title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mabala Wemba raided Ngolombe village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mabala Wemba raided Ngolombe village in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted goats, chickens, ducks, and property. They forced ten people to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kabishula shot and killed a 22-year-old man in the Numbi locality of Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kabishula shot and killed a 22-year-old man in the Numbi locality of Kalehe territory. This incident occurred when the victim resisted the extortion of his property by the attackers.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 53-year-old man near Kalonge village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 53-year-old man near Kalonge village in Kalehe territory. The victim's body was found along the road leading to Bunyakiri.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed one woman, two boys and two men at Buhene village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed one woman, two boys and two men at Buhene village in Nyiragongo territory. The attackers injured six people and kidnapped ten people. They also demanded a ransom of $20000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a man from Mbiza village in Kabare territory released the hostage.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a man from Mbiza village in Kabare territory released the hostage.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 40-year-old man at Kasusukamu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 40-year-old man at Kasusukamu village in Beni territory. The victim succumbed to his injuries while being rushed to the hospital.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the villages of Mbiza, Karhole and Mufuma in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the villages of Mbiza, Karhole and Mufuma in Kabare territory. The attackers shot and killed a 42-year-old man and a 58-year-old woman. They also abducted a 45-year-old man. The attackers also looted property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a man and his son with machetes in the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a man and his son with machetes in the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni town.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen who were looting goods and medicine from Maleki village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen who were looting goods and medicine from Maleki village in Beni territory. The FARDC chased the attackers.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted property and medicine from homes and a health center at Maleki village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted property and medicine from homes and a health center at Maleki village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: The population raided police facilities at Cituzo village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: The population raided police facilities at Cituzo village in Kabare territory. The population wanted to remove a gunman who had been arrested on suspicion of having killed a man and wounding others in Shanga village. Police dispersed protesters and injured a man.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kokodikoko and Ndusha raided Kakuku village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kokodikoko and Ndusha raided Kakuku village in Mwenga territory. The attackers looted money, goats, chickens, and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a 27-year-old man in the Kalinda neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a 27-year-old man in the Kalinda neighborhood of Beni town. The body of the victim showing signs of strangulation was found in a football stadium.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided houses at Shanga village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided houses at Shanga village in Kabare territory. The attackers killed a 55-year-old man and injured four others. They also looted $500 and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed two guards assigned to the Goma Institute of Goma town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed two guards assigned to the Goma Institute of Goma town.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani, who had forced six men to carry looted goods from the villages of Lungomangoma and Miruwa in Kalehe territory, released the hostages.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani, who had forced six men to carry looted goods from the villages of Lungomangoma and Miruwa in Kalehe territory, released the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed an FARDC soldier in the Kamesimbonzo neighborhood of Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed an FARDC soldier in the Kamesimbonzo neighborhood of Butembo town. The attackers stole an AK-47 rifle from the killed soldier.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani raided the villages of Lungomangoma and Miruwa in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani raided the villages of Lungomangoma and Miruwa in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted poultry and food. They also forced six men to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: The population opposed the dignified and secure burial of a person who died of Ebola at Mambowa village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The population opposed the dignified and secure burial of a person who died of Ebola at Mambowa village in Lubero territory. The people burned the Ebola transit center and ransacked three vehicles. The police dispersed the protesters. The police also killed one man and injured another.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted two motorboats and 13 fishermens' nets on Lake Kivu near Nkuvu village in Idjwi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted two motorboats and 13 fishermens' nets on Lake Kivu near Nkuvu village in Idjwi territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a mini-bus near Kaseghe locality in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a mini-bus near Kaseghe locality in Lubero territory. The robbers looted money and property. They also kidnapped five men and demanded ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Mutarule I village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Mutarule I village in Uvira territory. The attackers shot at the occupants of the house. This incident resulted in the death of a 35-year-old man and the injury of a woman and a baby.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Kavumbi attacked an FARDC position at Kahira village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Kavumbi attacked an FARDC position at Kahira village in Masisi territory. The FARDC fought back and chased the attackers.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Butachibera, who had kidnapped and raped a 14-year-old girl at Miyenge village in Kalehe territory on 10 March 2019, released the hostage after receiving payment of the $60 ransom.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Butachibera, who had kidnapped and raped a 14-year-old girl at Miyenge village in Kalehe territory on 10 March 2019, released the hostage after receiving payment of the $60 ransom.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Buhirwha, who had kidnapped a 45-year-old man from Kigwena village in Uvira territory on 11 March 2019, released the hostage after receiving payment of the $1500 ransom.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Buhirwha, who had kidnapped a 45-year-old man from Kigwena village in Uvira territory on 11 March 2019, released the hostage after receiving payment of the $1500 ransom.

title/0/en: Two men, who had been kidnapped by three unidentified gunmen from Mutuza village in Kalehe territory on 10 March 2019, escaped from their captors.
notes/en: Two men, who had been kidnapped by three unidentified gunmen from Mutuza village in Kalehe territory on 10 March 2019, escaped from their captors.

title/0/en: The APCLS kidnapped three men from Lwibo village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The APCLS kidnapped three men from Lwibo village in Masisi territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $1800 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: The ADF, who had kidnapped women and men in Beni territory, have released twenty-three hostages at Masesele village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF, who had kidnapped women and men from Beni territory, have released twenty-three hostages at Masesele village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Kasenga neighborhood of the Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Kasenga neighborhood of the Uvira rural commune. The attackers shot and killed a 71-year-old man.

title/0/en: The population ransacked the Mathe health center in the Mutsanga neighborhood of Butembo town.
notes/en: The population ransacked the Mathe health center in the Mutsanga neighborhood of Butembo town. The population tortured a nurse suspected of being an Ebola response officer. The police dispersed protesters.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men aged 40 and 54, respectively, from a farm in Mutuza village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men aged 40 and 54, respectively, from a farm in Mutuza village in Kalehe territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $20000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified men attacked at an Ebola treatment center in the Lumumba neighborhood of Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified men attacked at an Ebola treatment center in the Lumumba neighborhood of Butembo town. The FARDC and the police guarding it retaliated. The attack resulted in the death of one policeman, one injured and one captured assailant, and four injured civilians.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi raided Mweso town in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi raided Mweso town in Masisi territory. The police retaliated. This confrontation resulted in one injured policeman and another captured.

title/0/en: The police tortured and injured three men during an arrest at Butwasenge village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The police tortured and injured three men during an arrest at Butwasenge village in Kalehe territory. The victims were admitted to Kalonge General Hospital for treatment.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Katale village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Katale village in Masisi territory. The attackers killed two men and injured another. The injured victim was sent to Masisi hospital.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Manzanza village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Manzanza village in Beni territory. The attackers killed four men, a woman, and a boy.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen during an attempt to loot cows at Mutarule village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen during an attempt to loot cows at Mutarule village in Uvira territory. The FARDC chased the attackers. This incident resulted in the shooting and injury of a 16-year-old girl.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mwenyemali near Kahanda village in Uvira territory during an attempt to plunder cows.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mwenyemali near Kahanda village in Uvira territory during an attempt to plunder cows. The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali did not manage to take the cows away.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Jean Musumbu and Makindu raided Itula-Katembele village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Jean Musumbu and Makindu raided Itula-Katembele village in Shabunda territory. The attackers captured four police officers, abducted eight men and three girls. They raped the three abducted girls. The Raia Mutomboki also took away four weapons.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen stabbed a woman near Mukwidja village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen stabbed a woman near Mukwidja village in Kalehe territory. The attackers stole a part of the corpse. The body of the victim was found near Lake Kivu.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles attacked a park ranger station at Kyanika village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles attacked a park ranger station at Kyanika village in Lubero territory. This attack resulted in one death and several wounded park rangers.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ngandu stole five goats, ten ducks and six chickens from Bwise village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ngandu stole five goats, ten ducks and six chickens from Bwise village in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Kasenga neighborhood of rural Uvira.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Kasenga neighborhood of rural Uvira. The attackers wounded a 51-year-old man and his wife. They also stole money and two televisions.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed seven motorbikes near Malinde village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed seven motorbikes near Malinde village in Fizi territory. The robbers looted money and property. The attackers also raped a woman.

title/0/en: Police officers, supported by the FARDC, shot and killed a 25-year-old man and wounded five other youths at Cibanda village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Police officers, supported by the FARDC, shot and killed a 25-year-old man and wounded five other youths at Cibanda village in Mwenga territory. This occurred due to the youths' resistance to arrest.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position in the Kyaghala neighborhood of Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position in the Kyaghala neighborhood of Butembo town. The attack resulted in one dead and one wounded in the ranks of the attackers, two dead and three wounded for the FARDC. The FARDC chased the attackers. The FARDC also looted property from the population.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen captured an ANR agent from the Mweso locality of Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen captured an ANR agent from the Mweso locality of Masisi territory. The attackers shot several times into the air before leaving.

title/0/en: Two FARDC soldiers raided a telephone network antenna station at Minova village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Two FARDC soldiers raided a telephone network antenna station at Minova village in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted $121, a computer, twenty phones, and two power banks.

title/0/en: The ADF, who had abducted men and women from several settlements in Beni territory, released fourteen men, seven women and a girl at Mayi-Safi village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF, who had abducted men and women from several settlements in Beni territory, released fourteen men, seven women and a girl at Mayi-Safi village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mbulu, who had kidnapped a man from Kihurwe village in Uvira territory on February 25, 2019, released the hostage after the Burundian armed forces arrested the supposed receiver of the ransom.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mbulu, who had kidnapped a man from Kihurwe village in Uvira territory on February 25, 2019, released the hostage after the Burundian armed forces arrested the supposed receiver of the ransom.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Butachibera raided Bubamba village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Butachibera raided Bubamba village in Kalehe territory. The attackers stabbed three men aged 26, 36 and 50, respectively. They also looted eight goats, sixteen hens, a mattress, and a bag of peanuts.

title/0/en: A policeman shot his wife in the Kyondo rural commune.
notes/en: A policeman shot his wife in the Kyondo rural commune. The victim was rushed to the Kyondo General Hospital.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen stabbed and killed a man at Bugarura village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen stabbed and killed a man at Bugarura village in Nyiragongo territory. The corpse of the victim was found by a passerby.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Nyatura Kavumbi's position at Bugori village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Nyatura Kavumbi's position at Bugori village in Masisi territory. The attack resulted in the death of one NDC Guidon fighter, five dead on the Nyatura Kavumbi's side, and four dead and four wounded among civilians.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Luti village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Luti village in Kalehe territory. The attackers stole two phones and a suitcase of clothes.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed two men in the Majengo neighborhood of Goma town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed two men in the Majengo neighborhood of Goma town.

title/0/en: The Biloze Bshambuke and CNPSC attacked the Ngumino fighters allied with Twiganeho fighters in the villages of Biziba and Matanganyika in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Biloze Bshambuke and CNPSC attacked the Ngumino fighters allied with Twiganeho fighters in the villages of Biziba and Matanganyika in Fizi territory. The attack resulted in the burning of thirty-two houses and the looting of cows.

title/0/en: The FARDC dispersed protesters who wanted to file a memorandum to the governor, denouncing growing insecurity in Goma town.
notes/en: The FARDC dispersed protesters who wanted to file a memorandum to the governor, denouncing growing insecurity in Goma town.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Nyatura Domi in the Mweso locality of Masisi territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Nyatura Domi in the Mweso locality of Masisi territory. The FARDC intervened to put an end to this clash.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped thirteen people from the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma town on March 2, 2019, released the hostages after receiving payment of the ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped thirteen people from the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma town on March 2, 2019, released the hostages after receiving payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen amputated three cows' hooves at Chambombo village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen amputated three cows' hooves at Chambombo village in Kalehe territory. The attackers abandoned them in their pasture.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo and Lance Muteya raided Nyalukulu village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo and Lance Muteya raided Nyalukulu village in Kalehe territory. The attackers stole a cow and eight goats.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma town. The attackers killed one woman, six men, and wounded three men. They also kidnapped thirteen people and demanded a ransom of $10000 for the release of the hostages. The attackers looted money and property from some homes.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked a Mai-Mai Ebu Ela position who were in the process of surrendering at Kafulo village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked a Mai-Mai Ebu Ela position who were in the process of surrendering at Kafulo village in Fizi territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Nguru attempted to raid the Kyavinyonge locality of Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Nguru attempted to raid the Kyavinyonge locality of Beni territory. The FARDC responded by capturing four Mai-Mai Nguru fighters and their weapons.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier raped a 12-year-old girl at Numbi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier raped a 12-year-old girl at Numbi village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: The population wanted to lynch a policeman who was trying to steal a sheep the Kitchanga locality of Masisi territory.
notes/en: The population wanted to lynch a policeman who was trying to steal a sheep the Kitchanga locality of Masisi territory. Other officers intervened by firing bullets into the air and released their colleague.

title/0/en: The ADF, which had kidnapped men and women from several settlements in the Beni territory, released seven men and seven women at Makembi village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF, which had kidnapped men and women from several settlements in the Beni territory, released seven men and seven women at Makembi village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Mulongwe neighborhood of rural Uvira.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Mulongwe neighborhood of rural Uvira. The attackers looted $2000, a TV, and seven phones.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Munanira village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Munanira village in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted property.

title/0/en: The population protested against the FARDC's presence at Tubimbi village in Walungu territory after the killing of a teacher by a soldier.
notes/en: The population protested against the FARDC's presence at Tubimbi village in Walungu territory after the killing of a teacher by a soldier. Following pressure from the population, the FARDC left the village.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC soldier at Bunyuka village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC soldier at Bunyuka village in Beni territory. The attackers killed the FARDC soldier and stole his weapon.

title/0/en: A policeman injured six people in the Mutsanga neighborhood of Butembo town with a grenade.
notes/en: A policeman injured six people in the Mutsanga neighborhood of Butembo town with a grenade. The incident occurred when the population attempted to apprehend a driver, who had just crashed into three people and was attempting to flee from the police.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Musumbu set fire to the Museme Primary School office at Lusenge village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Musumbu set fire to the Museme Primary School office at Lusenge village in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a 25-year-old man at Tubimbi village in Walungu territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a 25-year-old man at Tubimbi village in Walungu territory.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Mulongwe neighborhood of the Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Mulongwe neighborhood of the Uvira rural commune. The attackers shot and killed a 49-year-old man. They also stole some money.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man from Kasitu village in Beni territory on February 26, 2019, released the hostage after receiving payment of the ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man from Kasitu village in Beni territory on February 26, 2019, released the hostage after receiving payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the kidnappers, who still held a hostage among those kidnapped near Kitemesho village in Uvira territory on February 26, 2019.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the kidnappers, who still held a hostage among those kidnapped near Kitemesho village in Uvira territory on February 26, 2019. The FARDC killed a kidnapper and released the hostage.

title/0/en: The Ngumino and Twiganeho attacked CNPSC positions in the villages of Robondo, Monda, Matanganyika and Bengwa in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Ngumino and Twiganeho attacked CNPSC positions in the villages of Robondo, Monda, Matanganyika and Bengwa in Fizi territory. These clashes resulted in three dead and six wounded in the ranks of Ngumino, three dead on the side of Mai-Mai, five dead and fourteen wounded civilians. The CNPSC chased the Ngumino and Twiganeho.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen tried to loot the Bisunzu Mining Company's ore deposit at Rubaya village.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen tried to loot the Bisunzu Mining Company's ore deposit at Rubaya village. The police officers guarding the depot responded and chased the attackers.

title/0/en: A Raia Mutomboki Kabishula fighter flogged an 88-year-old woman at Chambombo village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: A Raia Mutomboki Kabishula fighter flogged an 88-year-old woman at Chambombo village in Kalehe territory. The victim succumbed to his injuries.

title/0/en: An unidentified gunman shot and wounded a 28-year-old man near Kitaho village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An unidentified gunman shot and wounded a 28-year-old man near Kitaho village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an Ebola treatment center in the Lumumba neighborhood of Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an Ebola treatment center in the Lumumba neighborhood of Butembo town. This attack resulted in the death of a policeman, a part of the center, a jeep, and ten motorcycles burned.

title/0/en: Police dispersed a demonstration of LUCHA activists from the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma town.
notes/en: Police dispersed a demonstration of LUCHA activists from the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma town. Police arrested twenty-two activists. The LUCHA activists wanted to file a memorandum to the governor demanding security in the town of Goma.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped two men near Kitemesho village in Uvira territory on February 26, 2019, released one of the hostages to facilitate a ransom negotiation.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped two men near Kitemesho village in Uvira territory on February 26, 2019, released one of the hostages to facilitate a ransom negotiation.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai CNPSC killed a fighter who had raped a woman at Robondo village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai CNPSC killed a Ngumino fighter who had raped a woman at Robondo village in Fizi territory.

title/0/en: The Ngumino, supported by the Twiganeho, raided Monda village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Ngumino, supported by the Twiganeho, raided Monda village in Fizi territory. The attackers razed houses. They killed a man, a woman and a child in a burned house.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position at Mavivi village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position at Mavivi village in Beni territory. The FARDC killed an attacker and recovered three AK-47 rifles and missiles.

title/0/en: The ADF abducted two men from a field near Kungubamba village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF abducted two men from a field near Kungubamba village in Beni territory. The kidnappers demanded that the hostages serve as guides to attack an FARDC position in Mavivi.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen robbed a vehicle near Kitemesho village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen robbed a vehicle near Kitemesho village in Uvira territory. The robbers looted property. They also kidnapped two men aged 34 and 59, respectively. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $3000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided four houses in the Mabanga North neighborhood of Goma town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided four houses in the Mabanga North neighborhood of Goma town. The attackers looted money and property. They also hurt two men.

title/0/en: Six unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Cikonyi neighborhood of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Six unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Cikonyi neighborhood of Bukavu town. The attackers injured a 42-year-old man and his wife. They also looted some goods.

title/0/en: The ADF, who had abducted men during their attack of an FARDC position at Mamove village in Beni territory on 24 February 2019, released one of the hostages.
notes/en: The ADF, who had abducted men during their attack of an FARDC position at Mamove village in Beni territory on 24 February 2019, released one of the hostages.

title/0/en: A Ngumino fighter raped a woman at Robondo village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: A Ngumino fighter raped a woman at Robondo village in Fizi territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Kabikere village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Kabikere village in Kalehe territory. The attackers also looted money and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 25-year-old woman and a man at Sana village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 25-year-old woman and a man at Sana village in Lubero territory. The attackers escaped into the forest after the crime.

title/0/en: The FARDC tortured and injured a man at Mburamazi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC tortured and injured a man at Mburamazi village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers also robbed the victim.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mabala Wemba looted money, fifteen kilograms of cassiterite and eight telephones, from eight traders near Kabilu village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mabala Wemba looted money, fifteen kilograms of cassiterite and eight telephones, from eight traders near Kabilu village in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position at Kitevya village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position at Kitevya village in Beni territory. The FARDC chased the attackers.

title/0/en: Two FARDC soldiers shot and killed a man near Mangboko village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Two FARDC soldiers shot and killed a man near Mangboko village in Beni territory. The victim had been transporting both soldiers on his motorbike to bring them to Mbau.

title/0/en: Two Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin Mbaenda killed a 40-year-old woman near Vikilambo village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Two Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin Mbaenda killed a 40-year-old woman near Vikilambo village in Walikale territory. The killers threw the body of the victim into a river.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mbulu kidnapped a 55-year-old man from Kihurwe village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mbulu kidnapped a 55-year-old man from Kihurwe village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2000 for the release of the hostage. The ransom was to be sent to a Burundian number.

title/0/en: The police stole six goats and ten chickens from Mapimo village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The police stole six goats and ten chickens from Mapimo village in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from Kibanga village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from Kibanga village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a hospital center in the Ndendere neighborhood in Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a hospital center in the Ndendere neighborhood in Bukavu town. The attackers looted $950 and a computer.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attempted to raid a house in the Kyeshero neighborhood of Goma town at night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attempted to raid a house in the Kyeshero neighborhood of Goma town at night. The attackers faced resistance from a police officer in charge of guarding the plot. During the exchange of fire, the attackers fled having wounded the policeman.

title/0/en: The ADF raided Mamove village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF raided Mamove village in Beni territory. The raid resulted in deaths of two men and one woman, sixteen people kidnapped, and six houses including a pavilion of the Mamove health center burned.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a first-aid worker from the Red Cross from Mamove village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a first-aid worker from the Red Cross from Mamove village in Beni territory. The kidnappers demanded that the victim wear his outfit with the red cross logo.

title/0/en: Five unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Kakombe neighborhood of the Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Five unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Kakombe neighborhood of the Uvira rural commune. The attackers kidnapped a 40-year-old man and demanded a ransom of $2000 for the release of the hostage. They also stole money and goods.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi, who had kidnapped a woman from Iterero village in Rutshuru territory on February 19, 2019, released the victim after receiving payment of the $1500 ransom.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi, who had kidnapped a woman from Iterero village in Rutshuru territory on February 19, 2019, released the victim after receiving payment of the $1500 ransom.

title/0/en: Armed men burned the Ebola treatment center in the Katwa district of Butembo town.
notes/en: Armed men burned the Ebola treatment center in the Katwa district of Butembo town. The patients that were being treated at this center were referred to the ITAV site.

title/0/en: Five unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Kasanga neighborhood of Beni city.
notes/en: Five unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Kasanga neighborhood of Beni city. The attackers looted $77, a TV screen and a bag of clothes.

title/0/en: Five FARDC soldiers raided two houses in the Mambango neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: Five FARDC soldiers raided two houses in the Mambango neighborhood of Beni town. The attackers stole $100, two phones, a radio, a solar panel, and a shoe.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 63-year-old woman at Lumumba village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 63-year-old woman at Lumumba village in Uvira territory.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier tortured and injured a 35-year-old man in the Numbi locality of Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier tortured and injured a 35-year-old man in the Numbi locality of Kalehe territory. This incident occurred due to the low-cost sale of the soldier's mineral waste.

title/0/en: Alerted by the victims of looting near Kitemesho village in Uvira territory, the FARDC attacked the assailants who were looting civilians.
notes/en: Alerted by the victims of looting near Kitemesho village in Uvira territory, the FARDC attacked the assailants who were looting civilians. The FARDC chased the attackers.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money and property near Kitemesho village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money and property near Kitemesho village in Uvira territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Latin Quarter neighborhood of the Kasindi rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Latin Quarter neighborhood of the Kasindi rural commune. The attackers took away money, a phone and a TV screen.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided houses Chenkuru village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided houses Chenkuru village in Kabare territory. The attackers also looted property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen stabbed a man in the Ngongolio neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen stabbed a man in the Ngongolio neighborhood of Beni town. The body of the victim was found near the victim's home.

title/0/en: The population attacked Ebola response agents in the Bwinongo neighborhood of Butembo town.
notes/en: The population attacked Ebola response agents in the Bwinongo neighborhood of Butembo town. The incident occurred after a patient's death by Ebola. Police intervened to disperse the protesters.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 50-year-old man in the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 50-year-old man in the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni town. The body of the victim was found in a ravine.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked an FARDC position at Kikere village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked an FARDC position at Kikere village in Beni territory. The FARDC killed a man mistaking him for the enemy.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided houses at Ciranga village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided houses at Ciranga village in Kabare territory. The attackers also looted property.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi, who had abducted two women and a girl from Iterero village in Rutshuru territory on February 20, 2019, released the hostages.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi, who had abducted two women and a girl from Iterero village in Rutshuru territory on February 20, 2019, released the hostages.

title/0/en: A police officer shot at his colleague and a detainee at Busumba village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: A police officer shot at his colleague and a detainee at Busumba village in Masisi territory. The victims succumbed to their wounds. The officer responsible for this incident then committed suicide by shooting himself.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 35-year-old man at Kasavava village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 35-year-old man at Kasavava village in Beni territory. The body of the victim was found in a compound.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided several houses in the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided several houses in the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma town. The attackers killed two women and three men. They also kidnapped nearly twelve people. They demanded a ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: An armed man carrying a weapon stabbed a man near Butuhe village in Beni territory.
notes/en: An armed man stabbed a man near Butuhe village in Beni territory. The victim died at the Butuhe Health Center.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Delphin Mbaenda arrested and tortured two women aged 22 and 34, respectively, in Lukaraba village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Delphin Mbaenda arrested and tortured two women aged 22 and 34, respectively, in Lukaraba village in Walikale territory. The victims had been accused of witchcraft by their neighbors. The injured victims were taken to the Hombo health post for appropriate care.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi abducted two women and a girl near Iterero (Kishishe) village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi abducted two women and a girl near Iterero (Kishishe) village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers raped the hostages.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked a Mai-Mai Mazembe position at Vurondo village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked a Mai-Mai Mazembe position at Vurondo village in Beni territory. The attack resulted in the injury of two FARDC soldiers, and four dead and two captured in the ranks of Mai-Mai Mazembe. The FARDC recovered two AK-47 rifles, three spears, a phone, ammunition, and amulets.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided several houses at Cigukiro village in Walungu territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided several houses at Cigukiro village in Walungu territory. The attackers injured a 32-year-old woman and two men aged 35 and 45. They also looted property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from Kambake village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from Kambake village in Beni territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted $363, medicine from a pharmacy, and goods from a shop in the Mulongwe neighborhood of the Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted $363, medicine from a pharmacy, and goods from a shop in the Mulongwe neighborhood of the Uvira rural commune. The attackers also stole a TV screen and a motorcycle.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi kidnapped a 34-year-old woman from Kishishe village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi kidnapped a 34-year-old woman from Kishishe village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers raped the hostage. They demanded a ransom of $6000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The RED Tabara took twelve cows from a farm in Masango village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The RED Tabara took twelve cows from a farm in Masango village in Uvira territory. The FARDC alerted did not intercept the attackers.

title/0/en: Alerted to the looting of cows and passengers' property, the FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mwenyemali near Kitemesho village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Alerted to the looting of cows and passengers' property, the FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mwenyemali near Kitemesho village in Uvira territory. During the attack, three cows were killed and three others were wounded, among those stolen by the attackers.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the FARDC who wanted to establish their position at Kyuto village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the FARDC who wanted to establish a position at Kyuto village in Lubero territory. The NDC Guidon flushed the FARDC out of this village. The attack left five dead in the ranks of the FARDC and one wounded for the NDC Guidon.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali stole eight cows near Kitemesho village in Uvira territory, after stealing money and goods from the passengers of two vehicles.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali stole eight cows near Kitemesho village in Uvira territory, after stealing money and goods from the passengers of two vehicles.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali robbed two cars near Kitemseho village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali robbed two cars near Kitemseho village in Uvira territory. The attackers looted money and goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Bunzi neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Bunzi neighborhood of Beni town. The attackers shot and killed a 60-year-old man and looted $24.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi, who had abducted a man from Buhambi village in Rutshuru territory on February 17, 2019, following a land conflict, released the hostage after making peace with his neighbor.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi, who had abducted a man from Buhambi village in Rutshuru territory on February 17, 2019, following a land conflict, released the hostage after making peace with his neighbor.

title/0/en: Mapenzi group fighters tortured and injured the village chief of Lwashi village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Mapenzi group fighters tortured and injured the village chief of Lwashi village in Masisi territory. The victim succumbed to his wounds.

title/0/en: Unidentified men abducted a 10-year-old girl from Chibonaboshi village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men abducted a 10-year-old girl from Chibonaboshi village in Kabare territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man from Nyange village in Fizi territory, released the hostage after receiving payment of a ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man from Nyange village in Fizi territory, released the hostage after receiving payment of a ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen abducted a man and his wife from Kaleveryo village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen abducted a man and his wife from Kaleveryo village in Beni territory. The attackers stabbed and killed the man before leaving the wife in front of her husband's corpse.

title/0/en: The FARDC captured an ADF fighter at Gawa village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC captured an ADF fighter at Gawa village in Beni territory. The FARDC also recovered a PKM machine gun.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Shabani raided Lwasha village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Shabani raided Lwasha village in Kalehe territory. The attackers stole $60 and fourteen goats. They also tortured and injured three men aged 45, 56 and 60, respectively.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 71-year-old man at Kawizi village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 71-year-old man at Kawizi village in Uvira territory.

title/0/en: The ADF raided Mavivi village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF raided Mavivi village in Beni territory. The FARDC repelled the attackers. A man and a woman were killed as a result of the clash.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kidjangala at Kanga, Kabere, and Kahungu villages in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kidjangala at Kanga, Kabere, and Kahungu villages in Uvira territory. The attack resulted in the deaths of two Mai-Mai Kidjangala fighters.

title/0/en: The FARDC shot and wounded two men at Kaniro village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC shot and wounded two men at Kaniro village in Masisi territory. The victims were taken to Masisi Hospital for appropriate care.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked FARDC soldiers guarding a road toll booth in the Malende neighborhood of Butembo town.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked FARDC soldiers guarding a road toll booth in the Malende neighborhood of Butembo town. The attackers chased the FARDC from their position.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Lukoba and Ndarumanga robbed three motorbikes near Nyombe village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Lukoba and Ndarumanga robbed three motorbikes near Nyombe village in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted money and property. They forced six men to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed another FARDC soldier at Ramba village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed another FARDC soldier at Ramba village in Kalehe territory. This incident occurred following a discussion about nationality. The victim had described his colleague as Rwandan.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD attacked a Mai-Mai Mazembe position at Kayna village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD attacked a Mai-Mai Mazembe position at Kayna village in Rutshuru territory. This attack resulted in one dead and six wounded Mai-Mai Mazembe fighters.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi abducted a man from Buhambi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi abducted a man from Buhambi village in Rutshuru territory. They kidnapped the victim following a land dispute with his neighbor.

title/0/en: Knife-wielding men stabbed a 17-year-old boy guarding a gas station in the Virunga neighborhood of Goma town.
notes/en: Knife-wielding men stabbed a 17-year-old boy guarding a gas station in the Virunga neighborhood of Goma town. The victim succumbed to his injuries.

title/0/en: The FARDC forced civilians to carry their belongings during their relocation to Kitindi village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The FARDC forced civilians to carry their belongings during their relocation to Kitindi village in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified men stabbed a man at Biambwe village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men stabbed a man at Biambwe village in Lubero territory. The attackers perched the victim's head on a spear in the victim's plot.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from Nyange village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from Nyange village in Fizi territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked a Mai-Mai Kilalo UPLC position at Kitahuha village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked a Mai-Mai Kilalo UPLC position at Kitahuha village in Beni territory. This attack resulted in two dead and four captured Mai-Mai UPLC fighters. The FARDC also recovered an AK-47 rifle and a spear.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed six people in the Mugunga neighborhood of Goma town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed six people in the Mugunga neighborhood of Goma town.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position at Masulukwede village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position at Masulukwede village in Beni territory. The attack resulted in the four deaths and six wounded for the FARDC.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the FNL Nzabampema at Busisi village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the FNL Nzabampema at Busisi village in Uvira territory. The FARDC killed six FNL fighters and burned down their homes. The FARDC sustained a few injuries.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed two people in the Bugamba village of Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed two people in the Bugamba village of Nyiragongo territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a person in the Katoyi neighborhood of Goma town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a person in the Katoyi neighborhood of Goma town.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen beheaded a man in his house at Kanyatsi village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen beheaded a man in his house at Kanyatsi village in Lubero territory. The victim died from the beheading.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Bukira village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Bukira village in Beni territory. The attackers stole a goat and guinea pigs.

title/0/en: The Nyatura FDP robbed five motorbikes near Kanyambundu village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura FDP robbed five motorbikes near Kanyambundu village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers stole an alcoholic beverage, commonly called Chief, and two motorcycles.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru raided Rumondo village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru raided Rumondo village in Kalehe territory. The attackers arrested and forcibly recruited four young boys into their ranks.

title/0/en: The RED Tabara attacked unidentified gunmen at Kitembe village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The RED Tabara attacked unidentified gunmen at Kitembe village in Uvira territory. The attack resulted in two wounded men.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 61-year-old woman in the Kakombe neighborhood of the Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 61-year-old woman in the Kakombe neighborhood of the Uvira rural commune.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Mitoyi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Mitoyi village in Kalehe territory. The attackers shot and wounded a 44-year-old woman. They also stole money.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 35-year-old man at Mukungwe village in Walungu territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 35-year-old man at Mukungwe village in Walungu territory. The body of the victim was found in a river.

title/0/en: The FNL Nzabampema robbed two mini-buses of the Baleine and Okapi agencies near Munywema village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FNL Nzabampema robbed two mini-buses of the Baleine and Okapi agencies near Munywema village in Uvira territory. The robbers killed a woman and injured others. They also looted goods from the passengers.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raped two women aged 31and 35, in their respective fields near Rusingeti village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raped two women aged 31and 35, in their respective fields near Rusingeti village in Uvira territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali, who had kidnapped a man and a woman from Nyamugali village in Uvira territory on February 11, 2019, released the hostages after receiving payment of the $363 ransom.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali, who had kidnapped a man and a woman from Nyamugali village in Uvira territory on February 11, 2019, released the hostages after receiving payment of the $363 ransom.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mbulu who had kidnapped a man near Ngendo village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mbulu who had kidnapped a man near Ngendo village in Uvira territory. The FARDC killed three attackers and released the hostage.

title/0/en: The population rebelled against a team responsible for the dignified and secure burial of people who have died from Ebola at Kitatumba Cemetery in Butembo town.
notes/en: The population rebelled against a team responsible for the dignified and secure burial of people who have died from Ebola at Kitatumba Cemetery in Butembo town. The protestors injured five members of this team by stoning and damaged two vehicles.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man from Kanga village in Uvira territory on February 12, 2019, released the hostage after receiving payment of a $272 ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man from Kanga village in Uvira territory on February 12, 2019, released the hostage after receiving payment of a $272 ransom.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Kakombe neighborhood of the rural Uvira commune.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Kakombe neighborhood of the rural Uvira commune. The attackers shot and killed a 36-year-old man. They stole money and some goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Changezi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Changezi village in Kalehe territory. The attackers injured a 62-year-old man. They also stole money.

title/0/en: Four FDLR-RUD fighters, who had kidnapped a 34-year-old man from Mirumba village in Rutshuru territory on 11 February 2019, released the hostage after receiving payment of a $150 ransom.
notes/en: Four FDLR-RUD fighters, who had kidnapped a 34-year-old man from Mirumba village in Rutshuru territory on 11 February 2019, released the hostage after receiving payment of a $150 ransom.

title/0/en: The ADF killed two men and a woman near Mamove village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF killed two men and a woman near Mamove village in Beni territory. The attackers also burned three motorcycles.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 63-year-old man from Kanga village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 63-year-old man from Kanga village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen attempting, to loot a house shot and wounded two men aged 42 and 48, respectively, and a 35-year-old woman in the Numbi locality of Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen attempting, to loot a house shot and wounded two men aged 42 and 48, respectively, and a 35-year-old woman in the Numbi locality of Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a 53-year-old man in his field near Kitaraga village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a 53-year-old man in his field near Kitaraga village in Rutshuru territory. The victim refused to carry the soldier's baggage.

title/0/en: The ADF looted drugs from a health facility at Mamove village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF looted drugs from a health facility at Mamove village in Beni territory. The attackers also abducted civilians.

title/0/en: The ADF who had just looted drugs from a health facility and abducted civilians attacked an FARDC position at Mamove village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF who had just looted drugs from a health facility and abducted civilians attacked an FARDC position at Mamove village in Beni territory. The attack left four attackers and eleven FARDC soldiers dead. The attackers set fire to the FARDC camp. The FARDC recovered four AK47's, one PKM, six rockets, and some ammunition. The ADF abandoned the four hostages and the looted goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked a guard post at Museya village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked a guard post at Museya village in Beni territory. Park guards supported by the FARDC chased the attackers. This attack resulted in the deaths of two attackers. The park guards and the FARDC recovered an AK47 rifle, a military uniform and a chain of ammunition.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen raided a house in Bulinga village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen raided a house in Bulinga village in Uvira territory. The attackers raped a 21-year-old girl.

title/0/en: Four FDLR-RUD fighters kidnapped a 34-year-old man from Mirumba village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Four FDLR-RUD fighters kidnapped a 34-year-old man from Mirumba village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men, aged 35 and 38, respectively, near Kigulube village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men, aged 35 and 38, respectively, near Kigulube village in Shabunda territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $500 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo UPLC ambushed four FARDC soldiers at Mataba village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo UPLC ambushed four FARDC soldiers at Mataba village in Beni territory. The attackers killed three FARDC soldiers and injured another. They stole three AK47 rifles from dead FARDC soldiers.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mwenyemali kidnapped a 56-year-old man and a 55-year-old woman from Nyamugali village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mwenyemali kidnapped a 56-year-old man and a 55-year-old woman from Nyamugali village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2500 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who had forced 20 people to carry looted property from Ngalula village in Fizi territory on February 10, 2019, released the hostages.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had forced 20 people to carry looted property from Ngalula village in Fizi territory on February 10, 2019, released the hostages.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mbulu kidnapped a man from Ngendo village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mbulu kidnapped a man from Ngendo village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position at Ndombi village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position at Ndombi village in Beni territory. The FARDC retaliated.

title/0/en: Protesters ransacked the Muhatikani health center at Luotu village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Protesters ransacked the Muhatikani health center at Luotu village in Lubero territory. They protested against the transfer of a patient to the Ebola treatment center. Police dispersed the protesters.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a shop in the Minova locality of Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a shop in the Minova locality of Kalehe territory. The burglars looted $800 and goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position at Kitaragha village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position at Kitaragha village in Beni territory. This attack resulted in the injury of an FARDC soldier. The attackers set fire to the FARDC camp.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a shop at Kalungu town in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a shop at Kalungu town in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a man and his wife in Mulangala village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a man and his wife in Mulangala village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked two FARDC soldiers guarding the toll road barrier at Busalali village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked two FARDC soldiers guarding the toll road barrier at Busalali village in Beni territory. The attackers killed one FARDC soldier and injured another. They took away the corpse of the soldier.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted $200 and drugs from a pharmacy in the Mulongwe neighborhood, of the Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted $200 and drugs from a pharmacy in the Mulongwe neighborhood, of the Uvira rural commune. The attackers also stole phones and other goods from passers-by. They fired bullets in the air before leaving.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Ngalula village in Fizi territory. The attackers looted property.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Ngalula village in Fizi territory. The attackers looted property. They also forced men and women to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: The population burned down a health center in the Mavono neighborhood of Butembo town following the transfer of a suspected Ebola patient to an Ebola treatment center.
notes/en: The population burned down a health center in the Mavono neighborhood of Butembo town following the transfer of a suspected Ebola patient to an Ebola treatment center. The police intervened late and arrested some civilians.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped seven people from Kasha village in Rutshuru territory, released the rest of the hostages after receiving payment of a ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped seven people from Kasha village in Rutshuru territory, released the rest of the hostages after receiving payment of a ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man who had gone to pay a ransom to free hostages near Bunyangula village in Rutshuru territory
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man, who had gone to pay a ransom to free hostages, near Bunyangula village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Orac village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Orac village in Uvira territory. The attackers injured a 51-year-old man and his 34-year-old wife. They also stole $5000.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier killed a 45-year-old woman with a machete in the Lyakobo neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier killed a 45-year-old woman with a machete in the Lyakobo neighborhood of Beni town. The FARDC soldier attempted to rape the victim who resisted.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 19-year-old man at Bubale I village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 19-year-old man at Bubale I village in Kalehe territory. The body of the victim was found with injuries.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men who had abducted civilians from the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni town on 07 February, 2019 killed one of the hostages near Bwerera village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men who had abducted civilians from the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni town on 07 February, 2019 killed one of the hostages near Bwerera village in Beni territory. The body of the victim was found by the inhabitants of the village.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Mundima village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Mundima village in Beni territory. The attackers killed a 60-year-old man with a machete and wounded his wife. They also burned four houses.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Katelengo village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Katelengo village in Nyiragongo territory. The attackers injured a man. They also looted goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped two Belgian MSF agents from Bitoyi village in Masisi territory, released them in the evening of the same day.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped two Belgian MSF agents from Bitoyi village in Masisi territory, released them in the evening of the same day.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe have taken three weapons from FARDC soldiers in the Kimbulu locality of Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe have taken three weapons from FARDC soldiers in the Kimbulu locality of Lubero territory. The attackers attacked the soldiers in their houses scattered in the area.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position at Pk 9 in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position at Pk 9 in Beni territory. This attack left two dead and four wounded in the ranks of the FARDC.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed his wife and a 6-year-old boy in the Mbau locality of Beni territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed his wife and a 6-year-old boy in the Mbau locality of Beni territory. This soldier then shot himself and died.

title/0/en: The ADF killed a man, two women and a child with a knife near Kudukudu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF killed a man, two women and a child with a knife near Kudukudu village in Beni territory. The bodies of the victims were found in a field.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two Belgian MSF agents from Bitoyi village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two Belgian MSF agents from Bitoyi village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked men who were raiding the Rwangoma neighborhood in Beni town.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked men who were raiding the Rwangoma neighborhood in Beni town. The attackers retreated from the area with their hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Katanga village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Katanga village in Fizi territory. The attackers abducted a 44-year-old man and then killed him.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni town. The attackers killed one man, five women, a girl, and a boy. They kidnapped three men, a woman, three boys, and a girl.

title/0/en: The police suppressed a demonstration by LUCHA members demanding the removal of the barrier erected at Goma's public port.
notes/en: The police suppressed a demonstration by LUCHA members demanding the removal of the barrier erected at Goma's public port. The police arrested seven protesters.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Mwangaza neighborhood of the Kasindi commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Mwangaza neighborhood of the Kasindi commune. The attackers wounded a man with a machete. They also stole $319.

title/0/en: Two unidentified men killed a 17-year-old boy near Kamonyi village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified men killed a 17-year-old boy near Kamonyi village in Uvira territory. The killers were the victim's clients. The killers stole the victim's motorcycle and the victim's phone.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Kaloba village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Kaloba village in Kalehe territory. The attackers shot and killed a 34-year-old man and wounded his 34-year-old wife as well.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped seven people on the way to their fields near Kasha village in Rutshuru territory on February 2, 2019, released a hostage without receiving payment of a ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped seven people on the way to their fields near Kasha village in Rutshuru territory on February 2, 2019, released a hostage without receiving payment of a ransom. The abductors asked the victim to deliver a letter detailing the conditions for the release of the other hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Mukungwe village in Walungu territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Mukungwe village in Walungu territory. The attackers looted money and property. They also stabbed a man and a woman.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Kasindi rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Kasindi rural commune. The attackers stabbed a man, his wife, and a child. They also stole $4000.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a man near Bukoroghoto village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a man near Bukoroghoto village in Beni territory. The corpse was removed from the scene by the police.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen looted money, four phones, and a power bank in the Kalinda neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen looted money, four phones, and a power bank in the Kalinda neighborhood of Beni town.

title/0/en: An unidentified man stabbed his driver in the Kitulu neighborhood of Butembo town.
notes/en: An unidentified man stabbed his driver in the Kitulu neighborhood of Butembo town. The attacker stole the victim's bike. The victim managed to steal the weapon held by the assailant.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot at a 38-year-old man at Kinyatsi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot at a 38-year-old man at Kinyatsi village in Rutshuru territory. The victim was rushed to the Rutshuru General Hospital where he died.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raped two women returning from their fields near Mangwa village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raped two women returning from their fields near Mangwa village in Uvira territory.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Makindu raided Mukoloka village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Makindu raided Mukoloka village in Shabunda territory. The attackers also looted chickens, ducks and property.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked three Mai-Mai Charles fighters at Buramba village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked three Mai-Mai Charles fighters at Buramba village in Rutshuru territory. The FARDC killed a Mai-Mai Charles fighter, recovering two AK-47 rifles, a motorola radio and a hemp bag.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo UPLC attacked police officers guarding detention cells at Mabalako locality in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo UPLC attacked police officers guarding detention cells at Mabalako locality in Beni territory. After the police had fled, the attackers released one of their comrades who was detained, and his fellow detainees.

title/0/en: After an unidentified gunman killed a 16-year-old girl next to a police station in the Kyeshero neighborhood of Goma town, the people set fire to the Kyeshero neighborhood office and police station.
notes/en: After a policeman killed  a 16-year-old girl next to a police station in the Kyeshero neighborhood of Goma town, the people set fire to the Kyeshero neighborhood office and police station.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo UPLC burned nine mattresses donated to a health center in the Ebola response program at Kasitu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo UPLC burned nine mattresses donated to a health center in the Ebola response program at Kasitu village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Rushaba kidnapped a woman and injured her husband in the Rugenge neighborhood of rural Uvira.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Rushaba kidnapped a woman and injured her husband in the Rugenge neighborhood of rural Uvira. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $1000 for the release of the hostage. They also looted ten goats.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen assaulted a woman at the entrance of her plot in the Kasabinyole neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen assaulted a woman at the entrance of her plot in the Kasabinyole neighborhood of Beni town. The attackers also looted $8000 and gold jewelry.

title/0/en: Police shot and killed a 16-year-old girl in the Kyeshero neighborhood of Goma town.
notes/en: Police shot and killed a 16-year-old girl in the Kyeshero neighborhood of Goma town. The incident occurred when the police dispersed a crowd who wanted to attack an alleged thief.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Nzayi attacked the NDC Guidon at Munongo village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Nzayi attacked the NDC Guidon at Munongo village in Masisi territory. The NDC Guidon pushed the Nyatura Nzayi back. The attack resulted in the death of three Nyatura Nzayi fighters, one dead and one wounded on the NDC Guidon's side, and two civilian deaths.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen abducted a man from Kiriva village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen abducted a man from Kiriva village in Lubero territory. The kidnappers killed the hostage.

title/0/en: The population of Biambwe ransacked the Biambwe health center in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The population of Biambwe ransacked the Biambwe health center in Lubero territory. They were protesting against the taking of samples from a corpse.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles clashed with each other following an internal conflict near Kamuhororo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles clashed with each other following an internal conflict near Kamuhororo village in Rutshuru territory. This clash has left eight dead, including Charles himself.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Kyeshero district in Goma city.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Kyeshero district in Goma city. The attackers shot and wounded a man, and looted money and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a mini bus from the Okapi EL-SHADAI agency near Rutemba village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a mini bus from the Okapi EL-SHADAI agency near Rutemba village in Uvira territory. The attackers injured nine people. They also looted money and property, forcing other passengers to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Blaise raided Itara village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Blaise raided Itara village in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted five goats, seven hens and property. They also shot and wounded a 60-year-old man.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen raided a house at Maziba village in Walungu territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen raided a house at Maziba village in Walungu territory. The attackers shot and killed a 26-year-old man who wanted to help his neighbors.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Rn, who had kidnapped a woman from Nakiliba village in Uvira territory on January 31, 2019, released the hostage after receiving payment of the $606 ransom.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Rn, who had kidnapped a woman from Nakiliba village in Uvira territory on January 31, 2019, released the hostage after receiving payment of the $606 ransom.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Rn, who had kidnapped a man from Kigongo village in Uvira territory on January 31, 2019, released the hostage after receiving payment of the $1212 ransom
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Rn, who had kidnapped a man from Kigongo village in Uvira territory on January 31, 2019, released the hostage after receiving payment of the $1212 ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed an FARDC soldier in the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed an FARDC soldier in the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni town. The body was found in a bush.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position in the Boikene district of Beni town.
notes/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position in the Boikene district of Beni town. The FARDC repelled the attackers. This attack resulted in the death of an FARDC soldier.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 45-year-old woman at Mutarule village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 45-year-old woman at Mutarule village in Uvira territory. The victim wanted to evict the soldier from her house following his arrears of rent. The victim was transferred to Bukavu for appropriate care.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a woman and a boy at Kabunambo village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a woman and a boy at Kabunambo village in Uvira territory. This incident occurred as a result of the soldier's recklessness.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked a Mai-Mai Mazembe position at Kanyatsi village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked a Mai-Mai Mazembe position at Kanyatsi village in Lubero territory. This resulted in one dead and one wounded in the ranks of the Mai-Mai Mazembe and two dead FARDC soldiers. The FARDC looted property from the population and raped a girl.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped seven people who were going to their fields near Kasha village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped seven people who were going to their fields near Kasha village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo UPLC fired on four men who were in a hut at Kitokolu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo UPLC fired on four men who were in a hut at Kitokolu village in Beni territory. They killed two men and injured another.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted property from two shops in the Numbi locality of Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted property from two shops in the Numbi locality of Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Blaise abducted three men and a woman from Mihanda village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Blaise abducted three men and a woman from Mihanda village in Kabare territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Vuthungwe village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Vuthungwe village in Beni territory. The attackers looted $310, a TV screen and a mattress.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen stabbed an FARDC soldier in the concession of Honorary President Joseph Kabila in the Musienene locality of Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen stabbed an FARDC soldier in the concession of Honorary President Joseph Kabila in the Musienene locality of Lubero territory. The attackers stole the AK-47 rifle from the wounded soldier.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked Mai-Mai Kilalo positions at the villages of Kalingati and Pabuka in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked Mai-Mai Kilalo positions at the villages of Kalingati and Pabuka in Beni territory. The FARDC failed to dislodge the Mai-Mai Kilalo from their positions.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen who were trying to steal cows from a farm near the Kinanira neighborhood of the Sange rural commune.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen who were trying to steal cows from a farm near the Kinanira neighborhood of the Sange rural commune. The FARDC chased out the attackers and then looted property from the population.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Malachi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Malachi village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers also shot and wounded a six-year-old girl who was screaming for help.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a man at Orac village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a man at Orac village in Uvira territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Rn kidnapped a man from Kigongo village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Rn kidnapped a man from Kigongo village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen ransacked a road toll booth at Kahondo village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen ransacked a road toll booth at Kahondo village in Beni territory. The attackers also stabbed a man and stole $58.

title/0/en: The Nyatura FDP arrested and tortured six men in their fields near Burambo village in Rutshuru territory following their failure to pay a fee demanded by the militia.
notes/en: The Nyatura FDP arrested and tortured six men in their fields near Burambo village in Rutshuru territory following their failure to pay a fee demanded by the militia. One of the victims succumbed to his injuries.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Rn kidnapped a woman from Nakiliba village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Rn kidnapped a woman from Nakiliba village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked an APCLS position at Buabo village in Masisi territory.
