notes/en: The FARDC attacked an APCLS position at Buabo village in Masisi territory. The APCLS pushed the FARDC back to Masisi center. The clash resulted in the injury of a 6-year-old boy.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a 26-year-old man at Nyabirehe village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a 26-year-old man at Nyabirehe village in Rutshuru territory. The victim was rushed to Rutshuru General Hospital for appropriate care.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who forced a man, a woman and three boys to carry looted property from Loa Numbi village in Kalehe territory on 29 January 2019, released the hostages.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who forced a man, a woman and three boys to carry looted property from Loa Numbi village in Kalehe territory on 29 January 2019, released the hostages.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped two girls near Kalengera village in Rutshuru territory on 29 January, 2019, released the hostages after receiving payment of a $300 ransom.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped two girls near Kalengera village in Rutshuru territory on 29 January, 2019, released the hostages after receiving payment of a $300 ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Loa Numbi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Loa Numbi village in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted property, forcing a man, a woman and three boys to carry looted goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Numbi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Numbi village in Kalehe territory. The attackers shot and wounded a 39-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a convoy of merchants near Murhangu village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a convoy of merchants near Murhangu village in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted $272 and property.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Kavumbi at Kahira village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Kavumbi at Kahira village in Masisi territory. The Nyatura Kavumbi were trying to attack the Nyatura Buhoza.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man near Itolero village in Lubero territory on 28 January, 2019, released the hostage after receiving payment of the ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man near Itolero village in Lubero territory on 28 January, 2019, released the hostage after receiving payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen kidnapped two girls aged 17 and 19, near Kalengera village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen kidnapped two girls aged 17 and 19, near Kalengera village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers raped the two girls and demanded $600 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed an FARDC jeep carrying military pay near Kacungwe village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed an FARDC jeep carrying military pay near Kacungwe village in Fizi territory. The FARDC chased the attackers. This ambush resulted in a wounded FARDC soldier.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed an ambulance at the Lubero General Hospital near Itolero village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed an ambulance at the Lubero General Hospital near Itolero village in Lubero territory. The attackers kidnapped the driver and demanded a ransom of $5000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a man near the Congo ya Sika district of the Kasindi rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a man near the Congo ya Sika district of the Kasindi rural commune. The body of the victim was found in an advanced state decomposition.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a mini bus near Kasengesi village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a mini bus near Kasengesi village in Masisi territory. The robbers killed a 3-month-old child, abducted five men and one woman.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Bangu Institute's compound in the Nyakavogo neighborhood of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Bangu Institute's compound in the Nyakavogo neighborhood of Bukavu town. The attackers tied up the guards and looted money, six laptops and food.

title/0/en: The Twiganeho attacked the RED TABARA at the villages of Murambi, Bibangwa and Kitembe in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Twiganeho attacked the RED TABARA at the villages of Murambi, Bibangwa and Kitembe in Uvira territory. The clashes lasted three days. The clashes resulted in the death of one RED Tabara fighter, one Twiganeho fighter, and four civilians. Several buildings were also destroyed during these clashes.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked a vehicle weighing station in the Pasisi neighborhood of Beni town
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked a vehicle weighing station in the Pasisi neighborhood of Beni town. The attackers captured the two police officers guarding the station. They looted $1250, a weight and two batteries.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kokodikoko and Ngandu raided Tchakindo village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kokodikoko and Ngandu raided Tchakindo village in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted $242, gold and other property. They also shot and killed a 42-year-old man who was reluctant to hand over his belongings to the attackers.

title/0/en: Police dispersed the funeral procession for a taxi driver at the Kitatumba Cemetery in Butembo town.
notes/en: Police dispersed the funeral procession for a taxi driver at the Kitatumba Cemetery in Butembo town. The police confused this team for the one opposing the Ebola medical response team at Ngengere cemetery. This incident resulted in injuries, damaged vehicles, motorcycles, looted property and the arrest of seven people.

title/0/en: Family members of an Ebola victim attacked the team, charged with providing a safe and dignified burial, in the Ngengere neighborhood of Butembo town.
notes/en: Family members of an Ebola victim attacked the team, charged with providing a safe and dignified burial, in the Ngengere neighborhood of Butembo town. The protesters stoned three people.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided homes in the Ciriri neighborhood of Bukavu town at night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided homes in the Ciriri neighborhood of Bukavu town at night. The attackers looted money, computers, telephones, fish and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 44-year-old man at Kitalaga village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 44-year-old man at Kitalaga village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru raided Bubamba village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru raided Bubamba village in Kalehe territory. The attackers tortured and injured two men. They also looted $121, four goats, fifteen chickens and thirty guinea pigs.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Rn at Muheta village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Rn at Muheta village in Uvira territory. The FARDC chased the Mai-Mai Rn from the village. The FARDC also looted goods from the fleeing population. Five houses were destroyed by shells.

title/0/en: The Nyatura FDP raided Karambi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura FDP raided Karambi village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers abducted a 26-year-old man and looted his property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped five people near the Kayna Rural Commune in Lubero Territory on 20 January, 2019, released the hostages after receiving payment of the ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped five people near the Kayna Rural Commune in Lubero Territory on 20 January, 2019, released the hostages after receiving payment of the ransom. Of the hostages released, three were shot and wounded.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from Muhani village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from Muhani village in Beni territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $700 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Congo ya Sika neighborhood of the Kasindi rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Congo ya Sika neighborhood of the Kasindi rural commune. The attackers shot and wounded a man who was returning home.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man from Nkiko village in Rutshuru territory on 22 January, 2019, released the hostage after receiving payment of the ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man from Nkiko village in Rutshuru territory on 22 January, 2019, released the hostage after receiving payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: Policemen on patrol injured a man at Kalere village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Policemen on patrol injured a man at Kalere village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Knife-wielding men killed a man and wounded another at Ngangi village 1 in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Knife-wielding men killed a man and wounded another at Ngangi village 1 in Nyiragongo territory.

title/0/en: The RED TABARA clashed with the Mai-Mai Kihebe at a bar at Kishagala village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The RED TABARA clashed with the Mai-Mai Kihebe at a bar at Kishagala village in Uvira territory. The clash resulted in one Mai-Mai Kihebe fighter, and one civilian killed. A civilian was also wounded.

title/0/en: Police repressed a demonstration of LAMUKA activists in the Kasenga neighborhood of rural Uvira.
notes/en: Police repressed a demonstration of LAMUKA activists in the Kasenga neighborhood of rural Uvira. The police also arrested a man.

title/0/en: The ADF targeted a car and a truck belonging to the NGO: Okapi Logistics near Kisiki village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF targeted a car and a truck belonging to the NGO: Okapi Logistics near Kisiki village in Beni territory. The robbery resulted in three dead and three wounded passengers.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Kyeshero district of Goma town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Kyeshero district of Goma town. The attackers injured a child and stole money.

title/0/en: Three FARDC soldiers on patrol shot and wounded a man in the Malepe district of Beni town.
notes/en: Three FARDC soldiers on patrol shot and wounded a man in the Malepe district of Beni town. The soldiers stole money and a phone from the victim. The victim was sent to Beni's general hospital for appropriate care.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a 2-year-old child in the Cikonyi neighborhood of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a 2-year-old child in the Cikonyi neighborhood of Bukavu town. A passersby found the victim's body with blood on his head.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at night at Buhumbo village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at night at Buhumbo village in Nyiragongo territory. The attackers killed a 42-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Kakombe neighborhood of rural Uvira.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Kakombe neighborhood of rural Uvira. The attackers attacked three FARDC soldiers on Kavuye Avenue. They killed the three FARDC soldiers and stole their weapons.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mungoro attacked the Raia Mutomboki Ngandu who had just looted a cow and eight goats from Nguku village in Walikale territory
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mungoro attacked the Raia Mutomboki Ngandu who had just looted a cow and eight goats from Nguku village in Walikale territory. The Raia Mutomboki Mungoro chased the Raia Mutomboki Ngandu and recovered the looted cattle.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ngandu raided Nguku village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ngandu raided Nguku village in Walikale territory. The attackers took away a cow and eight goats.

title/0/en: A group of 41 unidentified gunmen raided the market in Kakwende village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: A group of 41 unidentified gunmen raided the market in Kakwende village in Mwenga territory. During the looting attempt, the population defended itself by learning from armed men. The raid resulted in the death of one FARDC soldier, five attackers and a civilian male. Eighteen men and three women were also injured.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Pilote village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Pilote village in Masisi territory. The attackers kidnapped a man.

title/0/en: Fighters of the Mapenzi Group, who had abducted a man from the Nyabiondo locality of Masisi territory on 22 January, 2019, released him.
notes/en: Fighters of the Mapenzi Group, who had abducted a man from the Nyabiondo locality of Masisi territory on 22 January, 2019, released him.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen raided a house at Rutare village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen raided a house at Rutare village in Kalehe territory. The attackers tortured a 43-year-old woman. The victim died from her injuries.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo UPLC ambushed a MONUSCO convoy near Kitahuha village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo UPLC ambushed a MONUSCO convoy near Kitahuha village in Beni territory. The attackers also looted weapons and military uniforms.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from Nkiko village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from Nkiko village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers tortured and injured the hostage. They also demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Three Mai-Mai Buhirwha fighters kidnapped a 59-year-old man from Narunanga village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Three Mai-Mai Buhirwha fighters kidnapped a 59-year-old man from Narunanga village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles kidnapped passengers from a dugout canoe on Lake Edward near the Vitshumbi locality of Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles kidnapped passengers from a dugout canoe on Lake Edward near the Vitshumbi locality of Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers took a goat and a bag of cassava flour. They also demanded a $187 ransom for the release of the hostages and canoes.

title/0/en: Fighters from the Mapenzi Group kidnapped a man from the Nyabiondo locality of Masisi territory.
notes/en: Fighters from the Mapenzi Group kidnapped a man from the Nyabiondo locality of Masisi territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the APCLS at Kahiro village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the APCLS at Kahiro village in Masisi territory. The population was displaced from the fighting.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Kalivuli village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Kalivuli village in Beni territory. The attackers also killed a man with a knife.

title/0/en: A policeman shot and killed a 37-year-old woman at Butare village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: A policeman shot and killed a 37-year-old woman at Butare village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen, attempting to steal a motorcycle,  shot and wounded a 51-year-old man at the Rutanga neighborhood of the rural Sange commune.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen, attempting to steal a motorcycle,  shot and wounded a 51-year-old man at the Rutanga neighborhood of the rural Sange commune.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position at Mapobu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position at Mapobu village in Beni territory. The attack resulted in several dead and wounded on both sides. The attackers also recovered several weapons.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked a Nyatura Nzayi position at Munongo village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked a Nyatura Nzayi position at Munongo village in Masisi territory. The NDC Guidon chased the Nyatura Nzayi from their position. A man drowned during their escape.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen stabbed and killed 73-year-old woman in the Rukangaga district of the Kiliba rural commune.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen stabbed and killed 73-year-old woman in the Rukangaga district of the Kiliba rural commune.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Rutoboko village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Rutoboko village in Masisi territory. The attackers killed two men and injured three others. They also raped two women.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from the Benengule neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from the Benengule neighborhood of Beni town. Along the way, the attackers also kidnapped another man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped two men from the Benengule neighborhood of Beni town on 21 January, 2019, tortured and abandoned one of the hostages.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped two men from the Benengule neighborhood of Beni town on 21 January, 2019, tortured and abandoned one of the hostages. The victim died from his wounds.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen looted money and property, from civilians returning from the market to Shanje village, in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen looted money and property, from civilians returning from the market to Shanje village, in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a minibus belonging to the Kivu Kwetu transport agency near Kayna rurale commune in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a minibus belonging to the Kivu Kwetu transport agency near Kayna rurale commune in Lubero territory. The robbers looted money and goods from the passengers. They also kidnapped five people and demanded a ransom for their release.

title/0/en: The RED Tabara attacked the Burundian Armed Forces allied to the Mai-Mai Kidjangala at Mulenge village I in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The RED Tabara attacked the Burundian Armed Forces allied to the Mai-Mai Kidjangala at Mulenge village I in Uvira territory. This attack left 18 dead and several wounded in the ranks of the Burundian Armed Forces. One woman was also wounded.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Kitchanga village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Kitchanga village in Masisi territory. The attackers killed two men.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Nzayi attacked the NDC Guidon at Kinyana village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Nzayi attacked the NDC Guidon at Kinyana village in Masisi territory. The clash has left five dead in the ranks of Nyatura, one dead on NDC Guidon's side and four civilians killed.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani attacked a Nyatura Nduhuye position in the Kimoto mining area of Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani attacked a Nyatura Nduhuye position in the Kimoto mining area of Kalehe territory. The attack left three dead and four wounded in the ranks of the Nyatura Nduhuye and one dead on the side of Raia Mutomboki Shabani.

title/0/en: Seven unidentified gunmen raided the compound of the Chahi Institute in the Chahi district of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Seven unidentified gunmen raided the compound of the Chahi Institute in the Chahi district of Bukavu town. The attackers tied up the sentry and looted money, nine computers, a generator, books and uniforms.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided houses at Buloli village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided houses at Buloli village in Kabare territory. The attackers shot and killed a 65-year-old women and looted property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a mini bus near Mujangala village in Walungu territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a mini bus near Mujangala village in Walungu territory. The attackers shot and killed a 30-year-old man and injured another 36-year-old. They stole money and goods from to the passengers.

title/0/en: The RED Tabara attacked Mai-Mai Kidjangala positions with their Burundian allies at the villages of Kabere and Mubere in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The RED Tabara attacked Mai-Mai Kidjangala positions with their Burundian allies at the villages of Kabere and Mubere in Uvira territory. The clashes have left two dead and one wounded in the ranks of Mai-Mai Kidjangala.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Buhandanda village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Buhandanda village in Kabare territory. The attackers injured two women and looted money and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Muhongoza village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Muhongoza village in Kalehe territory. The attackers shot and wounded a 59-year-old man.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru raided Karambi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru raided Karambi village in Kalehe territory. The attackers injured two men. They also stole seven goats and some property.

title/0/en: The police dispersed supporters of a female candidate at the central Shabunda locality in the territory of the same name.
notes/en: The police dispersed supporters of a female candidate at the central Shabunda locality in the territory of the same name. The demonstrators demanded for the true result of the polls because they felt that their candidate had won the election. The police arrested 45 people.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru raided Kashewe village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru raided Kashewe village in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted three goats and property. They also kidnapped three men aged 27, 30 and 40, respectively.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Kigingi's position at Kaniro village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Kigingi's position at Kaniro village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: FARDC-backed police dispersed a rally of Veranda Mutsanga activists in the Mutsanga neighborhood of Butembo town.
notes/en: FARDC-backed police dispersed a rally of Veranda Mutsanga activists in the Mutsanga neighborhood of Butembo town. The demonstrators were protesting the arrest of their leader, following his call for a demonstration demanding the release of the true results of the presidential election.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a 51-year-old man in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a 51-year-old man in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu town. The body of the victim was found in a channel. The killers also stole a purse containing $200.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen raided a house at Kamikile village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen raided a house at Kamikile village in Mwenga territory. The attackers took $24 and a goat.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Vunja Vikwazo looted 50 grams of gold from the Kabagole village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Vunja Vikwazo looted 50 grams of gold from the Kabagole village in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto raided Tchampundu village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto raided Tchampundu village in Shabunda territory. The attackers stole twelve goats, poultry and other goods from the villagers.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Donat / Ngandu raided Luyuyu village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Donat / Ngandu raided Luyuyu village in Shabunda territory. The attackers also looted property.

title/0/en: An ANR agent and an FARDC soldier tortured and injured two men at Chebumba village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An ANR agent and an FARDC soldier tortured and injured two men at Chebumba village in Kalehe territory. The ANR agent and the FARDC soldier extorted $45 and two goats from the victim.

title/0/en: Lola Hale fighters abducted ten men from the Nyabiondo locality in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Lola Hale fighters abducted ten men from the Nyabiondo locality in Masisi territory. The kidnappers suspected the hostages of being APCLS collaborators.

title/0/en: Two men, who had been kidnapped by unidentified gunmen from Kingarabe village on January 12, 2019, escaped from their captors.
notes/en: Two men, who had been kidnapped by unidentified gunmen from Kingarabe village on January 12, 2019, escaped from their captors.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had abducted a man near Kimbulu village in Lubero territory on 12 January, 2019,  released the hostage who had sustained injuries.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had abducted a man near Kimbulu village in Lubero territory on 12 January, 2019,  released the hostage who had sustained injuries.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a man at Kausa village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a man at Kausa village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a depot in the Rutshuru Catholic Parish at Fuko village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a depot in the Rutshuru Catholic Parish at Fuko village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers looted loincloths.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the office of the Maguy Rwakabuba Foundation at Bugara village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the office of the Maguy Rwakabuba Foundation at Bugara village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers looted computers, plastic chairs and a generator.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto, 100kg and Ngandu raided the Tchakindo mine in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto, 100kg and Ngandu raided the Tchakindo mine in Shabunda territory. The attackers stole money, minerals and goods.

title/0/en: The FARDC ambushed the Raia Mutomboki Mabala at Lwamba village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The FARDC ambushed the Raia Mutomboki Mabala at Lwamba village in Shabunda territory. The FARDC captured two Raia Mutomboki Mabala fighters and recovered a weapon.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma town. The attackers shot and killed a man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man near the Biena bridge in the Kimbulu locality of Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man near the Biena bridge in the Kimbulu locality of Lubero territory. The kidnappers stole the victim's money.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped ten people who were going to the fields near Kibende village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped ten people who were going to the fields near Kibende village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $5000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Charles, who were attempting to raid the Nyakakoma locality of Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Charles, who were attempting to raid the Nyakakoma locality of Rutshuru territory. This attack resulted in one dead and one wounded for the Mai-Mai Charles and one wounded civilian.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles killed eleven hippopotamuses and a buffalo near the villages of Kasali and Kabahari in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles killed eleven hippopotamuses and a buffalo near the villages of Kasali and Kabahari in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men from Kingarabe village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men from Kingarabe village in Nyiragongo territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted $274, seven telephones, two TV screens, and two radio sets from the Butsili neighborhood in Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted $274, seven telephones, two TV screens, and two radio sets from the Butsili neighborhood in Beni town. The attackers fired bullets before escaping.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen shot and wounded two men in the Kasabinyole neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen shot and wounded two men in the Kasabinyole neighborhood of Beni town. The attackers looted $6350 and two phones belonging to the victims.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 30-year-old man in the Bugina village of Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 30-year-old man in the Bugina village of Rutshuru territory. This occurred when the FARDC soldier wanted to extort money from the victim after selling a cow.

title/0/en: The FARDC forced sixteen men to carry military belongings when they moved to Swima village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC forced sixteen men to carry military belongings when they moved to Swima village in Fizi territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Shanje village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Shanje village in Kalehe territory. The attackers also looted money and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed three men in their fields at Butaro village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed three men in their fields at Butaro village in Rutshuru territory. The bodies of victims were recovered by the population.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 79-year-old man at Kikumba village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 79-year-old man at Kikumba village in Beni territory. The body of the victim was found near his residence.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a man in the Nkafu neighborhood of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a man in the Nkafu neighborhood of Bukavu town. The body of the victim was found not far from the Bukavu General Hospital.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped two 16-year-old girls near Kako village in Rutshuru territory on 08 January,  2019, released the hostages after receiving payment of the $170 ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped two 16-year-old girls near Kako village in Rutshuru territory on 08 January,  2019, released the hostages after receiving payment of the $170 ransom.

title/0/en: The ADF raided the villages of Kanake and Mayi Safi in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF raided the villages of Kanake and Mayi Safi in Beni territory. The attackers killed three men and four women. They injured nine others.

title/0/en: Five FARDC soldiers looted money and a phone from a shop in the Residential District of Beni town.
notes/en: Five FARDC soldiers looted money and a phone from a shop in the Residential District of Beni town. One of the soldiers shot in the air to deter any help.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Kasenga neighborhood of rural Uvira.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Kasenga neighborhood of rural Uvira. The attackers also stole $248.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed three vehicles and a motorcycle near Mubone village in Walungu territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed three vehicles and a motorcycle near Mubone village in Walungu territory. The attackers stole money and property.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani raided a site at Kahuzi Biega National Park in the Kahungu village of Kabare territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani raided a site at Kahuzi Biega National Park in the Kahungu village of Kabare territory. The attackers looted solar panels, radios and other items. They also forced three men to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: The FARDC, backed by park rangers, attacked the Raia Mutomboki Shabani who were looting property from Kahungu village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: The FARDC, backed by park rangers, attacked the Raia Mutomboki Shabani who were looting property from Kahungu village in Kabare territory. During the clash, the attackers killed an FARDC soldier.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position at Kake village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position at Kake village in Masisi territory. This clash resulted in the death of one FARDC soldier.

title/0/en: Unidentified men looted drugs, and five plastic chairs from the Tuungane health center at Boikene district in Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified men looted drugs, and five plastic chairs from the Tuungane health center at Boikene district in Beni town.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two 16-year-old girls near Kako village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two 16-year-old girls near Kako village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers raped the two hostages.They demanded a ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Kavimvira neighborhood in rural Uvira.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Kavimvira neighborhood in rural Uvira. The attackers looted $371 and property. They shot and wounded a 35-year-old man and his 25-year-old wife.

title/0/en: The ADF raided Mavivi town in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF raided Mavivi town in Beni territory. The attackers killed four men, two women, four girls and a boy. They also stole goods.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier raided a house at Kikindi village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier raided a house at Kikindi village in Mwenga territory. The soldier shot and wounded a 23-year-old man and stole a phone.

title/0/en: The police arrested 60 youths who expressed their joy at the rumor of the proclamation of Martin Fayulu as President of the Republic in Mabanga-North, Katindo, Katoyi and Office neighborhoods in Goma town.
notes/en: The police arrested 60 youths who expressed their joy at the rumor of the proclamation of Martin Fayulu as President of the Republic in Mabanga-North, Katindo, Katoyi and Office neighborhoods in Goma town. The police accused them of nocturnal disturbance of peace, malicious destruction and disturbing public order.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier raided a house at Hexagone village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier raided a house at Hexagone village in Mwenga territory. The soldier stole money and a phone.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers raped a 21-year-old woman at Vuyinga village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers raped a 21-year-old woman at Vuyinga village in Lubero territory. They also looted property.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 5-year-old girl from the Kasika neighborhood in Goma town.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 5-year-old girl from the Kasika neighborhood in Goma town. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $1000.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mungoro, who had forced four men to carry looted property near Kimbaseke village in Kalehe territory on January 5, 2019, released the hostages.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mungoro, who had forced four men to carry looted property near Kimbaseke village in Kalehe territory on January 5, 2019, released the hostages.

title/0/en: The APCLS targeted eight motorbikes near Kashebere village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The APCLS targeted eight motorbikes near Kashebere village in Walikale territory. The attackers stole $500 and property.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Butachibera raided Bubamba village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Butachibera raided Bubamba village in Kalehe territory. The attackers arrested and injured four men. They also looted property from the people.

title/0/en: The Raia mutomboki Mungoro targeted four motorbikes near Kimbaseke village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia mutomboki Mungoro targeted four motorbikes near Kimbaseke village in Kalehe territory. The robbers looted property from the victims. They also forced four men to carry looted goods.

title/0/en: Two FARDC soldiers stole four phones, two laptops, one amplifier from the Echo of Salvation studio in the Matonge district of Beni town.
notes/en: Two FARDC soldiers stole four phones, two laptops, one amplifier from the Echo of Salvation studio in the Matonge district of Beni town. The two FARDC soldiers fired while exiting.

title/0/en: The CNRD attacked the NDC Guidon at Kalonge village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The CNRD attacked the NDC Guidon at Kalonge village in Walikale territory. This clash resulted in one death and one injury for the NDC Guidon.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali kidnapped two men aged 31 and 61, respectively, near Bwesho village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali kidnapped two men aged 31 and 61, respectively, near Bwesho village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a man in the Nkafu neighborhood of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a man in the Nkafu neighborhood of Bukavu town. The body of the victim was found in a channel.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani attacked an FARDC position at Kabushwa village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani attacked an FARDC position at Kabushwa village in Kabare territory. The attackers captured three FARDC soldiers and took away three AK47 rifles and military uniforms.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Lance Muteya raided Nduma village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Lance Muteya raided Nduma village in Kalehe territory. The attackers stole goods from the people.

title/0/en: On their return from looting Nduma village in Shabunda territory, the Raia Mutomboki Lance Muteya were attacked by unidentified gunmen.
notes/en: On their return from looting Nduma village in Shabunda territory, the Raia Mutomboki Lance Muteya were attacked by unidentified gunmen. The attackers killed eight Raia Mutomboki Lance Muteya fighters including the leader of the movement.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali who had kidnapped three men near Bwesho village in Uvira territory on December 29, 2018, released two hostages after receiving payment of the $1000 ransom.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali who had kidnapped three men near Bwesho village in Uvira territory on December 29, 2018, released two hostages after receiving payment of the $1000 ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a man in Ngangi village 1 in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a man in Ngangi village 1 in Nyiragongo territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men, who had kidnapped a man from Kalunguta village in Beni territory on 31 December, 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of the $500 ransom near an FARDC position at Mangango village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men, who had kidnapped a man from Kalunguta village in Beni territory on 31 December, 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of the $500 ransom near an FARDC position at Mangango village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen stabbed a man in the Kitulu neighborhood of Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified assailants stabbed a man in the Kitulu neighborhood of Butembo town. The body of the victim was found with traces of several machete wounds.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a man at Shanje village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a man at Shanje village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: After the lynching of an FARDC soldier by the population, the victim's colleagues shot and killed three men at Shanje village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: After the lynching of an FARDC soldier by the population, the victim's colleagues shot and wounded three men at Shanje village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: A police officer shot and wounded an 18-year-old man at Muheto village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: A police officer shot and wounded an 18-year-old man at Muheto village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed two women aged 61 and 64, respectively, in the Kasenga neighborhood of the Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed two women aged 61 and 64, respectively, in the Kasenga neighborhood of the Uvira rural commune. The attackers took away three goats.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from Kalunguta village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from Kalunguta village in Beni territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked a CNRD position at Kashuga village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked a CNRD position at Kashuga village in Masisi territory. The clash resulted in three injured NDC Guidon fighters.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Nduhuye attacked an FARDC position at Katasomwa village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Nduhuye attacked an FARDC position at Katasomwa village in Kalehe territory. The FARDC repelled the assailants who were also attempting to rob the CENI facilities in the village.

title/0/en: The police dispersed voters who were harassing a CENI agent who was voting fraudulently for a candidate from Lurhala village in Walungu territory.
notes/en: The police dispersed voters who were harassing a CENI agent who was voting fraudulently for a candidate from Lurhala village in Walungu territory. The police killed two people and injured others.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier killed a woman in Kasheke village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier killed a woman in Kasheke village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali kidnapped three men near Bwesho village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali kidnapped three men near Bwesho village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked an FARDC position in the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked an FARDC position in the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni town. They kidnapped two men. The FARDC also killed one of the attackers.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a man from the Mukulya neighborhood in Beni town on December 28, 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of an $800 ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a man from the Mukulya neighborhood in Beni town on December 28, 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of an $800 ransom.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked a CNRD position at Kashuga village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked a CNRD position at Kashuga village in Masisi territory. This clash has displaced the population.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a man at Thako village in Beni territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a man at Thako village in Beni territory. The victim was resisting extortion by the said soldier.

title/0/en: Two FARDC soldiers shot and wounded a man in the Malepe district of Beni town.
notes/en: Two FARDC soldiers shot and wounded a man in the Malepe district of Beni town. Both soldiers stole money and a phone from the victim. The victim was sent to the Beni General Hospital for appropriate care.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen who were trying to kidnap a man in the Kinanira neighborhood of the Sange rural commune.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen who were trying to kidnap a man in the Kinanira neighborhood of the Sange rural commune. The FARDC killed an assailant.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a doctor from the Kalivuli health center at Kalivuli village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a doctor from the Kalivuli health center at Kalivuli village in Beni territory. The kidnappers took the hostage to an unknown destination.

title/0/en: The APCLS targeted six motorbikes near Kanyaminsindo village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The APCLS targeted six motorbikes near Kanyaminsindo village in Walikale territory. The attackers looted money and property. They forced six men to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from the Mukulya neighborhood in Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from the Mukulya neighborhood in Beni town. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $3000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Butachibera raided Chiriba village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Butachibera raided Chiriba village in Kalehe territory. The attackers took goats, chickens and property.

title/0/en: The police, backed by the FARDC, have dispersed a demonstration by the population of the Bulambo locality in Beni territory.
notes/en: The police, backed by the FARDC, have dispersed a demonstration by the population of the Bulambo locality in Beni territory. The population was protesting the postponement of elections for the Butembo constituency, Beni town and territory as well as Yumbi. The police arrested 31 demonstrators for disturbing public order.

title/0/en: FARDC-backed police cracked down on demonstrations by LUCHA activists in Beni town.
notes/en: FARDC-backed police cracked down on demonstrations by LUCHA activists in Beni town. The protesters demonstrated against the postponement of the elections for the Butembo constituency, Beni town and territory as well as Yumbi. The crackdown resulted in one dead, two shot and eight arrested in the ranks of protesters.

title/0/en: Police, backed by the FARDC and the ANR cracked down on a demonstration by LAMUKA activists at Butembo town.
notes/en: Police, backed by the FARDC and the ANR cracked down on a demonstration by LAMUKA activists at Butembo town. Protesters were protesting the postponement of elections in the constituencies of Butembo, Beni and Yumbi. Police arrested 15 protesters and injured others.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Shanje village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Shanje village in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted three goats, two sheeps and two chickens. They forced two men to carry the looted animals.

title/0/en: An unidentified gunman shot at a taxi near Kabasha town in Beni territory and killed a male adult passenger.
notes/en: An unidentified gunman shot at a taxi near Kabasha town in Beni territory and killed a male adult passenger.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Rugenge neighborhood of rural Uvira.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Rugenge neighborhood of rural Uvira. The attackers shot and wounded a man and his wife.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a man at Lyakobo neighborhood in Beni city.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a man at Lyakobo neighborhood in Beni city. The soldier also stole $15 and a phone belonging to the victim.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked an FARDC position at Musenge village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked an FARDC position at Musenge village in Lubero territory. This incident left one attacker dead and another wounded.

title/0/en: A drunken FARDC soldier shot and wounded a man in a drinking establishment at Kabasha in Beni territory.
notes/en: A drunken FARDC soldier shot and wounded a man in a drinking establishment at Kabasha in Beni territory. The victim was rushed to the Kabasha Health Center for appropriate care.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a soldier and a man in the Rwangoma neighborhood in Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a soldier and a man in the Rwangoma neighborhood in Beni town.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon, allied with the Nyatura Domi, attacked CNRD positions at the villages of Faringa, Nyambande, Kitunda and Muhanga in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon, allied with the Nyatura Domi, attacked CNRD positions at the villages of Faringa, Nyambande, Kitunda and Muhanga in Rutshuru territory. The NDC Guidon, and Nyatura Domi, chased the CNRD out of their strongholds.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Buhirwha kidnapped two men aged 55 and 59, respectively, from Katanu village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Buhirwha kidnapped two men aged 55 and 59, respectively, from Katanu village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $3000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 14-year-old boy at Kahanga village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 14-year-old boy at Kahanga village in Kalehe territory. The body of the victim had an eye and ear removed.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a man in the Benengule neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a man in the Benengule neighborhood of Beni town.

title/0/en: An unidentified gunman shot and killed a 27-year-old man in the Mabakanga neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: An unidentified gunman shot and killed a 27-year-old man in the Mabakanga neighborhood of Beni town.

title/0/en: The ADF raided the Masiani neighborhood in Beni town.
notes/en: The ADF raided the Masiani neighborhood in Beni town. The attackers killed a man and burned his motorcycle.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed two vehicles near the Karava-Sud neighborhood of the Kiliba rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed two vehicles near the Karava-Sud neighborhood of the Kiliba rural commune. The attackers looted money and property.

title/0/en: Youth vandalized a health center in the Bwinongo district of Butembo town following the transfer of a suspected ebola patient to the ebola treatment center.
notes/en: Youth vandalized a health center in the Bwinongo district of Butembo town following the transfer of a suspected ebola patient to the ebola treatment center. The police intervened and arrested thirteen protesters.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked an FARDC position at Kirima village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked an FARDC position at Kirima village in Lubero territory. This attack resulted in one Mai-Mai fighter killed and two FARDC soldiers wounded.

title/0/en: Rwandan soldiers from the RDF arrested and tortured two men aged 18 and 25, respectively, on Lake Kivu near Ntaligeza village in Idjwi territory.
notes/en: Rwandan soldiers from the RDF arrested and tortured two men aged 18 and 25, respectively, on Lake Kivu near Ntaligeza village in Idjwi territory.

title/0/en: UPDF Ugandan soldiers shot and injured a man on Lake Edward while arresting fishermen near the Kyavinyonge locality of Beni territory.
notes/en: UPDF Ugandan soldiers shot and injured a man on Lake Edward while arresting fishermen near the Kyavinyonge locality of Beni territory. The victim was sent to a health facility in Bwera for appropriate care.

title/0/en: The FARDC ambushed the Raia Mutomboki Elengi near Isangi village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The FARDC ambushed the Raia Mutomboki Elengi near Isangi village in Walikale territory. The FARDC killed one Raia Mutomboki Elenge fighter and injured another

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD, who had kidnapped five men, four women and a girl near Kasha village in Rutshuru territory on December 21, 2018, released the hostages after receiving payment of the $1400 ransom.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD, who had kidnapped five men, four women and a girl near Kasha village in Rutshuru territory on December 21, 2018, released the hostages after receiving payment of the $1400 ransom.

title/0/en: Five unidentified gunmen targeted the convoy of a MLA candidate near Cibeke village in Walungu territory.
notes/en: Five unidentified gunmen targeted the convoy of a MLA candidate near Cibeke village in Walungu territory. The robbers also looted money and property.

title/0/en: The ADF raided the Masiani neighborhood in Beni town. The attackers killed an FARDC soldier, five men, a woman, an 11-year-old girl and a 10-year-old boy.
notes/en: The ADF raided the Masiani neighborhood in Beni town. The attackers killed an FARDC soldier, five men, a woman, an 11-year-old girl and a 10-year-old boy. They also injured one woman and two boys aged 5 and 8, respectively.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 68-year-old woman from her home in the Mulongwe neighborhood of rural Uvira.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 68-year-old woman from her home in the Mulongwe neighborhood of rural Uvira.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Vunja Vikwazo tortured and kidnapped a 35-year-old man from Nyatusatu village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Vunja Vikwazo tortured and kidnapped a 35-year-old man from Nyatusatu village in Shabunda territory. The attackers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Vunja Vikwazo, who had tortured and kidnapped a man from Nyatusatu village in Shabunda territory on December 22, 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of a $121 ransom.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Vunja Vikwazo, who had tortured and kidnapped a man from Nyatusatu village in Shabunda territory on December 22, 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of a $121 ransom.

title/0/en: The CNRD kidnapped a man from Muhanga village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The CNRD kidnapped a man from Muhanga village in Walikale territory. The kidnappers accused the hostage of having facilitated the collection of tokens for the NDC Guidon and demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided several houses in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided several houses in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu town. The attackers also looted property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 47-year-old man at Matata village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 47-year-old man at Matata village in Fizi territory. The attackers stole money belonging to the victim.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money and property from Kalungu village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money and property from Kalungu village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: The APCLS targeted the convoy of a deputy candidate near Kashebere village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The APCLS targeted the convoy of a deputy candidate near Kashebere village in Walikale territory. The attackers also looted money and property from them.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 57-year-old man from his field in Gwagwa village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 57-year-old man from his field in Gwagwa village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $1500 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a man in the Mamundioma locality of Beni territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a man in the Mamundioma locality of Beni territory. The victim had demanded the soldier to repay his debt to him.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped five men, four women and a girl near Kasha village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped five men, four women and a girl near Kasha village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers raped the women and the girl. They demanded a ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 55-year-old man in the Kavimvira neighborhood of rural Uvira.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 55-year-old man in the Kavimvira neighborhood of rural Uvira. The attackers did not take anything from the victim's house.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man from Cheya village in Kalehe territory on 20 December, 2018,  released the hostage after a few minutes.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man from Cheya village in Kalehe territory on 20 December, 2018,  released the hostage after a few minutes.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Cheya village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Cheya village in Kalehe territory. The attackers injured a woman and stole $272. They also kidnapped a man.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe, who had kidnapped a man from Kirima village in Lubero territory on December 16, 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of the ransom.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe, who had kidnapped a man from Kirima village in Lubero territory on December 16, 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a man in his house at Museya village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a man in his house at Museya village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: The Red Tabara attacked Mai-Mai Kidjangala positions in the villages of Mubere and Kabere in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Red Tabara attacked Mai-Mai Kidjangala positions in the villages of Mubere and Kabere in Uvira territory. The Red Tabara burned seven houses in these villages.

title/0/en: Four FARDC soldiers robbed $157 and goods from traders who were going to a market near Mirenzo village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Four FARDC soldiers robbed $157 and goods from traders who were going to a market near Mirenzo village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a plot, shot and killed a 34-year-old man at Bwegera village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a plot, shot and killed a 34-year-old man at Bwegera village in Uvira territory. Afterwards the attackers engaged in the lynching of the wife, aged 24, who was seriously wounded by stabbing.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD, who had kidnapped two men from Mangala village in Rutshuru territory on December 17, 2018, released the hostages after receiving payment of a $1700 ransom.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD, who had kidnapped two men from Mangala village in Rutshuru territory on December 17, 2018, released the hostages after receiving payment of a $1700 ransom.

title/0/en: The ADF shot and killed two men and a woman near Kelekele town in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF shot and killed two men and a woman near Kelekele town in Beni territory. The bodies of the victims were found half a kilometer from an FARDC position.

title/0/en: Police officers who had wanted to chase fishermen off Lake Kivu, injured a man and a three-year-old boy in the Kyeshero neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Police officers, who had wanted to chase fishermen off Lake Kivu, injured a man and a three-year-old boy in the Kyeshero neighborhood of Goma.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani ambushed an FARDC convoy near Bubare village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani ambushed an FARDC convoy near Bubare village in Kalehe territory. The attackers killed one FARDC soldier and captured two others.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed five people at Sake village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed five people at Sake village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped three people near the Kibumba locality in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped three people near the Kibumba locality in Nyiragongo territory. The kidnappers took the hostages into the Virunga National Park.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier raped a 17-year-old girl at Angoa village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier raped a 17-year-old girl at Angoa village in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money, gold and other property near Tchonka village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money, gold and other property near Tchonka village in Shabunda territory. The attackers also intercepted a package intended for the transport agency AGEFRECO.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position on Ehu hill near Barara village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position on Ehu hill near Barara village in Nyiragongo territory. The attack resulted in five dead and seven wounded FARDC soldiers.

title/0/en: The ADF raided Mangboko village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF raided Mangboko village in Beni territory. The FARDC supported by MONUSCO troops repelled the attackers. The latter had been shot and wounded by a man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a World Food Program convoy near Lwashi village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a World Food Program convoy near Lwashi village in Masisi territory. The attackers killed one man and kidnapped two others.

title/0/en: Twelve armed men belonging to the RM Ndarumanga's attacked the villages of Bisangani and Kibumba in Ngando, Mwenga territory, in the morning.
notes/en: Twelve armed men belonging to the RM Ndarumanga's attacked the villages of Bisangani and Kibumba in Ngando, Mwenga territory, in the morning. They looted small livestock, including goats, pigs and other valuables. They also abducted four people, three men, and a woman to an unknown destination.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD robbed a motorcycle near Mangala village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD robbed a motorcycle near Mangala village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers also kidnapped two men aged 35 and 58, respectively. They demanded a ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed two FARDC soldiers in Rukoro village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed two FARDC soldiers in Rukoro village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers stole away the two weapons of the killed soldiers.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a woman at Bhuga village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a woman at Bhuga village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked police officers who were guarding a CENI warehouse in the Beni Residential District of the town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked police officers who were guarding a CENI warehouse in the Beni Residential District of the town. The police chased the attackers.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe fighters shot and killed an FARDC soldier at Kirima village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe fighters shot and killed an FARDC soldier at Kirima village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers took away the weapon of the killed soldier.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe killed an FARDC soldier in the Kirima village of Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe killed an FARDC soldier in the Kirima village of Rutshuru territory. The attackers stole the weapon of the killed soldier.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 30-year-old man near Kivunge village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 30-year-old man near Kivunge village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers also stole goats.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe targeted a convoy of an MP candidate at Kirima village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe targeted a convoy of an MP candidate at Kirima village in Lubero territory. The attackers captured a police officer guarding the candidate and kidnapped a man. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Kanyati village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Kanyati village in Nyiragongo territory. The attackers looted eleven goats and property.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers on patrol exchanged fire with a group of ten armed assailants who were looting and abducting people from Sange town in Uvira territory.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers on patrol exchanged fire with a group of ten armed assailants who were looting and abducting people from Sange town in Uvira territory. There were no injuries during exchange.

title/0/en: Unknown gunmen broke into a plot and kidnapped a man from Katonyera village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unknown gunmen broke into a plot and kidnapped a man from Katonyera village in Uvira territory. After 24 hours, the hostage was receiving payment of the USD 4500 ransom.

title/0/en: The police attacked unidentified gunmen in the Bushaku mining area in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The police attacked unidentified gunmen in the Bushaku mining area in Kalehe territory. The attackers repelled the police. This clash resulted in the injury of one policeman and three assailants.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position Maibo village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position at Maibo village in Beni territory. The FARDC chased the attackers.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen attacked police officers guarding the residence of the provincial minister for gender, youth and education at the Himbi neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen attacked police officers guarding the residence of the provincial minister for gender, youth and education at the Himbi neighborhood of Goma. The police killed an assailant.

title/0/en: The police arrested five LUCHA activists marching in Goma town.
notes/en: The police arrested five LUCHA activists marching in Goma town.

title/0/en: Six Raia Mutomboki Ngandu fighters simultaneously raided the villages of Bukama, Kimpembwe, Nyakavunga, Myagati and Kaligi in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Six Raia Mutomboki Ngandu fighters simultaneously raided the villages of Bukama, Kimpembwe, Nyakavunga, Myagati and Kaligi in Shabunda territory. They looted eight goats, and poultry, amongst others property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a man from Fuko village in Rutshuru territory on December 12, 2018 released the hostage after receiving payment of the ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a man from Fuko village in Rutshuru territory on December 12, 2018 released the hostage after receiving payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: Rebels of the Republican Forces of Burundi (PFB) killed a man who had deserted their ranks and the woman with whom he had taken refuge with at Kasenya village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Rebels of the Republican Forces of Burundi (PFB) killed a man who had deserted their ranks and the woman with whom he had taken refuge with at Kasenya village in Uvira territory. In the process they wounded a two-year-old baby girl, the daughter of the woman killed. They also clashed with the Mai-Mai Kashumba who tried to intervene, resulting in the death one Mai-Mai Kashumba fighter and two FPB fighters.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen (Pirates of the Lake), related to CNPSC fighters, attacked a motorized wooden boat (H / B BABA NI BABA) coming from Karamba on Lake Tanganyika near Buma village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen (Pirates of the Lake), related to CNPSC fighters, attacked a motorized wooden boat (H / B BABA NI BABA) coming from Karamba on Lake Tanganyika near Buma village in Fizi territory. The attackers, aboard a motorized canoe, stopped the boat, looted and killed a soldier of the Uvira 2 office on board. They took away the weapon and the military uniform of the dead soldier. The attackers also demanded a sum of FC5000 for the estimated 80 passengers on board.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a man at Rukoro village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a man at Rukoro village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers were trying to kidnap the victim.

title/0/en: The FARDC shot and killed a 30-year-old man at Kako village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC shot and killed a 30-year-old man at Kako village in Rutshuru territory. This incident occurred when the FARDC intervened to rescue a man who had been abducted.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen apprehended and tortured four men on their way to their fields near Busamura village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen apprehended and tortured four men on their way to their fields near Busamura village in Rutshuru territory. One of the victims succumbed to his wounds.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a police officer who wanted to rescue civilians who were being robbed by the attackers in Bujovu neighborhood in Goma town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a police officer who wanted to rescue civilians who were being robbed by the attackers in Bujovu neighborhood in Goma town. The attackers stole money and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 29-year-old man in the Himbi 2 neighborhood of Goma town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 29-year-old man in the Himbi 2 neighborhood of Goma town.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped four men from their field in Lushesha village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped four men from their field in Lushesha village in Kabare territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $500 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers, in collaboration with an ANR agent, shot and killed three men near Ramba village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers, in collaboration with an ANR agent, shot and killed three men near Ramba village in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted money and property from the victims.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon and the Mapenzi Group attacked an APCLS position in Bwendero village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon and the Mapenzi Group attacked an APCLS position in Bwendero village in Masisi territory. This attack resulted in the death of one Mapenzi fighter, and one APCLS fighter. Four civilians were also wounded.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen killed a buyer of gold at close range in the MIBA mining compound of the Misisi locality in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen killed a buyer of gold at close range in the MIBA mining compound of the Misisi locality in Fizi territory. The victim had resisted giving his gold to the attackers. The latter looted a large sum of money, a quantity of gold estimated at one hundred tola, and another quantity of gold which had not yet been cleaned.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kikwama raided Tchankindo village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kikwama raided Tchankindo village in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted money, cattle and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Fuko village in Rutshuru territory at night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Fuko village in Rutshuru territory at night. The attackers kidnapped a man and demanded a ransom of $2000 for his release.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Lance Muteya, who had kidnapped a 39-year-old man near Chifunzi village in Kalehe territory on 07 December 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of a $150 ransom.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Lance Muteya, who had kidnapped a 39-year-old man near Chifunzi village in Kalehe territory on 07 December 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of a $150 ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped and killed a man on a farm in Rutoboko village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped and killed a man on a farm in Rutoboko village in Masisi territory. The body of the victim was found not far from the farm.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi arrested and tortured two women on a witchcraft charge at Kyahemba village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi arrested and tortured two women on a witchcraft charge at Kyahemba village in Rutshuru territory. One of the victims succumbed to her wounds while the other was kidnapped by the attackers.

title/0/en: Alerted about the robbery of a mini bus near Munywema village in Uvira territory, the FARDC reacted by attacking the robbers.
notes/en: Alerted about the robbery of a mini bus near Munywema village in Uvira territory, the FARDC reacted by attacking the robbers. The attackers fled with money and looted goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a mini bus near Munywema village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a mini bus near Munywema village in Uvira territory. The attackers looted money and goods from the passengers.

title/0/en: The FARDC and the police shot and killed one man and injured another following a land dispute between groups in Chamishasha village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The FARDC and the police shot and killed one man and injured another following a land dispute between groups in Chamishasha village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position in Matombo village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position in Matombo village in Beni territory. The FARDC chased the attackers.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a vehicle and motorbikes near  Kigongo village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a vehicle and motorbikes near  Kigongo village in Uvira territory. The robbers looted money and goods from the passengers.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a man in Mambale village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a man in Mambale village in Beni territory. The body of the victim was found in a river.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a 13-year-old girl from the Buzito district of the Kiwanja commune on 09 December 2018, released the hostage after receiving two android phones, a carton of a drink and a rooster.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a 13-year-old girl from the Buzito district of the Kiwanja commune on 09 December 2018, released the hostage after receiving two android phones, a carton of a drink and a rooster.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had abducted a 26-year-old man from the Nyalukemba neighborhood of Bukavu town on 09 December, released the hostage following pressure from civil society.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had abducted a 26-year-old man from the Nyalukemba neighborhood of Bukavu town on 09 December, released the hostage following pressure from civil society.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped two men near Nkanguli village in Uvira territory on 09 December 2018, released the hostages after receiving payment of the ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped two men near Nkanguli village in Uvira territory on 09 December 2018, released the hostages after receiving payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Kinyatsi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Kinyatsi village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers looted money and medicine from the CBCA Kibirizi health center.

title/0/en: Alerted to the abduction of two men and three women near Lweba village in Fizi territory, the FARDC pursued the kidnappers and attacked them.
notes/en: Alerted to the abduction of two men and three women near Lweba village in Fizi territory, the FARDC pursued the kidnappers and attacked them. The kidnappers abandoned the hostages.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela targeted two MSF NGO vehicles and motorbikes near Lweba village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela targeted two MSF NGO vehicles and motorbikes near Lweba village in Fizi territory. The attackers looted money and property. They also kidnapped two men and three women.

title/0/en: The FARDC and the police killed three men in the Lijiwe Mining Square of Murhangu village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The FARDC and the police killed three men in the Lijiwe Mining Square of Murhangu village in Kalehe territory. This incident took place during the hunt for artisanal operators in this mining site.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked a position of Malawian MONUSCO troops at Pk 41 in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked a position of Malawian MONUSCO troops at Pk 41 in Beni territory. The Malawian's repelled the attackers.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen abducted a 43-year-old man near Rukoro village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen abducted a 43-year-old man near Rukoro village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Alerted by a man about the kidnapping of a man near Rukoro village in Rutshuru territory, two FARDC soldiers pursued the kidnappers and exchanged fire with them.
notes/en: Alerted by a man about the kidnapping of a man near Rukoro village in Rutshuru territory, two FARDC soldiers pursued the kidnappers and exchanged fire with them. The two FARDC soldiers managed to secure the release of the hostage who was wounded by a bullet during the exchange of fire.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 13-year-old girl from the Buzito neighborhood of the Kiwanja rural commune.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 13-year-old girl from the Buzito neighborhood of the Kiwanja rural commune. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men aged 54 and 55 near Nkanguli village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men aged 54 and 55 near Nkanguli village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $3000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Alerted about the looting of cows in the villages of Mulama and Rurambira in Uvira territory, the young Banyamulenge mobilized and attacked the Mai-Mai Kihebe who were looting the cows.
notes/en: Alerted about the looting of cows in the villages of Mulama and Rurambira in Uvira territory, the young Banyamulenge mobilized and attacked the Mai-Mai Kihebe who were looting the cows.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kihebe looted 58 cows from farms in the villages of Mulama and Rurambira in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kihebe looted 58 cows from farms in the villages of Mulama and Rurambira in Uvira territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from Nyalukemba neighborhood in Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from the Nyalukemba neighborhood of Bukavu town.

title/0/en: A Rwandan soldier shot and wounded a young Congolese boy who wanted to cross the Congolese-Rwandan border at the Goma barrier without documents.
notes/en: A Rwandan soldier shot and wounded a young Congolese boy who wanted to cross the Congolese-Rwandan border at the Goma small barrier without documents.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a currency trader in the Kyeshero district of Goma town after taking all his money.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a currency trader in the Kyeshero district of Goma town after taking all his money.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kokodikoko ambushed the cortege of a national deputy candidate at Kimbili in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kokodikoko ambushed the cortege of a national deputy candidate at Kimbili in Shabunda territory. The rebels seized five victims, all adults, and robbed them of all the property they possessed, including mobile phones and USD 2000, before releasing them.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 45-year-old man near Kibati village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 45-year-old man near Kibati village in Walikale territory. The attackers also stole gold from to the victim.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai kilalo attacked an FARDC position in the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni city.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai kilalo attacked an FARDC position in the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni city. The resulted in one Mai-Mai fighter killed and a recovered AK47 weapon.
