title/0/en: The population damaged two vehicles of the Ebola response team, and destroyed the house of the Lubero health district's head doctor in the Lubero rural commune.
notes/en: The population damaged two vehicles of the Ebola response team, and destroyed the house of the Lubero health district's head doctor in the Lubero rural commune. This protest followed an attempt to remove the corpse of a dead girl with signs of ebola.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Lance Muteya raided Cholobera village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Lance Muteya raided Cholobera village in Kalehe territory. The attackers also stole ten goats.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Lance Muteya kidnapped a 39-year-old man from Chifunzi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Lance Muteya kidnapped a 39-year-old man from Chifunzi village in Kalehe territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The Nyatura FDP, who had kidnapped four men from Kinyampundu village in Rutshuru territory on 07 December 2018, released the hostages after interrogation.
notes/en: The Nyatura FDP, who had kidnapped four men from Kinyampundu village in Rutshuru territory on 07 December 2018, released the hostages after interrogation. The kidnappers released them after noticing that the kidnapped candidate was not a member of the UCP political party.

title/0/en: The Nyatura FDP kidnapped four men from Kinyampundu village in Rutshuru territory during a campaign meeting of  a candidate for the national elections.
notes/en: The Nyatura FDP kidnapped four men from Kinyampundu village in Rutshuru territory during a campaign meeting of  a candidate for the national elections. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $5000 for the release of the hostages. They took away $800 held by the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from Mangango village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from Mangango village in Beni territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Gunmen from the new Raia Mutomboki OMELA group raided the Lumpumpu village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Gunmen from the new Raia Mutomboki Omela group raided the Lumpumpu village in Shabunda territory. They ambushed a tractor carrying cassiterite ore. They stole more than 567 kg of cassiterite, five mobile phones and USD 10.

title/0/en: The police dispersed protesters marching against the kidnapping of a doctor from Mangango village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The police dispersed protesters marching against the kidnapping of a doctor from Mangango village in Beni territory. The incident resulted one dead and two wounded among the protesters.

title/0/en: The unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man from Mangango village in Beni territory on 07 December 2018, released the man after receiving payment of the ransom.
notes/en: The unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man from Mangango village in Beni territory on 07 December 2018, released the man after receiving payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen targeted the delegation of a female candidate near Mikenge village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen targeted the delegation of a female candidate near Mikenge village in Mwenga territory. The attackers also looted money and property.

title/0/en: The ADF killed a man, a woman and a child at a field near Nyaleke village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF killed a man, a woman and a child at a field near Nyaleke village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Six fighters from the RM Ngandu group raided the villages of Bukama, Kimpembwe, Myagati and Kaligiou simultaneously in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Six fighters from the RM Ngandu group raided the villages of Bukama, Kimpembwe, Myagati and Kaligiou simultaneously in Shabunda territory. They looted several valuable goods from the population, including eight goats and poultry.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed 12 farmers with knives at Mangolikene village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed 12 farmers with knives at Mangolikene village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: A policeman from the PNC assigned to the Commissariat of the Kyondo rural commune in Beni territory, shot his wife who died on the spot.
notes/en: A policeman from the PNC assigned to the Commissariat of the Kyondo rural commune in Beni territory, shot his wife who died on the spot. Realizing his wife's death, the policeman also tried to kill himself by shooting, but did not succeed. The bullet wounded him in the chest.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen targeted a procession of a candidate near Mweso town in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen targeted a procession of a candidate near Mweso town in Masisi territory. This incident resulted in 17 injured.

title/0/en: A group of unidentified men kidnapped a Maiko park guard from Manguredjipa village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: A group of unidentified men kidnapped a Maiko park guard from Manguredjipa village in Lubero territory. The assailants demand a ransom of USD 500 for his release. They also stole his weapon.

title/0/en: The RM Mutomboki Butachibera kidnapped four people from Bubamba village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The RM Mutomboki Butachibera kidnapped four people from Bubamba village in Kalehe territory. They accused the captives of communicating with their enemies. They released them the next day after receiving payment of three goats per person.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 35-year-old man, and wounded a woman, at their house in Kasenga neighborhood in rural Uvira.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 35-year-old man, and wounded a woman, at their house in Kasenga neighborhood in rural Uvira. The attackers stole $1000.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money and property from three women returning from the market near Kasheishei village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money and property from three women returning from the market near Kasheishei village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: A policeman injured a fellow policeman with a tear gas canister following a disagreement over the custody of the CENI warehouse at Chifunzi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: A policeman injured a fellow policeman with a tear gas canister following a disagreement over the custody of the CENI warehouse at Chifunzi village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Mighobwe village at night, a town in the Kaseghe locality of Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Mighobwe village at night, a town in the Kaseghe locality of Lubero territory. They robbed some houses and shops. In one of the houses, the assailants abducted three women and one of them, aged 19, was raped by three of the bandits along the way. the other two managed to escape.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a motorcycle near the Kibirizi locality of Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a motorcycle near the Kibirizi locality of Rutshuru territory. The attackers kidnapped two men. They demanded a ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: The FARDC shot and injured a 19-year-old male during a patrol at Kabindula neighborhood in rural Uvira.
notes/en: The FARDC shot and injured a 19-year-old male during a patrol at Kabindula neighborhood in rural Uvira. The FARDC took away a phone.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen looted $50000 from the Kadutu neighborhood in Bukavu town from a woman who had just withdrawn the money from the bank.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen looted $50000 from the Kadutu neighborhood in Bukavu town from a woman who had just withdrawn the money from the bank. During the looting, the attackers killed one man and wounded seventeen others.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mabala looted money and property from civilians near Lutika village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mabala looted money and property from civilians near Lutika village in Shabunda territory. The attackers abducted twelve people to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: A police officer shot and killed a man and a woman in the Bondeko market in Nkafu neighborhood at Bukavu town.
notes/en: A police officer shot and killed a man and a woman in the Bondeko market in Nkafu neighborhood at Bukavu town. He also hurt others.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier posing as a Mai-Mai fighter placed a barrier at Kalabula village in Shabunda territory where he extorted money, and other valuable goods, including mobile phones and 3000 CDF per pass, from all passengers passing through.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier posing as a Mai-Mai fighter placed a barrier at Kalabula village in Shabunda territory where he extorted money, and other valuable goods, including mobile phones and 3000 CDF per pass, from all passengers passing through.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a man and his wife near the Kilalo-Mbili village of Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a man and his wife near the Kilalo-Mbili village of Beni territory. The bodies of the victims were found in a state of putrefaction.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Mupando village in Bwegera, Uvira territory, where they killed one person and kidnapped another.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Mupando village in Bwegera, Uvira territory, where they killed one person and kidnapped another. Subsequently, the kidnappers demanded $2000 for the release hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed two men near Mushungu village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed two men near Mushungu village in Kalehe territory. The attackers also stole a cow.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier inadvertently killed a man at Shasha village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier inadvertently killed a man at Shasha village in Masisi territory. The soldier on the motorcycle had accidentally triggered his weapon.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a currency trader in the Majengo neighborhood of Goma town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a currency trader in the Majengo neighborhood of Goma town.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kokodikoko raided Kikindo village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kokodikoko raided Kikindo village in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted 50 grams of gold, cattle and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 25-year-old man from the Volcano neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 25-year-old man from the Volcano neighborhood of Goma. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2500 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The CNRD killed a 41-year-old man Kalembe village in Masisi territory when the victim returned from his field.
notes/en: The CNRD killed a 41-year-old man Kalembe village in Masisi territory when the victim returned from his field.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a motorcycle near Malemo village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a motorcycle near Malemo village in Walikale territory. The robbers shot and injured the two men aged 29 and 45, respectively. They looted $192 and property from the victims.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo abducted four young boys at night in the Lyakobo neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo abducted four young boys at night in the Lyakobo neighborhood of Beni town. The kidnappers and the victims went to Kalau.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided two houses in Kiziba village 2 in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided two houses in Kiziba village 2 in Nyiragongo territory. The attackers injured five people and took away property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a home and shot a man, wounding him, in Mutarule village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a home and shot a man, wounding him, in Mutarule village in Uvira territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed a motorcycle heading from Nsuka to Malemo in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed a motorcycle heading from Nsuka to Malemo in Walikale territory. They shot and wounded the two people on the motorcycle and looted all their belongings, including two mobile phones, a sum of CDF 70000 and several valuable goods.

title/0/en: The FARDC forced men to carry the bodies of two soldiers killed by an unidentified gunmen at Butale village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC forced men to carry the bodies of two soldiers killed by an unidentified gunmen at Butale village in Fizi territory. The FARDC soldiers shot and killed two men who carried the bodies and wounded another.

title/0/en: After a series of attacks in the Baswagha chiefdom where the Mai-Mai Mazembe / UPDI chased the police, another exchange of fire took place between the FARDC and UPDI militiamen at Muhangi village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: After a series of attacks in the Baswagha chiefdom where the Mai-Mai Mazembe / UPDI chased the police, another exchange of fire took place between the FARDC and UPDI militiamen at Muhangi village in Lubero territory. The FARDC finally got the better of the rebels thanks to reinforcements from Lubero and Butembo.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Lance Muteya raided Mushingi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Lance Muteya raided Mushingi village in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted six goats and twelve chickens.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a shop in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a shop in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu town. The attackers looted money and property. They also fired bullets into the air to make their way through.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Ngalula village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Ngalula village in Fizi territory. They shot a man, stole a large sum of money and a quantity of gold.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position guarding CASA Mining Company's facilities at Butale village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position guarding CASA Mining Company's facilities at Butale village in Fizi territory. The attackers killed two FARDC soldiers.

title/0/en: Fighting broke out between FARDC soldiers and the Mai-Mai Mazembe / UPDI in the Vuyinga locality of Lubero territory.
notes/en: Fighting broke out between FARDC soldiers and the Mai-Mai Mazembe / UPDI in the Vuyinga locality of Lubero territory.

title/0/en: Elements of the UPDI / Mazembe attacked Mabambi village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Elements of the UPDI / Mazembe attacked Mabambi village in Lubero territory. FARDC soldiers withdrew from the village and left it to the Mai-Mai UPDI / Mazembe.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Karango village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Karango village in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted $103, a solar panel, a radio, a battery, and two phones.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a 32-year-old man in the volcano neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a 32-year-old man in the volcano neighborhood of Goma. The attackers wanted to rob him as he is a trader.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed vehicles and motorbikes near South Karava village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed vehicles and motorbikes near South Karava village in Uvira territory. The attackers looted money and goods from the passengers.

title/0/en: Park rangers fired upon the population who were protesting the ban on importing trees for the construction of houses at Keya village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Park rangers fired upon the population who were protesting the ban on importing trees for the construction of houses at Keya village in Rutshuru territory. This incident resulted in the death of two men aged 34 and 37, respectively, and in the injury of three young boys by bullets.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi and the NDC Guidon attacked CNRD positions at the villages of Kiyeye and Katsiru in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi and the NDC Guidon attacked CNRD positions at the villages of Kiyeye and Katsiru in Rutshuru territory. The attack resulted in one CNRD fighter, one Nyatura Domi fighter and three civilians killed.

title/0/en: The FDLR-FOCA abducted and killed a 45-year-old man from Buganza village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-FOCA abducted and killed a 45-year-old man from Buganza village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Two men and a girl kidnapped by the Mai-Mai Mwenyemali on November 25, 2018 at Kibungu village in Uvira territory escaped from the hands of their captors without payment of the ransom.
notes/en: Two men and a girl kidnapped by the Mai-Mai Mwenyemali on November 25, 2018 at Kibungu village in Uvira territory escaped from the hands of their captors without payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: Alerted by the population, the FARDC attacked the ADF in the Masoso district of the Oicha rural commune.
notes/en: Alerted by the population, the FARDC attacked the ADF in the Masoso district of the Oicha rural commune. This confrontation resulted in the death of an ADF fighter and an FARDC soldier.

title/0/en: The ADF raided the Oicha rural commune in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF raided the Oicha rural commune in Beni territory. The attackers killed five people.

title/0/en: The ADF shot and killed two men at Pk 7 in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF shot and killed two men at Pk 7 in Beni territory. The FARDC recovered the victims' bodies and sent them to Oicha for burial.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Matata village, shooting and wounding a woman in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Matata village, shooting and wounding a woman in Fizi territory.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers fired upon villages in Fizi territory; especially on Makyaka, Lusololo, Etundu, Mibula, Lulambwe Forest and Mboko, where a supposed Mai-Mai coalition meeting between Runion and Rn was taking place.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers fired upon villages in Fizi territory; especially on Makyaka, Lusololo, Etundu, Mibula, Lulambwe Forest and Mboko, where a supposed Mai-Mai coalition meeting between Reunion and Rn was taking place. The attacks resulted in two soldiers wounded and ten Mai-Mai fighters killed. The Mai-Mai also captured weapons and ammunition.

title/0/en: Elements of the Mai-Mai Mazembe / UPDI attacked an FARDC position at Kivugha village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Elements of the Mai-Mai Mazembe / UPDI attacked an FARDC position at Kivugha village in Lubero territory. The attackers took away some FARDC weapons.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided the Kalunguta General Hospital in Kalunguta, Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided the Kalunguta General Hospital in Kalunguta, Beni territory. The thugs set fire to a large batch of drugs worth at least $9000.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen tortured and injured two men in the Minova locality of Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen tortured and injured two men in the Minova locality of Kalehe territory. The attackers also took away money and two phones of the victims.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali kidnapped two men, aged 32 and 50, respectively, and an 18-year-old girl from Kibungu village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali kidnapped two men, aged 32 and 50, respectively, and an 18-year-old girl from Kibungu village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a 36-year-old man in the Minova area of Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a 36-year-old man in the Minova area of Kalehe territory. The victim was transferred to the CBCA Hospital in Goma for appropriate care.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Lance Muteya raided Mule village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Lance Muteya raided Mule village in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted 40 cows and 80 goats.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a woman from Munanira village in Rutshuru territory on 24 November 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of the $2000 ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a woman from Munanira village in Rutshuru territory on 24 November 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of the $2000 ransom.

title/0/en: Twelve armed men from the MABALA WEMBA group made incursions into Bulungu village in Shabunda territory where they looted a number of valuable goods, small livestock and abducted nine people to the forest to serve as baggage carriers.
notes/en: Twelve armed men from the MABALA WEMBA group made incursions into Bulungu village in Shabunda territory where they looted a number of valuable goods, small livestock and abducted nine people to the forest to serve as baggage carriers. A 35-year-old woman was also raped by the attackers during the incursion.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen tortured and injured three men at Mutuza village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen tortured and injured three men at Mutuza village in Kalehe territory. The attackers also took away the victims' property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen took 32 cows from a farm in Butanya village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen took 32 cows from a farm in Butanya village in Uvira territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 40-year-old man and a 10-year-old-boy at Luizi village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 40-year-old man and a 10-year-old-boy at Luizi village in Masisi territory. The attackers also shot and wounded a 17-year-old girl.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru looted money and property from civilians on National Highway No. 3 near Ebisha village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru looted money and property from civilians on National Highway No. 3 near Ebisha village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 35-year-old woman from Munanira village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 35-year-old woman from Munanira village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers raped the hostage and demanded a ransom for her release.

title/0/en: The inhabitants of the Rughenda district demolished the mortuary of the Katwa HGR in the Bulengera commune at Butembo and took the corpse of someone who had died of the Ebola virus (confirmed case).
notes/en: The inhabitants of the Rughenda district demolished the mortuary of the Katwa HGR in the Bulengera commune at Butembo and took the corpse of someone who had died of the Ebola virus (confirmed case). These people brought the body back to his home in the same neighborhood. The Congolese National Police were deployed to disperse the protesters and managed to bring the body back to the morgue.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 29-year-old man and injured another man in the Boikene neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 29-year-old man and injured another man in the Boikene neighborhood of Beni town. The victims were riding on motorcycles towards Oicha.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a 42-year-old man from Remera village in Rutshuru territory on 20 November 2018, released the hostage after receiving the payment of the $3000 ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a 42-year-old man from Remera village in Rutshuru territory on 20 November 2018, released the hostage after receiving the payment of the $3000 ransom.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD, who had kidnapped 12 people near Kaseke village in Rutshuru territory on 19 November,  released the hostages after receiving payment of the $4500 ransom.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD, who had kidnapped 12 people near Kaseke village in Rutshuru territory on 19 November,  released the hostages after receiving payment of the $4500 ransom.

title/0/en: The CNRD combatants raided Mubirubiru village in the Ujio Mwema area of Rutsuru territory at night.
notes/en: The CNRD combatants raided Mubirubiru village in the Ujio Mwema area of Rutsuru territory at night. They targeted three houses where they took valuables. They also abducted and raped a 20 year-old-woman in another house.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man and a woman from the Rugenge neighborhood in rural Uvira.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man and a woman from the Rugenge neighborhood in rural Uvira. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $1500 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Padri Giovani health center in the Panzi district of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Padri Giovani health center in the Panzi district of Bukavu town. The attackers looted money and property.

title/0/en: The residents of the Vuhira neighborhood ransacked the Vuhira health center in the Bulengera commune of Butembo, following an Ebola death case transferred from their health center to the Ebola Treatment Center (ETC).
notes/en: The residents of the Vuhira neighborhood ransacked the Vuhira health center in the Bulengera commune of Butembo, following an Ebola death case transferred from their health center to the Ebola Treatment Center (ETC). Community members were unable to come to terms with the news, and took revenge by destroying the Vuhira health center.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked a MONUSCO helicopter at Pk 40 on the Mbau-Kamango road in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked a MONUSCO helicopter at Pk 40 on the Mbau-Kamango road in Beni territory. MONUSCO mobilized two more helicopters to rescue to rescue them.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai kilalo, who had kidnapped two men from the Mataba area of Beni territory on 19 November 2018,  released the hostages after receiving payment of the ransom.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai kilalo, who had kidnapped two men from the Mataba area of Beni territory on 19 November 2018,  released the hostages after receiving payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted thirteen cows from Biriba village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted thirteen cows from Biriba village in Uvira territory. The FARDC alerted did not manage to intercept the attackers.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a currency trader in the Kyeshero district of Goma town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a currency trader in the Kyeshero district of Goma town. The attackers stole money from the victim.

title/0/en: An unidentified gunman shot and killed a man in the Kyeshero neighborhood in Goma town.
notes/en: An unidentified gunman shot and killed a man in the Kyeshero neighborhood in Goma town.

title/0/en: The Ugandan navy stopped three Congolese fishermen from Kyavinyonge on Lake Edward and held them for a day. The Ugandan navy accused the Congolese fishermen (pirogue No. 518) of violating the lake's border.
notes/en: The Ugandan navy stopped three Congolese fishermen from Kyavinyonge on Lake Edward and held them for a day. The Ugandan navy accused the Congolese fishermen (pirogue No. 518) of violating the lake's border. After entreaties by the Kyavinyonge Fishermen's Committee, the Ugandan army released the three arrested after the fishermen paid a fine.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked an FARDC position in the eastern periphres of Beni town in the Benengule neighborhood.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked an FARDC position in the eastern periphres of Beni town in the Benengule neighborhood.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 42-year-old man from his home in Remera village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 42-year-old man from his home in Remera village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Young people burned mattresses, medicine and materials, at the Kyaghala Health Center in the Kyaghala neighborhood of Butembo town, after a woman was transferred to the Ebola treatment center.
notes/en: Young people burned mattresses, medicine and materials, at the Kyaghala Health Center in the Kyaghala neighborhood of Butembo town, after a woman was transferred to the Ebola treatment center. Police intervened to disperse the angry youth.

title/0/en: A drunk FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 46-year-old woman at a bar in Katasomwa village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: A drunk FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 46-year-old woman at a bar in Katasomwa village in Kalehe territory. The FARDC soldier responsible for this incident was arrested and transferred to Bukavu.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mbulu raided ten houses in the Musenyi district of the rural Sange commune.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mbulu raided ten houses in the Musenyi district of the rural Sange commune. The attackers stole money and property. They also raped a 41-year-old woman.

title/0/en: Rwandan soldiers from the RDF wounded a man on Lake Kivu while checking nets near Birhalihale village in Idjwi territory.
notes/en: Rwandan soldiers from the RDF wounded a man on Lake Kivu while checking nets near Birhalihale village in Idjwi territory. The succumbed to his wounds at the CBCA hospital in Goma.

title/0/en: The APCLS attacked the NDC Guidon and Mapenzi Group's position at Lwibo village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The APCLS attacked the NDC Guidon and Mapenzi Group's position at Lwibo village in Masisi territory. The attacked resulted in two men injured.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon and the Mapenzi Group attacked an APCLS position at Kataheta village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon and the Mapenzi Group attacked an APCLS position at Kataheta village in Masisi territory. This attack resulted in the death of three women.

title/0/en: Young people ransacked a health center in the Rughenda district of Butembo town.
notes/en: Young people ransacked a health center in the Rughenda district of Butembo town. The demonstrators accused a nurse at this health facility of having transferred a patient to the ebola treatment center.

title/0/en: A group of young people from the Oicha rural commune set fire to a house rented by a soldier in the Pakanza / Oicha district of Beni town.
notes/en: A group of young people from the Oicha rural commune set fire to a house rented by a soldier in the Pakanza / Oicha district of Beni town. Four women (military wives) and children, of Banyarwanda descent, were tortured by angry youth. The police intercepted and dispersed the crowd by shooting in the air. A stray bullet hurt a captain's wife.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 65-year-old man in the Kinanira neighborhood of the rural Sange commune.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 65-year-old man in the Kinanira neighborhood of the rural Sange commune.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped five women, three girls, one boy and three men near Kaseke village in Rutshuru territory when the victims returned from their fields.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped five women, three girls, one boy and three men near Kaseke village in Rutshuru territory when the victims returned from their fields. The kidnappers raped the women and girls. They also demanded a ransom of $6000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto looted 200 kilograms of cassiterite money from AGEFRECO transport agents near Lukala village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto looted 200 kilograms of cassiterite money from AGEFRECO transport agents near Lukala village in Shabunda territory. The attackers forced ten men to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: Five Mai-Mai Kilalo fighters kidnapped two men from the Mataba locality in Beni territory.
notes/en: Five Mai-Mai Kilalo fighters kidnapped two men from the Mataba locality in Beni territory. They tortured and injured one of the hostages. The kidnappers also demanded ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The police dispersed a peaceful march demanding the resignation of the mayor of the Bagira commune in Fariala neighborhood of Bukavu town.
notes/en: The police dispersed a peaceful march demanding the resignation of the mayor of the Bagira commune in Fariala neighborhood of Bukavu town. The incident resulted in eight wounded and four arrests.

title/0/en: Three unidentified armed men appeared in a plot of land and killed a man in the north-central district of Sange town in the Ruzizi plain of Uvira territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified armed men appeared in a plot of land and killed a man in the north-central district of Sange town in the Ruzizi plain of Uvira territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 35-year-old man from his home in Rugarama village.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 35-year-old man from his home in Rugarama village. The kidnappers killed the victim.

title/0/en: CNRD fighters abducted and raped a woman during their invasion into Katsiru village in Majengo district in Rutsuru territory.
notes/en: CNRD fighters abducted and raped a woman during their invasion into Katsiru village in Majengo district in Rutsuru territory. Nyatura fighters intervened and exchanged fire. The attack resulted in three people dead and three others wounded.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position at Tungudu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position at Tungudu village in Beni territory. The FARDC repelled the attackers and managed to save civilians in a jeep and a motorcycle passing by this village.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men from Kibanga village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men from Kibanga village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Kokodikoko and Ndarumanga at the villages of Bwangama, Kiaselela and Musuku in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Kokodikoko and Ndarumanga at the villages of Bwangama, Kiaselela and Musuku in Shabunda territory. During the clash, FARDC troops killed one assailant and captured another. There was also looting of cattle, poultry and property.

title/0/en: The ADF targeted a jeep and a motorcycle near Mukoko village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF targeted a jeep and a motorcycle near Mukoko village in Beni territory. The attackers killed two women aged 35 and 38, respectively. They burned a jeep and a motorcycle.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela ambushed a FARDC jeep near the Malinde village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela ambushed a FARDC jeep near the Malinde village in Fizi territory. This ambush resulted in one wounded FARDC soldier and one fighter dead.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the home of an FDLR-FOCA fighter at Bugomba village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the home of an FDLR-FOCA fighter at Bugomba village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers killed the said commander.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen captured and raped a nine-year-old girl at Fubwe village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen captured and raped a nine-year-old girl at Fubwe village in Rutshuru territory. Two other girls, who were collecting firewood with the victim, managed to escape the assailants' assault. The victim received first aid at a local health center, before being rushed to Mweso and then to Goma for better care.

title/0/en: FDLR-RUD combatants surprised and attempted to kidnap two former M23 members who had fled to Uganda and were tending their cows in Kibaya village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: FDLR-RUD combatants surprised and attempted to kidnap two former M23 members who had fled to Uganda and were tending their cows in Kibaya village in Rutshuru territory. One escaped and the other was captured. The FDLR-RUD demanded a ransom of $25000 for the hostage. FARDC soldiers were alerted but unfortunately arrived on the spot and found the kidnapped person already shot to death in the Jomba groupement.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked MONUSCO peacekeepers in the Boikene district of Beni town.
notes/en: The ADF attacked MONUSCO peacekeepers in the Boikene district of Beni town. The attackers set fire to three houses and a car.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the police and the FARDC at the Kyambogho Barrier in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the police and the FARDC at the Kyambogho Barrier in Lubero territory. The attack resulted in the death of an attacker.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela targeted five vehicles and four MSF and UNICEF non-governmental organizations near Mushimushi village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela targeted five vehicles and four MSF and UNICEF organizations near Mushimushi village in Fizi territory. The attackers took away money, medicine and other property.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles shot and wounded two fishermen on Lake Edward near Mulindi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles shot and wounded two fishermen on Lake Edward near Mulindi village in Rutshuru territory. The victims had requested an extension for the payment of a tax imposed by the militiamen. One of the wounded succumbed to his injuries at the Vitshumbi Health Center.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a woman and her 3-year-old daughter from the Mukuna neighborhood of Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a woman and her 3-year-old daughter from the Mukuna neighborhood of Butembo town. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Young people set fire to an Ebola isolation ward in the Katwa district of Butembo town, following the death of a young person from the virus.
notes/en: Young people set fire to an Ebola isolation ward in the Katwa district of Butembo town, following the death of a young person from the virus. Police intervened to disperse the angry youth.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 30-year-old man at Chaminunu village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 30-year-old man at Chaminunu village in Kalehe territory. This FARDC soldier wanted to steal the victim's bag.

title/0/en: The ADF raided Mambanika village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF raided Mambanika village in Beni territory. The attackers set fire to twelve houses and looted property. They also killed four men, one woman, and wounded three others.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Lukoba and Vunja Vikwazo robbed a motorbike near Nyombe village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Lukoba and Vunja Vikwazo robbed a motorbike near Nyombe village in Shabunda territory. They stole money and property from the motorcyclists, and also from the artisan diggers from Nyombe village.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe kidnapped five people from Kasesero village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe kidnapped five people from Kasesero village in Lubero territory. The attackers also burned four houses.

title/0/en: Unidentified men who had kidnapped a 37-year-old woman and a man from the Mabanga neighborhood of Goma town on 11 November 2018, released the hostages at Turunga village in Nyiragongo territory without receiving payment of the ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified men who had kidnapped a 37-year-old woman and a man from the Mabanga neighborhood of Goma town on 11 November 2018, released the hostages at Turunga village in Nyiragongo territory without receiving payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen had killed an FARDC soldier in the Boikene district of Beni city.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen had killed an FARDC soldier in the Boikene district of Beni city. The body of the killed soldier was found in a very advanced state of putrefaction. The killed soldier had been missing since October 28, 2018.

title/0/en: The FARDC opened fire on a MM Kifuafua Delphin patrol at Kilungu village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The FARDC opened fire on a MM Kifuafua Delphin patrol at Kilungu village in Walikale territory. The latter went to Ntoto. The FARDC had the upper hand over the MM who dispersed into the bush. The casualties of this attack are unknown.

title/0/en: Seven FDLR-RUD combatants raided three houses in Nyarukwangara village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Seven FDLR-RUD combatants raided three houses in Nyarukwangara village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers stabbed a man, looted money, four goats, three sheep and property.

title/0/en: Seven FDLR-RUD combatants abducted a girl from Karambi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Seven FDLR-RUD combatants abducted a girl from Karambi village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers raped the victim.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi attacked the residence of a police commander in Bambu village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi attacked the residence of a police commander in Bambu village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers injured a policeman.

title/0/en: Burundian soldiers clashed with RED TABARA at Kitembe village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Burundian soldiers clashed with RED TABARA at Kitembe village in Uvira territory. The clash resulted in the death of eleven RED TABARA fighters and five Burundian soldiers.

title/0/en: Unidentified men, who had kidnapped three men from the Mangina district of the Mangina rural commune on 14 November 2018, released the hostages.
notes/en: Unidentified men, who had kidnapped three men from the Mangina district of the Mangina rural commune on 14 November 2018, released the hostages.

title/0/en: In the Matsihe village, in Masisi territory the Ny Nyatura Delta abducted several villagers to carry a patient on a stretcher (one of them injured, some villagers fired at close range and wounded upon resistance).
notes/en: In the Matsihe village, in Masisi territory the Ny Nyatura Delta abducted several villagers to carry a patient on a stretcher (one of them injured, some villagers fired at close range and wounded upon resistance). Two of the abductees were shot. They were taken to a medical center in the square.

title/0/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants captured and raped three girls aged nine to 12 years old form Mushwago village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants captured and raped three girls aged nine to 12 years old form Mushwago village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted a dugout canoe, four nets and spades from fishermen at Lake Kivu near Kabonde village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted a dugout canoe, four nets and spades from fishermen at Lake Kivu near Kabonde village in Kabare territory. The attackers shot and wounded a fisherman.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a man at Kimuka village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a man at Kimuka village in Uvira territory. The victim died after being transferred to Bukavu for proper care.

title/0/en: The FARDC, supported by MONUSCO, led an offensive against an ADF position in Kididiwe village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC, supported by MONUSCO, led an offensive against an ADF position in Kididiwe village in Beni territory. This offensive resulted in a death toll of 12 dead and 20 wounded in the ranks of the FARDC, and seven dead and ten wounded on the side of MONUSCO. The ADF also captured weapons.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped three men from the Mangina district of the Mangina rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped three men from the Mangina district of the Mangina rural commune.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Mulongwe district of rural Uvira.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Mulongwe district of rural Uvira. The attackers stole money.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed two minibuses and a car near Kisango village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed two minibuses and a car near Kisango village in Mwenga territory. The robbers stole money and property.

title/0/en: The two FDLR-RUD fighters, who had kidnapped three women from the Buturande district of the Kiwanja rural commune on 08 November 2018, released the hostages after receiving payment of the ransom.
notes/en: The two FDLR-RUD fighters, who had kidnapped three women from the Buturande district of the Kiwanja rural commune on 08 November 2018, released the hostages after receiving payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a man in the rural commune of Kayna.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a man in the rural commune of Kayna.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man from his home in the rural Kayna commune on 09 November 2018, released the hostage after paying a $700 ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man from his home in the rural Kayna commune on 09 November 2018, released the hostage after paying a $700 ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 39-year-old woman and a man from the Mabanga neighborhood in Goma town.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 39-year-old woman and a man from the Mabanga neighborhood in Goma town. The kidnapped woman had just finished holding a lecture in the children's voice room. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $20000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a 45-year-old man with a machete in his field at Kituva village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a 45-year-old man with a machete in his field at Kituva village in Masisi territory. The body of the victim was found in his field.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali, who had kidnapped a man from Bwegera village in Uvira territory on 19 November 2018,  released the hostage after receiving payment of a $ 600 ransom.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali, who had kidnapped a man from Bwegera village in Uvira territory on 19 November 2018,  released the hostage after receiving payment of a $ 600 ransom.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked an FARDC position in the Muhangi locality of Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked an FARDC position in the Muhangi locality of Lubero territory. The Mai-Mai Mazembe chased the FARDC out of this locality. They ransacked the FARDC field and the police office. The attackers also looted property from the population.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Boikene neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Boikene neighborhood of Beni town. The attackers killed a man, a woman and their three children. They burned two houses, a RAV4 branded car and property. They also took goats and chickens.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked Operation Sokola I headquarters in the Paida district of Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked Operation Sokola I headquarters in the Paida district of Beni town. The attackers killed two FARDC soldiers.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Makindo stole two 12-gauge brand hunting weapons and five phones belonging to artisanal diggers from the Ngonda mining area in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Makindo stole two 12-gauge brand hunting weapons and five phones belonging to artisanal diggers from the Ngonda mining area in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: Alerted by the population to unidentified gunmen raiding three houses in the Kasenga neighborhood of the Uvira rural commune, the FARDC intervened and attacked the attackers.
notes/en: Alerted by the population to unidentified gunmen raiding three houses in the Kasenga neighborhood of the Uvira rural commune, the FARDC intervened and attacked the attackers. The FARDC captured an attacker.

title/0/en: Alerted by the population of the presence of unidentified gunmen raiding three houses in the Kasenga neighborhood of the Uvira rural commune, the FARDC intervened and attacked.
notes/en: Alerted by the population of the presence of unidentified gunmen raiding three houses in the Kasenga neighborhood of the Uvira rural commune, the FARDC intervened and attacked. The FARDC captured an attacker.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided three houses in the Kasenga neighborhood of the Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided three houses in the Kasenga neighborhood of the Uvira rural commune. The attackers looted money and property. One of the attackers raped an 18-year-old girl.

title/0/en: The ADF raided Mayi Moya village in Beni territory. The attackers killed four men and one woman.
notes/en: The ADF raided Mayi Moya village in Beni territory. The attackers killed four men, one woman and injured a woman. They stole goats and possessions. The attackers also abducted a girl aged 4, and two boys aged 6 and 12.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man from Bingo village in Beni territory on 08 November 2018,  released the hostage after receiving payment of a ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man from Bingo village in Beni territory on 08 November 2018,  released the hostage after receiving payment of a ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man from  Mangoyo village in Beni territory on November 9, 2018,  released the hostage after payment of a ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man from  Mangoyo village in Beni territory on November 9, 2018,  released the hostage after payment of a ransom.

title/0/en: The FARDC came from Makobola 2 and attacked the Mai-Mai Runion, which had just looted cattle, poultry and goods from Ngalula village in the territory of Fizi.
notes/en: The FARDC came from Makobola 2 and attacked the Mai-Mai Runion, which had just looted cattle, poultry and goods from Ngalula village in the territory of Fizi.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Runion raided Ngalula village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Runion raided Ngalula village in Fizi territory. The attackers looted goats, chickens and property.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali kidnapped a 61-year-old man from Bwegera village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali kidnapped a 61-year-old man from Bwegera village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 59-year-old man in the Kakombe neighborhood of the Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 59-year-old man in the Kakombe neighborhood of the Uvira rural commune.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from Mangoyo village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from Mangoyo village in Beni territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from his home in the rural Kayna commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from his home in the rural Kayna commune. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from Bingo village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man from Bingo village in Beni territory. The attackers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Two FDLR-RUD combatants kidnapped a woman from the  Buturande district of the Kiwanja rural commune.
notes/en: Two FDLR-RUD combatants kidnapped a woman from the  Buturande district of the Kiwanja rural commune. The kidnappers also kidnapped another two women found en route their return to Virunga National Park. They raped two women and demanded a ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: During the robbery of a mini-bus from the original Radio Okapi office, the FARDC rescued the victims from the robbers.
notes/en: During the robbery of a mini-bus from the original Radio Okapi office, the FARDC rescued the victims from the robbers. There was an exchange of fire between the attackers and the FARDC.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen targeted a mini bus from the original Radio Okapi office near the Rutemba locality in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen targeted a mini bus from the original Radio Okapi office near the Rutemba locality in Uvira territory. The robbers shot and wounded two men. They also looted money and property.

title/0/en: The police arrested four LUCHA activists who wanted to participate in a rally organized by students and citizen movements at the central roundabout of Beni town.
notes/en: The police arrested four LUCHA activists who wanted to participate in a rally organized by students and citizen movements at the central roundabout of Beni town. The police accused the organizers of attempting to disrupt public order.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the ADF attempting to move from the north to the south near the Mamundioma locality in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the ADF attempting to move from the north to the south near the Mamundioma locality in Beni territory. The confrontation resulted in two ADF fighters being killed.

title/0/en: The CNRD raped a 9-year-old girl who was going to school at Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The CNRD raped a 9-year-old girl who was going to school at Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory. The rape victim was rushed to Mweso Hospital for appropriate care.

title/0/en: The CNRD, who had kidnapped and raped two girls from Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory on 06 November 2018, released the hostages.
notes/en: The CNRD, who had kidnapped and raped two girls from Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory on 06 November 2018, released the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a clinic at Kwangambwa village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a clinic at Kwangambwa village in Mwenga territory. The attackers looted money, drugs and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position at Ndombi village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position at Ndombi village in Beni territory. The attackers killed two FARDC soldiers and stole their weapons.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo kidnapped five civil protection officers,  who are responsible for the dignified and safe burial of Ebola victims, from the Lyakobo neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo kidnapped five civil protection officers,  who are responsible for the dignified and safe burial of Ebola victims, from the Lyakobo neighborhood of Beni town. The kidnappers accused them of being spies for the FARDC. They set their ransom at $50.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo, who took five civil protection officers from the Lyakobo district in Beni City on November 7, 2018, released the hostages the same day in the evening after receiving payment of the $50 ransom.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo, who took five civil protection officers from the Lyakobo district in Beni City on November 7, 2018, released the hostages the same day in the evening after receiving payment of the $50 ransom.

title/0/en: The CNRD abducted two girls aged 15 and 16, respectively, from Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The CNRD abducted two girls aged 15 and 16, respectively, from Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers raped the two hostages.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon and the Mapenzi group attacked an APCLS position at Bwendero village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon and the Mapenzi group attacked an APCLS position at Bwendero village in Masisi territory. The APCLS held their position by pushing back their opponents.

title/0/en: The CNRD, who had kidnapped a 39-year-old man from Majengo village in Rutshuru territory on 04 November 2018,  released the hostage after receiving payment of a $700 ransom.
notes/en: The CNRD, who had kidnapped a 39-year-old man from Majengo village in Rutshuru territory on 04 November 2018,  released the hostage after receiving payment of a $700 ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Mwangaza district of the Kasindi rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Mwangaza district of the Kasindi rural commune. The attackers shot and wounded a man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a clinic and eight houses at Cifuma village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a clinic and eight houses at Cifuma village in Kabare territory. The attackers injured two women, looted drugs and property.

title/0/en: Three ANR agents looted $242 from a man near the Kigulube locality in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Three ANR agents looted $242 from a man near the Kigulube locality in Shabunda territory. The police arrested the three ANR agents.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 20-year-old man in the Boikene neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 20-year-old man in the Boikene neighborhood of Beni town. The FARDC soldier wanted to separate two boys who were arguing.

title/0/en: During the altercation between fishermen and state agents at Cikumbo village in Idjwi territory, a police officer shot and wounded a man.
notes/en: During the altercation between fishermen and state agents at Cikumbo village in Idjwi territory, a police officer shot and wounded a man. The wounded victim died in Bukavu hospital.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi shot and killed an FARDC soldier at a makeshift fence in Kiseghe village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi shot and killed an FARDC soldier at a makeshift fence in Kiseghe village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers stole the weapon of the killed soldier.

title/0/en: The population rebelled against police inaction in the Katsiru locality of Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The population rebelled against police inaction in the Katsiru locality of Rutshuru territory. The population accused the police of not intervening in the kidnappings of civilians in this region. They burned the police station.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked FARDC Operation Sukola I headquarters at the Paida and Rwangoma neighborhoods of Beni town.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked FARDC Operation Sukola I headquarters at the Paida and Rwangoma neighborhoods of Beni town. The attack left two Mai-Mai Kilalo fighters dead.

title/0/en: A police officer raped a five-year-old girl at Chondo village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: A police officer raped a five-year-old girl at Chondo village in Kalehe territory. The policeman was arrested.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Kabere village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Kabere village in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted $100, goats, and property.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers tortured and injured a 50-year-old man at Kalungu village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers tortured and injured a 50-year-old man at Kalungu village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: The CNRD kidnapped a 39-year-old man from Majengo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The CNRD kidnapped a 39-year-old man from Majengo village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $3000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The CNRD raped a 17-year-old girl and three women at Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The CNRD raped a 17-year-old girl and three women at Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Sake village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Sake village in Masisi territory. The attackers killed an FARDC soldier and stole his weapon. They also killed five men and injured four others.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 58-year-old man in the Kabindula neighborhood of the rural Uvira commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 58-year-old man in the Kabindula neighborhood of the rural Uvira commune.

title/0/en: The ADF raided Mambanika village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF raided Mambanika village in Beni territory. The attackers killed one man, abducted four girls and ten boys. They also looted cattle and property.

title/0/en: The ADF targeted two vehicles near Sikwaila village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF targeted two vehicles near Sikwaila village in Beni territory. The attackers killed seven men and one woman. They also burned a FUSO branded vehicle.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga at the villages of Kasimba and Kasheyi in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga at the villages of Kasimba and Kasheyi in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: An unidentified gunman shot and killed a man at Mutaho village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: An unidentified gunman shot and killed a man at Mutaho village in Nyiragongo territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money, 50 kilograms of cassiterite and five telephones from diggers at Lusungu village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money, 50 kilograms of cassiterite and five telephones from diggers at Lusungu village in Mwenga territory.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi ambushed the FARDC near Mashango village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi ambushed the FARDC near Mashango village in Rutshuru territory. The Nyatura killed five FARDC soldiers and stole weapons.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo stormed the military detention center in the Cit-Belge neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo stormed the military detention center in the Cit-Belge neighborhood of Beni town. The FARDC guards fired  but did not resist the assault. The attackers managed to release 35 detainees. An FARDC soldier was reported missing.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Iseke village in Mwenga territory. The attackers looted money, livestock and property. They also shot and killed a 21-year-old man.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Iseke village in Mwenga territory. The attackers looted money, livestock and property. They also shot and killed a 21-year-old man.

title/0/en: The FARDC intercepted and attacked the Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga who had just raided Isopo village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: The FARDC intercepted and attacked the Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga who had just raided Isopo village in Mwenga territory. The attack killed 7 Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga fighters and one hostage.

title/0/en: The FARDC released two men abducted by the Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga at Isopo village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: The FARDC released two men abducted by the Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga from Isopo village in Mwenga territory.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kabishula attacked the Mai-Mai Kirikicho at Tushunguti village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kabishula attacked the Mai-Mai Kirikicho at Tushunguti village in Kalehe territory. The attack resulted in three dead and one wounded on the Mai-Mai Kirikicho's side, and one dead and one wounded on the Raia Mutomboki Kabishula's side.

title/0/en: The CNRD fighters raided Majengo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The CNRD fighters raided Majengo village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers also stole $909 and a goat.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mabala raided Sambumbulu village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mabala raided Sambumbulu village in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted two motorola radios, two goats, four chickens and other valuables.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked Mai-Mai Kihebe and Kigjangala positions in the villages of Lushago and Kiridja in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked Mai-Mai Kihebe and Kigjangala positions in the villages of Lushago and Kiridja in Uvira territory. Cattle and poultry were looted, and 59 houses were burned.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen at Miki village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen at Miki village in Mwenga territory. The FARDC killed an assailant.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers killed three men and wounded another in Mambangu village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers killed three men and wounded another in Mambangu village in Lubero territory. They also looted property from the people.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mamba attacked the FARDC at Kamidjedje village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mamba attacked the FARDC at Kamidjedje village in Walikale territory. The attack has pushed the population to move to neighboring villages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked RED TABARA positions in the villages of Kahololo, Muhanga, Butumba and Mashuba in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The burundian Army attacked RED TABARA positions in the villages of Kahololo, Muhanga, Butumba and Mashuba in Uvira territory. These clashes resulted in one dead and six wounded for the attackers.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga raided Isopo village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga raided Isopo village in Mwenga territory. The attackers looted money, livestock and property. They also forced three men to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided two houses, at night, in the neighborhoods of Kanoshe and Cikera in Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided two houses, at night, in the neighborhoods of Kanoshe and Cikera in Bukavu town. The attackers looted $300 and property.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles, who had kidnapped a man in Chabafu village in Rutshuru territory on 28 October 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of the ransom.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles, who had kidnapped a man in Chabafu village in Rutshuru territory on 28 October 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kabishula clashed with the Mai-Mai Kirikicho in the village of Ziralo in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kabishula clashed with the Mai-Mai Kirikicho in the village of Ziralo in Kalehe territory. The clash left four Mai-Mai Kirikicho fighters dead and one dead on Mai-Mai Kabishula's side.

title/0/en: The ADF shot and killed a man near the Mamundioma locality of Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF shot and killed a man near the Mamundioma locality of Beni territory. The victim was going to his field.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen abducted a 21-year-old man from the Nyakavogo neighborhood of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen abducted a 21-year-old man from the Nyakavogo neighborhood of Bukavu town.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a farm at Chamuyange village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a farm at Chamuyange village in Kalehe territory. The attackers tortured and injured two men. They also took away eight goats.

title/0/en: Two unidentified men raided a house in Kangandu village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified men raided a house in Kangandu village in Mwenga territory. The attackers stole $1063 and gold.

title/0/en: Four FDLR-RUD combatants shot dead a 45-year-old man at Nyamirambo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Four FDLR-RUD combatants shot dead a 45-year-old man at Nyamirambo village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 62-year-old man in the Kinanira neighborhood of the rural Sange commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 62-year-old man in the Kinanira neighborhood of the rural Sange commune. The victim resisted an attempted abduction by the attackers.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kirikicho attacked the Mai-Mai Kabishula at Bundje village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kirikicho attacked the Mai-Mai Kabishula at Bundje village in Kalehe territory. The attack killed one and wounded another Mai-Mai Kabishula fighter.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen fired bullets into the house of an ANR agent at Kahira village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen fired bullets into the house of an ANR agent at Kahira village in Masisi territory. This incident resulted in two deaths including the ANR agents and two others wounded.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped and raped a 17-year-old girl near Kiringa village in Rutshuru territory on 30 October 2018, released the hostage.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped and raped a 17-year-old girl near Kiringa village in Rutshuru territory on 30 October 2018, released the hostage.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Maheshe raided Karembu village in Walungu territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Maheshe raided Karembu village in Walungu territory. The attackers looted 40 kilograms of wolframite, six goats and twenty hens.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Runion targeted three vehicles near the village of Mukwezi in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Runion targeted three vehicles near the village of Mukwezi in Fizi territory. The robbers shot and killed five people, looted money and property.

title/0/en: Armed men dressed in military uniform abducted and raped a girl near Kiringa village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Armed men dressed in military uniform abducted and raped a girl near Kiringa village in Rutshuru territory. The victim was on the way to the field with her colleagues who were able to escape.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers tortured and injured a 28-year-old man at Kayaya village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers tortured and injured a 28-year-old man at Kayaya village in Kalehe territory. The victim was dispatched to the Chebumba health center for appropriate care.

title/0/en: The Police dispersed citizen movement activists marching in the Ndendere district of Bukavu town.
notes/en: The Police dispersed citizen movement activists marching in the Ndendere district of Bukavu town. The protesters called for the improvement of living conditions for the population of South Kivu. The police arrested three protesters.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Kavimvira neighborhood of rural Uvira.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Kavimvira neighborhood of rural Uvira. The attackers shot and wounded a 36-year-old man and also looted money.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a boy and two girls from the Buturande district of the Kiwanja rural commune on October 20, 2018, released the hostages after receiving payment of the $1000 ransom.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a boy and two girls from the Buturande district of the Kiwanja rural commune on October 20, 2018, released the hostages after receiving payment of the $1000 ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a 25-year-old man at Ramba village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a 25-year-old man at Ramba village in Kalehe territory. The victim was transferred to the Bukavu General Hospital for appropriate care.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a woman from Bwegera village in Uvira territory on 28 October 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of a $500 ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a woman from Bwegera village in Uvira territory on 28 October 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of a $500 ransom.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen robbed a shop in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen robbed a shop in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu town. The attackers looted money and property.

title/0/en: The ADF raided Makumbo village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF raided Makumbo village in Beni territory. The attackers stabbed two men and two women killing them. Two people were burned in a house by the attackers.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 62-year-old woman from Bwegera village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 62-year-old woman from Bwegera village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles kidnapped a 45-year-old man from Chabafu village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles kidnapped a 45-year-old man from Chabafu village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped two men from Bukeye village in Uvira territory on 24 October 2018,  released the hostages after receiving payment of the $606 ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped two men from Bukeye village in Uvira territory on 24 October 2018,  released the hostages after receiving payment of the $606 ransom.

title/0/en: A 45-year-old man who had been kidnapped by unidentified gunmen, near Kamukwale village in Rutshuru territory on 26 October 2018, escaped from his captors.
notes/en: A 45-year-old man who had been kidnapped by unidentified gunmen, near Kamukwale village in Rutshuru territory on 26 October 2018, escaped from his captors.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen stabbed a man at Tchengerero village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen stabbed a man at Tchengerero village in Rutshuru territory. The body of the victim was found by a passersby.

title/0/en: A Mai-Mai Mazembe fighter raped an 11-year-old girl in the Vuyinga locality of the Lubero territory when the victim was heading to the field.
notes/en: A Mai-Mai Mazembe fighter raped an 11-year-old girl in the Vuyinga locality of the Lubero territory when the victim was heading to the field.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 46-year-old man in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu town when the victim returned from his workplace.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 46-year-old man in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu town when the victim returned from his workplace. The attackers took money from the killed man.

title/0/en: A 3-year-old girl was shot at her home and died on the spot.
notes/en: A 3-year-old girl was shot at her home and died on the spot. Her father was injured and is recovering in a health facility.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted $984 and merchants property near Malembe village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted $984 and merchants property near Malembe village in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a man at Kanyatsi village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a man at Kanyatsi village in Lubero territory. The FARDC soldier accused the victim of not participating in community work in the village.

title/0/en: Unidentified men, who had kidnapped a woman and a girl from Mukuna neighborhood in Butembo town on October 16, 2018, released the two hostages after payment of a portion of the required ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified men, who had kidnapped a woman and a girl from Mukuna neighborhood in Butembo town on October 16, 2018, released the two hostages after payment of a portion of the required ransom. ANR agents had apprehended one of the kidnappers and pressured them to free the hostages.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo positions at the villages of Safari and Kasimba in Kabare territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo and Safari positions at Kasimba village in Kabare territory. The attack left five dead FARDC soldiers, two injured soldiers and five rebels killed.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 45-year-old man near Kamukwale village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 45-year-old man near Kamukwale village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $15000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Lance Muteya looted money, four cows and three sheep from traders who were going to the market near Nguliro village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Lance Muteya looted money, four cows and three sheep from traders who were going to the market near Nguliro village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a woman from the Buzito district of the Kiwanja rural commune on October 23, 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of the $1200 ransom.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a woman from the Buzito district of the Kiwanja rural commune on October 23, 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of the $1200 ransom.

title/0/en: Two knife wielding men stabbed an FARDC soldier in the Kasabinyole neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: Two knife wielding men stabbed an FARDC soldier in the Kasabinyole neighborhood of Beni town. The FARDC soldier died on the spot.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 60-year-old man from Kabaya village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 60-year-old man from Kabaya village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $5000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The police dispersed the population protesting the forced eviction from a concession at Buhene village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: The police dispersed the population protesting the forced eviction from a concession at Buhene village in Nyiragongo territory. The incident resulted in one dead and one wounded for the protesters

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Mulambula neighborhood of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Mulambula neighborhood of Bukavu town. The attackers shot and killed a 45-year-old man, and looted money and property.

title/0/en: The ADF, which had forced four men to carry looted property from the Oicha rural commune, released the hostages.
notes/en: The ADF, which had forced four men to carry looted property from the Oicha rural commune, released the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed 35-year-old man at Muteke village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed 35-year-old man at Muteke village in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi, who had kidnapped a man, a woman and two children from Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory on October 19, 2018, released the hostages after receiving payment of a $500 ransom.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi, who had kidnapped a man, a woman and two children from Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory on October 19, 2018, released the hostages after receiving payment of a $500 ransom.

title/0/en: The ADF raided the Bakaiku neighborhood of the Oicha rural commune.
notes/en: The ADF raided the Bakaiku neighborhood of the Oicha rural commune. The FARDC fought back and chased the attackers. The ADF burnt four houses and three vehicles. The also killed three men, looted goats, drugs and other property. They forced four men to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked an FARDC position at the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked an FARDC position at the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni town. The attack resulted in the death of one FARDC soldier and two attackers. The Mai-Mai Kilalo also recovered a weapon and set fire to the FARDC camp.

title/0/en: The police injured two civilians who were demanding the search an FARDC colonel's home in the Kasabinyole neighborhood of Beni town.
