notes/en: The police injured two civilians who were demanding the search an FARDC colonel's home in the Kasabinyole neighborhood of Beni town. The population suspected the FARDC commander of sheltering Hutu immigrants.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Zombe mining area in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Zombe mining area in Mwenga territory. The attackers looted money, minerals and property. They forced people to carry looted goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men from Bukeye village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men from Bukeye village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 45-year-old woman from the Buzito neighborhood of the Kiwanja rural commune.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 45-year-old woman from the Buzito neighborhood of the Kiwanja rural commune. The kidnappers raped the victim and demanded a ransom of $3500 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: An unidentified gunman shot and killed a 72-year-old man at Amba village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: An unidentified gunman shot and killed a 72-year-old man at Amba village in Fizi territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin shot and killed a 30-year-old man at Biriko village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin shot and killed a 30-year-old man at Biriko village in Walikale territory. The incident occurred when the Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin were disputing the sharing of loot.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali, who had kidnapped a man from Katano village in Uvira territory on October 23, 2018, released the hostage after payment of the $303 ransom.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali, who had kidnapped a man from Katano village in Uvira territory on October 23, 2018, released the hostage after payment of the $303 ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a convoy of the CODEVA NGO near Naulugye village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a convoy of the CODEVA NGO near Naulugye village in Uvira territory. The robbers also looted money and property.

title/0/en: The police dispersed demonstrators protesting against the eviction of some citizens from a concession at Munigi village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: The police dispersed demonstrators protesting against the eviction of some citizens from a concession at Munigi village in Nyiragongo territory. The incident left two dead and another two injured.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a man at Pk 5 in Beni territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a man at Pk 5 in Beni territory. The victim was returning from his field.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a 23-year-old man in the Kasali neighborhood of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a 23-year-old man in the Kasali neighborhood of Bukavu town. The body of the victim was found in a gutter.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon targeted traders near Kasugho in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon targeted traders near Kasugho in Lubero territory. The attackers also stole $2000.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali, who had kidnapped a man from Nyamugali village in Uvira territory on 21 October 2018,  released the hostage following pressure by the FARDC on the family of one of the kidnappers.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali, who had kidnapped a man from Nyamugali village in Uvira territory on 21 October 2018,  released the hostage following pressure by the FARDC on the family of one of the kidnappers. The FARDC arrested the mother of one of the kidnappers.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali kidnapped a 54-year-old man from Nyamugali village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali kidnapped a 54-year-old man from Nyamugali village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2000.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked police officers guarding the high court of the Kambali district of Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked police officers guarding the high court of the Kambali neighborhood of Butembo town. The attack resulted in the death of one policeman and one attacker.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position in the Paida district of Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position in the Paida district of Beni town. The attack killed one attacker and one civilian. The FARDC also recovered an AK-47.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin arrested and tortured a 43-year-old man who was going to his field in Madje village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin arrested and tortured a 43-year-old man who was going to his field in Madje village in Walikale territory. The victim succumbed to his injuries. The attackers accused the victim of being an FARDC intelligence agent.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles, who had abducted a man near Ishasha village in Rutshuru territory on October 20, 2018, abandoned the hostage as park rangers were conducting a search patrol.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles, who had abducted a man near Ishasha village in Rutshuru territory on October 20, 2018, abandoned the hostage as park rangers were conducting a search patrol.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen at Kamonyi village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen at Kamonyi village in Uvira territory. The attack killed one attacker and wounded an FARDC soldier. The FARDC also captured seven attackers

title/0/en: The ADF raided the Boikene neighborhood in Beni city. The FARDC, supported by MONUSCO peacekeepers, counter-attacked.
notes/en: The ADF raided the Boikene neighborhood in Beni city. The FARDC, supported by MONUSCO peacekeepers, counter-attacked. The attack resulted in the death of an FARDC soldier, six women and five men. The attackers also looted goats, pharmaceuticals and other goods. They kidnapped ten miners and civilian men.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali kidnapped a 40-year-old man from Katano village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali kidnapped a 40-year-old man from Katano village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The population who had apprehended two thieves at Cibimbi village in Kabare territory disturbed public order in seeking justice.
notes/en: The population who had apprehended two thieves at Cibimbi village in Kabare territory disturbed public order in seeking justice. The population wanted to stone the two thieves. The FARDC interrupted by firing bullets in the air.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen kidnapped an 18-year-old boy and two girls aged 10 and 17 respectively from the Buturande district of the rural Kiwanja commune.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen kidnapped an 18-year-old boy and two girls aged 10 and 17 respectively from the Buturande district of the rural Kiwanja commune. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $4000 for the release of the hostages. One of the abductors raped the 17-year-old girl.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mabala and Kokodikoko attacked an FARDC position at Migamba village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mabala and Kokodikoko attacked an FARDC position at Migamba village in Shabunda territory. The FARDC fought back and injured an attacker. The FARDC also recovered four AK-47 weapons.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the FOREBU who had infiltrated Kihanama village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the FOREBU who had infiltrated Kihanama village in Uvira territory. The attack killed two FOREBU fighters.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles abducted a man near Ishasha village in Rusthuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles abducted a man near Ishasha village in Rusthuru territory. The kidnappers also stole money from the victim.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo raided a farm in the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni city.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo raided a farm in the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni city. The attackers took away two cows, 58 goats, chickens and rabbits.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi raided a house at Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi raided a house at Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers kidnapped a 29-year-old man, a 20-year-old woman and two children. They stole $500 and demanded ransom for the release of the hostages. They also raped a woman.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed two FARDC soldiers in the Congo ya Sika neighborhood of Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed two FARDC soldiers in the Congo ya Sika neighborhood of Butembo town. The attackers also took away two weapons.

title/0/en: The police killed a 14-year-old boy at Chitungano village in Kabare territory when the police arrested the father of a driver who had just been involved in an accident in that area.
notes/en: The police killed a 14-year-old boy at Chitungano village in Kabare territory when the police arrested the father of a driver who had just been involved in an accident in that area.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked an FARDC position at Kasitu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked an FARDC position at Kasitu village in Beni territory. The attack killed six Mai-Mai fighters and one FARDC soldier.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at night in the Rugenge district of rural Uvira.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at night in the Rugenge district of rural Uvira. The attackers shot and killed a 45-year-old man and injured his wife.

title/0/en: A woman abducted by the ADF from the Mabapula district of the Oicha rural commune, on 24 September 2018, escaped from her captors to an FARDC position at Sulungwe village in Beni territory.
notes/en: A woman abducted by the ADF from the Mabapula district of the Oicha rural commune, on 24 September 2018, escaped from her captors to an FARDC position at Sulungwe village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a man in the Vutsundo neighborhood of Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a man in the Vutsundo neighborhood of Butembo town.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 60-year-old man in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 60-year-old man in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu town. The attackers stole money from the victim who was returning from selling gold.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles targeted a motorcycle near the Ishasha locality of Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles targeted a motorcycle near the Ishasha locality of Rutshuru territory. The robbers shot and killed the man who was trying to escape. They forced another man to join their armed group.

title/0/en: A drunk FARDC soldier shot and killed his wife and a boy at Nobili village in Beni territory.
notes/en: A drunk FARDC soldier shot and killed his wife and a boy at Nobili village in Beni territory. The FARDC soldier was arrested by his colleagues.

title/0/en: The FARDC shot and killed a fellow FARDC soldier during a patrol, confusing him with an assailant at Kashebere village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The FARDC shot and killed a fellow FARDC soldier during a patrol, confusing him with an assailant at Kashebere village in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo and Safari raided Bisisi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo and Safari raided Bisisi village in Kalehe territory. Alerted by the population, the FARDC chased the attackers. The attackers looted four goats and property of the population.

title/0/en: Alerted by the population of the Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo and Safari raiding Bisisi village in Kalehe territory, the FARDC intervened and chased the attackers.
notes/en: Alerted by the population of the Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo and Safari raiding Bisisi village in Kalehe territory, the FARDC intervened and chased the attackers.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Love attacked two FARDC soldiers who were going to their guard post near Kise village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Love attacked two FARDC soldiers who were going to their guard post near Kise village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers killed an FARDC soldier and took away his weapon.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura FDP at a plantation in Mivumba village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura FDP at a plantation in Mivumba village in Rutshuru territory. The FARDC chased the attackers from this plantation.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked a Mai-Mai Mazembe position at Lubango village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked a Mai-Mai Mazembe position at Lubango village in Lubero territory. The FARDC chased the militiamen from this area.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon tortured a 28-year-old man at Robe village in Walikale territory due to non-payment of token fees.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon tortured a 28-year-old man at Robe village in Walikale territory due to non-payment of token fees. The victim died from his injuries in a field.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed an ANR agent in Rushovu village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed an ANR agent in Rushovu village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked a Mai-Mai Kabido position at Bunyatenge village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked a Mai-Mai Kabido position at Bunyatenge village in Lubero territory. The NDC Guidon chased the Mai-Mai Kabido from this locality.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndusha, who had kidnapped a 58-year-old man from Karembu village in Walungu territory on 13 October 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of the $600 ransom.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndusha, who had kidnapped a 58-year-old man from Karembu village in Walungu territory on 13 October 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of the $600 ransom.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked an FARDC position at Samboko village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked an FARDC position at Samboko village in Beni territory. The attack killed three and wounded four FARDC soldiers.

title/0/en: Three FARDC soldiers injured two men in the Mbimbi neighborhood of the Oicha rural commune.
notes/en: Three FARDC soldiers injured two men in the Mbimbi neighborhood of the Oicha rural commune. They also stole $194.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a 32-year-old man who had been resisting the looting of his goat at Ngugo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a 32-year-old man who had been resisting the looting of his goat at Ngugo village in Rutshuru territory. The FARDC soldier was arrested and referred to the public prosecutor's office.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed three jeeps near Kakamba village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed three jeeps near Kakamba village in Fizi territory. The robbers shot and killed a 44-year-old man. They also looted money and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man and his son from Kidoti village in Uvira territory on October 6, 2018, released the hostages after receiving payment of the $600 ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man and his son from Kidoti village in Uvira territory on October 6, 2018, released the hostages after receiving payment of the $600 ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a 38-year-old man from Kihanama village in Uvira territory on October 12, 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of the $400 ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a 38-year-old man from Kihanama village in Uvira territory on October 12, 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of the $400 ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a 19-year-old man from Fuko village in Rutshuru territory on 12 October 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of the $1000 ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a 19-year-old man from Fuko village in Rutshuru territory on 12 October 2018, released the hostage after receiving payment of the $1000 ransom.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndusha kidnapped a 58-year-old man from Karembu village in Walungu territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndusha kidnapped a 58-year-old man from Karembu village in Walungu territory. The kidnappers accused the victim of failing to repay money. They demanded a ransom of $600 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 34-year-old man at Rwabangi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 34-year-old man at Rwabangi village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers suspected the victim of being an ANR collaborator.

title/0/en: Following the warning shots of the FARDC, the 57-year-old man escaped from the Mai-Mai Kivuhwe who had just abducted him from the Musenyi neighborhood of the Sange rural commune.
notes/en: Following the warning shots of the FARDC, the 57-year-old man escaped from the Mai-Mai Kivuhwe who had just abducted him from the Musenyi neighborhood of the Sange rural commune.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kivuhwe kidnapped a 57-year-old man from the Musenyi neighborhood of the Sange rural commune.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kivuhwe kidnapped a 57-year-old man from the Musenyi neighborhood of the Sange rural commune. Alerted by the population, the FARDC fired into the air to deter the kidnappers.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped two men at Kibanga village in Uvira territory on 08 October 2018, released the hostages after receiving payment of the $1206 ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped two men at Kibanga village in Uvira territory on 08 October 2018, released the hostages after receiving payment of the $1206 ransom.

title/0/en: Two FARDC soldiers shot and killed a 51-year-old man in his house in the Lulimba locality of Fizi territory.
notes/en: Two FARDC soldiers shot and killed a 51-year-old man in his house in the Lulimba locality of Fizi territory. The attackers also stole a television screen belonging to the victim.

title/0/en: Men wielding knives wounded a policeman in Mambombo village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Men wielding knives wounded a policeman in Mambombo village in Beni territory. The attackers also stole the weapon of the injured policeman.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 35-year-old man in the Kabindula neighborhood of the Uvira commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 35-year-old man in the Kabindula neighborhood of the Uvira commune. The attackers also stole money from the victim.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 38-year-old man from Kihanama village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 38-year-old man from Kihanama village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $1000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Vunja Vikwazo raided Nyatusatu village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Vunja Vikwazo raided Nyatusatu village in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted six goats, four pigs and property.

title/0/en: The population of Butembo town demonstrated for the release of a researcher arrested and the end of the massacre of the population of Beni.
notes/en: The population of Butembo town demonstrated for the release of a researcher arrested and the end of the massacre of the population of Beni. Police arrested 43 protesters.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Fuko village in Rutshuru territory at night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Fuko village in Rutshuru territory at night. The attackers kidnapped a 19-year-old man and demanded ransom for the release of the hostage. They also stole a computer and belongings.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma town. The attackers also shot and killed a 33-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Nyabibwe village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Nyabibwe village in Kalehe territory. They also stole $38000.

title/0/en: A police officer shot and wounded an FARDC soldier and four men at Chifunzi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: A police officer shot and wounded an FARDC soldier and four men at Chifunzi village in Kalehe territory. The policeman wanted to arrest a man, but the civilian resisted with the support of his companions.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted cows in Runingu in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted cows in Runingu in Uvira territory.

title/0/en: Three hostages, who had been abducted by the ADF in the rural commune of Oicha on 24 September 2018, escaped from the hands of their captors and reported to an FARDC position at Abialose village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Three hostages, who had been abducted by the ADF in the rural commune of Oicha on 24 September 2018, escaped from the hands of their captors and reported to an FARDC position at Abialose village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen dressed in military uniforms shot and killed a 17-year-old boy in the Lulimba locality of Fizi territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen dressed in military uniforms shot and killed a 17-year-old boy in the Lulimba locality of Fizi territory. The attackers also stole two phones from the victim.

title/0/en: The police and the FARDC dispersed demonstrators who had gathered around the estate of an FARDC colonel in the Cit-Belge neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: The police and the FARDC dispersed demonstrators who had gathered around the estate of an FARDC colonel in the Cit-Belge neighborhood of Beni. This FARDC colonel had just received twenty Hutu migrants, one of whom had just been stoned by the population. Two men aged 18 and 22,  were injured from being shot.

title/0/en: The CNRD robbed a motorcycle near Mubirubiru village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The CNRD robbed a motorcycle near Mubirubiru village in Rutshuru territory. The robbers looted $1500.

title/0/en: The FARDC dispersed a demonstration of women protesting against the monopoly of the MUYEYE company in Tchonka village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The FARDC dispersed a demonstration of women protesting against the monopoly of the MUYEYE company in Tchonka village in Shabunda territory. The dispersion caused the death, by hypertension, of a 38-year-old woman. Another 27-year-old woman and a 9-year-old boy were injured.

title/0/en: Civilians revolted against the traffic police who were trying to arrest a driver who had just had an accident at Bulambika village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Civilians revolted against the traffic police who were trying to arrest a driver who had just had an accident at Bulambika village in Kalehe territory. This altercation resulted in eight policemen being injured.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position at Mayi-Moya village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position at Mayi-Moya village in Beni territory. The attackers launched a rocket at a car carrying seven people. The attack killed five men, and three women, wounded two men and eight other persons were reported missing.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men aged 46 and 50 , respectively, from Kibanga village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men aged 46 and 50 , respectively, from Kibanga village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position in the Boikene district of Beni town.
notes/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position in the Boikene district of Beni town. The attack wounded three FARDC soldiers.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen raided three houses in Kabuzu village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen raided three houses in Kabuzu village in Mwenga territory. The attackers looted $393, two phones, a radio and a walkman.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen took 30 cows from a farm in Kakamba village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen took 30 cows from a farm in Kakamba village in Uvira territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a shop at Base village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a shop at Base village in Mwenga territory. The attackers stole $545 and gold

title/0/en: The FARDC burned a house at Nyawaronga village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The FARDC burned a house at Nyawaronga village in Kalehe territory. The house belonged to a family that was in a land dispute with another who had recruited the FARDC for this purpose.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen raided facilities in the Mayaka settlement at Kivovo harbor in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen raided facilities in the Mayaka settlement at Kivovo harbor in Uvira territory. The attackers also stole $17409.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 37-year-old man and his son from Kidoti village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 37-year-old man and his son from Kidoti village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $1200 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Donat, Mabala and Kokodikoko robbed a FUSO vehicle and a motorcycle near Ngolombe village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Donat, Mabala and Kokodikoko robbed a FUSO vehicle and a motorcycle near Ngolombe village in Shabunda territory. The also attackers looted money and property and forced sixteen people to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Kabingo village in Rutshuru territory and attempted to abduct a 25-year-old man.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at Kabingo village in Rutshuru territory and attempted to abduct a 25-year-old man. Following resistance from the victim, the attackers shot him and the victim died of his wounds at the Rutshuru General Hospital.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Mamiki neighborhood in the rural commune of Oicha.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Mamiki neighborhood in the rural commune of Oicha. The attackers took away cattle, beer and other goods.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked a FDLR-FOCA position at Bishigiro village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked a FDLR-FOCA position at Bishigiro village in Rutshuru territory. The attack also killed three FARDC soldiers.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked Sukola I operations headquarters in the Paida neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: The ADF attacked Sukola I operations headquarters in the Paida neighborhood of Beni town. The attack killed four FARDC soldiers, two civilians, and wounded a civilian.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen attempting to cross the border near Bikenke village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen attempting to cross the border near Bikenke village in Rutshuru territory. The FARDC stopped the entry of armed men into Congolese territory.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki 100 Kilo erected a barrier at Wakenge village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki 100 Kilo erected a barrier at Wakenge village in Shabunda territory. The attackers extorted and looted money from people and passers-by.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai CNPSC raided the Ngoma mine in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai CNPSC raided the Ngoma mine in Fizi territory. The attackers killed two men and injured another. They also looted money and property.

title/0/en: Following an intense FARDC patrol in the area the FDLR-RUD, who had kidnapped six women and two men near Rusaka village 5 in Rutshuru territory on 01 October 2018, released the hostages without receiving payment of the ransom.
notes/en: Following an intense FARDC patrol in the area the FDLR-RUD, who had kidnapped six women and two men near Rusaka village 5 in Rutshuru territory on 01 October 2018, released the hostages without receiving payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped a 69-year-old man in his field near Ruti village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped a 69-year-old man in his field near Ruti village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $1500 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 26-year-old woman in the Buturande district of the Kiwanja rural commune.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 26-year-old woman in the Buturande district of the Kiwanja rural commune. The attackers wanted to steal the victim's phone but were startled by the victim's resistance.

title/0/en: Two FARDC soldiers robbed a shop in the Tamende neighborhood of Beni city.
notes/en: Two FARDC soldiers robbed a shop in the Tamende neighborhood of Beni city. The two soldiers looted money, two boxes of sardines and cigarettes.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 43-year-old man at Kitaragha village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 43-year-old man at Kitaragha village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed his two children at Kanzulinzuli neighborhood in Beni town.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed his two children at Kanzulinzuli neighborhood in Beni town. The FARDC soldier accused his two children of stealing his flash disk.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani attacked two motorcyclists near Cheenge village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani attacked two motorcyclists near Cheenge village in Kalehe territory. The attackers also looted money and two bags of clothes.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali, who had kidnapped two men in Narunanga village in Uvira territory on 29 September, 2018, released the hostages after payment of a $606 ransom.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali, who had kidnapped two men in Narunanga village in Uvira territory on 29 September, 2018, released the hostages after payment of a $606 ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position at Karuruma village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position at Karuruma village in Beni territory. The attack killed four of the gunmen.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped six women and two men returning from their fields near Rusaka village 5 in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped six women and two men returning from their fields near Rusaka village 5 in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers raped the women and demanded a ransom of $800 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon shot dead a 33-year-old man at Binyampuri village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon shot dead a 33-year-old man at Binyampuri village in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Mai-Mai Kabido at Masika village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Mai-Mai Kabido at Masika village in Lubero territory. The attack killed five NDC Guidon fighters. It killed and injured a further two Mai-Mai Kabido fighters. The NDC Guidon also looted property from civilians.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed two motorbikes near Rujebeshi village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed two motorbikes near Rujebeshi village in Masisi territory. The attackers also looted goods from the passengers.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided two farms at Kagurube village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided two farms at Kagurube village in Uvira territory. The attackers also stole some cows.

title/0/en: Two FARDC soldiers raided a house in the Masiani neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: Two FARDC soldiers raided a house in the Masiani neighborhood of Beni town. The two FARDC soldiers took $181.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon shot and killed a 53-year-old man near Bunangiri village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon shot and killed a 53-year-old man near Bunangiri village in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon clashed with the Mai-Mai Kabido at the villages of Mbughavinywa, Kanyatsi and Busekera in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon clashed with the Mai-Mai Kabido at the villages of Mbughavinywa, Kanyatsi and Busekera in Lubero territory. This clash has displaced the villages' populations.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a 57-year-old man from Katyaza village in Uvira territory on 29 September 2018, released the hostage after payment of a $242 ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a 57-year-old man from Katyaza village in Uvira territory on 29 September 2018, released the hostage after payment of a $242 ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Institute Avenir offices at Panzi district in Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Institute Avenir offices at Panzi district in Bukavu town. The attackers also looted $3000 and computers.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali kidnapped two men aged 56 and 59, respectively, from Narunanga village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali kidnapped two men aged 56 and 59, respectively, from Narunanga village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $1000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 27-year-old man at Kiringye village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 27-year-old man at Kiringye village in Uvira territory. The attackers stole money, phones and prepaid cards from the victim.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked Mai-Mai Mwenyemali positions in the villages of Mahungubwe, Nawera and Rusheke in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked Mai-Mai Mwenyemali positions in the villages of Mahungubwe, Nawera and Rusheke in Uvira territory. The attacks left two dead, two wounded and one captured in the ranks of the Mai-Mai Mwenyemali.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto robbed an MSF convoy near Ndese village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto robbed an MSF convoy near Ndese village in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted money and property from the Dutch MSF agents.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD, who had kidnapped four women near Kaseke village in Rutshuru territory on 26 September 2018, released the hostages after payment of the ransom.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD, who had kidnapped four women near Kaseke village in Rutshuru territory on 26 September 2018, released the hostages after payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: Police dispersed demonstrators who were protesting growing insecurity in the rural commune of Oicha.
notes/en: Police dispersed demonstrators who were protesting growing insecurity in the rural commune of Oicha. Police arrested eight protesters. An 8-year-old child was also shot and wounded.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the rural commune of Oicha.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the rural commune of Oicha. The attackers also looted money and property.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 60-year-old man from Mununze village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 60-year-old man from Mununze village in Beni territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2500 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Two FARDC soldiers shot and killed a 40-year-old man near Lumbishi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Two FARDC soldiers shot and killed a 40-year-old man near Lumbishi village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 57-year-old man from Katyaza village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 57-year-old man from Katyaza village in Uvira territory. The attackers demanded a ransom of $500 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The FDLR-FOCA attacked the FARDC at Mutoho village in Nyirangongo territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-FOCA attacked the FARDC at Mutoho village in Nyiragongo territory. The attack resulted in three missing and two dead FARDC soldiers.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money and property from a money transfer agent in the Mulambula neighborhood of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money and property from a money transfer agent in the Mulambula neighborhood of Bukavu town.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, attempting to rob a house, shot and wounded a 34-year-old man in the Birere neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, attempting to rob a house, shot and wounded a 34-year-old man in the Birere neighborhood of Goma.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 32-year-old forex trader in the Office neighbourhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 32-year-old forex trader in the Office neighbourhood of Goma. The attackers also stole the victims money.

title/0/en: The ADF raided Mukoko village in Beni territory. The FARDC repelled the attackers.
notes/en: The ADF raided Mukoko village in Beni territory. The FARDC repelled the attackers. The attack killed three women, three men and injured one man

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided houses at Kabushwa village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided houses at Kabushwa village in Kabare territory. The attackers also looted property.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position Kididiwe village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position Kididiwe village in Beni territory. The attack killed two and injured two FARDC soldiers.

title/0/en: Three men, carrying knives and guns, robbed a shop in the Muvingi district of the Kasindi rural commune.
notes/en: Three men, carrying knives and guns, robbed a shop in the Muvingi district of the Kasindi rural commune. The attackers shot and killed a 29-year-old man and wounded another man with a machete.

title/0/en: The police intercepted some youths leaving Butembo for Beni in the Mataba area of Beni territory.
notes/en: The police intercepted some youths leaving Butembo for Beni in the Mataba area of Beni territory. These demonstrators wanted to sympathize with the people of Beni following the massacres of civilians in that city. The police arrested twelve young people.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a BDOM Funu health center in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a BDOM Funu health center in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu town. The attackers also stole money and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house and abducted a 51-year-old man from Kitemesho village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house and abducted a 51-year-old man from Kitemesho village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers killed the hostage.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali, who was attempting to kidnap a man, shot and wounded a 21-year-old boy at Simba village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali, who was attempting to kidnap a man, shot and wounded a 21-year-old boy at Simba village in Uvira territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed an FARDC soldier at Kitobindo village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed an FARDC soldier at Kitobindo village in Lubero territory. The attackers also took away the weapon of the killed soldier.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped four women returning from their fields to Kaseke village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped four women returning from their fields to Kaseke village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers raped the victims and demanded a ransom for their release.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Maheshe raided Butongo village in Mwenga territory at night.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Maheshe raided Butongo village in Mwenga territory at night. The attackers stole money, livestock and property.

title/0/en: Police dispersed a student demonstration in Beni town.
notes/en: Police dispersed a student demonstration in Beni town. They were protesting the massacre of civilians in the Paida neighborhood. Police shot and injured two demonstrators.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 59-year-old man from Kibogoyi neighborhood in the Sange rural commune.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 59-year-old man from Kibogoyi neighborhood in the Sange rural commune. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $1000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man in Bandulu village in Lubero territory on 22 September 2018, killed the hostage.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a man in Bandulu village in Lubero territory on 22 September 2018, killed the hostage.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kokodikoko, Mabala and Ndarumanga raided Buloba village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kokodikoko, Mabala and Ndarumanga raided Buloba village in Shabunda territory. The attackers stole eight goats, food and other property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man in Camp Six village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man in Camp Six village in Mwenga territory.

title/0/en: The FARDC exchanged fire with the CNRD in Kabumba village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC exchanged fire with the CNRD in Kabumba village in Rutshuru territory. The exchange injured two civilians.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a 53-year-old man at Chaamba village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a 53-year-old man at Chaamba village in Kalehe territory. The attackers also stole $800.

title/0/en: Knife-wielding men raided Mabuku village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Knife-wielding men raided Mabuku village in Beni territory. The attackers killed an ANR agent.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped five people near Mighobwe village in Lubero territory on 23 September 2018,  released the hostages after payment of a ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped five people near Mighobwe village in Lubero territory on 23 September 2018,  released the hostages after payment of a ransom.

title/0/en: The Nyatura FDP attacked an FARDC position at Mwaro village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura FDP attacked an FARDC position at Mwaro village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers killed an FARDC soldier.

title/0/en: The ADF raided the Bakaiku district in the rural district of Oicha.
notes/en: The ADF raided the Bakaiku district in the rural district of Oicha. The attackers killed one man and abducted a woman, twelve girls and four boys. They burned two houses and looted cattle and property.

title/0/en: A police officer shot a 42-year-old man at a bistro in Kakulu village in Mwenga territory after a discussion about the exoneration of the Mwenga Territory Administrator accused of supporting gangs.
notes/en: A police officer shot a 42-year-old man at a bistro in Kakulu village in Mwenga territory after a discussion about the exoneration of the Mwenga territorial administrator, who had been accused of supporting local gangs. The victim died from his injuries.

title/0/en: Five unidentified gunmen robbed a vehicle near Katala village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Five unidentified gunmen robbed a vehicle near Katala village in Uvira territory. The attackers kidnapped three men. They demanded a ransom of $5000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Police dispersed protesters at Busawa village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Police dispersed protesters at Busawa village in Mwenga territory. The population was protesting the release of the territory's administrator who had been arrested for the maintenance of armed bands and illegal possession of a weapon. The police arrested seventeen and then released them.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 30-year-old man from Pabuka village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 30-year-old man from Pabuka village in Beni territory. The kidnappers killed the hostage.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD killed an FARDC soldier in Nyaruhange village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD killed an FARDC soldier in Nyaruhange village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers stole the victim's weapon.

title/0/en: Two FARDC soldiers shot and wounded a 50-year-old woman in the Paida district of Beni town when they attempted to take her goats away.
notes/en: Two FARDC soldiers shot and wounded a 50-year-old woman in the Paida district of Beni town when they attempted to take her goats away.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a mini bus near Mighobwe village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a mini bus near Mighobwe village in Lubero territory. The robbers stole money and property. They also kidnapped five people and demanded ransom for their release.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position at Katenga village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position at Katenga village in Fizi territory. The attackers killed three FARDC soldiers, took away four AK-47's and missiles.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a woman returning from her field in Nyamilima locality in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a woman returning from her field in Nyamilima locality in Rutshuru territory. The FARDC soldier wanted to steal the victim's harvest.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed an Actros-branded vehicle near Rudahira village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed an Actros-branded vehicle near Rudahira village in Rutshuru territory. The robbers also kidnapped a man.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a 60-year-old woman and a 17-year-old girl in Bwagwa village in Uvira territory, released the hostages after payment of the ransom.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a 60-year-old woman and a 17-year-old girl in Bwagwa village in Uvira territory, released the hostages after payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai CNPSC and Malaika at Kilembwe locality in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai CNPSC and Malaika at Kilembwe locality in Fizi territory. The FARDC chased the attackers out of the area. The FARDC also looted property from the population and kidnapped a man.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD, who had kidnapped four women returning from their fields to Kibende village in Rutshuru territory on 19 September 2018, released the hostages after payment of a ransom.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD, who had kidnapped four women returning from their fields to Kibende village in Rutshuru territory on 19 September 2018, released the hostages after payment of a ransom.

title/0/en: The FDLR-FOCA ambushed an FARDC convoy near Ngerenge village in Rutshuru territory, in retaliation for the capture of an FDLR-FOCA commander by the FARDC.
notes/en: The FDLR-FOCA ambushed an FARDC convoy near Ngerenge village in Rutshuru territory, in retaliation for the capture of an FDLR-FOCA commander by the FARDC.

title/0/en: Fighters from the Allied Democratic Forces (ADF) raided the eastern part of the city of Beni.
notes/en: Fighters from the Allied Democratic Forces (ADF) raided the eastern part of the city of Beni. The FARDC and the UN intervention brigade responded. They killed at least 15 civilians and 4 FARDC soldiers, and wounded 6 civilians and three FARDC soldiers. They looted, burnt 4 houses. There was extensive material damage, including 5 lorries at the Beni Container Terminal (TCB).

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the FARDC at Kalembe village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the FARDC at Kalembe village in Masisi territory. The attack resulted in one soldier killed, one injured and one captured by the NDC Guidon.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a 51-year-old man from Simba village in Uvira territory on 20 September 2018, released the hostage after payment of the $303 ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a 51-year-old man from Simba village in Uvira territory on 20 September 2018, released the hostage after payment of the $303 ransom.

title/0/en: The FARDC captured an FDLR-FOCA commander at Bushege village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC captured an FDLR-FOCA commander at Bushege village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man at Bandulu village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man at Bandulu village in Lubero territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The FARDC arrested and killed two men aged 19 and 25, respectively, at Katoro village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC arrested and killed two men aged 19 and 25, respectively, an Katoro village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position at Rughenda district in Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked an FARDC position at Rughenda district in Butembo town. The attack left two dead and five wounded civilians.

title/0/en: Unidentified men abducted a one-year-old child from the Mapendo neighborhood in Goma town.
notes/en: Unidentified men abducted a one-year-old child from the Mapendo neighborhood in Goma town. The kidnappers killed the child.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani raided the villages of Chihunda III, Muhonga and Mbulamishi in Kabare territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani raided the villages of Chihunda III, Muhonga and Mbulamishi in Kabare territory. The attackers stole a bag of cassava flour, two cases of beer and some clothes.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen attempted to abduct a 47-year-old man from Kinanira neighborhood in the rural commune of Sange.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen attempted to abduct a 47-year-old man from Kinanira neighborhood in the rural commune of Sange. The victim resisted resulting in the attackers shooting and killing him. They also stole $30 and property.

title/0/en: The CNRD raided the Katsiru locality of Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The CNRD raided the Katsiru locality of Rutshuru territory. The attackers shot and killed a 20-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 51-year-old man from Simba village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 51-year-old man from Simba village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $1000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped three men at Kagurube village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped three men at Kagurube village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $4500 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a plot at Sanza village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a plot at Sanza village in Fizi territory. The attackers shot and killed a 60-year-old woman.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Buturande district of rural Kiwanja.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Buturande district of rural Kiwanja. The attackers kidnapped one man and killed another who was trying to escape.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 48-year-old man in the Nkafu neighborhood of Bukavu town when he returned to his workplace.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 48-year-old man in the Nkafu neighborhood of Bukavu town when he heading toward his workplace. The attackers also took his money.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked an APCLS position at Ndurumo village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked an APCLS position at Ndurumo village in Masisi territory. The APCLS drove the FARDC back to Lukweti.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position at Tubameme village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position at Tubameme village in Beni territory. The attack killed one and injured four FARDC soldiers.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin Mbaenda attacked and chased the Mai-Mai Kirikicho and Shalio at Busurungi village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin Mbaenda attacked and chased after the Mai-Mai Kirikicho and Shalio at Busurungi village in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified men, who had kidnapped four men near Ake village in Fizi territory on 19 September 2018, released the hostages after payment of the $181 ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified men, who had kidnapped four men near Ake village in Fizi territory on 19 September 2018, released the hostages after payment of the $181 ransom.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen raided a plot of land in Bwagwa village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen raided a plot of land in Bwagwa village in Uvira territory. The attackers kidnapped a 60-year-old woman and a 17-year-old girl. They also demanded a ransom of $2000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed an FARDC soldier in Kasonge village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed an FARDC soldier in Kasonge village in Fizi territory. The attackers took away the weapon of the soldier killed.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped and raped four women as they returned from their fields to Kibende village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped and raped four women as they returned from their fields to Kibende village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a mini bus of the Rainbow transport agency near Rutemba village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a mini bus of the Rainbow transport agency near Rutemba village in Uvira territory. The attackers also looted money and property.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked a NDC Guidon position at Makuranga village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked an NDC-R position at Makuranga village in Lubero territory. The FARDC chased the NDC from the village and burned their camp. The attack killed two NDC fighters and injured another. Two FARDC soldiers were wounded.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a 39-year-old man from Katogota village in Uvira territory on 16 September, released the hostage after receiving payment of the ransom of $400.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a 39-year-old man from Katogota village in Uvira territory on 16 September, released the hostage after receiving payment of the ransom of $400.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped four men near Ake village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped four men near Ake village in Fizi territory. The attackers looted property and demanded a ransom of $500 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani have taken control of police officers in charge of the Tchebumba police station in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani detained police officers in charge of the Tchebumba police station in Kalehe territory. The attackers stole an AK-47 weapon and police equipment.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Bushiika village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Bushiika village in Kalehe territory. The attackers also looted property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had abducted four men and four girls to carry looted property in Kahungu village in Kabare territory on 17 September 2018, released the hostages.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had abducted four men and four girls to carry looted property in Kahungu village in Kabare territory on 17 September 2018, released the hostages.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier raped a 30-year-old woman in her field in Mughalika village in Beni territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier raped a 30-year-old woman in her field in Mughalika village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Kahungu village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Kahungu village in Kabare territory. The attackers looted property and forced four men and four girls to carry the looted goods. They also raped the four girls.

title/0/en: Unidentified men abducted a man in the Lukweti locality of Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men abducted a man in the Lukweti locality of Masisi territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Rubaya village in Masisi territory. The attackers killed a policeman, a man and a woman.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Rubaya village in Masisi territory. The attackers killed a policeman, a man and a woman. They also injured four people.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto, Kikwama and Kasosoli attacked an FARDC position at Nyambembe village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto, Kikwama and Kasosoli attacked an FARDC position at Nyambembe village in Shabunda territory. The attack killed four of the assailants and injured one.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD raided a house in Buganza village in Rutshuru territory at night.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD raided a house in Buganza village in Rutshuru territory at night. The attackers shot and killed a 42-year-old man.

title/0/en: The CNRD attacked a Nyatura Jean-Marie position at Rwankeri village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The CNRD attacked a Nyatura Jean-Marie position at Rwankeri village in Masisi territory. The CNRD pursued the Nyatura Jean-Marie and burned down houses in the village.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 39-year-old man from Katogota village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 39-year-old man from Katogota village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $1000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Buzito neighborhood of the Kiwanja commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Buzito neighborhood of the Kiwanja commune. The attackers shot and killed a 78-year-old man and his 58-year-old wife.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Kitemesho village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Kitemesho village in Uvira territory. The attackers shot and injured two men and looted property.

title/0/en: Five naked men carrying spears and a woman carrying a baby raided Butembo town.
notes/en: Five naked men carrying spears and a woman carrying a baby entered into Butembo town, parading down the main avenue. Police, backed by the FARDC,  injured one of the attackers.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD, who had kidnapped seven people near  Domaine village in Rutshuru Territory on 10 September 2018, released a man and a woman after the payment of a ransom.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD, who had kidnapped seven people near  Domaine village in Rutshuru Territory on 10 September 2018, released a man and a woman after the payment of a ransom.

title/0/en: Six unidentified gunmen raided an airtel money shop in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Six unidentified gunmen raided an Airtel money shop in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu town. The attackers injured a 38-year-old man, stole money, a computer and phones.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Maachano robbed an NGO's, Mercy Corps, vehicle near Minova town in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Maachano robbed a Mercy Corps (an NGO) vehicle near Minova town in Kalehe territory. The attackers  also looted money and property.

title/0/en: CNPSC fighters and the Mai-Mai Malaika attacked an FARDC position at Kilembwe town in Fizi territory.
notes/en: CNPSC fighters and the Mai-Mai Malaika attacked an FARDC position at Kilembwe town in Fizi territory. The attackers chased the FARDC out of this town and neighboring villages. The attack killed eight FARDC soldiers and wounded five of the assailants.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen a house, at night, in the Ndendere neighborhood in Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen burglarized a house, at night, in the Ndendere neighborhood in Bukavu town. The attackers shot and wounded a 23-year-old man and looted money.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked a group of unidentified gunmen's position during a patrol in Mukoberwa village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked a group of unidentified gunmen's position during a patrol in Mukoberwa village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: The FARDC burned houses in Lukopfu village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC burned houses in Lukopfu village in Masisi territory. The incident took place following a land dispute in the village.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Habikuangalie raided the villages of Beach Lugulu and Kantokombi in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Habikuangalie raided the villages of Beach Lugulu and Kantokombi in Shabunda territory. They looted $393, minerals and other property. They forced eleven men to carry the goods and burned ten houses.

title/0/en: The FARDC went to the rescue of the Burundian army at a Gatumba border post during a RED TABARA attack.
notes/en: The FARDC went to support the Burundian army at Gatumba border post during a RED TABARA attack. During the attackers' retreat, they killed three FARDC soldiers and two children on Congolese soil in the rural commune of Uvira.

title/0/en: The FARDC chased and attacked the Mai-Mai Nyerere who had looted 23 cows in Kashatu village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FARDC chased and attacked the Mai-Mai Nyerere who had looted 23 cows in Kashatu village in Uvira territory. The FARDC were able to recover the stolen cows. The attackers injured one FARDC soldier

title/0/en: The CNRD clashed with the NDC Guidon at Kaliba village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The CNRD clashed with the NDC Guidon at Kaliba village in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe ambushed an FARDC convoy near Kabuhendo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe ambushed an FARDC convoy near Kabuhendo village in Rutshuru territory. This ambush killed one FARDC soldier and 2 civilians and injured 4 other civilians.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi who had kidnapped two men, and looted eleven cows in Ndondo village in Rutshuru territory, released one of the hostages.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi who had kidnapped two men, and looted eleven cows in Ndondo village in Rutshuru territory, released one of the hostages.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Makanaki near Kitundu village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Makanaki near Kitundu village in Uvira territory. This attack killed one FARDC soldier, two Mai Mai fighters and injured one Mai Mai fighter.

title/0/en: The FARDC shot and killed a 45-year-old woman and her 17-year-old boy in the Kibirizi locality in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC shot and killed a 45-year-old woman and her 17-year-old boy in the Kibirizi locality in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at night in the Kasenga district of rural Uvira.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at night in the Kasenga district of rural Uvira. The attacker sstole two sacks of cassava flour and goods.

title/0/en: Three CNRD fighters raided Njiapanda village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Three CNRD fighters raided Njiapanda village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers stabbed a 40-year-old man and looted money and property.

title/0/en: An unidentified gunman, attempting to rob a communication credit booth, killed a 30-year-old man at Katongo village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: An unidentified gunman, attempting to rob a phone credit booth, killed a 30-year-old man in Katongo village in Uvira territory.

title/0/en: The FDLR-FOCA who had kidnapped two men aged 41 and 43, respectively, in Rushovu on 08 September 2018 released the hostages in Kalengera village in Rutshuru territory after paying a ransom of $1000.
notes/en: The FDLR-FOCA who had kidnapped two men aged 41 and 43, respectively, in Rushovu on 08 September 2018 released the hostages in Kalengera village in Rutshuru territory after paying a ransom of $1000.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi kidnapped two men and looted eleven cows in Ndondo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi kidnapped two men and looted eleven cows in Ndondo village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers accused one of the hostages of deserting with a weapon he had given to MONUSCO.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD, who had kidnapped three women near Kitoboko village in Rutshuru territory on 11 September 2018, released the hostages after payment of the ransom.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD, who had kidnapped three women near Kitoboko village in Rutshuru territory on 11 September 2018, released the hostages after payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: Five unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Mangodomu neighborhood of Mangina rural district.
notes/en: Five unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Mangodomu neighborhood of Mangina rural district. The attackers shot and killed a 32-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 58-year-old man from the Rulimbi village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 58-year-old man from the Rulimbi village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $1000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Two Mai-Mai Kilalo fighters killed a policeman in Maboya locality in Beni territory.
notes/en: Two Mai-Mai Kilalo fighters killed a policeman in Maboya locality in Beni territory. The attackers took away an AK-47 from the victim.

title/0/en: The FDLR-FOCA ambushed an FARDC convoy at Virunga Park near Bugomba village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-FOCA ambushed an FARDC convoy at Virunga Park near Bugomba village in Rutshuru territory. This ambush killed four FARDC soldiers and two civilians.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked a Mai-Mai Kabido/FPP position at Pitakongo village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked a Mai-Mai Kabido/FPP position at Pitakongo village in Lubero territory. The NDC Guidon looted property before leaving the village.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed two shops in Katana village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed two shops in Katana village in Kabare territory. The attackers looted $2100 and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Lutunda village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Lutunda village in Mwenga territory. The attackers shot and wounded two men. They also took money and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen threw a rocket that fell into the TMB bank plots in the Beni Residential District.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot a explosive projectile that fell into the TMB bank plots in the Beni Residential District. The explosion wounded a man and a policeman.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kabishula Ngubito attacked the Mai-Mai Kirikicho at Mianda village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kabishula Ngubito attacked the Mai-Mai Kirikicho at Mianda village in Kalehe territory. This attack wounded a boy.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped three women returning from their fields near Kitoboko village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped three women returning from their fields near Kitoboko village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier raided a house in Ngadi neighborhood in Beni town.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier raided a house in Ngadi neighborhood in Beni town. The soldier also looted property.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped three men and four women returning from their fields to the estate village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped three men and four women returning from their fields in Domaine village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Police dispersed a demonstration of shoe salesmen, who were demanding the recognition of their right to the Nyamugo neighborhood in Bukavu town.
notes/en: Police dispersed a demonstration of shoe salesmen, who were demanding the recognition of their right to peddle shoes in the Nyamugo neighborhood of Bukavu town. The town hall had started construction in the area where the vendors used to work.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed two police officers at Kivisire village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed two police officers at Kivisire village in Lubero territory. The ambush killed one of the policeman and wounded the other.

title/0/en: The ADF raided the Nzuma neighborhood in Beni town and MONUSCO peacekeepers reataliated by counter-attacking.
notes/en: The ADF raided the Nzuma neighborhood in Beni town and MONUSCO peacekeepers retaliated by counter-attacking. The ADF killed a man and one house was destroyed by a bomb.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo abducted two men in the Kalunguta locality in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo abducted two men in the Kalunguta locality in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Bwinyole district in Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Bwinyole district in Butembo town. The attackers kidnapped a man and demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 23 year old man near ISIG in Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 23-year-old man near the ISIG institute in Goma.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Walike looted the property of directors and teachers returning from a meeting near Myangati village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Walike looted the property of directors and teachers returning from a meeting near Myangati village in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: An FDLR-FOCA fighter raped a 13-year-old girl who was returning from a field near Mukaka village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: An FDLR-FOCA fighter raped a 13-year-old girl who was returning from her fields near Mukaka village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: The FDLR-FOCA kidnapped two men aged 41 and 43, respectively, near Rushovu village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-FOCA kidnapped two men aged 41 and 43, respectively, near Rushovu village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $10,000 for the release of the hostages. They also stole the money and the phone of the driver of the motorcycle that was carrying the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Mambango neighborhood in Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Mambango neighborhood of Beni town. The attackers stole $19, a radio and two phones.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen raided a house in Malepe district in Beni town.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen raided a house in Malepe district in Beni town. The attackers stole money and property.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Walike looted school supplies from Kidambo Primary School at Myangati village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Walike looted school supplies from Kidambo Primary School at Myangati village in Shabunda territory. The attackers forced five boys to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Walike, who had abducted five boys from Myangati village in Shabunda territory on 08 September 2018, released the hostages on the same evening.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Walike, who had abducted five boys from Myangati village in Shabunda territory on 08 September 2018, released the hostages on the same evening.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Maheshe raided the villages of Hema, Nyabalume and Maengo in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Maheshe raided the villages of Hema, Nyabalume and Maengo in Mwenga territory. The attackers looted money, minerals and other property. They forced six men to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kokodikoko raided Nyakibisizye village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kokodikoko raided Nyakibisizye village in Shabunda territory. The attackers stole $181, five goats, five sheep and ten phones.

title/0/en: The FARDC shot and killed a 26-year-old man in Kakomero village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC shot and killed a 26-year-old man in Kakomero village in Rutshuru territory. The FARDC thought the victim was a Nyatura fighter.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kokodikoko shot and killed a policeman in Bulumbu village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kokodikoko shot and killed a policeman in Bulumbu village in Shabunda territory. The policeman killed was the commander of the Kigulube police station. The attackers stole an AK-47.

title/0/en: Unidentified men strangled a 40-year-old man to death in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified men strangled a 40-year-old man to death in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu town. The body of the victim was found in the concession of ISP Bukavu.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the FDLR-FOCA who had raided Mutaho village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the FDLR-FOCA who had raided Mutaho village in Nyiragongo territory. The FDLR-FOCA had looted the property of civilians.

title/0/en: Unidentified men, who had kidnapped an 18-year-old man from Lumumba neighborhood in Bukavu town, killed the man.
notes/en: Unidentified men, who had kidnapped an 18-year-old man from Lumumba neighborhood in Bukavu town, killed the man. The body was found on Nyatemu Avenue.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Mambango neighborhood in Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Mambango neighborhood in Beni town. The attackers stole $561, a solar panel, a battery and a box of Bibles (New Testaments).

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed four men on Lake Edward near the Kyavinyonge town in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed four men on Lake Edward near the Kyavinyonge town in Beni territory.

title/0/en: The FARDC captured a militiaman who was spying in the Mbau area of Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC captured a militiaman who was spying in the Mbau area of Beni territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted $1169 and goods from a currency trader in Mafula village in Idjwi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted $1169 and goods from a currency trader in Mafula village in Idjwi territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked a Raia Mutomboki Shabani position in Nyamutwe village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked a Raia Mutomboki Shabani position in Nyamutwe village in Kalehe territory. This attack killed one civilian and wounded another.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD tortured and injured a 42-year-old man near Bunyereza village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD tortured and injured a 42-year-old man near Bunyereza village in Rutshuru territory. The victim was rushed to the hospital for appropriate care.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Nduhuye attacked the Raia Mutomboki Shabani at the Chimoto mining site in the Kahuzi Biega National Park.
notes/en: The Nyatura Nduhuye attacked the Raia Mutomboki Shabani at the Chimoto mining site in the Kahuzi Biega National Park.

title/0/en: The Nyatura FDP ambushed an FARDC convoy near Muaru village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura FDP ambushed an FARDC convoy near Muaru village in Rutshuru territory. The ambush killed one FARDC soldiers and wounded two others.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen raided a house in Minova village in Kalehe territory at night.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen raided a house in Minova village in Kalehe territory at night. The attackers injured an 18-year-old man and stole $400 and a battery.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Bwinyole district in Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Bwinyole district in Butembo town. The attackers shot and killed a 47-year-old man, and injured his wife and child.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Love retaliated to a previous incident by attacking the CNRD in the villages of Kitanda, Kaetsi and Kabirangiriro in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Love retaliated for a previous incident by attacking the CNRD in the villages of Kitanda, Kaetsi and Kabirangiriro in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked a Raia Mutomboki Cisayura position in Nyamutwe village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked a Raia Mutomboki Cisayura position in Nyamutwe village in Kalehe territory. The attack resulted in one dead and one wounded for the Raia Mutomboki Cisayuru.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raped a 13-year-old girl in Kambale area of Kalehe.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raped a 13-year-old girl in Kambale area of Kalehe.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo who had kidnapped a woman in Mataba on September 4, 2018 released the hostage in Kalingati village in Beni territory after paying a ransom of $500.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo who had kidnapped a woman in Mataba on September 4, 2018 released the hostage in Kalingati village in Beni territory after paying a ransom of $500.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked Mai-Mai Kihebe in Bubamba village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked Mai-Mai Kihebe in Bubamba village in Uvira territory. This attack allowed the FARDC to recover cows looted by the Mai-Mai Kihebe.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided houses in Vutsundo neighborhood in Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided houses in Vutsundo neighborhood in Butembo town. The attackers injured two people. They also looted $250 and property.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo kidnapped a woman in Mataba town in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo kidnapped a woman in Mataba town in Beni territory. The kidnappers accused her of being an informant for the FARDC and demanded ransom for her release.

title/0/en: The CNRD responded to a previous attack by attacking the Nyatura Love position in Kitanda village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The CNRD responded to a previous attack by attacking the Nyatura Love position in Kitanda village in Rutshuru territory. The CNRD chased the Nyatura Love from the village.

title/0/en: Unidentified men abducted an 18-year-old man from Lumumba neighborhood in Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified men abducted an 18-year-old man from Lumumba neighborhood in Bukavu town.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen stabbed and killed a man at Hutwe village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen stabbed and killed a man in Hutwe village in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: Police cracked down on a protest by LUCHA activists at the BDGL roundabout in Goma city.
notes/en: Police cracked down on a protest by LUCHA activists at the BDGL roundabout in Goma city. The activists protested the use of voting machines and demanded a clean up of the electoral roll. Police arrested six activists and some were wounded.

title/0/en: Police repressed LUCHA activists during their peaceful demonstration in Bukavu town, demanding free, transparent and inclusive elections and the abandonment of voting machines.
