notes/en: Police repressed LUCHA activists during their peaceful demonstration in Bukavu town, demanding free, transparent and inclusive elections and the abandonment of voting machines. This crackdown resulted in two injured policemen and ten others arrested and released.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at night in Minova village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at night in Minova village in Kalehe territory. The attackers injured a 22-year-old man and stole a machete.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen who wanted to occupy the Luziba mine site in Lumbishi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen who wanted to occupy the Luziba mine site in Lumbishi village in Kalehe territory. The FARDC also captured an attacker.

title/0/en: The ADF raided the Ngadi neighborhood in Beni town.
notes/en: The ADF raided the Ngadi neighborhood in Beni town. The attackers robbed a branded vehicle, looted $600 and boxes of soap. They also entered three houses and looted property. The ADF wounded one man and kidnapped another. MONUSCO peacekeepers on patrol exchanged fire with the attackers. The exchange resulted in two wounded peacekeeprs

title/0/en: The Nyatura Love attacked two CNRD positions simultaneously in Lubwe and Kitunda villages in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Love attacked two CNRD positions simultaneously in Lubwe and Kitunda villages in Rutshuru territory. These attacks resulted in one CNRD soldier killed and another wounded. The Nyatura Love also recovered two weapons.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto raided Byundu village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto raided Byundu village in Shabunda territory. The attackers stole drugs from the Byundu health center.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided two houses in Cikonyi neighbourhood in Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided two houses in Cikonyi neighbourhood in Bukavu town. The attackers took money and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 30-year-old woman and hurt her older child in Lumbishi village and Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 30-year-old woman and hurt her older child in Lumbishi village and Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed nine motorcycles leaving for Bukavu near Ikeke village in Shabgunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed nine motorcycles leaving for Bukavu near Ikeke village in Shabgunda territory. The attackers looted $400 and eighteen phones. They also injured a 38-year-old man.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Love ambushed an FARDC patrol near Munguli village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Love ambushed an FARDC patrol near Munguli village in Rutshuru territory. The ambush killed two FARDC soldiers. The FARDC also looted property in the village.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked Raia Mutomboki Maheshe positions in the villages of Kachai and Mulambula in Walungu territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked Raia Mutomboki Maheshe positions in the villages of Kachai and Mulambula in Walungu territory. The FARDC chased the militia out of these villages. FARDC soldiers had also looted fifteen cows but returned them under the order of their superiors.

title/0/en: The FARDC ambushed the Nyatura Domi who were attempting to raid a farm in Lunga village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC ambushed the Nyatura Domi who were attempting to raid a farm in Lunga village in Rutshuru territory. The FARDC chased after the attackers.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kokodikoko and the Mabala looted money and property from passers-by near Sangila village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kokodikoko and the Mabala looted money and property from passers-by near Sangila village in Shabunda territory. The attackers fired off bullets to prevent any possibility of an FARDC intervention.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a 23-year-old woman from the Ngongolio neighborhood in Beni town, on August 31, 2018 released the hostage upon receiving a $600 ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a 23-year-old woman from the Ngongolio neighborhood in Beni town, on August 31, 2018 released the hostage upon receiving a $600 ransom.

title/0/en: The FARDC looted property from the population in Munguli village After the Nyatura Love ambushed their patrol team near Munguli village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC looted property from the population in Munguli after the Nyatura Love ambushed their patrol near the village in Rutshuru territory. They also tortured and injured a man.

title/0/en: The Nyatura FDP and the FDLR-FOCA attacked an FARDC position in Machazo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura FDP and the FDLR-FOCA attacked an FARDC position in Machazo village in Rutshuru territory. The attack resulted in three civilians, two FARDC soldiers wounded and one dead civilian. There was also looting of civilian property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a DGDA vehicle near the rural commune of Kiliba in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a DGDA vehicle near the rural commune of Kiliba in Uvira territory. The attackers kidnapped three men and demanded a ransom of $15000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: The 25-year-old man, who had been kidnapped by three unidentified gunmen in Rusaka village 2 in Rutshuru territory, on 31 August 2018, escaped from his captors.
notes/en: The 25-year-old man, who had been kidnapped by three unidentified gunmen in Rusaka 2 village in Rutshuru territory, on 31 August 2018, escaped from his captors.

title/0/en: The FDLR-FOCA and Nyatura FDP coalition counter-attacked an FARDC position in Machazo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-FOCA and Nyatura FDP coalition counter-attacked an FARDC position in Machazo village in Rutshuru territory. This attack resulted in one FARDC soldier killed and another wounded.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a fellow soldier in Kahimbari village in Walungu territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a fellow soldier in Kahimbari village in Walungu territory. Other FARDC soldiers who came for the investigation looted goats, chickens and other property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided an ore trading post in Mazozo village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a gold trading shop in Mazozo village in Mwenga territory. The attackers looted $533 and three grams of gold.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed a motorcycle carrying an FARDC soldier near Ndoyi village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed a motorcycle carrying an FARDC soldier near Ndoyi village in Beni territory. The driver of the bike was wounded by a bullet and the FARDC soldier managed to escape.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 25-year-old man from Rusaka village 2 in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 25-year-old man from Rusaka 2 village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $600 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The FARDC supported by Virunga park guards attacked the FDLR-FOCA and Nyatura FDP in Virunga Park near Machazo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC supported by Virunga park guards attacked the FDLR-FOCA and Nyatura FDP in Virunga Park near Machazo village in Rutshuru territory. The FARDC captured two FDLR-FOCA fighters and set their camp on fire.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier raped a 12-year-old girl near Nyambembe village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier raped a 12-year-old girl near Nyambembe village in Shabunda territory. The victim was treated at the Lulingu General Hospital.

title/0/en: MONUSCO soldiers retook positions taken by the ADF in the villages of Kakuka, Sayo and Kinyamubiri in Beni territory.
notes/en: MONUSCO soldiers retook positions taken by the ADF in the villages of Kakuka, Sayo and Kinyamubiri in Beni territory. The ADF retreated into the Virunga Park.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 23-year-old woman from Ngongolio neighborhood in Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 23-year-old woman from Ngongolio neighborhood in Beni town. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the villages of Kabushwa and Mulangala in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the villages of Kabushwa and Mulangala in Kabare territory. The attackers looted money, livestock, food and other property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed five mini buses near Mighobwe village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed five mini-buses near Mighobwe village in Lubero territory. The attackers kidnapped five men and demanded a ransom for their release.

title/0/en: Two knife carrying men wounded a 70-year-old man on his veranda in Mayi-Moya village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Two men armed with crude weapons wounded a 70-year-old man on his veranda in Mayi-Moya village in Beni territory. The injured victim was rushed to a military hospital in Oicha.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 52-year-old woman and a 15-year-old girl in her field in Burayi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 52-year-old woman and a 15-year-old girl in her field in Burayi village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $5000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Young people showed their anger following a series of assassinations in Bukavu town.
notes/en: Young people protested following a series of assassinations in Bukavu town. They barricaded the roads, demanding that the provincial authorities open serious investigations to find the gang of criminals. Police dispersed the protesters. The intervention resulted in seven wounded police officers, five wounded and four others arrested and released.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked FARDC positions in the villages of Kakuka, Sayo and Kinyamubiri in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked FARDC positions in the villages of Kakuka, Sayo and Kinyamubiri in Beni territory. The clashes lasted more than twelve hours. They resulted in three men and one woman killed, and another two men wounded.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon shot and killed a 30-year-old man in Mera vilage in North Kivu territory.
notes/en: The NDC-R shot and killed a 30-year-old man in Mera vilage in North Kivu territory. The attackers suspected the victim to be an NDC Sheka informant.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a currency exchange and an electronic money transfer shop in Nyakaliba neighborhood in Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a currency exchange and an electronic money transfer shop in Nyakaliba neighborhood in Bukavu town. The attackers shot and killed two men aged 23 and 61, respectively, stole money, two computers and twelve telephones.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the house of agents from the NGO, NRC, in Kitabo village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the house of agents from the NGO, NRC, in Kitabo village in Uvira territory. The attackers looted money, phones and food.

title/0/en: The FARDC shot and killed a 24-year-old man in Tinge village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC shot and killed a 24-year-old man in Tinge village in Beni territory. They accused the victim of being a Mai-Mai.

title/0/en: Knife carrying men killed a 45-year-old man in the rural commune of Kanyabayonga.
notes/en: Men armed with crude weapons killed a 45-year-old man in the rural commune of Kanyabayonga. The body of the victim was found in the Muwe River not far from the victim's home.

title/0/en: Unidentified men beat up an FARDC soldier in Rwangoma neighborhood in Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified men beat up an FARDC soldier in Rwangoma neighborhood in Beni town. The attackers stole the soldier's weapon.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided two houses, at night, in Rughenda neighborhood in Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided two houses during the night in the Rughenda neighborhood of Butembo town. The attackers shot and wounded two men and looted money and property.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen robbed a motorcycle near Kibanga village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen robbed a motorcycle near Kibanga village in Uvira territory. The attackers shot and wounded a 31-year-old man.

title/0/en: A policeman injured a 50-year-old woman in Shabunda locality in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: A policeman injured a 50-year-old woman in Shabunda locality in Shabunda territory. The incident occurred when the police wanted to separate two men who were arguing. The victim was rushed to a medical facility for appropriate care.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 27-year-old man in Nzuma neighborhood in Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 27-year-old man in Nzuma neighborhood in Beni town. The lifeless body of the victim was found in a nearby field by farmers.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided five houses at night in the Katwa district of Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided five houses at night in the Katwa district of Butembo town. The attackers shot and wounded a woman and looted money and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 36-year-old man from Murambi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 36-year-old man from Murambi village in Kalehe territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $1500.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 46-year-old man from Kisisile village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 46-year-old man from Kisisile village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $5000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked a Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Pitakongo village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked a Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Pitakongo village in Lubero territory. This attack killed two NDC-R fighters and wounded a Mai-Mai Mazembe fighter. The NDC-R also looted money and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 68-year-old woman in Mabuku village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 68-year-old woman in Mabuku village in Beni territory. The attackers took a goat.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 34-year-old man from Rukoro village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 34-year-old man from Rukoro village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $6000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man in Mabingu village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man in Mabingu village in Kabare territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a 55-year-old man in Kishe village in Kishe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a 55-year-old man in Kishe village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Minova village in Kalehe territory at night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Minova village in Kalehe territory at night. The attackers looted $100, fabric, a battery and a solar panel.

title/0/en: Two boys, among the hostages who had been abducted by the ADF in the village of Malolu on 03 August 2018, escaped from the hands of their captors.
notes/en: Two boys, who were among the hostages who had been abducted by the ADF in the village of Malolu on 3 August 2018, escaped from the hands of their captors.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon, who had kidnapped two men in Mavingu village in Lubero territory to carry their goods, freed the hostages.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon, who had kidnapped two men in Mavingu village in Lubero territory to carry their goods, freed the hostages.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked an FARDC position in Kasugho town in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked an FARDC position in Kasugho town in Lubero territory. The attack resulted in four dead and four captured NDC Guidon soldiers, and one FARDC soldier injured. The FARDC recovered an AK47 and a PKM.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a farm at night in the village of Malangayi in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a farm at night in the village of Malangayi in Beni territory. The attackers took away cows, goats and sheep.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a 26-year-old man in the Kalinda neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a 26-year-old man in the Kalinda neighborhood of Beni town. The FARDC soldier was arrested by a patrol.

title/0/en: The CNRD raided houses and a health center in Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The CNRD raided houses and a health center in Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers looted money, goats, medicine and other property.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier accidentally shot a 45-year-old woman in the rural commune of Sange in Rutanga district.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier accidentally shot a 45-year-old woman in the rural commune of Sange in Rutanga district. The victim died from her wounds.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position in Ngadi neighbourhood in Beni town.
notes/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position in Ngadi neighbourhood in Beni town. This attack resulted in seventeen FARDC soldiers killed, six FARDC soldiers wounded and one missing. The ADF looted weapons and the money that was intended pay the salaries for soldiers.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo who kidnapped a 55-year-old man from the Lyakobo neighborhood in Beni town on August 22, 2018 released the hostage after received a $250 ransom.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo, who had kidnapped a 55-year-old man from the Lyakobo neighborhood in Beni town on August 22, 2018, released the hostage after receiving a $250 ransom.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles, who had kidnapped twelve men on the river near Uhene village in Rutshuru territory on August 23, 2018, released the hostages after paying a ransom of $181.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles, who had kidnapped twelve men on the river near Uhene village in Rutshuru territory on August 23, 2018, released the hostages after paying a ransom of $181.

title/0/en: The CNRD, who had abducted a 42-year-old man from Kalembe village in Masisi territory on 22 August 2018, released the hostage and asked him not to involve himself in the land dispute in that area.
notes/en: The CNRD, who had abducted a 42-year-old man from Kalembe village in Masisi territory on 22 August 2018, released the hostage and asked him not to involve himself in the land dispute in that area.

title/0/en: An unidentified man stabbed a man near Hutwe village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: An unidentified man stabbed a man near Hutwe village in Lubero territory. The victim succumbed to his injuries.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi raided a house in Bukungu village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi raided a house in Bukungu village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers shot and injured an 60-year-old man and a 58-year-old woman.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a 39-year-old man in Tchampundu village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a 39-year-old man in Tchampundu village in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Mwangaza district of rural kasindi commune during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Mwangaza neighborhood of rural Kasindi commune during the night. The attackers shot and killed a 34-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed an FARDC soldier in the Malepe neighborhood of Beni city.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed an FARDC soldier in the Malepe neighborhood of Beni city.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked a FARDC position in the village of Mukoko in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked an FARDC position in Mukoko village, Beni territory. This attack killed one man and one woman.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles kidnapped twelve fishermen on the Rwindi river near Uhene village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles kidnapped twelve fishermen on the Rwindi river near Uhene village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Angry civilians destroyed and burned down the office of the delegated official of the rural commune of Kasindi, following the killing of a man in this area by unidentified gunmen.
notes/en: Angry civilians destroyed and burned down the office of the administrator of the rural commune of Kasindi, following the killing of a man in this area by unidentified gunmen. Police intervened to disperse the angry demonstrators.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided houses in the Vutetse neighborhood in Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided houses in the Vutetse neighborhood in Butembo town. The attackers shot and wounded a 42-year-old man, and stole $700 and other property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 54-year-old man in his field near Ngendo village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 54-year-old man in his field near Ngendo village in Uvira territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a 54-year-old man in his field near Ngendo village in Uvira territory, left the hostage in a ravine near an FARDC position.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped a 54-year-old man in his field near Ngendo village in Uvira territory, left the hostage in a ravine near an FARDC position.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo kidnapped a 55-year-old man from the Lyakobo neighborhood in Beni town.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo kidnapped a 55-year-old man from the Lyakobo neighborhood in Beni town. The kidnappers demanded a ransom to release the hostage. They also took a goat.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Habikuangaliye raided Byundu village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Habikuangaliye raided Byundu village in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted twelve goats, fifteen chickens and eight ducks. They also set fire to an abandoned FARDC camp.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani looted $1,212 and other belongings from cattle traders near the village of Pumuzika in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani looted $1,212 and other belongings from cattle traders near the village of Pumuzika in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: The NDC Sheka ambushed the FARDC at the Maninge mine site entrance in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC Sheka ambushed the FARDC at the Maninge mining site entrance in Walikale territory. The NDC Sheka killed one FARDC soldier and injured another.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Panzi neighborhood of Bukavu town during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the Panzi neighborhood of Bukavu town during the night. The attackers raped a 42-year-old woman. They stole two phones, shoes and clothes.

title/0/en: The CNRD abducted a 42-year-old man from Kalembe village in Masisi territory following a land dispute.
notes/en: The CNRD abducted a 42-year-old man from Kalembe village in Masisi territory following a land dispute.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon abducted two men Mavingu village in Lubero territory to carry the militia's property.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon abducted two men Mavingu village in Lubero territory to carry the militia's property.

title/0/en: Nyatura Domi, attempting to capture a CNRD combatant in Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory, shot and killed a 14-year-old girl during their target's escape.
notes/en: Nyatura Domi, while attempting to capture a CNRD combatant in Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory, shot and killed a 14-year-old girl when the victim was trying to escape.

title/0/en: The police tortured a man arrested for kidnapping in the rural commune of Kasindi.
notes/en: The police tortured a man arrested for kidnapping in the rural commune of Kasindi. The victim died of his injuries in jail.

title/0/en: The CNRD who had kidnapped and raped two women aged 29 and 31, respectively, in Mashango village, Rutshuru territory, on August 20, 2018, released the hostages.
notes/en: The CNRD who had kidnapped and raped two women aged 29 and 31, respectively, in Mashango village, Rutshuru territory, on August 20, 2018, released the hostages.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin Mbaenda tortured a 37-year-old man in Malembe village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin Mbaenda tortured a 37-year-old man in Malembe village in Walikale territory. The victim succumbed to his injuries. The attackers accused the victim of failing to pay a debt to the local commander.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kivuwhe, who had kidnapped four men in Nyamugali village in Uvira territory on August 17, 2018, released the hostages.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kivuwhe, who had kidnapped four men in Nyamugali village in Uvira territory on August 17, 2018, released the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at night in Bambu village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house at night in Bambu village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers abducted a 46-year-old man and stole two goats.

title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men dressed in FARDC uniforms looted $3,800 from a foreign currency trader at his workplace in the Rugenge district of Uvira.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men dressed in FARDC uniforms looted $3,800 from a foreign currency trader at his workplace in the Rugenge district of Uvira. The attackers fled after firing bullets in the air.

title/0/en: The ADF raided Mukoko village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF raided Mukoko village in Beni territory. Alerted by the population, the FARDC, supported by MONUSCO contingents, attacked and chased the attackers out of the village.

title/0/en: CNRD abducted two women aged 29 and 31, respectively, from Mashango village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: CNRD abducted two women aged 29 and 31, respectively, from Mashango village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers raped the hostages.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika who had kidnapped seven men near the Mayi ya Moto village in Fizi territory on August 9, 2018 released the hostages after the payment of a ransom.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika who had kidnapped seven men near the Mayi ya Moto village in Fizi territory on August 9, 2018 released the hostages after the payment of a ransom.

title/0/en: The APCLS abducted a 28-year-old woman from Malemo village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The APCLS abducted a 28-year-old woman from Malemo village in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked two FARDC positions in Nyaleke village, Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked two FARDC positions in Nyaleke village, Beni territory. The FARDC repelled the attackers.

title/0/en: Seven FDLR-RUD combatants kidnapped four men and two women in their fields in Kibende village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Seven FDLR-RUD combatants kidnapped four men and two women in their fields in Kibende village, Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $6,000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke attacked the Twagineho in the villages of Kanongo and Wingwa in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke attacked the Twagineho in the villages of Kanongo and Wingwa in Uvira territory. This attack killed three people. The Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke stole cattle and burned down houses.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani attacked the Nyatura Nduhuye in the Kilimoto Mining Area in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani attacked the Nyatura Nduhuye in the Kilimoto Mining Area in Kalehe territory. The attack left one dead and one wounded in the ranks of the Raia Mutomboki Shabani and four dead among the Nyatura Nduhuye.

title/0/en: The police tortured and injured a 42-year-old man in Penekusu locality in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The police tortured and injured a 42-year-old man in Penekusu locality in Shabunda territory. The victim demanded the return of his two goats which had been stolen following a raid by the police.

title/0/en: A 32-year-old man kidnapped by three FDLR-RUD fighters in Kakondo village on August 17, 2018 escaped from his captors without paying ransom.
notes/en: A 32-year-old man kidnapped by three FDLR-RUD fighters in Kakondo village on August 17, 2018 escaped from his captors without paying ransom. But the kidnappers continue to call the victim to demand $1,000. Otherwise they said they would get him.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who kidnapped two men near Kasisi village in Rutshuru territory on August 16, 2018, released one of the hostages after the payment of a ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped two men near Kasisi village in Rutshuru territory on August 16, 2018, released one of the hostages after the payment of a ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raped a 16-year-old girl in a field at Kilungu village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raped a 16-year-old girl in a field at Kilungu village in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men aged 58 and 60, respectively, from the village of Luziru in Walungu territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men aged 58 and 60, respectively, from the village of Luziru in Walungu territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2,000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Songa Kivuwhe kidnapped four men in Nyamugali village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Songa Kivuwhe kidnapped four men in Nyamugali village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot a man and a woman in Kasoko village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot a man and a woman in Kasoko village in Rutshuru territory. The incident took place at a roadblocks set up by the FARDC where they taxed passersby. This incident left one man dead and one woman wounded.

title/0/en: Three FDLR-RUD fighters raided a health center in Kakondo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Three FDLR-RUD fighters raided a health center in Kakondo village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers kidnapped a 32-year-old man.

title/0/en: Two FDLR-RUD fighters raided a house in Rusaka 5 village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Two FDLR-RUD fighters raided a house in Rusaka 5 village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers shot dead a 50-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen fired bullets at three women and a seven-year-old boy in Ruhogwe village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen fired at three women and a seven-year-old boy in Ruhogwe village, Nyiragongo territory. The shooting killed a woman and wounded two women and a boy.

title/0/en: A policeman shot and killed a man in Katoyi Ward in Goma City.
notes/en: A policeman shot and killed a man in the Katoyi neighborhood of Goma. The incident occurred when the police wanted to drive street traders out of this part of the city.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto, Kikwama, Vunja Vikwazo and Habikuangalie attacked the FARDC position in Nyambembe village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto, Kikwama, Vunja Vikwazo and Habikuangalie attacked the FARDC position in Nyambembe village in Shabunda territory. This attack left two Raia Mutomboki and two civilians killed.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a 56-year-old man in his field in Ihunga village in Beni territory on August 10, 2018 released the hostage after receiving a $100 ransom.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a 56-year-old man in his field in Ihunga village in Beni territory on August 10, 2018 released the hostage after receiving a $100 ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a gold trading shop in Blala village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a gold trading shop in Blala village in Fizi territory. The attackers shot dead a 52-year-old man and stole money, gold and telephones.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed two motorbikes near Kasisi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed two motorbikes near Kasisi village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers kidnapped two men and demanded ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped two men near Kasisi village in Rutshuru territory on 16 August 2018 released another hostage after paying a $ 1,500 ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped two men near Kasisi village in Rutshuru territory on 16 August 2018 released another hostage after paying a $1,500 ransom.

title/0/en: The Nyatura FDP captured a policeman on his way to Goma near Kigarama village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura FDP abducted a policeman on his way to Goma near Kigarama village in Rutshuru territory. The Nyatura FDP seized the weapon and the clothing of the captured policeman.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the village of Mikenge in Mwenga territory overnight.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the village of Mikenge in Mwenga territory overnight. The attackers shot and killed an 8-year-old girl. They took away money, phones, prepaid cards and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked farmers in a field at Itsiva village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked farmers in a field at Itsiva village in Beni territory. The attackers killed a 60-year-old man with a machete.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Lusasa village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Lusasa village in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted fifteen kilograms of cassiterite, a motorized pump, spades and clothes.

title/0/en: The police attacked unidentified gunmen who were attempting to raid a Catholic convent in Minova village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The police attacked unidentified gunmen who were attempting to raid a Catholic convent in Minova village, Kalehe territory. The police chased away the attackers.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto, Kikwama, Vunja Vikwazo and Habikuangalie abducted a 35-year-old man from Nkuni village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto, Kikwama, Vunja Vikwazo and Habikuangalie abducted a 35-year-old man from Nkuni village in Shabunda territory. The attackers stole $242 and other property.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga attacked the Raia Mutomboki Mabala positions in the villages of Mpwe, Iguma and Kiluma in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga attacked the Raia Mutomboki Mabala positions in the villages of Mpwe, Iguma and Kiluma in Shabunda territory. The Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga looted property.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the NDC-R in the village of Masekeseke in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the NDC-R in the village of Masekeseke in Lubero territory. The FARDC chased the armed group out of the village.

title/0/en: The NDC-R abducted a man in the village of Bunyatenge in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC-R abducted a man in the village of Bunyatenge in Lubero territory. The militia kidnapped the hostage in order to treat their wounded fighters during the Kagheri and Masekeseke clashes.

title/0/en: The police raided houses in Ngongolio neighborhood of Beni city.
notes/en: The police raided houses in Ngongolio neighborhood of Beni city. The attackers injured a woman and looted money, a TV screen, a phone, a gold chain and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men aged 40 and 50 respectively at a field in Kanyavuyiri village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men aged 40 and 50, respectively, at a field in Kanyavuyiri village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 24-year-old man in the Rughenda neighborhood in Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 24-year-old man in the Rughenda neighborhood in Butembo town.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 56-year-old man from Nyakabere neighborhood in rural Sange commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 56-year-old man from Nyakabere neighborhood in rural Sange commune. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $10,000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Katyela and Kakamba villages in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Katyela and Kakamba villages in Mwenga territory. The attackers looted money, livestock and property.

title/0/en: The Twiganeho and Ngumino fired at two men aged 36 and 43 who were going to a field in the village of Canzovu in Uvira territory
notes/en: The Twiganeho and Ngumino fired at two men aged 36 and 43, who were going to a field in the Canzovu village in Uvira territory. This incident killed one and wounded the other.

title/0/en: Men carrying knives raided houses in Minova village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Men carrying knives raided houses in Minova village in Kalehe territory. The attackers stole $181 and property.

title/0/en: The NDC-R attacked the FARDC position in Kanaana village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC-R attacked the FARDC position in Kanaana village in Lubero territory. This attack left three dead in the ranks of the FARDC. There were wounded on both sides.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke shot and killed a 56-year-old man in the village of Kirumba in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke shot and killed a 56-year-old man in the village of Kirumba in Uvira territory. The victim was on his way back from raising awareness among displaced people that they could return to their communities.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the NDC-R in the locality of Kasugho in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the NDC-R in the locality of Kasugho in Lubero territory. This attack killed an FARDC soldier. The NDC-R looted livestock and property. They forced civilians to carry looted goods.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga raided Kamamba and Kamusimbi villages in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga raided Kamamba and Kamusimbi villages in Mwenga territory. The attackers looted money, livestock and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a man and a woman in the village of Muhola in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a man and a woman in Muhola village, Lubero territory. The attackers also raped a girl and stole $200.

title/0/en: A police officer shot and wounded three men and a woman in Karambo village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: A police officer shot and wounded three men and a woman in Karambo village, Rutshuru territory. This incident occurred when the officer tried to stop a motorcycle driver and his colleagues intervened to stop him.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen shot at a car near Kitemesho village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen shot at a car near Kitemesho village in Uvira territory. The attackers injured a man.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the position of the NDC-R in Kagheri village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the position of the NDC-R in Kagheri village in Lubero territory. The FARDC dislodged these militiamen from this village. The attack left four dead and wounded among the NDC-R and two dead and three wounded on the FARDC side. The protagonists looted property from civilians. The NDC-R abducted eight men to carry the looted goods. They also set fire to a house.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who kidnapped three men near the village of Mighobwe in Lubero territory on August 10, 2018,  released the hostages after payment of ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped two men near the village of Mighobwe in Lubero territory on August 10, 2018, released the hostages after they paid a ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house and shop in the Chai neighborhood of the city of Bukavu.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house and shop in the Chai neighborhood of the city of Bukavu. The attackers looted money and property.

title/0/en: FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen in Bushaku village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen in Bushaku village in Kalehe territory. The FARDC chased after the attackers.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the positions of Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto and Kikwama at the Nyambembe mine site in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the positions of Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto and Kikwama at the Nyambembe mining site in Shabunda territory. The FARDC were trying to push these armed groups out of this mining site.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided three houses in the Masiani district of Beni city during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided three houses in the Masiani district of Beni city during the night. The assailants looted $249, two TV screens, a chain, a pair of jewelry, two pairs of shoes and an empty bag.

title/0/en: Eight FARDC soldiers took $ 6 and a teacher's phone in the Mbau area of Beni territory.
notes/en: Eight FARDC soldiers stole $6 and a teacher's phone in the Mbau area of Beni territory.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked the FARDC position in Nyaleke village in Beni territory
notes/en: The ADF attacked the FARDC position in Nyaleke village in Beni territory. After the FARDC fled, the ADF burned down their camp.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided two houses in Chahi neighborhood in the town of Bukavu.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided two houses in Chahi neighborhood in the town of Bukavu. They stole four phones, an amplifier, and four cans of diesel.

title/0/en: The FARDC took away goods during a shop fire in Kabasha locality in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC stole goods during a shop fire in Kabasha locality in Beni territory.

title/0/en: ADF fighters raided Mayi-Moya village, Beni territory. They killed two men, three women and a girl, and wounded a 12-year-old boy.
notes/en: ADF fighters raided Mayi-Moya village, Beni territory. They killed two men, three women and a girl, and wounded a 12-year-old boy. They stole livestock and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 42-year-old man from Kidoti village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $ 5,000 for the release of the hostage.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 42-year-old man from Kidoti village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $5,000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The FNL-Nzabampema held up a mini bus of the "Arc-en-ciel" ("Rainbow") transport agency near Kawizi village, Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FNL-Nzabampema held up a mini bus of the "Arc-en-ciel" ("Rainbow") transport agency near Kawizi village, Uvira territory. This robbery left two people dead and five others wounded. The robbers looted money and property.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Makindu pointed a vehicle near the village of Kabuzibuzi in Fizi territory. The attackers looted money and property.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Makindu held up a vehicle near the village of Kabuzibuzi in Fizi territory. The attackers looted money and property.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles kidnapped five men on Lake Edward near the village of Magiso in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $ 10,000 for the release of the hostages.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles kidnapped five men on Lake Edward near the village of Magiso in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $10,000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a mini bus near Mighobwe village, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a mini bus near Mighobwe village, Lubero territory. The robbers injured three people and stole money and property. They kidnapped two people and demanded a ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons attacked a police station in Manguredjipa village, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons attacked a police station in Manguredjipa village, Lubero territory. The attackers wounded a policeman among those who guarded the office.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 56-year-old man in his field in Ihunga village in Beni territory. The kidnappers demanded ransom for the release of the hostage
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 56-year-old man in his field in Ihunga village in Beni territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 51-year-old man in the Rombe I district of rural Uvira. The attackers took away the victim's money.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 51-year-old man in the Rombe I district of rural Uvira. The attackers took away the victim's money.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika attacked a convoy of the Simba Society escorted by the FARDC near the village of Mayi ya Moto in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika attacked a convoy of the Simba company escorted by the FARDC near the village of Mayi ya Moto in Fizi territory. Two FARDC soldiers and two men were killed and another wounded. The attackers kidnapped seven men, took away money, and property.

title/0/en: CNRD fighters attacked the Nyatura Love's position in Kitanda village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: CNRD fighters attacked the Nyatura Love's position in Kitanda village, Rutshuru territory. The CNRD combattants killed two Nyatura Love fighters and took with them two weapons.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela captured two ANR agents in the village of Namukala in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela captured two ANR agents in the village of Namukala in Fizi territory. The attackers accused the two ANR agents of having arrested young people in the area, accusing them of belonging to the Mai-Mai.

title/0/en: Six unidentified gunmen raided Kalengera, Kishashu and Kahinga villages in Walungu territory.
notes/en: Six unidentified gunmen raided Kalengera, Kishashu and Kahinga villages in Walungu territory. The attackers looted money and property. The population apprehended two men among the attackers and lynched them.

title/0/en: FDLR-RUD fighters held up a vehicle from the NGO NRC near Ngwenda village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: FDLR-RUD fighters held up a vehicle from the NGO NRC near Ngwenda village, Rutshuru territory. The robbers abducted six agents of this organization.

title/0/en: An FDLR-RUD commander instructed some of his elements who had abducted six NRC agents to release them unconditionally in Ngwenda village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: An FDLR-RUD commander instructed some of his elements who had abducted six NRC agents to release them unconditionally in Ngwenda village, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: CNRD fighters released, after a ransom was paid, two men aged 31 and 42, respectively, who had been kidnapped near Mutongano village, Rutshuru territory, on 7 August 2018.
notes/en: CNRD fighters released, after a ransom was paid, two men aged 31 and 42, respectively, who had been kidnapped near Mutongano village, Rutshuru territory, on 7 August 2018.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles abducted two men aged 18 and 28 near Magiso village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles abducted two men aged 18 and 28 near Magiso village, Rutshuru territory. The victims were going to the lake to fish.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 52-year-old woman in her field in Mangato village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 52-year-old woman in her field in Mangato village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a 58-year-old man in the village of Bwagwa in Uvira territory on 06 August 2018 released the hostage after paying a ransom.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a 58-year-old man in the village of Bwagwa in Uvira territory on 06 August 2018 released the hostage after receiving a ransom.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers on patrol captured four armed men and two armed women attempting to rob a gold trading post in Kalingi village, Mwenga territory.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers on patrol captured four armed men and two armed women attempting to rob a gold trading post in Kalingi village, Mwenga territory. The FARDC recovered two AK47 weapons and a grenade.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga fighters killed a FARDC soldier in Nyabalume village, Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga fighters killed a FARDC soldier in Nyabalume village, Mwenga territory. The attackers took with them the weapon of the killed soldier.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked the FARDC position in Kasinga neighborhood in the city of Beni.
notes/en: The ADF attacked the FARDC position in Kasinga neighborhood in the city of Beni. The attack left a FARDC soldier and a 34-year-old woman dead.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Makindu fights raided Mukenge village, Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Makindu fights raided Mukenge village, Shabunda territory. The attackers looted six solar panels, four radios, two pigs, and twelve goats.

title/0/en: The police dispersed a delegation of "Ensemble pour le changement" activists who were accompanying the candidates of this political alliance to submit their applications in the rural commune of Uvira in the territory of the same name.
notes/en: The police dispersed a delegation of "Ensemble pour le changement" activists who were accompanying the candidates of this political alliance to submit their applications in the rural commune of Uvira in the territory of the same name. This crackdown left of its five members wounded by bullets. The police took away the signs and posters belonging to the alliance.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked APCLS positions in the villages of Shangi, Muundu and Kinyana in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked APCLS positions in the villages of Shangi, Muundu and Kinyana in Masisi territory. These attacks killed seven APCLS combatants.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided two houses in Nkafu neighborhood in the city of Bukavu.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided two houses in Nkafu neighborhood in the city of Bukavu. The attackers looted money and property. They shot and wounded two men, aged 40 and 46 respectively.

title/0/en: Armed men dressed in military uniform raided at night a house in the Ngongolio district in the city of Beni.
notes/en: Armed men dressed in military uniform raided at night a house in the Ngongolio district in the city of Beni. They shot and wounded a 34-year-old man. They stole $ 90, two phones, a TV screen and a battery.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 50-year-old man in the Kalundu district of rural Uvira.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 50-year-old man in the Kalundu district of Uvira.

title/0/en: CNRD combattants held up a motorcycle near Mutongano village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: CNRD combattants held up a motorcycle near Mutongano village, Rutshuru territory. The robbers kidnapped two men aged 31 and 42 respectively. They demanded a ransom of $ 2,500.

title/0/en: Park rangers and FARDC soldiers burned homes and food crops in farmers' fields in Sekwekwe village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Park rangers and FARDC soldiers burned homes and food crops in farmers' fields in Sekwekwe village, Rutshuru territory. FARDC soldiers also looted sacks of maize. It was a peasant eviction operation in this part of the Virunga Park.

title/0/en: The FARDC intercepted a Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke team near Kijaga village, Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FARDC intercepted a Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke team near Kijaga village, Uvira territory. The FARDC attacked these Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the house of a FARDC soldier in Kavimvira neighborhood in Uvira.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the house of a FARDC soldier in Kavimvira neighborhood in Uvira. The attackers shot and killed the FARDC soldier.

title/0/en: The ADF killed three women and ten men from a group of hostages who had been abducted in Tubameme village, Beni territory, on August 3, 2018.
notes/en: ADF combattants killed three women and ten men from a group of hostages who had been abducted on August 3, 2018 in Tubameme village, Beni territory. The bodies of the victims were found near Tubameme village.

title/0/en: A FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 38-year-old man and stole $ 3,030 near Kakomero village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: A FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 38-year-old man and stole $ 3,030 near Kakomero village, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: FARDC tortured and wounded five men in Kavusu village in Beni territory. The FARDC arrested these civilians following the discovery of FARDC uniforms near the fields of these victims.
notes/en: FARDC tortured and wounded five men in Kavusu village in Beni territory. The FARDC arrested these civilians following the discovery of FARDC uniforms near the fields of the victims.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 58-year-old man in the village of Bwagwa in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 58-year-old man in the village of Bwagwa in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe fighters shot and wounded a 30-year-old man in Bukomerwa village, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe fighters shot and wounded a 30-year-old man in Bukomerwa village, Lubero territory. The attackers accused the victim of not paying a token. The victim died two days later.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked a FARDC position near Kamahoro village, Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked a FARDC position near Kamahoro village, Nyiragongo territory. The attack left a FARDC soldier and an assailant dead.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 52-year-old man in his field in Sulungwe village, Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 52-year-old man in his field in Sulungwe village, Beni territory. The victim's body was found by the FARDC.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed a FARDC team that was searching for a missing man in a field in Sulungwe village, Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed a FARDC team that was searching for a missing man in a field in Sulungwe village, Beni territory. A man was killed during this ambush.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped thirteen men in the fields of Lahe village in Beni territory. The destination of the hostages is unknown.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped thirteen men in the fields of Lahe village in Beni territory. The destination of the hostages is unknown.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen abducted three men, a woman, two girls and a boy in the village of Kalingati in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen abducted three men, a woman, two girls and a boy in the village of Kalingati in Beni territory.

title/0/en: CNRD combattants released a man who had been kidnapped on July 31, 2018 in Katsiru village, Rutshuru territory, after a ransom of $ 1,000 was paid.
notes/en: CNRD combattants released a man who had been kidnapped on July 31, 2018 in Katsiru village, Rutshuru territory, after a ransom of $ 1,000 was paid.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen stabbed a 36-year-old man and robbed him of $90 at Kusisa in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen stabbed a 36-year-old man and robbed him of $90 at Kusisa in Kalehe territory. The victim was rushed to a medical facility for appropriate care.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the town of Butembo. The FARDC and the PNC on patrol attacked and chased the attackers in the Kasongomi neighborhood.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the town of Butembo. The FARDC and the PNC on patrol attacked and chased the attackers in the Kasongomi neighborhood.

title/0/en: A FARDC soldier broke into a house in Kasanga Tuha neighborhood in the city of Beni.
notes/en: A FARDC soldier broke into a house in Kasanga Tuha neighborhood in the city of Beni. This FARDC soldier shot and injured a man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped three men on July 30, 2018 near Mighobwe village, Lubero territory, released the two remaining hostages after a ransom of $ 1,000 was paid.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped three men on July 30, 2018 near Mighobwe village, Lubero territory, released the two remaining hostages after a ransom of $ 1,000 was paid.

title/0/en: The ADF raided Tubameme village in Beni territory. The attackers abducted three women and thirteen men.
notes/en: The ADF raided Tubameme village in Beni territory. The attackers abducted three women and thirteen men.

title/0/en: Five unidentified gunmen raided Kaunju village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Five unidentified gunmen raided Kaunju village in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted $ 545 and property. They tortured and injured two men.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the villages of Kabushwa, Mabingu and Mantu in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the villages of Kabushwa, Mabingu and Mantu in Kabare territory. The attackers killed a man and injured a 17-year-old girl. They also looted property.

title/0/en: FDLR-RUD fighters released a man who had been kidnapped on 30 July 2018 in Kaharagi village, Rutshuru territory, after a ransom of $ 1,300 was paid.
notes/en: FDLR-RUD fighters released a man who had been kidnapped on 30 July 2018 in Kaharagi village, Rutshuru territory, after a ransom of $ 1,300 was paid.

title/0/en: A NDC Guidon fighter shot and killed a 39-year-old man in Mpombi village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: A NDC Guidon fighter shot and killed a 39-year-old man in Mpombi village, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a 48-year-old man from Kasenga neighborhood in rural Uvira released the hostage after receiving a ransom of $6,500.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a 48-year-old man from Kasenga neighborhood in rural Uvira released the hostage after receiving a ransom of $6,500.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed individuals intercepted two NGO vehicles returning from the field in Biboyi village on the Bukombo road in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed individuals intercepted two NGO vehicles returning from the field in Biboyi village on the Bukombo road in Masisi territory. After stripping humanitarians of their valuables, they kidnapped them and demanded a ransom for their release.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a Catholic chapel in Kalau village, Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a Catholic chapel in Kalau village, Beni territory. The attackers broke the door and the cross. They threw away the hosts.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men who had captured a FARDC soldier in Wayibutwa village, Lubero territory, killed him.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men who had captured a FARDC soldier in Wayibutwa village, Lubero territory, killed him. His corpse was found on the Lubero-Kasugho road, not far from Wayibutwa village.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD released two men who had been kidnapped on 31 August 2018 in Buhindangoma village, Rutshuru territory, after a ransom of $ 2,000 was paid.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD released two men who had been kidnapped on 31 August 2018 in Buhindangoma village, Rutshuru territory, after a ransom of $ 2,000 was paid.

title/0/en: The FARDC tracked down the unidentified gunmen who had abducted a man from the Camula village in Kalehe territory on July 31, 2018.
notes/en: The FARDC tracked down the unidentified gunmen who had abducted a man from the Camula village in Kalehe territory on July 31, 2018. The FARDC released the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 44-year-old man from Kasenga neighborhood in Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 44-year-old man from Kasenga neighborhood in Uvira rural commune. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $ 20,000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: CNRD fighters raided a house in Katsiru village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: CNRD fighters raided a house in Katsiru village, Rutshuru territory. The attackers kidnapped a man and demanded a ransom of $ 1,000.

title/0/en: One of the hostages kidnapped by unidentified gunmen in Mighobwe village, Lubero territory, escaped the kidnappers.
notes/en: One of the hostages kidnapped by unidentified gunmen in Mighobwe village, Lubero territory, escaped the kidnappers.

title/0/en: FDLR-RUD robbed a motorbike carrying two directors near Buhindangoma village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: FDLR-RUD robbed a motorbike carrying two directors near Buhindangoma village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers delighted the teachers' salaries that these two directors carried with them. They then kidnapped the two victims.

title/0/en: NDC Guidon fighters attacked CNRD combattants in Kalembe village, Walikale territory.
notes/en: NDC Guidon fighters attacked CNRD combattants in Kalembe village, Walikale territory.

title/0/en: The FARDC supported by MONUSCO attacked the position of the Mai-Mai Vuvuya in Kalingati, Soma, and Pabuka villages, Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC supported by MONUSCO attacked the position of the Mai-Mai Vuvuya in Kalingati, Soma, and Pabuka villages, Beni territory. The Mai-Mai Vuvuya scattered in the bush. ANR agents captured a Mai-Mai.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man in the field at Camula village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man in his field at Camula village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Kibuye village in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Kibuye village in Kalehe territory during the night. The attackers injured two men. They stole $400 and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a vehicle carrying cantors of the CBCA church in Mighobwe village, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a vehicle carrying cantors of the CBCA church in Mighobwe village, Lubero territory. The attackers kidnapped three men among the passengers. They demanded a ransom of $ 10,000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 55-year-old man near Shanje village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 55-year-old man near Shanje village, Kalehe territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $ 100,000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Three FDLR-RUD kidnapped four men, a woman, and three girls who were on their way to their fields in Kaharagi village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Three FDLR-RUD kidnapped four men, a woman, and three girls who were on their way to their fields in Kaharagi village, Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostages. The kidnappers raped the kidnapped woman.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed a police delegation near Kamihunga village, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed a police delegation near Kamihunga village, Lubero territory. There was an exchange of fire between the groups. The ambush left a police officer and an assailant dead. The attackers took with them an AK47 weapon and burned the motorcycle of the attacked policemen.

title/0/en: Nyatura Domi killed two FARDC soldiers at their patrol post in Munguli village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Nyatura Domi killed two FARDC soldiers at their patrol post in Munguli village, Rutshuru territory. The attackers took with them two weapons.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen captured a FARDC soldier who was searching for straw and embers in Wayibutwa village, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen captured a FARDC soldier who was searching for straw and embers in Wayibutwa village, Lubero territory. The corpse of the soldier was found on August 1, 2018, not far from the village.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Musongati village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Musongati village in Masisi territory. The attackers shot and killed a woman.

title/0/en: Three girls who had been kidnapped by the Democratic Forces for the Liberation of Rwanda-Rally for Unity and Democracy (FDLR-RUD) in Kaharagi village, Rutshuru territory, escaped their captors.
notes/en: Three girls who had been kidnapped by the Democratic Forces for the Liberation of Rwanda-Rally for Unity and Democracy (FDLR-RUD) in Kaharagi village, Rutshuru territory, escaped their captors.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted fourteen cows in Makola village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted fourteen cows in Makola village in Fizi territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot dead a 22-year-old man in Makola village, Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot dead a 22-year-old man in Makola village, Fizi territory.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen who abducted a 53-year-old man from the village of Ndunda in Uvira territory on 28 July 2018 released the hostage.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen who abducted a 53-year-old man from the village of Ndunda in Uvira territory on 28 July 2018 released the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot dead a 63-year-old woman in Kaburungu village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot dead a 63-year-old woman in Kaburungu village, Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: An unidentified armed man shot dead a 35-year-old man from the Mataba locality in Beni territory.
notes/en: An unidentified armed man shot dead a 35-year-old man from the Mataba locality in Beni territory. The body of the victim was found by passersby.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the NDC Guidon's position in the Kifo mining area in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the NDC Guidon's position in the Kifo mining area in Walikale territory. The attack left one NDC Guidon fighter dead and three men wounded.

title/0/en: A man kidnapped by unidentified gunmen in the Ndosho neighborhood in the city of Goma on July 20, 2018 escaped from his captors.
notes/en: A man kidnapped by unidentified gunmen in the Ndosho neighborhood in the city of Goma on July 20, 2018 escaped from his captors.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen wounded a road traffic policeman with a machete in the rural commune of Lubero.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen wounded a road traffic policeman with a machete in the rural commune of Lubero. The attackers took away the weapon of the injured policeman.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a 51-year-old man from the Butaho district of Kiliba rural commune on July 23, 2018 released the hostage after a $ 4,500 ransom was paid.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a 51-year-old man from the Butaho district of Kiliba rural commune on July 23, 2018 released the hostage after a $ 4,500 ransom was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a 43-year-old woman from Lemera village in Uvira territory released the hostage after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a 43-year-old woman from Lemera village in Uvira territory released the hostage after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: The ADF ambushed two FARDC soldiers in Kadou village, Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF ambushed two FARDC soldiers in Kadou village, Beni territory. There was an exchange of fire between the two groups. The attackers killed a 23-year-old man carrying luggage from these FARDC soldiers.

title/0/en: ADF ambushed a FARDC convoy near Totolito village, Beni territory.
notes/en: ADF ambushed a FARDC convoy near Totolito village, Beni territory. The attackers stoel two cans of palm oil and a bag of cassava chips.

title/0/en: Two men and a woman carrying a gun raided during the night a house in Ngongolio district in the city of Beni.
notes/en: Two men and a woman carrying a gun raided during the night a house in Ngongolio district in the city of Beni. The attackers stool $ 70. They shot and injured a man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a shop in the Chai district of the city of Bukavu.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a shop in the Chai district of the city of Bukavu. The attackers stole money and property. They fired bullets in the air to scare the neighbors.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked the FARDC position in the village of Ndombi in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked the FARDC position in the village of Ndombi in Beni territory. This attack left one dead and one captured in the ranks of the Mai-Mai.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen abducted a 53-year-old man from Ndunda village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen abducted a 53-year-old man from Ndunda village in Uvira territory. The destination of the kidnappers was unknown.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers shot dead a 36-year-old man in Kasoko village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers shot dead a 36-year-old man in Kasoko village, Rutshuru territory. The FARDC were angry following the murder of one soldier in this village. The victim was returning from his workplace.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen held up an ambulance carrying a sick person near Nyamoma village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen held up an ambulance carrying a sick person near Nyamoma village in Uvira territory. The robbers looted $ 69 and two phones.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto attacked the FARDC position in the Nduma village, Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto attacked the FARDC position in the Nduma village, Shabunda territory. There was a massive displacement of the population fleeing this clash.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen injured a woman in the village of Rusayo in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen injured a woman in the village of Rusayo in Nyiragongo territory. The victim was coming back from her field.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons wounded a woman returning from her field in Rusayo village, Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons wounded a woman returning from her field in Rusayo village, Nyiragongo territory. The victim was rushed to a health facility for appropriate care.

title/0/en: Nyatura Domi fighters killed a FARDC soldier who was about to return to his home base in Kasoko village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Nyatura Domi fighters killed a FARDC soldier who was about to return to his home base in Kasoko village, Rutshuru territory. The attackers took away his weapon. The women of the military paralyzed the activities in this village following the murder of the soldier.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Kilalo raided a farm in Kalunguta village, Beni territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Kilalo raided a farm in Kalunguta village, Beni territory. The attackers stole 22 cows.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons raided a house in Kanoshe district in Bukavu town.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons raided a house in Kanoshe district in Bukavu town. The assailants wounded a 75-year-old man and stole $ 8, a bag of corn flour, and a suitcase with clothes.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot dead three men aged 47, 66, and 67 respectively in Nyanzale locality, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot dead three men aged 47, 66, and 67 respectively in Nyanzale locality, Rutshuru territory. The victims were members of the same family. One of the victims was an agent of the ANR (Congo's intelligence service).

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Kikwama and Kazimoto fighters released eleven abducted men in Nyambembe village, Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Kikwama and Kazimoto fighters released eleven abducted men in Nyambembe village, Shabunda territory. The attackers had forced the victims to carry looted goods.

title/0/en: The population spoke out against the construction of a fence around a concession in Bukavu's Nkafu neighborhood.
notes/en: The population spoke out against the construction of a fence around a concession in Bukavu's Nkafu neighborhood. During this protest, the police intervened to disperse the demonstrators. Two women and one child were injured as a result.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 68-year-old woman from her field in Katanu village, Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 68-year-old woman from her field in Katanu village, Uvira territory. The kidnappers killed the hostage with crude weapons. They took away the vertebral column, the left breast, the heart, and the sex of the victim.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided at night a house in Bukavu town's Nyalukemba neighborhood.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided at night a house in Bukavu town's Nyalukemba neighborhood. The attackers injured a 56-year-old man. They stole $ 1,500 and three phones. The injured victim's wife is a currency trader.

title/0/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants killed a 43-year-old man and wounded a boy in Kigarama village, Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants killed a 43-year-old man and wounded a boy in Kigarama village, Nyiragongo territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a 38-year-old man near Lumbishi village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a 38-year-old man near Lumbishi village, Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a 25-year-old man in Kitindiro village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a 25-year-old man in Kitindiro village, Kalehe territory. The victim was coming back from a shop to buy some cooking salt. The police arrested the two alleged attackers.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 43-year-old woman in Lemera locality, Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 43-year-old woman in Lemera locality, Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $ 15,000 for the release.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons and guns made broke into a house in Butondi village, Beni territory.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons and guns made broke into a house in Butondi village, Beni territory. The attackers were looking for the person in charge of the plot. Having noticed the absence of the wanted person, the attackers abducted his wife.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a mini-bus near Kagunga village, Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a mini-bus near Kagunga village, Uvira territory. The attackers killed three people and wounded five others. They looted money and property. The attackers finally fired a rocket at the mini bus.

title/0/en: FARDC on patrol attempting to arrest a man in Rukoro village, Rutshuru territory, fired live ammunition at the victim while he was trying to escape. The injured victim was rushed to the Rutshuru Military Hospital for appropriate care.
notes/en: FARDC on patrol attempting to arrest a man in Rukoro village, Rutshuru territory, fired live ammunition at the victim while he was trying to escape. The injured victim was rushed to the Rutshuru Military Hospital for appropriate care.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot dead a 38-year-old man near Nsengu village, Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot dead a 38-year-old man near Nsengu village, Walikale territory. The attackers stole money and property of the victim, who was returning from the Ntoto market.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin Mbaenda tortured and wounded a 29-year-old man in Malembe village, Walikale territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin Mbaenda tortured and wounded a 29-year-old man in Malembe village, Walikale territory. The attackers accused the victim of collaborating with the FARDC and refusing to pay a military ration to their armed group.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen tortured and injured a 32-year-old man in Mianda village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen tortured and injured a 32-year-old man in Mianda village, Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen abducted a 43-year-old man from Mugunga neighborhood in the city of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen abducted a 43-year-old man from Mugunga neighborhood in the city of Goma. The kidnappers did not demand anything.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen tied up a policeman and three men in a house in Luseke village, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen tied up a policeman and three men in a house in Luseke village, Lubero territory. Having noticed the policeman's escape, the attackers took the three tied up men and put them in the police station. They burned the police station. The three men came out with burns.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked the positions of unidentified gunmen in Lisasa, Pabuka, and Kalingati villages in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked the positions of unidentified gunmen in Lisasa, Pabuka, and Kalingati villages in Beni territory. Mai-Mai Kilalo fighters killed two armed men and captured four others.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen robbed a shop in Kitutu II village, Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen robbed a shop in Kitutu II village, Mwenga territory. The attackers wounded a man with a knife and stole $ 3,000.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen fired at a currency trader who was returning from his workplace in Kyeshero neighborhood, in the city of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen fired at a currency trader who was returning from his workplace in Kyeshero neighborhood, in the city of Goma. The attackers stole his money.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi shot and killed a 33-year-old man and wounded another man with a crude weapon in Mulimbi village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi shot and killed a 33-year-old man and wounded another man with a crude weapon in Mulimbi village, Rutshuru territory. The attackers killed the first victim after he refused to give them his phone.

title/0/en: During the arrest of a suspected criminal, police shot and wounded a 28-year-old man near the alleged criminal's plot in Buhambi village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: During the arrest of a suspected criminal, police shot and wounded a 28-year-old man near the alleged criminal's plot in Buhambi village, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: ADF fighters ambushed a FARDC convoy near Kididiwe village, Beni territory.
notes/en: ADF fighters ambushed a FARDC convoy near Kididiwe village, Beni territory. Three FARDC soldiers were wounded in this ambush.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided during the night a house in Ngongolio district in the city of Beni.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided during the night a house in Ngongolio district in the city of Beni. The attackers shot and wounded a man. They stole money, a computer and three phones.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Simba in the Bongisa mining site, Walikale territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Simba in the Bongisa mining site, Walikale territory. This attack left one dead and two wounded in the ranks of Mai-Mai Simba, and two wounded on the FARDC side.

title/0/en: NDC Guidon fighters abducted a 16-year-old girl from Bihiri village, Masisi territory.
