notes/en: NDC Guidon fighters abducted a 16-year-old girl from Bihiri village, Masisi territory. The NDC Guidon raped the victim. The attackers took her to their camp.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted property from civilians in Shanje village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted property from civilians in Shanje village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Four Mai-Mai Mazembe who had kidnapped a 70-year-old man in Kitsombiro locality released him in the locality of Kasugho, Lubero territory, after a ransom of $ 1,000 was paid.
notes/en: Four Mai-Mai Mazembe who had kidnapped a 70-year-old man in Kitsombiro locality released him in the locality of Kasugho, Lubero territory, after a ransom of $ 1,000 was paid.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons broke into a house in Kabamba village, Kabare territory.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons broke into a house in Kabamba village, Kabare territory. The attackers stabbed a 21-year-old man with a knife. Civilians came to the rescue, and apprehended one of the attackers and lynched him.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 7-year-old girl in Kibumba locality, Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 7-year-old girl in Kibumba locality, Nyiragongo territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $ 7,000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: CNRD fighters broke into six houses in Katsiru village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: CNRD fighters broke into six houses in Katsiru village, Rutshuru territory. They looted money, clothes and food.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons wounded a woman in Kasungalere village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons wounded a woman in Kasungalere village, Kalehe territory. The victim was coming back from her field. She was admitted to the Numbi hospital.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons and firearms raped a woman near Bilobilo village, Walikale territory.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons and firearms raped a woman near Bilobilo village, Walikale territory. The attackers stole $157 and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the FARDC position in Kitevya village, Beni territory
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the FARDC position in Kitevya village, Beni territory. The attack left one FARDC soldier and another man dead. The attackers looted oil cans and cassava flour.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 51-year-old man in Butaho district of Kiliba rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 51-year-old man in Butaho district of Kiliba rural commune. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $ 20,000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Police officers tortured and injured a 36-year-old man in Kikunda village,Kalehe territory. The victim had resisted arrest by the police.
notes/en: Police officers tortured and injured a 36-year-old man in Kikunda village,Kalehe territory. The victim had resisted arrest by the police. The victim was rushed to the general reference hospital in Minova.

title/0/en: FARDC attacked a Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Vuvenga village, Lubero territory.
notes/en: FARDC attacked a Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Vuvenga village, Lubero territory. This clash left one dead and two captured in the ranks of the Mai-Mai Mazembe, and one dead on the FARDC side. The FARDC recovered an AK47 weapon and set fire to the Mai-Mai Mazembe camp.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Kikwama and Kazimoto captured two policemen in Kimuluzi village, Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Kikwama and Kazimoto captured two policemen in Kimuluzi village, Shabunda territory. The attackers took away two weapons.

title/0/en: Armed men dressed in FARDC military uniforms broke into houses in Mambango neighborhood, Beni city.
notes/en: Armed men dressed in FARDC military uniforms broke into houses in Mambango neighborhood, Beni city. They stole $ 45, a radio and a phone.

title/0/en: The ADF raided Mavivi town in Beni territory. The attackers killed a 56-year-old man and a 37-year-old woman.
notes/en: The ADF raided Mavivi town in Beni territory. The attackers killed a 56-year-old man and a 37-year-old woman. They injured four men and a 16-year-old girl. The attackers looted goats and chickens. Thirteen people went missing.

title/0/en: The ADF intercepted two men who were going to their fields near Masulukwede village, Beni territory, and killed them.
notes/en: The ADF detained two men who were going to their fields near Masulukwede village, Beni territory, and killed them. Alerted by the population, the FARDC chased the attackers.

title/0/en: Three FDLR-RUD raided three houses in Kanyesanani village, Rutshuru territory at night.
notes/en: Three FDLR-RUD raided three houses in Kanyesanani village, Rutshuru territory at night. The attackers looted money and property. They kidnapped a 52-year-old man and demanded a $10,000 ransom for his release.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided at night a computer center called Bilima in Nyalukemba neighborhood in the city of Bukavu.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided a computer center called Bilima in Nyalukemba neighborhood in the city of Bukavu during the night. The attackers tied up the guard and stole money, 22 computers and an overhead projector. The burglarized computer center is a few meters from the military headquarters of Operation Sokola II.

title/0/en: A policeman injured a man using a stone in Kintama village, Idjwi territory.
notes/en: A policeman injured a man using a stone in Kintama village, Idjwi territory. This incident took place after a quarrel between the two.

title/0/en: Five women and a baby who had been taken hostage by ADF fighters in Mayangose village, Beni territory, escaped from their captors.
notes/en: Five women and a baby who had been taken hostage by ADF fighters in Mayangose village, Beni territory, escaped from their captors. The hostages were rescued by the FARDC.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mbulu stole money and nine cows in Rutabira village, Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mbulu stole money and nine cows in Rutabira village, Uvira territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed an 18-year-old man near Mikevo village, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed an 18-year-old man near Mikevo village, Lubero territory. The victim's body was found amputated of his sex.

title/0/en: Armed men dressed in military uniform broke into a house in Mabolio neighborhood, Beni city.
notes/en: Armed men dressed in military uniform broke into a house in Mabolio neighborhood, Beni city. The attackers stabbed a 20-year-old man with a knife. They stole a TV screen, two phones and a battery.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into the "55th CEBCE" church and two houses in Kasheke village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into the "55th CEBCE" church and two houses in Kasheke village, Kalehe territory. They stole four goats, a solar panel, a battery, an amplifier and a stabilizer.

title/0/en: Five armed and hooded men robbed $ 286 and a phone in Chebumba village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Five armed and hooded men robbed $ 286 and a phone in Chebumba village, Kalehe territory. They were dressed in police uniform.

title/0/en: Police arrested six LUCHA activists outside the ICGLR office in the city of Goma.
notes/en: Police arrested six LUCHA activists outside the ICGLR office in the city of Goma. The LUCHA activists were holding a sit-in to denounce the killing of fishermen on Lake Edward in Kyavinyonge.

title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men robbed a shop in Kisungu village, Beni territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men robbed a shop in Kisungu village, Beni territory. The attackers looted $110 and items for sale.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Katanga village, Kalehe territory, at night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Katanga village, Kalehe territory, at night. The attackers stole $323, a phone and a flash disk.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 32-year-old man in the Ndosho neighborhood in the city of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 32-year-old man in the Ndosho neighborhood in the city of Goma. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $ 3,000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Kikwama and Kazimoto raided Nyambembe village, Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Kikwama and Kazimoto raided Nyambembe village, Shabunda territory. The attackers abducted eight men and three women. They accused the hostages of collaborating with the FARDC to identify their positions.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 5-year-old boy in the Ndosho neighborhood in the city of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 5-year-old boy in the Ndosho neighborhood in the city of Goma. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $ 200 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men who kidnapped a 50-year-old woman near Rukoro village, Rutshuru territory, released the hostage after payment of a ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men who had kidnapped a 50-year-old woman near Rukoro village, Rutshuru territory, released the hostage after the payment of a ransom.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen raided a house in Tukenga village, Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen raided a house in Tukenga village, Mwenga territory. The attackers raped a 38-year-old disabled woman and injured a 40-year-old man.

title/0/en: CNRD raided a house in Katsiru village, Rutshuru territory. The attackers tortured and injured a 46-year-old man outside.
notes/en: The CNRD raided a house in Katsiru village, Rutshuru territory. The attackers tortured and injured a 46-year-old man outside. They abandoned the victim after shots were fired by the FARDC from their base.

title/0/en: A MONUSCO peacekeeper inadvertently fired a rocket in Ngite village, Beni territory.
notes/en: A MONUSCO peacekeeper inadvertently fired a rocket-propelled grenade in Ngite village, Beni territory. Shrapnel from this rocket injured a 13-year-old girl. The victim was rushed to the Mavivi reference health center for appropriate care.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Kihebe combattants attacked a convoy of police accompanied by civilians near Kahololo village, Uvira territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Kihebe combattants attacked a convoy of police accompanied by civilians near Kahololo village, Uvira territory. The attackers took with them four weapons from the police and looted money and property. They captured the four policemen to carry looted goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided two houses in Masau village, Beni territory, at night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided two houses in Masau village, Beni territory, at night. The attackers were looking for money. Failing to find any, the attackers shot and killed two men aged 32 and 45, respectively.

title/0/en: The APCLS attacked NDC Guidon in Birihi village, Masisi territory.
notes/en: The APCLS attacked NDC Guidon in Birihi village, Masisi territory. The clash left two NDC Guidon fighters injured. The APCLS chased the NDC Guidon out of the village.

title/0/en: Ngumino combattants shot and killed a 52-year-old man near Mikungubwe village, Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Ngumino fighters shot and killed a 52-year-old man near Mikungubwe village, Mwenga territory. The victim was traveling after he had received an invitation from MONUSCO to attend negotiations between the armed groups in the area.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a 50-year-old woman near Rukoro village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a 50-year-old woman near Rukoro village, Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2,000 for the release of the hostage. They also raped the victim.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Kihebe fighters stole 43 cows in Kahololo village, Uvira territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Kihebe fighters stole 43 cows in Kahololo village, Uvira territory. The intervention team that came to the rescue did not intercept the attackers.

title/0/en: FARDC took $1,484 from a gold trader near Musingi village, Mwenga territory.
notes/en: FARDC stole $1,484 from a gold trader near Musingi village, Mwenga territory. The victim was heading to the Lubyolo mining site to buy minerals.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons held up motorcycles on the road near the village of Katolero in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons held up motorcycles on the road near the village of Katolero in Lubero territory. The attackers kidnapped a man.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided a house in Nyalukemba neighborhood in Bukavu town at night. The attackers looted $ 2,000.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided a house in Nyalukemba neighborhood in Bukavu town at night. The attackers looted $2,000.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked a NDC Guidon position in the Kahira village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked a NDC Guidon position in the Kahira village in Masisi territory. The FARDC managed to displace the militiamen from this village.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked an APCLS position at Mbuyi village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked an APCLS position at Mbuyi village in Masisi territory. This attack killed nine APCLS fighters, six NDC fighters and injured 4 NDC fighters.

title/0/en: Informed of the kidnapping of a man near Katolero village, Lubero territory, the FARDC chased the kidnappers.
notes/en: Informed of the kidnapping of a man near Katolero village, Lubero territory, the FARDC pursued the kidnappers. Under pressure, the kidnappers released the hostage.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a man in his field near Kanyeshongo village, Rutshuru territory, released him after a $ 2,000 ransom was paid.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a man in his field near Kanyeshongo village, Rutshuru territory, released him after a $2,000 ransom was paid.

title/0/en: A police officer raped a 28-year-old woman in Maibano village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: A police officer raped a 28-year-old woman in Maibano village, Kalehe territory. The victim was detained in the local police cell.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed a FARDC patrol convoy in Nyamugali village, Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed a FARDC patrol convoy in Nyamugali village, Uvira territory. The attackers killed a FARDC soldier and took with them his weapon.

title/0/en: New Raia Mutomboki Puchi gunmen raided the Tumpyempye mining area in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: New Raia Mutomboki Puchi gunmen raided the Tumpyempye mining area in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted money, gold, and other property.

title/0/en: Angry FARDC looted property from residents in Kabuye village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Angry FARDC looted property from residents in Kabuye village, Rutshuru territory. This incident occurred after a former FDLR combattant robbed a weapon from a FARDC soldier after a dispute in a drinking establishment.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Kikwama and Kazimoto attacked the FARDC position in Byunda village, Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Kikwama and Kazimoto attacked the FARDC position in Byunda village, Shabunda territory. A man was injured during the attack. The attackers looted property, and forced ten men to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men tortured and injured a man in Katasomwa locality, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men tortured and injured a man in Katasomwa locality, Kalehe territory. The victim was admitted to a health facility for appropriate care.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attempted to rob a minibus near Mighobwe village, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attempted to rob a minibus near Mighobwe village, Lubero territory. The attackers shot and wounded a man.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD, FDLR-FOCA and Nyatura Domi coalition attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Kahumiro village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD, FDLR-FOCA and Nyatura Domi coalition attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Kahumiro village, Rutshuru territory. This clash left four Mai-Mai Mazembe wounded, three Nyatura Domi injured, as well as another man injured. The Mai-Mai repelled this coalition.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the FARDC position in Kavasewa village, Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the FARDC position in Kavasewa village, Beni territory. This attack left three dead in the ranks of the attackers, as well as three dead and three wounded on the FARDC side. A man and a woman were also killed. The attackers took with them three AK47 weapons.

title/0/en: Three men armed with a firearm and crude weapons raided a farm in Kitembe village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Three men armed with a firearm and crude weapons raided a farm in Kitembe village in Beni territory. The attackers wounded a 39-year-old man with a machete. They looted two goats, eggs, clothes and a bag of beans.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a FARDC soldier in Lunyasenge village, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a FARDC soldier in Lunyasenge village, Lubero territory. They also wounded another FARDC soldier by machete.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a farm near Kabasha locality, Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a farm near Kabasha locality, Beni territory. The attackers cased the death of 107 sheep near the Tabi River and took around 343 sheep with them.

title/0/en: NDC Guidon and the Mapenzi group attacked the APCLS position in Lwibo and Kinyumba villages, Masisi territory.
notes/en: NDC Guidon and the Mapenzi group attacked the APCLS position in Lwibo and Kinyumba villages, Masisi territory. This clash left five dead in the ranks of the APCLS, as well as two dead and one wounded on the side of the NDC Guidon. NDC Guidon and the Mapenzi group chased the APCLS from these villages.

title/0/en: Armed men dressed in military uniform raided a house in the Mabolio neighborhood in Beni city during the night.
notes/en: Armed men dressed in military uniform raided a house in the Mabolio neighborhood in Beni city during the night. The attackers stole $242, a TV screen, a USB key, sheets, clothes and breads.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen stabbed a man in front of his house in Majengo neighborhood in the city of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen stabbed a man in front of his house in the Majengo neighborhood of Goma. The victim was admitted to a health facility for appropriate care.

title/0/en: CNRD fighters raided at night seven houses in Katsiru village, Rutshuru territory. The attackers looted property.
notes/en: CNRD fighters raided at night seven houses in Katsiru village, Rutshuru territory. The attackers looted property. They shot and wounded a boy and a man aged 16 and 38 respectively. The injured victims were rushed to Mweso Hospital for treatment.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked APCLS positions at the villages of Kinyana and Tambi in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked APCLS positions at the villages of Kinyana and Tambi in Masisi territory. These attacks killed two NDC Guidon fighters and five civilians.

title/0/en: Six unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men in the Sayo neighborhood of Beni city.
notes/en: Six unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men in the Sayo neighborhood of Beni city. The kidnappers stole $48 and a phone. They demanded a ransom of $10,000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a man on a farm in Humbiza village, Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a man on a farm in Humbiza village, Nyiragongo territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped three MONUSCO agents at Shera village in Uvira territory, released the hostages after payment of a $12000 ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, who had kidnapped three MONUSCO agents at Shera village in Uvira territory, released the hostages after payment of a $12000 ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position in Chishado village, Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position in Chishado village, Kabare territory. A FARDC soldier was killed and another man was wounded during the clash.

title/0/en: The ADF raided the Bakaiku neighborhood of the rural district of Oicha.
notes/en: The ADF raided the Bakaiku neighborhood of the rural district of Oicha. The attackers killed a 48-year-old man and two women. Alerted, the FARDC repelled the attackers. The attackers also looted $400 and goats, and burned down two houses.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen raided a gold trading post in Camp Six village, Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen raided a gold trading post in Camp Six village, Mwenga territory. The attackers pretended to take shelter after the rain. They stole $ 2,318 and gold.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Wemba stripped passers-by of their money and property near the village of Ngolombe in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Wemba stripped passers-by of their money and property near the village of Ngolombe in Shabunda territory. The attackers forced three men to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen came to a field near Kanyeshongo village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen came to a field near Kanyeshongo village, Rutshuru territory. The attackers kidnapped a 48-year-old man and took away a goat. They demanded a ransom of $ 7,000 for his release. The attackers left the hostage's grandson, so he could go and inform the other family members of the kidnapping.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped three MONUSCO agents at Shera village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped three MONUSCO agents at Shera village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded $60000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Twiganeho combattants shot and killed a 51-year-old man in Rubibi village, Uvira territory.
notes/en: Twiganeho combattants shot and killed a 51-year-old man in Rubibi village, Uvira territory. The victim was on his way to a field to collect food.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier killed one soldier and wounded another in the village of Miti in Kabare territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier killed one soldier and wounded another in the village of Miti in Kabare territory. This incident occurred when the injured soldier was arguing with his wife and his colleague wanted to intervene to separate them. At that point, another soldier arrived who fired at the two quarreling soldiers.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot dead a 37-year-old man in Biruma village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot dead a 37-year-old man in Biruma village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers fled after the crime.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a 39-year-old man from Burihira village in Rutshuru territory released the hostage after paying a ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a 39-year-old man from Burihira village in Rutshuru territory released the hostage after receiving a ransom.

title/0/en: Gunmen raided two houses in Mwanda village in Walungu territory during the night.
notes/en: Gunmen raided two houses in Mwanda village in Walungu territory during the night. The attackers shot and wounded a 56-year-old man. They looted money and property.

title/0/en: The hostage who had been abducted by four Mai-Mai Mazembe in Maboya locality in Beni territory escaped from his captors.
notes/en: The hostage who had been abducted by four Mai-Mai Mazembe in Maboya locality in Beni territory escaped from his captors.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Bwatsinge village in Lubero territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Bwatsinge village in Lubero territory during the night. The attackers shot and killed a 24-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Ludaha health center in Ludaha village in Kabare territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Ludaha health center in Ludaha village in Kabare territory during the night. The attackers looted money and destroyed the doors, windows and tables.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a few houses in the town of Kitchanga in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a few houses in the town of Kitchanga in Masisi territory. The attackers looted $90 and property. The FARDC arrived on the scene and exchanged fire with the attackers.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked Mai-Mai Malaika and Raia Mutomboki Makindu in Chabene village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked Mai-Mai Malaika and Raia Mutomboki Makindu in Chabene village in Shabunda territory. The rebels had raided the village to loot property. This clash left one dead among the FARDC. The attackers looted property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attempting to rob a shop in Majengo neighborhood in the city of Goma shot and wounded an 11-year-old girl.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attempting to rob a shop in Majengo neighborhood in the city of Goma shot and wounded an 11-year-old girl.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 62-year-old woman in the Pasisi neighborhood of Beni city.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 62-year-old woman in the Pasisi neighborhood of Beni city. The body of the victim was discovered with bullet wounds in her chest.

title/0/en: Four Mai-Mai Mazembe raided a house in Maboya village, in Beni territory.
notes/en: Four Mai-Mai Mazembe raided a house in Maboya village, in Beni territory. The attackers looted $15 and property. They kidnapped a man.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD, who had kidnapped eleven people near Chakayonza village in Rutshuru territory, released five of the eleven hostages after receiving a ransom of $750.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD, who had kidnapped eleven people near Chakayonza village in Rutshuru territory, released five of the eleven hostages after receiving a ransom of $750.

title/0/en: Police dispersed a demonstration by the population demanding the release of a kidnapped man from Burihira village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Police dispersed a demonstration by the population, which was demanding the release of a kidnapped man from Burihira village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kirikicho raped two women in the village of Kahunju in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kirikicho raped two women in the village of Kahunju in Walikale territory. The rapists fled into the bush.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Burihira village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Burihira village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers kidnapped a 39-year-old man. They demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a health center and four houses in Cikundushe village in Walungu territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a health center and four houses in Cikundushe village in Walungu territory during the night. The attackers raped three women and looted money, drugs and property.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in the village of Mambale in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in the village of Mambale in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Two men carrying crude weapons and firearms attacked an FARDC soldier and a policeman in charge of guarding the roadblock on the Butembo-Kyondo road in Kavingu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Two men carrying crude weapons and firearms attacked an FARDC soldier and a policeman in charge of guarding the roadblock on the Butembo-Kyondo road in Kavingu village in Beni territory. The injured FARDC soldier died of his injuries. The attackers stole an AK47 weapon.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD who had kidnapped eleven people near Chakayonza village in Rutshuru territory released six of the eleven hostage after receiving a ransom of $900.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD who had kidnapped eleven people near Chakayonza village in Rutshuru territory released six of the eleven hostage after receiving a ransom of $900.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi attacked the FARDC position in Bambu locality in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi attacked the FARDC position in Bambu village, Rutshuru territory. The FARDC repelled the attackers.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a 43-year-old man from Kivunge village, Rutshuru territory, released the hostage after a $ 1,300 ransom was paid.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a 43-year-old man from Kivunge village, Rutshuru territory, released the hostage after a $1,300 ransom was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position in the village of Mambale in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position in the village of Mambale, Beni territory. This clash resulted in a death toll of four assailants killed.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 4-year-old boy in Minova locality, Kalehe territory. The attackers demanded a ransom of $ 1,500 for the release of the hostage.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 4-year-old boy in Minova locality, Kalehe territory. The attackers demanded a ransom of $1,500 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 13-year-old boy in Minova locality, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 13-year-old boy in Minova locality, Kalehe territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $1,500.

title/0/en: FARDC based in Minova attacked FARDC soldiers who had come from Goma to extort goods from traders on Lake Kivu near Minova.
notes/en: FARDC based in Minova attacked FARDC soldiers who had come from Goma to extort goods from traders on Lake Kivu near Minova. The FARDC from Goma turned back.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Ngandu raided Mikobokobo village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Ngandu raided Mikobokobo village in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted money and property and kidnapped people.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Kitulu neighborhood, Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Kitulu neighborhood, Butembo town. The attackers shot and wounded a man and looted money and property. They also shot through the door of a shop, injuring another man in this shop.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted eight cows in Murambi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted eight cows in Murambi village in Kalehe territory. Of the eight cows stolen, six cows were found.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot at his wife in the Benengule neighborhood of Beni city.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot at his wife in the Benengule neighborhood of Beni city. The injured victim was admitted to the Beni Reference General Hospital for appropriate care. The soldier was arrested and received a life sentence.

title/0/en: A FARDC soldier stole fifteen phones from passersby in Butanuka district in Beni city.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier stole fifteen phones from passersby in Butanuka district in Beni city. Alerted by a one of the victims, the police on patrol arrested the perpetrator.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted $713 and property from passers-by near Ntando village, Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted $713 and property from passers-by near Ntando village, Walikale territory.

title/0/en: A driver and his two clients attacked the traffic police in the village of Minova in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: A driver and his two clients attacked the traffic police in the village of Minova in Kalehe territory. The incident occurred after the police demanded the driver give them money. The police and FARDC arrested three people. The police shot bullets in the air.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a 43-year-old man from Kivunge village, Rutshuru territory, as the victim was going to his field.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a 43-year-old man from Kivunge village, Rutshuru territory, as the victim was going to his field. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $ 5,000.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a motorcycle near the village of Tebero in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a motorcycle near the village of Tebero in Masisi territory. The robbers looted money and goods from the passengers.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD who kidnapped a 42-year-old man from Kinyandonyi village in Rutshuru territory released the hostage after paying a $ 30 ransom.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD who had kidnapped a 42-year-old man from Kinyandonyi village in Rutshuru territory released the hostage after receiving a $30 ransom.

title/0/en: The CNRD abducted two boys aged 17 and 19, respectively, from their home in Kabumba village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers killed the hostages in the bush.
notes/en: The CNRD abducted two boys aged 17 and 19, respectively, from their home in Kabumba village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers killed the hostages in the bush.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a man near the village of Karton in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a man near the village of Karton in Masisi territory. The killers threw the body of the victim into the Osso River. The body of the victim was discovered in a state of advanced decomposition.

title/0/en: Les FDLR-RUD ont kidnapp un homme g de 42 ans au village de Kinyandonyi en territoire de Rutshuru.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped a 42-year-old man from Kinyandonyi village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The population rose up against the police who were harassing the women who sell goods on the streets in the Ndendere district of Bukavu.
notes/en: The population rose up against the police who were harassing the women who sell goods on the streets in the Ndendere district of Bukavu. The police had just injured a woman. The altercation between the police and the population left three policemen wounded.

title/0/en: Police wounded a woman when they were evicting street vendors from the streets in the Ndendere district of Bukavu.
notes/en: Police wounded a woman when they were evicting street vendors from the streets in the Ndendere district of Bukavu.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kikwama attacked the FARDC position in the village of Swiza in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kikwama attacked the FARDC position in the village of Swiza in Shabunda territory. This attack killed one FARDC soldier and two civilians.

title/0/en: A Raia Mutomboki Butachibera combatant tortured and wounded a 38-year-old man in the village of Mirenzo in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: A Raia Mutomboki Butachibera combatant tortured and wounded a 38-year-old man in the village of Mirenzo in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi attacked the FARDC position in Bambu locality in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi attacked the FARDC position in Bambu locality in Rutshuru territory. The FARDC repelled the attackers.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon and the Mapenzi group attacked the APCLS position in the village of Kilambo in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon and the Mapenzi group attacked the APCLS position in the village of Kilambo in Walikale territory. The NDC Guidon and the Mapenzi group chased the APCLS from this village and the surrounding area.

title/0/en: The FARDC arrested a combatant Raia Mutomboki Butachibera in the village of Mirenzo in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The FARDC arrested a Raia Mutomboki Butachibera combatant in the village of Mirenzo, Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Three unidentified men attempted to assault a policeman in Ramba village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified men attempted to assault a policeman in Ramba village in Kalehe territory. The policeman threw a grenade which wounded a policeman, an ANR agent and a civilian.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a gold trading shop in the Panzi district of the city of Bukavu.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a gold trading shop in the Panzi district of the city of Bukavu. The assailants shot a 43-year-old man. They took money, gold and telephones.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a 13-year-old girl by hanging in Mambango neighborhood in Beni city.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a 13-year-old girl by hanging in Mambango neighborhood in Beni city. The tied body of the victim was found in the bushes.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen slaughtered a 68-year-old woman in her field in the Sayo neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen slaughtered a 68-year-old woman in her field in the Sayo neighborhood of Beni town.

title/0/en: FARDC detainees held in a jail in Kashwa village in Rutshuru territory tortured a 42-year-old man arrested for investigation.
notes/en: FARDC detainees held in a jail in Kashwa village in Rutshuru territory tortured a 42-year-old man arrested for investigation. The tortured victim succumbed to his injuries.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked FARDC positions at the Boikene district in the town of Beni.
notes/en: The ADF attacked FARDC positions at the Boikene district in the town of Beni. The FARDC, supported by the Tanzanian contingent of MONUSCO, pushed the attackers out of town. This attack left one FARDC soldier dead and a civilian wounded. The assailants looted money, a TV, two batteries, sixteen chickens, two suitcases of clothes, three cans, three pots, and two bags of peanuts

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attempted to rob a motorcycle near the village of Rubona in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attempted to rob a motorcycle near the village of Rubona in Rutshuru territory. The attackers fired in the driver's direction because the driver had accelerated. They injured a 35-year-old man.

title/0/en: The CNRD abducted an 18-year-old girl and killed her near the village of Buhambira in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The CNRD abducted an 18-year-old girl and killed her near the village of Buhambira in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Ugandan soldiers from the UPDF fired on Congolese fishermen on Lake Edward near Kyavinyonge town, Beni territory.
notes/en: Ugandan soldiers from the UPDF fired on Congolese fishermen on Lake Edward near Kyavinyonge town, Beni territory. This incident resulted in the death of thirteen Congolese fishermen. The Ugandan military also arrested other fishermen.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who abducted a man from the village of Michaele have released the hostage following police intervention.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who abducted a man from the village of Michaele released the hostage following police intervention.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped seven men, three women and a 16-year-old girl on their way back from their fields near Chakayonza village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped seven men, three women and a 16-year-old girl on their way back from their fields near Chakayonza village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers raped the three women and the 16-year-old girl. They demanded a ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Maria Health Centre and the CERPI BETHEL church office in the Nkafu district of Bukavu during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Maria Health Centre and the CERPI BETHEL church office in the Nkafu district of Bukavu during the night. The assailants looted $466, nine phones and medicine.

title/0/en: Three unidentified armed men raided a house in the Kasenga district of Uvira, a rural commune.
notes/en: Three unidentified armed men raided a house in the Kasenga district of Uvira, a rural commune. The assailants shot and killed a 31-year-old woman.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a 49-year-old man returning from his field near the village of Muumba in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a 49-year-old man returning from his field near the village of Muumba in Kalehe territory. The victim was admitted to a health center to be treated.

title/0/en: UPDF soldiers carried out a raid into Congolese territory on Lake Edward near Kyavinyonge in Beni territory.
notes/en: UPDF soldiers carried out a raid into Congolese territory on Lake Edward near Kyavinyonge in Beni territory. The military arrested Congolese fishermen and seized their nets and fish. After they opened fire on FARDC soldiers who had come to negotiate, the FARDC fought back by firing an RPG at the Ugandan military boat. The clash left five UPDF soldiers and three Ugandan fishermen dead and one FARDC soldier and a Congolese fisherman injured.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo UPLC attacked the FARDC position in the village of Kanyihunga in the territory of Beni.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo UPLC attacked the FARDC position in the village of Kanyihunga in the territory of Beni. The FARDC killed three Mai-Mai.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a FARDC soldier in the Majengo neighborhood of Goma town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a FARDC soldier in the Majengo neighborhood of Goma town.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the village of Michaele in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the village of Michaele in Masisi territory. The assailants abducted a 39-year-old man. The police intervened and clashed with the kidnappers. The police captured an assailant.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position in the village of Kalyatsuki Mwalika in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position in the village of Kalyatsuki Mwalika in Beni territory. The FARDC killed five assailants.

title/0/en: A police officer tortured and injured a 25-year-old man in Chambombo village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: A police officer tortured and injured a 25-year-old man in Chambombo village, Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a policeman returning home to the village of Kinigi in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a policeman returning home to the village of Kinigi in Masisi territory. The assailants took the policeman's weapon.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 41-year-old man from Kamatare village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 41-year-old man from Kamatare village in Kalehe territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $25,000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attempted to rob a motorcycle near the village of Buhambira in Rutshuru territory
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attempted to rob a motorcycle near the village of Buhambira in Rutshuru territory. When the driver accelerated, the assailants fired on the bike. They injured a man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a man in the village of Buzambya in Nyiragongo territory released the hostage after ransom payment.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a man in the village of Buzambya in Nyiragongo territory released the hostage after a ransom payment.

title/0/en: The FDLR-FOCA attacked the police in the village of Rusayo in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-FOCA attacked the police in the village of Rusayo in Nyiragongo territory. The incident took place following the police arrest of a former FDLR-FOCA combattant.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men who were attempting to loot cows from a ranch in the village of Kitemesho in Uvira territory
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men who were attempting to loot cows from a ranch in the village of Kitemesho in Uvira territory. The FARDC pursued the assailants.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mabala raided the village of Nyombe in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mabala raided the village of Nyombe in Shabunda territory. The assailants killed a 39-year-old man. They looted money and goods.

title/0/en: The FDP Nyatura ambushed an FARDC convoy escorting prisoners near the village of Bisoko in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDP Nyatura ambushed an FARDC convoy escorting prisoners near the village of Bisoko in Rutshuru territory. This clash killed an FARDC soldier and wounded another.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the village of Buzambya in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the village of Buzambya in Nyiragongo territory. The attackers looted property. The attackers attacked the FARDC who came to the rescue of the population. They killed an FARDC soldier and his wife. They also kidnapped a man.

title/0/en: Men carrying knives and guns raided a house in the Lumumba neighborhood of Butembo town during the night.
notes/en: Men carrying knives and guns raided a house in the Lumumba neighborhood of Butembo town during the night. The attackers stabbed a man with a knife. They stole money and property.

title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men abducted a 53-year-old man from the village of Simba in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men abducted a 53-year-old man from Simba village, Uvira territory.

title/0/en: Two armed men, one of them dressed in police attire, raided the night in a house in the Ngongolio district in the town of Beni.
notes/en: Two armed men, one of them dressed in police attire, raided the night in a house in the Ngongolio district in the town of Beni. The assailants looted $900.

title/0/en: Unidentified men raped and killed a 17-year-old girl in the Vighole neighborhood in Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified men raped and killed a 17-year-old girl in the Vighole neighborhood in Butembo town. The attackers threw the body of the victim into the Mususa River.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a FUSO brand vehicle near the village of Kilibiri in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a FUSO brand vehicle near the village of Kilibiri in Masisi territory. The FARDC soldiers who were aboard this vehicle opened fire and killed an assailant. The FARDC recovered the assailant's weapon.

title/0/en: Men carrying knives raided a house in Majengo village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Men carrying knives raided a house in Majengo village in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted money and a phone.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the COOPADE facilities and a household in the village of Kisunga in Beni territory. The assailants looted money, two batteries, solar panels and telephones.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the COOPADE compound and a household in the village of Kisunga in Beni territory. The assailants looted money, two batteries, solar panels and telephones.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Guides-MAC raided the villages of Chumbawamba and Brazza in Walikale territory. The assailants took out seven goats.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Guides-MAC raided the villages of Chumbawamba and Brazza in Walikale territory. The assailants took seven goats.

title/0/en: The Twiganeho, reportedly allied with the Ngumino and RNC, counter-attacked the Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke in the village of Kagogo in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Twiganeho, reportedly allied with the Ngumino and RNC, counter-attacked the Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke in the village of Kagogo in Uvira territory. The Twiganeho and their allies pushed the Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke back to the villages of Lubakakya, Elemamba and Atengya. The Twiganeho and their allies set fire to houses in these villages.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke attacked the Twiganeho coalition with the Ngumino and the RNC in the village of Kagogo in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke attacked the Twiganeho coalition with the Ngumino and the RNC in the village of Kagogo in Uvira territory. After chasing away the Twiganeho and their allies, the Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke burned down houses and took away cattle.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the office of the 8th CEPAC church in Kanyunyi village in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted $ 232 and a battery.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the office of the 8th CEPAC church in Kanyunyi village in Kalehe territory. The attackers stole $232 and a battery.

title/0/en: The police dispersed a peaceful march organized by the militants of the LUCHA in rural commune of Kasinda.
notes/en: The police dispersed a peaceful march organized by members of LUCHA in the rural commune of Kasinda. The police arrested sixteen militants. The demonstrators protested against the use of the voting machine in the elections of 23 December 2018.

title/0/en: The APCLS attacked the position of the NDC Guidon and the Mapenzi Group in the village of Manyema in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The APCLS attacked the position of the NDC Guidon and the Mapenzi Group in the village of Manyema in Walikale territory. This clash left seven dead in the ranks of the NDC Guidon and Mapenzi group.

title/0/en: After bandits looted the village of Kabanda in Rutshuru territory, youths who were chasing the looters were attacked by the FARDC who had come to hunt the looters.
notes/en: After bandits looted the village of Kabanda in Rutshuru territory, youths who were chasing the looters were attacked by the FARDC who had come to hunt the looters. The FARDC killed a 21-year-old man and wounded a 25-year-old.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men looted property in Kibingu village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men looted property in Kibingu village, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Walike and Mabala robbed a convoy of the NGO ACTED in Ikeke village, Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Walike and Mabala robbed a convoy of the NGO ACTED in Ikeke village, Shabunda territory. The assailants looted money and telephones.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a man in Buhumba village in Nyiragongo territory released the hostage.
notes/en: The unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a man in Buhumba village in Nyiragongo territory released the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 24-year-old man in Muhanga village in Rutshuru territory with a crude weapon.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 24-year-old man in Muhanga village in Rutshuru territory with a crude weapon. The victim's body was found in a field.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Walike and Raia Mutomboki Ngandu, who forced 20 men to carry looted goods to Myangati and Nyakavunga villages in Shabunda territory, released the captured hostages and policemen.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Walike and Raia Mutomboki Ngandu, who had forced 20 men to carry looted goods to Myangati and Nyakavunga villages in Shabunda territory, released the captured hostages and policemen.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Buhumba village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Buhumba village in Nyiragongo territory. The attackers shot and wounded a man. They also kidnapped a man.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a 40-year-old man in the village of Kitsimba in Beni territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a 40-year-old man in the village of Kitsimba in Beni territory. The FARDC soldier demanded money from the victim, but he had nothing to give.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the FDLR-FOCA who had just looted two goats in Kako village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the FDLR-FOCA who had just looted two goats in Kako village in Rutshuru territory. The FARDC chased away the attackers.

title/0/en: The FDLR-FOCA raided Kako village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-FOCA raided Kako village in Rutshuru territory. They looted two goats.

title/0/en: The Nyatura FDP wounded by white weapon a man aged 36 years in the village of Nkokwe in the territory of Rutshuru.
notes/en: The Nyatura FDP wounded a man of 36 years with the crude weapon in the village of Nkokwe, territory of Rutshuru.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Walike and Ngandu raided the villages of Myangati and Nyakavunga in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Walike and Ngandu raided the villages of Myangati and Nyakavunga in Shabunda territory. The attackers captured several police officers. They tortured and injured police and civilians. They stole five goats, eight ducks and other property. The attackers forced twenty people to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: The NIEA looted money and property from a trader near the village of Malemo in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The CNRD looted money and property from a trader near the village of Malemo in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided two houses in Ndendere neighborhood in Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided two houses in Ndendere neighborhood in Bukavu town. The attackers looted $210, two televisions, six telephones, three jackets and four shoes.

title/0/en: Two armed men on motorbikes fired on FARDC soldiers in custody of a colonel in Matanda district in Butembo town.
notes/en: Two armed men on motorbikes fired at FARDC soldiers who had been arrested and were in the custody of a colonel in Matanda district in Butembo town. They injured an FARDC soldier.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the village of Musimba in Lubero territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in the village of Musimba in Lubero territory during the night. The attackers shot and wounded two men and one woman.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Nkafu neighborhood in Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Nkafu neighborhood in Bukavu town. The attackers looted money and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed four AAA vehicles near Kimoka village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed four AAA vehicles near Kimoka village in Masisi territory. The attackers shot and wounded three men. They looted money and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a 38-year-old man from Rutsiro village in Rutshiro territory released the hostage.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a 38-year-old man from Rutsiro village in Rutshiro territory released the hostage.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen raided a house in Rutsiro village in Rutshuru territory during the night.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen raided a house in Rutsiro village in Rutshuru territory during the night. The attackers abducted a 38-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Cizi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Cizi village in Kalehe territory. The attackers fired a shot in the head of a 56-year-old man. The victim succumbed to his injuries at Ihusi Hospital.

title/0/en: A FARDC military police officer fired on his colleague at Kasando military camp in rural Kirumba commune.
notes/en: A FARDC military police officer fired on his colleague at Kasando military camp in rural Kirumba commune. The victim died on the spot.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kirikicho raped three women aged 18, 23 and 27 respectively in the village of Kilambo in the territory of Walikale.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kirikicho raped three women aged 18, 23 and 27, respectively, in the village of Kilambo in the territory of Walikale.

title/0/en: CNRD stabbed to death a 31-year-old man in Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: CNRD stabbed to death a 31-year-old man in Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory. The victim was going to the Katsiru Institute where he was teaching.

title/0/en: A Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo fighter who wanted to return home stabbed his wife in Kambale village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: A Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo fighter who was returning home stabbed his wife in Kambale village, Kalehe territory. He accused his wife of taking another husband. After the attack, he returned to the bush.

title/0/en: Nyatura Kavumbi attacked other the Nyatura Mudogo at Rwankeri village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Nyatura Kavumbi attacked other the Nyatura Mudogo at Rwankeri village in Masisi territory. The population fled from the village.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Vighole neighborhood in Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Vighole neighborhood in Butembo town. The attackers injured three officials at the Kasumbira toll booth on the road. They stole $27, three phones and a rabbit.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD who kidnapped three men at Rwindi village in Rutshuru territory released the hostages after paying a ransom of $1,500.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD who kidnapped three men at Rwindi village in Rutshuru territory released the hostages after paying a ransom of $1,500. The hostages were construction workers fixing the road.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD who had kidnapped a 41-year-old man near Muserege village in Rutshuru territory released the hostage after receiving a $1,000 ransom.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD who had kidnapped a 41-year-old man near Muserege village in Rutshuru territory released the hostage after receiving a $1,000 ransom.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded two men aged 23 and 24, respectively, in a bar in Numbi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded two men aged 23 and 24, respectively, in a bar in Numbi village in Kalehe territory. The drunk soldier had had shot his gun inadvertently.

title/0/en: The FARDC captured a Nyatura Kalume close to Lumbishi village in Kalehe territory. The FARDC seized his weapon.
notes/en: The FARDC captured a Nyatura Kalume close to Lumbishi village in Kalehe territory. The FARDC seized his weapon.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked policemen patrolling Rombe I neighborhood of Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked policemen patrolling Rombe I neighborhood of Uvira rural commune. The policemen supported by the FARDC killed one of the assailants. The police seized the killed assailant's weapon.

title/0/en: The Mapenzi Group attacked the APCLS position in Lwibo village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The Mapenzi Group attacked the APCLS position in Lwibo village in Masisi territory. The clash left four dead and six wounded in the ranks of the Mapenzi group.

title/0/en: The APCLS attacked armed men identified as Nyatura Bavuga in Kyekire village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The APCLS attacked armed men identified as Nyatura Bavuga in Kyekire village in Masisi territory. The APCLS killed a member of this newly-formed armed group.

title/0/en: Nyatura Jean-Marie looted 26 cows on a farm in Lwama village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Nyatura Jean-Marie looted 26 cows on a farm in Lwama village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe killed an ANR agent in a drinking establishment in the village of Mambale in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe killed an ANR agent in a bar in the village of Mambale in Beni territory.

title/0/en: CNRD raided Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory during the night.
notes/en: CNRD raided Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory during the night. Following an outcry, the attackers fired at random into the houses, killing a 29-year-old woman and her six-year-old child.

title/0/en: Following FARDC bombing of suspected ADF positions, the kidnappers released three hostages close to Mayi-Safi village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Following FARDC bombing of suspected ADF positions, the kidnappers released three hostages close to Mayi-Safi village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles attacked the FARDC position in the village of Kafunzo in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles attacked the FARDC position in the village of Kafunzo in Rutshuru territory. The Mai-Mai Charles killed sixteen FARDC soldiers and took their weapons and ammunition.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped a 41-year-old man on the Kinyandonyi-Busanza road near the village of Muserege in Rutshuru territory
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped a 41-year-old man on the Kinyandonyi-Busanza road near the village of Muserege in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers also took $84 and two phones. They demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The CNRD killed a 43-year-old man in Kalembe village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The CNRD killed a 43-year-old man in Kalembe village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the compound of Mabula Primary School and the 55th CBCE church office in Cibira village in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the compound of Mabula Primary School and the 55th CBCE church office in Cibira village in Kalehe territory during the night. The attackers looted money, a computer and other property.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke attacked the Twiganeho and Ngumino who were burning down houses in the villages of Nyogomberwa, Runywera, Bijingi, Namurambagira in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke attacked the Twiganeho and Ngumino who were burning down houses in the villages of Nyogomberwa, Runywera, Bijingi, Namurambagira in Uvira territory. The Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke chased the Twiganeho and Ngumino from these villages.

title/0/en: Twiganeho and Ngumino raided the villages of Nyogomberwa, Runywera, Bijingi, Namurambagira in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Twiganeho and Ngumino raided the villages of Nyogomberwa, Runywera, Bijingi, Namurambagira in Uvira territory. The attackers burned down 80 houses.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a 29-year-old man in the Majengo neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a 29-year-old man in the Majengo neighborhood of Goma.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen raided a house in Mishuli village in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen raided a house in Mishuli village in Kalehe territory during the night. The attackers raped a 28-year-old woman. The victim was admitted for treatment in a health facility in Tushunguti village.

title/0/en: The CNRD arrested three young boys aged 17, 20 and 24, respectively, in Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory and took them to their camp.
notes/en: The CNRD arrested three young boys aged 17, 20 and 24, respectively, in Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory and took them to their camp. The CNRD then stabbed them to death.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed an Isuzu vehicle near Nyamoma village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed an Isuzu vehicle near Nyamoma village in Uvira territory. The attackers abducted two men, aged 36 and 48, respectively.

title/0/en: Following the kidnapping of three men in Kayna rural commune, the hostages' family members handed over the first tranche of the ransom of $1,200.
notes/en: Following the kidnapping of three men in Kayna rural commune, the hostages' family members handed over the first tranche of the ransom of $1,200. While they were handing over the second tranche the FARDC opened fire at the kidnappers. The hostages escaped into the Virunga park. The FARDC released the three hostages.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Wemba and Mabala raided Kakongya village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Wemba and Mabala raided Kakongya village in Shabunda territory. The assailants stole $151, livestock and goods.

title/0/en: The 45-year-old man abducted the previous day by four unidentified gunmen at Nyawaronga village in Kalehe territory escaped from his captors.
notes/en: The 45-year-old man abducted the previous day by four unidentified gunmen at Nyawaronga village in Kalehe territory escaped from his captors.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed the FARDC escorting civilians to gather the bodies of three people killed in Mayangose in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed the FARDC escorting civilians to gather the bodies of three people killed in Mayangose in Beni territory. The delegation was forced to turn back.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a policeman in Burungu village in Masisi territory as the victim was returning from work.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a policeman in Burungu village in Masisi territory as the victim was returning from work.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed a motorcycle transporting an FARDC soldier close to Chamiloge village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed a motorcycle transporting an FARDC soldier close to Chamiloge village in Kalehe territory. The assailants shot and killed the driver who was driving the motorcycle and injured the FARDC soldier.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Vunja Vikwazo raided the village of Mitala in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Vunja Vikwazo raided the village of Mitala in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted money, livestock and property. They forced five men to carry looted goods.

title/0/en: Armed men wearing military uniforms broke into two houses in the Kitulu neighborhood of Butembo.
notes/en: Armed men wearing military uniforms broke into two houses in the Kitulu neighborhood of Butembo. The assailants shot and wounded two men. They looted money and goods.

title/0/en: Men carrying knives raided the home of an FARDC soldier in Kanzulinzuli neighborhood in Beni city.
notes/en: Men carrying knives raided the home of an FARDC soldier in Kanzulinzuli neighborhood in Beni city. The FARDC soldier and his colleague shot back. The attackers fled.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a Rwandan woman close to Vubiro village in Nyiragonongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a Rwandan woman close to Vubiro village in Nyiragonongo territory. The victim's dead body was found close to the DRC-Rwanda border.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen raided a farm in Nyawaronga village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen raided a farm in Nyawaronga village in Kalehe territory. The attackers abducted a 45-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed two men and a woman in Mayangose village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed two men and a woman in Mayangose village in Beni territory. The bodies of victims were found by farmers.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Shalio looted traders' goods near the village of Bunyamwirimbwa in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Shalio looted traders' goods near the village of Bunyamwirimbwa in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: Armed men wearing military uniforms broke into a house in the Vutetse neighborhood of Butembo during the night.
notes/en: Armed men wearing military uniforms broke into a house in the Vutetse neighborhood of Butembo during the night. The assailants shot and killed a 24-year-old man and wounded a woman. They looted money.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen fired into a house through a window in Rumangabo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen fired into a house through a window in Rumangabo village in Rutshuru territory. The bullets hit a 29-year-old woman who died of her injuries.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kasenyi village in Nyiragongo territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kasenyi village in Nyiragongo territory during the night. The assailants shot a man. The victim died from his injuries.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed an FARDC convoy in the Boikene neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed an FARDC convoy in the Boikene neighborhood of Beni. Two FARDC soldiers were killed during the ambush.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier broke into the Regideso (public water company) office in the Matonge neighborhood of Beni during the night.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier broke into the Regideso (public water company) office in the Matonge neighborhood of Beni during the night. The soldier destroyed the documents he found in the office.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Nyerere who abducted a 24-year-old man close to Kiliba rural commune in Uvira territory released the hostage.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Nyerere who abducted a 24-year-old man close to Kiliba rural commune in Uvira territory released the hostage.

title/0/en: The three unidentified armed men who kidnapped a 5-year-old boy in Ntamugenga village in Rutshuru territory released the hostage after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: The three unidentified armed men who kidnapped a 5-year-old boy in Ntamugenga village in Rutshuru territory released the hostage after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men who kidnapped a 42-year-old man close to Rwampisi village in Rutshuru territory released the hostage after a ransom of $500 was paid.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men who kidnapped a 42-year-old man close to Rwampisi village in Rutshuru territory released the hostage after a ransom of $500 was paid.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe ambushed an FARDC convoy in Kalunguta village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe ambushed an FARDC convoy in Kalunguta village in Beni territory. The FARDC convoy was moving from Butembo to Beni. Five FARDC soldiers were injured during the ambush.

title/0/en: Five unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a woman and a boy in Kahunga village in Rutshuru territory released the hostages after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: Five unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a woman and a boy in Kahunga village in Rutshuru territory released the hostages after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle in Mapera concession in Kayna rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle in Mapera concession in Kayna rural commune. The assailants kidnapped three men and left the motorcycle driver.  The kidnappers demanded a ransom to release the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot a taxi driver close to Shanje village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot a taxi driver close to Shanje village in Kalehe territory. The assailants injured the victim in the thigh.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into five houses in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into five houses in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu during the night. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the NDC Sheka position in Kangera village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the NDC Sheka position in Kangera village in Walikale territory. Four NDC Sheka and one NDC Guidon combatants were killed and one NDC Guidon combatant was injured during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Minova village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Minova village in Kalehe territory. The assailants injured a 36-year-old man and his wife. They looted goods.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a man close to Mutarule II village in Uvira territory released the hostage after a ransom of $400 was paid.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a man close to Mutarule II village in Uvira territory released the hostage after a ransom of $400 was paid.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin shot and killed one of the two Mai-Mai Shalio captured during the clash between the two factions close to Kahunju village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin shot and killed one of the two Mai-Mai Shalio captured during the clash between the two factions close to Kahunju village in Walikale territory. The incident happened as the Mai-Mai Shalio combatant tried to escape.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the FARDC patrolling the "Uni" mining site in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the FARDC patrolling the "Uni" mining site in Walikale territory. One NDC Guidon and two civilians were injured during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen tried to hold up a mini bus close to Mighobwe village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen tried to hold up a mini bus close to Mighobwe village in Lubero territory. Three FARDC soldiers who were in the mini bus fired back. An exchange of fire followed. An FARDC soldier was injured during the shooting.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into an Airtel money shop in the Katindo neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into an Airtel money shop in the Katindo neighborhood of Goma. The assailants shot and wounded a man and stole money.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men arrested a policewoman at her home entrance as she was returning from the market in the Buturande neighborhood of Kiwanja rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men arrested a policewoman at her home entrance as she was returning from the market in the Buturande neighborhood of Kiwanja rural commune. Alerted by the noise the policewoman's husband, who is a policeman himself, shot bullets in the air. The assailants captured the policewoman.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Shalio attacked the Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin position in Kahunju village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Shalio attacked the Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin position in Kahunju village in Walikale territory. The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin captured two Mai-Mai Shalio.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi held up two motorcycles close to Karton village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi held up two motorcycles close to Karton village in Masisi territory. The assailants looted passangers' money and goods.

title/0/en: The policemen tortured and injured a 32-year-old man in Chadoto village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The policemen tortured and injured a 32-year-old man in Chadoto village in Kalehe territory. The victim was hospitalized for treatment.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who abducted a man in Kyaramba village in Lubero territory released him after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: The kidnappers who abducted a man in Kyaramba village in Lubero territory released him after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles who kidnapped 30 fishermen on Lake Edward close to Tshanika and Ndwali villages released the hostages after a ransom of $300 was paid.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles who kidnapped 30 fishermen on Lake Edward close to Tshanika and Ndwali villages released the hostages after a ransom of $300 was paid.

title/0/en: APCLS combatants attacked unidentified gunmen in Ngingwe village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: APCLS combatants attacked unidentified gunmen in Ngingwe village in Masisi territory. The assailants shot and killed a 12-year-old girl during the battle.
The FDLR-RUD broke into a house in Mufurege village in Rutshuru territory during the night. The assailants shot and killed a 25-year-old man.

title/0/en: FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen in Bwasa village of Uvira territory.
notes/en: FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen in Bwasa village of Uvira territory. The FARDC killed two gunmen and captured another. The FARDC recovered two weapons.

title/0/en: Three unidentified armed men broke into a house in Bukuta village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified armed men broke into a house in Bukuta village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants woke up the targeted person and shot her. The person died on the spot.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a Toyota Probox vehicle near the village of Rutemba in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a Toyota Probox vehicle near the village of Rutemba in Uvira territory. The attackers looted money and property. These assailants also attacked the FARDC who were trying to help the victims of the looting. During the fighting, they killed a FARDC soldier.

title/0/en: Five unidentified gunmen broke into a field in Kahunga village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Five unidentified gunmen broke into a field in Kahunga village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants killed a 24-year-old man among those who were running away. The assailants kidnapped a woman and a 12-year-old boy. They raped the woman and demanded a ransom to release the hostages.

title/0/en: Following a conflict between families over the control of a mining site, armed men close to one of the families shot and killed a woman and a man.
notes/en: Following a conflict between families over the control of a mining site, armed men close to one of the families shot and killed a woman and a man.

title/0/en: The FARDC shot and killed a man detained in the "DFS" jail in Cit-Belge neighborhood in Beni town when the detainee tried to escape.
notes/en: The FARDC shot and killed a man detained in the "DFS" jail in Cit-Belge neighborhood in Beni town when the detainee tried to escape. The victim had attempted to strangle an FARDC soldier in order to rob him of his weapon.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a hotel looking for the hotel manager in Karhanda village in Kabare territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a hotel looking for the hotel manager in Karhanda village in Kabare territory during the night. As they could not find him, the assailants stole $169, two mattresses, clothes and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a 42-year-old man close to Rwampisi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a 42-year-old man close to Rwampisi village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers injured the hostage. They demanded a ransom of $2,000.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Burambo village in Nyiragongo territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Burambo village in Nyiragongo territory during the night. The assailants looted goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed two young men aged 16 and 18, respectively, in Bubanga I village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed two young men aged 16 and 18, respectively, in Bubanga I village in Rutshuru territory. The incident took place close to an FARDC camp.

title/0/en: The FARDC arrested a 30-year-old man in Kigarama village in Rutshuru territory as they suspected him of being a collaborator of the Nyatura.
notes/en: The FARDC arrested a 30-year-old man in Kigarama village in Rutshuru territory as they suspected him of being a collaborator of the Nyatura. Not having enough evidence, the FARDC commander ordered his release. The FARDC who were in charge of his release shot him in his leg. The victim died from his injuries.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Ntamugenga village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Ntamugenga village in Rutshuru territory. Having missed the house owner, the assailants kidnapped his 5-year-old child and demanded a ransom of $3,000.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier deployed to protect a military magistrate shot and killed a 30-year-old man as the victim was climbing a wall in the Malepe neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier deployed to protect a military magistrate shot and killed a 30-year-old man as the victim was climbing a wall in the Malepe neighborhood of Beni. The victim was a known thief.

title/0/en: Residents attempted to stone a man who allegedly murdered a woman in Misinga village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Residents attempted to stone a man who allegedly murdered a woman in Misinga village, Kalehe territory.
