Alerted, the police intervened, arresting the accused person and dispersing the angry crowd that had started to attack the police. Some police officers and civilians were injured during this altercation.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin in Brazza village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin in Brazza village in Walikale territory. The FARDC pushed the Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin out of the village.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a FUSO vehicle close to Rudahira village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a FUSO vehicle close to Rudahira village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants abducted the vehicle's driver.

title/0/en: Six unidentified gunmen robbed a Land Cruiser jeep and ten motorbikes near Kamba village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Six unidentified gunmen robbed a Land Cruiser jeep and ten motorbikes near Kamba village in Uvira territory. The attackers stole money and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a girl in Kibumba village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a girl in Kibumba village in Nyiragongo territory. The victim's body was found by the population.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Kyanzaba village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Kyanzaba village in Beni territory. The assailants stole $380.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Brazza village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Brazza village in Masisi territory. The assailants shot and killed a man and his wife.

title/0/en: The FARDC shelled the alleged ADF positions in Mamundioma village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC shelled the positions of alleged ADF in Mamundioma village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: During the bombing of suspected ADF positions in Mamundioma village in Beni territory, two women taken hostages by the ADF managed to escape from their kidnappers.
notes/en: During the bombing of suspected ADF positions in Mamundioma village in Beni territory, two women taken hostages by the ADF managed to escape from their kidnappers.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi who kidnapped a woman and her two children in Mulimbi village in Rutshuru territory, released the hostages after a ransom of $200 was paid.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi who kidnapped a woman and her two children in Mulimbi village in Rutshuru territory, released the hostages after a ransom of $200 was paid.

title/0/en: Ten armed men dressed in military uniform broke into a farm in Kasanga neighborhood in Beni town in search of the owner.
notes/en: Ten armed men dressed in military uniform broke into a farm in Kasanga neighborhood in Beni town in search of the owner. Having missed him, the attackers took away the herdsman's phone.

title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Songo neighborhood of Uvira.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Songo neighborhood of Uvira. The assailants shot and killed a 61-year-old man.

title/0/en: Eleven men wearing military uniforms abducted a man in Mulingo village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Eleven men wearing military uniforms abducted a man in Mulingo village in Beni territory. The kidnappers did not demand a ransom.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin shot and killed a Mai-Mai Shalio fighter who was treated for injuries at a health center in Nyamimba village, Walikale territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin shot and killed a Mai-Mai Shalio fighter who was treated for injuries at a health center in Nyamimba village, Walikale territory.

title/0/en: The Twiganeho killed a woman and a child close to Mugogo village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Twiganeho killed a woman and a child close to Mugogo village in Uvira territory. The victims belong to the Fuliru community.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into several houses in the Rughenda neighborhood of Butembo during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into several houses in the Rughenda neighborhood of Butembo during the night. The assailants looted money and goods. They injured a man and a woman.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi raided Mulimbi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi raided Mulimbi village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants kidnapped a woman and her two children as the person they were looking forher husbandhad just ran away. They stole three sheep. They demanded a ransom of $200 to release the kidnapped people.

title/0/en: A police patrol attacked armed men who were robbing houses in the Mutiri neighborhood of Butembo.
notes/en: A police patrol attacked armed men who were robbing houses in the Mutiri neighborhood of Butembo. One armed man was killed during the shooting. The police seized an AK47 weapon, two motorcycles and goods.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Vunja Vikwazo combatants raided Ngolombe village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Vunja Vikwazo combatants raided Ngolombe village in Shabunda territory. The assailants stole two motorcycles, six telephones and other goods. They kidnapped six men.

title/0/en: Four unidentified armed men kidnapped a man close to Mutarule II village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified armed men kidnapped a man close to Mutarule II village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers tortured the hostage and demanded a ransom of $5,000 to release him.

title/0/en: Unidentified men who kidnapped a 48-year-old man in Munigi village in Nyiragongo territory killed the hostage.
notes/en: Unidentified men who kidnapped a 48-year-old man in Munigi village in Nyiragongo territory killed the hostage. The population looking for the hostage found the victim's dead body.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a man in Kyaramba village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a man in Kyaramba village in Lubero territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $500.

title/0/en: During the clash opposing the Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke and the Twiganeho in Kiziba village in Uvira territory, the FARDC intervened between the opponents.
notes/en: During the clash opposing the Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke and the Twiganeho in Kiziba village in Uvira territory, the FARDC intervened between the opponents. One FARDC died and four were injured during the clash.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men stole 45 cows in Rulimbi village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men stole 45 cows in Rulimbi village in Uvira territory. The assailants held up the shepherds before stealing the cows.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men looted money and goods from people at the ITAV concession in the Vutsundo neighborhood of Butembo.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men looted money and goods from people at the ITAV concession in the Vutsundo neighborhood of Butembo. One of the victims was injured while running away.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 37-year-old woman who was returning from a pharmacy in the Kasenga neighborhood of Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 37-year-old woman who was returning from a pharmacy in the Kasenga neighborhood of Uvira rural commune.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Nduma village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Nduma village in Walikale territory. The assailants stole $303, ten goats, twenty chickens and other goods. They forced five men to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: A policeman shot at his female colleague claiming she lacked respect for their commander during an dispute over a vehicle in Rubumba village in Walungu territory.
notes/en: A policeman shot at his female colleague claiming she lacked respect for their commander during an dispute over a vehicle in Rubumba village in Walungu territory. The bullet hit the police commander who died on the spot.

title/0/en: Four armed men wearing military uniforms broke into a trader's house in Karuni village in Walungu territory during the night.
notes/en: Four armed men wearing military uniforms broke into a trader's house in Karuni village in Walungu territory during the night. The assailants stole $303 and goods.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi attacked FARDC soldiers who were at their patrolling post in Katendere village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi attacked FARDC soldiers who were manning a guard post in Katendere village in Rutshuru territory. The Nyatura killed an FARDC soldier and stole his weapon.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Shalio, Shukuru and Kirikicho attacked the Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin to take revenge for the death of a Shalio combatant.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Shalio, Shukuru and Kirikicho attacked the Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin to take revenge for the death of a Shalio combatant. The clashes took place in Busurungi, Biriko, Kifuruka, Bunyamwerimba and Kilamba villages in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe looted money at a check point in Bulimba village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe looted money at a toll road check point in Bulimba village in Beni territory. The assailants fired bullets in the air. One of the tax collectors was injured during the escape.

title/0/en: The ADF raided Mabakweli village in Beni territory. The assailants attacked the FARDC position.
notes/en: The ADF raided Mabakweli village in Beni territory. The assailants attacked the FARDC position. They killed an FARDC soldier and abducted eight people. They also burned down the FARDC camp.

title/0/en: Among the eight people abducted by the ADF in Mabakweli village in Beni territory, five men managed to escape from the kidnappers.
notes/en: Among the eight people abducted by the ADF in Mabakweli village in Beni territory, five men managed to escape from the kidnappers.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke attacked the Twiganeho in Migezi, Misayo and Bikinga villages in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke attacked the Twiganeho in Migezi, Misayo and Bikinga villages in Uvira territory. Two Mai-Mai Biloze Bishambuke and four Twiganeho died during the clash.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin raided the villages of Mianda, Lulere and Kalamu in Kalehe territory in search of deserters from their group.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin raided the villages of Mianda, Lulere and Kalamu in Kalehe territory in search of deserters from their group. The attackers took three goats and six chickens.

title/0/en: An unidentified gunman raped a 10-year-old girl near the village of Chambombo in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An unidentified gunman raped a 10-year-old girl near the village of Chambombo in Kalehe territory. The victim was coming back from her field.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into several houses in Minova village in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into several houses in Minova village in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: The population caught a man carrying a crude weapon who was trying to burgle a house with his colleagues in Bambu village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The population caught a man carrying a crude weapon who was trying to burgle a house with his colleagues in Bambu village, Rutshuru territory. The police intervened and shot and wounded three men.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen broke into a bar in the Rugenge neighborhood of Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen broke into a bar in the Rugenge neighborhood of Uvira rural commune. The assailants shot the bar owner. They stole money and telephones that were charging. The victim, seriously injured, died on the spot.

title/0/en: A policeman shot and killed a 23-year-old man in Mugoye village in Walungu territory following an argument over the candidacy of Vital Kamerhe, a politician the victim was supporting.
notes/en: A policeman shot and killed a 23-year-old man in Mugoye village in Walungu territory following an argument over the candidacy of Vital Kamerhe, a politician the victim was supporting. The policeman tried to run away and was caught by the population who beat him. He died from the injuries.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 13-year-old child in the Virunga neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 13-year-old child in the Virunga neighborhood of Goma. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $5,000 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin killed two men aged 27 and 32 respectively in Biriko village in Walikale territory with a crude weapon.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin killed two men aged 27 and 32 respectively in Biriko village in Walikale territory with a crude weapon. The Mai-Mai Kifuafua accused them of being allied to the Mai-Mai Shukuru, Shalio and Kirikicho.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped eight people in their fields in Kibingu village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped eight people in their fields in Kibingu village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $16,000 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: The police dispersed angry youth demonstrating against increasing insecurity in the Rugenge neighborhood of Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: The police dispersed angry youth demonstrating against increasing insecurity in the Rugenge neighborhood of Uvira rural commune. Two men were wounded by a teargas cartridge. The demonstration took place after the assassination of a 27-year-old man in the same neighborhood the day before.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a man in Kangalamuka village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a man in Kangalamuka village in Lubero territory. The assailants shot bullets through the victim room's window. The victim died on the spot.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kirikicho attacked the Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin in Biriko village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kirikicho attacked the Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin in Biriko village in Walikale territory following the killing of the commander Shalio. Two Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin and three Mai-Mai Kirikicho were killed and three Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin were injured during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a man in his field in Malolu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a man in his field in Malolu village in Beni territory. The victim's body was found in a state of decomposition.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles kidnapped 30 fishermen on Edouard Lake close to Tshanika and Ndwali villages in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles kidnapped 30 fishermen on Edouard Lake close to Tshanika and Ndwali villages in Lubero territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom to release the hostages.

title/0/en: Biloze Bishambuke combatants burned down several houses in Rubibi, Gatoki villages in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Biloze Bishambuke combatants burned down several houses in Rubibi and Gatoki villages in Uvira territory. They burned houses down belong to the Banyamulenge.

title/0/en: Twiganeho combatants burned down several houses in Mbundamo village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Twiganeho combatants burned down several houses in Mbundamo village in Uvira territory. The incident was in response to the burning down of Banyamulenge houses in Rubibi and Gatoki villages.

title/0/en: Three unidentified men who kidnapped a 20-year-old man close to Minova in Kalehe territory released the hostage after a ransom of $250 was paid.
notes/en: Three unidentified men who kidnapped a 20-year-old man close to Minova in Kalehe territory released the hostage after a ransom of $250 was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a farm in Mupando village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a farm in Mupando village in Uvira territory. The assailants fired bullets to threaten the cowherds. They stole 35 cows.

title/0/en: Following the death of a man during a fight with a policeman in Kasheke village in Kalehe territory, angry civilians demonstrated by burning down the police office and the belongings inside it.
notes/en: Following the death of a man during a fight with a policeman in Kasheke village in Kalehe territory, angry civilians demonstrated by burning down the police office and the belongings inside it.

title/0/en: A policeman who was having a drink in a bar in Kasheke village in Kalehe territory had a fight with a man who had questioned the reasons he had arrested some people.
notes/en: A policeman who was having a drink in a bar in Kasheke village in Kalehe territory had a fight with a man who had questioned the reasons he had arrested some people. During the fight the policeman pushed the man against a tree. The victim died from his injuries.

title/0/en: CNRD combatants attacked the NDC Guidon in Kinyabwitsi village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: CNRD combatants attacked the NDC Guidon in Kinyabwitsi village in Walikale territory. Two CNRD and one NDC Guidon died during the clash.

title/0/en: The three hostages who were kidnapped by unidentified gunmen in Mapera concession in Kanyabayonga rural commune, escaped from their kidnappers without the payment of a ransom.
notes/en: The three hostages who were kidnapped by unidentified gunmen in Mapera concession in Kanyabayonga rural commune, escaped from their kidnappers without the payment of a ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a vehicle of the NGO MSF/Belgium close to Bukombo village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a vehicle of the NGO MSF/Belgium close to Bukombo village in Masisi territory. The NGO convoy was leaving to Nyabiondo where the NGO manages part of the local hospital. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified men who had abducted an 8-year-old girl in the Benengule neighborhood of Beni abandoned the hostage close to the victim's parents house.
notes/en: Unidentified men who had abducted an 8-year-old girl in the Benengule neighborhood of Beni abandoned the hostage close to the victim's parents house. The girl had been kept hostage for one month.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Nyerere kidnapped a 24-year-old man close to Kiliba rural commune in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Nyerere kidnapped a 24-year-old man close to Kiliba rural commune in Uvira territory. The Mai-Mai Nyerere wanted to forcibly recrute the hostage.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers accompanied by a civilian broke into the UCBC campus in the Masiani neighborhood of Beni during the night.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers accompanied by a civilian broke into the UCBC campus in the Masiani neighborhood of Beni during the night. The FARDC stole 43 plastic chairs. These soldiers were caught following an investigation.

title/0/en: A FARDC patrol attacked unidentified armed men who were trying to steal cows in a farm in Ngandjo village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: A FARDC patrol attacked unidentified armed men who were trying to steal cows in a farm in Ngandjo village in Kalehe territory. One FARDC soldier was injured during the clash.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a MEPROBA company mini bus close to Kanyabayonga rural commune in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a MEPROBA company mini bus close to Kanyabayonga rural commune in Lubero territory. The assailants looted money and goods. They kidnapped three men.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Lukorwe village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Lukorwe village in Nyiragongo territory. The assailants injured three people and kidnapped a man. The kidnapped person is the chief of the village. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $50,000 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Alerted over the arrival of Nyatura FDP close to Kabashumba village in Rutshuru territory, the FARDC attacked the assailants.
notes/en: Alerted over the arrival of Nyatura FDP close to Kabashumba village in Rutshuru territory, the FARDC attacked the assailants. The clash lasted for two hours.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a man, a woman and two children in Kajembe village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a man, a woman and two children in Kajembe village in Uvira territory. All the victims were members of the same family.

title/0/en: Following the assassination of four people in Kajembwe village in Uvira territory, the Twiganeho mobilized to pursue the assailants.
notes/en: Following the assassination of four people in Kajembwe village in Uvira territory, the Twiganeho mobilized to pursue the assailants. Having heard a noise in the nearby forest, the Twiganeho opened fire. After checking, the Twiganeho realized that they had just killed several cows.

title/0/en: Unidentified men abducted a 48-year-old man in Munigi village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men abducted a 48-year-old man in Munigi village in Nyiragongo territory. The reason behind the abduction is unknown.

title/0/en: Three unidentified men kidnapped a 20-year-old man close to Minova in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified men kidnapped a 20-year-old man close to Minova in Kalehe territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $500 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto tortured and wounded a 43-year-old man at the exit of the Kalimboloko mining area in Shabunda territory because the victim did not have his voter's card.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto tortured and wounded a 43-year-old man at the exit of the Kalimboloko mining site in Shabunda territory because the victim did not have his voter ID. The attackers took away his phone.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen broke into a gold trading shop in Misisi village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen broke into a gold trading shop in Misisi village in Fizi territory. The assailants shot and wounded a 35-year-old man and looted money and goods.

title/0/en: After hearing two shots in Nyamagana village in Rutshuru territory, the FARDC started firing too.
notes/en: After hearing two shots in Nyamagana village in Rutshuru territory, the FARDC started firing too. A 40-year-old man and an 11-year-old by were shot and wounded during the shooting.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Shalio attacked the Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin position in Busurungi village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Shalio attacked the Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin position in Busurungi village in Walikale territory. Eight Mai-Mai Shalio were killed including commander Shalio himself during the two-day long clash.

title/0/en: Following the looting of money and goods in a gold trading shop in Misisi village in Fizi territory, the FARDC intervened and captured one of the assailants.
notes/en: Following the looting of money and goods in a gold trading shop in Misisi village in Fizi territory, the FARDC intervened and captured one of the assailants.

title/0/en: A police patrol attacked unidentified gunmen who were trying to break into a house in the Malepe neighborhood of Beni during the night.
notes/en: A police patrol attacked unidentified gunmen who were trying to break into a house in the Malepe neighborhood of Beni during the night. The police repelled the assailants.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 36-year-old man in Kilungu village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 36-year-old man in Kilungu village, Walikale territory. The victim's body was found in the bush.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto tortured and wounded four men returning from the Kalimboloko mining area near Kalijuwe village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto tortured and wounded four men returning from the Kalimboloko mining area near Kalijuwe village in Shabunda territory. The assailants stole $60 and three kilograms of cassiterite.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a man in Buhimba village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a man in Buhimba village in Beni territory. The victim is a police collaborator.

title/0/en: Armed men from the new armed group Raia Mutomboki 100 kilo, stole money, a cow and goods from traders returning from a market close to Wakenge village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Armed men from the new armed group Raia Mutomboki 100 Kilo, stole money, a cow and goods from traders returning from a market close to Wakenge village in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot bullets at a RAV4 car in the RVA neighborhood of Goma. They killed two men.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot bullets at a RAV4 car in the RVA neighborhood of Goma. They killed two men.

title/0/en: Four unidentified armed men who kidnapped a woman in Kyanzaba village in Beni territory released the hostage after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: Four unidentified armed men who kidnapped a woman in Kyanzaba village in Beni territory released the hostage after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: The ADF/NALU attacked an FARDC vehicle in Ngite village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF/NALU attacked an FARDC vehicle in Ngite village in Beni territory. FARDC reinforcements coming from Beni center managed to repel the assailants after the latter had started looting houses and shops. Three FARDC were seriously injured and two houses were burned down during the attack.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen broke into Nkokwe health center in Bwasamiro village in Rutshuru territory during the night.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen broke into Nkokwe health center in Bwasamiro village in Rutshuru territory during the night. The assailants tortured and stabbed the health center guard.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men destroyed the offices of the area chief and of Kavingu village chief in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men destroyed the offices of the area chief and of Kavingu village chief in Beni territory. The assailants burned the chairs, tables and documents.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a 29-year-old man in Minova village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a 29-year-old man in Minova village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen stopped a 60-year-old man in Ntamugenga village in Rutshuru territory as he was returning from his working place.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen stopped a 60-year-old man in Ntamugenga village in Rutshuru territory as he was returning from his working place. The assailants forced the victim to follow them. Following the victim's resistance one of the assailants shot him. The victim died from his injuries.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Ngangi 3 village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Ngangi 3 village in Nyiragongo territory. The assailants tried to steal the solar panel of the compound. As the owner approached the assailants shot him. The victim died on the spot.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up two motorcycles close to Turungu village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up two motorcycles close to Turungu village in Fizi territory. The assailants raped four women who were passengers of the two motorcycles.

title/0/en: Armed men wearing police uniforms held up a FUSO vehicle close to Kilolirwe village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Armed men wearing police uniforms held up a FUSO vehicle close to Kilolirwe village in Masisi territory. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: Four men carrying an AK47 weapon kidnapped a woman in Kyanzaba village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Four men carrying an AK47 weapon kidnapped a woman in Kyanzaba village in Beni territory. During the kidnapping the assailants stole $30 and a telephone. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $4,000.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 50-year-old man in Ramba village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 50-year-old man in Ramba village, Kalehe territory. The lifeless body of the victim was later found by passersby.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a man in front of his house in the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a man in front of his house in the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma. The killers ran away after the shooting.

title/0/en: Two FARDC soldiers stole a taxi driver's motorcycle who was taking them to the Boikene neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: Two FARDC soldiers stole a taxi driver's motorcycle who was taking them to the Boikene neighborhood of Beni. The two FARDC soldiers tied down the taxi driver before stealing the motorcycle.

title/0/en: An unidentified gunman raped a 13-year-old girl near Kirambo village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An unidentified gunman raped a 13-year-old girl near Kirambo village in Kalehe territory. The victim was returning from the Kitindiro market. She was taken care of at the CADIBU hospital.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a motorcycle close to Bunake village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a motorcycle close to Bunake village in Beni territory. The assailants shot and killed a man and stole the pharmaceutical products he was carrying.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into fur houses in the Vutetse neighborhood of Butembo during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into fur houses in the Vutetse neighborhood of Butembo during the night. The assailants stole money and goods. They shot and wounded a woman.

title/0/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms broke into eight houses in the Kakombe neighborhood of Uvira rural commune during the night.
notes/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms broke into eight houses in the Kakombe neighborhood of Uvira rural commune during the night. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen broke into an Airtel money shop in the Vutetse neighborhood of Butembo.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen broke into an Airtel money shop in the Vutetse neighborhood of Butembo. The assailants stole money and telephones. The population caught one of the assailants and stoned him.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen stole $8,800 from a trader in the Biantu neighborhood of Beni as the victim was returning from work.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen stole $8,800 from a trader in the Biantu neighborhood of Beni as the victim was returning from work. The assailants wearing FARDC uniforms shot a bullet in the floor to force the trader to hand over his bag containing the money.

title/0/en: The police dispersed a popular demonstration demanding the installation of the local customary chief of Bukumu chieftaincy in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: The police dispersed a demonstration demanding the installation of the local customary chief of Bukumu chieftaincy in Nyiragongo territory. The police arrested two people.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into five houses in the Bwinongo neighborhood of Butembo.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into five houses in the Bwinongo neighborhood of Butembo. The assailants looted goods. They injured a 15-year-old girl.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Panzi neighborhood of Bukavu during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Panzi neighborhood of Bukavu during the night. The assailants looted money and telephones. They shot bullets in the air to dissuade civilians who wanted to intervene.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Bulenge village in Uvira territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Bulenge village in Uvira territory during the night. The assailants shot a 48-year-old man. The bullets hit the victim's 3-year-old daughter. Both died.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into two houses in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into two houses in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu during the night. The assailants looted money and goods. They also shot and wounded a girl.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into several houses in the Rughenda neighborhood of Butembo during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into several houses in the Rughenda neighborhood of Butembo during the night. The assailants injured a man and his wife with a machete. They also looted money and goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed with a crude weapon a man in Kiddiwe village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a man in Kiddiwe village in Beni territory with a crude weapon. The victim's body was found in a state of decomposition.

title/0/en: The FARDC captured an unidentified gunman in Kavumo Luzirantaka village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The FARDC captured an unidentified gunman in Kavumo Luzirantaka village in Kalehe territory. The population alerted the FARDC over the presence of the gunman in the village.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Kavumbi attacked unidentified gunmen in Lwama village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Kavumbi attacked unidentified gunmen in Lwama village in Masisi territory. Three Nyatura Kavumbi were killed during the two-day-long clash.

title/0/en: The gunmen who killed three shepherds and stole six cows fought over the loot close to Rugarama village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The gunmen who killed three shepherds and stole six cows fought over the loot close to Rugarama village in Masisi territory. One of the assailants died during the clash.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Rusagara village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Rusagara village in Uvira territory. The assailants shot and killed a 62-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into MUSO cooperative office in the Masosi neighborhood of Oicha rural commune during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into MUSO cooperative office in the Masosi neighborhood of Oicha rural commune during the night. The assailants strangled the guard and stole $36,750.

title/0/en: Three FARDC soldiers robbed a shop in the Pakanza neighborhood of Oicha rural commune.
notes/en: Three FARDC soldiers robbed a shop in the Pakanza neighborhood of Oicha rural commune. The neighborhood youth caught one of the soldiers while the others managed to run away without stealing anything.

title/0/en: The FARDC broke into Kamulila site in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The FARDC broke into Kamulila site in Shabunda territory. The FARDC forced the diggers to each give them 0.5 grams of gold. They managed to extort ten grams from twenty diggers.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mungoro stopped several traders on the road close to Kamananga village in Kalehe territory and stole $2,272, telephones and bags.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mungoro stopped several traders on the road close to Kamananga village in Kalehe territory and stole $2,272, telephones and bags.

title/0/en: The CNRD held up a motorcycle close to Luve village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The CNRD held up a motorcycle close to Luve village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants took a man to the forest and shot and killed him.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe who forced a member of the Red Cross to treat their wounded combatants in Bukomerwa village in Lubero territory released the hostage following the intervention of some local leaders.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe who forced a member of the Red Cross to treat their wounded combatants in Bukomerwa village in Lubero territory released the hostage following the intervention of some local leaders.

title/0/en: Armed men wearing police uniforms broke into a house in Rubaya village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Armed men wearing police uniforms broke into a house in Rubaya village in Masisi territory. The assailants shot and killed a 50-year-old man.

title/0/en: Armed men ambushed a motorcycle on Nyanzale-Mweso road in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Armed men ambushed a motorcycle on Nyanzale-Mweso road in Rutshuru territory. The assailants looted the passengers' money (the president of the Hutu community and his wife) and took them to the forest to an unknown destination before leaving the taxi driver to continue his trip. The assailants killed the president of the Hutu community.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men stole a telephone, a watch and a flashlight from a man in Minova village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men stole a telephone, a watch and a flashlight from a man in Minova village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men left an artisanal bomb in the compound of the post office next to Beni town hall.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men left an artisanal bomb in the compound of the post office next to Beni town hall. The bomb exploded without causing any casualties.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a vehicle close to Kibombo village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a vehicle close to Kibombo village in Fizi territory. The assailants looted money and goods. They raped a 30-year-old woman.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe broke into a house in Mbughavinywa village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe broke into a house in Mbughavinywa village in Lubero territory. The owner had a fight with one of the assailants and seized his weapon. He killed the Mai-Mai with the weapon. The other Mai-Mai Mazembe killed the man.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into four houses in the Panzi neighborhood of Bukavu during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into four houses in the Panzi neighborhood of Bukavu during the night. The assailants looted money and goods. They deterred the population that wanted to intervene by shooting in the air.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe abducted a man working for the Red Cross in Bukomerwa village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe abducted a man working for the Red Cross in Bukomerwa village in Lubero territory. The assailants forced the victim to treat the injured militiamen.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier stabbed a fisherman in Vitshumbi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier stabbed a fisherman in Vitshumbi village in Rutshuru territory. The soldier wanted to steal the fisherman's catch.

title/0/en: The Nyatura JED attacked the CNRD combatants position in Kiryamo village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura JED attacked the CNRD combatants position in Kiryamo village in Masisi territory. The CNRD epelled the Nyatura JED.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a vehicle close to Nyaleke village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a vehicle close to Nyaleke village in Beni territory. The assailants injured the driver and burned down the vehicle, which was transporting beans. They also shot a man who was passing on his motorcycle. The victim died on the spot.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Mighobwe village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Mighobwe village in Lubero territory. The FARDC abandoned their position. Two men were shot and wounded during the attack. The Mai-Mai Mazembe burned down six houses and the Kyaghanda Yira (an ethnic community organization) meeting place.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a 24-year-old man and injured a woman with a machete in Kiringa village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a 24-year-old man and injured a woman with a machete in Kiringa village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms shot and killed a 31-year-old man in Miba village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms shot and killed a 31-year-old man in Miba village in Fizi territory. The incident happened as the victim was returning home.

title/0/en: Two kidnappers who abducted a man close to Ilange village in Beni territory released the hostage after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: Two kidnappers who abducted a man close to Ilange village in Beni territory released the hostage after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons broke into a house in Minova village in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons broke into a house in Minova village in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants stole $90, a battery, a telephone and other goods. They also injured the owner of the house.

title/0/en: Two FARDC tried to attack the policemen deployed to guard Ngongolio local office in Beni town.
notes/en: Two FARDC tried to attack the policemen deployed to guard Ngongolio local office in Beni town. One of the soldiers who tried to shoot the policemen injured his colleague. The police responded and one soldier ran away, abandoning his injured colleague. The policemen captured the FARDC soldier.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen who had just raided Bushumba village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen who had just raided Bushumba village in Kabare territory. Two assailants were captured and four civilians were shot and wounded during the attack.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD attacked gunmen in the fields in Kahumiro village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD attacked gunmen in the fields in Kahumiro village in Rutshuru territory. One FDLR-RUD, one armed man and one civilian died and six FDLR-RUD were injured during the attack.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men in Kasakya village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men in Kasakya village in Fizi territory. The FARDC wanted to push the assailants out the zone because of their abuses of the population. One FARDC was killed and one assailant was injured during the clash.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked the FARDC position in the Lyakobo neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked the FARDC position in the Lyakobo neighborhood of Beni. With the help of support that came from Mangango, the FARDC repelled the assailants. Six assailants, a 5-year-old boy and a woman were killed during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men tried to abduct a 23-year-old woman in the Buturande neighborhood of Kiwanja rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men tried to abduct a 23-year-old woman in the Buturande neighborhood of Kiwanja rural commune. When the victim being yelling, the assailants left her after injuring her with a machete.

title/0/en: The FARDC supported by park rangers attacked the Mai-Mai Charles positions in Kafunzo, Chondo, Kamuhororo and Charuganda villages in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC supported by park rangers attacked the Mai-Mai Charles positions in Kafunzo, Chondo, Kamuhororo and Charuganda villages in Rutshuru territory. The Mai-Mai Charles escaped toward their position in Chanika.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon released one of the hostages who were kidnapped in Karambi village in Lubero territory after a ransom of $255 was paid.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon released one of the hostages who were kidnapped in Karambi village in Lubero territory after a ransom of $255 was paid.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali abducted a 40-year-old woman in Mugerero village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali abducted a 40-year-old woman in Mugerero village in Uvira territory. Alerted by the population, the FARDC tried to shoot the assaillants but missed.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen stole $2,000 and two telephones from a trader woman who was returning from work in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen stole $2,000 and two telephones from a trader who was returning from work in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen injured a final year student close to Kyampindu village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen injured a final year student close to Kyampindu village in Shabunda territory. The assailants stole $27 and a telephone. The victim was returning from getting money for school fees from his family.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a convoy of the NGO MSF Holland close to Mukandama village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a convoy of the NGO MSF Holland close to Mukandama village in Fizi territory. The assailants looted money, telephones and other goods.

title/0/en: The population demonstrated against the interim chief of Bukumu chieftaincy in Nyiragongo territory demanding the installation of the a new customary chief in the locality.
notes/en: The population demonstrated against the interim chief of Bukumu chieftaincy in Nyiragongo territory demanding the nomination of the a new customary chief in the locality.

title/0/en: The police and the FARDC dispersed a demonstration of youth activists in Rutshuru center village in the territory holding the same name.
notes/en: The police and the FARDC dispersed a demonstration of youth activists in Rutshuru town. The police and FARDC arrested six demonstrators. These activists were demonstrating against kidnappings and insecurity in the area.

title/0/en: Twigwaneho combatants raided Mugogo and Chanzovu villages in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Twigwaneho combatants raided Mugogo and Chanzovu villages in Uvira territory. The assailants burned down 50 houses.

title/0/en: Three unidentified armed men who had kidnapped a boy in Kanyabayonga rural commune in Lubero territory killed the hostage.
notes/en: Three unidentified armed men who had kidnapped a boy in Kanyabayonga rural commune in Lubero territory killed the hostage. The arrested kidnappers confessed that they killed him because he knew them. They killed the hostage after having received the ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed an ADF combatant close to Kizumbura village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed an ADF combatant close to Kizumbura village in Beni territory. The population found the ADF combatant's body in an advanced state of decomposition. Next to the body there were two AK47 weapons. The security services seized these two weapons.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked the FARDC position in Kokola village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked the FARDC position in Kokola village in Beni territory. One ADF was killed and one was captured, one FARDC died and two were injured during the attack. The ADF burned down a FUSO vehicle transporting timber.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who abducted two fishermen and stole two canoes on Edouard lake close to Lunyasenge village in Lubero territory released the hostages after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: The kidnappers who abducted two fishermen and stole two canoes on Edouard lake close to Lunyasenge village in Lubero territory released the hostages after a ransom was paid. They also gave the two canoes back.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the Bulengera police station in Butembo during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the Bulengera police station in Butembo during the night. The assailants killed three policemen and stole eight AK47 weapons.

title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle close to Kanyere village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle close to Kanyere village in Beni territory. The assailants shot and wounded the motorcycle driver. They looted the victim's money and stole the motorcycle. The victim was hospitalized at Lubiriha health center for treatment.

title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men kidnapped a man who was returning from his field in Ilange village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men kidnapped a man who was returning from his field in Ilange village in Beni territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Three FDLR-RUD combatants tried to rape a girl who was returning from the field with her mother and older brother close to Rusaka I village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Three FDLR-RUD combatants tried to rape a girl who was returning from the field with her mother and older brother close to Rusaka I village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants shot the victim's older brother as he tried to intervene. They also injured the girl's mother with a machete. The injured boy died from his injuries. The FDLR-RUD abducted the girl and took her to the forest.

title/0/en: Three Ugandan soldiers crossed into the Congo in Tako village, Beni territory.
notes/en: Three Ugandan soldiers crossed into the Congo in Tako village, Beni territory. The population chased the three soldiers and captured one of them. The population handed him over to Kasindi rural commune authorities. The two others managed to cross the border.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men burned down the road-toll office on Butembo-Bulambo axe in Kunguta village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men burned down the road toll office  in Kunguta village on the Butembo-Bulambo road in Beni territory. The office was empty.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Pitakongo village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Pitakongo village in Lubero territory. Three NDC Guidon died and one was injured during the attack. One Mai-Mai Mazembe was also injured. The NDC-Guidon burned down the Mai-Mai Mazembe camp.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Vutetse neighborhood of Butembo during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Vutetse neighborhood of Butembo during the night. The assailants shot and wounded a 35-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot a woman through her room window in the Bwinyole neighborhood of Butembo.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot a woman through the window of her room in the Bwinyole neighborhood of Butembo. The victim died on the spot.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu during the night. The assailants stole $1,400 and goods. When the policemen arrived, the assailants ran away to an unknown destination.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men injured a man and two women in Musimba village in Lubero territory. The assailants also looted goods.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men injured a man and two women in Musimba village in Lubero territory. The assailants also looted goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a man in Kyanguwe village on May 22, 2018 killed the hostage in Kirivata village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a man in Kyanguwe village on May 22, 2018 killed the hostage in Kirivata village in Lubero territory. The victim's body was found in Talihya river.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who abducted three men in Katobo village in Masisi territory on May 26 ,2018 killed the hostages close to Katobo village.
notes/en: The kidnappers who abducted three men in Katobo village in Masisi territory on May 26 ,2018 killed the hostages close to Katobo village. The victims' bodies were found in a ravine.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up two canoes on Lake Edouard close to Lunyasenge village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up two canoes on Lake Edouard close to Lunyasenge village in Lubero territory. The assailants kidnapped two fishermen and stole the canoes. They demanded a ransom to release the hostages and give the canoes back.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD who kidnapped four farmers who were returning from their fields in Kibende village in Rutshuru territory released the hostages after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD who kidnapped four farmers who were returning from their fields in Kibende village in Rutshuru territory released the hostages after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Chabingili village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Chabingili village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants kidnapped two men aged 40 and 20 respectively and a 16-year-old boy. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $6,000 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: Angry youths demonstrated following the assassination of a young man detained in Tulonge prison in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Angry youths demonstrated following the assassination of a young man detained in Tulonge prison in Fizi territory. The youths pillaged local administrative offices, including the local village chief office and the police station.

title/0/en: A policeman shot two prisoners at Tulonge police station in Fizi territory as the prisoners wanted to take his weapon and run away.
notes/en: A policeman shot two prisoners at Tulonge police station in Fizi territory as the prisoners wanted to take his weapon and run away. A 33-year-old man was killed and a 29-year-old man was injured during the incident.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen abducted three people in their field in Kabasha village, Buliki groupement, in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen abducted three people in their field in Kabasha village, Buliki groupement, in Beni territory.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers looted several houses in Limangi village, Ihana groupement in Walikale territory at around five in the morning.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers looted several houses in Limangi village, Ihana groupement in Walikale territory at around five in the morning.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the APCLS combatants position in Buboa village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the APCLS combatants position in Buboa village in Masisi territory. Two APCLS were killed and two NDC Guidon were injured during the clash.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up two motorcycles close to Karton village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up two motorcycles close to Karton village in Masisi territory. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD who kidnapped two children in Buhangamaso village in Rutshuru territory released the hostages after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD who kidnapped two children in Buhangamaso village in Rutshuru territory released the hostages after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD who kidnapped a child in Kasasa village in Rutshuru territory released the hostage after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD who kidnapped a child in Kasasa village in Rutshuru territory released the hostage after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up two motorcycles close to Kibingu village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up two motorcycles close to Kibingu village in Rutshuru territory. The motorcycle drivers managed to escape. The assailants kidnapped three male passengers and demanded a ransom of $3,000 to release them.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier who was in a jeep with his colleagues pulled the trigger of his weapon by mistake in the Mabakanga neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier who was in a jeep with his colleagues pulled the trigger of his weapon by mistake in the Mabakanga neighborhood of Beni. A 14-year-old girl was injured in her leg. The victim was taken to Beni general hospital for treatment.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided Kafunda village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided Kafunda village in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole $127, three goats and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a woman in Kitchanga village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a woman in Kitchanga village in Masisi territory. The victim's body was found in her house.

title/0/en: The FARDC arrested two men during the patrol in Kyangolo village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC arrested two men during a patrol in Kyangolo village in Beni territory. The FARDC accused the two farmers of being Mai-Mai. The FARDC killed the two victims on the spot and buried them.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Kimanga neighborhood of Uvira during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Kimanga neighborhood of Uvira during the night. The assailants stole $3,000, eight computers, two telephones and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Rusabagi neighborhood of Kiliba rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Rusabagi neighborhood of Kiliba rural commune. The assailants shot and killed a 69-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a mini bus close to Munywema village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a mini bus close to Munywema village in Uvira territory. The assailants looted money and goods. The mini bus was leaving Bukavu to Uvira.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 12-year-old girl in Katolu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 12-year-old girl in Katolu village in Beni territory. The soldier responsible for the injury belongs to the local patrolling unit.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin shot two traders who were returning from the market in Lukaraba village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin shot two traders who were returning from the market in Lukaraba village in Walikale territory. The assailants killed one trader on the spot and wounded another one during the shooting. The victims had refused to carry the assailants' belongings.

title/0/en: ISC Beni students disturbed public order in the Lumumba neighborhood of Butembo when they tried to force the release of their colleague who had been arrested by the police following the beating of a local citizen.
notes/en: ISC Beni students disturbed public order in the Lumumba neighborhood of Butembo when they tried to force the release of their colleague who had been arrested by the police following the beating of a local citizen. The police shot bullets in the air to disperse the demonstrators and arrested fourteen students.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Karambi village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Karambi village in Lubero territory. Three NDC Guidon were killed and four were injured during the attack. A Mai-Mai Mazembe was injured. The NDC Guidon looted goods in the shops. They also burned down part of the Mai-Mai Mazembe camp.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who abducted the chief of Butondi in Kasitu village in Beni territory released the hostage after a ransom of $60 was paid.
notes/en: The kidnappers who abducted the chief of Butondi in Kasitu village in Beni territory released the hostage after a ransom of $60 was paid.

title/0/en: A policeman shot another policeman during a document check of vehicles in the Sivirwa neighborhood of Kyondo rural commune.
notes/en: A policeman shot another policeman during a document check of vehicles in the Sivirwa neighborhood of Kyondo rural commune. The policeman died from his injuries.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon kidnapped civilians in Karambi village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon kidnapped civilians in Karambi village in Lubero territory. The NDC Guidon demanded a ransom to release the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a shepherd in Burungu village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a shepherd in Burungu village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot a several members of a family in Mbau village in Beni territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot a several members of a family in Mbau village in Beni territory. He also killed a 36-year-old woman and her children aged 10, 12, 17 and 18.

title/0/en: Four FDLR-RUD combatants stopped 14 farmers who were returning from their fields in Kibende village in Rutshuru territory
notes/en: Four FDLR-RUD combatants stopped 14 farmers who were returning from their fields in Kibende village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants shot one of the farmers who resisted the kidnapping as he had already been kidnapped twice before. The victim died on the spot and the other farmers attempted to escape. In the end, the kidnappers managed to kidnap four peasants. They demanded a ransom to release them.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the Kadou FARDC position in the Ngadi neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the Kadou FARDC position in the Ngadi neighborhood of Beni. Two assailants were killed during the attack. The FARDC seized two AK47 weapons.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men abducted three civilians in Kitobo village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men abducted three civilians in Kitobo village in Masisi territory. The destination of the kidnappers and hostages remains unknown.

title/0/en: A couple quarreling in Majengo village in Rutshuru territory made loud noises during the night.
notes/en: A couple quarreling in Majengo village in Rutshuru territory made loud noises during the night. The FARDC soldiers, thinking it was an attack, deployed. They killed the husband when he tried to flee and injured the victim's father.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who abducted a public transportation and communication service agent in Maboya village in Beni territory released the hostage after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: The kidnappers who abducted a public transportation and communication service agent in Maboya village in Beni territory released the hostage after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a transport and communication service agent in Maboya village in Beni territory, thinking he was an ANR agent.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a transport and communication service agent in Maboya village in Beni territory, thinking he was an ANR agent. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $500 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped the chief of Butondi village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped the chief of Butondi village in Beni territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom to release the hostage.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who abducted a man in Katolero village in Lubero territory killed the hostage.
notes/en: The kidnappers who abducted a man in Katolero village in Lubero territory killed the hostage. The victim's body was found on May 25 2018.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Mweso village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Mweso village in Masisi territory. Two men were killed and five were injured during the attack.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped a third year secondary school girl and her younger brother in Buhangamaso village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped a third year secondary school girl and her younger brother in Buhangamaso village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2,000 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped a boy in Kasasa village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped a boy in Kasasa village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $1,500 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a gold trader's house in Misisi village in Fizi territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a gold trader's house in Misisi village in Fizi territory during the night. The assailants shot and wounded the owner, a 51-year-old man and wounded a 44-year-old man. They also stole $6,000.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot his wife in the Ngadi neighborhood of Beni following the victim's refusal to hand him over a sum of money to buy a drink.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot his wife in the Ngadi neighborhood of Beni following the victim's refusal to hand him over a sum of money to buy a drink. The soldier had just given the money to his wife. The victim died on the spot.

title/0/en: The FARDC captured a Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga with four women in Kakoloto village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The FARDC captured a Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga with four women in Kakoloto village in Shabunda territory. The FARDC seized three AK47 weapons.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position in Kalole village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position in Kalole village in Shabunda territory. The assailants wanted to burn the FARDC camp down. The FARDC repelled the assailants.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked the FARDC position on Mbau-Kamango road between PK 36 to 40 in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked the FARDC positions on the Mbau-Kamango road between PK 36 to 40 in Beni territory. The FARDC, supported by other soldiers, repelled the assailants from the temporarily occupied positions. Fourteen ADF and five FARDC died, thirteen FARDC were injured during the clash. The FARDC seized nine AK47, two PKM and a motorola phone.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Nyalukemba neighborhood of Bukavu during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Nyalukemba neighborhood of Bukavu during the night. The assailants shot into the parents' sleeping room. A 57-year-old man and his son were injured, the 46-year-old woman died from her injuries.

title/0/en: Three unidentified persons carrying  crude weapons robbed in the compound of a local telecommunication antenna in Goma.
notes/en: Three unidentified persons carrying  crude weapons burglarized the compound of a local telecommunication company in Goma. The criminals injured the guard and looted telephones and computers.

title/0/en: The FOREBU attacked the FARDC position in the Butaho neighborhood of Kiliba commune.
notes/en: The FOREBU attacked the FARDC position in the Butaho neighborhood of Kiliba commune. The assailants killed an FARDC soldier and stole an AK47 weapon, a uniform and other military items.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe shot a vehicle transporting FARDC soldiers and civilians close to Butindiri village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe shot at a vehicle transporting FARDC soldiers and civilians close to Butindiri village in Rutshuru territory. Two FARDC and four civilians were shot and wounded during the incident.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men tried to steal fishermen's nets on Kivu Lake close to Boza village in Idjwi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men tried to steal fishermen's nets on Lake Kivu close to Boza village in Idjwi territory. Alerted by the fishermen, the Congolese navy intervened to repel the assailants. One FARDC was injured during the clash. He died from his wounds.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who abducted and raped three women in Kibende village in Rutshuru territory released the hostages after a ransom of $2,000 was paid.
notes/en: The kidnappers who abducted and raped three women in Kibende village in Rutshuru territory released the hostages after a ransom of $2,000 was paid.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon intercepted twenty artisanal diggers who were coming back from Fatua, at the level of Kibukulu village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon intercepted twenty artisanal diggers who were coming back from Fatua, at the level of Kibukulu village in Lubero territory. The assailants looted gold and goods belonging to the diggers.

title/0/en: Alerted by civilians about the looting of diggers in Kibukulu village in Lubero territory, the Mai-Mai Mazembe intervened and attacked the NDC Guidon.
notes/en: Alerted by civilians about the looting of diggers in Kibukulu village in Lubero territory, the Mai-Mai Mazembe intervened and attacked the NDC Guidon. One Mai-Mai Mazembe was injured.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into more than five houses in Mususa village in Butembo town during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into more than five houses in Mususa village in Butembo town during the night. The assailants looted goods and injured civilians.

title/0/en: Two armed men looted money and other valuables in a house in Katolo village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Two armed men looted money and other valuables in a house in Katolo village in Lubero territory. No one was injured.

title/0/en: APCLS commanders whipped a 45-year-old man in Bunyere village in Rutshuru territory following an accusation of betrayal by another civilian.
notes/en: APCLS commanders whipped a 45-year-old man in Bunyere village in Rutshuru territory following an accusation of betrayal by another civilian. The victim died from his wounds.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kabishula who abducted a man in Milanda village in Kalehe territory released the victim after a ransom of $90 was paid.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kabishula who abducted a man in Milanda village in Kalehe territory released the victim after a ransom of $90 was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men abducted a 32-year-old man in Kyanguwe village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men abducted a 32-year-old man in Kyanguwe village in Lubero territory. The hostage had witnessed the assassination of Mwami Kambere Mbalulinda during the night of October 8-9, 2017.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men abducted a man in Katolero village in Lubero territory as he was coming back from his field.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men abducted a man in Katolero village in Lubero territory as he was coming back from his field. The victim's destination is unknown.

title/0/en: Five unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Katana village in Kabare territory during the night.
notes/en: Five unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Katana village in Kabare territory during the night. The assailants tortured and wounded a woman. They looted goods.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru raided Ebisha village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru raided Ebisha village in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole $250, two pigs, one goat, five chickens and twenty guinea pigs.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle close to Bususa village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle close to Bususa village in Lubero territory. The robbers abducted a female passenger and the driver.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Gwagwa village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Gwagwa village in Uvira territory. The assailants shot and wounded the head of the household. They stole $1,200, two radios, three batteries and a TV.

title/0/en: Three unidentified armed men broke into a compound in the Kibondwe neighborhood of Uvira.
notes/en: Three unidentified armed men broke into a compound in the Kibondwe neighborhood of Uvira. The assailants shot and killed the head of the household.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Misisi village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Misisi village in Fizi territory. The assailants shot and killed the head of the household. They looted money and goods. The victim had just come back from his gold trading shop.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle close to Vusuesa village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle close to Vusuesa village in Lubero territory. The assailants shot and wounded the motorcycle driver. They stole $200 and a telephone.

title/0/en: Following a clash between the FARDC and a group of armed men in Ishenge village in Uvira territory, FARDC soldiers raped a 42-year-old woman and her 17-year-old daughter as they were conducting a search operation.
notes/en: Following a clash between the FARDC and a group of armed men in Ishenge village in Uvira territory, FARDC soldiers raped a 42-year-old woman and her 17-year-old daughter as they were conducting a search operation.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position in Ishenge village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position in Ishenge village in Uvira territory. The assailants injured three soldiers and stole the FARDC soldiers' belongings.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe ambushed a motorcycle transporting two FARDC soldiers close to Butindiri village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe ambushed a motorcycle transporting two FARDC soldiers close to Butindiri village in Rutshuru territory. Two FARDC soldiers and the driver were killed during the ambush.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Kabishula fighters abducted a man and took him to their camp in Mianda village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Kabishula fighters abducted a man and took him to their camp in Mianda village in Kalehe territory. The assailants held the victim demanding a ransom to release him.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a civilian in the Keyshero neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a civilian in the Keyshero neighborhood of Goma. The victim's body was found in the morning of May 21, 2018.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a 41-year-old man with a crude weapon close to Lwango village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a 41-year-old man with a crude weapon close to Lwango village in Kalehe territory. The victim's body was found in Lake Kivu.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot a man in a bar in the Lyakobo neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot a man in a bar in the Lyakobo neighborhood of Beni. The victim died on the spot.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed ten people and wounded three others in Mangboko village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed ten people and wounded three others in Mangboko village in Beni territory. Alerted by the population, the FARDC intervened and repelled the assailants.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot two civilians in Kisunga village in Beni territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot two civilians in Kisunga village in Beni territory. One 29-year-old man was killed and an old woman was injured at the abdomen during the shooting. The soldier responsible for the incident ran away with his weapon.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo attacked the FARDC position in Kambale in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo attacked the FARDC position in Kambale, Kalehe territory. The FARDC repelled the assailants.

title/0/en: The ADF/Nalu ambushed two FARDC in Beni territory, in Ndawi village east of Kokola.
notes/en: The ADF/Nalu ambushed two FARDC in Beni territory, in Ndawi village east of Kokola. A shootout followed. An FARDC soldier was killed and a second one managed to escape.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen stole two fishermen's nets on Kivu lake close to Luhihi village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen stole two fishermen's nets on Kivu lake close to Luhihi village in Kabare territory.

title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Mulongwe neighborhood of Uvira.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Mulongwe neighborhood of Uvira. The assailants shot and killed a 78-year-old woman.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Rwahanga village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Rwahanga village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants shot and killed a 25-year-old man.

title/0/en: Armed men surrounded eight people who were going to the fields in Kibende village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Armed men surrounded eight people who were going to the fields in Kibende village, Rutshuru territory. The assailants kidnapped three women while others managed to escape. The kidnappers raped the victims. They demanded a ransom of $3,000 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: The population blocked Kilomoni road in Uvira commune while demonstrating against the assassination of the local "chef d'avenue" Mapendo the day before.
notes/en: The population blocked Kilomoni road in Uvira commune while demonstrating against the assassination of the local "chef d'avenue" Mapendo the day before. After the demonstration the area was quieter than usual.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe looted the population belongings in Musigha village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe looted the population belongings in Musigha village in Lubero territory. The assailants shot bullets in the air to frighten the civilians.

title/0/en: Five unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Kavimvira neighborhood of Uvira during the night.
notes/en: Five unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Kavimvira neighborhood of Uvira during the night. The assailants shot and killed the local street chief residing there.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen clashed close to Kamatare village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen clashed close to Kamatare village in Masisi territory. One of the assailants was killed during the clash.

title/0/en: Five unidentified armed men raided Rukoro village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Five unidentified armed men raided Rukoro village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants wounded three men with crude weapons and looted money.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the NDC Sheka position in Robe village, Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the NDC Sheka position in Robe village, Walikale territory. Two NDC Guidon and one NDC Sheka were killed, two NDC Guidon and one NDC Sheka were injured and one NDC Sheka was captured.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Mabanga-Nord neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Mabanga-Nord neighborhood of Goma. The assailants looted goods and abducted two girls.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a civilian close to Mugeri village in Kabare territory with a crude weapon.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a civilian close to Mugeri village in Kabare territory with a crude weapon. The victim's dead body was found in Lake Kivu in the morning of May 18, 2018.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Bigizi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Bigizi village in Kalehe territory. The assailants raped a 32-year-old woman and took her to the forest with her 5-year-old chid. They stole fifteen goats, a solar panel and other goods.

title/0/en: Seven unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle belonging to the NGO Help Canal of Congo close to Rulimbi village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Seven unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle belonging to the NGO Help Canal of Congo close to Rulimbi village in Uvira territory. The assailants tortured and injured three of the NGO representatives. They looted money, telephones and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into two houses and several shops in the Panzi neighborhood of Bukavu during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into two houses and several shops in the Panzi neighborhood of Bukavu during the night. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: The police dispersed the crowd that was taking a man's body to the mortuary in Beni.
