notes/en: The police dispersed the crowd that was taking a man's body to the mortuary in Beni. The man had been killed by an FARDC soldier in the Paida neighborhood of Beni town. The population was demonstrating against the FARDC.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men abducted a 25-year-old man and his 22-year-old wife in their field in Mayangose village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men abducted a 25-year-old man and his 22-year-old wife in their field in Mayangose village in Beni territory. The direction taken by the kidnappers and the hostages is unknown.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 22-year-old man in his field in Musanda village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 22-year-old man in his field in Musanda village in Beni territory. The kidnappers stole $200 fro the victim. They demanded a ransom of $30,000.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Chifunzi village in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Chifunzi village in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants raped and wounded a 65-year-old woman. When the victim's neighbors sounded the alert the assailants ran away.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a 52-year-old man and his 24-year-old son in the Paida neighborhood of Beni as the soldier wanted to steal the victims' goat.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a 52-year-old man and his 24-year-old son in the Paida neighborhood of Beni as the soldier was trying to steal the victims' goat.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked an unidentified armed group in Mianzi village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked an unidentified armed group in Mianzi village, Shabunda territory. Two of the assailants were killed during the clash. The FARDC seized two AK-47 weapons.

title/0/en: The police dispersed a peaceful demonstration organized by students in Kamituga, Mwenga territory, demanding the rehabilitation of the national road that runs through town.
notes/en: The police dispersed a peaceful demonstration organized by students in Kamituga, Mwenga territory, demanding the rehabilitation of the national road that runs through town. The police arrested three students and two men who were passing by. Two students were injured.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into the ISP school compound in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu during the night. The assailants tortured one of the guards.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into the ISP school compound in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu during the night. The assailants tortured one of the guards. They looted money and three computers.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons abducted the chief of Kasitu locality in Kunguta village, Beni territory.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons abducted the chief of Kasitu locality in Kunguta village, Beni territory. The kidnappers and their hostage fled towards an unknown destination.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Mirangi village in Rutshuru territory to steal cows.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Mirangi village in Rutshuru territory to steal cows. Alerted by the population, the Nyatura Domi intervened to try and prevent the looting. A clash followed between the two armed groups. Four shepherds were killed and five were injured during the clash. The assailants managed to steal 30 cows.

title/0/en: The FARDC organized a search-and-seizure operation in Mutarule I village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FARDC organized a search-and-seizure operation in Mutarule I village in Uvira territory. Eighteen alleged RED Tabara combatants were captured during the operation. The FARDC also found military items.

title/0/en: As they arrived in Lukonfu village in Masisi territory, the FARDC shot bullets as a land conflict persists between dealers.
notes/en: As they arrived in Lukonfu village in Masisi territory, the FARDC shot about at random. There is a simmering land conflict in the village. The FARDC injured two men.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen abducted a 58-year-old man and his 50-year-old wife in their field in Mayangose village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen abducted a 58-year-old man and his 50-year-old wife in their field in Mayangose village in Beni territory. Their destination is unknown.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men stole sixteen fishermen's nets on Kivu Lake close to Mugererebo village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men stole sixteen fishermen's nets on Kivu Lake close to Mugererebo village in Kabare territory. Alerted by the fishermen, the FARDC intervened and captured one of the assailants. The assailants abandoned the looted nets.

title/0/en: An unidentified man took a 9-year-old boy to an unknown destination in Buziralo village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An unidentified man took a 9-year-old boy to an unknown destination in Buziralo village in Kalehe territory. The victim's body was found beheaded with a crude weapon. The criminal stole his genitals and liver.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men tried to hold up a FUSO vehicle close to Vitshumbi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men tried to hold up a FUSO vehicle close to Vitshumbi village in Rutshuru territory. As the driver accelerated, the assailants shot at the vehicle, killing a 43-year-old man.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Kabishula fighters injured two men and looted goods in Kisha village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Kabishula fighters injured two men and looted goods in Kisha village in Kalehe territory. The incident happened after civilians demanded the men to give them back a Motorola telephone that they had stolen from a civilian.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the CNRD position in Busumba village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the CNRD position in Busumba village in Masisi territory. The attack resulted in one FARDC and one CNRD killed.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Buciro village in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Buciro village in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants injured a 45-year-old man. They looted goods in the victim's shop.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons broke into a farm called Hewa Safi in Nyabirehe village in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons broke into a farm called Hewa Safi in Nyabirehe village in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants tortured and injured two shepherds.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Rutsiro village in Rutshuru territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Rutsiro village in Rutshuru territory during the night. The assailants kidnapped a 35-year-old man. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2,000 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men who had kidnapped two British tourists and an ICCN driver in Kibaya village in Nyiragongo territory released the hostages after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men who had kidnapped two British tourists and an ICCN driver in Kibaya village in Nyiragongo territory released the hostages after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: ANR agents arrested a man in Bulambo village in Beni territory suspecting him of being a Mai-Mai Mazembe combatant.
notes/en: ANR agents arrested a man in Bulambo village in Beni territory suspecting him of being a Mai-Mai Mazembe combatant. The victim was taken to the FARDC camp in Bulambo. The FARDC tortured the victim, who died from his wounds in the military camp. The FARDC buried the victim without informing the family.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house and a shop in the Panzi neighborhood of Bukavu.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house and a shop in the Panzi neighborhood of Bukavu. The assailants looted money and goods. As they were escaping, the assailants shot bullets in the air to deter neighbors from intervening.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Kibirizi village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants shot and killed a 35-year-old woman.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Kibirizi village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants shot and killed a 35-year-old woman.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Wemba, Ngandu and their allies raided Nyakavunga, Mwagati and Kasili villages in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Wemba, Ngandu and their allies raided Nyakavunga, Mwagati and Kasili villages in Shabunda territory. The assailants stole three pigs, six goats, twelve chickens, solar panels, radios, clothes and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Kaligi, Kiseku, Nyabasanganyi, Nyakavunga, Mwagati and Kasili villages in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Kaligi, Kiseku, Nyabasanganyi, Nyakavunga, Mwagati and Kasili villages in Shabunda territory. The assailants looted money, goats, chickens, food and other goods. They forced eight civilians to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles held up a motorcycle close to Kinyonzo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles held up a motorcycle close to Kinyonzo village in Rutshuru territory. The robbers kidnapped the motorcycle driver and his two clients. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $9,000 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into the compound of Espoir School in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into the compound of Espoir School in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu during the night. The assailants tied up the guards and injured one of them with the butt of a gun. They stole money, two laptops and books.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed a vehicle belonging to the Virunga National Park close to Kibaya village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed a vehicle belonging to the Virunga National Park close to Kibaya village in Nyiragongo territory. One park ranger was killed, and the driver and two tourists were kidnapped by the assailants.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a  pastor in Rugarama village in Masisi territory, released the hostage after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a  pastor in Rugarama village in Masisi territory, released the hostage after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms broke into ten houses in the Kibondwe neighborhood of Uvira during the night.
notes/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms broke into ten houses in the Kibondwe neighborhood of Uvira during the night. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into Nyakibamba village chief's house in Idjwi territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into Nyakibamba village chief's house in Idjwi territory during the night. The assailants shot and killed the village chief. During their escape, the assailants shot a man and a boy they ran into. The two victims died on the spot.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked FNL/Nibizi combatants at the roadblock they had just set up in Kahololo village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked FNL/Nibizi combatants at the roadblock they had just set up in Kahololo village in Uvira territory. Two FNL/Nibizi combatants were killed during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a trader in Sovere village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a trader in Sovere village in Walikale territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom to release the hostage.

title/0/en: The FARDC, obeying their S2 (intelligence officer) commander, orders shot two policemen who refused to release the commander's cousin who was being held in jail in Nyange village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC, obeying their S2 (intelligence officer) commander, orders shot two policemen who refused to release the commander's cousin who was being held in jail in Nyange village in Fizi territory. The FARDC injured four policemen. Nevertheless, the detainee was not released.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen stole a bag full of money from a female trader in the Songo neighborhood of Uvira
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen stole a bag full of money from a female trader in the Songo neighborhood of Uvira. There was $3,242 and Burundian francs in the bag.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men abducted a pastor of the 34th CADAF church in Rugarama village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men abducted a pastor of the 34th CADAF church in Rugarama village in Masisi territory. The kidnappers did not demand a ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a man in Mugogo village in Uvira territory released the hostage.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a man in Mugogo village in Uvira territory released the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked a delegation that included both FARDC and civilians while it was on its way to Malolu in Beni territory to retrieve the body of a man killed with a crude weapon.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked a delegation that included both FARDC and civilians while it was on its way to Malolu in Beni territory to retrieve the body of a man killed with a crude weapon. Four FARDC and one civilian were killed.

title/0/en: Three unidentified armed men broke into a hotel in Kambara village in Walungu territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified armed men broke into a hotel in Kambara village in Walungu territory. The assailants shot and killed the policeman guarding the hotel and looted money and goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Mutaho village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Mutaho village in Nyiragongo territory. The population fled from the shooting. The assailants looted livestock and goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu. The assailants looted money and goods. The assailants shot bullets in the air to scare the young people who wanted to rescue the victim.

title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men stole fishermen's nets on Lake Kivu close to Minova village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men stole fishermen's nets on Lake Kivu close to Minova village in Kalehe territory. The assailants shot and killed a fisherman.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a 27-year-old man close to Malolu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a 27-year-old man close to Malolu village in Beni territory. The victim's body was found in a state of advanced decomposition.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men abducted five women and five men in Mbongya, Mabambila and Nyaleke villages in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men abducted five women and five men in Mbongya, Mabambila and Nyaleke villages in Beni territory. The kidnappers did not demand a ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Butemure village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Butemure village in Masisi territory. The assailants killed the owner, the chief of Butemure.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a policeman and wounded another one in Kisuma village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a policeman and wounded another one in Kisuma village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: Four unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Pakanza neighborhood of Oicha.
notes/en: Four unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Pakanza neighborhood of Oicha. The assailants shot a 34-year-old woman and her 40-year-old husband. The woman died from her wounds.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into an Airtel money shop in the Cashi neighborhood of Bukavu.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into an Airtel money shop in the Cashi neighborhood of Bukavu. The assailants looted money and telephones. They shot and killed a taxi driver and wounded four people. An injured woman died from the wounds at the hospital.

title/0/en: Twenty five Mai-Mai CNPSC raided Namaona village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Twenty five Mai-Mai CNPSC raided Namaona village in Fizi territory. The assailants looted food and goods. They forced civilians to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men stole $48, two cows, four goats and goods close to Nguliro village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men stole $48, two cows, four goats and goods close to Nguliro village in Kalehe territory. The assailants raped three women and injured another one.

title/0/en: Two of the seven women abducted by the FDLR-RUD in Kibende village in Rutshuru territory escaped from the kidnappers.
notes/en: Two of the seven women abducted by the FDLR-RUD in Kibende village in Rutshuru territory escaped from the kidnappers.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into four houses in the Panzi neighborhood of Bukavu.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into four houses in the Panzi neighborhood of Bukavu. The assailants looted money and goods. They also injured four men.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a woman with a crude weapon in the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a woman with a crude weapon in the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma. The victim's body was found in the morning and her son went missing.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Nzenga I village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Nzenga I village in Beni territory. The assailants shot and killed a 27-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a motorcycle and abducted two people close to Kise village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a motorcycle and abducted two people close to Kise village in Rutshuru territory. As they passed through a field, the kidnappers also abducted two other people. As they reached Rwindi river, one of the hostages managed to escape. The kidnappers initially demanded a ransom of $500 per person and subsequently of $1,500 per hostage to release them.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a woman and a 15-year-old girl on a road leading to their fields in Kibende village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a woman and a 15-year-old girl on a road leading to their fields in Kibende village, Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $1,500 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: Diggers demonstrated against the arrest of their colleagues and the ban on accessing mining sites in Rubaya village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Diggers demonstrated against the arrest of their colleagues and the ban on accessing mining sites in Rubaya village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: The police and FARDC shot artisanal miners who were demonstrating against the arrest of their colleagues and the ban over access the mining sites.
notes/en: The police and FARDC shot artisanal miners who were demonstrating against the arrest of their colleagues and the ban over access the mining sites. Two miners were injured during the incident.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a 37-year-old woman with a crude weapon in her field in Kaukebo village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a 37-year-old woman with a crude weapon in her field in Kaukebo village in Beni territory. The victim's body was found with wounds on her head and neck.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers looted civilians belongings in the Shanje market in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers looted civilians belongings in the Shanje market in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a 32-year-old man with a crude weapon in his field in Kudukudu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a 32-year-old man with a crude weapon in his field in Kudukudu village in Beni territory. The victim's body was found disemboweled.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed two shops in Buciro village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed two shops in Buciro village in Kalehe territory. The assailants injured a man who wanted to alert the population with a machete. They looted goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Mugogo village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Mugogo village in Uvira territory. The assailants killed a woman and injured a policeman.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into two houses in Kizimba village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into two houses in Kizimba village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants stole $727 and shot and wounded a girl when the owner of one of the houses wanted to capture one of the assailants.

title/0/en: CNRD combatants clashed among themselves in Bitongi village in Masisi territory following a disagreement over whether they should join the NDC Guidon group.
notes/en: CNRD combatants clashed among themselves in Bitongi village in Masisi territory following a disagreement over whether they should join the NDC Guidon group. Seven CNRD and two civilians were killed, one CNRD and one civilian were injured,

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kirikicho captured a policeman in Mianda village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kirikicho captured a policeman in Mianda village in Kalehe territory. The armed group commander released the captured policeman.

title/0/en: Twiganeho combatants attacked unidentified armed men who injured cows in Kinyunyi village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Twiganeho combatants attacked unidentified armed men who were injuring cows in Kinyunyi village, Uvira territory. The Twiganeho injured 27 cows belonging to the Bafuliru. Five civilians were killed during the attack.

title/0/en: Miners demonstrated in Rubaya in Masisi territory against the eviction of diggers from mining sites belonging to the COPERAMA cooperative.
notes/en: Miners demonstrated in Rubaya in Masisi territory against the eviction of diggers from mining sites belonging to the COPERAMA cooperative. The demonstrators also demanded the release of their colleagues who were arrested by the police. They tried to block the road going to Goma.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen wearing FARDC uniforms broke into a house in Kisaka village in Lubero territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen wearing FARDC uniforms broke into a house in Kisaka village in Lubero territory during the night. The assailants demanded money and the victims gave them $1,200. The assailants killed the two men.

title/0/en: Five armed men wearing FARDC uniforms broke into a camp of flood victims in the Kavimira neighborhood of Uvira during the night.
notes/en: During the night, five armed men wearing FARDC uniforms broke into a camp of people who had been displaced by flooding in the Kavimira neighborhood of Uvira. The assailants looted money and goods. They injured three men aged 30, 36 and 50.

title/0/en: The FARDC shot and killed a 23-year-old woman in Kisiki village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC shot and killed a 23-year-old woman in Kisiki village in Beni territory. The FARDC thought she was an enemy as she was walking alone during the night in this unsafe area.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali abducted two men in Kibanga village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali abducted two men in Kibanga village in Uvira territory. Alerted to the abduction, other armed men in the village gave pursuit and fired at the assaillants in vain.

title/0/en: The police stole two goats in Keisha village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The police stole two goats in Keisha village in Shabunda territory. The village's youth chased the policemen and managed to take two policemen's weapons. The policemen then arrested the village chief.

title/0/en: The FARDC stole $24, three goats and two chickens in Chambombo village in Kalehe territory during a mediation session following the destruction of crops by cows.
notes/en: The FARDC stole $24, three goats and two chickens in Chambombo village in Kalehe territory during a mediation session following the destruction of crops by cows.

title/0/en: A Raia Mutomboki Kabishula fighter killed his armed colleague in Kasuru village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: A Raia Mutomboki Kabishula fighter killed his armed colleague in Kasuru village in Kalehe territory. The civilians who were present managed to catch the assailant and handed him over to the FARDC.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD broke into a house in Kashwa 3 village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD broke into a house in Kashwa 3 village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants abducted a 60-year-old woman.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Kinyunyi village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Kinyunyi village in Uvira territory. The assailants shot and wounded a woman and a man. The victims were hospitalized at Kinyunyi health center.

title/0/en: An FARDC shot and killed a 72-year-old man in Kavalala in Beni territory as the victim was coming back home from his field in Beni.
notes/en: An FARDC shot and killed a 72-year-old man in Kavalala in Beni territory as the victim was coming back home from his field in Beni. When the civilians wanted to recover the victim's body the same evening, the FARDC shot to disperse them. The FARDC injured six civilians.

title/0/en: The police arrested 30 LUCHA activists during a peaceful demonstration organized on the occasion of the mouvement's sixth anniversary in Goma.
notes/en: The police arrested 30 LUCHA activists during a peaceful demonstration organized on the occasion of the mouvement's sixth anniversary in Goma.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD attacked a convoy close to Busendo in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD attacked a convoy close to Busendo in Rutshuru territory. Four FDLR-RUD combatants and two civilians were killed, an FARDC soldier and two civilians were injured during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men robbed a shop in Minova village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men robbed a shop in Minova village in Kalehe territory. The robbers stole $24, two boxes of Primus drinks, eleven boxes of wine and hair braids.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raped two women close to Katasomwa village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raped two women close to Katasomwa village in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole $51,

title/0/en: An unidentified armed man shot a 22-year-old man in Musimba village in Lubero territory as the victim was coming back from the toilet.
notes/en: An unidentified armed man shot a 22-year-old man in Musimba village in Lubero territory as the victim was coming back from the toilet. The victim died from his injuries.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a vehicle coming back from Mitamba market close to Gongwa village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a vehicle coming back from Mitamba market close to Gongwa village in Uvira territory. The assailants shot and killed a local leader and looted some goods. They abducted two people.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a man in Mitamba village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a man in Mitamba village in Uvira territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot civilians in a shopping area in the Mugunga neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot civilians in a shopping area in the Mugunga neighborhood of Goma. Six people died and 22 were injured during the shooting.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men, aged 31 and 29, in Nakashoma village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two men, aged 31 and 29, in Nakashoma village in Uvira territory. Alerted by the population the FARDC pursued the kidnappers and shot at them but missed.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a police commander close to Matanda village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a police commander close to Matanda village in Masisi territory. The victim was coming back from Mushaki.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Love broke into a house in Kachayi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Love broke into a house in Kachayi village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants shot and killed two men. They left the house without stealing anything.

title/0/en: A coalition of Nyatura Domi and FDLR-RUD attacked the FARDC position in Kirumba village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: A coalition of Nyatura Domi and FDLR-RUD attacked the FARDC position in Kirumba village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants burned down a house and damaged two vehicles. With the help of reinforcement from Bambu, the FARDC repelled the assailants. Two FARDC were killed and two Nyatura were injured during the attack.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Domi position in Bundase village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Domi position in Bundase village in Rutshuru territory. Two Nyatura were killed and two civilians were shot and wounded during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: Youth in the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni lamenting the growing insecurity in their area threw stones at a convoy of FARDC and Nepalese peacekeepers.
notes/en: Youth in the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni lamenting the growing insecurity in their area threw stones at a convoy of FARDC and Nepalese peacekeepers. The FARDC and the peacekeepers shot bullets and wounded a 12-year-old boy and a 14-year-old girl.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed with a crude weapon a 60-year-old man in the field close to Rukoro village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a 60-year-old man in the field close to Rukoro village in Rutshuru territory with a crude weapon. The victim's family found the beheaded body in the forest.

title/0/en: The FARDC tortured and wounded a man at Minova market in Kalehe territory following his refusal to follow the soldiers to the prosecutor's office.
notes/en: The FARDC tortured and wounded a man at Minova market in Kalehe territory following his refusal to follow the soldiers to the prosecutor's office. The victim pleaded not guilty.

title/0/en: The police shot a man carrying a spear in Butembo city center.
notes/en: The police shot a man carrying a spear in Butembo city center. The man injured a policeman with the spear. The police was supported by the FARDC in pursuit of the fleeing man. During the chasing the police injured a woman. Late at night the FARDC killed the man.

title/0/en: A taxi driver who had taken on board two FARDC soldiers coming from Oicha and going to Beni in the morning was found shot and dead in Ngadi, south of Beni, two hours later.
notes/en: A taxi driver who had transported two FARDC soldiers from Oicha to Beni in the morning was found shot and dead in Ngadi, south of Beni, two hours later. The victim's body was found next to his motorcycle.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Kalungu village in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Kalungu village in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants looted goods in the houses and shops.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed an FDLR-FOCA officer in Mianja village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed an FDLR-FOCA officer in Mianja village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Kisharo village in Rutshuru territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Kisharo village in Rutshuru territory during the night. When the house owners resisted, the assailants shot the father and his son. The two injured victims were transferred to Goma for treatment.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into thirteen houses in the Kasenga neighborhood of Uvira during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into thirteen houses in the Kasenga neighborhood of Uvira during the night. The assailants stole $1,500, five telephones and other goods. They shot and wounded four people.

title/0/en: The CNRD broke into Kalonge IDP camp in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The CNRD broke into the Kalonge IDP camp in Walikale territory. The assailants looted goods and forced five men to carry them.

title/0/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms broke into a compound in the Bakaiku neighborhood of Oicha.
notes/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms broke into a compound in the Bakaiku neighborhood of Oicha. The assailants looted goods and shot and wounded the compound owner.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a 40-year-old man on the road close to Kibenete village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a 40-year-old man on the road close to Kibenete village in Rutshuru territory. The victim was returning from Kikuku market on his motorcycle.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons broke into a house in the Keyshero neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons broke into a house in the Keyshero neighborhood of Goma. The assailants looted money and goods. They tried to rape the women there but did not succeed.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Wemba, Ngandu and their allies who forced civilians to carry looted goods in Lutika village in Shabunda territory released the hostages.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Wemba, Raia Mutomboki Ngandu and their allies who had forced civilians to carry looted goods in Lutika village in Shabunda territory released the hostages.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who abducted a man in Rutsiro village in Rutshuru territory released the hostage after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: The kidnappers who abducted a man in Rutsiro village in Rutshuru territory released the hostage after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: The FDLR-FOCA attacked the FARDC position in Katale, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-FOCA attacked the FARDC position in Katale, Rutshuru territory. The FDLR-FOCA were seeking revenge against the FARDC following the destruction of their charcoal kiln.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a man in Rutsiro village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a man in Rutsiro village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom to release the hostage.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Karakara position in Mukuyu village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Karakara position in Mukuyu village in Uvira territory. Two Mai-Mai Karakara were killed and one was captured during the attack.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika raided Kabulongo village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika raided Kabulongo village in Shabunda territory. The assailants abducted a 38-year-old man and looted livestock and goods. When they came back, the FARDC captured two of the assailants.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men looted money, telephones and other goods from traders who were going to the market close to Kyabula village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men looted money, telephones and other goods from traders who were going to the market close to Kyabula village in Fizi territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Runion held up a RAV4 car close to Ngalua village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Runion held up a RAV4 car close to Ngalua village in Fizi territory. The assailants looted money and telephones.

title/0/en: The police dispersed LUCHA activists and other supporters who were peacefully demonstrating in Beni against the massacres of civilians.
notes/en: The police dispersed LUCHA activists and other supporters who were peacefully demonstrating in Beni against the massacres of civilians. The police injured four activists and arrested 42 others.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a farm in Tahiro village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a farm in Tahiro village in Uvira territory. The assailants killed seventeen cows and injured 39.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a woman in Miveya in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a woman in Miveya in Lubero territory. The victim's body was found with evidence of torture and a bullet wound.

title/0/en: An unidentified armed man shot a civilian in the Kikimba neighborhood of Kirumba commune.
notes/en: An unidentified armed man shot a civilian in the Kikimba neighborhood of Kirumba commune. The injured victim was hospitalized at Ndihira hospital.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Majengo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Majengo village in Rutshuru territory. They stole $30, a telephone and eight goats in two houses.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Wemba, Ngandu and their allies raided Lutika village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Wemba, Ngandu and their allies raided Lutika village in Shabunda territory. The assailants stole four goats, sixteen chickens, six solar panels and other goods. The assailants abducted civilians to carry the looted goods. They also raped four women.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money and goods close to Katongo village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money and goods close to Katongo village in Fizi territory. The victims of the looting were going to Sebele market.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men stole $1,212, 50 grams of gold and other goods in Kalonge in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men stole $1,212, 50 grams of gold and other goods in Kalonge in Walikale territory. The assailants injured a 42-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Tarika and Bushandaba villages in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Tarika and Bushandaba villages in Rutshuru territory. The assailants looted money, livestock and goods.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men who were trying to abduct a man in the Musenyi neighborhood of Sange rural commune.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men who were trying to abduct a man in the Musenyi neighborhood of Sange rural commune. The FARDC killed two assailants and seized one weapon.

title/0/en: Unidentified men tortured and injured a man close to Kisharo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men tortured and injured a man close to Kisharo village in Rutshuru territory. The victim died at the local health center.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the FARDC position in Ntoto village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the FARDC position in Ntoto village in Walikale territory. One FARDC and one assailant died during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed with a crude weapon an FARDC captain in the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed an FARDC captain in the Rwangoma neighborhood of Beni with a crude weapon. The captain's body was found with his throat cut in Rwangoma cemetery.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men stole five off-board motors and other goods from fishermen close to Karamba village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men stole five off-board motors and other goods from fishermen close to Karamba village in Fizi territory. The incident occurred as the fishermen were on the lake.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD broke into the Catholic sector, a primary and a secondary school, in Kiseguru village in Rutshuru territory during the night.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD broke into the Catholic sector, which is composed of a primary and a secondary school, in Kiseguru village in Rutshuru territory during the night. The assailants stole $350, bags of soy flour and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen tried to break into a house in the Kimanga neighborhood of Uvira.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen tried to break into a house in the Kimanga neighborhood of Uvira. As the woman tried to help her husband escape through the window, the assailants shot her twice in the back, killing her on the spot. The assailants also abducted the husband.

title/0/en: Three unidentified armed men abducted a 64-year-old man in Mahungubwe village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified armed men abducted a 64-year-old man in Mahungubwe village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers did not demand a ransom.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed another soldier in the Boikene neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed another soldier in the Boikene neighborhood of Beni. Alerted by the population over the misbehavior of a soldier, the platoon commander tried to reprimand his colleague, but was shot in the chest and died.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki position in Wasamba village in Shabunda territory. The
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Wemba position in Wasamba village in Shabunda territory. The FARDC killed the armed group chief, Wemba, during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed two men in Mweso in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed two men in Mweso in Masisi territory. The population discovered the victim's bodies handcuffed in the Mweso river.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali stole 53 cows in a farm in Sango village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali stole 53 cows in a farm in Sango village in Uvira territory. Alerted by the population, the FARDC attacked the assailants and managed to free 40 cows.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Kabishula fighters tortured and wounded three boys in Kisha village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Kabishula fighters tortured and wounded three boys in Kisha village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 57-year-old man on the road close to Nyawaranga village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 57-year-old man on the road close to Nyawaranga village in Uvira territory. The victim went to Nyawaranga village to collect his goats.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD who had kidnapped a woman and her 4-year-old son in Kapsa village in Rutshuru territory on April 16, 2018, released the hostages after a ransom of $600, two telephones and a box of wine was paid.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD who had kidnapped a woman and her 4-year-old son in Kapsa village in Rutshuru territory on April 16, 2018, released the hostages after a ransom of $600, two telephones and a box of wine was paid.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked unidentified armed men in Vuvenga village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked unidentified armed men in Vuvenga village in Lubero territory. The Mai-Mai Mazembe burned down a building belonging to their enemies. The Mai-Mai Mazembe abducted three men and stole fifteen goats and goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Luhihi village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Luhihi village in Kabare territory. The FARDC and the police attacked them as they were trying to loot the population's belongings. The FARDC seized two AK-47s. The assailants managed to escape.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Rugenge neighborhood of Uvira commune.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Rugenge neighborhood of Uvira commune. The assailants shot and wounded a 40-year-old man and stole his telephone.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up three vehicles close to Nyaleke village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up three vehicles close to Nyaleke village in Beni territory. The assailants looted sacks of flour, sugar, fishes, salt and goats. The assailants set fire to the vehicles and killed four people. They also abducted several people.

title/0/en: The police repressed a peaceful demonstration of former members of the Coopec Imara which has been bankrupt since 2013, in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu.
notes/en: The police repressed a peaceful demonstration of former members of the Coopec Imara which has been bankrupt since 2013, in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu. One civilian was injured during the repression.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga raided Bimpanga village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga raided Bimpanga village in Shabunda territory. The assailants looted goods and forced twenty people to carry them. They raped two women, aged 27 and 38, and injured a man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 38-year-old man in Mangolikene village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 38-year-old man in Mangolikene village in Beni territory. The victim was returning from his field.

title/0/en: The ADF killed a motorcycle driver and his client close to Tungudu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF killed a motorcycle driver and his client close to Tungudu village in Beni territory. The victims were leaving Oicha to go to Ndalya market in Ituri province.

title/0/en: Following the killing of two civilians close to Tungudu village in Beni territory, the FARDC chased and attacked the ADF who had just perpetrated the killing.
notes/en: Following the killing of two civilians close to Tungudu village in Beni territory, the FARDC chased and attacked the ADF who had just perpetrated the killing. One ADF was killed during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed two men close to Kasitu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed two men close to Kasitu village in Beni territory. The assailants stole the victims' motorcycles.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a woman in the Buturande neighborhood of Kiwanja on April 16, 2018 released the hostage after a ransom of $1,800 was paid.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a woman in the Buturande neighborhood of Kiwanja on April 16, 2018 released the hostage after a ransom of $1,800 was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified men abducted a nurse in Mweso village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men abducted a nurse in Mweso village in Masisi territory. The kidnappers did not demand a ransom.

title/0/en: Three Mai-Mai Mazembe who were trying to loot goods in a shop in Buna village in Beni territory shot and killed a policeman who wanted to prevent them from looting.
notes/en: Three Mai-Mai Mazembe who were trying to loot goods in a shop in Buna village in Beni territory shot and killed a policeman who wanted to prevent them from looting. The policeman was on his way from Mangina commune to Mabalako on an official mission.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Love broke into the house of Chumba local customary chief in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Love broke into the house of Chumba local customary chief in Rutshuru territory. The assailants shot him, his 6-year-old boy and a woman who was sitting next to the chief. The victims died on the spot.

title/0/en: Armed men who forced four men to carry looted goods, released the hostages in Hutwe village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Armed men who forced four men to carry looted goods, released the hostages in Hutwe village in Lubero territory. The kidnappers did not demand any ransom.

title/0/en: Suspected ADF/NALU abducted two people in their fields at PK 13 on Mbau-Kamango axe.
notes/en: Suspected ADF/NALU abducted two people in their fields at PK 13 on Mbau-Kamango axe.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Nyakiliba beat and arrested two people in Kasenyi, Muvunyikibabi groupement in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Nyatura beat and arrested two people in Kasenyi, Muvunyikibabi groupement in Masisi territory.  The two were released after fines were paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a man close to Kaluhimbo village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a man close to Kaluhimbo village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who had abducted a man in Kibulba village in Nyiragongo territory killed the hostage and the two men who had come to hand over a sum of $800 as an advance for the demanded ransom.
notes/en: The kidnappers who had abducted a man in Kibumba village in Nyiragongo territory killed the hostage and the two men who had come to hand over a sum of $800 as an advance for the demanded ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Bundje village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Bundje village in Kalehe territory. One of the assailants raped a 13-year-old girl.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men stole eight cows in Butanya village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men stole eight cows in Butanya village in Uvira territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men forced four men to carry looted goods in Kamandi in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men forced four men to carry looted goods in Kamandi in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: During a meeting between the Nyatura Domi and APCLS combatants, a fight broke out between the two armed groups in Bunkuba village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: During a meeting between the Nyatura Domi and APCLS combatants, a fight broke out between the two armed groups in Bunkuba village in Rutshuru territory. Two APCLS and two Nyatura Domi combatants were killed and one Nyatura Domi was injured during the clash.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon ambushed the FARDC close to Basombe village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon ambushed the FARDC close to Basombe village in Walikale territory. Two FARDC were killed and two were injured during the ambush.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped an 8-year-old child in Bugumba village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped an 8-year-old child in Bugumba village in Nyiragongo territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom to release the hostage.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga broke into Parking mining site in Shabunda territory. The assailants attacked the three FARDC soldiers who were patrolling the mining site.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga broke into Parking mining site in Shabunda territory. The assailants attacked the three FARDC soldiers who were patrolling the mining site. One FARDC soldier was killed. The assailants looted the site.

title/0/en: APCLS combatants attacked a position of unidentified armed men in Kilambo village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: APCLS combatants attacked a position of unidentified armed men in Kilambo village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a student in Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a student in Goma. The kidnappers demanded a ransom to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Kabishula fighters tortured and wounded a man in Mafuo village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Kabishula fighters tortured and wounded a man in Mafuo village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Mule village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Mule village in Kalehe territory. The assailants looted goods in several houses. When they reached the PNC commander's house, the assailants captured the policeman. They stole an AK-47 and looted goods.

title/0/en: Once arrived in Ngite village in Beni territory, gunmen held up a mini bus coming from Butembo and driving to Oicha.
notes/en: Once arrived in Ngite village in Beni territory, gunmen held up a mini bus coming from Butembo and driving to Oicha. The assailants shot at the mini bus. They wounded five men and two women who were travelling aboard of the bus. They burned down two houses. They also looted goods in a shop and stole three goats.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men wearing FARDC and police uniforms forced two young boys aged 18 and 19 to show them the way to reach Ngite village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men wearing FARDC and police uniforms forced two young boys aged 18 and 19 to show them the way to reach Ngite village in Beni territory. The assailants then beheaded the hostages on the National Road #4.

Unidentified gunmen ran into a 38-year-old woman and her two sons aged 4 and 7 in her field close to Kapsa village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants kidnapped the woman and her 4-year-old son. They demanded that the 7-year-old boy take their phone number to their family so that they could be reached. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $1,580 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a mini-bus belonging to "Le volcan" transportation company close to Cotonco village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a mini-bus belonging to "Le volcan" transportation company close to Cotonco village in Uvira territory. The assailants looted passengers' money and goods.

title/0/en: UPDI combatants coming from Katwakalenda village looted three houses in Mulito village, Musindi groupement in Batangi chieftaincy, Lubero territory.
notes/en: UPDI combatants coming from Katwakalenda village looted three houses in Mulito village, Musindi groupement in Batangi chieftaincy, Lubero territory.

title/0/en: An unidentified gunman raped a 15-year-old girl in Kamiriano village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An unidentified gunman raped a 15-year-old girl in Kamiriano village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Buturande neighborhood of Kiwanja during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Buturande neighborhood of Kiwanja during the night. The assailants looted money and goods. They forced a 40-year-old woman to follow them and demanded a ransom of $1,500 to release her.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a shop in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a shop in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu. The assailants looted money and goods. The assailants shot bullets in the air to clear the way.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Nkwenda village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Nkwenda village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants looted goods in five houses. They kidnapped a man and demanded a ransom of $500 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen stole seven goats in Mugadja village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen stole seven goats in Mugadja village in Uvira territory. The assailants tied up the shepherds.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a FUSO vehicle in Virunga park in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a FUSO vehicle in Virunga park in Nyiragongo territory. The assailants looted goods and injured certain passengers.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped two men, aged 42 and 25, in Cotonco village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped two men, aged 42 and 25, in Cotonco village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $10,000 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ngandu raided Keba and Wamery villages in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ngandu raided Keba and Wamery villages in Shabunda territory. The assailants looted goods and abducted eight people.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who took position on the road close to Lupango village in Uvira territory, shot and killed a man and a woman.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who took position on the road close to Lupango village in Uvira territory, shot and killed a man and a woman. The assailants were planning to hold up traders' cars driving back from Rubanga market.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe who had kidnapped the chief of Kavingu cellule in the Lyakobo neighborhood of Beni on April 6, 2018, released the hostage after a ransom of $700 was paid.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe who had kidnapped the chief of Kavingu cellule in the Lyakobo neighborhood of Beni on April 6, 2018, released the hostage after a ransom of $700 was paid. The kidnappers tortured and injured the hostage.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked armed men in Masika village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked armed men in Masika village in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into an Airtel money shop in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into an Airtel money shop in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu. The assailants looted money, telephones and pre-paid cards to be sold.

title/0/en: The Nyatura FDP captured an FARDC soldier in Rugari village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura FDP captured an FARDC soldier in Rugari village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants killed the captured soldier and seized his weapon.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Karambi village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Karambi village in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot a taxi driver in Misisi village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot a taxi driver in Misisi village in Fizi territory. The incident followed the refusal of two FARDC soldiers who had come from Lulimba to pay their fare to the taxi driver. The victim died on the spot.

title/0/en: The FARDC dispersed the population that wanted to go to the forest to look for the farmers who had fled following an attack in the Ngadi neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: The FARDC dispersed the population that wanted to go to the forest to look for the farmers who had fled following an attack in the Ngadi neighborhood of Beni. An FARDC soldier shot a 40-year-old man. The victim died from his wounds at Beni general hospital.

title/0/en: Six unidentified gunmen raped a 32-year-old woman close to Kilombwe village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Six unidentified gunmen raped a 32-year-old woman close to Kilombwe village in Fizi territory. The victim was leaving Misisi to go to Lulimba to pay a visit to her sister-in-law who had just given birth.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Maghutu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Maghutu village in Beni territory. The FARDC repelled the assailants. While searching the FARDC stole $110, sixteen chickens and twenty-five goats.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Kasambiryo village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Kasambiryo village in Beni territory. The assailants abducted a 32-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men forced a 60-year-old man to carry a bunch of bananas close to the Ngadi neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men forced a 60-year-old man to carry a bunch of bananas close to the Ngadi neighborhood of Beni. The assailants killed the hostage before attacking an FARDC position.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked an FARDC position in the Ngadi neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked an FARDC position in the Ngadi neighborhood of Beni. The FARDC repelled the assailants.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men stole sixteen cows in Sango village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men stole sixteen cows in Sango village in Uvira territory. The FARDC who intervened did not find the assailants.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier tortured and injured a woman fish trader at the market in Shabunda center.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier tortured and injured a woman fish trader at the market in Shabunda center.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Kasithu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Kasithu village in Beni territory. The FARDC repelled the Mai-Mai.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into nine houses in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into nine houses in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu during the night. The assailants stole money, six computers and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a gold trader's house in Miba in Fizi territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a gold trader's house in Miba in Fizi territory during the night. The assailants looted money. They shot the chief of the household. The victim died from his wounds.

title/0/en: Four unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle close to Malinde village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle close to Malinde village in Fizi territory. The assailants looted the victims' belongings. The motorcycle driver was injured as he braked to dodge the bullets shot by the assailants.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a FUSO vehicle close to Ecibe village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a FUSO vehicle close to Ecibe village in Fizi territory. The assailants looted money and goods. They searched two women's private parts to find the gold they were hiding.

title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men who had kidnapped a 61-year-old man in Kasenga village in Uvira territory on April 10, 2018, released the hostage after a ransom of $1,500 was paid.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men who had kidnapped a 61-year-old man in Kasenga village in Uvira territory on April 10, 2018, released the hostage after a ransom of $1,500 was paid.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Love who had kidnapped two men in Lutehe village in Rutshuru territory on April 9, 2018 released the hostages after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: The Nyatura Love who had kidnapped two men in Lutehe village in Rutshuru territory on April 9, 2018 released the hostages after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a woman close to Vuhumbi village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a woman close to Vuhumbi village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the prison guarded by policemen and the FARDC in Katasomwa in Kalehe territory in an attempt to free their colleagues captured during the Mushunguti village clashes.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the prison guarded by policemen and the FARDC in Katasomwa in Kalehe territory in an attempt to free their colleagues captured during the Mushunguti village clashes. One FARDC soldier was injured. The assailants failed to free their captured colleagues.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen broke into a plot in Kasenga village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen broke into a compound in Kasenga village in Uvira territory. The assailants kidnapped the manager in charge of the compound; the attack went unnoticed by the other family members who were in the same compound. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $5,000 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle close to Kamukoba village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle close to Kamukoba village in Fizi territory. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: The FARDC supported by the Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked unidentified armed men in Karambi village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC supported by the Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked unidentified armed men in Karambi village in Lubero territory. One Mai-Mai Mazembe combatant died during the attack. The FARDC and the Mai-Mai Mazembe burned down the assailants' camp.

title/0/en: The FARDC killed militia leader Karakara and his two bodyguards in Rutumba village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FARDC killed militia leader Karakara and his two bodyguards in Rugeje village in Uvira territory. The FARDC arrested Karakara's concubine.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto attacked the FARDC position in Lukala village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto attacked the FARDC position in Lukala village in Shabunda territory. The FARDC repelled the assailants. One Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto combatant died and another was injured, two FARDC soldiers and five civilians died during the attack. The FARDC seized an AK47 weapon.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a man close to Rusaka 3 village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a man close to Rusaka 3 village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $200 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Alerted by the population on a case of kidnapping, the FARDC chased and attacked the kidnappers close to Rusaka 3 village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Alerted by the population about a kidnapping, the FARDC chased and attacked the kidnappers close to Rusaka 3 village in Rutshuru territory. One woman was shot and wounded during the clash. The wounded victim was returning from her fields. The FARDC seized an AK47 weapon after the kidnappers ran away with their hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified men beheaded a man in his field in Vemba village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men beheaded a man in his field in Vemba village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Following the looting of Mushunguti village in Kalehe territory, the FARDC repelled the assailants and attacked them in the forest close to the village.
notes/en: Following the looting of Mushunguti village in Kalehe territory, the FARDC repelled the assailants and attacked them in the forest close to the village. The FARDC captured seven assailants.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD killed three men in their fields in Kahumiro village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD killed three men in their fields in Kahumiro village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe raided Kalunguta village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe raided Kalunguta village in Beni territory. As the assailants arrived the policemen ran away. The assailants shot in the air and burned down the groupement chief's hut, documents and a police motorcycle. They withdrew from the village when FARDC reached the village.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles ambushed a park ranger convoy close to Horo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles ambushed a park ranger convoy close to Horo village in Rutshuru territory. Five park rangers and a driver were killed, and another park ranger was injured. The assailants seized six weapons belonging to the park rangers.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed the FARDC allied of Twiganeho combatants as they wanted to attack them in Kihamba village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed the FARDC who were collaborating with Twiganeho combatants in Kihamba village in Uvira territory. An FARDC soldier was injured during the attack. The assailants stole 70 goats, 24 cows and poultry.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Mushunguti village in Kalehe territory. The assailants looted money and goats.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Mushunguti village in Kalehe territory. The assailants looted money and goats.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Love kidnapped two men in their field in Lutehe village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Love kidnapped two men in their field in Lutehe village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom to release the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen wearing military uniforms looted money and goods belonging to civilians who were going to the market close to Mugadja village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen wearing military uniforms looted money and goods belonging to civilians who were going to the market close to Mugadja village in Uvira territory.

title/0/en: Three unidentified armed men shot and killed the Kitchanga parish priest as he had just celebrated a wedding mass in Kyahemba village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified armed men shot and killed the Kitchanga parish priest as he had just celebrated a wedding mass in Kyahemba village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Kanyatsi village in Lubero territory. One Mai-Mai Mazembe died during the clash.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Kanyatsi village in Lubero territory. One Mai-Mai Mazembe died during the clash.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked unidentified armed men in Kivale village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked unidentified armed men in Kivale village in Lubero territory. An armed man was shot and wounded. After the clash the NDC Guidon returned to their position in Kagheri.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a man in the Katoyi neighborhood of Goma as the victim was returning from work.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a man in the Katoyi neighborhood of Goma as the victim was returning from work.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen stole two fishing nets from fishermen on Kivu Lake close to Minova in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen stole two fishing nets from fishermen on Kivu Lake close to Minova in Kalehe territory. The assailants shot in the air to dissuade other fishermen who wanted to come in rescue of the victims of the looting.

title/0/en: An ANR agent tortured and wounded a Lowa primary school teacher in Mubalaka village in Walikale territory following the victim's refusal to hand him 500 Congolese Francs.
notes/en: An ANR agent tortured and wounded a Lowa primary school teacher in Mubalaka village in Walikale territory following the victim's refusal to give him 500 Congolese Francs.

title/0/en: Armed men stole ten kilograms of cassiterite and two telephones from two men close to Tukutu village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Armed men stole ten kilograms of cassiterite and two telephones from two men close to Tukutu village in Shabunda territory. Once they arrived in Tukutu, the assailants abducted two other men.

title/0/en: Unidentified people raped and killed a 25-year-old woman in the Pasisi neighborhood of Beni during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified people raped and killed a 25-year-old woman in the Pasisi neighborhood of Beni during the night. The victim's body was found the morning after.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a man with a crude weapon in the fields of Mayangose in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a man with a crude weapon in the fields of Mayangose in Beni territory. As the victim's body was brought back, unidentified gunmen attacked the civilians escorted by the FARDC.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD released six hostages kidnapped in Bubanga 2 village in Rutshuru territory after a ransom of $3,000 was paid.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD released six hostages kidnapped in Bubanga 2 village in Rutshuru territory after a ransom of $3,000 was paid.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Kabishula  fighters tortured and wounded a man as he was leaving his house to relieve himself in Kisha village, Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Kabishula  fighters tortured and wounded a man as he was leaving his house to relieve himself in Kisha village, Kalehe territory during the night.

title/0/en: Ten unidentified armed men broke into the house of the Kavingu cell chief in the Lyakobo neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe broke into the house of the Kavingu cell chief in the Lyakobo neighborhood of Beni. The assailants kidnapped the cell chief.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot a 67-year-old woman in Maendeleo village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot a 67-year-old woman in Maendeleo village in Uvira territory. The victim died from the wounds.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who abducted a man in the Kalundu neighborhood of Uvira rural commune released the hostage without the payment of a ransom.
notes/en: The kidnappers who abducted a man in the Kalundu neighborhood of Uvira rural commune released the hostage without the payment of a ransom.

title/0/en: Five Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga raped a 14-year-old girl close to Bibugwa village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Five Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga raped a 14-year-old girl close to Bibugwa village in Shabunda territory. The assailants released the girl after the rape.

title/0/en: The FARDC and the police who had been asked to assist in an eviction clashed with the FARDC who were based in this compound in Nyawaronga village in Kalehe territory
notes/en: The FARDC and the police who had been asked to assist in an eviction clashed with the FARDC who were based in this compound in Nyawaronga village in Kalehe territory. One soldier died and two were injured during the clash. They looted goods and burned down six houses.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Kitwa-Muke village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Kitwa-Muke village in Beni territory. The FARDC repelled the Mai-Mai Mazembe and captured five of them.

title/0/en: Unidentified men carrying crude weapons broke into a house in Cirundu village in Walungu territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified men carrying crude weapons broke into a house in Cirundu village in Walungu territory during the night. The assailants demanded the victim to hand over money. When the owner of the house refused, the assailants injured him with crude weapons. They stole money and telephones. The victim died from his wounds before he could reach the hospital.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position in Kasiki village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position in Kasiki village in Lubero territory. Two FARDC and one civilian were killed, six civilians were injured. The assailants withdrew from the village after the clash.

title/0/en: Seven unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Cagala village in Walungu territory during the night.
notes/en: Seven unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Cagala village in Walungu territory during the night. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Karakara looted cows in Rutumba village in Uvira territory during the night.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Karakara looted cows in Rutumba village in Uvira territory during the night.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot two men in Kanyabayonga rural commune.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot two men in Kanyabayonga rural commune. One man died and another was injured during the shooting.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Wemba held up a convoy of Christians belonging to ADECO church who were about to leave on a pilgrimage close to Lubila village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Wemba held up a convoy of Christians belonging to ADECO church who were about to leave on a pilgrimage close to Lubila village in Shabunda territory. The assailants abducted 37 people. They also stole musical instruments and other goods.

title/0/en: The FARDC repelled the unidentified armed men who stole fifteen cows in Kikozi village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FARDC repelled the unidentified armed men who stole fifteen cows in Kikozi village in Uvira territory. The FARDC attacked the assailants. One assailant was killed and one FARDC was injured during the attack.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who abducted the Karambi parish priest released the hostage in Bunyangula village in Rutshuru territory after a ransom of $3,000 was paid.
notes/en: The kidnappers who abducted the Karambi parish priest released the hostage in Bunyangula village in Rutshuru territory after a ransom of $3,000 was paid.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga tortured and injured the supervisor of Mulungu health zone in Nyombe village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga tortured and injured the supervisor of Mulungu health zone in Nyombe village in Shabunda territory. The assailants stole all victim's belongings.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men stole fishing nets on Kivu Lake close to Muhanga village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men stole fishing nets on Kivu Lake close to Muhanga village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a 42-year-old man close to Bunake village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a 42-year-old man close to Bunake village in Beni territory. The FARDC alerted  chased the assailants but did not manage to catch them.

title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men arrested a 37-year-old woman and her 12-year-old son in Kibanga village in Fizi territory as the victims were returning from the field.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men detained a 37-year-old woman and her 12-year-old son in Kibanga village in Fizi territory as the victims were returning from the field. The assailants raped the woman and stole her food basket.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen stole fifteen cows in Kikozi village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen stole fifteen cows in Kikozi village in Uvira territory.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru held up two motorcycles close to Ebisha village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru held up two motorcycles close to Ebisha village in Kalehe territory. The robbers looted money and goods.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who had abducted a 65-year-old man in Buhuria village in Rutshuru territory on April 3, 2018 released the hostage after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: The kidnappers who had abducted a 65-year-old man in Buhuria village in Rutshuru territory on April 3, 2018 released the hostage after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men who were trying to steal fishing nets killed a 34-year-old man with a machete on Kivu Lake close to Chondo village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men who were trying to steal fishing nets killed a 34-year-old man with a machete on Kivu Lake close to Chondo village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into two houses in Nyangezi village in Walungu territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into two houses in Nyangezi village in Walungu territory during the night. The assailants tied up the members of these two households. They looted money, telephones, clothes and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified men broke into a house in Buhuria village in Rutshuru territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified men broke into a house in Buhuria village in Rutshuru territory during the night. The assailants kidnapped a 65-year-old man. The kidnappers demanded an unknown amount for ransom.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man in the Kalundu neighborhood of Uvira as the victim had just watched a Champions League match.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen kidnapped a man in the Kalundu neighborhood of Uvira as the victim was coming back from watching a Champions League match. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $1,250 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen tried to hold up a vehicle driving to Bukavu close to Kashenyi village in Walungu territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen tried to hold up a vehicle driving to Bukavu close to Kashenyi village in Walungu territory. As the driver accelerated, the assailants shot at the passengers. One passenger died and ten others were injured during the incident.
