title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Mulongwe neighborhood of Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Mulongwe neighborhood of Uvira rural commune. The assailants shot and killed the owner.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen raped a 13-year-old girl close to Kirambo village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen raped a 13-year-old girl close to Kirambo village in Kalehe territory. The victim was coming back from Kasasangutiya village.

title/0/en: Unidentified men strangled a girl in the Volcan neighborhood of Goma during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified men strangled a girl in the Volcan neighborhood of Goma during the night.

title/0/en: The Nyatura FDP ambushed the FARDC in Gitunva village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura FDP ambushed the FARDC in Gitunva village in Rutshuru territory. An unknown number of both Nyatura and FARDC died and were injured as a result of the ambush.

title/0/en: Six unidentified gunmen raided a cattle ranch in Nyarundani village, Uvira territory.
notes/en: Six unidentified gunmen raided a cattle ranch in Nyarundani village, Uvira territory. The assailants stole 26 cows.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier raped a 9-year-old girl in Ishasha 2 village in Rutshuru territory as the victim was going to fetch water.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier raped a 9-year-old girl in Ishasha 2 village in Rutshuru territory as the victim was going to fetch water. The soldier was arrested and transferred to Rutshuru prosecutor's office.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped six women in a field close to Buseregenye village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped six women in a field close to Buseregenye village in Rutshuru territory. They demanded a ransom of $3,000 to release them. The kidnappers also raped the hostages.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika ambushed an FARDC patrol convoy in Kibimbo village in Fizi territory. An FARDC soldier was injured during the ambush.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika ambushed an FARDC convoy in Kibimbo village in Fizi territory. An FARDC soldier was injured during the ambush.

title/0/en: A policeman shot and wounded a civilian in Chambombo village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: A policeman shot and wounded a civilian in Chambombo village in Kalehe territory. The incident was triggered by the policeman's dissatisfaction with the ANR, who had illegally freed the civilian who was imprisoned.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into two houses in the Mabolio neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into two houses in the Mabolio neighborhood of Beni. The assailants injured  a woman with a machete and stole money and two telephones.

title/0/en: Four unidentified armed men held up a vehicle carrying Karambi parish priest and catholic worshipers close to Buhindangoma village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified armed men held up a vehicle carrying Karambi parish priest and his parishioners close to Buhindangoma village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants kidnapped the priest and demanded a ransom of $500,000 to release him.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Donat and Mabala in Lwigi and Bwise villages in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Donat and Mabala in Lwigi and Bwise villages in Shabunda territory. One Raia Mutomboki was captured during the attack. The FARDC seized an AK-47.

title/0/en: An FARDC patrol intercepted a group of men who were looting from the population in Uvira.
notes/en: An FARDC patrol intercepted a group of men who were stealing goods from civilians in Uvira. The FARDC shot at the assailants. As they pursued them, the FARDC caught one of the injured assailants, an FARDC soldier.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked park rangers patrolling the construction site of Ivingu hydroelectric power plant in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked park rangers patrolling the construction site of Ivingu hydroelectric power plant in Lubero territory. One park ranger was killed and one was injured.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into three houses in the Mabolio neighborhood of Beni during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into three houses in the Mabolio neighborhood of Beni during the night. The assailants looted money and goods. They injured two men with a machete and shot and wounded a boy.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into several houses in the Mambango neighborhood of Beni
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into several houses in the Mambango neighborhood of Beni. The assailants looted money and goods. They injured a man with a crude weapon.

title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men broke into a plot in the Kalundu neighborhood of Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men broke into a plot in the Kalundu neighborhood of Uvira rural commune. The assailants targeted a 46-year-old woman suspected of being a witch. They killed her and injured her daughter.

title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men held up three motorcycles on the Kinyandonyi-Busanza road close to Buhindangoma village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men held up three motorcycles on the Kinyandonyi-Busanza road close to Buhindangoma village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants looted money and telephones.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Donat and Mabala raided Tchankindo village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Donat and Mabala raided Tchankindo village in Shabunda territory. The assailants stole 100 kg of cassiterite, six solar panels and batteries. They forced seven men to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: Five unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Kanzulinzuli neighborhood of Beni during the night.
notes/en: Five unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Kanzulinzuli neighborhood of Beni during the night. The assailants stole $150 and jewelry. They injured the owner of the house, a woman, with a machete.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into nine houses in the Butsili neighborhood of Beni during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into nine houses in the Butsili neighborhood of Beni during the night. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: Four unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Benengule neighborhood of Beni during the night.
notes/en: Four unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Benengule neighborhood of Beni during the night. The assailants injured the owner and his wife with crude weapons. They stole a loudspeaker, a battery and a solar panel.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a bistro in Kavumo village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a bistro in Kavumo village in Kabare territory. The assailants shot and killed a policeman who was in the bistro. They also killed an FARDC soldier who was in the vecinity.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 32-year-old money changer in the Mabanga-Nord neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 32-year-old money changer in the Mabanga-Nord neighborhood of Goma.

title/0/en: Armed men broke into a gold trading shop in Miba village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Armed men broke into a gold trading shop in Miba village in Fizi territory. The assailants shot and killed a 51-year-old man and wounded a 40-year-old man. They also looted money and goods.

title/0/en: The day after the shooting of a 21-year-old man by a policeman in Musimba village in Lubero territory, the population demonstrated their anger by trying to burn down the local police office.
notes/en: The day after the shooting of a 21-year-old man by a policeman in Musimba village in Lubero territory, the population demonstrated their anger by trying to burn down the local police office. The police shot bullets in the air to disperse the demonstrators. The police injured a man and a woman.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto raided Tchankombe village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto raided Tchankombe village in Shabunda territory. The assailants killed two FARDC and the village chief.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked the FARDC position at Espoir farm in Kabasha in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked the FARDC position at Espoir farm in Kabasha in Beni territory. One assailant and one FARDC died and one assailant was captured.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu during the night. The assailants injured the house owner, a money trader, with a crude weapon before stealing his money.

title/0/en: The FARDC who intervened after an attack on a gold trading shop in Miba village, Fizi territory, captured two of the assailants.
notes/en: The FARDC who intervened after an attack on a gold trading shop in Miba village, Fizi territory, captured two of the assailants.

title/0/en: As the FARDC arrived at Miba village in Fizi territory with two captured combatants, the population wanted to take revenge against the two captured.
notes/en: As the FARDC arrived at Miba village in Fizi territory with two captured combatants, the population wanted to take revenge against the two captured. The FARDC shot in the air to disperse the population. Two men were shot and wounded.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto shot and killed an FARDC soldier in Nduma village in Shabunda territory as the soldier was going to fetch water.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto shot and killed an FARDC soldier in Nduma village in Shabunda territory as the soldier was going to fetch water.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Ibinza village in Walungu territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Ibinza village in Walungu territory during the night. The assailants shot and killed two men aged 20 and 24. They looted money, telephones and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into two houses in Maya village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into two houses in Maya village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants injured two men and a woman. They stole goats.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier broke into a house in Ngunamo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier broke into a house in Ngunamo village in Rutshuru territory. As the soldier extorted the house owner $20, the victim got into a fight with him. As the neighbors came to help, the soldier shot one man who later died of his injuries.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Bihovu village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Bihovu village in Kalehe territory. The assailants shot the house owner. The 24-year-old victim died of his injuries.

title/0/en: A policeman shot a 21-year-old man in Musimba village in Lubero territory during the night.
notes/en: A policeman shot a 21-year-old man in Musimba village in Lubero territory during the night. The victim was hospitalized at the local health center for care.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen tortured and injured a 28-year-old man in Kusisa village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen tortured and injured a 28-year-old man in Kusisa village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai CNPSC ambushed the FARDC in Ibwe village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai CNPSC ambushed the FARDC in Ibwe village in Fizi territory. Five FARDC were killed and ten were injured, two Mai-Mai CNPCS were captured during the ambush. The assailants seized military items.

title/0/en: The CNRD ambushed the NDC Guidon in Kashuga village in Masisi territry.
notes/en: The CNRD ambushed the NDC Guidon in Kashuga village in Masisi territry. Two NDC Guidon died, two CNRD and two policemen were injured, one civilian was killed during the ambush.

title/0/en: The FARDC killed a 28-year-old man as they thought he was an ADF in Nyaleke village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC killed a 28-year-old man whom they accused of being an ADF combatant in Nyaleke village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: The three kidnappers who had abducted three farmers in Kithwa village in Beni territory on March 26, 2018 released the hostages.
notes/en: The three kidnappers who had abducted three farmers in Kithwa village in Beni territory on March 26, 2018 released the hostages. The two injured hostages were hospitalized in a health center for treatment.

title/0/en: The FARDC arrested nine LUCHA activists at Beni town hall where the victims of Buili massacre were being displayed.
notes/en: The FARDC arrested nine LUCHA activists at Beni town hall where the victims of Buili massacre were being displayed. The FARDC accused the activists of inciting other young people to demonstrate against the massacres.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided the Boikene neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided the Boikene neighborhood of Beni. The FARDC repelled the assailants. Three women, seven men and an infant were killed and one person was injured. The assailants abducted four men and a woman.

title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men intercepted a currency trader  just after he left the place where he worked in the Rombe I neighborhood of Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men intercepted a currency trader  just after he left the place where he worked in the Rombe I neighborhood of Uvira rural commune. The assailants injured the trader with a crude weapon and stole $2,712.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Mavivi village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Mavivi village in Beni territory. The assailants demanded $500 from the woman they found in the house but she did not have any money. The assailants shot the victim through her thorax. The injured victim was hospitalized at Beni hospital for treatment.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into four houses in Tchonka village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into four houses in Tchonka village in Shabunda territory. The assailants looted money and goods. They shot and wounded a 42-year-old man.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD broke into a house in Rusaka 5 village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD broke into a house in Rusaka 5 village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants demanded money as the owner of the plot had just sold a bag of coffee. When the victim resisted,  the assailants shot and killed him and stole $350.

title/0/en: Unidentified men abducted and raped a woman in Kamulima Mergo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men abducted and raped a woman in Kamulima Mergo village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants strangled and killed the victim.

title/0/en: The Police dispersed a peaceful demonstration organized by LUCHA activists in Goma the day before the renewal of MONUSCO's mandate.
notes/en: The Police dispersed a peaceful demonstration organized by LUCHA activists in Goma the day before the renewal of MONUSCO's mandate. The police arrested seven activists.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men clashed at Bundengi village in Kalehe territory following a misunderstanding over food collection in the market.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men clashed at Bundengi village in Kalehe territory following a misunderstanding over food collection in the market. The assailants looted civilians' cattle and food.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo broke into the house hosting an ANR agent in Maboya village in Beni territory during the night.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo broke into the house hosting an ANR agent in Maboya village in Beni territory during the night. The assailants injured the ANR agent with a crude weapon. The local police commander fired bullets in the air to deter the assailants.

title/0/en: he FDLR-RUD who kidnapped a 68-year-old man in Nkwenda village in Rutshuru territory on March 24, 2018 released the hostage after a ransom of $100 was paid of the $200 demanded.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD who kidnapped a 68-year-old man in Nkwenda village in Rutshuru territory on March 24, 2018 released the hostage after a ransom of $100 was paid of the $200 demanded. The kidnappers released the hostage on the condition that he would pay the remaining $100.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Museya village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Museya village in Beni territory. The assailants stole $200 and a TV screen. They injured the house owner with a machete.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen abducted three farmers in Kithwa village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen abducted three farmers in Kithwa village in Beni territory. The assailants tortured and injured two hostages.

title/0/en: The police dispersed a peaceful demonstration of LUCHA activists in Beni as the demonstrators tried to hand over a memorandum to MONUSCO at its Mavivi base.
notes/en: The police dispersed a peaceful demonstration of LUCHA activists in Beni as the demonstrators tried to hand over a memorandum to MONUSCO at its Mavivi base. Six activists were injured and five were arrested during the incident.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazimano broke into a house in Simba village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazimano broke into a house in Simba village in Uvira territory. The assailants kidnapped a 57-year-old man. They demanded a ransom of $1,500 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a shepherd's house in Kashatu village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a shepherd's house in Kashatu village in Uvira territory. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons injured two men, aged 66 and 29, in Sana village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons injured two men, aged 66 and 29, in Sana village in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped a 68-year-old man in Nkwenda village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped a 68-year-old man in Nkwenda village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants demanded a ransom of $200 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed an FARDC soldier in Kamukwale village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed an FARDC soldier in Kamukwale village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants stole the dead soldier's weapon.

title/0/en: Armed men wearing police uniforms broke into a house in the Mambango neighborhood of Beni during the night.
notes/en: Armed men wearing police uniforms broke into a house in the Mambango neighborhood of Beni during the night. The assailants stole $703, one telephone and a jacket. They shot and wounded the owner of the house they broke into.

title/0/en: The FARDC participating in the military operations against the Mai-Mai CNPSC forced twenty two men and thirteen women to carry military items in Kayumba and Maindombe villages in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC participating in the military operations against the Mai-Mai CNPSC forced twenty two men and thirteen women to carry military items in Kayumba and Maindombe villages in Fizi territory.

title/0/en: The FARDC soldiers who had forced thirteen women and twenty two men to carry military items in Kayumba and Maindombe villages in Fizi territory released the victims.
notes/en: The FARDC soldiers who had forced thirteen women and twenty two men to carry military items in Kayumba and Maindombe villages in Fizi territory released the victims.

title/0/en: Three unidentified armed men robbed a shop in Kyanzaba in Beni territory. The assailants looted items for sale.
notes/en: Three unidentified armed men robbed a shop in Kyanzaba in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Kinanira neighborhood of Sange rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Kinanira neighborhood of Sange rural commune. The assailants kidnapped a 33-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot a man in Mutenda village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot a man in Mutenda village in Fizi territory. One man was killed and an 11-year-old boy was injured during the attack.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who had kidnapped fourteen agents and captured ten Kahuzi Biega park rangers in Nduma village in Shabunda territory released the hostages after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: The kidnappers who had kidnapped fourteen agents and captured ten Kahuzi Biega park rangers in Nduma village in Shabunda territory released the hostages after a ransom was paid. The amount of the demanded ransom was not disclosed by the CICR delegation carrying out the negotiations.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kiwanja rural commune in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kiwanja rural commune in Rutshuru territory. The assailants stole $8 and abducted a 20-year-old woman.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who had abducted an 18-year-old man in his field close to Kiwanja in Rutshuru territory on March 20, 2018 released the hostage after a ransom of $300 was paid.
notes/en: The kidnappers who had abducted an 18-year-old man in his field close to Kiwanja in Rutshuru territory on March 20, 2018 released the hostage after a ransom of $300 was paid.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto broke into Muta mining site close to Kigulube village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto broke into Muta mining site close to Kigulube village in Shabunda territory. The assailants stole two water pumps, telephones, 50 grams of gold and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the FARDC position in Mayangose village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the FARDC position in Mayangose village in Beni territory. The assailants pushed the FARDC out of their position.

title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men broke into a plot to seek refuge from the rain in Khango village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men broke into a plot to seek refuge from the rain in Khango village in Fizi territory. These men shot and killed a 33-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men injured  two men with a crude weapon as they were standing at a toll point  in Bulema village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men injured  two men with a crude weapon as they were standing at a toll point  in Bulema village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men captured an FARDC colonel and his bodyguard close to Katanu village in Uvira territory as they were about to leave to Luvungi.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men captured an FARDC colonel and his bodyguard close to Katanu village in Uvira territory as they were about to leave to Luvungi.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Kigulube village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Kigulube village in Shabunda territory. The assailants stole a motorcycle, two bikes, two pigs, and fifteen kilograms of cassiterite.

title/0/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms broke into a house in Lulimba village in Fizi territory during the night.
notes/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms broke into a house in Lulimba village in Fizi territory during the night. The assailants looted goods. They shot and killed a 51-year-old man.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Delta positions in Mulema, Kasenyi and Shakingi villages in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Delta positions in Mulema, Kasenyi and Shakingi villages in Masisi territory. The FARDC looted livestock.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Donat raided Kaligi village in Shabunda territory. The assailants looted goods.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Donat raided Kaligi village in Shabunda territory. The assailants looted goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into five houses in Minova village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into five houses in Minova village in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole four boxes of wine from a shop. They wounded a 34-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped an 18-year-old man in his field close to Kiwanja rural commune in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped an 18-year-old man in his field close to Kiwanja rural commune in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $5,000 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: An unidentified gunman burst into a wake in Mulimbi village in Rutshuru territory mourning four people killed by an FARDC soldier.
notes/en: An unidentified gunman burst into a wake in Mulimbi village in Rutshuru territory mourning four people killed by an FARDC soldier. The assailant killed a man. The victim died out of the wounds.

title/0/en: An unidentified man shot and wounded a 24-year-old man in Ngunamo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: An unidentified man shot and wounded a 24-year-old man in Ngunamo village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: The Pygmies rebelled against the local customary authority in Basimukuma-Nord groupement in Kaboke village in Fizi territory as the customary authority grabbed their land.
notes/en: The Pygmies rebelled against the local customary authority in Basimukuma-Nord groupement in Kaboke village in Fizi territory as the customary authority grabbed their land. These pygmies built barricades on the road to express their indignation.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai CNPSC in Ibwe village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai CNPSC in Ibwe village in Fizi territory. Two FARDC died and three were injured during the attack. While running away the FARDC forced 21 men to carry their military equipment.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a plot in the Mabolio neighborhood of Beni. The assailants stole $1,000 and injured a woman.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a plot in the Mabolio neighborhood of Beni. The assailants stole $1,000 and injured a woman.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon tortured and wounded two men in Kasugho locality in Lubero territory when they did not take part in the communal labor imposed on the population by the armed group.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon tortured and wounded two men in Kasugho locality in Lubero territory when they did not take part in the communal labor imposed on the population by the armed group.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a man in Kilolirwe village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a man in Kilolirwe village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men who wanted to hold up vehicles close to Liva village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men who wanted to hold up vehicles close to Liva village in Beni territory. The FARDC repelled the assailants.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Kirikicho attacked the Mai-Mai Maachano in Remeka village in Masisi territory. The
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Kirikicho attacked the Mai-Mai Maachano in Remeka village in Masisi territory. The clash caused the displacement of the population.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a man with a crude weapon in Kitahuha village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a man with a crude weapon in Kitahuha village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who had abducted a 60-year-old man in Kavegha village in Beni territory in March 3 2018 killed the hostage with a crude weapon after a ransom of $600 was paid.
notes/en: The kidnappers who had abducted a 60-year-old man in Kavegha village in Beni territory in March 3 2018 killed the hostage with a crude weapon after a ransom of $600 was paid.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men in Kikozi village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men in Kikozi village in Uvira territory. One FARDC major died and an assailant was injured during the attack. After the assailants left the area the FARDC stole 35 goats, 21 pigs and chickens.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a motorcycle belonging to an agent of the Vodacom telecommunication company close to Kankoba village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a motorcycle belonging to an agent of the Vodacom telecommunication company close to Kankoba village in Fizi territory. The assailants stole money, one computer and two telephones.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto raided Nduma village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto raided Nduma village in Shabunda territory. The assailants stole eight goats, six telephones and four solar panels. They kidnapped a man and demanded a ransom of $500 to release him.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the NDC Sheka close to Burumbi village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the NDC Sheka close to Burumbi village in Walikale territory. Three NDC Sheka died and one was injured, four NDC Guidon died and three were injured during the attack.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked the FARDC position in Sesele village in Beni territory. Two FARDC died during the attack.
notes/en: The ADF attacked the FARDC position in Sesele village in Beni territory. Two FARDC died during the attack.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed his wife and another woman and two girls in Mulimbi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed his wife and another woman and two girls in Mulimbi village in Rutshuru territory. He also wounded another girl.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot a colleague and football players at the stadium in Walikale center during a fight between players.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot a colleague and football players at the stadium in Walikale center during a fight between players. One soldier was killed, two players and a boy were injured during the shooting.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD attacked a convoy of cars being escorted by the FARDC close to Kahunga village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD attacked a convoy of cars being escorted by the FARDC close to Kahunga village in Rutshuru territory. One man died and six were injured during the ambush. One of them was a soldier. The assailants abducted five people.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier tortured a 43-year-old woman in Kamisuku village in Shabunda territory when the victim demanded the soldier to pay his debts.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier tortured a 43-year-old woman in Langalanga village in Shabunda territory when the victim demanded the soldier to pay his debts. The victim died from her wounds.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who had abducted a 41-year-old man in Misisi village in Fizi territory on March 15 2018 released the hostage after a ransom of $2,700 was paid.
notes/en: The kidnappers who had abducted a 41-year-old man in Misisi village in Fizi territory on March 15 2018 released the hostage after a ransom of $2,700 was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men looted money and goods in the Kyeshero neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men looted money and goods in the Kyeshero neighborhood of Goma.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen broke into a plot in Chahi village in Walungu territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Chahi village in Walungu territory. The assailants shot and killed a 45-year-old woman.

title/0/en: The FARDC ambushed three unidentified armed men who were trying to steal livestock from a farm in Murambi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The FARDC ambushed three unidentified armed men who were trying to steal livestock from a farm in Murambi village in Kalehe territory. One assailant died and one was captured during the ambush.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Delta position in Bitobolo village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Delta position in Bitobolo village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle transporting two church ministers close to Rukoro village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle transporting two church ministers close to Rukoro village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants stole the victims' belongings. They kidnapped one minister and the motorcycle's driver.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Boikene neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Boikene neighborhood of Beni. The assailants stole $150, a TV screen, three radios, five gold necklaces, four pairs of shoes and one watch. They also injured a man with a machete.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed three men with a crude weapon and abducted three others in Kididiwe village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed three men with a crude weapon and abducted three others in Kididiwe village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a 41-year-old man in Misisi village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a 41-year-old man in Misisi village in Fizi territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2,700 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up two taxi cars on the road Kasindi-Butembo close to Kahondo village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up two taxi cars on the Kasindi-Butembo road close to Kahondo village in Beni territory. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: The FNL Nzabampema attacked the Mai-Mai Kashumba in Kitabo village in Uvira territory during a negotiation attempt over the control of the zones of influence.
notes/en: The FNL Nzabampema attacked the Mai-Mai Kashumba in Kitabo village in Uvira territory during a negotiation attempt over the control of the zones of influence. One Mai-Mai Kashumba died during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Butsili neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Butsili neighborhood of Beni. The assailants, who were looking for the $1,000 that the woman had just received from an aunt, shot and killed the 43-year-old woman. The assailants stole the money.

title/0/en: The FARDC shot and killed an armed man in Murambi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The FARDC shot and killed an armed man in Murambi village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the ADF who had just killed three civilians in Nyaleke village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the ADF who had just killed three civilians in Nyaleke village in Beni territory. Two ADF were killed during the attack.

title/0/en: The ADF shot and killed a motorcycle driver and his two passangers on the Beni-Kasindi road close to Nyaleke village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF shot and killed a motorcycle driver and his two passangers on the Beni-Kasindi road close to Nyaleke village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD shot and killed a man in his field close to Kahunga village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD shot and killed a man in his field close to Kahunga village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Three armed men wearing FARDC uniforms stole $62 from a 32-year-old woman close to Lusololo village in Uvira territory as the victim was returning from the market.
notes/en: Three armed men wearing FARDC uniforms stole $62 from a 32-year-old woman close to Lusololo village in Uvira territory as the victim was returning from the market. The assailants raped the victim.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe shot and killed a 46-year-old man in Kanyatsi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe shot and killed a 46-year-old man in Kanyatsi village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Kitaragha village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Kitaragha village in Beni territory. The assailants shot and killed a 30-year-old man. They did not steal anything.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into several houses in the Ngongolio neighborhood of Beni during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into several houses in the Ngongolio neighborhood of Beni during the night. The assailants stole $589 and other goods. They injured two men with a machete and shot and wounded a 12-year-old boy.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into three houses in Rukwende village in Walungu territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into three houses in Rukwende village in Walungu territory during the night. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up motorcycles on the Kitchanga-Burungu road close to Burungu village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up motorcycles on the Kitchanga-Burungu road close to Burungu village in Masisi territory. The assailants killed a man and injured three others. They looted money and goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified men looted plastic chairs, office furniture and other goods from a micro-credit organization called Projet Wezesha, as well as from the 8th CEPAC office in Minova, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men looted plastic chairs, office furniture and other goods from a micro-credit organization called Projet Wezesha, as well as from the 8th CEPAC office in Minova, Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Five unidentified gunmen stole $218 and goods from traders close to Biganangwa village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Five unidentified gunmen stole $218 and goods from traders close to Biganangwa village in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: Following a fight, an FARDC soldier shot and wounded two men in Rubaya village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Following a fight, an FARDC soldier shot and wounded two men in Rubaya village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Katembele village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Katembele village in Shabunda territory. The assailants looted solar panels, telephones, goats, chickens, ducks and other goods.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe broke into a house in Kanyatsi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe broke into a house in Kanyatsi village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants shot and killed a woman and wounded her two children aged 16 and 18. The assailants were looking for the head of the household.

title/0/en: Two Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto raped a 45-year-old woman close to Nyambembe village in Shabunda territory as the victim was coming back from her field.
notes/en: Two Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto raped a 45-year-old woman close to Nyambembe village in Shabunda territory as the victim was coming back from her field. The victim was hospitalized at Lulingu hospital.

title/0/en: The FARDC were patrolling Kagando village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC were patrolling Kagando village in Rutshuru territory. Having arrived after the Nyatura had left the village, the FARDC looted goats, chickens and food items.

title/0/en: The FARDC captured an armed man in Lulingu village in Shabunda territory as he was on his way to buy food for his armed group.
notes/en: The FARDC captured an armed man in Lulingu village in Shabunda territory as he was on his way to buy food for his armed group.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked the FARDC position in Mapobu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked the FARDC position in Mapobu village in Beni territory. Two ADF were killed during the attack. The FARDC seized three AK47 weapons, an M16 and a Motorola radio handset.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons and a 12 caliber gun attacked the FARDC position in Ngote village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons and a 12 gauge shotgun attacked the FARDC position in Ngote village in Beni territory. As a consequence of the attack one FARDC and two assailants were killed, one FARDC was injured and three assailants were captured. The FARDC seized crude weapons and the 12 gauge shotgun.

title/0/en: Unidentified men raped and killed a 16-year-old girl in Sake village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men raped and killed a 16-year-old girl in Sake village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons stole ten fishing nets in Ishovu village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons stole ten fishing nets in Ishovu village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe fought back the FARDC in Vuhayo village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe fought back the FARDC in Vuhayo village in Lubero territory. The assailants repelled the FARDC from the village and built their camp.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into three houses in Lugera village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into three houses in Lugera village in Kalehe territory. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier disturbing the population in Vususa village in Beni territory shot two men who wanted to alert the security services.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier who was harassing the population in Vususa village in Beni territory shot two men who wanted to alert the security services. The soldier killed a 24-year-old man and wounded another aged 18.

title/0/en: Four unidentified armed men broke into a money transfer Vodacom shop in Ndjingala in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified armed men broke into a money transfer Vodacom shop in Ndjingala in Walikale territory. The assailants stole $2,692 and wounded a 32-year-old man. They also wounded a policeman among those who had intervened and seized an AK47 weapon.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Musasa village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Musasa village in Lubero territory. One Mai-Mai Mazembe died and one other was injured during the attack.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Vuhayo village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Vuhayo village in Lubero territory. Two assailants were killed during the attack. The FARDC looted the population's belongings. The FARDC burned down the Mai-Mai camp.

title/0/en: Three FARDC soldiers broke into a house in Tenambo in Beni territory.
notes/en: Three FARDC soldiers broke into a house in Tenambo in Beni territory. As the compound manager did not have any money one of the assailants shot and killed a 35-year-old man.

title/0/en: Men carrying firearms and crude weapons stole fishermen's nets on Kivu Lake close to Minova in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Men carrying firearms and crude weapons stole fishermen's nets on Kivu Lake close to Minova in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: An unidentified armed man shot a 25-year-old man in a bar in Kisharo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: An unidentified armed man shot a 25-year-old man in a bar in Kisharo village in Rutshuru territory. The victim died while he was transported to the health center.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a sewing workshop in Minova in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a sewing workshop in Minova in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole two sewing machines and other tools.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Murambi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Murambi village in Kalehe territory. The assailants shot and killed a pregnant woman and wounded two men. They also abducted two men.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed an FARDC soldier in Kamukwale village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed an FARDC soldier in Kamukwale village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed two men and a woman in Totolito village in Beni territory as the victims were going to their field to get food.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed two men and a woman in Totolito village in Beni territory as the victims were going to their field to get food.

title/0/en: A policeman broke into a house in Chiriba village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: A policeman broke into a house in Chiriba village in Kalehe territory. The policeman stole $350 and four chickens. He shot and wounded the house's owner when the latter tried to alert the neighbors.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into two houses in the Ngongolio neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into two houses in the Ngongolio neighborhood of Beni. The assailants injured two men with a machete and stole $1,200.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Bugushu village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Bugushu village in Kabare territory. The assailants looted money, food and other goods.

title/0/en: Five armed men broke into Masiki-Vahyana chief of groupement's plot in the Kyomole neighborhood of Kyondo rural commune.
notes/en: Five armed men broke into Masiki-Vahyana chief of groupement's property in the Kyomole neighborhood of Kyondo rural commune. As they could not find the chief, the assailants stole $100 and clothes. They damaged a RAV4 car that was on the chief's property.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Mangolikene village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Mangolikene village in Beni territory. The assailants killed four women and three men with crude weapons. Seven people have been reported missing and three survivors.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into the 40th CECA health center in Ciregera village in Walungu territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into the 40th CECA health center in Ciregera village in Walungu territory during the night. The assailants shot an FARDC soldier who was guarding the health center. The soldier died from his wounds. The assailants looted medicine that the health center had just received as a gift. They also stole the soldier's weapon.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men injured a man with a machete in Vusayi village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men injured a man with a machete in Vusayi village in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen injured a man with a machete in Kasiyiro village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen injured a man with a machete in Kasiyiro village in Lubero territory. The victim was hospitalized at Makoko health center.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped seven people in Kitabya village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped seven people in Kitabya village in Lubero territory. The assailants also burned down several houses.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who had abducted a man close to Kamukwale village in Rutshuru territory on March 3 2018 released the hostage after a ransom of $2,000 was paid.
notes/en: The kidnappers who had abducted a man close to Kamukwale village in Rutshuru territory on March 3 2018 released the hostage after a ransom of $2,000 was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and wounded an 18-year-old man in Kenya village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and wounded an 18-year-old man in Kenya village in Fizi territory. The assailants stole the victim's telephone.

title/0/en: The FARDC forced 25 men, five women and two girls to carry their military equipment and belongings to Kazimiya village in Fizi territory. The soldiers released the victims in the evening.
notes/en: The FARDC forced 25 men, five women and two girls to carry their military equipment and belongings to Kazimiya village in Fizi territory. The soldiers released the victims in the evening.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted shops' goods and livestock in Kiseghe village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted shops' goods and livestock in Kiseghe village in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kavegha village in Beni territory. The assailants abducted a 60-year-old man.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kavegha village in Beni territory. The assailants abducted a 60-year-old man.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles tried to hold up a fish trader's motorcycle close to Horo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles tried to hold up a fish trader's motorcycle close to Horo village in Rutshuru territory. As the driver accelerated the assailants shot and killed him.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a woman in Chinono forest close to Ramba in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a woman in Chinono forest close to Ramba in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Wangatsu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Wangatsu village in Beni territory. The assailants kidnapped seventeen people. The assailants shot and killed six of the seventeen abducted people.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed an FARDC vehicle close to Rusovu village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed an FARDC vehicle close to Rusovu village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants killed two FARDC and injured four others as well as four civilians.

title/0/en: Armed men kidnapped fourteen Kahuzi Biega national park rangers close to Lulingu village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Armed men kidnapped fourteen Kahuzi Biega national park rangers close to Lulingu village in Shabunda territory. The assailants captured ten park guards who were escorting the delegation. They demanded a ransom of $25,000 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle close to Kamukwale village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle close to Kamukwale village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants kidnapped a man and demanded a ransom of $10,000.

title/0/en: The FARDC shot and wounded two men at a check point in Samba village in Fizi territory as the two men did not have the money that was demanded by the FARDC.
notes/en: The FARDC shot and wounded two men at a check point in Samba village in Fizi territory as the two men did not have the money that was demanded by the FARDC.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Benengule neighborhood of Beni during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Benengule neighborhood of Beni during the night. The assailants stole $23 and injured the female owner of the house with a machete.

title/0/en: A drunk FARDC soldier shot customers  in a shop in Kalungu village in Kalehe territory
notes/en: A drunk FARDC soldier shot customers  in a shop in Kalungu village in Kalehe territory. One civilian was killed and two were wounded. The population then lynched the FARDC soldier.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who abducted two women in their field in Nyaleke village in Beni territory released the hostages.
notes/en: The kidnappers who abducted two women in their field in Nyaleke village in Beni territory released the hostages.

title/0/en: An armed man tried to hold up a motorcycle in the Mambango neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: An armed man tried to hold up a motorcycle in the Mambango neighborhood of Beni. The assailant shot and wounded the motorcycle driver.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle carrying an FARDC captain close to Copela village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle carrying an FARDC captain close to Copela village in Uvira territory. The assailants killed the FARDC captain and stole $8,125.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raped and strangled to death a 50-year-old woman in a field close to Chumirwa village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raped and strangled to death a 50-year-old woman in a field close to Chumirwa village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Five unidentified gunmen broke into Fadhili Institute compound in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu.
notes/en: Five unidentified gunmen broke into Fadhili Institute compound in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu. The assailants tied up the guard and stole money, a mixer, a solar panel and a battery.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men abducted two women in their field in Nyaleke village, Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men abducted two women in their field in Nyaleke village, Beni territory. The assailants ordered the hostages not to go to that field anymore.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Lukoba and Mabala attacked an FARDC position in Kamulila village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Lukoba and Mabala attacked an FARDC position in Kamulila village in Shabunda territory. The assailants wanted to push the FARDC out of the village mining site.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked ADF combatants close to Linzosisene village in Beni territory as the assailants were trying to hold up vehicles.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked ADF combatants close to Linzosisene village in Beni territory as the assailants were trying to hold up vehicles. One ADF died during the attack.

title/0/en: During an neighborhood search and seizure operation in Kavumo village, Kabare territory, unidentified armed men attacked the policemen who were conducting the operation.
notes/en: During an neighborhood search and seizure operation in Kavumo village, Kabare territory, unidentified armed men attacked the policemen who were conducting the operation. The police arrested fifteen assailants.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked an FARDC patrol in Miba village, Fizi territory. Two assailants were injured and seven were captured during the attack.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked an FARDC patrol in Miba village, Fizi territory. Two assailants were injured and seven were captured during the attack.

title/0/en: Five unidentified armed men broke into two houses in Rugohwa village in Walungu territory during the night.
notes/en: Five unidentified armed men broke into two houses in Rugohwa village in Walungu territory during the night. The assailants stole $105 and five telephones.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who had abducted a 40-year-old man in his field close to the Rukangaga neighborhood of Kiliba rural commune released the hostage after a ransom of $15,000 was paid.
notes/en: The kidnappers who had abducted a 40-year-old man in his field close to the Rukangaga neighborhood of Kiliba rural commune released the hostage after a ransom of $15,000 was paid.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Karakara tried to steal Burundian shepherds' cows in Rwenena I in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Karakara tried to steal Burundian shepherds' cows in Rwenena I in Uvira territory. The shepherds reacted by attacking the assailants. One shepherd and one Mai-Mai Karakara died in the clash.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika broke into Kapilapila mining site in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika broke into Kapilapila mining site in Shabunda territory. The assailants stole $312 and 25 grams of gold. They abducted the head of the mining site on the ground of his cooperation with the FARDC.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the CNRD position in Kashuga village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the CNRD position in Kashuga village in Masisi territory. The FARDC pushed the assailants out of the village. One civilian was killed during the clash.

title/0/en: The men who kidnapped a boy in Kinyandonyi village in Rutshuru territory on February 25 2018, released the hostage after a ransom of $200 was paid.
notes/en: The men who kidnapped a boy in Kinyandonyi village in Rutshuru territory on February 25 2018, released the hostage after a ransom of $200 was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed an FARDC soldier in the Mugunga neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed an FARDC soldier in the Mugunga neighborhood of Goma.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a 43-year-old man with a crude weapon in his field close to the Buturande neighborhood of Kiwanja rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a 43-year-old man with a crude weapon in his field close to the Buturande neighborhood of Kiwanja rural commune.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men looted money and goods in Kahololo village in Uvira territory. The assailants injured two men.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men looted money and goods in Kahololo village in Uvira territory. The assailants injured two men.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Love attacked the FARDC position in Bwalanda village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Love attacked the FARDC position in Bwalanda village in Rutshuru territory. Five Nyatura Love and six civilians were killed, seven civilians were injured during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a health center in Chidodobo village in Walungu territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a health center in Chidodobo village in Walungu territory. The assailants looted money, medicines and goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Kinyandonyi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Kinyandonyi village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants kidnapped a boy and demanded a ransom of $1,000 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Armed men attacked the FARDC position in Lulingu village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Armed men attacked the FARDC position in Lulingu village in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: Four unidentified armed men kidnapped a 40-year-old man who was working in his field close to the Rukangaga neighborhood of Kiliba rural commune.
notes/en: Four unidentified armed men kidnapped a 40-year-old man who was working in his field close to the Rukangaga neighborhood of Kiliba rural commune. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $15,000 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: The FNL-Nzabampema held up two vehicles that were in the convoy of Tanzanian musician Bahati Bukuku close to Nyamunindi village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FNL-Nzabampema held up two vehicles that were in the convoy of Tanzanian musician Bahati Bukuku close to Nyamunindi village in Uvira territory. The assailants injured six people and three policemen. They looted goods.

title/0/en: The police dispersed a peaceful demonstration of lay Catholics, political opposition parties and citizen movements in the Virunga neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: The police dispersed a peaceful demonstration of lay Catholics, political opposition parties and citizen movements in the Virunga neighborhood of Goma. The police arrested twenty people.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle close to Kamukwale village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle close to Kamukwale village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants abducted two men.

title/0/en: Following an attack against the Mai-Mai Mazembe position, the Nyatura Love killed four men, a woman and four children with a crude weapon in Kalusi farm site in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Following an attack against the Mai-Mai Mazembe position, the Nyatura Love killed four men, a woman and four children with a crude weapon in Kalusi farm site in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Love attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Kanyatsi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Love attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Kanyatsi village in Rutshuru territory. Two Mai-Mai Mazembe died during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified men burned documents at the local administration office in the Vutetse neighborhood of Butembo.
notes/en: Unidentified men burned documents at the local administrative office in the Vutetse neighborhood of Butembo.

title/0/en: The police dispersed the march of Vranda de Mutsanga, a community organization, in Butembo. They had heeded the Catholic Lay Coordination Committee's call to demand the respect of the December 2016 agreement.
notes/en: The police dispersed the march of Vranda de Mutsanga, a community organization, in Butembo. They had heeded the Catholic Lay Coordination Committee's call to demand the respect of the December 2016 agreement. The police arrested three people and beat a pregnant woman who was then hospitalized at Matanda general hospital.

title/0/en: The police dispersed a peaceful demonstration of LUCHA activists and political opposition parties in Lubiriha in Beni territory on the occasion of the Comit Lac de Coordination's call for the respect of the December 31, 2016 agreement.
notes/en: The police dispersed a peaceful demonstration of LUCHA activists and political opposition parties in Lubiriha in Beni territory on the occasion of the Comit Lac de Coordination's call for the respect of the December 31, 2016 agreement. The police arrested five demonstrators.

title/0/en: The police dispersed Lucha activists' peaceful demonstration in Beni, which had been organized following the Comit Lac de Coordination's call to action.
notes/en: The police dispersed Lucha activists' peaceful demonstration in Beni, which had been organized following the Comit Lac de Coordination's call to action. The police arrested 32 demonstrators and released them 20km away from Beni towards Ocha.

title/0/en: Three Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo forced a 19-year-old girl to follow them to their camp in Chabunda village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Three Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo forced a 19-year-old girl to follow them to their camp in Chabunda village in Kalehe territory. The assailants raped the girl.

title/0/en: The FARDC ambushed unidentified armed men in Buloba village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The FARDC ambushed unidentified armed men in Buloba village in Shabunda territory. Six assailants were killed and one was injured.

title/0/en: The FARDC supported by police and ANR elements surrounded a plot of land where they suspected unidentified armed men were staying.
notes/en: The FARDC supported by police and ANR elements surrounded a plot of land where they suspected unidentified armed men were staying. Four of the suspected criminals and one ANR agent were killed during the operation.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up two motorcycles close to Kamukwale village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up two motorcycles close to Kamukwale village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants abducted eleven men.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle taxi close to Ishasha 2 village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle taxi close to Ishasha 2 village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants kidnapped Nyakakoma fishermen's president. They demanded a ransom of $10,000 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Minova in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Minova in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole $2,000 and two suitcases of clothes.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Langalanga village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Langalanga village in Shabunda territory. The assailants looted the village. They abducted two men.

title/0/en: After being informed of an armed raid in Langalanga village in Shabunda territory, the FARDC ambushed the armed men responsible.
notes/en: After being informed of an armed raid in Langalanga village in Shabunda territory, the FARDC ambushed the armed men responsible. Two assailants died during the ambush.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika attacked the FARDC position in Penekusu village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika attacked the FARDC position in Penekusu village in Shabunda territory. Eight FARDC died during the attack. The assailants seized nine AK-47 weapons and other military equipment.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a 50-year-old man in the Mikeno neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a 50-year-old man in the Mikeno neighborhood of Goma.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked the FARDC position in Mbau in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked the FARDC position in Mbau in Beni territory. The attack left two ADF dead, while was one FARDC was killed and another was injured. Three civilians died and two were injured. The assailants burned down a motorcycle and a phone kiosk. Thirteen houses were destroyed by rocket-propelled grenades.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe broke into Vuhovi village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe broke into Vuhovi village in Beni territory. The FARDC and MONUSCO peacekeepers attacked the assailants as they were destroying the local police office. During the clash an 18-year-old boy was shot and killed.

title/0/en: The police dispersed a popular peaceful demonstration in Luigi, Shabunda territory, demanding the cancellation of the relocalization of Luigi and Kigulube primary schools.
notes/en: The police dispersed a popular peaceful demonstration in Luigi, Shabunda territory, demanding the cancellation of the relocalization of Luigi and Kigulube primary schools. The police arrested Luigi primary school director.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe raided Kisunga village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe raided Kisunga village in Beni territory. They burned down the building in which the village chief and police have their offices.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Kavasewa village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Kavasewa village in Beni territory. The Mai-Mai Mazembe burned down the FARDC camp.

title/0/en: Unidentified men and a policeman kidnapped a 9-year-old boy in the Buturande neighborhood of Kiwanja.
notes/en: Unidentified men and a policeman kidnapped a 9-year-old boy in the Buturande neighborhood of Kiwanja. The kidnappers demanded a ransom to release the hostage. They killed him with a crude weapon.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Love who had just raided Mutanda village in Rutshuru territory in search of the village chief.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Love who had just raided Mutanda village in Rutshuru territory in search of the village chief. The FARDC repelled the assailants.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Love raided Mutanda village in Rutshuru territory in search of the village chief.
notes/en: The Nyatura Love raided Mutanda village in Rutshuru territory in search of the village chief. As the village chief had just ran away the assailants shot at the chief and his neighbors' plots. They killed a 50-year-old woman and injured two men one of whom was the village chief's son.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Nepanepa village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Nepanepa village in Shabunda territory. The assailants stole twelve goats and goods. Three assailants raped a 38-year-old woman. The assailants abducted four men.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Kinyamigha village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Kinyamigha village in Beni territory. The Mai-Mai Mazembe abandoned their position to move towards Karuruma.

title/0/en: The FDLR-FOCA attacked the NDC Guidon position in Kabirangiriro village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-FOCA attacked the NDC Guidon position in Kabirangiriro village in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into five houses in Minova in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into five houses in Minova in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants stole a sewing machine, fifteen pieces of fabric and other goods.

title/0/en: Six unidentified armed men broke into a house in Bwesho village in Uvira territory during the night.
notes/en: Six unidentified armed men broke into a house in Bwesho village in Uvira territory during the night. The assailants abducted two men aged 28 and 65, respectively.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Kagabi village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Kagabi village in Kabare territory. The assailants killed a policeman, and ANR agent and four civilians one of whom was Cibingu village chief.

title/0/en: Virunga park rangers attacked the FARDC patrolling Vimbao village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Virunga park rangers attacked the FARDC patrolling Vimbao village in Beni territory. One park ranger died during the clash. The park rangers thought that bandits were attacking their position.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Love killed a 45-year-old man with a machete in Mutanda village in Rutshuru territory as the victim was heading to the field with his son.
notes/en: The Nyatura Love killed a 45-year-old man with a machete in Mutanda village in Rutshuru territory as the victim was heading to his fields with his son.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a FUSO vehicle in Kitemesho in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a FUSO vehicle in Kitemesho in Uvira territory. The assailants killed the driver and injured the second driver. They stole $10,000. The FARDC intervention did not deter the assailants.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Shanje village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Shanje village in Kalehe territory. The assailants shot and killed a 36-year-old woman and wounded her two-months-old child.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe seized an AK-47 weapon belonging to an FARDC soldier in Kanyabayonga rural commune in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe seized an AK-47 weapon belonging to an FARDC soldier in Kanyabayonga rural commune in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in the Yakobo neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in the Yakobo neighborhood of Beni. Two FARDC and a woman were killed during the attack.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the ADF position in Mapobu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the ADF position in Mapobu village in Beni territory. One ADF died and two were captured during the attack.

title/0/en: The men who had kidnapped a DGDA woman agent in Uvira on February 16 2018 released the hostage after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: The men who had kidnapped a DGDA woman agent in Uvira on February 16, 2018 released the hostage after a ransom was paid. The ransom amount was not disclosed.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Love who had kidnapped HYFRO NGO workers on February 17 2018 close to Kongola village in Rutshuru territory released the last hostage after a ransom of $1,050 was paid.
notes/en: The Nyatura Love who had kidnapped HYFRO NGO workers on February 17 2018 close to Kongola village in Rutshuru territory released the last hostage after a ransom of $1,050 was paid.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Oicha rural commune.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Oicha rural commune. The assailants shot a 35-year-old woman. The victim died at Oicha general hospital

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kidodi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kidodi village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants killed a 69-year-old woman with a machete.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who had abducted a priest and his driver close to Kambya village in Beni territory released the hostage being chased by the security services.
notes/en: The kidnappers who had abducted a priest and his driver close to Kambya village in Beni territory released the hostage being chased by the security services.

title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men abducted a Catholic priest and his driver close to Kambya village in Beni territory as they were coming back from Cantine.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men abducted a Catholic priest and his driver close to Kambya village in Beni territory as they were coming back from Cantine. The kidnappers stole the offerings. They abandoned the hostages after being chased by the security services.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kasaka village in Beni territory during the night. The
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kasaka village in Beni territory during the night. The assailants stole $62 and clothes.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Mabanga-Nord neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Mabanga-Nord neighborhood of Goma. The assailants shot and wounded a 26-year-old man. When the victims began screaming, the assailants ran away.

title/0/en: Three unidentified armed men broke into a house in Luduha village in Walungu territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified armed men broke into a house in Luduha village in Walungu territory. The assailants shot and killed a gold trader. They shot and wounded a man who came to help his neighbor. They also looted money, gold and telephones.

title/0/en: Following the clash between unidentified armed men and three Nyatura Love who had kidnapped HYFRO NGO agents close to Kongola village in Rutshutu territory, one of the kidnappers shot and killed two hostages who were too tired to continue walking.
notes/en: Following the clash between unidentified armed men and three Nyatura Love who had kidnapped HYFRO NGO agents close to Kongola village in Rutshutu territory, one of the kidnappers shot and killed two hostages who were too tired to continue walking.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked three Nyatura Love combatants who had just kidnapped four HYFRO NGO agents in Kongola village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked three Nyatura Love combatants who had just kidnapped four HYFRO NGO agents in Kongola village in Rutshuru territory. During the attack one of the hostages managed to escape.

title/0/en: Three Nyatura Love combatants held up a vehicle belonging to the NGO Hydraulique Sans Frontires (HYFRO) close to Kongola village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Three Nyatura Love combatants held up a vehicle belonging to the NGO Hydraulique Sans Frontires (HYFRO) close to Kongola village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants kidnapped four men among the vehicle's passengers.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed an ICCN vehicle of the Okapi Epulu reserve close to Tungudu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed an ICCN vehicle of the Okapi Epulu reserve close to Tungudu village in Beni territory. Five passengers died on the spot, two other passengers died at Oicha general hospital. Four people were injured.

title/0/en: Following the Mai-Mai CNPSC incursion in Ndende mining site the FARDC in turn, raided the same Ndende mining site in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Following the Mai-Mai CNPSC incursion at the Ndende mining site in Fizi territory, the FARDC raided the site. They shot and killed four men and arrested several people.

title/0/en: An FARDC captain and two of his bodyguards broke into a house in Bulambo village in Beni territory.
notes/en: An FARDC captain and two of his bodyguards broke into a house in Bulambo village in Beni territory. The soldiers shot and killed a 28-year-old man. They also burned and injured a 35-year-old man in the same village.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers raped a 53-year-old woman in Bulambo village in Beni territory.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers raped a 53-year-old woman in Bulambo village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai CNPSC raided the Ndende mining site in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai CNPSC raided the Ndende mining site in Fizi territory. The assailants killed a man and wounded six people. They also looted gold.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a jeep close to the Rukangaga neighborhood of Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a jeep close to the Rukangaga neighborhood of Uvira rural commune. The assailants kidnapped a 53-year-old woman, a DGDA agent. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $30,000 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked a Nyatura Domi and FDLR-FOCA position in Muti village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked a Nyatura Domi and FDLR-FOCA position in Muti village in Rutshuru territory. After the attack the FARDC returned to their base in Bambu.

title/0/en: The police arrested sixteen LUCHA activists in Beni during a peaceful demonstration denouncing the resumption of massacres in Beni, as well as rejecting the decision of the mayor of Beni town to make motorcycle owners purchase wooden license plates.
notes/en: The police arrested sixteen LUCHA activists in Beni during a peaceful demonstration denouncing the resumption of massacres in Beni, as well as rejecting the decision of the mayor of Beni town to make motorcycle owners purchase wooden license plates.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men tried to hold up a jeep close to Kasaka village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men tried to hold up a jeep close to Kasaka village in Beni territory. The assailants shot the vehicle and damaged it.

title/0/en: Following the clash between the Mai-Mai Mazembe and the FARDC in Butungu village in Beni territory, the FARDC looted food, goats and chickens.
notes/en: Following the clash between the Mai-Mai Mazembe and the FARDC in Butungu village in Beni territory, the FARDC looted food, goats and chickens.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Butungu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Butungu village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: The NDC-R attacked the APCLS combatants in Binyungunyunyu in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The NDC-R attacked the APCLS combatants in Binyungunyunyu in Masisi territory. The toll from the clash remains unknown.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 31-year-old man in the Oicha Ier neighborhood of Oicha rural commune following the victim's refusal to hand over a cigarette to the soldier for free.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 31-year-old man in the Oicha Ier neighborhood of Oicha rural commune following the victim's refusal to give a cigarette to the soldier. The victim was hospitalized at Oicha general hospital.

title/0/en: Armed and hooded men raided shops in Kayabu Avenue in the Nyalukemba neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: Armed and hooded men raided shops along Kayabu Avenue in the Nyalukemba neighborhood of Bukavu. The assailants shot and killed a 37-year-old man and wounded six people. They also looted money and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a trader in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a trader in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu. The assailants threw a grenade before shooting the victim. They looted money.

title/0/en: Unidentified men broke into a house in Minova in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men broke into a house in Minova in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole a bag of beans, plastic chairs, some dishes, clothes and other goods.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Charles and Jackson position in Lunyasenge village in Lubero territory.
