notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Charles and Jackson position in Lunyasenge village in Lubero territory. The FARDC pushed the assailants out of the village. Two civilians were killed during the clash.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position based in President Kabila's farm in Kabasha, Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position based in President Kabila's farm in Kabasha, Beni territory. Three Mai-Mai Mazembe and two FARDC died and three Mai-Mai Mazembe were captured during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen drank beer in a bar in the Rombe I neighborhood of Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen drank beer in a bar in the Rombe I neighborhood of Uvira rural commune. The assailants shot the bar's owner and his wife as they chased them to claim the payment. The 45-year-old man died on the spot and his 29-year-old wife was hospitalized.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked a herd of cows to steal them in Rurambo village.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked a herd of cows to steal them in Rurambo village. The assailants killed the cows' owner as he tried to intervene. They also shot and wounded three men and the victim's wife. The assailants stole five cows.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked armed men in Wakozi village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked armed men in Wakozi village in Shabunda territory. Seven assailants were killed and two were captured. The FARDC seized four AK47 weapons.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons broke into two houses in Minova village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons broke into two houses in Minova village in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole $150, two telephones, a watch, a pair of trousers and a shirt.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped and raped a 48-year-old woman in Bunyangula in Rutshuru territory on February 11, 2018 released the hostage after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped and raped a 48-year-old woman in Bunyangula in Rutshuru territory on February 11, 2018 released the hostage after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Charles position on the shores of Edouard Lake close to Ndwali village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Charles position on the shores of Edouard Lake close to Ndwali village in Lubero territory. One Mai-Mai Charles died and several were injured during the clash. On the side of the FARDC, three were killed and five wounded. Two civilians were also killed.

title/0/en: Armed men attacked the APCLS position in Ndurumo village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Armed men attacked the APCLS position in Ndurumo village in Masisi territory. The toll of the clash remains unknown.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Rwandan Defense Forces (RDF) position close to Nyesisi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Rwandan Defense Forces (RDF) position close to Nyesisi village in Rutshuru territory. Six FARDC were killed and four were injured during the clash.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika attaked the FARDC positions in Nepanepa, Mulongo, Matala, Kabulongo, Kalabula, Mutumbi and Kitakita villages in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika attaked the FARDC positions in Nepanepa, Mulongo, Matala, Kabulongo, Kalabula, Mutumbi and Kitakita villages in Shabunda territory. Six FARDC were injured and sixteen were captured, one Mai-Mai Malaika died and twenty-two civilians were killed during the attacks. The assailants burned down ten houses. The FARDC seized nine weapons.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into six houses in Majengo Mapya village in Fizi territory. T
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into six houses in Majengo Mapya village in Fizi territory. The assailants looted money, telephones, food and clothes. The assailants shot in the air before leaving.

title/0/en: Unidentified men vandalized the ANR office in Bunyuka village in Beni territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified men vandalized the ANR office in Bunyuka village in Beni territory during the night. The assailants burned all the documents that were in the building.

title/0/en: A policeman raped a 16-year-old girl in Shabunda centre in the territory holding the same name.
notes/en: A policeman raped a 16-year-old girl in Shabunda centre in the territory holding the same name. The neighborhood youth captured the rapist and handed him over to the prosecutor's office.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Minova village in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Minova village in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants stole a mattress, clothes and other goods.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a colleague in Munigi village in Nyiragongo territory as the fought of whether a vehicle should be allowed to pass through Virunga park.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a colleague in Munigi village in Nyiragongo territory as the fought of whether a vehicle should be allowed to pass through Virunga park.

title/0/en: Three unidentified armed men held up motorcycles in Kamandi village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified armed men held up motorcycles in Kamandi village in Lubero territory. The assailants looted money, telephones and other goods. They also raped a woman.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Muhima tortured a 38-year-old man in Ngitse village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Muhima tortured a 38-year-old man in Ngitse village in Beni territory. The victim died from the wounds.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Njolinjoli village in Mwenga territory during the night
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Njolinjoli village in Mwenga territory during the night. The assailants looted money and pharmaceutical products.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Bralima beer warehouse in the Ndendere neighborhood in Bukavu town. The attackers shot and wounded a man who was responsible for the security of the warehouse. They also stole money.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Bralima beer warehouse in the Ndendere neighborhood in Bukavu town. The attackers shot and wounded a man who was responsible for the security of the warehouse. They also stole money.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into the compound of the Vodacom communication company in the Rombe 2 neighborhood of Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into the compound of the Vodacom communication company in the Rombe 2 neighborhood of Uvira rural commune. The assailants shot and killed an FNBank agent. The policeman who was on guard reacted and killed one of the assailants. The other assailants who shot back wounded the policeman and ran away.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raped five women who were coming back from a field close to Kazimia village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raped five women who were coming back from a field close to Kazimia village in Fizi territory. The assailants injured a woman who tried to resist the rape.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men seized two policemen's weapons and uniforms in Katyaza village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men seized two policemen's weapons and uniforms in Katyaza village in Uvira territory. The two policemen were on mission in the village to execute an arrest warrant.

title/0/en: Unidentified men who had kidnapped two men in Goma on February 8, 2018 released the hostages in Munigi village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men who had kidnapped two men in Goma on February 8, 2018 released the hostages in Munigi village in Nyiragongo territory. The kidnappers had tortured, wounded and undressed the hostages.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a colleague following a fight over $20 received during an investigation in Loa Numbi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a colleague following a fight over $20 received during an investigation in Loa Numbi village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a 46-year-old man in Loa Numbi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a 46-year-old man in Loa Numbi village in Kalehe territory. The body of the victim bore traces of a beating.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles kidnapped a pastor of CBCA Buturande church close to Ishasha in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles kidnapped a pastor of CBCA Buturande church close to Ishasha in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $25,000 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: The FARDC looted civilians' property in three villages abandoned by the Nyatura Domi and notably Kashavu, Burere and Mashango in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC looted civilians' property in three villages abandoned by the Nyatura Domi and notably Kashavu, Burere and Mashango in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men who had kidnapped a man and 39 women in Kabikokole village in Mwenga territory on February 8 2018 released the hostages.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men who had kidnapped a man and 39 women in Kabikokole village in Mwenga territory on February 8 2018 released the hostages.

title/0/en: The population of Kasheke village in Kalehe territory demonstrated against the decision of the health district to reject an autonomous status for the local health center.
notes/en: The population of Kasheke village in Kalehe territory demonstrated against the decision of the health district to reject an autonomous status for the local health center. The population blocked all traffic on the Goma-Bukavu road for three days.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into an organization's office in Buganga village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into an organization's office in Buganga village in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole two sewing machines, six chairs, two pairs of scissors and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a 48-year-old woman in Bunyangula village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a 48-year-old woman in Bunyangula village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers raped the victim. They demanded a ransom the amount of which was not disclosed.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi raided Bambu village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi raided Bambu village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants shot and killed Buhambi's police commander who was deployed to the village. They seized the victim's weapon.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a vehicle (brand NOAH) close to Rutemba village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a vehicle (brand NOAH) close to Rutemba village in Uvira territory. The assailants looted money and goods. They also shot and wounded two passengers.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a mini-bus of the Okapi El-Shadai company close to Munywema village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a mini-bus of the Okapi El-Shadai company close to Munywema village in Uvira territory. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga who had kidnapped the vaccination team members in Nyalubemba health center in Koze village in Shabunda territory released the hostages without payment of a ransom.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga who had kidnapped the vaccination team members in Nyalubemba health center in Koze village in Shabunda territory released the hostages without payment of a ransom.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles attacked the FARDC position in Ishasha 2 village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles attacked the FARDC position in Ishasha 2 village in Rutshuru territory. The FARDC repelled the assailants. Eight Mai-Mai Charles died and one was captured during the attack. Three FARDC were injured. The FARDC seized one weapon.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men during their incursion in Ngite village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men during their incursion in Ngite village in Beni territory. The FARDC stopped the assailants from advancing toward the village center.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Ngite village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Ngite village in Beni territory. The assailants looted goods. They shot and killed four men. During their retreat, the assailants abducted six men. They killed four of the six abducted men with machetes.

title/0/en: Four unidentified armed men broke into a shop in Mugogo centre in Walungu territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified armed men broke into a shop in Mugogo centre in Walungu territory. The burglars stole $687, eight telephones and other goods.

title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Kinanira neighborhood of Sange rural commune.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Kinanira neighborhood of Sange rural commune. The assailants abducted the head of the household.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Kabikokole village in Mwenga territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Kabikokole village in Mwenga territory during the night. The assailants looted money, medicines in a health center, stole sixteen solar panels, ten mattresses and other goods. They raped at least 5 womensome reports claim much higher figureswho were in the health center and kidnapped them along with the health center's head nurse.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up two motorcycles close to Buramba village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up two motorcycles close to Buramba village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants kidnapped three men. They demanded $4,000 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified men injured with a crude weapon a 21-year-old woman in the Kasika neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified men injured with a crude weapon a 21-year-old woman in the Kasika neighborhood of Goma.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Nkafu neighborhood of Bukavu during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Nkafu neighborhood of Bukavu during the night. The assailants shot and killed the 63-year-old head of the household.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed an 11-year-old boy in Bwando Bukere village in Idjwi territory as the victim was leaving to go to the nearby village to visit other members of his family.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed an 11-year-old boy in Bwando Bukere village in Idjwi territory as the victim was leaving to go to the nearby village to visit other members of his family.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who had abducted two women in Katwiguru village in Rutshuru territory on February 06, 2018 released the hostages after having raped and wounded them.
notes/en: The kidnappers who had abducted two women in Katwiguru village in Rutshuru territory on February 06, 2018 released the hostages after having raped and wounded them. The release was made possible thanks to the involvement of local leaders.

title/0/en: Unidentified men abducted two musicians in Goma City. The motive for this kidnapping is not known, although one of them sang a song critical of the government.
notes/en: Unidentified men abducted two musicians in Goma City. The motive for this kidnapping is not known, although one of them sang a song critical of the government. After four days of captivity, the two musicians were found naked on February 12, 2018, near the Bukumu chiefdom office in Nyiragongo territory, north of the city of Goma.

title/0/en: Armed men broke into five houses in Minova in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Armed men broke into five houses in Minova in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: Three unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Kasenga neighborhood of Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Three unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Kasenga neighborhood of Uvira rural commune. The assailants shot and killed a 61-year-old woman.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto position in Nkuni in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto position in Nkuni in Shabunda territory. One Raia Mutomboki died and three were injured during the attack. The FARDC seized an AK47 weapon. During the incident, the FARDC released a hostage.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men's positions in Kavusu and Mughalika villages in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men's positions in Kavusu and Mughalika villages in Beni territory. The FARDC destroyed the assailants' camp.

title/0/en: An FARDC captain shot and killed a 22-year-old woman in Mpeti village in Walikale territory during an attempt of burglary in the victim's home.
notes/en: An FARDC captain shot and killed a 22-year-old woman in Mpeti village in Walikale territory during an attempt to break into the victim's home.

title/0/en: Unidentified men injured three people with a machete in the Birere neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified men injured three people with a machete in the Birere neighborhood of Goma.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kimba, who had forced ten people to carry looted goods in Katingi, Kitingi and Kamegi villages in Shabunda territory on February 06, 2018, released the hostages without the payment of a ransom.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kimba, who had forced ten people to carry looted goods in Katingi, Kitingi and Kamegi villages in Shabunda territory on February 06, 2018, released the hostages without the payment of a ransom.

title/0/en: Armed men alleged to be ADF attacked the FARDC in Eringeti, Beni territory.
notes/en: Armed men alleged to be ADF attacked the FARDC in Eringeti, Beni territory. The attack left two civilians wounded by shrapnel from a RPG that landed in the courtyard of Eringeti Health Center.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Muhimbira and Tarika villages in Rutshuru territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Muhimbira and Tarika villages in Rutshuru territory during the night. The assailants looted money, livestock, food and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Kabindula neighborhood of Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Kabindula neighborhood of Uvira rural commune. The assailants shot and killed a 64-year-old woman.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a local chief's house in Kavingu cellule in the Lyakobo neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a local chief's house in Kavingu cellule in the Lyakobo neighborhood of Beni. As they did not find the head of the household the assailants abducted his 18-year-old son.

title/0/en: Six unidentified armed men raided Katwiguru village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Six unidentified armed men raided Katwiguru village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants looted money, livestock and food. They also kidnapped two women.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kimba raided Katingi, Kaligi and Kamegi villages in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kimba raided Katingi, Kaligi and Kamegi villages in Shabunda territory. The assailants stole eighteen goats, five chickens, fifteen batteries and solar panels. They forced ten people to carry looted goods.

title/0/en: The NDC Sheka attacked the NDC Guidon position in Bibasirwa mining site in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC Sheka attacked the NDC Guidon position in Bibasirwa mining site in Walikale territory. The two groups looted the village.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Muhima attacked the FARDC position in Tumbwe village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Muhima attacked the FARDC position in Tumbwe village in Beni territory. One civilian was injured during the attack.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded an 18-year-old man in Vuyinga village in Lubero territory during a patrol organized by the population.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded an 18-year-old man in Vuyinga village in Lubero territory during a patrol organized by the population.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a canoe on Kivu Lake close to Mugote village in Idjwi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a canoe on Kivu Lake close to Mugote village in Idjwi territory. The assailants stole $300. The victims seized the assailants' AK47 weapon.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the position of the policemen guarding the convent in Minova in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the position of the policemen guarding the convent in Minova in Kalehe territory. The assailants ran away following the policemen's resistance.

title/0/en: Following the 5 February 2018 clashes in Lubango, the FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in their retrenchment in Kalonge in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Following the 5 February 2018 clashes in Lubango, the FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in their base in Kalonge in Lubero territory. Three FARDC died during the attack.

title/0/en: ADF gunmen attacked the FARDC position in Mapiki village in Beni territory. The FARDC repelled the attackers.
notes/en: ADF combatants attacked the FARDC position in Mapiki village, Beni territory. The FARDC repelled the attackers.

title/0/en: The FARDC raided Kichanga village in Kalehe territory. The soldiers looted goods and wounded two people.
notes/en: The FARDC raided Kichanga village in Kalehe territory. The soldiers looted goods and wounded two people.

title/0/en: Unidentified men injured a 34-year-old man with a crude weapon close to Bubale I village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men injured a 34-year-old man with a crude weapon close to Bubale I village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Nine unidentified armed men held up two mini buses close to Chibundu village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Nine unidentified armed men held up two mini buses close to Chibundu village in Mwenga territory. The assailants shot and wounded three men aged respectively 48, 50 and 52. They stole $15,000, 45 telephones, 35g of gold. Chibundu's inhabitants managed to catch and lynch three of the assailants.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga abducted the vaccination team members in Nyalubemba health zone in Koze village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga abducted the vaccination team members in Nyalubemba health zone in Koze village in Shabunda territory. The assailants looted the victims' goods.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Jackson position in Lutundu village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Jackson position in Lutundu village in Lubero territory. The FARDC did not manage to dislodge the Mai-Mai from their position.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Lubango in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Lubango in Lubero territory. One Mai-Mai Mazembe died and two were injured, one FARDC was injured during the clash. The FARDC looted the village.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons broke into Saint Christophe and Makimbilio health centers in the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma during the night.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons broke into Saint Christophe and Makimbilio health centers in the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma during the night. The assailants injured twelve patients. Three of the them died.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen who were attempting to rob peop;e near Buhunga village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen who were attempting to rob peop;e near Buhunga village in Beni territory. The FARDC chased away the attackers.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Nguru held up a taxi vehicle close to Kavasewa village in Beni territory. The assailants stole $120.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Nguru held up a taxi vehicle close to Kavasewa village in Beni territory. The assailants stole $120.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the NDC Sheka in Mukaka village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the NDC Sheka in Mukaka village in Walikale territory. There were no victims during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into 8th CEPAC parish in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into 8th CEPAC parish in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu during the night. The assailants injured the watchman. They stole money, two computers and 48 telephones.

title/0/en: Seven armed men wearing FARDC uniforms broke into a shop in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu.
notes/en: Seven armed men wearing FARDC uniforms broke into a shop in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu. The assailants looted money and telephones.

title/0/en: Two policemen tortured and wounded a 30-year-old man in Mungembe village in Shabunda territory after one of his acquantainces was demanded a 9,000 Congolese francs debt be paid bacl.
notes/en: Two policemen tortured and wounded a 30-year-old man in Mungembe village in Shabunda territory after one of his acquantainces was demanded a 9,000 Congolese francs debt be paid bacl.

title/0/en: A policeman raped a 12-year-old girls in Tuntungulu village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: A policeman raped a 12-year-old girls in Tuntungulu village in Shabunda territory. The policeman was arrested.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen held up motorcycles close to Kasekezi village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen held up motorcycles close to Kasekezi village in Fizi territory. The assailants stole $437, telephones and clothes.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped four people in Kibende village in Rutshuru territory as the hostages were working in their fields.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped four people in Kibende village in Rutshuru territory as the hostages were working in their fields. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $5,000 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: Seven unidentified armed men raped a 30-year-old woman close to Mukwezi village in Fizi territory as the victim was going to the shores of Lake Tanganyika to buy fish.
notes/en: Seven unidentified armed men raped a 30-year-old woman close to Mukwezi village in Fizi territory as the victim was going to the shores of Lake Tanganyika to buy fish.

title/0/en: Gunmen broke into the house of the Rassemblement's (opposition coalition) spokesperson in the Nkafu neighborhood of Bukavu during the night.
notes/en: Gunmen broke into the house of the Rassemblement's (opposition coalition) spokesperson in the Nkafu neighborhood of Bukavu during the night. The assailants stole $400 and five telephones.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men who had kidnapped the chief of Kayaya village in Kalehe territory on 2 February 2018 released the hostage without the payment of a ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men who had kidnapped the chief of Kayaya village in Kalehe territory on 2 February 2018 released the hostage without the payment of a ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Panzi neighborhood of Bukavu during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Panzi neighborhood of Bukavu during the night. The assailants stole $250 and two computers.

title/0/en: Armed men abducted the chief of Kayaya village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Armed men abducted the chief of Kayaya village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Armed men accompanied by their wives and children raided Kitevya village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Armed men accompanied by their wives and children raided Kitevya village in Beni territory. The assailants looted medicines, livestock and other goods. They killed six men with crude weapons and wounded nine people. The assailants also burned down several houses.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped four men in Kitoboko village, Rutshuru territory, as they were returning from their fields.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped four men in Kitoboko village, Rutshuru territory, as they were returning from their fields. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $8,000 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up seven motorcycles close to Ake-Lusambo village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up seven motorcycles close to Ake-Lusambo village in Fizi territory. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: The police shot and wounded three Pygmies during an eviction in Kasunyu-Mahuge village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The police shot and wounded three Pygmies during an eviction in Kasunyu-Mahuge village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two peasants in the fields near Mughalika village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped two peasants in the fields near Mughalika village in Beni territory. As of mid-February 2018, no information was available regarding the fate of the hostages.

title/0/en: The FARDC opened fire at random in Mayi-Moya village in Beni territory as they believed that the ADF were raiding the village.
notes/en: The FARDC opened fire at random in Mayi-Moya village in Beni territory as they believed that the ADF were raiding the village. The FARDC shot and wounded a 19-year-old man and an 11-year-old boy.

title/0/en: Armed men shot a motorcycle driver and his two passengers including an FARDC soldier and his wife in Kaseke village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Armed men shot a motorcycle driver and his two passengers including an FARDC soldier and his wife in Kaseke village in Fizi territory. The driver died on the spot. The assailants wounded the soldier and his wife. They seized an AK47 weapon, the soldier's uniform, money and telephones.

title/0/en: CNRD combatants attacked the NDC Guidon position in Buronga village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: CNRD combatants attacked the NDC Guidon position in Buronga village in Walikale territory. The NDC Guidon repelled the CNRD.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Mapema village in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Mapema village in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants stole money, seven goats and goods. They forced fifteen people to carry looted goods. The assailants kept five of the fifteen abducted people and demanded a ransom of $750.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a man and his wife in Kibiriga village in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a man and his wife in Kibiriga village in Nyiragongo territory. Following the incident, the soldier took his own life.

title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men broke into two shops in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men broke into two shops in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto as they were looting goods belonging to traders coming back from Niabembe market close to Makutano in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto as they were looting goods belonging to traders coming back from Niabembe market close to Makutano in Shabunda territory. The FARDC shot and wounded one of the assailants and captured him.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto stole $281,30 Kg of cassiterite and merchandise belonging to traders who were returning from Niabembe market close to Makutanto in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto stole $281,30 Kg of cassiterite and merchandise belonging to traders who were returning from Niabembe market close to Makutanto in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai CNPSC attacked the FARDC position in Mikenge in Mwenga territory as they were running away from FARDC's heavy attacks in Fizi.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai CNPSC attacked the FARDC position in Mikenge in Mwenga territory as they were running away from FARDC's offensive in Fizi. Two FARDC died during the attack.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Kasongo attacked the APCLS position in Malanda village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Kasongo attacked the APCLS position in Malanda village in Masisi territory. One Nyatura Kasongo died during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men abducted a man, two women and two boys in Kipeyayo village in Beni territory as the victims were going to Mayangose fields.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men abducted a man, two women and two boys in Kipeyayo village in Beni territory as the victims were going to Mayangose fields.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into the house of the chief of Katolu village in Beni territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into the house of the chief of Katolu village in Beni territory during the night. The assailants shot and killed the 40-year-old Capita and his 35-year-old neighbor who was trying to come in his rescue.

title/0/en: Unidentified men raped a 28-year-old woman close to Kibua in Walikale territory as she was returning from the field.
notes/en: Unidentified men raped a 28-year-old woman close to Kibua in Walikale territory as she was returning from her field. The rapers then killed the victim with a machete.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men who had abducted five people in Kipeyayo village in Beni territory on 30 January 2018 released a man and a woman.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men who had abducted five people in Kipeyayo village in Beni territory on 30 January 2018 released a man and a woman.

title/0/en: Three unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kaswa 3 village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kaswa 3 village in Rutshuru territory. Having missed the head of the household, the assailants kidnapped his 46-year-old wife and demanded a ransom of $3,000.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a mini bus belonging to Pacifique company and transporting a corpse close to Rutemba in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a mini bus belonging to Pacifique company and transporting a corpse close to Rutemba in Uvira territory. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: The FARDC whipped a policeman who was accused of having stolen a goat in Lugungu in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The FARDC whipped a policeman who was accused of having stolen a goat in Lugungu in Shabunda territory. The victim died from his wounds.

title/0/en: Three unidentified armed men held up a FUSO vehicle transporting traders close to Nyahanga village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified armed men held up a FUSO vehicle transporting traders close to Nyahanga village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants looted money.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed gunmen had nightly entered a house at Panzi quater in Bukavu.
notes/en: Unidentified armed gunmen had nightly broke into a house in the Panzi neighborhood of Bukavu. They stole money, telephones and several goods. They injured a 22-year-old woman.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons broke into a house in Kusisa in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons broke into a house in Kusisa in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants killed a 54-year-old woman suspected of being a witch with a machete.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Domi positions in Kamena, Kihesi and Kanaba villages in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Domi positions in Kamena, Kihesi and Kanaba villages in Rutshuru territory. One Nyatura Domi was injured during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up six motorcycles close to Karto village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up six motorcycles close to Karto village in Masisi territory. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: An unidentified gunman shot and killed three men in Mapendo village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: An unidentified man shot and killed three men in Mapendo village, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto looted $ 6,562,40 kgs of cassiterite and phones belonging to traders who were returning from Niabembe to Lulingu in the village of Isambe, Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto looted $ 6,562,40 kgs of cassiterite and phones belonging to traders who were returning from Niabembe to Lulingu in the village of Isambe, Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: The FARDC launched an offensive against the positions of Mai-Mai CNPSC in the villages of Mizimu, Dine, Manga, Some in Fizi territory. The FARDC captured 32 assailants, including seven wounded. The FARDC looted property from civilians and burned houses.
notes/en: The FARDC launched an offensive against the CNPSC in the villages of Mizimu, Dine, Manga, Some in Fizi territory. The FARDC captured 32 assailants, including seven wounded. The FARDC looted property from civilians and burned houses.

title/0/en: NDC Guidon attacked the NDC Sheka positions at Mukaka village in Walikale territory when civilians were being asked for 2000 Congolese franc as a tax for being able to move freely in the area.
notes/en: NDC Guidon attacked the NDC Sheka positions at Mukaka village in Walikale territory when civilians were being asked for 2000 Congolese franc as a tax for being able to move freely in the area. One NDC Guidon and one NDC Sheka fighter were injured. A young boy was also reportedly injured when he fled the fighting.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked FNL combatants near the rural commune of Kiliba in Uvira territory. The FARDC killed three attackers.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked FNL combatants near the rural commune of Kiliba in Uvira territory. The FARDC killed three combatants.

title/0/en: The FARDC repelled armed men who were attempting to rob a convent in Minova, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The FARDC repelled armed men who were attempting to rob a convent in Minova, Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Nyatura Love attacked the positions of another armed group in Kitanda and Kaetsi villages, Rutshuru territory. This clash killed three civilians. Nyatura Love burned down several houses belonging to civilians.
notes/en: Nyatura Love attacked the positions of another armed group in Kitanda and Kaetsi villages, Rutshuru territory. This clash killed three civilians. Nyatura Love burned down several houses belonging to civilians.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a taxi vehicle close to Karuruma village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a taxi vehicle close to Karuruma village in Beni territory. The assailants injured the driver with a machete. They stole $3,350, a gold chain, a gold necklace and a telephone.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen raided a house in Ruzozi village in Uvira territory. The attackers shot and killed a 60-year-old woman following a presumption of witchcraft.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen raided a house in Ruzozi village in Uvira territory. The attackers shot and killed a 60-year-old woman; she had been accused of witchcraft.

title/0/en: A Nyatura Kalume combatant shot and killed a 45-year-old man in Bushugulu village in Kalehe territory following a land conflict.
notes/en: A Nyatura Kalume combatant shot and killed a 45-year-old man in Bushugulu village in Kalehe territory following a land conflict.

title/0/en: At the same time, NDC Guidon attacked  the Mai-Mai Mazembe at Pitakongo,Mbughaviywa and Kinyatsi villages in Lubero territory.
notes/en: At the same time, NDC Guidon attacked  the Mai-Mai Mazembe at Pitakongo,Mbughaviywa and Kinyatsi villages in Lubero territory. Five NDC Guidon fighters were killed  and seven others wounded; A Mai-Mai Mazembe combatant was also wounded.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the FARDC position in Mapobu village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the FARDC position in Mapobu village in Beni territory. One FARDC major was killed during the attack.

title/0/en: The coalition of Raia Mutomboki Donat, Mabala, Kimba, Ndarumanga, Wemba, Kokodikoko and Willy held up a FUSO vehicle close to Ngolombe in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The coalition of Raia Mutomboki Donat, Mabala, Kimba, Ndarumanga, Wemba, Kokodikoko and Willy held up a FUSO vehicle close to Ngolombe in Shabunda territory. The assailants looted money and goods. They injured the passengers and forced sixteen people to carry looted goods.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai CNPSC in Kikonde village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai CNPSC in Kikonde village in Fizi territory. After the Mai-Mai ran away, the soldiers looted medicines in Kikonde hospital.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru raided the village of Kashewe in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted money and property. They shot and wounded two boys under the age of 18. They also forcibly recruited five former militiamen.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru raided the village of Kashewe in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted money and property. They shot and wounded two boys under the age of 18. They also forcibly recruited five former militiamen.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Domi position close to Rushovu village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Domi position close to Rushovu village in Rutshuru territory. One man was killed and a woman was shot and wounded during the clash.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attached the FARDC position in Linzosinene in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attached the FARDC position in Linzosinene in Beni territory. The FARDC managed to repel the assailants.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi attacked policemen in Rushovu village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi attacked policemen in Rushovu village in Rutshuru territory. When the FARDC came in reinforcement, the assailants ran away. One policeman was killed during the clash.

title/0/en: FARDC raided nightly 25 houses in the rural district of Baraka in Fizi territory. The FARDC soldiers looted money, food and property.
notes/en: The FARDC raided 25 houses in the rural district of Baraka in Fizi territory during the night. The FARDC soldiers looted money, food and property.

title/0/en: Five unidentified gunmen raided a house in Kiseguru village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers shot dead a 46-year-old man.
notes/en: Five unidentified gunmen raided a house in Kiseguru village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers shot dead a 46-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 57-year-old man in Uvira town, in the territory of the same name. The kidnappers also stole two phones.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 57-year-old man in Uvira town, in the territory of the same name. The kidnappers also stole two phones.

title/0/en: Five armed men wearing hoods shot and injured with a grenade sixteen traders in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu.
notes/en: Five armed men wearing hoods shot and injured with a grenade sixteen traders in the Ndendere neighborhood of Bukavu. The assailants looted money.

title/0/en: An unidentified armed man shot and killed a taxi driver close to Opira village in Beni territory.
notes/en: An unidentified armed man shot and killed a taxi driver close to Opira village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up eleven motorcycles close to Karega village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up eleven motorcycles close to Karega village in Kalehe territory. The assailants looted money and other goods. They also shot and wounded three men who were trying to run away.

title/0/en: An NDC Guidon combatant shot and killed a 25-year-old man in Bukumbirwa in Walikale territory, following an argument over which team is better: Real Madrid or FC Barcelona.
notes/en: An NDC Guidon combatant shot and killed a 25-year-old man in Bukumbirwa in Walikale territory, following an argument over which team is better: Real Madrid or FC Barcelona.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen stole $4,200 from cow traders close to Ramba village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen stole $4,200 from cow traders close to Ramba village in Kalehe territory. The assailants shot and wounded two men trying to run away with the money.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a mini bus close to Opira village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a mini bus close to Opira village in Beni territory. The assailants shot and wounded four women.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Charles position in Lunyasenge village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Charles position in Lunyasenge village in Lubero territory. Two Mai-Mai Charles died during the clash. The FARDC seized two AK47 weapons.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Kasindi, Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Kasindi, Beni territory. One of the assailants was killed during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into the health center, the primary school and the village institute in Cigukiro, Walungu territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into the health center, the primary school and the village institute in Cigukiro, Walungu territory. The assailants injured three men aged 40, 55 and 60 respectively. They looted money and goods.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mabala and Donat abducted three men aged 28, 33 and 37 respectively in Luyuyu, Shabunda territory, accusing them of leaving their group without their leader's authorization.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mabala and Donat abducted three men aged 28, 33 and 37 respectively in Luyuyu, Shabunda territory, accusing them of leaving their group without their leader's authorization. The assailants stole eight goats and five batteries.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Butachibera raided Mihaha village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Butachibera raided Mihaha village in Kalehe territory. The assailants shot and killed a 43-year-old man following a land conflict. They kidnapped three men and demanded a ransom of $1,350. They also looted the village.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kimba stole five telephones, 30 g of gold, 52 kg of cassiterite and two motorcycles on the road leading to Lulingu close to Mombelwa village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kimba stole five telephones, 30 g of gold, 52 kg of cassiterite and two motorcycles on the road leading to Lulingu close to Mombelwa village in Shabunda territory. The assailants shot and wounded a man and forced four other men to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who had abducted an abbot and an agronomist in Bingo village on 22 January 2018 released the hostages in the Mangodomu neighborhood of Mangina rural commune.
notes/en: The kidnappers who had abducted an abbot and an agronomist in Bingo village on 22 January 2018 released the hostages in the Mangodomu neighborhood of Mangina rural commune.

title/0/en: The 20-year-old man abducted by unknown people in Ngangi 3 in Nyiragongo territory on 23 January 2018 managed to escape from his kidnappers.
notes/en: The 20-year-old man abducted by unknown people in Ngangi 3 in Nyiragongo territory on 23 January 2018 managed to escape from his kidnappers.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai CNPSC launched a counteroffensive against the FARDC position in Baraka, Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai CNPSC launched a counteroffensive against the FARDC position in Baraka, Fizi territory. This attack killed two civilians and wounded three others.

title/0/en: An ANR agent tortured and wounded a 45-year-old woman in Kalungu in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An ANR agent tortured and wounded a 45-year-old woman in Kalungu, Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 29-year-old taxi driver at an illegal checkpoint put up in Vuyinga village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 29-year-old taxi driver at an illegal checkpoint put up in Vuyinga village in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo in Miowe village in Kalehe territory as the assailants were stealing civilians' belongings.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo in Miowe village in Kalehe territory as the assailants were stealing civilians' belongings. One FARDC died and two were injured, one of the assailants was killed and three civilians were shot and wounded. The FARDC and the assailants stole civilians' belongings.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe who had kidnapped five men in Mwavaghendi in Lubero territory on 20 January 2018 released the remaining two hostages after a ransom of $250 was paid.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe who had kidnapped five men in Mwavaghendi in Lubero territory on 20 January 2018 released the remaining two hostages after a ransom of $250 was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the APCLS combatants' position in Mahanga village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the APCLS combatants' position in Mahanga village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into an Airtel money shop in the Buholo VI neighborhood of Bukavu.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into an Airtel money shop in the Buholo VI neighborhood of Bukavu. The assailants shot and wounded a 48-year-old woman. They looted money, telephones and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men, wearing FARDC uniforms kidnapped an priest and an agronomist in Bingo, Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men, wearing FARDC uniforms kidnapped an priest and an agronomist in Bingo, Beni territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom to release the hostages.

title/0/en: The Raia-Mutomboki Kazimoto stole 600 Kg of cassiterite, six telephones and six bicycles in Niabembe in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia-Mutomboki Kazimoto stole 600 Kg of cassiterite, six telephones and six bicycles in Niabembe in Shabunda territory. They forced six owners of these goods to carry them.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the APCLS combatants positions in Kasompo and Mafanga villages in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the APCLS combatants positions in Kasompo and Mafanga villages in Masisi territory. One APCLS was killed and one was injured during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a 51-year-old woman with a machete in Katondi village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a 51-year-old woman with a machete in Katondi village in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked four Nyatura Kalume combatants in Murambi village in Kalehe territory as they were patrolling.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked four Nyatura Kalume combatants in Murambi village in Kalehe territory as they were patrolling. The FARDC captured one of them.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up four motorcycles close to Karton village in Masisi territory. The
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up four motorcycles close to Karton village in Masisi territory. The assailants looted money, telephones and other goods.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Domi position in Butare and Kabizo vilages in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Domi position in Butare and Kabizo vilages in Rutshuru territory. One FARDC died and one was injured during the attack.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe raided Lusogha village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe raided Lusogha village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants looted the village. The FARDC intervened to push back the assailants. During the shooting the FARDC injured and captured three Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants. A 45-year-old man was shot and wounded.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position in Tungudu in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position in Tungudu in Beni territory. Three men died during the attack.

title/0/en: The police repressed a peaceful demonstration called by the Comit Lac de Coordination at Butembo Cathedral.
notes/en: The police repressed a peaceful demonstration called by the Comit Lac de Coordination at Butembo Cathedral. The police arrested three men.

title/0/en: The police repressed a demonstration of Catholics at Cathdrale de Virunga in Goma using tear gas.
notes/en: The police repressed a demonstration of Catholics at Cathdrale de Virunga in Goma using tear gas. The police locked the parishioners in the cathedral.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked the FARDC position in Katambi village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked the FARDC position in Katambi village in Lubero territory. The assailants were trying to get back control over their former stronghold.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi attacked the convoy of Minister Eugne Serufuli's who was being escorted by the FARDC in Butare in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi attacked the convoy of Minister Eugne Serufuli's who was being escorted by the FARDC in Butare in Rutshuru territory. During the attack they shot and wounded a 14-year-old girl. The assailants burned down the minister's home.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided Chisasa village in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided Chisasa village in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants stole $560, five goats, ten chickens and goods. They also injured with a machete a man and his wife as they were trying to get the neighbors' attention.

title/0/en: The police and the FARDC repressed a peaceful demonstration organized by the Comit Lac de Coordination in Bukavu.
notes/en: The police and the FARDC repressed a peaceful demonstration organized by the Comit Lac de Coordination in Bukavu. The police and the FARDC arrested fourteen civilians and injured fourteen others.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Munyakondomi in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Munyakondomi in Lubero territory. Six Mai-Mai Mazembe and two FARDC died during the clash.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe who had captured a policeman in Katondi in Lubero territory on 15 January 2018 killed the policeman.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe who had captured a policeman in Katondi in Lubero territory on 15 January 2018 killed the policeman.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe who had kidnapped five men in Mwavaghendi in Lubero territory on 20 January 2018 released three of the hostages without the payment of the ransom.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe who had kidnapped five men in Mwavaghendi in Lubero territory on 20 January 2018 released three of the hostages without the payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe killed a policeman and an ANR agent with a machete in Masereka village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe killed a policeman and an ANR agent with a machete in Masereka village in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into Surs de Marie reine des Aptres convent in Minova in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into Surs de Marie reine des Aptres convent in Minova in Kalehe territory. The assailants destroyed the contents of the tabernacle.

title/0/en: Five FARDC soldiers who went to Murambi in Kalehe territory to arrest several old Nyatura combatants took a woman's drink without paying.
notes/en: Five FARDC soldiers who went to Murambi in Kalehe territory to arrest several old Nyatura combatants took a woman's drink without paying. These soldiers shot at another FARDC T2 intelligence officer and the village chief who wanted to hold them and force them to pay for the drink.

title/0/en: The CNRD attacked the Nyatura Kasongo positions in Kashuga, Bugarama, Bushenge and Mbuhi villages in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The CNRD attacked the Nyatura Kasongo positions in Kashuga, Bugarama, Bushenge and Mbuhi villages in Masisi territory. Six Nyatura Kasongo died during the clashes.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi attacked the FARDC position in Kabizo in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi attacked the FARDC position in Kabizo in Rutshuru territory. During the attack they shot and killed a 12-year-old girl and injured a man.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe kidnapped five men in Mwavaghendi in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe kidnapped five men in Mwavaghendi in Lubero territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $250 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: The FARDC launched an offensive against the Mai-Mai CNPSC positions in the villages of Nemba, Makama, Kongolo and Kibanga in Fizi territory. The Mai-Mai CNPSC abandoned their positions.
notes/en: The FARDC launched an offensive against the Mai-Mai CNPSC positions in the villages of Nemba, Makama, Kongolo and Kibanga in Fizi territory. The Mai-Mai CNPSC abandoned their positions.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Kirikiri in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Kirikiri in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position in Mayi-Moya in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position in Mayi-Moya in Beni territory. A man and a woman were killed during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the FARDC position in Nyaleke village in Beni territory. T
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the FARDC position in Nyaleke village in Beni territory. Three FARDC died during the attack. The FARDC seized three AK47 weapons.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who had abducted eleven people close to Nyaleke village in Beni territory on 11 January 2018 released three hostages in the Kasabinyole neighborhood of Beni after a ransom of $10,500 was paid.
notes/en: The kidnappers who had abducted eleven people close to Nyaleke village in Beni territory on 11 January 2018 released three hostages in the Kasabinyole neighborhood of Beni after a ransom of $10,500 was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a food shop in the Nyalukemba neighborhood of Bukavu
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a grocery store in the Nyalukemba neighborhood of Bukavu. The assailants looted money, telephones and other goods. They also injured a 45-year-old woman.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into an Airtel money shop in the Nyakavogo neighborhood of Bukavu.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into an Airtel money shop in the Nyakavogo neighborhood of Bukavu. The assailants stole $4,000, telephones and other goods.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon captured an CNRD combatant among those who had kidnapped two MSF agents in Matenge in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon captured an CNRD combatant among those who had kidnapped two MSF agents in Matenge in Walikale territory. The CNRD released the hostages upon NDC Guidon's pressure.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin fought among themselves over who should keep the money collected at an illegal check point in Rukaraba in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin fought among themselves over who should keep the money collected at an illegal check point in Rukaraba in Walikale territory. Two combatants were shot and wounded.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the FARDC positions in Parking and Abialose villages in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, alleged to be ADF, attacked the FARDC positions in Parking and Abialose villages in Beni territory. Four assailants and 24 FARDC died, and fifteen FARDC were injured during the attack.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika raided Kalole-Mapepo, Makamba, Matala and Mulongo villages in Shabunda territory during the night.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika raided Kalole-Mapepo, Makamba, Matala and Mulongo villages in Shabunda territory during the night. The assailants stole $500, fourteen telephones, twelve solar paneles, 23 goats and ten bags of rice.

title/0/en: The CNRD raided Mpati village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The CNRD raided Mpati village in Masisi territory. They shot and killed a 40-year-old man and a 10-year-old girl.

title/0/en: The 11-year-old girl who had been kidnapped by unknown people in the Himbi 2 neighborhood of Goma managed to escape from her kidnappers.
notes/en: The 11-year-old girl who had been kidnapped by unknown people in the Himbi 2 neighborhood of Goma managed to escape from her kidnappers.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a mini bus belonging to Okapi/El-Shadai company close to Rutemba village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a mini bus belonging to Okapi/El-Shadai company close to Rutemba village in Uvira territory. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga et Ngandu held up four motorcycles close to Nduma in Sabunda territory as the taxi drivers had just left their clients in Suiza.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga et Ngandu held up four motorcycles close to Nduma in Sabunda territory as the taxi drivers had just left their clients in Suiza. The assailants abducted four taxi drivers aged 25, 26, 33, and 36 respectively and took their motorcycles.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped an 11-year-old girl in the Himbi 2 neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped an 11-year-old girl in the Himbi 2 neighborhood of Goma.

title/0/en: Four CNRD combatants kidnapped two MSF agents aged 32 and 36 respectively in Matenge in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Four CNRD combatants kidnapped two MSF agents aged 32 and 36 respectively in Matenge in Walikale territory. The kidnappers released the hostages under pressure from the NDC Guidon.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mail Kilalo and Mai-Mai Charles position in Katambi in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mail Kilalo and Mai-Mai Charles position in Katambi in Lubero territory. One Mai-Mai Kilalo died and two were captured during the clash.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Nguru attacked policemen in Kyondo rural commune in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Nguru attacked policemen in Kyondo rural commune in Beni territory. Two policemen were shot and wounded during the attack.

title/0/en: CNRD combatants shot and killed a 47-year-old man in Mabeshe village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: CNRD combatants shot and killed a 47-year-old man in Mabeshe village in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Maheshe who had kidnapped a 39-year-old man in Kavundo in Walungu territory released the hostage after a ransom of $1,000 was paid.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Maheshe who had kidnapped a 39-year-old man in Kavundo in Walungu territory released the hostage after a ransom of $1,000 was paid.

title/0/en: The FDLR-FOCA who had kidnapped a 48-year-old man close to Kabanda in Rutshuru territory on 12 January 2018 released the hostage after a ransom of $2,500 was paid.
notes/en: The FDLR-FOCA who had kidnapped a 48-year-old man close to Kabanda in Rutshuru territory on 12 January 2018 released the hostage after a ransom of $2,500 was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen burgled two shops in Camp Bonde village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into two shops in Camp Bonde village in Kalehe territory. The assailants looted money, solar panels, batteries and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Biambe village in Beni territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Biambe village in Beni territory during the night. The attackers looted property from a local shop.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a home in Kinyangara village in Beni territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a home in Kinyangara village in Beni territory during the night. The assailants shot and wounded a man and burned down his kitchen.

title/0/en: Armed men shot and killed a 32-year-old man in Kasindwa in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Armed men shot and killed a 32-year-old man in Kasindwa in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: Following the abduction of an ANR agent and his brother in Lokoke in Fizi territory, the FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Yakutumba who had kidnapped the two hostages.
notes/en: Following the abduction of an ANR agent and his brother in Lokoke in Fizi territory, the FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Yakutumba who had kidnapped the two hostages. The kidnappers released the ANR agent's brother.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Yakutumba kidnapped an ANR agent and his brother close to Lokoke village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Yakutumba kidnapped an ANR agent and his brother close to Lokoke village in Fizi territory.

title/0/en: Two FARDC soldiers shot and killed a 22-year-old man in Mavivi in Beni territory when the victim asked one of the soldiers to pay for the airtime he bought.
notes/en: Two FARDC soldiers shot and killed a 22-year-old man in Mavivi in Beni territory when the victim asked one of the soldiers to pay for the airtime he bought.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD broke into twelve houses in Ngwenda in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD broke into twelve houses in Ngwenda in Rutshuru territory. The assailants looted money, telephones, clothes and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Mabanga-Nord neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Mabanga-Nord neighborhood of Goma. The assailants shot and killed a 22-year-old student.

title/0/en: Armed men killed two men aged 39 and 40 respectively in Kasanya in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Armed men killed two men aged 39 and 40 respectively in Kasanya in Shabunda territory. The assailants stole two cows among those that the victims were herding.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Ebu Ela in Tujenge village, Fizi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Ebu Ela in Tujenge village, Fizi territory. Three Mai-Mai Ebu Ela and a FARDC soldier died in the clash.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Itili village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Itili village in Lubero territory. Three FARDC died, two Mai-Mai Mazembe were injured during the clash. The assailants seized fifteen weapons.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon abducted a 40-year-old man in Mpeti village in Walikale territory during the night.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon abducted a 40-year-old man in Mpeti village in Walikale territory during the night. They accused the man of hiding weapons.

title/0/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms held up two cars in Karuruma village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms held up two cars in Karuruma village in Beni territory. The assailants injured a driver with a machete and looted money and goods.

title/0/en: Following a clash at Itili, the FARDC stole money and goods from civilians in Lubango village, Lubero territory, while they were returning back from the place of the clash.
notes/en: Following a clash at Itili, the FARDC stole money and goods from civilians in Lubango village, Lubero territory, while they were returning back from the place of the clash.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Mugogo village, Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Mugogo village, Uvira territory. The attackers shot and wounded a 56-year-old man.

title/0/en: Armed men broke into a house in Nyakombe in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Armed men broke into a house in Nyakombe in Shabunda territory. The assailants shot and wounded the head of the household and stole $375.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Maheshe attacked the FARDC positions in Kaliba, Kavundo and Irunga villages in Walungu territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Maheshe attacked the FARDC positions in Kaliba, Kavundo and Irunga villages in Walungu territory. Two Raia Mutomboki Maheshe died, a 39-year-old man was kidnapped by the assailants and one person was shot and wounded during the clash. The assailants demanded a ransom of $3,000. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Kabanzi and Butachibera close to Kambale in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Kabanzi and Butachibera close to Kambale in Kalehe territory. One assailant died, one FARDC was injured and a woman was shot and wounded during the clash. The FARDC and the assailants looted the village.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position in the Kasabinyole neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position in the Kasabinyole neighborhood of Beni. Three FARDC died, four were injured and one was captured during the attack. The FARDC seized two AK47 weapons.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen broke into Rwacaf factory in Bubanga II in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen broke into Rwacaf factory in Bubanga II in Rutshuru territory. The assailants tortured and injured two guards aged 53 and 56 respectively.

title/0/en: Four CNRD combatants broke into a house in Matenge village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Four CNRD combatants broke into a house in Matenge village in Walikale territory. The assailants killed the head of the household, aged 49, with a machete.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe captured a policeman in Katondi in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe captured a policeman in Katondi in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Minova in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Minova in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants stole a mattress, a chair and a table.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen burgled a house in Mulala village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen burgled a house in Mulala village in Kalehe territory. The burglars stole a printer and two telephones.

title/0/en: Nyatura FDP combatants broke into a house in Mugwata village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Nyatura FDP combatants broke into a house in Mugwata village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants looted money, clothes and mattresses.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Busama in Walungu territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Busama in Walungu territory. The assailants shot and killed a 27-year-old man.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kimba raided Kitandi and Ibonga villages in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kimba raided Kitandi and Ibonga villages in Shabunda territory. The assailants abducted three men and a woman who used to be members of the armed group. They looted the villages.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru held up more than six motorcycles close to Mukowa in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru held up more than six motorcycles close to Mukowa in Kalehe territory. The assailants looted money and goods. They shot and wounded two men. They kidnapped five men and demanded a ransom of $1,750 to release them.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed two men in Burambya in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed two men in Burambya in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Katogota village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a house in Katogota village in Uvira territory. The attackers stabbed a 17-year-old boy with a knife and looted $125.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD raided Kinyandonyi village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD raided Kinyandonyi village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants kidnapped a woman and raped her. They demanded an unknown ransom. The kidnappers released the victim after the demanded ransom was paid.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot dead a 27-year-old man in the village of Kibungu in Uvira territory after the victim had  recovered a debt of 10,000 Congolese francs from the soldier.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot dead a 27-year-old man in the village of Kibungu in Uvira territory after the victim had  recovered a debt of 10,000 Congolese francs from the soldier.

title/0/en: Three armed men wearing FARDC uniforms who had kidnapped a man in the Ngongolio neighborhood of Beni on 13 January 2018 at 1am released the hostage without the payment of the ransom.
notes/en: Three armed men wearing FARDC uniforms who had kidnapped a man in the Ngongolio neighborhood of Beni on 13 January 2018 at 1am released the hostage without the payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into Luguguma mining site in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into Luguguma mining site in Shabunda territory. The assailants attacked a policeman in the site. One digger was shot and wounded, three men were abducted by the assailants. The assailants stole $209, 25 grams of gold and fifteen kilograms of cassiterite.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Wemba stole ten goats and traders' merchandise close to Masina village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Wemba stole ten goats and traders' merchandise close to Masina village in Shabunda territory. The assailants forced fifteen men to carry looted goods.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the armed groups operating in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked armed groups operating in Beni territory. The FARDC shelled suspected rebel strongholds near Mukoko village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Kilongote village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Kilongote village in Walikale territory. The assailants stole ten goats and goods. They shot and wounded a woman and two underage boys. They forced seventeen people to carry the looted goods and conditioned the release of eight people to the payment of a ransom of $1,600. The assailants also burned down six houses.

title/0/en: Three gunmen wearing FARDC uniforms broke into a house in the Ngongolio neighborhood of Beni during the night.
notes/en: Three gunmen wearing FARDC uniforms broke into a house in the Ngongolio neighborhood of Beni during the night. The assailants stole $300 and kidnapped a man. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $10,000 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a shop in Minova in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a shop in Minova in Kalehe territory. The assailants looted manufactured goods.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Ndoluma village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Ndoluma village in Lubero territory. Two FARDC died and three were injured during the clash. The assailants seized two weapons.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped three women near the village of Bwironde in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped three women near the village of Bwironde in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $ 4,500 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: The FDLR-FOCA kidnapped a 48-year-old man close to Kabanda village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-FOCA kidnapped a 48-year-old man close to Kabanda village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $10,000 to release the hostages. The kidnappers released the hostage after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: One of the hostages kidnapped by armed men wearing FARDC uniforms close to Nyaleke in Beni territory on 11 January 2018 escaped from his kidnappers.
notes/en: One of the hostages kidnapped by armed men wearing FARDC uniforms close to Nyaleke in Beni territory on 11 January 2018 escaped from his kidnappers.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers looted money and property in Nyange village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers looted money and property in Nyange village in Fizi territory.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier stabbed a man with a crude weapon at a FONER check point in Lubero town, in the territory of the same name.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier stabbed a man with a crude weapon at a FONER check point in Lubero town, in the territory of the same name.

title/0/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms with a yellow armband held up two cars and motorcycles close to Nyaleke in Beni territory.
notes/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms with a yellow armband held up two cars and motorcycles close to Nyaleke in Beni territory. The assailants looted money and other goods. They abducted nine people.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai She Malaika attacked the FARDC position in Kalole-Mapepo village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai She Malaika attacked the FARDC position in Kalole-Mapepo village in Shabunda territory. The assailants stole 38 goats and other goods. They forced seven men to carry the stolen goods.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon, who had kidnapped a 38-year-old man in Burumbi village in Walikale territory on 09 January 2018, released the hostage without the payment of the ransom.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon, who had kidnapped a 38-year-old man in Burumbi village in Walikale territory on 09 January 2018, released the hostage without the payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided seven shops in the Panzi neighborhood of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided seven shops in the Panzi neighborhood of Bukavu town. The attackers looted money and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Mapendo in Rutshuru territory where they shot and killed a woman.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Mapendo in Rutshuru territory where they shot and killed a woman. In a nearby property, the assailants came across a policeman who shot at them. During the clash the policeman, a man and two women were killed; an infant was shot and wounded.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up eleven motorcycles close to Namutungulu in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up eleven motorcycles close to Namutungulu in Fizi territory. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: The man who had been abducted together with a woman by unidentified armed men on 10 January 2018 close to Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory managed to escape from his kidnappers.
notes/en: The man who had been abducted together with a woman by unidentified armed men on 10 January 2018 close to Katsiru village in Rutshuru territory managed to escape from his kidnappers. Shortly afterwards the kidnappers released also the woman.

title/0/en: An unidentified gunman harvesting eggplants in a field shot and wounded the owner of the field in Katogota village, Uvira territory.
notes/en: An unidentified gunman harvesting eggplants in a field shot and wounded the owner of the field in Katogota village, Uvira territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a motorcycle close to Katsiru in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a motorcycle close to Katsiru in Rutshuru territory. The assailants abducted the man and woman and stole the motorcycle.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin Mbaenda killed a woman in Mandje village in Walikale territory, accusing her of being a witch.
