notes/en: Armed men identified as Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin Mbaenda killed a woman in Mandje village in Walikale territory, accusing her of being a witch. The assailants looted the victim's house.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai UPLC attacked the FARDC position in Kipese in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai UPLC attacked the FARDC position in Kipese in Lubero territory. The assailants pushed the FARDC out of the village. The FARDC took back control of the area once reinforcements arrived.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a trader's residence in Katobolo village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a trader's residence in Katobolo village, Kalehe territory. The attackers shot and wounded a woman and stole $700, six goats and other property.

title/0/en: One of the hostages kidnapped by the FDLR-FOCA on 09 January 2018 escaped from his kidnappers in Kibirizi in Lubero territory.
notes/en: One of the hostages kidnapped by the FDLR-FOCA on 09 January 2018 escaped from his kidnappers in Kibirizi in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe shot dead three men aged 36, 37 and 60, respectively.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe shot dead three men aged 36, 37 and 60, respectively. They also shot and injured a 48-year-old man.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Elenge looted money and goods from traders who were coming back from Isangi close to Katatwa village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Elenge looted money and goods from traders who were coming back from Isangi close to Katatwa village in Walikale territory. The assailants shot and wounded two men trying to escape and forced eight men to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: Police and FARDC dispersed a peaceful march organized by civil society in Kitindi village, Shabunda territory, to demand community development from the mining company Banro Mining.
notes/en: Police and FARDC dispersed a peaceful march organized by civil society in Kitindi village, Shabunda territory, to demand community development from the mining company Banro Mining.

title/0/en: During the ransacking that followed clashes between Mai-Mai Kilalo and the FARDC in the rural commune of Lubero, FARDC soldiers looted goats, chickens, solar panels and other goods.
notes/en: During the ransacking that followed clashes between Mai-Mai Kilalo and the FARDC in the rural commune of Lubero, FARDC soldiers looted goats, chickens, solar panels and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen fired at a motorcycle carrying an FARDC soldier on the Butembo-Goma road near Kibirizi locality in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen fired at a motorcycle carrying an FARDC soldier on the Butembo-Goma road near Kibirizi locality in Rutshuru territory. The FARDC soldier retaliated and the attackers fled. In the clash, a 37-year-old civilian died after he was hit by a bullet.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked the FARDC position in Lubero rural commune in the territory of the same name.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked the FARDC position in Lubero rural commune in the territory of the same name.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen raped a 38-year-old woman in Kitindi in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants abducted eleven people who were returning from their fields close to Kahumiro village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants killed five men.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen raped a 38-year-old woman in Kitindi in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen raped a 38-year-old woman in Kitindi in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: An unidentified gunman raped a 13-year-old girl near Rusaka II village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: An unidentified gunman raped a 13-year-old girl near Rusaka II village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Burungu village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Burungu village in Masisi territory. The assailants raped a 19-year-old woman and a 14-year-old girl. They stole goods and livestock.

title/0/en: The 21-year-old woman and the 23-year-old man who were abducted by two policemen on 6 January 2018 at 17:00 were released at 20:00.
notes/en: The 21-year-old woman and the 23-year-old man who were abducted by two policemen on 6 January 2018 at 17:00 were released at 20:00. Their phones were recovered the next morning thanks to the intervention of the commander of the Mobile Intervention Group, but the memory cards had been removed.

title/0/en: Twelve unidentified gunmen raided Ngwenda village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Twelve unidentified gunmen raided Ngwenda village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers looted money, cattle and other property. They raped a 35-year-old woman.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo attacked the FARDC position at Kambale market in Kalehe territory following the arrest by the FARDC of a woman believed to be Hamakombo's spouse.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo attacked the FARDC position at Kambale market in Kalehe territory following the arrest by the FARDC of a woman believed to be Hamakombo's spouse. One 17-year-old boy was shot and wounded and goods were stolen.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped two men aged 26 and 30 in Mununze in Beni territory on 01/05/2018 released the hostages after a ransom of $1,500 was paid.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped two men aged 26 and 30 in Mununze in Beni territory on 01/05/2018 released the hostages after a ransom of $1,500 was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into the local administration office in the Mambango neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into the local administration office in the Mambango neighborhood of Beni. The assailants stole twenty chairs and four bicycles. The police was not patrolling at the time of the incident.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Ekinga in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Ekinga in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants shot and wounded a 16-year-old boy and raped two women. They stole $566, five goats, nine chickens and seven jerry cans of palm oil.

title/0/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms held up a taxi in Karuruma in Beni territory.
notes/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms held up a taxi in Karuruma in Beni territory. The assailants injured a man with a machete and stole $10,000.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen tortured and wounded a 39-year-old man in Minova in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen tortured and wounded a 39-year-old man in Minova in Kalehe territory. The assailants looted money and food.

title/0/en: Two police officers kidnapped a 21-year-old girl and a 23-year-old man on a path in the CBCA Katwa concession in Butembo town.
notes/en: Two police officers kidnapped a 21-year-old girl and a 23-year-old man on a path in the CBCA Katwa concession in Butembo town. They beat them, robbing them of phones and money (12,000 Congolese francs). They then held them for three hours and demanded 100,000 Congolese francs before releasing them so they could get 30,000 francs to recover their phones.

title/0/en: Two policemen abducted a 21-year-old woman and a 23-year-old man on one of the roads crossing the CBCA Katwa concession in Butembo.
notes/en: Two policemen abducted a 21-year-old woman and a 23-year-old man on one of the roads crossing the CBCA Katwa concession in Butembo. They beat them, seized their telephones and money and kidnapped them for three hours before releasing them so that they could go and look for 30,000 Congolese francs demanded by the assailants to get their phones back.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen stabbed a 24-year-old man in Nyabibwe village in Kalehe territory when the victim was on his way back from his fields.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen stabbed and wounded a 24-year-old man in Nyabibwe village in Kalehe territory when the victim was on his way back from his fields.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Lopards moving through Kalau in Kalingathi village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Lopards moving through Kalau in Kalingathi village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Seven unidentified armed men raided the village of Mununze in Beni territory.
notes/en: Seven unidentified armed men raided the village of Mununze in Beni territory. The attackers looted $5,000 and kidnapped two men aged 26 and 30, respectively. They demanded a ransom of $1,500. The kidnappers released the hostages after the ransom was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kitumba-Bisagara in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kitumba-Bisagara in Fizi territory. The assailants shot and killed a 62-year-old man and his 14-year-old son.

title/0/en: Five unidentified gunmen raided the household of a currency trader in the Nkafu neighborhood of Bukavu town.
notes/en: Five unidentified gunmen raided the household of a currency trader in the Nkafu neighborhood of Bukavu town. The attackers shot and wounded a 40-year-old man and looted $6,800.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 34-year-old woman with machetes in Kibati village, Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 34-year-old woman with machetes in Kibati village, Nyiragongo territory.

title/0/en: The six unidentified men who had kidnapped three herdsmen on 01/04/2018 in Magango village in Kalehe territory released the hostages without the payment of the ransom.
notes/en: The six unidentified men who had kidnapped three herdsmen on 01/04/2018 in Magango village in Kalehe territory released the hostages without the payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided three households in Minova, Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided three households in Minova, Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants looted $120, two phones, two bags of beans, four cases of Primus and soft drinks, clothes and other belongings. They also wounded a 48-year-old man with a machete.

title/0/en: Six unidentified men kidnapped three herdsmen in Magango village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Six unidentified men kidnapped three herdsmen in Magango village in Kalehe territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom, the amount of which was not disclosed. The kidnappers tortured the hostages and stole $12 from one of them. The kidnappers released the hostages without the payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money and property from civilians returning from a market near the village of Chiyenge in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money and property from civilians returning from a market near the village of Chiyenge in Kalehe territory. The attackers shot and wounded three men.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Forces Divines Simba who had kidnapped a 45-year-old man at Misa mining site in Walikale territory on 12/19/2017 released the hostage after a ransom of $125 and twenty grams of gold was paid.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Forces Divines Simba who had kidnapped a 45-year-old man at Misa mining site in Walikale territory on 12/19/2017 released the hostage after a ransom of $125 and twenty grams of gold was paid.

title/0/en: Armed men dressed in FARDC uniforms raided a household in the Benengule neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: Armed men dressed in FARDC uniforms raided a household in the Benengule neighborhood of Beni. The attackers tortured a man and looted $375.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Muku health center, operated by the 3rd CBCA Church, in Lwami village, Walungu territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Muku health center, operated by the 3rd CBCA Church, in Lwami village, Walungu territory during the night. The attackers looted $1,250, a computer, 40 phones, five radios and two boxes of medicine.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Wemba raided the villages of Kakongya, Kiluma, Nyakanya and Mukangi in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Wemba raided the villages of Kakongya, Kiluma, Nyakanya and Mukangi in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted money, solar panels, goats, chickens and other property. They also forced four men to carry looted goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a soldier in the Mukulya neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a soldier in the Mukulya neighborhood of Beni.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided the village of Chisasa, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided the village of Chisasa, Kalehe territory. The attackers looted money, seven goats, eleven chickens and other property. They kidnapped two men and demanded a $ 1,200 ransom for their release. The attackers also burned down seven houses.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Kavumbi killed one of their own combatants with a crude weapon in Kibarizo, Masisi territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Kavumbi killed one of their own combatants with a crude weapon in Kibarizo, Masisi territory. The victim was accused to have handed over information on their whereabouts to civilians.

title/0/en: A policeman shot and killed a 10-year-old girl in Kashuga village, Masisi territory.
notes/en: A policeman shot and killed a 10-year-old girl in Kashuga village, Masisi territory.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers clashed with each other in Kipese locality in Lubero territory.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers clashed with each other in Kipese locality in Lubero territory. This confrontation left one soldier dead and another wounded.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Kasongo killed an 18-year-old girl near the village of Mpeti in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Kasongo killed an 18-year-old girl near the village of Mpeti in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: The FARDC and the police came upon unidentified gunmen robbing a flour warehouse in the center of Bulambika village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The FARDC and the police came upon unidentified gunmen robbing a flour warehouse in the center of Bulambika village, Kalehe territory. The FARDC and the police shot and wounded one of the robbers.

title/0/en: Nyatura Love fighters looted four cows at Colline village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Nyatura Love fighters looted four cows at Colline village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Camp Mulima village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Camp Mulima village, Rutshuru territory. The assailants looted money and goods. In one of the houses where the assailants did not find money, they kidnapped a 14-year-old girl and raped her.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a 14-year-old girl in Camp Mulima village in Rutshuru territory on 1 January 2018 released the victim.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a 14-year-old girl in Camp Mulima village in Rutshuru territory on 1 January 2018 released the victim.

title/0/en: The police arrested two men who were sensitizing the population in favor of fiscal disobedience in Bulambika in Kalehe territory
notes/en: The police arrested two men who were sensitizing the population in favor of fiscal disobedience in Bulambika in Kalehe territory. The police tortured and injured the two victims.

title/0/en: Six FARDC soldiers extorted $6 and the battery of his motorcycle from a motorcycle driver at the entrance to the Catholic parish of Paida in Beni.
notes/en: Six FARDC soldiers extorted $6 and the battery of his motorcycle from a motorcycle driver at the entrance to the Catholic parish of Paida in Beni.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the FARDC position at the Mafilo mining site in Walikale territory. This attack left one soldiers dead in the ranks of the FARDC.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the FARDC position at the Mafilo mining site in Walikale territory. This attack left one soldiers dead in the ranks of the FARDC. The attackers looted civilian property and stole the weapon of the killed soldier.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked the FARDC position in Maboya, Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked the FARDC position in Maboya, Beni territory. One Mai-Mai Kilalo and one FARDC soldier died during the attack.

title/0/en: Four Nyatura Love fighters tortured and wounded two men, aged 26 and 32 respectively, in the village of Colline in Rutshuru territory following a dispute over a woman.
notes/en: Four Nyatura Love fighters tortured and wounded two men, aged 26 and 32 respectively, in the village of Colline in Rutshuru territory following a dispute over a woman. One of the victims died from his wounds.

title/0/en: A policeman shot and killed a 41-year-old man in Majengo neighborhood in Goma.
notes/en: A policeman shot and killed a 41-year-old man in Majengo neighborhood in Goma. The population wanted to stone the offending policeman, but other officers protected him.

title/0/en: The police dispersed a peaceful demonstration organized by the Committee of Catholic Laity and political parties in Bukavu.
notes/en: The police dispersed a peaceful demonstration organized by the Committee of Catholic Laity and political parties in Bukavu. The crackdown left a 33-year-old man injured.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in the town of Kipese in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in the town of Kipese in Lubero territory. This attack left two dead and several wounded in the ranks of Mai-Mai Mazembe and one dead and one wounded in the ranks of the FARDC.

title/0/en: The police dispersed protesters throwing stones in the Himbi neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: The police dispersed protesters throwing stones in the Himbi neighborhood of Goma. They arrested four protesters.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the position of Mai-Mai Mazembe in the village of Kirikiri in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the position of Mai-Mai Mazembe in the village of Kirikiri in Lubero territory. The attack left one dead and three wounded in the ranks of Mai-Mai Mazembe.

title/0/en: The police dispersed the peaceful protest organized by opposition political parties and citizen movements in Butembo town.
notes/en: The police dispersed the peaceful protest organized by opposition political parties and citizen movements in Butembo town. The police arrested fourteen people.

title/0/en: The police broke up a demonstration of LUCHA activists in Lubiriha, Beni territory.
notes/en: The police broke up a demonstration of LUCHA activists in Lubiriha, Beni territory. The activists were were demanding the implementation of the New Year's Eve agreement. Police beat up and injured four protesters.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the village of Bwengeya in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the village of Bwengeya in Kalehe territory. The attackers shot and wounded a pregnant woman and looted property.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and wounded a 17-year-old girl in the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and wounded a 17-year-old girl in the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma. The assailants were trying to break into the victim's parents' house.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked police officers who were guarding a savings and credit cooperative in the Musenyi neighborhood of Sange town during an attempted robbery.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked police officers who were guarding a savings and credit cooperative in the Musenyi neighborhood of Sange town during an attempted robbery.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kabazimia abducted three men aged 23, 42 and 45, respectively, near the village of Ndese in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kabazimia abducted three men aged 23, 42 and 45, respectively, near the village of Ndese in Shabunda territory. The kidnappers also stole their belongings.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Sheih Malaika attacked the FARDC position in Nepanepa village, Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Sheih Malaika attacked the FARDC position in Nepanepa village, Shabunda territory. The attack left three dead and one captured in the ranks of Mai-Mai Sheih Malaika and one wounded and one captured in the ranks of the FARDC. The attackers also stole an AK-47 rifle.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen stole money, four pigs, ten goats, food and other goods from civilians travelling close to Braza-Chumba village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen stole money, four pigs, ten goats, food and other goods from civilians travelling close to Braza-Chumba village in Walikale territory. The FARDC intervened and captured the assailants after having been informed by some of the victims.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Kisekelwa attacked the FARDC at the Kabalo mining site in Walikale territory
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Kisekelwa attacked the FARDC at the Kabalo mining site in Walikale territory. The attack left three dead and two wounded in the ranks of Raia Mutomboki Kisekelwa and one dead and one wounded in the ranks of the FARDC.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Kamananga village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Kamananga village in Kalehe territory. The attackers shot and wounded three men and kidnapped two minors, both former Raia Mutomboki combatants. They looted goats, chickens and other property. They also burned down three houses.

title/0/en: Three FARDC soldiers raided a household in the Ngongolio neighborhood of Beni city during the night.
notes/en: Three FARDC soldiers raided a household in the Ngongolio neighborhood of Beni city during the night. The attackers broke down the door and raped a 14-year-old girl.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a household in the village of Minova, Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a household in the village of Minova, Kalehe territory during the night. The attackers looted money, two phones and clothes.

title/0/en: Three FARDC soldiers raided the KAPAVE hotel in the Rwangoma neighborhood in Beni city.
notes/en: Three FARDC soldiers raided the KAPAVE hotel in the Rwangoma neighborhood in Beni city. They looted money, a bag, and two phones. The manager of the hotel identified one of the attackers and reported him to the FARDC commander. The commander found the looted goods and returned them to their owners.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Kimemi police station in Butembo during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Kimemi police station in Butembo during the night. The attackers stole an AK-47 rifle.

title/0/en: An armed man identified as an FARDC soldier raided a household in the Paida neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: An armed man identified as an FARDC soldier raided a household in the Paida neighborhood of Beni. The attacker raped a 22-year-old woman. The soldier abandoned the raped victim on the porch of a house in the Vuhakulu neighborhood.

title/0/en: The FARDC shot at civilians during the night in Kyavinyonge village, Beni territory, believing they were Mai-Mai combatants, whose incursion had been rumored.
notes/en: The FARDC shot at civilians during the night in Kyavinyonge village, Beni territory, believing they were Mai-Mai combatants, whose incursion had been rumored. The FARDC killed a 31-year-old man, a 24-year-old woman, a 43-year-old man, a 34-year-old woman, and a 6-month-old child.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier stole clothes from a household in the Paida neighborhood of Beni town.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier stole clothes from a household in the Paida neighborhood of Beni town.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a 34-year-old man in Shanje, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and wounded a 34-year-old man in Shanje, Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Kavumo village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Kavumo village in Kalehe territory. The assailants shot and wounded an ANR agent and a 30-year-old woman.

title/0/en: The FARDC simultaneously attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe positions in the villages of Masereka and Vusitoro in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC simultaneously attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe positions in the villages of Masereka and Vusitoro in Lubero territory. These attacks left several wounded in the ranks of the FARDC.

title/0/en: Two policemen tortured and injured a 22-year-old man in Biglimani village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Two policemen tortured and injured a 22-year-old man in Biglimani village in Kalehe territory. The victim had asked the policemen to pay for the drinks they had just drunk in his bar.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked ADF combatants in Bilimani village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked ADF combatants in Bilimani village in Beni territory. This attack left two dead and one captured in the ranks of the ADF. The FARDC also recovered three weapons.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai CNPSC raided Kaseke village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai CNPSC raided Kaseke village in Fizi territory. The assailants looted money, telephones, flour, chickens and other goods. They forced people to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kalungu village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kalungu village in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole $3,800 and other goods.

title/0/en: An FARDC patrol shot a 34-year-old man in Mutinwa in Fizi territory. The victim died on the spot.
notes/en: An FARDC patrol shot a 34-year-old man in Mutinwa in Fizi territory. The victim died on the spot.

title/0/en: Three armed men wearing police uniforms broke into a gold trading house in Lugundu in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Three armed men wearing police uniforms broke into a gold trading house in Lugundu in Mwenga territory. The assailants stole $1,625 and six grams of gold.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a warehouse in the Nkafu neighborhood of Bukavu.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a warehouse in the Nkafu neighborhood of Bukavu. The assailants looted money. They shot and killed a 15-year-old boy and wounded two men aged 19 and 24 years old.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali broke into a farm in Mutarule I in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali broke into a ranch in Mutarule I in Uvira territory. The assailants stole eight cows and shot and wounded a farmer. The farmers were armed and shot back but were not able to stop the assailants.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot a woman at Wikongo hotel in Kasindi, Lubero territory. The victim died on the spot.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot a woman in the Wikongo hotel in Kasindi, Lubero territory. The victim died on the spot.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Kasindi in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Kasindi in Beni territory. One FARDC died and three were injured. On the assailants side three were killed and three were injured and subsequently captured. Three civilians were killed.

title/0/en: During an operation in Kalundja village in Fizi territory to hunt down the Mai-Mai Ebu-Ela, the FARDC looted money, telephones, solar panels, clothes and other goods.
notes/en: During an operation in Kalundja village in Fizi territory to hunt down the Mai-Mai Ebu-Ela, the FARDC looted money, telephones, solar panels, clothes and other goods.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers fired bullets in the air to announce their return to Kitindi village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers fired bullets in the air to announce their return to Kitindi village in Shabunda territory. The ensuing panic ended up injuring 10 civilians, including five girls under 18, four women and a 67-year-old man.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Kavumbi attacked the Nyatura Nzayi position in Kametembe village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Kavumbi attacked the Nyatura Nzayi position in Kametembe village in Masisi territory. Two Nyatura Kavumbi and one Nyatura Nzayi were killed during the clash.

title/0/en: Unidentified men tortured a 50-year-old man close to Nyabibwe village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men tortured a 50-year-old man close to Nyabibwe village in Kalehe territory. The victim died from the injuries.

title/0/en: Two armed men who had kidnapped and raped two women in Kasuba village, Walikale territory on 27 December 2017 released the hostages.
notes/en: Two armed men who had kidnapped and raped two women in Kasuba village, Walikale territory on 27 December 2017 released the hostages.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Leopards attacked a position of unidentified gunmen in the Virunga Park near the village of Yambi, Beni territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Leopards attacked a position of unidentified gunmen in the Virunga Park near the village of Yambi, Beni territory.

title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men wearing FARDC uniforms shot and wounded a 35-year-old man in the Malepe neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men wearing FARDC uniforms shot and wounded a 35-year-old man in the Malepe neighborhood of Beni.

title/0/en: An unidentified man threw a grenade at policemen who were guarding the Mususa police station in Butembo.
notes/en: An unidentified man threw a grenade at policemen who were guarding the Mususa police station in Butembo. The grenade injured a policeman.

title/0/en: A 47-year-old policeman raped a 15-year-old girl in Tchonka in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: A 47-year-old policeman raped a 15-year-old girl in Tchonka in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: Gunmen identified as members of the CNPSC coalition robbed four vehicles near the village of Iseke in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Gunmen identified as members of the CNPSC coalition robbed four vehicles near the village of Iseke in Fizi territory. The attackers looted property and forced thirteen men to carry looted property. The attackers released the thirteen men after they had carried the looted goods to a hill not far from the scene of the incident.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers tortured a 37-year-old man in Shabunda center in the territory holding the same name.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers tortured a 37-year-old man in Shabunda town, Shabunda territory. The victim died from the injuries.

title/0/en: Three unidentified armed men dressed in FARDC uniforms raided a household in the Matonge district of Beni during the night.
notes/en: Three unidentified armed men dressed in FARDC uniforms raided a household in the Matonge district of Beni during the night. The attackers stabbed a 33-year-old man and looted $2,400.

title/0/en: Two armed men belonging to the CNPSC coalition stabbed a motorbike driver carrying a gold trader near the village of Mulongwe in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Two armed men belonging to the CNPSC coalition robbed a motorbike driver carrying a gold trader near the village of Mulongwe in Fizi territory. The attackers looted $937, gold and phones.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the village of Kazuba in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the village of Kazuba in Walikale territory. The attackers abducted a 30-year-old woman and a 10-year-old girl. The attackers raped the hostages.

title/0/en: A coalition of Nyatura Kasongo, Domi and Love attacked the FARDC position in Mutanda in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: A coalition of Nyatura Kasongo, Domi and Love attacked the FARDC position in Mutanda in Rutshuru territory. A 16-year-old boy was killed and two men aged 20 and 23 were injured during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Minova in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Minova in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole goods from the house.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen raided a household in Minova, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen raided a household in Minova, Kalehe territory. The attackers stabbed a 30-year-old man and stole $185.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as Mai-Mai CNPSC abducted a 55-year-old man in Baraka in Fizi territory during the night.
notes/en: Armed men identified as Mai-Mai CNPSC abducted a 55-year-old man in Baraka in Fizi territory during the night.

title/0/en: Two Mai-Mai Charles combatants who had just stolen a fishermen's canoe for their patrol on Lake Edward fired bullets at a park guard boat near Kyangiro village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Two Mai-Mai Charles combatants who had just stolen a fishermen's canoe for their patrol on Lake Edward fired bullets at a park guard boat near Kyangiro village in Rutshuru territory. The park guards responded by firing a rocket launcher against the canoe, killing two Mai-Mai Charles, three fishermen and one woman.

title/0/en: Unidentified men strangled and killed a 32-year-old man in Kamahinga in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men strangled and killed a 32-year-old man in Kamahinga in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified men who had kidnapped a 56-year-old man on 12/23/2017 in Kihuma in Rutshuru territory released the hostage after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: Unidentified men who had kidnapped a 56-year-old man on 12/23/2017 in Kihuma in Rutshuru territory released the hostage after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: A coalition of Nyatura Kasongo, Domi and Love raided Yobora village in Rutshuru territory during the night.
notes/en: A coalition of Nyatura Kasongo, Domi and Love raided Yobora village in Rutshuru territory during the night. The assailants shot and killed three women and a man. They also burned down 140 houses.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto looted four phones, five grams of gold and 21 kgs of cassiterite from two men near the village of Niabembe in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto looted four phones, five grams of gold and 21 kgs of cassiterite from two men near the village of Niabembe in Shabunda territory. The attackers abducted the two men, a 35 and a 52-year-old.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe shot a man in Kitsombiro in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe shot a man in Kitsombiro in Lubero territory. The victim died at Kitsombiro hospital.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela attacked the FARDC position in the village of Kikwena in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela attacked the FARDC position in the village of Kikwena in Fizi territory. This attack left one dead and two wounded in the ranks of the FARDC. The attackers stole weapons and ammunition.

title/0/en: The police attacked unidentified gunmen as they attempted to loot a house in the Katindo neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: The police attacked unidentified gunmen as they attempted to loot a house in the Katindo neighborhood of Goma. The clash left three assailants dead.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the private residence of the President of the Republic in Musienene in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the private residence of the President of the Republic in Musienene in Lubero territory. Three policemen died and three were injured. Three workers went missing. The assailants burned down the residence that was made up of three houses.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a 26-year-old man in 12/23/2017 in Mulala village in Rutshuru territory released the hostage after a ransom of $800 was paid.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a 26-year-old man in 12/23/2017 in Mulala village in Rutshuru territory released the hostage after a ransom of $800 was paid.

title/0/en: Two armed men dressed in FARDC uniforms shot dead a man in Kasanga neighborhood in Beni town when the victim was intervening to secure the release of a boy arrested by a patrol.
notes/en: Two armed men dressed in FARDC uniforms shot dead a man in Kasanga neighborhood in Beni town when the victim was intervening to secure the release of a boy arrested by a patrol.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Mabala raided the villages of Kiseku and Kisuku in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted money and property.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mabala raided the villages of Kiseku and Kisuku in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted money and property.

title/0/en: A FARDC soldier shot and wounded a woman and a man on Lake Tanganyika near the village of Swima in Fizi territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a woman and a man on Lake Tanganyika near the village of Swima in Fizi territory.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 22-year-old man in Kumbwa in Walikale territory following a fight over illegal taxes the soldier was collecting close to the camp.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 22-year-old man in Kumbwa in Walikale territory following a fight over illegal taxes the soldier was collecting close to the camp.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Kabanzi looted money and property from civilians near Mbongo village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Kabanzi looted money and property from civilians near Mbongo village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Kyavitondo in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Kyavitondo in Lubero territory. Two Mai-Mai Mazembe and one NDC Guidon died during the attack. The NDC Guidon seized two AK47 weapons and looted civilians' goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Lukungula village in Kalehe territory as they were looking for two ANR agents.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Lukungula village in Kalehe territory as they were looking for two ANR agents. As they did not find the two people they were looking for, the assailants burned down two houses belonging to the two agents. They stole $200, three goats and five chickens.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the FARDC position in Kitobindo in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the FARDC position in Kitobindo in Lubero territory. Three FARDC and two NDC Guidon died during the attack. The NDC Guidon looted the village.

title/0/en: The Nyatura FDP broke into a house in Kabashumba village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura FDP broke into a house in Kabashumba village in Rutshuru territory. The assailants, who did not find the owner at home, stole six cows.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money and goods belonging to traders who were returning from Kambegeti market in Ebisha village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money and goods belonging to traders who were returning from Kambegeti market in Ebisha village, Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Four unidentified armed men kidnapped a 26-year-old man in his field close to Mulala in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified armed men kidnapped a 26-year-old man in his field close to Mulala in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2,000. They released the hostage after a ransom of $800 was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed two motorbike drivers near Tchonka village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed two motorbike drivers near Tchonka village in Shabunda territory. The attackers stole $20,000, 30 kgs of cassiterite and nine phones.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 56-year-old man in Kihuma village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 56-year-old man in Kihuma village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded an unknown ransom. the kidnappers released the hostage after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 24-year-old man in Himbi neighborhood in Goma City.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed a 24-year-old man in the Himbi neighborhood of Goma.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted property and abducted people who were travelling from Musenge to Hombo near the village of Kisa in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted property and abducted people who were travelling from Musenge to Hombo near the village of Kisa in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: Ten unidentified gunmen raided the Simali mine site in Mwenga territory at night.
notes/en: Ten unidentified gunmen raided the Simali mine site in Mwenga territory at night. The attackers fired bullets and looted $5,875, 55 grams of gold and telephones from the three trading houses (comptoirs) at the mining site.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided Hungu village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided Hungu village in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole $1,230, eleven goats, seventeen chickens and other goods. They forcibly recruited six boys and wounded a 17-year-old boy.

title/0/en: Three unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Rombe II neighborhood of Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Three unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Rombe II neighborhood of Uvira rural commune. The assailants injured a 40-year-old woman with a machete and stole $137 and three telephones.

title/0/en: A FARDC soldier shot a fellow soldier in the Bakaiku district of Oicha rural commune after a dispute over a debt owed by the victim.
notes/en: A FARDC soldier shot a fellow soldier in the Bakaiku district of Oicha rural commune after a dispute over a debt owed by the victim. The victim died on the spot.

title/0/en: After an FARDC soldier was assassinated in Majengo in Rutshuru territory, the FARDC shot and killed three men to take revenge for the killed soldier.
notes/en: After an FARDC soldier was assassinated in Majengo in Rutshuru territory, the FARDC shot and killed three men to take revenge.

title/0/en: An unidentified armed man shot and killed an FARDC in Majengo in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: An unidentified armed man shot and killed an FARDC in Majengo in Rutshuru territory. The assailant seized the victim's weapon.

title/0/en: One Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin shot and wounded a 13-year-old boy in Bunyamwirimba in Walikale territory.
notes/en: One Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin shot and wounded a 13-year-old boy in Bunyamwirimba in Walikale territory. The incident happened as the assailants were collecting illegal taxes.

title/0/en: A policeman shot a man in Buguri village in Masisi territory following his refusal to hand over his telephone to the policeman.
notes/en: A policeman shot a man in Buguri village in Masisi territory following his refusal to hand over his telephone to the policeman. The victim died on the spot. The policeman also shot other civilians who came to help the victim. He shot and wounded three men.

title/0/en: The Nyatura APRDC attacked the FARDC position in Muheto in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura APRDC attacked the FARDC position in Muheto, Masisi territory. The FARDC repelled the attack.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe killed five out of eleven people who had been kept hostages since 12/18/2017 in Katuunda in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe killed five out of eleven people who had been kept hostages since 12/18/2017 in Katuunda in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru raided Lwana village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru raided Lwana village in Kalehe territory. The assailants looted goats, chickens and goods. They shot and wounded three people. They also kidnapped two men and two women and demanded a ransom of $1,800.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as Raia Mutomboki Maheshe raided the villages of Kisungi, Idalo and Kamitili in Walungu territory.
notes/en: Armed men identified as Raia Mutomboki Maheshe raided the villages of Kisungi, Idalo and Kamitili in Walungu territory.

title/0/en: The FARDC ambushed assailants who were looting in Kakondo village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC ambushed assailants who were looting in Kakondo village, Rutshuru territory. The FARDC wounded one of the attackers. They then arrested him at a local health facility subsequently captured two other assailants.

title/0/en: Three policemen tortured and injured an 18-year-old man and his 14-year-old sister during a patrol in the Minova area of Kalehe territory when the victims left to buy medicine for their sick brother. They delighted $ 6 and a phone to the victims.
notes/en: Three policemen tortured and injured an 18-year-old man and his 14-year-old sister during a patrol in the Minova area of Kalehe territory when the victims were on their way to buy medicine for their sick brother. They stole $6 and a phone from the victims.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen raped a 16-year-old girl near the village of Munigi in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen raped a 16-year-old girl near the village of Munigi in Nyiragongo territory.

title/0/en: The kidnappers who kidnapped a 68-year-old man from his Kaseke field near the rural commune of Kiwanja beheaded the hostage after receiving the $ 500 ransom.
notes/en: The kidnappers who had taken a 68-year-old man from his Kaseke field near the rural commune of Kiwanja beheaded the hostage after receiving the $500 ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked FARDC soldiers in the village of Bilimani of Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked FARDC soldiers in the village of Bilimani of Beni territory. The attack left two of the attackers dead, one dressed in a Tanzanian uniform and the other in an FARDC uniform. The FARDC recovered two AK47 weapons and a rocket launcher.

title/0/en: CNRD combatants attacked the Nyatura Kasongo in Bukama village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: CNRD combatants attacked the Nyatura Kasongo in Bukama village in Masisi territory. One Nyatura Kasongo and one CNRD combatant died during the attack.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Maheshe raided Butongo village in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Maheshe raided Butongo village in Mwenga territory. The assailants looted money, telephones, livestocks and other goods.

title/0/en: An unidentified gunman, dressed in FARDC uniform, looted money and phones from a 22-year-old man in Minova locality in Kalehe territory when the victim returned from his workplace.
notes/en: An unidentified gunman dressed in an FARDC uniform looted money and phones from a 22-year-old man in Minova locality in Kalehe territory when the victim was  coming homr from work.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a vehicle belonging to Kiliba sugar factory close to Rutemba in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen held up a vehicle belonging to Kiliba sugar factory close to Rutemba in Uvira territory. The assailants kidnapped the driver and his colleague. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $20,000 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed three motorbike drivers near Mbindano village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed three motorbike drivers near Mbindano village in Kalehe territory. The attackers shot and wounded a man and looted $4,350.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Forces Divines Simba kidnapped a 45-year-old man in Misa mining site in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Forces Divines Simba kidnapped a 45-year-old man in Misa mining site in Walikale territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom to release the hostage. The amount of the ransom was not disclosed. The kidnappers released the hostage after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: The police dispersed a demonstration of students from the Nyongera Institute in rural Kiwanja who were protesting against the kidnapping of one of their teachers.
notes/en: The police dispersed a demonstration of students from the Nyongera Institute in rural Kiwanja who were protesting against the kidnapping of one of their teachers. During the altercation, the police injured a person.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked Virunga park guards at the Luviro power station near the village of Kagheri in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked Virunga park guards at the Luviro power station near the village of Kagheri in Lubero territory. The attack resulted in a death toll of four dead and two wounded in the ranks of the attackers, one dead and one wounded in the ranks of the park rangers, one dead and two wounded on the civilian side.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon slaughtered three of the eight men kidnapped in the village of Kagheri in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon killed three of the eight men they kidnapped in the village of Kagheri in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the villages of Kakondo and Kabiranyuma, Rutshuru territory, during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the villages of Kakondo and Kabiranyuma, Rutshuru territory, during the night. The attackers killed a 22-year-old man with a machete and wounded a 36-year-old woman. They also looted goods in the shops.

title/0/en: The police broke up the demonstration of members of opposition political parties in Kasindi-Lubiriha, Beni territory.
notes/en: The police broke up the demonstration of members of opposition political parties in Kasindi-Lubiriha, Beni territory. This repression left two opposition activists injured.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the APCLS position in Kilambo in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the APCLS position in Kilambo in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: One woman and two men from the eighteen people abducted by the Mai-Mai Mazembe near the village of Katuunda in Rutshuru territory escaped from their captors.
notes/en: One woman and two men from the eighteen people abducted by the Mai-Mai Mazembe near the village of Katuunda in Rutshuru territory escaped from their captors.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a car near Kitemesho village, Uvira territory. The attackers kidnapped a 47-year-old man and demanded a ransom of $ 8,000.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a car near Kitemesho village, Uvira territory. The attackers kidnapped a 47-year-old man and demanded a ransom of $ 8,000.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe abducted eighteen people returning from their fields near the village of Katuunda in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe abducted eighteen people returning from their fields near the village of Katuunda in Rutshuru territory. The attackers stabbed to death a 33-year-old man, a woman and two boys aged 12 and 14, respectively.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a 47-year-old man near Sake village in Masisi territory released the hostage after he paid a ransom of $1,000.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a 47-year-old man near Sake village in Masisi territory released the hostage after he paid a ransom of $1,000.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon abducted eight men in the village of Kagheri in Lubero territory. The attackers accused the victims of being collaborators of Mai-Mai Mazembe.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon abducted eight men in the village of Kagheri in Lubero territory. The attackers accused the victims of being collaborators of the Mai-Mai Mazembe.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Domi positions in Butare, Kabizo and Ruza villages in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Domi positions in Butare, Kabizo and Ruza villages in Rutshuru territory. This attack wounded three civilians.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a man with a crude weapon who refused to disclose the FARDC position to the assailants in Buloloma-Mapina in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a man with a crude weapon who refused to disclose the FARDC position to the assailants in Buloloma-Mapina in Beni territory. The assailants attacked the FARDC positions at Mamiki close to Oicha rural commune. One FARDC was killed, a man was shot and wounded, and two other men were killed.

title/0/en: Three Mai-Mai Nguru held up a car close to Kavasewa in Beni territory.
notes/en: Three Mai-Mai Nguru held up a car close to Kavasewa in Beni territory. As the driver and two passengers run away, the assailants shot bullets as deterrent for the other passengers. They stole $120 and three telephones. The assailants took the remaining three passengers to the bush. The FARDC arrived and the assailants abandoned the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen, wearing police and FARDC uniforms, robbed a gold selling point in Misisi in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen, wearing police and FARDC uniforms, robbed a gold selling point in Misisi in Fizi territory. The assailants shot and wounded a 51-year-old man and stole money and a telephone.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men speaking Kirundi held up a motorcycle close to Kala-Rutemba in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men speaking Kirundi held up a motorcycle close to Kala-Rutemba in Uvira territory. The assailants stole $112, three telephones and a suitcase full of clothes.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai CNPSC under the orders of Ebu Ela and Eshillo attacked the FARDC position in Buko village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai CNPSC under the orders of Ebu Ela and Eshillo attacked the FARDC position in Buko village in Fizi territory. They seized two weapons, ammunitions and uniforms. They also burned down the FARDC camp.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a man on December 15, 2017 on Goma-Minova axe close to Mubambiro village in Masisi territory, released the hostage after a ransom of $1,000 was paid.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped a man on December 15, 2017 on Goma-Minova axe close to Mubambiro village in Masisi territory, released the hostage after a ransom of $1,000 was paid.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe slaughtered two NDC Guidon fighters captured during clashes in the village of Kagheri in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe slit the throats of two NDC Guidon fighters captured during clashes in the village of Kagheri in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen dressed in police clothes shot dead a man in the Mutiri neighborhood in Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen dressed in police clothes shot dead a man in the Mutiri neighborhood of Butembo town.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided the village of Chisasa in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided the village of Chisasa in Kalehe territory. The attackers injured a man and looted property. They kidnapped three men and demanded a ransom of $1,500 for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a vehicle near Sake in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a vehicle near Sake in Masisi territory. The attackers injured some passengers and looted money and property. They kidnapped a 47-year-old man and demanded a ransom of $1,000. The kidnappers released the hostage after paying a ransom of $1,000.

title/0/en: Nyatura Kasongo raided the village of Ihula in Walikale territory. The attackers looted money, livestock, food, and other property.
notes/en: The Nyatura Kasongo raided the village of Ihula in Walikale territory. The attackers looted money, livestock, food, and other property.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as Mai-Mai Nguru held up a car close to Kasaka village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Armed men identified as Mai-Mai Nguru held up a car close to Kasaka village in Beni territory. The assailants injured the driver and stole $120, a telephone and five trousers.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a FUSO vehicle close to Mukwezi village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a FUSO vehicle close to Mukwezi village in Fizi territory. The assailants looted money and goods belonging to the passengers travelling on the vehicle.

title/0/en: Virunga park rangers shot and killed a 17-year-old girl who carelessly entered Virunga park close to Mutaho in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Virunga park rangers shot and killed a 17-year-old girl who carelessly entered Virunga park close to Mutaho in Nyiragongo territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who kidnapped the village chief of Loa Numbi in Kalehe territory on 15 December 2017, released him.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who had kidnapped the village chief of Loa Numbi in Kalehe territory on 15 December 2017 released him.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked a position of the NDC Guidon in the village of Kagheri in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked a position of the NDC Guidon in the village of Kagheri in Lubero territory. This attack killed three NDC combatants and injured two Mai-Mai Mazembe.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into several houses of Chebumba village in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into several houses of Chebumba village in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants killed a 64-year-old man and a 37-year-old woman. They also injured a 3-year-old child and a woman.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men stole $100 from four men in Minova in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men stole $100 from four men in Minova in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the village of Loa Numbi in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the village of Loa Numbi in Kalehe territory. The attackers shot in the air and abducted the village chief. The kidnappers released the hostage the next day.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men stole a woman's belongings close to Kalungu in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men stole a woman's belongings close to Kalungu in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed two FARDC and a 26-year-old man at Km 23 point on Mbau-Kamango axe close to Sulungwe in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed two FARDC and a 26-year-old man at Km 23 point on Mbau-Kamango axe close to Sulungwe in Beni territory. The assailants seized two weapons from the killed FARDC.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a man on Goma-Minova road close to Mubambiro in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a man on Goma-Minova road close to Mubambiro in Masisi territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $1,500 to release the hostage. The kidnappers released the hostage two days later after a ransom of $1,000 was paid.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe as they were trying to raid Kitsombiro in Lubero territory with the aim of disrupting a rural fair organized by the Norwegian Refugee Council.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe as they were trying to raid Kitsombiro in Lubero territory with the aim of disrupting a rural fair organized by the Norwegian Refugee Council.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen stole $6,000 and goods belonging to a trader close to Kitembo village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen stole $6,000 and goods belonging to a trader close to Kitembo village in Kalehe territory. The assailants forced the motorized canoe's captain to take them back to Kirotshe village.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money and goods from civilians close to Musenge village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money and goods from civilians close to Musenge village in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: APCLS combatants held up motorcycles close to Kashebere village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: APCLS combatants held up motorcycles close to Kashebere village in Walikale territory. The assailants stole $3,000 and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men tried to burglarize an FARDC captain's house in Nkafu neighborhood of Bukavu.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men tried to burglarize an FARDC captain's house in Nkafu neighborhood of Bukavu. The captain shot and killed one of the assailants.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided Eronga village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided Eronga village in Kalehe territory. The assailants shot and wounded a man and an underage boy. They raped a woman and a 12-year-old girl. The assailants looted the village and kidnapped a man. The demanded a ransom of $600 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 6-year-old boy in Bugumba in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 6-year-old boy in Bugumba in Nyiragongo territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $100 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men stole $700 and goods close to Bitoy village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men stole $700 and goods close to Bitoy village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles killed an FARDC soldier in Kamandi in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles killed an FARDC soldier in Kamandi in Lubero territory. The assailants seized the soldier's weapon.

title/0/en: Five unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu during the night.
notes/en: Five unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Mosala neighborhood of Bukavu during the night. The assailants stole $3,000, telephones, computers and a TV.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe ambushed a FARDC patrol near the village of Soma in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe ambushed a FARDC patrol near the village of Soma in Beni territory. There were no casualties reported.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position close to Kibirizi in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position close to Kibirizi in Rutshuru territory. The FARDC killed seven Mai-Mai Mazembe. Subsequently the FARDC shot bullets in the air to celebrte their victory. They shot and wounded a 60-year-old man.

title/0/en: The FARDC shot unidentified armed men who were breaking into a house in the Mwemezi neighborhood of Baraka rural commune.
notes/en: The FARDC shot unidentified armed men who were breaking into a house in the Mwemezi neighborhood of Baraka rural commune. The FARDC shot and killed a man in the property next to the one that was broken into.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kilalo in Kivira village, Beni territory when they found the Mai-Mai ransacking the population.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kilalo in Kivira village, Beni territory when they found the Mai-Mai ransacking the population. The FARDC killed two Mai-Mai and captured seven others. One civilian was also killed.

title/0/en: An unidentified armed man shot and wounded a motorcycle driver close to Kitwe village in Rutshuru territory following a robbery attempt.
notes/en: An unidentified armed man shot and wounded a motorcycle driver close to Kitwe village in Rutshuru territory following a robbery attempt. An FARDC soldier who happened to be close to the place of the incident shot bullets in the air to deter the assailant.

title/0/en: Unidentified men recruited civilians by force in Lwibo, Kilambo and Lukweti villages in Masisi territory to join the armed group they were forming.
notes/en: Unidentified men recruited civilians by force in Lwibo, Kilambo and Lukweti villages in Masisi territory to join the armed group they were forming.

title/0/en: The Police dispersed LUCHA's peaceful demonstration close to BDGL roundabout in Goma.
notes/en: The Police dispersed LUCHA's peaceful demonstration close to BDGL roundabout in Goma. The police arrested ten men and women activists.

title/0/en: A policeman shot at a 34-year-old man in Kihonga village in Kalehe territory as he was trying to arrest him following a land conflict.
notes/en: A policeman shot a 34-year-old man in Kihonga village in Kalehe territory as he was trying to arrest him following a land conflict. The victim died on the spot.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Minova in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Minova in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole $18 and goods. Alerted by bullets shooting the police intervened and attacked the assailants.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men in the Vighole neighborhood of Butembo.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men in the Vighole neighborhood of Butembo. The assailants were preparing to raid Butembo town. Seven armed men were killed and one was captured, while among the FARDC three soldiers died and two were injured.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Luziba mining site in Lumbishi in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Luziba mining site in Lumbishi in Kalehe territory. The assailants abducted a 45-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Masiba village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Masiba village in Kalehe territory. The assailants shot and wounded three women and two underage boys. They also looted the village.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Butsili neighborhood of Beni during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Butsili neighborhood of Beni during the night. The assailants shot and killed a 32-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Tamende neighborhood of Beni during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Tamende neighborhood of Beni during the night. The assailants shot and killed a 23-year-old man, two women and a 2-year-old girl.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Buna village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Buna village in Beni territory. Two FARDC were injured and one Mai-Mai Mazembe was captured.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Nyakasania village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Nyakasania village in Shabunda territory. The assailants looted the village.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed a vehicle carrying FARDC soldiers, civilians and military tools close to Kicanga in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed a vehicle carrying FARDC soldiers, civilians and military tools close to Kicanga in Fizi territory. One FARDC and two civilians were killed, twelve civilians were injured. The assailants looted weapons, ammunitions and uniforms.

title/0/en: The police dispersed a peaceful march of the opposition political party PLD in the Volcan neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: The police dispersed a peaceful march of the opposition political party PLD in the Volcan neighborhood of Goma. Police arrested two protesters and released them in the evening.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as FDLR-RUD combatats robbed a motorcycle near Kibingu in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Armed men identified as FDLR-RUD combatats robbed a motorcycle near Kibingu in Rutshuru territory. The attackers abducted two men, aged 20 and 54 respectively.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela attacked the FARDC position in Lweba in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela attacked the FARDC position in Lweba in Fizi territory. One FARDC soldier was captured and the assailants stole ammunition. The assailants also burned down the FARDC camp.

title/0/en: Suspected ADF attacked a MONUSCO operational base at the Semuliki bridge on the Mbau-Kamango road.
notes/en: Suspected ADF attacked a MONUSCO operational base at the Semuliki bridge on the Mbau-Kamango road. This attack resulted in a lengthy fight between the alleged ADF on the one hand and MONUSCO and FARDC forces on the other. The attack killed 19 peacekeepers and wounded 53; several FARDC soldiers were reportedly killed.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the position of the CNPSC coalition led by Yakutumba in Sebele and Kasaka villages in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the position of the CNPSC coalition led by Yakutumba in Sebele and Kasaka villages in Fizi territory. One CNPSC coalition combatant was killed and four were captured. Two FARDC died and six were injured. The assailants seized FARDC gears while the FARDC seized four weapons.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen close to Loa Numbi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified gunmen close to Loa Numbi village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Jackson attacked the Mai-Mai Muhima, confusing them for FARDC in Muko village in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Jackson attacked the Mai-Mai Muhima, confusing them for FARDC in Muko village in Beni territory. One Mai-Mai Muhima was killed and three were injured, while two Mai-Mai Jackson were injured.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a household in the Ciriri neighborhood of Bukavu during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a household in the Ciriri neighborhood of Bukavu during the night. The attackers shot and killed a 48-year-old woman and injured a 55-year-old man.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants broke into a house in Kindundula village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants broke into a house in Kindundula village in Beni territory. The assailants shot and killed an ANR official and wounded a 8-year-old girl. They also stole $1,500.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a 19-year-old man near Nyabirehe village in Rutshuru territory on 5 December 2017 released the hostage after paying a $ 1,500 ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a 19-year-old man near Nyabirehe village in Rutshuru territory on 5 December 2017 released the hostage after paying a $ 1,500 ransom.

title/0/en: FARDC troops and unidentified gunmen clashed at Kididiwe village in Beni territory.
notes/en: FARDC troops and a group of unidentified gunmen reportedly clashed at Kididiwe village in Mayangose, approximately 7 km east of Beni town.

title/0/en: FARDC troops and suspected ADF rebel fighters clashed at Budati village.
notes/en: FARDC troops and suspected ADF fighters clashed at Budati village, located 70km northeast of Beni town. The same group of rebels proceeded on and attacked Mbumbuli/Budati village, located 70km northeast of Beni town along Banande-Kainama road. They kidnapped the local chief of Budati and some civilians and robbed around 50 cows.

title/0/en: Suspected Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo militia group attacked FARDC troops position.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo reportedly attacked the FARDC position at Kambale village along the Bulambika-Kambegeti road within Kalehe Territory.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as FNL-Nzabampema held up a mini-bus close to Kagunga in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Armed men identified as FNL-Nzabampema held up a mini-bus close to Kagunga in Uvira territory. The assailants looted money and goods.

title/0/en: A policeman raped a 33-year-old woman at Kabamba prison in Kabare territory.
notes/en: A policeman raped a 33-year-old woman at Kabamba prison in Kabare territory.

title/0/en: Students in Yamulemye demonstrated against the kidnapping of one of their fellow students in Kalengera, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Students in Yamulemye demonstrated against the kidnapping of one of their fellow students in Kalengera, Rutshuru territory. The demonstrators brought all activities in surrounding villages to a halt. The police broke up the demonstrators, who were trying to reach the administrator's office in Rutshuru center.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen fired at a canoe in Lake Kivu near the village of Birava in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen fired at a canoe in Lake Kivu near the village of Birava in Kabare territory. One of the fishermen drowned.

title/0/en: Six unidentified gunmen raided a house in Isingo village in Walungu territory.
notes/en: Six unidentified gunmen raided a house in Isingo village in Walungu territory. The attackers looted money and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a minibus near the town of Kayna, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a minibus near the town of Kayna, Lubero territory. The attackers shot and wounded five people. They looted goods from passengers. They also kidnapped three people; the ransom demanded is not known.

title/0/en: Unidentified men who had kidnapped a child at Cit-Belge neighborhood in Beni released the hostage after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: Unidentified men who had kidnapped a child at Cit-Belge neighborhood in Beni released the hostage after a ransom was paid. The ransom amount was not disclosed.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as Mai-Mai Mazembe who abducted two men and a woman near the village of Mburamazi in Rutshuru territory released their hostages on the same day in the afternoon.
notes/en: Armed men identified as Mai-Mai Mazembe who abducted two men and a woman near the village of Mburamazi in Rutshuru territory released their hostages on the same day in the afternoon.

title/0/en: An FARDC captain shot and killed another soldier after an argument between them in Zuiza village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: An FARDC captain shot and killed another soldier after an argument between them in Zuiza village in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 19-year-old man near Nyabirehe village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 19-year-old man near Nyabirehe village in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $ 1,500 for the release of the hostage. The kidnappers released the hostage after payment of the ransom.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as Mai-Mai Mazembe robbed a vehicle belonging to Mdecins Sans Frontires (MSF) near the village of Mburamazi, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Armed men identified as Mai-Mai Mazembe robbed a vehicle belonging to Mdecins Sans Frontires (MSF) near the village of Mburamazi, Rutshuru territory. The attackers kidnapped two men and a woman. The attackers released the woman after a few hours. Following pressure from the population, the kidnappers released the remaining hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men driving a red Rav4 car kidnapped a 3-year-old child in Cit-Belge neighborhood in Beni.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men driving a red Rav4 car kidnapped a 3-year-old child in Cit-Belge neighborhood in Beni. The assailants demanded a ransom the amount of which was not disclosed. They released the hostage at Kitchanga cemetery after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela attacked the FARDC in Simbi, Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela attacked the FARDC in Simbi, Fizi territory. Two FARDC died and three were injured during the attack. The assailants looted clothes and poultry.

title/0/en: Gunmen raided the village of Kiseku in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Gunmen raided the village of Kiseku in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted fifteen phones, five solar panels, a satellite dish, three chainsaws and eight goats.

title/0/en: Gunmen identified as Raia Mutomboki Kabanzi shot and killed a woman in Chiriba in Kalehe territory because she was suspected to be a witch.
notes/en: Gunmen identified as Raia Mutomboki Kabanzi shot and killed a woman in Chiriba in Kalehe territory because she was accused of being a witch.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as CNRD combatants ambushed a police patrol convoy in Tebero village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Armed men identified as CNRD combatants ambushed a police patrol convoy in Tebero village in Masisi territory. Two policemen were killed and one was injured during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Chebumba village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Chebumba village in Kalehe territory. The assailants looted money and goods. They forced three men to carry looted goods.

title/0/en: An unidentified gunman broke into a house in Buzimba village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: An unidentified gunman broke into a house in Buzimba village in Fizi territory. The assailant shot and wounded a 61-year-old woman and looted money and a suitcase full of clothes.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga ambushed an FARDC patrol near the village of Kibanda-Mangobo in Walungu territory. This ambush killed three Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga ambushed an FARDC patrol near the village of Kibanda-Mangobo in Walungu territory. This ambush killed three Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga combatants. The FARDC recovered three AK-47s.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Chamombe village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Chamombe village in Shabunda territory. The attackers stole 55,000 Congolese francs, six goats, two pigs, five hens, four cans of fuel and other goods. They forced ten men to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a FUSO vehicle near Nyabirehe village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a FUSO vehicle near Nyabirehe village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers kidnapped three men.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Donat / Ngandu and Mabala looted property at a mining site in Batoba village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Donat and Ngandu and the Raia Mutomboki Mabala looted property at a mining site in Batoba village, Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: The NDC-R ambushed the NDC Sheka in Muira village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC-R ambushed the NDC Sheka in Muira village in Walikale territory. They killed one combatant and wounded another in the ranks of NDC Sheka. One civilian was also killed.

title/0/en: The FDLR-FOCA robbed a FUSO vehicle near the village of Rushovu in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-FOCA robbed a FUSO vehicle near the village of Rushovu in Rutshuru territory. The attackers looted property and abducted a woman and a man. The kidnappers released the hostages when they were fired on by the FARDC.

title/0/en: The CNPSC coalition lead by Bafuliru, Banyindu and Batwa raided Kirambi, Rugethe, Kadegu, Bibangwa and Kahuna I & II in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The CNPSC coalition lead by members of the Bafuliru, Banyindu and Batwa communities raided Kirambi, Rugethe, Kadegu, Bibangwa and Kahuna I & II in Uvira territory. The CNPSC coalition attacked Twiganeho combatants. Two Twiganeho were killed and five were injured, two minor boys were shot and wounded. The coalition combatants looted the villages. The FARDC intervened to separate the two sides.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Yakutumba attacked the FARDC close to Nyangi village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Yakutumba attacked the FARDC close to Nyangi village in Fizi territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Muhima raided Kyavinyonge in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Muhima raided Kyavinyonge in Beni territory. The assailants shot bullets in the air. They withdrew from the village after the FARDC opened fire.

title/0/en: Following a clash close to Nyangi village, ten FARDC soldiers raided Mangobingobo mining site in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Following a clash close to Nyangi village, ten FARDC soldiers raided Mangobingobo mining site in Fizi territory. These FARDC shot and wounded two men and looted money, telephones and gold.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Alimbongo in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Alimbongo in Lubero territory. The assailants managed to take control over the area, pushing the FARDC put of the village.

title/0/en: The NDC Sheka ambushed the NDC-R at Mirenge village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC Sheka ambushed the NDC-R at Mirenge village in Walikale territory. The ambush resulted in a death toll of two dead and two wounded in the ranks of the NDC Guidon and one injured in the NDC Sheka ranks.

title/0/en: FARDC navy soldiers killed a 25-year-old fisherman on Lake Edward close to Kyavinyonge in Beni territory.
