notes/en: FARDC navy soldiers killed a 25-year-old fisherman on Lake Edward close to Kyavinyonge in Beni territory.

title/0/en: A FARDC officer raped a 17-year-old girl in Kibua village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: A FARDC officer raped a 17-year-old girl in Kibua village in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon killed one of their own combatants in Irameso village in Walikale territory accusing him of the theft of 250,000 Congolese francs and 50 grams of gold.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon killed one of their own combatants in Irameso village in Walikale territory accusing him of the theft of 250,000 Congolese francs and 50 grams of gold.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot dead a 31-year-old man in Namisha village in Fizi territory. The attackers looted money and the victim's phone.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot dead a 31-year-old man in Namisha village in Fizi territory. The attackers stole money and the victim's phone.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and injured his colleague over a debt of 2,000 Congolese francs at Ihusi, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and injured his colleague over a debt of 2,000 Congolese francs at Ihusi, Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto raided Nyambembe village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto raided Nyambembe village in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted 250 kilograms of cassiterite from local traders who were transporting the goods on bicycles.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga attacked the FARDC in the village of Lubimbe in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga attacked the FARDC in the village of Lubimbe, Shabunda territory. One Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga was reportedly killed. The FARDC recovered three AK47 weapons.

title/0/en: Five FARDC raped a 17-year-old girl in Lulimba in Fizi territory. The victim was hospitalized at Lulimba MSF hospital.
notes/en: Five FARDC raped a 17-year-old girl in Lulimba in Fizi territory. The victim was hospitalized at Lulimba MSF hospital.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela attacked the FARDC position in A'amba village, Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela attacked the FARDC position in A'amba village, Fizi territory. Five FARDC died during the clash. The assailants seized weapons, uniforms and motorola radios. The FARDC who came in reinforcement shot an RPG that burned down four houses.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Nyakagezi in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Nyakagezi in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants shot and wounded a man and looted goods.

title/0/en: Six armed men wearing FARDC uniforms broke into a house in Kele in Mwenga territory during the night.
notes/en: Six armed men wearing FARDC uniforms broke into a house in Kele in Mwenga territory during the night. The assailants stole $5,250 and ten grams of gold.

title/0/en: Two FARDC wounded a man in Kyavinyonge in Beni territory.
notes/en: Two FARDC wounded a man in Kyavinyonge in Beni territory. The FARDC commander had the suspected perpetrators arrested.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe raided the town of Kitsombiro in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe raided the town of Kitsombiro in Lubero territory. The attackers shot dead a policeman and a man.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided households in Minova, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided households in Minova, Kalehe territory. The attackers looted $500, televisions and clothes.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali who had kidnapped three men close to Kisozi village in Uvira territory released the hostages after a ransom of $2,000 was paid.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali who had kidnapped three men close to Kisozi village in Uvira territory released the hostages after a ransom of $2,000 was paid.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali kidnapped three men close to Kisozi in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mwenyemali kidnapped three men close to Kisozi in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2,000 to release the hostages. The assailants released the hostages after a ransom of $2,000 was paid.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Nguru raided Masereka village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Nguru raided Masereka village in Lubero territory. The police ran away as the assailants arrived. The assailants burned documents at the local civil registry office. As the FARDC approached, local notaries negotiated with the assailants for them to leave, and pay them $30.

title/0/en: A coalition of Mai-Mai Jackson, Mai-Mai Nguru and Mai-Mai Muhima raided Mulakirwa neighborhood in Kyondo rural commune.
notes/en: A coalition of Mai-Mai Jackson, Mai-Mai Nguru and Mai-Mai Muhima raided Mulakirwa neighborhood in Kyondo rural commune. The assailants burned down the local police headquarters.

title/0/en: Police arrested two LUCHA militants in Lubiriha, Beni territory.
notes/en: Police arrested two LUCHA militants in Lubiriha, Beni territory. The police accused the militants of having published the photo of the police vehicle that had transported activists arrested in the demonstration of 30 November.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided the village of Kambale in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided the village of Kambale in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted property. They abducted five young men on the pretext that they are working as taxi drivers with FARDC officers' motorcycles. The attackers then shot and wounded a woman who was protesting the abduction of her son.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mabala raided Nzibu, Kiseku and Kisuku villages in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mabala raided Nzibu, Kiseku and Kisuku villages in Shabunda territory. They stole ten solar panels, fifteen goats, thirteen chickens, five pigs, clothes and money.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Karakara tortured and wounded a 55-year-old woman in Ngendo village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Karakara tortured and wounded a 55-year-old woman in Ngendo village in Uvira territory. The victim was accused of witchcraft.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men clashed at Kishagala village in Uvira territory following a misunderstanding over a sharing of spoils.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men clashed at Kishagala village in Uvira territory following a misunderstanding over a sharing of spoils. Two of them died and one was injured during the clash. The FARDC rescued the wounded victim who was taken to Mulenge central hospital.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided the village of Kalukundu in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided the village of Kalukundu in Shabunda territory. The assailants looted the village. They abducted two women aged 52 and 27.

title/0/en: The PNC dispersed LUCHA activists' peaceful demonstration in Lubiriha in Beni territory, demanding that President Joseph Kabila leave power and the organization of elections.
notes/en: The PNC broke up a peaceful demonstration by LUCHA activists in Lubiriha, Beni territory. LUCHA was demanding the organization of elections and that President Joseph Kabila leave power. The police arrested thirteen activists. The police also tortured and wounded two of the arrested activists.

title/0/en: The police supported by the FARDC dispersed a peaceful demonstration of opposition political parties and civil society organizations in Kibondwe neighborhood in Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: The police supported by the FARDC dispersed a peaceful demonstration of opposition political parties and civil society organizations in Kibondwe neighborhood in Uvira rural commune. As a consequence of the repression one man was injured and another was arrested. Policemen also seized demonstrators' money and telephones.

title/0/en: The Police supported by the FARDC arrested thirteen LUCHA activists in Kavumo in Kabare territory during a peaceful demonstration demanding the organization of elections and that President Joseph Kabila leave power.
notes/en: The Police supported by the FARDC arrested thirteen LUCHA activists in Kavumo in Kabare territory during a peaceful demonstration demanding the organization of elections and that President Joseph Kabila leave power. The police released the victims in the evening.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed two men in Buku in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed two men in Buku in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole money, telephones and other goods.

title/0/en: The police cracked down on demonstrations by opposition political party activists in Himbi and Majengo neighborhoods of Goma.
notes/en: The police cracked down on demonstrations by opposition political party activists in Himbi and Majengo neighborhoods of Goma. They arrested ten activists.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a car near the village of Museya in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed a car near the village of Museya in Beni territory. The attackers looted $ 200 and seven phones.

title/0/en: The Police supported by the FARDC dispersed a demonstration of opposition political parties and citizens' movements in Congo ya sika neighborhood in Butembo.
notes/en: The Police supported by the FARDC dispersed a demonstration of opposition political parties and citizens' movements in Congo ya sika neighborhood in Butembo. One man was shot and killed.

title/0/en: The PNC arrested two LUCHA activists in Kyavinyonge in Beni territory during the demonstrations demanding that President Joseph Kabila leave power and the organization of elections.
notes/en: The police arrested two LUCHA activists in Kyavinyonge in Beni territory. They were demonstrating to demand the organization of elections and that President Joseph Kabila leave power . The police released the two activists in the evening.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted goods in the shops at the small market in Kalungu village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted goods in the shops at the small market in Kalungu village, Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified men carrying knives and a firearm raided a household in Kanyabusoro, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men carrying knives and a firearm raided a household in Kanyabusoro, Rutshuru territory. The attackers took a 35-year-old man to a ravine where they cut him with a machete and shot him in the head.

title/0/en: An armed man shot through a window into a house where people were smoking marijuana in the Mabanga neighborhood of Kibirizi commune.
notes/en: An armed man shot through a window into a house where people were smoking marijuana in the Mabanga neighborhood of Kibirizi commune. The assailant shot and killed a 45-year-old man.

title/0/en: A group of men, women and children, carrying crude weapons and firearms, raided Ngite village in Beni territory.
notes/en: A group of men, women and children, carrying crude weapons and firearms, raided Ngite village in Beni territory. The assailants injured a 35-year-old with a machete. They stole nineteen goats, salt, cassava flour, and beans.

title/0/en: Armed men attacked FARDC in Kigarama village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Armed men attacked the FARDC in Kigarama village in Rutshuru territory. This confrontation led to a 12-year-old girl being shot and wounded.

title/0/en: The police supported by ANR agents arrested two MLC and UDPS activists in Bunyakiri in Kalehe territory during the preparation of a peaceful demonstration demanding that President Kabila leave power.
notes/en: The police supported by ANR agents arrested two MLC and UDPS activists in Bunyakiri in Kalehe territory during the preparation of a peaceful demonstration demanding that President Kabila leave power. The PNC shot and wounded two activists as they intervened to free the two activists who had been arrested.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen shot a 63-year-old man close to Katogota village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen shot a 63-year-old man close to Katogota village in Uvira territory. The victim died on the spot.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Alimbongo in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Alimbongo in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a household in Cikonyi neighborhood in Bukavu during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a household in Cikonyi neighborhood in Bukavu during the night. The attackers looted money and property.

title/0/en: The PNC and FARDC arrested fifteen opposition political parties members and LUCHA activists in Beni as they were preparing a peaceful demonstration demanding elections and that President Kabila leave power.
notes/en: The PNC and FARDC arrested fifteen opposition political parties members and LUCHA activists in Beni as they were preparing a peaceful demonstration demanding elections and that President Kabila leave power. The police released thirteen of the activists.

title/0/en: A NDC Guidon fighter shot and killed a 38-year-old man following the refusal to pay a local NDC tax in the village of Bireshe in Walikale territory.
notes/en: A NDC Guidon fighter shot and killed a 38-year-old man following the refusal to pay a local NDC tax in the village of Bireshe in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: Police dispersed a demonstration of social movements in Butembo town.
notes/en: Police dispersed a demonstration of social movements in Butembo town. The police arrested four men.

title/0/en: The population protested against insecurity in Kigarama village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The population protested against insecurity in Kigarama village in Rutshuru territory. Police used tear gas to disperse protesters. The demonstrators used projectiles and tried to destroy the bridge over the Kihunde River.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the Raia Mutomboki Shabani as they were raiding the village of Chishi in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the Raia Mutomboki Shabani as they were raiding the village of Chishi in Kalehe territory. Three civilians were killed, one Raia Mutomboki Shabani was captured. The assailants looted the village. The Raia Mutomboki Shabani abducted four men.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided the village of Kaloba in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided the village of Kaloba in Kalehe territory. The assailants looted the village and burned down fourteen houses. They shot and wounded a woman and a 14-year-old girl. The assailants also kidnapped five men and three minor boys and demanded a ransom of $2,000.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a 56-year-old man released the hostage after he paid a $2,000 ransom.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen who kidnapped a 56-year-old man released the hostage after he paid a $2,000 ransom.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles attacked the FARDC position in Lunyasenge in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles attacked the FARDC position in Lunyasenge in Lubero territory. One FARDC was killed and three were injured, two assailants were wounded during the clash.

title/0/en: The FARDC took back the city of Kilembwe, which was controlled for a week by a coalition of Mai-Mai Yakutumba and Mai-Mai Malaka.
notes/en: The FARDC took back the city of Kilembwe, which was controlled for a week by a coalition of Mai-Mai Yakutumba and Mai-Mai Malaka. The army managed to take control of the road between the town of Lulimba and the city of Kilembwe without resistance.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot dead a 48-year-old man in Himbi neighborhood in Goma town.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot dead a 48-year-old man in Himbi neighborhood in Goma town.

title/0/en: Six unidentified armed men wearing FARDC uniforms shot and wounded a 34-year-old man in Buganga in Kalehe territory
notes/en: Six unidentified armed men wearing FARDC uniforms shot and wounded a 34-year-old man in Buganga in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole a flashlight and a machete.

title/0/en: Four armed men identified as FDLR-FOCA combatants shot dead a 46-year-old man in Kigarama village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Four FDLR-FOCA combatants shot dead a 46-year-old man in Kigarama village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Armed men attacked the FARDC in Numbi locality of Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Armed men attacked the FARDC in Numbi locality of Kalehe territory. The confrontation resulted in a death toll of two FARDC soldiers, two dead and six wounded on the civilian side. The attackers kidnapped a man and demanded a ransom of $ 50,000. The kidnappers released the hostage after paying a ransom of $ 2,000.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 42-year-old man near the village of Wangatsu in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 42-year-old man near Wangatsu village, in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed three men in Chitendebwa mining site in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed three men in Chitendebwa mining site in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole $11,000 belonging to the victims.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed group reportedly ambushed FARDC MP patrol team in Baraka general area approx 91 km South of Uvira town.
notes/en: Unidentified armed group reportedly ambushed FARDC MP patrol team in Baraka general area approx 91 km South of Uvira town; killed 02 soldiers and injured one of them.

title/0/en: Three unidentified armed men dressed in military uniform raided a household in Kamanyola, Walungu territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified armed men dressed in military uniform raided a household in Kamanyola, Walungu territory. The attackers looted money.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot a 35-year-old woman in Nyange village in Fizi territory as the victim refused to give a bottle of Primus to the assailant.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot a 35-year-old woman in Nyange village in Fizi territory as the victim refused to give a bottle of Primus beer to the assailant. The victim died on the sport.

title/0/en: Unidentified men raided three houses in Kiringa village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men raided three houses in Kiringa village in Rutshuru territory. The attackers looted money and phones. The people who came to the rescue of the victims hurt one of the attackers.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru raided the village of Mashere.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru raided the village of Mashere. The assailants stole seven goats, chickens and other goods. They shot and wounded a man and a woman.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Yakutumba attacked the FARDC position in the village of Muzimu on the Ubwari peninsula in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Yakutumba attacked the FARDC position in the village of Muzimu on the Ubwari peninsula in Fizi territory.

title/0/en: FDLR rebel group clashed with FARDC troops along Busihusha-Bukombo road
notes/en: FDLR rebels allegedly clashed with FARDC troops along the Bishusha-Bukombo road in the village of Kala. No further details about the incident were provided.

title/0/en: RM Butachibera militias robbed 05 civilians in Kayirenge and Ramba villages
notes/en: Suspected Raia Mutomboki Butachibera militias intercepted five civilians in Kayirenge and Ramba villages 20 km northeast of Bunyakiri center. They robbed their belongings and tortured and injured them. The victims were later taken to Bunyakiri Referral Hospital.

title/0/en: A policeman fired at a prisoner who was trying to escape from the central prison of Butembo town.
notes/en: A policeman fired at a prisoner who was trying to escape from the central prison of Butembo town. The latter was seriously wounded.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo held up two vehicles and motorcycles close to the village of Bubare in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo held up two vehicles and motorcycles close to the village of Bubare in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole $6,570 and other goods. They kidnapped six men and demanded a ransom of $18,000 and six goats. They shot and wounded a woman and her child.

title/0/en: A FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 51-year-old man in the village of Lulimba in Fizi territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 51-year-old man in the village of Lulimba in Fizi territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a man close to Mutimuli village, in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a man close to Mutimuli village, in Beni territory, during the night.

title/0/en: Twelve FARDC soldiers stole $630, fifteen goats, three solar panels, chickens and guinea pigs in Kalemi in Beni territory.
notes/en: Twelve FARDC soldiers stole $630, fifteen goats, three solar panels, chickens and guinea pigs in Kalemi in Beni territory. These soldiers wanted to take back a weapon that youth from the village had seized to a drunk soldier.

title/0/en: Two unidentified gunmen abducted a 40-year-old man from Muhanga village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified gunmen abducted a 40-year-old man from Muhanga village in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mabala raided the village of Ngolombe in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mabala raided the village of Ngolombe in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted property in a vehicle that was passing through Bukavu. They kidnapped 30 men and 10 women. The attackers raped five women.

title/0/en: Armed men carrying knives and firearms identified as FDLR-RUD fighters killed two men aged 43 and 60, two women aged 30 and 55, and a 12-year-old girl. from Kibirizi locality in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Armed men carrying knives and firearms identified as FDLR-RUD fighters killed two men aged 43 and 60, two women aged 30 and 55, and a 12-year-old girl close to Kibirizi in Rutshuru territory. A woman and a girl are missing.

title/0/en: FDLR-RUD combatants raided a household in Kisharo village in Rutshuru territory during the night.
notes/en: FDLR-RUD combatants raided a household in Kisharo village in Rutshuru territory during the night. The attackers shot and killed a man 500 meters from his house.

title/0/en: ADF combatants attacked the FARDC position at PK17 on Mbau-Kamango axe in Beni territory.
notes/en: ADF combatants attacked the FARDC position at PK17 on the Mbau-Kamango road in Beni territory. The assailants also ambushed the FARDC at PK 7. One FARDC died and two were injured, while one civilian was shot and killed during the clash. The assailants burned the victim's motorcycle.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Mabala raided the village of Nzimbi in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Mabala raided the village of Nzimbi in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted money, six goats, 24 chickens and other property. They injured several people.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru raided the village of Mukowa/Mashere in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru raided the village of Mukowa/Mashere in Kalehe territory. The attackers looted $ 650, six goats and eleven chickens. They kidnapped seven men, two women and one girl under the age of 18. The attackers abducted the women for sexual exploitation.

title/0/en: Two FARDC soldiers stole 102,000 Congolese francs and two telephones in Bulambo centre in Beni territory.
notes/en: Two FARDC soldiers stole 102,000 Congolese francs and two telephones in Bulambo, Beni territory.

title/0/en: Three FARDC soldiers shot dead a two gold traders, a man and a woman, near Nyawaronga village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Three FARDC soldiers shot dead a two gold traders, a man and a woman, near Nyawaronga village in Kalehe territory. The FARDC soldiers stole $ 3,870 and a package of gold.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Lukoba raided the village of Mukenge in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Lukoba raided the village of Mukenge in Shabunda territory. The attackers looted property and abducted 25 people.

title/0/en: Police and FARDC dispersed a demonstration in rural Oicha protesting against the killing of an eighteen-year-old boy in the village of Tenambo.
notes/en: Police and FARDC dispersed a demonstration in rural Oicha protesting against the killing of an eighteen-year-old boy in the village of Tenambo. The police and the FARDC shot and wounded two men aged 21 and 22, respectively, and a 13-year-old girl.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked two Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants during a meeting in the village of Musigha in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked two Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants during a meeting in the village of Musigha in Lubero territory. This attack killed six civilians and wounded five others.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as Mai-Mai Mazembe shot dead two men in Kabika village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Armed men identified as Mai-Mai Mazembe shot dead two men in Kabika village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: ADF combatants attacked the FARDC positions at PK 23 and 24 in Sulungwe in Beni territory.
notes/en: ADF combatants attacked the FARDC positions at PK 23 and 24 in Sulungwe in Beni territory.

title/0/en: The FARDC looted the belongings of the population in Alimbongo following the killing of an FARDC captain the previous day.
notes/en: The FARDC looted the belongings of the population in Alimbongo following the killing of an FARDC captain the previous day.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika She Assani ambushed the FARDC convoy returning from Kilembwe to the village of Salamabila in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika She Assani ambushed the FARDC convoy returning from Kilembwe to the village of Salamabila in Fizi territory. This ambush resulted in a death toll of 24 dead and three captured in the ranks of the FARDC. The attackers burned an FARDC jeep. The FARDC looted property in this area.

title/0/en: Three FARDC soldiers shot dead an 18-year-old man in Tenambo village in Beni territory.
notes/en: Three FARDC soldiers shot dead an 18-year-old man in Tenambo village in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed three motorbikes on National Road 3 near Bitale village, Kalehe territory. The attackers looted money and property.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen robbed three motorbikes on National Road 3 near Bitale village, Kalehe territory. The attackers looted money and property. They shot and wounded a 33-year-old man who was trying to flee.

title/0/en: Eleven armed men dressed in civilian clothes and FARDC uniforms robbed a taxi on the Butembo-Kasindi road near the village of Kavasewa in Beni territory.
notes/en: Eleven armed men dressed in civilian clothes and FARDC uniforms robbed a taxi on the Butembo-Kasindi road near the village of Kavasewa in Beni territory. The attackers stole $ 840 and a bag of potatoes.

title/0/en: Unidentified men stabbed to death a man in the rural commune of Kirumba.
notes/en: Unidentified men stabbed to death a man in the rural commune of Kirumba.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the police officers who were in charge of Kiwanja's administrator in the Mabungo district of rural Kiwanja commune.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the police officers who were in charge of Kiwanja's administrator in the Mabungo district of rural Kiwanja commune. The police killed an assailant.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani raided Miruwa village in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani raided Miruwa village in Kalehe territory during the night. The attackers raped a woman and a 16-year-old girl. They looted a cow, five goats and other property. They shot and wounded a 19-year-old man and burned six houses.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided Bitale center in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided Bitale center in Kalehe territory during the night. The FARDC attacked the attackers when they tried to loot. The attack left one FARDC soldier dead and another wounded, one dead and one wounded among the attackers and three civilians shot and wounded. The attackers kidnapped seven men and two wives of FARDC soldiers and demanded a ransom of $168 They also burned down nine houses.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers on patrol shot and wounded a 20-year-old man in the Kasenga neighborhood of Uvira.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers on patrol shot and wounded a 20-year-old man in the Kasenga neighborhood of Uvira.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a guest house in the Kasenga neighborhood in rural Uvira.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided a guest house in the Kasenga neighborhood in rural Uvira. The attackers stole $500, cassava flour, goats, chickens, and beer. In their flight, they got into a firefight with the FARDC. The attackers injured a man.

title/0/en: The attackers who kidnapped a 16-year-old girl in Pasisi District of Beni town released the hostage after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: The attackers who kidnapped a 16-year-old girl in Pasisi District of Beni town released the hostage after a ransom was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 16-year-old girl while she was on her way to the church in Beni.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 16-year-old girl while she was on her way to the church in Beni. The kidnappers demanded a ransom; the amount has not been revealed. The kidnappers released the hostage in the evening after payment of a ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC at "kilometer 16", in the village of Kabuliya Seku in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC at "kilometer 16", in the village of Kabuliya Seku in Beni territory. This clash killed one FARDC soldier.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe and Malaika attacked the FARDC position in Bulambo center, Beni territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe and Malaika attacked the FARDC position in Bulambo center, Beni territory. The attack left two FARDC soldiers dead, four dead and one wounded captured in the ranks of the attackers.

title/0/en: Unidentified men stabbed a 47-year-old man in Lujo village in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men stabbed to death a 47-year-old man in Lujo village in Kabare territory.

title/0/en: The coalition of Mai-Mai Malaika and Yakutumba attacked the FARDC headquarter close to Kilembwe administrative office.
notes/en: A coalition of Mai-Mai Malaika and Yakutumba attacked the FARDC headquarter close to Kilembwe administrative office. An FARDC died during the attack, according to local sources. They also said that the assailants were well armed.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Aigle attacked the FARDC in the village of Kilembwe in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Aigle attacked the FARDC in the village of Kilembwe in Fizi territory. Reinforcements sent by the FARDC pushed the attackers out of the town.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed the FARDC on patrol at Kavumo village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen ambushed FARDC on patrol at Kavumo village in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position at "Kilometer 20" in Sulungwe village, Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position at "Kilometer 20" in Sulungwe village, Beni territory. This attack killed two and wounded seven FARDC soldiers. One attacker was captured.

title/0/en: Fifteen unidentified armed men robbed seven motorbikes on the road between Kasindi-Kasindi port in Beni territory.
notes/en: Fifteen unidentified armed men robbed seven motorbikes on the road between Kasindi-Kasindi port in Beni territory. The attackers looted $ 1,000, phones and fish.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kabazimia stole 50 Kg of cassiterite close to Ibumba in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kabazimia stole 50 Kg of cassiterite close to Ibumba in Shabunda territory. The assailants also abducted a 54-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided the village of Bulambika in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided the village of Bulambika in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole thirteen goats and goods. They kidnapped six men and four boys and demanded a ransom of $3,000.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the position of the Mai-Mai Charles and Mai-Mai Kilalo coalition in Kirikiri, Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the position of the Mai-Mai Charles and Mai-Mai Kilalo coalition in Kirikiri, Lubero territory. The attack left two dead and three wounded in the ranks of the FARDC, one dead and wounded in the ranks of the attackers.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Jackson stole 32 motorized canoes belonging to fishermen on the pretext that they had not paid a local tax in Kyavinyonge, Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Jackson stole 32 motorized canoes belonging to fishermen on the pretext that they had not paid a local tax in Kyavinyonge, Beni territory. The assailants demanded the payment of $1,600 to give the canoes back.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen trying to loot Mabanga-Nord neighborhood in Goma attacked policemen.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen trying to loot Mabanga-Nord neighborhood in Goma attacked policemen. One civilian was shot and killed.

title/0/en: Four men among the seventeen hostages kidnapped by the Raia Mutomboki Kabanzi managed to escape from their kidnappers in Mbongo in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Four men among the seventeen hostages kidnapped by the Raia Mutomboki Kabanzi managed to escape from their kidnappers in Mbongo in Kalehe territory. The hostages did not pay any ransom.

title/0/en: One of the hostages kidnapped by the Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo managed to escape from the kidnappers in Ebisha in Kalehe territory. The hostage's family did not pay any ransom.
notes/en: One of the hostages kidnapped by the Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo managed to escape from the kidnappers in Ebisha in Kalehe territory. The hostage's family did not pay any ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen carrying crude weapons and firearms broke into a farm in Lyakobo neighborhood in Beni.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen carrying crude weapons and firearms broke into a farm in Lyakobo neighborhood in Beni. The assailants stole four cows.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo held up eleven motorcycles close to Ebisha in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo held up eleven motorcycles close to Ebisha in Kalehe territory. The assailants looted passengers' belongings. They also kidnapped eleven men and demanded a ransom of $2,400.

title/0/en: arly in the morning,FARDC troops from Bambo and Kabizo launched an attack on Nyatura positions in the Ruza sector (between Kabizo and Bambo).
notes/en: Early in the morning,FARDC troops from Bambo and Kabizo launched an attack on Nyatura positions in the Ruza sector (between Kabizo and Bambo). The clashes extended to Kajagari (Kabizo-Mushababwe secondary road). Shots stopped being heard in these areas around 11:30. The FARDC regained their original positions, while the Nyatura maintained their presence in the Ruza, Butare and Kajagari sectors. A child was reported wounded by stray bullets in Rushashi village (near Mushababwe).

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the FARDC position in Rugeje in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the FARDC position in Rugeje in Uvira territory. Two FARDC died and five were injured during the attack.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen stabbed and wounded a 35-year-old man in the Minova area of Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen stabbed and wounded a 35-year-old man in the Minova area of Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the police at Butembo central prison.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the police at Butembo central prison. Four assailants were killed, one policeman was injured and a woman and a girl were shot and wounded during the attack.

title/0/en: Police dispersed protesters protesting the publication of the electoral calendar in the Goma neighborhood.
notes/en: Police dispersed protesters protesting the publication of the electoral calendar in the Goma neighborhood. Police arrested eight protesters.

title/0/en: The police and FARDC dispersed civilians who were demonstrating in Butembo against the electoral calendar published by the CENI.
notes/en: The police and FARDC dispersed civilians who were demonstrating in Butembo against the electoral calendar published by the CENI. The police arrested two men and released them after few hours.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Buzito district of rural Kiwanja during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Buzito district of rural Kiwanja during the night. The attackers stole a bag of beans and other goods. They forced the head of the household to carry the looted goods. Not having the strength to continue with the march, the attackers shot the kidnapped man. The victim died of his wounds at the Mapendo Health Center.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Minova, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Minova, Kalehe territory. The attackers stole $3,000, four phones and communication credits. The victim fainted after the looting and was admitted to the Minova hospital.

title/0/en: A clash broke out among Nyatura APRDC combatants following a disagreement between the armed group leaders.
notes/en: A clash broke out among Nyatura APRDC combatants following a disagreement between the armed group leaders. One Nyatura APRDC was injured during the clash.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed two men in a plantation in Bambu, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed two men in a plantation in Bambu, Rutshuru territory. The bodies of the victims were found in a state of decomposition.

title/0/en: The police broke up a peaceful march against the extension of the President Kabila's mandate and the publication of the electoral calendar in the village of Lubiriha, Beni territory.
notes/en: The police broke up a peaceful march against the extension of the President Kabila's mandate and the publication of the electoral calendar in the village of Lubiriha, Beni territory. Police arrested twelve men and two women.

title/0/en: CNRD combatants who had kidnapped three men and a woman on 11/07/2017 released the hostages in Kalonge in Walikale territory.
notes/en: CNRD combatants who had kidnapped three men and a woman on 11/07/2017 released the hostages in Kalonge in Walikale territory. The victims' families paid a ransom of $4,500.

title/0/en: FDLR-RUD combatants shot at a vehicle FUSO transporting passengers close to the village of Kise in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: FDLR-RUD combatants shot at a vehicle FUSO transporting passengers close to the village of Kise in Rutshuru territory. Two men were killed, five men and a woman were injured during the shooting.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Domi position in Muti village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Domi position in Muti village in Rutshuru territory. This FARDC attack was retaliation for the assailants' attack on the FARDC position in Kabizo village.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Charles position in Kirikiri in Lubero territory. Two
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Charles position in Kirikiri in Lubero territory. Two FARDC died during the attack.

title/0/en: FARDC troops and Mai-Mai militias reportedly clashed in Mubana, in Lubero territory.
notes/en: FARDC troops and a Mai-Mai militia reportedly clashed in Mubana, in Lubero territory. The FARDC troops managed to drive out the militias from Mubana village and the surrounding area.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles ambushed an FARDC convoy in Katambi in Lubero territory. Six FARDC died during the ambush.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles ambushed an FARDC convoy in Katambi in Lubero territory. Six FARDC died during the ambush.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Karakara combatants stole 35 cows in Mutarule 2 in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Karakara combatants stole 35 cows in Mutarule 2, Uvira territory. Following negotiations with the cows' owner, the assailants gave the 35 cows back against the payment of $2,000.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed an ANR officer in Lubicako in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed an ANR official in Lubicako in Fizi territory.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Yakutumba reportedly attacked FARDC troops position in Kananda, Fizi territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Yakutumba reportedly attacked the FARDC position in Kananda, Fizi territory. No further details were provided.

title/0/en: Two FARDC opened fire while fighting over a chicken in Lugungu in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Two FARDC opened fire while fighting over a chicken in Lugungu in Shabunda territory. A 10-year-old child fell in a well while escaping from the shooting and died. Five women fainted.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Domi attacked the FARDC position in Kabizo in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Domi attacked the FARDC position in Kabizo in Rutshuru territory. An 11-year-old child was shot and wounded.

title/0/en: Farmers and cattle herdersmen reportedly exchanged gunfire in Kilicha village located 210 km South West of Uvira town.
notes/en: Farmers and cattle herders reportedly exchanged gunfire in Kilicha village,  in Fizi territory. At least four cows were reported killed.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Charles position in the village of Mubana, Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Charles position in the village of Mubana, Lubero territory. The confrontation killed four FARDC and three of the attackers. The FARDC and the attackers looted a motorcycle and property.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 24-year-old man in Bugumba in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed a 24-year-old man in Bugumba in Nyiragongo territory.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani raided Mafuo in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani raided Mafuo in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole $5,180, 79 telephones, seven computers, nine televisions and other goods from two local shops. They kidnapped two men and demanded a ransom of $1,000. On their way back the assailants shot and wounded a woman and burned down two houses.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Katoy neighborhood in Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Katoy neighborhood in Goma. The assailants shot and killed a 36-year-old woman.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela ambushed an FARDC convoy patrolling the village of Lukoke in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela ambushed an FARDC convoy patrolling the village of Lukoke in Fizi territory. Two FARDC died and two were injured during the ambush.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Lukoba raided Lukumba village in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Lukoba raided Lukumba village in Shabunda territory. The attackers killed an FARDC soldier with a crude weapon and stole his weapons and Motorola walkie-talkie.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen stole $6,450 from traders travelling to Ramba market close to Kairenge in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen stole $6,450 from traders travelling to Ramba market close to Kairenge in Kalehe territory. The assailants shot and wounded five men trying to run away.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Lubero rural commune
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Lubero rural commune. The militias allegedly set two FARDC shacks and a civilian residence on fire.The FARDC repelled the assailants.

title/0/en: Nyatura and CNRD militias reportedly clashed at Mpati village and displaced the civilian population towards Goriba, Kirimbu and Mweso.
notes/en: A Nyatura group and the CNRD reportedly clashed at Mpati village and displaced the civilian population towards Goriba, Kirimbu and Mweso.

title/0/en: APCLS combatants attacked the FDC position in Mianza in Masisi territory
notes/en: APCLS combatants attacked the FDC position in Mianza in Masisi territory. Two FDC combatants were killed and three civilians were shot and wounded during the clash.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men including a policeman broke into three houses in Musimba in Lubero territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men and a policeman broke into three houses in Musimba, Lubero territory during the night. The assailants stole $1,500. They shot and killed a man and injured other men with a crude weapon.

title/0/en: An unidentified armed group reportedly ambushed an FARDC patrol of military police in Baraka, killing two soldiers and injuring another.
notes/en: An unidentified armed group reportedly ambushed an FARDC patrol of military police in Baraka, killing two soldiers and injuring another.

title/0/en: A policeman sent by his commander to arrest two men suspected of abandoning their children shot the two men aged 30 and 31 in Tunkele in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: A Policeman sent by his commander to arrest two men suspected of abandoning their children shot the two men aged 30 and 31 in Tunkele in Mwenga territory. Both men died from their wounds.

title/0/en: Unidentified men carrying crude weapons and firearms injured with a machete a woman in Dada plot in vch neighborhood in Butembo.
notes/en: Unidentified men carrying crude weapons and firearms injured a woman with a machete in Dada's concession in the vch neighborhood of Butembo.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the village of Mulungu in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the village of Mulungu in Shabunda territory. The assailants stole sixteen goats, five sheeps and two 12 caliber hunting weapons from the village chief. They abducted twenty men.

title/0/en: Two gunmen identified as FDLR-FOCA kidnapped a 49-year-old man in his field in Kanyeshongo in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Two gunmen identified as FDLR-FOCA kidnapped a 49-year-old man in his field in Kanyeshongo in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $5,000.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked a Nyatura Domi position on a hill overlooking Butare in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked a Nyatura Domi position on a hill overlooking Butare in Rutshuru territory. The FARDC pushed the armed group off the hill.

title/0/en: FARDC troops reportedly attacked a coalition of armed groups in Kichula village, 177 km southwest of Uvira town.
notes/en: FARDC troops reportedly attacked a coalition of armed groups in Kichula village, 177 km southwest of Uvira town. The armed group reportedly forced the FARDC to withdraw towards Mukera village. The situation also forced the civilian population to flee the area.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe and FARDC clashed at Kirikiri village, approximately  7km south of Kipese.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe and FARDC clashed at Kirikiri village, approximately  7km south of Kipese. At least two FARDC soldiers were wounded and transferred to Lubero general hospital for treatment; one of them later succumbed to his wounds.

title/0/en: Unidentified men carrying crude weapons and firearms raided the village of Mupando in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men carrying crude weapons and firearms raided the village of Mupando in Uvira territory. The assailants stole 41 cows.

title/0/en: Police dispersed a demonstration by youths protesting the increased insecurity in the Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Police dispersed a demonstration by youths protesting the increased insecurity in the Rutshuru territory. The demonstrators demanded the resignation of the territorial administrator and the military auditor. The police arrested thirteen protesters.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the FARDC position in Kavumu in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen attacked the FARDC position in Kavumu in Kabare territory. The FARDC repelled the assailants.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men who had kidnapped two women in Pasisi neighborhood in Beni released the hostages after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men who had kidnapped two women in Pasisi neighborhood in Beni on 7 November released the hostages after a ransom was paid. The ransom amount was not disclosed.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a 29-year-old man in Bujovu neighbourhood in Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a 29-year-old man in Bujovu neighbourhood in Goma.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Kasongo attacked CNRD combatants in Busumba in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Kasongo attacked CNRD combatants in Busumba in Masisi territory. Three CNRD combatants and one civilian were killed during the clash.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Kalume captured a policeman and an ANR officer in Kavumo in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Kalume captured a policeman and an ANR officer in Kavumo in Kalehe territory. The assailants released the hostages and sent them to meet the local authorities to demand them to pay $2,000 so that they would be allowed to resume their daily activities.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the village of Mulungu in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the village of Mulungu in Shabunda territory. The assailants stole three goats, five rabbits, six mattresses and other goods. They abducted two men aged 27 and 32 and forced them to carry looted items.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided the village of Kisuku in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided the village of Kisuku in Shabunda territory. The assailants stole eleven goats and commodities from a shop.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Malaika reportedly attacked the FARDC position in Tubangoye, 385 km southwest of Uvira town, and allegedly took control of the area.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Malaika reportedly attacked the FARDC position in Tubangoye, 385 km southwest of Uvira town, and allegedly took control of the area.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Aigle raided the village of Kobokobo in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Aigle raided the village of Kobokobo in Fizi territory. The assailants burned down 40 houses and looted goats and chickens. This attack was meant to punish the village's inhabitants who had housed the FARDC in their village.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela attacked the FARDC position in Mukela in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela attacked the FARDC position in Mukela in Fizi territory. Two FARDC were killed and six were injured during the clash. Two Mai-Mai Ebu Ela were captured. The assailants stole weapons and ammunitions.

title/0/en: CNRD combatants raided the villages of Matenge, Kashesha, Burongo and Bulibindi in Walikale territory.
notes/en: CNRD combatants raided the villages of Matenge, Kashesha, Burongo and Bulibindi in Walikale territory. The assailants looted money and goods. They abducted two men aged 30 and 50.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed group reportedly fired gunshots and attacked a PNC Commissariat HQ office built by MONUSCO in 2015 on the frame of UNPOL QIPs in Baraka.
notes/en: An unidentified armed group reportedly fired gunshots and attacked a police station built in Baraka in Fizi territory. No further details about incident were provided.

title/0/en: Suspected CNRD and Nyatura/Kasongo militias reportedly clashed in Bweru general area approx. 24 Km South East of Mweso village within Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: CNRD and Nyatura/Kasongo militias reportedly clashed in the general area of Bweru, around 24 km southeast of Mweso village, Rutshuru territory. At least two civilians were killed and five others wounded.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Mabalako in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided Mabalako in Beni territory. The assailants stole two solar panels, a box of syrup, four telephones and a saucepan.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a 37-year-old man with a crude weapon in Mukulya neighbourhood in Beni.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a 37-year-old man with a crude weapon in Mukulya neighbourhood in Beni.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kabazimia released eight men and two minor boys in Myanzi in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kabazimia released eight men and two minor boys in Myanzi in Shabunda territory. The hostages paid a ransom of $300.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kabazimia raided the village of Myanzi in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kabazimia raided the village of Myanzi in Shabunda territory. The assailants looted a sum of money equivalent to $237.5, six solar panels, 28 grams of gold, a power generator. They also abducted ten men.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up motorcycles on National Road #3 around Camp Mpempa in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up motorcycles on National Road #3 around Camp Mpempa in Walikale territory. The assailants looted money and other goods. They shot and wounded two men and forced thirteen men to carry looted goods. They subsequently kidnapped the thirteen men and demanded a ransom for their release, the amount of which was not disclosed.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles attacked the FARDC patrolling on Albert Lake close to the village of Mubana in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles attacked the FARDC patrolling on Albert Lake close to the village of Mubana in Lubero territory. During the clash two FARDC were killed and a Mai-Mai Charles combatant was injured.

title/0/en: The hostage captured by the FDLR-RUD on 11/04/2017 close to Ngombe in Rutshuru territory managed to escape.
notes/en: The hostage captured by the FDLR-RUD on 11/04/2017 close to Ngombe in Rutshuru territory managed to escape. The victim's family did not pay the ransom demanded by the kidnappers.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raped two young women aged 18 and 22 close to Makengere in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raped two young women aged 18 and 22 close to Makengere in Kalehe territory. They shot and wounded a 17-year-old boy. The assailants also stole $10 and three telephones.

title/0/en: Seven gunmen wearing FARDC uniforms abducted two men aged 42 and 45 and captured a policeman in Lyakoba neighbourhood in Beni. The assailants took the victims to Buthungu village.
notes/en: Seven gunmen wearing FARDC uniforms abducted two men aged 42 and 45 and captured a policeman in the Lyakoba neighborhood of Beni. The assailants took the victims to Buthungu village.

title/0/en: CNRD combatants kidnapped three men aged 39, 40 and 45 and a 52-year-old woman close to Ihula in Walikale territory.
notes/en: CNRD combatants kidnapped three men aged 39, 40 and 45 and a 52-year-old woman close to Ihula in Walikale territory. The assailants demanded a ransom of $17,000.

title/0/en: Four unidentified men carrying crude weapons and firearms killed a policeman with a crude weapon on Pinga-Kalembe road close to Kalonge in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified men carrying crude weapons and firearms killed a policeman with a crude weapon on Pinga-Kalembe road close to Kalonge in Walikale territory. The assailants threw the victim's body into the Mweso river.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Kalume attacked the FARDC in their attempt to raid Chitendebwa mining site in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Kalume attacked the FARDC in their attempt to raid Chitendebwa mining site in Kalehe territory. During the clash one FARDC died and two were injured, two Nyatura Kalume died and three were injured, one civilian died and two were wounded. The Nyatura Kalume and the FARDC looted money, gold and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the village of Masiba in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the village of Masiba in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants stole nineteen chickens, eleven goats and other goods. They shot and wounded three men who refused to carry looted goods. They forced sixteen men and five minor boys to carry looted goods. The assailants kidnapped six men and demanded a ransom of $900. They also burned down seventeen houses.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Donat/Ngandu ambushed a FARDC patrol between Lumpumpu and Lutika in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Donat/Ngandu ambushed a FARDC patrol between Lumpumpu and Lutika in Shabunda territory. Two Raia Mutomboki Donat/Ngandu died during the clash and an FARDC soldier went missing.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kabanzi demanded $500 from men cutting timber close to the village of Mbongo in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kabanzi demanded $500 from men cutting timber close to Mbongo village in Kalehe territory. The assailants then shot and wounded two men. They kidnapped five men and demanded $500 to release them. They also stole a chainsaw.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided the village of Kambegeti in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided the village of Kambegeti in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants looted a sum of money equivalent to $212, nine bags of rice, seven bags of corn flour, eight bags of beans and kitchen tools. The goods and money stolen belonged to the Bunyakiri III primary school. The assailants shot and wounded a man.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a 26-year-old pregnant woman as the FARDC were trying to arrest a suspected Mai-Mai combatant who was having a drink in the victim's property in Kanyandahi in Lubero territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a 26-year-old pregnant woman as the FARDC were trying to arrest a suspected Mai-Mai combatant who was having a drink in the victim's property in Kanyandahi in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Kiwanja rural commune in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Kiwanja rural commune in Rutshuru territory. The assailants shot and killed a 27-year-old man. The assailants shot and killed a second man while they were running away.

title/0/en: A drunk FARDC soldier harassing the population shot and wounded a 28-year-old man in Boikene neighbourhood in Beni.
notes/en: A drunk FARDC soldier harassing the population shot and wounded a 28-year-old man in Boikene neighbourhood in Beni. The victim was hospitalised at Beni general hospital and then transferred to Goma.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the guards of the head of the anti-fraud cell at Nyalukenda neighborhood in Bukavu town, Abbas Kayonga.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the guards of the head of the anti-fraud cell at Nyalukenda neighborhood in Bukavu town, Abbas Kayonga. This incident resulted in three FARDC killed, as well as one of the guards of the dissident official. The clash also killed three civilians, including a man, a woman and a boy.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani, Shukuru and Hamakombo coalition attacked the FARDC position in the village of Bitale, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani, Shukuru and Hamakombo coalition attacked the FARDC position in the village of Bitale, Kalehe territory. During the clash two civilians were shot and wounded. The assailants stole goats, chickens and other goods. They kidnapped six men and demanded a ransom of $1,200. Before leaving, the assailants also burned down the FARDC camp.

title/0/en: Four gunmen identified as FDLR-RUD combatants held up a motorcycle close to Kanyamagana in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Four gunmen identified as FDLR-RUD combatants held up a motorcycle close to Kanyamagana in Rutshuru territory. The assailants kidnapped three men and set the motorcycle driver free. They demanded a ransom of $3,000.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD held up a motorcycle transporting two men and a woman close to Ngombe in Rutshuru territory
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD held up a motorcycle transporting two men and a woman close to Ngombe in Rutshuru territory. The assailants shot and killed a man and wounded a woman. They kidnapped a man. The amount of the ransom demanded was not disclosed. The hostage managed to escape.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Kamibale and Okigo mining sites in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Kamibale and Okigo mining sites in Walikale territory. The assailants looted money and goods. They abducted four men and forced them to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Kalume attacked the FARDC position in the village of Shanje in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Kalume attacked the FARDC position in the village of Shanje in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: The ADF and unidentified armed men abducted men and women returning from their fields in the Boikene neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: The ADF and unidentified armed men abducted men and women returning from their fields in the Boikene neighborhood of Beni. The assailants released the hostages after having heard the FARDC shooting a few kilometers away.

title/0/en: The FARDC shot in the air 2 km from the place where unidentified armed men and the ADF had abducted civilians in Boikene neighbourhood in Beni.
notes/en: The FARDC shot in the air 2 km from the place where unidentified armed men and the ADF had abducted civilians in Boikene neighbourhood in Beni.

title/0/en: The Nyatura John Love raided the village of Katolo in Rutshuru territory during the night.
notes/en: The Nyatura John Love raided the village of Katolo in Rutshuru territory during the night. The assailants shot and killed four men aged 65, 63, 23 and 20, a 47-year-old woman and two boys aged 14 and 13. They shot and wounded an underage boy and burned down 60 houses.

title/0/en: Two gunmen identified as FARDC shot and killed a 42-year-old man and wounded a 34-year-old man in the commune of Kiliba in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Two gunmen identified as FARDC shot and killed a 42-year-old man and wounded a 34-year-old man in the commune of Kiliba in Uvira territory.

title/0/en: A coalition of Raia Mutomboki Kabazimya and Kazimoto attacked the FARDC in the village of Muumbilwa, Shabunda territory.
notes/en: A coalition of Raia Mutomboki Kabazimya and Kazimoto attacked the FARDC in the village of Muumbilwa, Shabunda territory. One FARDC was injured and one Raia Mutomboki died during the clash.

title/0/en: The CNRD raided the villages of Matenge and Buronga in Walikale territory. The assailants abducted two men aged 47 and 46 respectively.
notes/en: The CNRD raided the villages of Matenge and Buronga in Walikale territory. The assailants abducted two men aged 47 and 46 respectively. They also looted the villages.

title/0/en: A coalition of Raia Mutomboki Donat/Ngandu and Mabala attacked an FARDC patrol in Ndese, Shabunda territory.
notes/en: A coalition of Raia Mutomboki Donat/Ngandu and Mabala attacked an FARDC patrol in Ndese, Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: Policemen patrolling Kasika neighbourhood in Goma killed three assailants during a shooting.
notes/en: Policemen patrolling Kasika neighborhood in Goma killed three assailants during a shootout. The unidentified armed men had attempted to loot several houses.

title/0/en: APCLS combatants attacked the FARDC in the village of Ndumba, Masisi territory.
notes/en: APCLS combatants attacked the FARDC in the village of Ndumba, Masisi territory. The assailants killed a woman during the clash and looted cows.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Love tied down three women and a man they came upon in a field close to Mutanda, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Love tied down three women and a man they came upon in a field close to Mutanda, Rutshuru territory. The assailants released the three women and killed the 23-year-old man with a crude weapon.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped a man close to the village of Kamukwale in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped a man close to the village of Kamukwale in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2,000 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Armed men kidnapped three men aged 54, 48 and 42 in the village of Mulungu in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Armed men kidnapped three men aged 54, 48 and 42 in the village of Mulungu in Shabunda territory. The amount of ransom demanded was unknown.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons and firearms broke into a house in the village of Kambale, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons and firearms broke into a house in the village of Kambale, Kalehe territory. The assailants abducted a man and injured by machete a woman trying to alert the neighbors. They also looted the house.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon who had kidnapped six men in Mbuhi in Walikale territory on 10/29/2017 released the hostages after a ransom of $1,000 was paid.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon who had kidnapped six men in Mbuhi in Walikale territory on 10/29/2017 released the hostages after a ransom of $1,000 was paid.

title/0/en: APCLS raided the village of Muluu in Masisi territory. The attackers looted the village, stealing money and cattle
notes/en: APCLS raided the village of Muluu in Masisi territory. The attackers looted the village, stealing money and cattle. As they were leaving the scene, the APCLS kidnapped two men. The fate of the abductees is not known.

title/0/en: The Nyatura FDP (Niyonzimana) ambushed the FARDC in the village of Kigarama in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura FDP (Niyonzimana) ambushed the FARDC in the village of Kigarama in Rutshuru territory. One FARDC was injured, a 50-year-old woman and a 30-year-old man were shot and killed and three men were shot and wounded.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a 38-year-old woman who had been his concubine after he suspected her of having stolen money from him. The incident occured in Kabaya, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and killed a 38-year-old woman who had been his concubine after he suspected her of having stolen money from him. The incident occured in Kabaya, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mwenyemali, who had just held up a passanger vehicle close to the village of Kigwena, Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mwenyemali, who had just held up a passanger vehicle close to the village of Kigwena, Uvira territory. One FARDC was injured during the clash.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Bipompa held up four trucks and seven motorcycles on National Road #3 in the Kahuzi Biega national park in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Bipompa held up four trucks and seven motorcycles on National Road #3 in the Kahuzi Biega national park in Kalehe territory. The assailants shot and wounded a woman and a man trying to escape. They stole $6,780 and goods. They forced eighteen men and five boys to carry the stolen goods. Among the 23 abducted, the assailants kidnapped eight men and five boys and demanded a ransom of $2,600.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru held up a convoy of vehicles close to the village of Nyamirera, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru held up a convoy of vehicles close to the village of Nyamirera, Kalehe territory. The assailants shot and wounded three men. They looted money and goods. They also kidnapped nine men and demanded a ransom of $2,250.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Nguru in Masereka in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Nguru in Masereka in Lubero territory. One FARDC was injured. The FARDC stole four solar panels, 37 goats, 26 chickens, clothes, kitchen tools and other goods.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kilalo position in Katambi in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kilalo position in Katambi in Lubero territory. The FARDC burned down the Mai-Mai Kilalo camp as the latter pulled out of the camp.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier injured a 35-year-old man with a knife in Kitembo, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier injured a 35-year-old man with a knife in Kitembo, Kalehe territory. The FARDC hierarchy arrested the soldier responsible for the injury.

title/0/en: The police dispersed a peaceful demonstration of LUCHA activists in the Matonge neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: The police dispersed a peaceful demonstration of LUCHA activists in the Matonge neighborhood of Beni. The police arrested nine men.

title/0/en: FDLR-RUD combatants kidnapped two men, one of whom aged 34, close to Mutabo in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: FDLR-RUD combatants kidnapped two men, one of whom aged 34, close to Mutabo in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $4,000.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD ambushed the FARDC close to the village of Kinyandonyi in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD ambushed the FARDC close to the village of Kinyandonyi in Rutshuru territory. The assailants managed to kill two FARDC soldiers during the ambush.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a 24-year-old man in the Muganga neighborhood in Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a 24-year-old man in the Muganga neighborhood in Goma.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Bizagwira held up convoy of vehicles close to the village of Chitebeka in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Bizagwira held up convoy of vehicles close to the village of Chitebeka in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole $4,670 and injured two men trying to escape.

title/0/en: The Congolese police cracked down on demonstrations in Goma aimed at demanding the holding of elections.
notes/en: The Congolese police cracked down on demonstrations in Goma aimed at demanding the holding of elections. The repression took place mainly in the neighborhoods of Majengo, Ndosho and Katindo. During the repression, policemen shot and killed two men aged 21 and 19, and two boys aged 13 and 16. They also injured thirteen men and nine boys. Demonstrators killed a policeman by stoning.

title/0/en: The police cracked down on demonstrations in Nyiragongo locality, in the territory of the same name.
notes/en: The police cracked down on demonstrations in Nyiragongo locality, in the territory of the same name.  Police shot and wounded two men aged 19 and 21 years old and a 16-year-old girl.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as FDLR-FOCA combatants shot at a passenger vehicle close to Seta in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Armed men identified as FDLR-FOCA combatants shot at a passenger vehicle close to Seta in Rutshuru territory. The assailants wounded several men.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Muhanga in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Muhanga in Lubero territory. Seven NDC Guidon  and five Mai-Mai Mazembe were killed. Five NDC Guidon were injured. The Mai-Mai Mazembe seized three weapons belonging to the NDC Guidon.

title/0/en: The coalition of FDLR-FOCA and Nyatura Kasongo attacked the NDC Guidon in the village of Ihula in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The coalition of FDLR-FOCA and Nyatura Kasongo attacked the NDC Guidon in the village of Ihula in Walikale territory. One man was killed and a woman was injured during the attack. The assailants looted the village.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto raided the village of Zwiza in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto raided the village of Zwiza in Shabunda territory. The assailants raped three women aged 26, 23 and 18 years old and two girls aged 16 and 13. They injured a 58-year-old man with a crude weapon and stole 270,000 Congolese francs.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as FDLR-FOCA combatants held up a motorcycle transporting three men close to Nyabirehe in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Armed men identified as FDLR-FOCA combatants held up a motorcycle transporting three men close to Nyabirehe in Rutshuru territory. The assailants shot and killed a 57-year-old man. They also looted money and goods.

title/0/en: Four armed men identified as Mai-Mai Charles kidnapped seven men walking to their field in the village of Domaine in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Four armed men identified as Mai-Mai Charles kidnapped seven men walking to their field in the village of Domaine in Rutshuru territory. The assailants shot and wounded one of the hostages who managed to escape. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $6,000.

title/0/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants attacked the four Mai-Mai Charles who had kidnapped seven men in the village of Domaine in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants attacked the four Mai-Mai Charles who had kidnapped seven men in the village of Domaine in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: The hostages kidnapped by the Mai-Mai Charles managed to escape during a clash with FDLR-FOCA combatants close to the village of Domaine in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The hostages kidnapped by the Mai-Mai Charles managed to escape during a clash with FDLR-FOCA combatants close to the village of Domaine in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon kidnapped six men in Mbuhi, Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon kidnapped six men in Mbuhi, Walikale territory. The kidnappers demanded an unknown ransom. The kidnappers released the hostages after a ransom of $1,000 was paid.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mulumba attacked the FARDC position in Akyamba, Mwenga territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mulumba attacked the FARDC position in Akyamba, Mwenga territory. The assailants stole the FARDC's military equipment. Ngumino combatants subsequently came to chase away the Mai-Mai Mulumba.

title/0/en: he Mai-Mai Lopards attacked the FARDC position in the village of Bulambo, Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Lopards attacked the FARDC position in the village of Bulambo, Beni territory. One Mai-Mai was killed, one FARDC and one civilian were injured with a crude weapon.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Butachibera who were raiding the village of Mihaha in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Butachibera who were raiding the village of Mihaha in Kalehe territory. During the clash a man, two women and three boys were shot and wounded. The assailants kidnapped two men and two boys and demanded a ransom of $1,000. The FARDC burned down seventeen houses belonging to civilians suspected to be close to the assailants.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons and firearms killed two men with a crude weapon in Mageria in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons and firearms killed two men with a crude weapon in Mageria in Lubero territory. The assailants were intervening in a land conflict, in which one of the sides had burned down three houses and the other side had killed a man. The assailants also burned down three houses.

title/0/en: Heavily armed men attacked the FARDC position on Mbau-Kamango road close to Mamundioma in Beni territory.
notes/en: Heavily armed ADF, possibly in collaboration with another armed group, attacked the FARDC position on Mbau-Kamango road close to Mamundioma in Beni territory. Two FARDC soldiers were killed and three were injured.

title/0/en: Two gunmen identified as FARDC broke into a house in Kasalama, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Two gunmen identified as FARDC broke into a house in Kasalama, Rutshuru territory. The FARDC shot and killed a 53-year-old man.

title/0/en: Two armed men raided an Airtel antenna station in Kalungu village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Two armed men raided an Airtel antenna station in Kalungu village in Kalehe territory. The attackers stole a solar panel.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as FDLR-FOCA combatants kidnapped a 55-year-old man in Rubare in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Armed men identified as FDLR-FOCA combatants kidnapped a 55-year-old man in Rubare in Rutshuru territory. The amount of the ransom demanded was not disclosed.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin held up a convoy of civilian vehicles close to the village of Katatwa, Walikale territory.
notes/en: Armed men identified as Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin held up a convoy of civilian vehicles close to the village of Katatwa, Walikale territory. The assailants looted money and goods. They shot and wounded a woman and a man trying to escape. They also kidnapped five men and demanded a ransom of $2,250.
FDLR-FOCA combatants kidnapped a 45-year-old man and a woman close to Kapopi in Rutshuru territory. The amount of the ransom demanded was not disclosed.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the NDC Sheka in the village of Mironge in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the NDC Sheka in the village of Mironge in Walikale territory. The NDC Sheka repelled the NDC Guidon.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men who kidnapped a 22-year-old man in Tanda in Rutchuru territory released the hostage after a ransom of $4,000 was paid.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men who kidnapped a 22-year-old man in Tanda in Rutchuru territory released the hostage after a ransom of $4,000 was paid.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon shot and killed four civilians in Mwekwe in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon shot and killed four civilians in Mwekwe in Lubero territory. All the vicitms were cowherds.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon who had kidnapped six men in Mwekwe in Lubero territory released one of the hostages after a ransom was paid.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon who had kidnapped six men in Mwekwe in Lubero territory released one of the hostages after a ransom was paid. The amount paid was not revealed.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon tortured and wounded with a crude weapon a 34-year-old man running away with the money he got on behalf of the armed group.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon tortured and wounded with a crude weapon a 34-year-old man running away with the money he got on behalf of the armed group. The NDC Guidon cut the victim's left ear.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Boikene neighbourhood in Beni.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Boikene neighbourhood in Beni. The FARDC repelled them. Three FARDC and two civilians were killed during the attack, two civilians were injured. The assailants stole seven goats.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo held up civilians going to Bunyakiri market in Kahuzi Biega park at the level of Nguliro hill in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo held up civilians going to Bunyakiri market in Kahuzi Biega park at the level of Nguliro hill in Kalehe territory. The assailants injured with a crude weapon seven men. They raped women who were going to the market. They also looted people's money and goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified men carrying crude weapons and firearms broke into Nyakunde hospital in Mambango neighbourhood in Beni during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified men carrying crude weapons and firearms broke into Nyakunde hospital in Mambango neighbourhood in Beni during the night. The assailants looted money, medicines, telephones and a computer.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke through a civilian's house in Maboya in Beni territory with a 4x4 Jeep.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke through a civilian's house in Maboya in Beni territory with a 4x4 Jeep. They abducted a man and injured another man who was trying to alert the neighbours.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboi Hamakombo raided the village of Hungu in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboi Hamakombo raided the village of Hungu in Kalehe territory. The assailants looted the village and burned down seventeen houses.
