They forced seven men and four boys to join their armed group. They also kidnapped six women and four minor girls, and demanded a ransom of $3,500.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Mwekwe in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Mwekwe in Lubero territory. Three Mai-Mai Mazembe were killed during the attack, four civilians were killed with a crude weapon and five were injured. The NDC Guidon burned down the Mai-Mai Mazembe camp and stole 30 cows from farms in Pitakongo.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon kidnapped six men in Mwekwe in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon kidnapped six men in Mwekwe in Lubero territory. The ransom amount was not revealed. The kidnappers suspected the hostages to be Mai-Mai Mazembe.

title/0/en: Unidentified men carrying crude weapons stole $2,500 and jewelry belonging to a 39-year-old woman on Avenue de la Mission in Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified men carrying crude weapons stole $2,500 and jewelry belonging to a 39-year-old woman on Avenue de la Mission in Goma.

title/0/en: A policeman accidentally shot a bullet as he wanted to take it out of his AK47 weapon.
notes/en: A policeman accidentally shot a bullet as he wanted to take it out of his AK47 weapon. The bullet reached a 20-year-old woman who died on the spot.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Malaika raided a mining site in Kapilapila in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Malaika raided a mining site in Kapilapila in Shabunda territory. The assailants stole eight goats, ten grams of gold and other goods.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe close to Kibirizi in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe close to Kibirizi in Rutshuru territory. One FARDC died during the attack.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Donat/Ngandu stole 520,000 Congolese francs and two cows in Nyombe in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Donat/Ngandu stole 520,000 Congolese francs and two cows in Nyombe in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: The FARDC ambushed the Raia Mutomboki Kabanzi in Chiriba in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The FARDC ambushed the Raia Mutomboki Kabanzi in Chiriba in Kalehe territory. One Raia Mutomboki Kabanzi and two FARDC were injured. The FARDC burned down eleven houses. The assailants kidnapped four men and two boys. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of 1,200,000 Congolese francs and six goats to release the hostages. The FARDC and the Raia Mutomboi Kabanzi looted the population.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as Raia Mutomboki Shabani raided the village of Misheshe in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Armed men identified as Raia Mutomboki Shabani raided the village of Misheshe in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants raped a 17-year-old girl. They shot and wounded a man trying to escape with his money. They also kidnapped a woman and the girl they had raped and demanded a ransom of $600. Before leaving the assailants looted money and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kishinji in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kishinji in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants stole $300, an oil tank, a beans bag, a suitcase full of clothes and other goods.

title/0/en: Suspected Mai-Mai Charles  militias' kidnapped 16 fishermen from Nyakakoma village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Charles kidnapped 16 fishermen from Nyakakoma village, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kinyamahiri in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kinyamahiri in Lubero territory. The assailants shot and killed a man.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe who had kidnapped two men in Lubango released the second hostage after a ransom of $150 was paid.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe who had kidnapped two men in Lubango released the second hostage after a ransom of $150 was paid.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe killed with a machete a man who was hospitalized at Kitsombiro hospital in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe killed with a machete a man who was hospitalized at Kitsombiro hospital in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: Three unidentified men carrying crude weapons and firearms raided the village of Mayigone in Beni territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified men carrying crude weapons and firearms raided the village of Mayigone in Beni territory. The assailants killed two men and a woman with a crude weapon.

title/0/en: Armed men attacked Ngumino combatants in Mutara in Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Armed men attacked Ngumino combatants in Mutara in Mwenga territory. One of the unidentified assailants was injured. The assailants looted the civilians in Mutara market.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Butachibera held up passangers close to Ebisha in Kalehe territory. The assailants shot and wounded two men trying to escape.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Butachibera held up passangers close to Ebisha in Kalehe territory. The assailants shot and wounded two men trying to escape. They looted money and goods. The assailants also kidnapped seven men and demanded a ransom of $2,100.

title/0/en: Teachers and students of Kabanda Institute in Chondo in Kalehe territory demonstrated against the arrest of one of the institute's teachers perpetrated by the police.
notes/en: Teachers and students of Kabanda Institute in Chondo in Kalehe territory demonstrated against the arrest of one of the institute's teachers perpetrated by the police. A fight burst out between the demonstrators and the police. The demonstrators threw stones at the policemen and two of them were injured. The policemen wounded a 16-year-old boy and a 15-year-old girl.

title/0/en: FDLR rebels clashed with a coalition of Mai-Mai Mazembe and Moto na Moto militias in Kayna village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR (unknown faction) clashed with a coalition of suspected Mai-Mai Mazembe and Moto na Moto militias at PNVi general area in Kayna village located 65 km northwest of Rutshuru.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Kalundu neighbourhood in Uvira.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Kalundu neighbourhood in Uvira. The assailants shot and killed a 69-year-old woman.

title/0/en: CNRD combatants attacked the APCLS in Ngingwe in Masisi territory.
notes/en: CNRD combatants attacked the APCLS in Ngingwe in Masisi territory. The CNRD combatants burned dowm several huses.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Love attacked the police station in Kibindu in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Love attacked the police station in Kibindu in Rutshuru territory. The assailants killed a policeman and seized his weapon and uniform.

title/0/en: Four unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kalundu neighbourhood in Uvira.
notes/en: Four unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kalundu neighbourhood in Uvira. The assailants shot and killed a 70-year-old woman. During their escape they stole a man's telephone.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe who had kidnapped two men in Lubango released the hostages after a ransom of $250 was paid.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe who had kidnapped two men in Lubango released the hostages after a ransom of $250 was paid.

title/0/en: FARDC troops clashed with Raia Mutomboki Sisawa militia group at Kachungu village, Shabunda territory.
notes/en: FARDC troops clashed with Raia Mutomboki Sisawa at Kachungu village situated 90 km North of Shabunda centre. The FARDC troops reportedly captured one of the chiefs of the Raia Mutomboki Sisawa militia group.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the Mai-Mai Lopards/Muthundo position in Buhambya in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the Mai-Mai Lopards/Muthundo position in Buhambya in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Militia group reportedly robbed livestock, 800 USD and abducted four civilians to unknown place at Karembu village within Walungu territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Maheshe reportedly robbed livestock, $800 and abducted four civilians at Karembu village, Walungu territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men stole sixteen fishermen's nets on Kivu Lake close to Munanira in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men stole sixteen fishermen's nets on Kivu Lake close to Munanira in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a 22-year-old man in Tanda in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a 22-year-old man in Tanda in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded $8,000 in ransom. The kidnappers released the hostage after a ransom of $4000 was paid.

title/0/en: Three unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Kakombe neighbourhood in Uvira rural commune.
notes/en: Three unidentified gunmen broke into a house in Kakombe neighbourhood in Uvira rural commune. The assailants shot and killed a 66-year-old woman.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed an FARDC major in Kituva in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed an FARDC major in Kituva in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe kidnapped two men in Lubango in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe kidnapped two men in Lubango in Lubero territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $500. The kidnappers released the first hostage on 10/22/2017 after a ransom of $250 was paid. They also released the second hostage on 10/24/2017 after a ransom of $250 was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed two policemen starting their guard shift at Kamandi police station in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed two policemen starting their guard shift at Kamandi police station in Lubero territory. The assailants seized the victims' weapons.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Lopards/Muthumo abducted three men aged 54, 36, 23 years old and a 15-year-old by in Kasinga in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Lopards/Muthumo abducted three men aged 54, 36, 23 years old and a 15-year-old by in Kasinga in Beni territory. The assailants forced the victims to join their armed group.

title/0/en: Armed men shot and killed a policeman assigned to the night guard at the police station in Mabalako, Beni territory.
notes/en: Armed men shot and killed a policeman assigned to the night guard at the police station in Mabalako, Beni territory. The assailants seized the policeman's AK47.

title/0/en: Four armed men waering FARDC uniforms broke into a house in Kitalaga in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Four armed men waering FARDC uniforms broke into a house in Kitalaga in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole 200,000 Congolese francs, a mattress and other goods.

title/0/en: The FARDC ambushed the Mai-Mai Mazembe close to Kilama in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC ambushed the Mai-Mai Mazembe close to Kilama in Rutshuru territory. Four Mai-Mai Mazembe were killed and eight were captured. The FARDC seized two AK47 weapons.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 47-year-old man close to the village of Kakamba in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen kidnapped a 47-year-old man close to the village of Kakamba in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $5,000.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as FNL-Nzabampema combatants raped two women and three girls close to Butambara in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Armed men identified as FNL-Nzabampema combatants raped two women and three girls close to Butambara in Uvira territory. The assailants shot and wounded three men and stole 12,000 Congolese francs.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Kasongo attacked the FARDC position in Mweso in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Kasongo attacked the FARDC position in Mweso in Masisi territory. One Nyatura Kasongo died and one was injured.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a 38-year-old woman with a machete in Bugumba 2 in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a 38-year-old woman with a machete in Bugumba 2 in Nyiragongo territory.

title/0/en: FARDC troops clashed with unidentified armed group in Sange village, Uvira territory.
notes/en: FARDC troops reportedly clashed with an unidentified armed group in Sange village located 33 km North of Uvira town during an armed robbery attempt.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Malaika attacked the FARDC in Mulongo in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Malaika attacked the FARDC in Mulongo in Shabunda territory. The assailants killed five FARDC soldiers and thirteen civilians including twelve students.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as FNL-Nzabampema combatants raided the village of Kadjoro in Uvira territory during the night.
notes/en: Armed men identified as FNL-Nzabampema combatants raided the village of Kadjoro in Uvira territory during the night. The assailants looted money, telephones, goats, chickens, cassava flour and other goods.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo combatants raided the village of Miowe in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo combatants raided the village of Miowe in Kalehe territory. The assailants shot and wounded two men. They looted goats and chickens. They also abducted three women for sexual exploitation.

title/0/en: FARDC troops clashed with unideintified armed group in Rushima village, Uvira territory.
notes/en: FARDC troops reportedly clashed with unidentified armed group in Rushima, 53 km north of Uvira town. The armed group allegedly blocked the national road #5 with fallen trees and rocks to help them easily intercept moving vehicles along the road.

title/0/en: APCLS combatants attacked several times the FARDC position in Kitchanga in Masis territory.
notes/en: APCLS combatants attacked several times the FARDC position in Kitchanga in Masis territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 73-year-old man in Rwenena 1 in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 73-year-old man in Rwenena 1 in Uvira territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $500.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Minova in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Minova in Kalehe territory. The assailants shot and killed a 40-year-old man.

title/0/en: An armed man raided the village of Murambi in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An armed man raided the village of Murambi in Kalehe territory. The assailant shot and wouded an FARDC soldier. The soldier opened fire and killed the attacker.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a 26-year-old man on the Mushaki-Sake road in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a 26-year-old man on the Mushaki-Sake road in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: The FARDC patrolling the Lake Kivu attacked armed men trying to loot fishermen close to Muhanga in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The FARDC patrolling the Lake Kivu attacked armed men trying to loot fishermen close to Muhanga in Kalehe territory. The FARDC killed four assailants.

title/0/en: Four unidentified armed men abducted a 51-year-old man close to the village of Rwenena 1 in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified armed men abducted a 51-year-old man close to the village of Rwenena 1 in Uvira territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified men attacked the FARDC who wanted to enter a bar while patrolling Mabughu village in Beni territory during the day.
notes/en: Unidentified men attacked the FARDC who wanted to enter a bar while patrolling Mabughu village in Beni territory during the day. As they ran away, the FARDC shot and wounded one of the assailants.

title/0/en: An armed man shot and wounded a 27-year-old man while he was trying to pay back a debt to the assailant in Mutoberwa in Walikale territory.
notes/en: An armed man shot and wounded a 27-year-old man while he was trying to pay back a debt to the assailant in Mutoberwa in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed an FARDC convoy on the Mbau-Kamango road at the level of Ntoi in Beni territory.
notes/en: ADF ambushed an FARDC convoy on the Mbau-Kamango road at the level of Ntoi in Beni territory. One FARDC died and five were injured in the ambush. One FARDC vehicle was hit by a rocket and burned down.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Kombi combatants seized the weapon of an FARDC soldier standing guard at the Busendo check point in Beni territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Kombi combatants seized the weapon of an FARDC soldier standing guard at the Busendo check point in Beni territory. The assailants shot and wounded the FARDC soldier.

title/0/en: Combatants identified as Mai-Mai Ebu Ela attacked the FARDC position in Kananda in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Combatants identified as Mai-Mai Ebu Ela attacked the FARDC position in Kananda in Fizi territory. One FARDC was killed. The assailants seized sixteen weapons, boxes of ammunition and uniforms.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Kalume attacked the FARDC in Loa Numbi in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Kalume attacked the FARDC in Loa Numbi in Kalehe territory. One child was shot and wounded during the clash.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided the village of Bwengeya in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided the village of Bwengeya in Kalehe territory. The assailants looted the village. They raped a woman and shot her and wounded her.

title/0/en: The APCLS ambushed the military vehicle of the 3411th regiment in Kiusha, in the Mwesso-Kitshanga axis.
notes/en: The APCLS ambushed the military vehicle of the 3411th regiment in Kiusha, on the Mweso-Kitchanga road. Local police reported two combatants killed.

title/0/en: The APCLS rebels capture the city of Carton, in the Mwesso-Kitshanga axis, Rutshuru territory..
notes/en: The APCLS took control of the village of Carton, on the Mweso-Kitchanga road, Rutshuru territory..

title/0/en: The FDLR-FOCA combatants who had kidnapped two women and eight men in Virunga park close to Ngerenge in Rutshuru territory released the hostages after a ransom of $1,500 was paid.
notes/en: The FDLR-FOCA combatants who had kidnapped two women and eight men in Virunga park close to Ngerenge in Rutshuru territory released the hostages after a ransom of $1,500 was paid.

title/0/en: ADF attacked the FARDC in Kinziki on Mbau-Kamango road in Beni territory.
notes/en: ADF attacked the FARDC in Kinziki on Mbau-Kamango road in Beni territory. The assailants were heading to the south of Beni territory.

title/0/en: Suspected FDLR rebels allegedly kidnapped a local man from his farm in Ruti village,Rutshuru territory
notes/en: The FDLR allegedly kidnapped a local man from his farm in Ruti, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed three men close to Lungufa in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen shot and killed three men close to Lungufa in Kalehe territory. The assailants seized money and gold belonging to the victims.

title/0/en: Nyatura Love combatants raided the village of Kikuku in Rutshuru territory while an FARDC and MONUSCO delegation was evaluating the damages incurred during the 10/16/2017 raid.
notes/en: Nyatura Love combatants raided the village of Kikuku in Rutshuru territory while an FARDC and MONUSCO delegation was evaluating the damages incurred during the 10/16/2017 raid. At the same time the Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the Nyatura Love in the village. The FARDC and MONUSCO intervened to repell the two armed groups. The Nyatura Love shot and killed a 19-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 7-year-old boy and a 5-year-old girl walking to school in the Kyeshero neighbourhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 7-year-old boy and a 5-year-old girl walking to school in the Kyeshero neighbourhood of Goma. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $800.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men in Murambi in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men in Murambi in Kalehe territory. One ANR agent died and one assailant was captured.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe raided the village of Kikuku in Rutshuru territory during the night.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe raided the village of Kikuku in Rutshuru territory during the night. The assailants burned down eighteen houses belonging to the Hutu community.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Donat/Ngandu killed a 20-year-old man with a crude weapon close to Kingele in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Donat/Ngandu killed a 20-year-old man with a crude weapon close to Kingele in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants held up a vehicle in the Virunga park close to Ngerenge in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants held up a vehicle in the Virunga park close to Ngerenge in Rutshuru territory. The assailants kidnapped two women and eight men. They raped two women and injured eight men. The kidnappers released the hostages after a ransom on $1,500 was paid.

title/0/en: Nyatura Love combatants raided the village of Kishishe in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Nyatura Love combatants raided the village of Kishishe in Rutshuru territory. The assailants injured a man with a crude weapon and burned three houses down.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided the village of Nyamirera in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided the village of Nyamirera in Kalehe territory. The assailants shot and wounded two men. They looted goats and other goods. The assailants also kidnapped four men and demanded a ransom of $1,600.

title/0/en: The police stiffled a peaceful march of the meeting of political and social forces for change before it began in Goma.
notes/en: The police repressed a peaceful march of opposition parties before it began in Goma. Eight members were arrested and subsequently released.

title/0/en: Unidentified men carrying crude weapons and firearms abducted fifteen men and three women in Kikyo, Kanyihunga and Kasithu in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men carrying crude weapons and firearms abducted fifteen men and three women in Kikyo, Kanyihunga and Kasithu in Beni territory. The assailants were motivated by a land conflict in these villages.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked a vehicle transporting civilians and soldiers close to Katolo in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked a vehicle transporting civilians and soldiers close to Katolo in Rutshuru territory. Three FARDC were killed in the attack and one was injured. Three women and one boy were killed.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kabanzi attacked unidentified armed men in Chisheke in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kabanzi attacked unidentified armed men in Chisheke in Kalehe territory. As a result of the clash one Raia Mutomboki Kabanzi died and one was injured, two unidentified armed men were killed, three were injured and three captured. The Raia Mutomboki Kabanzi looted the population and burned down eleven houses.

title/0/en: The attackers who had kidnapped a 65-year-old man on 10/13/2017 in a mining site close to Loa Numbi released the hostage after a ransom of $600 was paid.
notes/en: The attackers who had kidnapped a 65-year-old man on 10/13/2017 in a mining site close to Loa Numbi released the hostage after a ransom of $600 was paid.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as APCLS combatants broke into a house in Kitchanga in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Armed men identified as APCLS combatants broke into a house in Kitchanga in Masisi territory. The assailants shot and killed a man.

title/0/en: Unidentified men carrying firearms broke into the PNC enclosure in Sange.
notes/en: Unidentified men carrying firearms broke into the PNC enclosure in Sange. The assailants shot and killed one policeman and seized his weapon.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Malaika attacked an FARDC patrol in the village of Mutumbi in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Malaika attacked an FARDC patrol in the village of Mutumbi in Shabunda territory. Two Raia Mutomboki Malaika were killed during the clash. The FARDC seized an AK47.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided the village of Mapimo in Shabunda territory during the night of 14 to 15 October 2017.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided the village of Mapimo in Shabunda territory during the night of 14 to 15 October 2017. The assailants abducted five men and stole a bicycle, six goats and twelve chickens.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mwenyemali while the latter were looting cows in the village of Nyamugali, Uvira territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mwenyemali while the latter were looting cows in the village of Nyamugali, Uvira territory. One Mai-Mai Mwenyemali was killed during the clash and one was captured.

title/0/en: An FARDC shot and wounded a 48-year-old man in Nyangi in Fizi territory.
notes/en: An FARDC shot and wounded a 48-year-old man in Nyangi in Fizi territory. The victim did not hand over the money the FARDC soldier wanted to extort from him.

title/0/en: Three unidentified armed men broke into an Airtel shop in Minova, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified armed men broke into an Airtel shop in Minova, Kalehe territory. These assailants shot and wounded a 55-year-old moneychanger and looted 200,000 Congolese francs. The victim was brought to Bukavu by the ICRC and hospitalized.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants attacked the FARDC position in Alimbongo, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants attacked the FARDC position in Alimbongo, Lubero territory. Two civilians, five Mai-Mai Mazembe and an unknown number of FARDC were killed.

title/0/en: Unidentified men carrying firearms broke into a house in Kaguri, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men carrying firearms broke into a house in Kaguri, Kalehe territory. The assailants shot and killed a 66-year-old man.

title/0/en: Unidentified men carrying firearms kidnapped a 65-year-old man at a mining site close to Loa Numbi, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men carrying firearms kidnapped a 65-year-old man at a mining site close to Loa Numbi, Kalehe territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $600. The kidnappers released the hostage after the $600 ransom was paid.

title/0/en: Demonstrators took the streets in Goma town protesting against the raising of school fees.
notes/en: Protesters took the streets in Goma on 13th October 2017 to protest against the raising of school fees, but the protest was broken up by the police. The police attacked protesters, severely injuring two of them, and hurting others. The police used tear gas to disperse the crowd.

title/0/en: Six Mai-Mai Nzirunga, armed with crude weapons and fire arms, abducted the head of the ANR office in Lisasa.
notes/en: Six Mai-Mai Nzirunga, armed with crude weapons and fire arms, abducted the head of the ANR office in Lisasa. The assailants did not ask for a ransom. The reason of the adbduction remains unknown.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men trying to loot a house in the Kyeshero neighborood of Goma.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men trying to loot a house in the Kyeshero neighborood of Goma. One FARDC soldier was injured during the clash.

title/0/en: Two men identified as FARDC soldiers broke into a house in the village of Madjengo, Uvira territory.
notes/en: Two men identified as FARDC soldiers broke into a house in the village of Madjengo, Uvira territory. The two men stole 250,000 Congolese francs and two telephones.

title/0/en: Presumed Mai-Mai Ebu Ela militias attacked FARDC troops position in Abala village, Fizi territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Ebu Ela reportedly attacked FARDC troops position in Abala village located 200 km southwest of Uvira town.

title/0/en: Suspected RM Mabala militias shot and killed a FARDC soldier in the Bakisi village:
notes/en: Suspected Raia Mutomboki Mabala militias shot and killed an FARDC soldier in Bakisi village located approximately 3 km north of Chez Evary, Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: Suspected CNRD and Nyatura Kasongo militia groups clashed in Bokumba village.
notes/en: Suspected CNRD and Nyatura Kasongo reportedly clashed in Bokumba village, Masisi territory. The situation forced many civilians to flee towards Kirumba village.

title/0/en: FARDC troops reportedly clashed with Mai-Mai coalition in Kasandjala village.
notes/en: FARDC troops reportedly clashed with a Mai-Mai coalition in Kasandjala village, 116 km south of Uvira town.

title/0/en: FARDC troops reportedly clashed with Mai-Mai coalition in Mukera village, Fizi territory.
notes/en: FARDC troops reportedly clashed with a Mai-Mai coalition in Mukera village located 140 Km south west of Uvira town. At least, two FARDC soldiers, four Mai-Mai militias were killed and seven other Mai-Mai captured by the FARDC troops.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men, carrying crude weapons and light firearms, raided the households in the Kyaghala neighborhood, on the east side of Butembo town.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men, carrying crude weapons and light firearms, raided the households in the Kyaghala neighborhood, on the east side of Butembo town. They injured two officials who work in the mayor's office and looted goods.

title/0/en: Three men carrying firearms broke into a farm in Minova in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Three men carrying firearms broke into a farm in Minova in Kalehe territory. The assailants stole a goat, mattresses, bedding and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified men abducted two men aged 37 and 34 in Mugero in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men abducted two men aged 37 and 34 in Mugero in Uvira territory. The kidnappers did not communicate the reason for the abduction.

title/0/en: Two unidentified men carrying firearms broke into a house in Kizimba in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Two unidentified men carrying firearms broke into a house in Kizimba in Rutshuru territory. The assailants looted money and telephones of traders coming from Goma.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela attacked the FARDC position in Mukele in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Ebu Ela attacked the FARDC position in Mukele in Fizi territory. Two FARDC were injured during the clash. The assailants looted uniforms, weapons and ammunitions from the FARDC warehouse. They also looted money and other goods.

title/0/en: FARDC troops clashed with coalitions of armed groups in three villages, Fizi territory.
notes/en: FARDC troops reportedly clashed with a coalition of armed groups in Mukera, around 150 km southwest of Uvira town. At the same time, another coalition of armed groups clashed with FARDC troops in Kikonde.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon kidnapped a 36-year-old man in Kasugho in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon kidnapped a 36-year-old man in Kasugho in Lubero territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $500. They accused the hostage of collaborating with the Mai-Mai Mazembe.

title/0/en: A coalition of FDLR-FOCA and Nyatura Kasongo combatants raided the village of Sun City in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: A coalition of FDLR-FOCA and Nyatura Kasongo combatants raided the village of Sun City in Rutshuru territory. The assailants shot and killed a policeman, an ANR agent and five men. They shot and wounded two women and a man. They also stole 100 cows.

title/0/en: The FARDC recovered the city of Mukeba, in Fizi, from the Mayi Mayi Yakutumba
notes/en: The FARDC took back control over Mukeba village from the Mai-Mai Yakutumba, pushing the armed group into the woods. One of the soldiers was captured by the militia.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai militia of NDC/Renov killed Five people at Kabirangiriro village in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The NDC-R killed five people at Kabirangiriro village in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: NDC-R militias detained a local humanitarian actor representing the "Programme d'Assistance Multisectoriel" (PASMU) and accused him of supporting MM Mazembe militias faction at Kasugho village, Lubero territory.
notes/en: NDC-R militias detained a local humanitarian official representing the "Programme d'Assistance Multisectoriel" (PASMU) in Kasugho village, Lubero territory. They accused him of supporting the Mai-Mai Mazembe. The armed group demanded $500 in ransom.

title/0/en: FDLR-RUD combatants raided the village of Kisorora in Rutshuru territory during the night.
notes/en: FDLR-RUD combatants raided the village of Kisorora in Rutshuru territory during the night. The assailants looted money from three houses and kidnapped a 19-year-old man. They demanded $5,000 in ransom.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as FARDC soldiers raided the village of Kashenda, Masisi territory.
notes/en: Armed men identified as FARDC soldiers raided the village of Kashenda, Masisi territory. The FARDC looted civilians' belongings and shot and wounded three men.

title/0/en: An FARDC shot a man in the village of Shasha, Masisi territory.
notes/en: An FARDC shot a man in the village of Shasha, Masisi territory. The victim died on the spot.

title/0/en: FARDC troops clashed with coalition of armed groups in Kasandjala village, in Fizi territory.
notes/en: FARDC troops reportedly clashed with a coalition of armed groups in Kasandjala and Matete villages. No casualties were reported.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe released the man they had kidnapped on 27 September 2017 in Kitsombiro, Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe released the man they had kidnapped on 27 September 2017 in Kitsombiro, Lubero territory. The hostage's family paid a ransom of $5,500 to obtain the victim's release.

title/0/en: FDLR combatants broke into six houses in Nyarukwangara in Rutshuru territory during the night.
notes/en: FDLR combatants broke into six houses in Nyarukwangara in Rutshuru territory during the night. The assailants looted money, 26 goats, telephones and other goods.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mungoro shot and killed a woman they accused of being a witch in Lumenje in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Mungoro shot and killed a woman they accused of being a witch in Lumenje in Kalehe territory. They also shot and wounded a man who wanted to rescue his wife, the alleged witch.

title/0/en: FARDC troops and alleged ADF rebel fighters clashed at PK36 along Mbau-Kamango road in Beni territory
notes/en: FARDC troops and alleged ADF rebel fighters clashed at PK36 along Mbau-Kamango road in Beni territory. At least two FARDC soldiers were killed, one injured and three others abducted.

title/0/en: Suspected MM Mazembe killed at least 9 people in the villages of Butsiri and Mirangi, in Kanyabayonga.
notes/en: Suspected Mai-Mai Mazembe killed at least 9 people in the villages of Butsiri and Mirangi, in Kanyabayonga.

title/0/en: Three FARDC broke into a health center in Kipese in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Three FARDC broke into a health center in Kipese in Lubero territory. The soldiers looted money, telephones and other goods. They then went to the Catholic Church, where they shot three civilians. One man died and a man and a woman were wounded.

title/0/en: CNRD militias clashed with Nyatura/Kasongo militia group at Goriba area in Masisi territory
notes/en: The CNRD clashed with the Nyatura Kasongo militia group at Goriba in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: A policeman shot a 16-year-old boy in Sake, Masisi territory. The victim died on the spot.
notes/en: A policeman shot a 16-year-old boy in Sake, Masisi territory. The victim died on the spot.

title/0/en: FARDC troops repordly attacked a coalition of armed groups at Burembo village, Fizi territory.
notes/en: FARDC troops reportedly attacked a coalition of armed groups in Burembo village, Fizi territory. No casualties were reported.

title/0/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants shot and killed a woman and a man who were bringing the ransom that had been demanded for the release of two hostages kidnapped on 06/10/2017 in Kishishe in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants shot and killed a woman and a man who were bringing the ransom that had been demanded for the release of two hostages kidnapped on 06/10/2017 in Kishishe in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: FARDC troops clashed with Mai-Mai Ebu Ela militias at Lumanya village in Fizi territory
notes/en: FARDC troops clashed with Mai-Mai Ebu Ela militias at Lumanya village in Fizi territory on 9 October 2017.

title/0/en: Four Mai-Mai militias killed in a clash between FARDC and Mai-Mai Mazembe at Kauli village in Lubero territory
notes/en: Four Mai-Mai combatants were killed in a clash between the FARDC and the Mai-Mai Mazembe at Kauli village in Lubero territory.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked a MONUSCO base in Mamundioma, in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked a MONUSCO base in Mamundioma, in Beni territory. There were at least two deaths among the peacekeepers.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons and firearms broke into a house in Kyanguwe in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons and firearms broke into a house in Kyanguwe in Lubero territory. The assailants abducted a man and killed him with a machete not far from his home.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai fighters allegedly attacked a PNC position at Mighobwe village in Lubero territory
notes/en: Mai-Mai fighters allegedly attacked police station at Mighobwe village in Lubero territory on 8 October 2017, around 19:30 hours. FARDC troops intervened and repelled the attack. No casualty was recorded.

title/0/en: A coalition of Armed groups reportedly attacked FARDC position at Namatungulu village in Fizi territory
notes/en: A coalition of armed groups reportedly attacked the FARDC position at Namatungulu village in Fizi territory on 8 October 2017, around 17:00 hours.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kilalo in the villge of Masereka in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kilalo in the villge of Masereka in Lubero territory. One Mai-Mai Kilalo died and one was injured during the attack.

title/0/en: The FARDC shot around at random in Kabenga, Kalehe territory after the Raia Mutomboki Shukuru captured two FARDC and seized their weapons.
notes/en: The FARDC shot around at random in Kabenga, Kalehe territory after the Raia Mutomboki Shukuru captured two FARDC and seized their weapons. The FARDC wounded a woman and a 15-year-old boy.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru captured two FARDC at a check point set up in the village of Kabenga in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru captured two FARDC at a check point set up in the village of Kabenga in Kalehe territory. The Raia Mutomboki stole their two weapons.

title/0/en: Two armed men wearing police uniforms broke into a house in Kasabinyole neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: Two armed men wearing police uniforms broke into a house in Kasabinyole neighborhood of Beni. The assailants stole a TV and kitchen utensils.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika attacked the FARDC forces at Nepanepa and Matala in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika attacked FARDC forces at Nepanepa and Matala, Shabunda territory on 8 October 2017. The fighting lasted until 10 October.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika attacked the FARDC position in Matala in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Malaika attacked the FARDC position in Matala in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a 19-year-old woman with a machete in Kashalira, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a 19-year-old woman with a machete in Kashalira, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: ADF combatants and unidentified men carrying crude weapons and firearms killed 22 men, three women and an FARDC soldier on the Mbau-Kamango road at the place called "Kilometer 40", in Beni territory.
notes/en: ADF combatants and unidentified men carrying crude weapons and firearms killed 22 men, three women and an FARDC soldier on the Mbau-Kamango road at the place called "Kilometer 40", in Beni territory. The assailants released several women so that they could relay the news of the massacre.

title/0/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants shot and wounded men and women selling embers in Rusayo in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants shot and wounded men and women selling embers in Rusayo in Nyiragongo territory.

title/0/en: CNRD militia group allegedly clashed with Nyatura/Kasongo militias at Kabukomo in Masisi terrirory.
notes/en: The CNRD allegedly clashed with Nyatura/Kasongo militias at Kabukomo, Masisi territory. No further details about the incident were provided.

title/0/en: Unidentified men carrying crude weapons and firearms attacked the FARDC and MONUSCO positions on the Mbau-Kamango road in Beni territory over a period of six days.
notes/en: ADF, possibly in collaboration with another armed group, attacked the FARDC and MONUSCO positions on the Mbau-Kamango road in Beni territory over a period of six days. An FARDC soldier died and seven were injured, two UN peacekeepers died and eighteen were wounded. One of the assailants also died.

title/0/en: ADF fighters attacked FARDC base at Madina and Canada villages in Beni territory
notes/en: Alleged ADF fighters attacked the FARDC base at Madina and Canada villages in Beni territory on 07 October 2017, around 04:00 hours.

title/0/en: An FARDC patrol shot and killed a 16-year-old boy close to a prayer hall in Bitale center, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An FARDC patrol shot and killed a 16-year-old boy close to a prayer hall in Bitale center, Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: NDC-R Mai-Mai fighters allegedly attacked a mining area at Karambi village in Lubero territory
notes/en: NDC-R fighters allegedly attacked a mining area at Karambi village in Lubero territory. NDC killed one person, robbed gold from miners and allegedly kidnapped two miners but later released them.

title/0/en: The FARDC looted Radio Moto Butembo-Beni radio station in Masereka in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC looted Radio Moto Butembo-Beni radio station in Masereka in Lubero territory. The assailants stole a radio transmitter, a mixing table, an electric converter, other radio equipment, solar panels and batteries.

title/0/en: FARDC troops clashed with an unidentified armed group attempting to rob cows at Rusabagi village in Uvira territory
notes/en: FARDC troops clashed with an unidentified armed group attempting to rob cows at Rusabagi village in Uvira territory. At least one FARDC soldier was killed and two cowherds were injured.

title/0/en: Four men carrying crude weapons broke into a house in the Kasabinyole neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: Four men carrying crude weapons broke into a house in the Kasabinyole neighborhood of Beni. The assailants stole $800, a motorcycle and a solar panel.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers raped six women at a FONER check point in Bangwe in the territory of Fizi.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers raped six women at a FONER check point in Bangwe in the territory of Fizi. Subsequently, other FARDC who came to inquire about the situation looted money, telephones and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the village of Bandari in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the village of Bandari in Uvira territory. The assailants shot and killed a 71-year-old man.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 38-year-old woman in the Kahembe neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 38-year-old woman in the Kahembe neighborhood of Goma.

title/0/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants kidnapped two men in Kishishe in the territory of Rutshuru.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants kidnapped two men in Kishishe in the territory of Rutshuru. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $6,000.

title/0/en: Armed men raided the village of Tchankindo in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Armed men raided the village of Tchankindo in Shabunda territory. The assailants looted the belongings of artisanal miners at the mining site. They also abducted two men.

title/0/en: The NDC Sheka attacked the NDC Guidon position in the village of Mirenge, Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC Sheka attacked the NDC Guidon position in the village of Mirenge, Walikale territory. Four NDC Guidon died and one was injured. The NDC Sheka seized two AK47 weapons.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the NDC Guidon in Mera in the territory of Walikale.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the NDC Guidon in Mera in the territory of Walikale. One NDC Guidon died and two were injured. The FARDC seized one of the rebels' AK47s.

title/0/en: The APCLS militias allegedly clashed with Nyatura armed group in 3 villages of Masisi territory
notes/en: APCLS clashed with the Nyatura at Bwemire, Bushanga and Malanda villages in Masisi territory. At least 5 civilians were reported killed and twenty houses were burned down.

title/0/en: Suspected Ngumino militia group attacked FARDC troops' position in Abala village in Fizi territory
notes/en: The Ngumino armed group reportedly attacked an FARDC position at Abala village in Fizi territory on 6 October 2017, around 06:00.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Vutsorovya in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Vutsorovya in Lubero territory. A man was killed and an FARDC soldier was injured. The FARDC burned the militia's camp down.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Lopards attacked the FARDC position in Kavasewa in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Lopards attacked the FARDC position in Kavasewa in Beni territory. One of the assailants and two FARDC died and one civilian was injured.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai MRC attacked the MONUSCO position in Mulo in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unkown Mai-Mai fighters attacked the MONUSCO position in Mulo in Lubero territory. During the attacks three Mai-Mai MRC died and two were injured; two UN peacekeepers were injured.

title/0/en: After clashes between ADF and the FARDC, the ADF got control of the Madina camp.
notes/en: After clashes between ADF and the FARDC, the ADF got control of the Madina camp.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Lubango in the territory of Lubero.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Lubango in the territory of Lubero. One civilian man was shot and wounded during the clash.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle transporting two passengers and the driver close to Bukombo in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a motorcycle transporting two passengers and the driver close to Bukombo in Masisi territory. The assailants looted money and other goods.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kilalo position in Mubana in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kilalo position in Mubana in Lubero territory. Three Mai-Mai died while one FARDC soldier died and three were injured and two civilians were killed. The FARDC looted solar panels and other goods.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Kalume shot and killed a member of their group as he tried to surrender to the FARDC in Numbi, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Kalume shot and killed a member of their group as he tried to surrender to the FARDC in Numbi, Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the NDC Sheka in Mutongo in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the NDC Sheka in Mutongo in Walikale territory. One NDC Sheka died during the attacks. The NDC Guidon seized an AK47 weapon and burned down the NDC Sheka camp.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Shukuru in Kamananga, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Shukuru in Kamananga, Kalehe territory. One Raia Mutomboki died and three civilians were shot and wounded. The FARDC seized a PKM weapon. The FARDC and the Raia Mutomboki looted the village.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Ndoluma in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Ndoluma in Lubero territory. Nine Mai-Mai Mazembe and two civilians died during the clash. Two FARDC were injured.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons identified as Mai-Mai Lopards/Muthundo raided the village of Kanyihunga, Beni territory, during the night.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons identified as Mai-Mai Lopards/Muthundo raided the village of Kanyihunga, Beni territory, during the night. The assailants abducted a 33-year-old man and a 36-year-old woman. The kidnappers did not demand any ransom.

title/0/en: FARDC troops clashed with Mai-Mai Malaika Milititias South of Kilembwe village in Fizi territory
notes/en: FARDC troops clashed with Mai-Mai Malaika 10 km south of Kilembwe village, Fizi territory between 00:30 and 11:00.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers stole two pigs, twelve motorcycles and other goods in Mubana in Lubero territory.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers stole two pigs, twelve motorcycles and other goods in Mubana in Lubero territory. They also shot and killed four men.

title/0/en: The FARDC launched an offensive on the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Kapanga, a locality in Lubero territory on the border with Uganda, killing ten of them.
notes/en: The FARDC launched an offensive on the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Kapanga, a locality in Lubero territory on the border with Uganda, killing ten of them.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked armed men who had just occupied the village of Rubaya in Masisi territory the previous day.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked armed men who had just occupied the village of Rubaya in Masisi territory the previous day. One policeman and a man were killed, three men, a woman and a child were shot and wounded during the clash.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen burned down a man's house in Bugina in the territory of Rutshuru during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen burned down a man's house in Bugina in the territory of Rutshuru during the night. The assailants burned the house down while its inhabitants where sleeping.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier was harassing passers-by in the Kalonge neighborhood of Oicha when he shot and killed a 36-year-old man.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier was harassing passers-by in the Kalonge neighborhood of Oicha when he shot and killed a 36-year-old man. The man was trying to help another man who had been detained by the soldier. The FARDC soldier then ran away leaving his AK47 weapon behind.

title/0/en: A Nyatura Domi combatant seized the weapon of an FARDC patroling the village of Kagando in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: A Nyatura Domi combatant seized the weapon of an FARDC patroling the village of Kagando in Rutshuru territory. The assailant wounded the FARDC soldier.

title/0/en: Armed men attacked the FARDC position in Mukoloka in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Armed men attacked the FARDC position in Mukoloka in Shabunda territory. One FARDC died and one was injured during the clash.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Elenge held up nine motorcycles close to Katatwa in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Elenge held up nine motorcycles close to Katatwa in Walikale territory. The assailants looted passengers and motorcycle drivers' money and belongings. The FARDC came to rescue the victims and a shooting ensued.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants held up a motorcycle transporting three passengers and the driver close to Lushebere in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants held up a motorcycle transporting three passengers and the driver close to Lushebere in Rutshuru territory. The assailants shot the people passing by. The driver died on the spot and the three men were shot and wounded.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo in Katubiro in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo in Katubiro in Kalehe territory. Two civilians, a man and a woman, were shot and wounded. The FARDC and the Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo also looted the population. Two boys and two girls went missing.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Panzi neighborhood of Bukavu during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into a house in the Panzi neighborhood of Bukavu during the night. The robbers stole $400 and a telephone.

title/0/en: The FARDC shot and killed two men in Kipese in the territory of Lubero.
notes/en: The FARDC shot and killed two men in Kipese in the territory of Lubero.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kilalo positions in the villages of Kisisi and Mighende in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kilalo positions in the villages of Kisisi and Mighende in Lubero territory. Four Mai-Mai and one FARDC died during the attacks.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai soldiers attacked a check point controlled by the FARDC in Simbi, Fizi territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai soldiers attacked a check point controlled by the FARDC in Simbi, Fizi territory. One FARDC died and one was injured. The assailants seized three AK47 weapons, food and telephones belonging to the FARDC.

title/0/en: Suspected Mai-Mai Yakutumba militias killed a FARDC soldier at Mukangi village in Fizi territory
notes/en: Suspected Mai-Mai Yakutumba combatants killed an FARDC soldier at Mukangi village in the vecinity of Malinde in Fizi territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a 22-year-old man with a machete in the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a 22-year-old man with a machete in the Ndosho neighborhood of Goma.

title/0/en: Six FDLR-FOCA combatants broke into a house in Majengo in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Six FDLR-FOCA combatants broke into a house in Majengo in Rutshuru territory. The assailants stole five goats.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money and the belongings of traders at the Kalungu market in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen looted money and the belongings of traders at the Kalungu market in Kalehe territory. The assailants also injured a 39-year-old woman with a crude weapon.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men strangled to death a 40-year-old man in Katolo, Kelehe territory, during the night from 3 to 4 October 2017.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men strangled to death a 40-year-old man in Katolo, Kelehe territory, during the night from 3 to 4 October 2017. The victim's body was found on 4 October at 13.30.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants injured a man and two FARDC with a crude weapon in Kaseghe in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants injured a man and two FARDC with a crude weapon in Kaseghe in Lubero territory. The assailants seized an AK47 weapon.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men who were looting the village of Kasenyi in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked unidentified armed men who were looting the village of Kasenyi in Nyiragongo territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a 48-year-old man in Kiwanja rural commune, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a 48-year-old man in Kiwanja rural commune, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Nyatura Kalume combatants killed two men with machetes in the village of Chitendebwa, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Nyatura Kalume combatants killed two men with machetes in the village of Chitendebwa, Kalehe territory. The assailants stole the victims' money and gold.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a 41-year-old woman with a crude weapon in the Kahembe neighborood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a 41-year-old woman with a crude weapon in the Kahembe neighborood of Goma.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped two boys playing in their house's courtyard in Kiwanja rural commune in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped two boys playing in their house's courtyard in Kiwanja rural commune in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $8,000.

title/0/en: Two FARDC held up a motorcycle transporting two women traders at Bonde, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Two FARDC held up a motorcycle transporting two women traders at Bonde, Rutshuru territory. The soldiers stole $2,000 from the women.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons and firearms raided the village of Kalimba in Beni territory during the night.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons and firearms raided the village of Kalimba in Beni territory during the night. The assailants stole 560,000 Congolese francs and three telephones. They also injured a man with a machete.

title/0/en: Twenty FARDC soldiers detained four men and five women including a minor in a field close to Sebele in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Twenty FARDC soldiers detained four men, four women, and one girl in a field close to Sebele in Fizi territory. The FARDC raped the four women aged 37, 30, 22, and 20 and the 14-year-old girl. They shot and killed three men and wounded another man.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Kasugho, Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Kasugho, Lubero territory. One Mai-Mai Mazembe and one civilian died during the clash.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto raided the village of Lulingu in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto raided the village of Lulingu in Shabunda territory. The assailants abducted four men aged from 22 to 40 years old and stole three goats.

title/0/en: The police arrested 30 Lucha activists and shot and wounded one activist during a peaceful march to demand the publication of the electoral calendar in Le Volcan neighborood of Goma.
notes/en: The police arrested 30 Lucha activists and shot and wounded one activist during a peaceful march to demand the publication of the electoral calendar in Le Volcan neighborood of Goma.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin Mbaenda recruted by force seven men aged between 18 and 20 years old and three minor boys in the villages of Malembe, Myanga and Choko in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin Mbaenda recruted by force seven men aged between 18 and 20 years old and three minor boys in the villages of Malembe, Myanga and Choko in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the village of Bunyakiri, bringing all activities to a halt.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the village of Bunyakiri, bringing all activities to a halt.

title/0/en: FARDC clashed with a coalition composed of Mai-Mai Charles and illegal fishermen.
notes/en: FARDC clashed with a coalition composed of Mai-Mai Charles and illegal fishermen. The clash lasted for 30 minutes. FARDC captured three fishermen.

title/0/en: CNRD combatants attacked the Nyatura Kasongo in Kabukomo in the territory of Masisi.
notes/en: CNRD combatants attacked the Nyatura Kasongo in Kabukomo in the territory of Masisi. One Nyatura Kasongo died during the clash.

title/0/en: CNRD combatants shot and killed a man in Bweru in Masisi territory.
notes/en: CNRD combatants shot and killed a man in Bweru in Masisi territory. The assailants accused the victim of being a Nyatura Kasongo collaborator.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Love ambushed two FARDC in Mushweshwe in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Love ambushed two FARDC in Mushweshwe in Rutshuru territory.The assailants killed a soldier and seized his weapon and uniform.

title/0/en: A coalition of Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo, Shabani, Shukuru, Butachibera and Mungoro attacked the FARDC position in Kambale, in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: A coalition of Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo, Shabani, Shukuru, Butachibera and Mungoro attacked the FARDC position in Kambale, in Kalehe territory. One Raia Mutomboki, one FARDC and two civilians died. Two Raia Mutomboki, two FARDC and three civilians were injured. The assailants also looted goods in local shops.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked the FARDC position in Kipese in the territory of Lubero.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo attacked the FARDC position in Kipese in the territory of Lubero. Seven Mai-Mai Kilalo were killed and three were injured; eleven FARDC died and three were wounded, four civilians were killed. The FARDC looted the belongings of the population.

title/0/en: Unidentified men strangled and killed a policeman in Kikuvo rural commune in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men strangled and killed a policeman in Kikuvo rural commune in Lubero territory. The assailants seized the policeman's weapon.

title/0/en: Unidentified rmed men raided the village of Kibirizi, Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified rmed men raided the village of Kibirizi, Uvira territory. The assailants shot and killed a 57-year-old man suspected to be an FARDC informer.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot a motorcycle driver transporting two FARDC soldiers to Kikuvo in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot a motorcycle driver transporting two FARDC soldiers to Kikuvo in Lubero territory. The assailants killed the civilian and injured one of the FARDC. The injured soldier was hospitalized at Kayna general hospital.

title/0/en: Des hommes non identifis ont tu par balle un homme dans la localit de Mweso en territoire de Masisi.
notes/en: Des hommes non identifis ont tu par balle un homme dans la localit de Mweso en territoire de Masisi. Les assaillants ont jet le corps de la victime dans la rivire Mweso.

title/0/en: An FARDC stole 10,000 Congolese francs from a 15-year-old girl and sheets of corrugated iron from a 50-year-old man close to Magoba, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An FARDC stole 10,000 Congolese francs from a 15-year-old girl and sheets of corrugated iron from a 50-year-old man close to Magoba, Kalehe territory. The FARDC commander, when informed of this, forced the FARDC to give the money and the sheets of corrugated iron back.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Kasongo held up a convoy of people close to Kalembe in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Kasongo held up a convoy of people close to Kalembe in Walikale territory. The assailants looted $800. They also injured a 46-year-old man with a machete.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the Nyatura Love position in Ngoroba in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the Nyatura Love position in Ngoroba in Rutshuru territory. The Mai-Mai Mazembe pushed the Nyatura Love away to allow the farmers to access their fields.

title/0/en: Two policemen broke into a house in Chihombehombe in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Two policemen broke into a house in Chihombehombe in Kalehe territory during the night. The policemen raped a woman and a 15-year-old girl. They shot and wounded a man who was trying to alert the neighbours. They also looted $650 and other goods.
There were clashes between Mayi Mayi Yakutumba and FARDC forces in the hills on the outskirts of Uvira. The rebels did not manage to enter the city but a FARDC soldier was captured.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kilalo position in Kipese in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kilalo position in Kipese in Lubero territory. After the clash the FARDC looted solar panels and goods from shops and pharmacies.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe kidnapped a man in Kitsombiro in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe kidnapped a man in Kitsombiro in Lubero territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $5,000.

title/0/en: Unidentified men burned a house down in the village of Luvere, Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men burned a house down in the village of Luvere, Beni territory. A 5-year-old girl was killed in the fire.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided the village of Lutchuwa in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided the village of Lutchuwa in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants looted $1,300, nine goats and seventeen chickens. They shot and wounded a man and two women who had tried to alert the population.

title/0/en: Armed men attacked an FARDC soldier who was drawing water from a well in Mutarule, Uvira territory.
notes/en: Armed men attacked an FARDC soldier who was drawing water from a well in Mutarule, Uvira territory. The FARDC arrived to rescue the soldier and clashed with the assailants. The assailants shot and wounded the FARDC and seized an AK47.

title/0/en: FARDC troops clashed with an unknown coalition of armed groups at Malinde village in Fizi territory
notes/en: FARDC troops clashed with an unknown coalition of armed groups at Malinde village in Fizi territory around 05:00.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Yakutumba position in the village of Katanga, Fizi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Yakutumba position in the village of Katanga, Fizi territory. One 44-year-old man and a 32-year-old woman were shot and wounded. The FARDC looted the village after repelling the attack of the Mai-Mai Yakutumba.

title/0/en: FARDC forces fought with the Mai-Mai Yakutumba near Mboko, killing six combatants.
notes/en: FARDC forces fought with the Mai-Mai Yakutumba near Mboko, killing six combatants.

title/0/en: The population demonstrated against increased insecurity in the Panzi neighbourhood in Bukavu.
notes/en: The population demonstrated against increased insecurity in the Panzi neighbourhood in Bukavu. The police intervened to stop the demonstration and to free three policemen who had been abducted by the population while they were in the midst of an armed robbery. As a consequence of the clash between the population and the police, three men, one pregnant woman and a 16-year-old boy were shot and killed; several civilians were injured; almost 50 policemen were shot and wounded by the civilians. The civilians also seized three weapons belonging to the policemen.

title/0/en: Armed men who had kidnapped a man on 09/23/2017 in Katwiguru in Rutshuru territory, killed the hostage after the payment of the $1,500 ransom.
notes/en: Armed men who had kidnapped a man on 09/23/2017 in Katwiguru in Rutshuru territory, killed the hostage after the payment of the $1,500 ransom.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazimano, who had kidnapped two men on 09/23/2017 in Kigwena in Uvira territory, released the hostages after a ransom of $1,000 was paid.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazimano, who had kidnapped two men on 09/23/2017 in Kigwena in Uvira territory, released the hostages after a ransom of $1,000 was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a convoy of vehicles transporting the food meant for displaced people in Butare, Masisi territory and stole the food.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a convoy of vehicles transporting the food meant for displaced people in Butare, Masisi territory and stole the food.

title/0/en: The police looted money and telephones belonging to a 24-year-old man in Turunga 2, Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: The police looted money and telephones belonging to a 24-year-old man in Turunga 2, Nyiragongo territory.

title/0/en: Armed men attacked the FARDC position in Nkiko, in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Armed men attacked the FARDC position in Nkiko, in Rutshuru territory. The assailants ran away as FARDC reinforcements arrived from Rumangabo.

title/0/en: Presumed FNL combattants attacked a Burundian FDN position at Kahororo village in Uvira territory
notes/en: Presumed FNL combattants attacked a Burundian national army position at Kahororo village in Uvira territory. At least two Burundian soldiers were killed and eight others wounded. The casualties were repatriated through the Gatumba border crossing.

title/0/en: Suspected Nyatura militias allegedly killed a local man in Birundule village, Rustshuru territory.
notes/en: Suspected Nyatura militias allegedly killed a local man in Birundule village, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: The FARDC claimed to have regained control of Nundu after an offensive against the Mai-Mai Yakutumba.
notes/en: The FARDC claimed to have regained control of Nundu after an offensive against the Mai-Mai Yakutumba.

title/0/en: An FARDC shot and killed a 16-year-old boy at Kambale center in Kalehe territory as the victim asked the soldier to leave the bar because it was late.
notes/en: An FARDC shot and killed a 16-year-old boy at Kambale center in Kalehe territory as the victim asked the soldier to leave the bar because it was late. The soldier also stole the victim's money. The FARDC patrol arrested the perpetrator. The day after the population demanded that the FARDC withdraw from the area. The FARDC left and moved to Bunyakiri.

title/0/en: Suspected FDLR rebels allegedly kidnapped civilians along Ishasha-Kiwanja road in Buganza village,Rutshuru territory
notes/en: FDLR rebels allegedly kidnapped civilians on the Ishasha-Kiwanja road in Buganza village, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: A suspected drunken FARDC soldier reportedly shot and killed a 15-year-old boy during a dispute at Kambale village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: A drunken FARDC soldier reportedly shot and killed a 15-year-old boy during a dispute at Kambale village, Kalehe territory. The situation triggered tension in the area. The culprit was arrested and transferred to Bukavu military court for questioning.

title/0/en: Three men carrying crude weapons broke into a house in Kanyihunga in Beni territory.
notes/en: Three men carrying crude weapons broke into a house in Kanyihunga in Beni territory. The assailants demanded that the owners hand over their money but the latter did not have any. They killed the owners of the house, a man and a woman.

title/0/en: Armed men broke into a house in Katwiguru, Rutshuru territory, during the night.
notes/en: Armed men broke into a house in Katwiguru, Rutshuru territory, during the night. The assailants shot at the people living in the house, injuring a woman and a boy. The assailants kidnapped a man and demanded a ransom of $1,500. The injured woman died on 09/25/2017. After they received the ransom, the assailants killed the hostage.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons and firearms, identified as Mai-Mai Mazimano, broke into a farm in Kamonyi in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons and firearms, identified as Mai-Mai Mazimano, broke into a farm in Kamonyi in Uvira territory. The assailants stole 38 cows and wounded two men.

title/0/en: Three Mai-Mai militias gunned down an ex-Mai-Mai militiaman in Lubero territory
notes/en: Three Mai-Mai militias allegedly gunned down an ex-Mai-Mai militiaman who was admitted at Lukanga Campus Clinic. They accused the victim of collaborating with FARDC against the Mai-Mai fighters in the area.

title/0/en: FARDC troops clashed with an unknown coalition of armed groups at Kilembwe village in Fizi territory
notes/en: FARDC troops clashed with an unknown coalition of armed groups at Kilembwe village in Fizi territory on 23 september 2017. The fights continued till 24 september 2017. No further details were provided.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC in Kanyatsi, Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC in Kanyatsi, Lubero territory. One Mai-Mai Mazembe died and two were injured, two FARDC were killed and three were wounded. Two civilians were shot and wounded.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Yakutumba attacked the FARDC positions in Mboko, Kabumbe, Mukwezi, Kasekezi, Makobola Ier in the territories of Fizi and Uvira.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Yakutumba attacked the FARDC positions in Mboko, Kabumbe, Mukwezi, Kasekezi, Makobola Ier in the territories of Fizi and Uvira. The FARDC, supported by MONUSCO, counter-attacked and won back control of these areas. Several FARDC and Mai-Mai Yakutumba died in the clashes, one UN peacekeeper was injured, six civilians died and five were wounded. The assailants and the FARDC looted the belongings of the local population and of NGOs.

title/0/en: Five FDLR-FOCA combatants who had kidnapped a 45-year-old man in Kashwa 3 in Rutshuru territory released the hostage after a ransom of $200 was paid.
notes/en: Five FDLR-FOCA combatants who had kidnapped a 45-year-old man in Kashwa 3 in Rutshuru territory released the hostage after a ransom of $200 was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the policemen in charge of guarding the CENI office and those guarding the Cooprative d'pargne et de crdits Chai in Walungu center in the territory of Walungu.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the policemen in charge of guarding the CENI office and those guarding the Cooprative d'pargne et de crdits Chai in Walungu center in the territory of Walungu. Two policemen were shot and wounded. The assailants looted computers and other goods belonging to the two institutions.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo raided Lukanga in Lubero territory during the night.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kilalo raided Lukanga in Lubero territory during the night. The assailants shot and killed a man.

title/0/en: Three armed men who had kidnapped two men in Vusigho in Lubero territory on 09/16/2017, released the hostages after the payment of a ransom of $300 and the restitution of their motorcycle that had been abandoned in the village on 09/15/2017 on the occasion of a previous raid that had been prevented by the population.
notes/en: Three armed men who had kidnapped two men in Vusigho in Lubero territory on 09/16/2017, released the hostages after the payment of a ransom of $300 and the restitution of their motorcycle that had been abandoned in the village on 09/15/2017 on the occasion of a previous raid that had been prevented by the population. The motorcycle had been handed over to the FARDC.

title/0/en: Armed combatants broke into a huse in Kigwena in Uvira territory during the night. The assailants demanded money, but the victims did not have any.
notes/en: Armed combatants broke into a huse in Kigwena in Uvira territory during the night. The assailants demanded money, but the victims did not have any. The assailants kidnapped two men aged 59 and 19 and demanded a ransom of $1,500. On 09/25/2017 the kidnappers released the hostages after the payment of a ransom of $1,000.

title/0/en: Five FDLR-FOCA combatants raided the village of Kashwa 3 in Rutshuru territory during the night.
notes/en: Five FDLR-FOCA combatants raided the village of Kashwa 3 in Rutshuru territory during the night. The assailants looted money, telephones and other goods. They kidnapped a 45-year-old man and demanded a ransom of $200. The kidnappers released the hostage on 09/23/2017.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked an FARDC convoy transporting soldiers' salaries close to Matembe in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked an FARDC convoy transporting soldiers' salaries close to Matembe in Lubero territory. Three FARDC soldiers died and five were injured. The assailants seized two weapons and stole the shipment of money.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe who had kidnapped two men on 09/20/2017 in Chasenda in Rutshuru territory, released the hostages after a ransom of 170,000 Congolese francs was paid.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe who had kidnapped two men on 09/20/2017 in Chasenda in Rutshuru territory, released the hostages after a ransom of 170,000 Congolese francs was paid.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo combatants held up five motorcycles close to Bubare in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo combatants held up five motorcycles close to Bubare in Kalehe territory. The assailants looted money and other goods. They shot and wounded two men trying to seize one of the assailants' weapons. The assailants also kidnapped four men and demanded an $800 ransom and four goats to release the hostages.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Kimbulu in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Kimbulu in Lubero territory. During the attack one Mai-Mai Mazembe was killed, two were injured and one was captured. The FARDC also seized an AK47.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 44-year-old man during a fight in Vuyinga in Lubero territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a 44-year-old man during a fight in Vuyinga in Lubero territory. The soldier was arrested and the victim was hospitalized in a local health center for appropriate treatment.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Lwanga, while passing themselves off as Mai-Mai Mazembe, attacked the Mai-Mai Lopards/Muthundo position in Buhambya in Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Lwanga, while passing themselves off as Mai-Mai Mazembe, attacked the Mai-Mai Lopards/Muthundo position in Buhambya in Beni territory. During the clashes that lasted four days fifteen Mai-Mai Lopards died and three were injured, four Mai-Mai Lwanga were killed.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe kidnapped two men in Chasenda in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe kidnapped two men in Chasenda in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers released the hostages after a ransom of 170,000 Congolese francs was paid.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo held up thirteen motorcycles on the National Road #3 close to the village of Kamananga in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo held up thirteen motorcycles on the National Road #3 close to the village of Kamananga in Kalehe territory. The assailants looted money and other goods. They also shot and wounded three men and set fire to a motorcycle.

title/0/en: The FDLR-FOCA combatants held up a vehicle in the Virunga park close to Nyabirehe in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-FOCA combatants held up a vehicle in the Virunga park close to Nyabirehe in Rutshuru territory. The assailants kidnapped three men and demanded a ransom of $6,000 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: The police arrested 27 Lucha activists who were demonstrating against the involvement of the police in urban insecurity in Goma.
notes/en: The police arrested 27 Lucha activists who were demonstrating against the involvement of the police in urban insecurity in Goma. The police jailed them in the detention facility situated at the Goma town hall.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen abducted a 28-year-old man in Nduma in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen abducted a 28-year-old man in Nduma in Shabunda territory. The reason for the abduction was not revealed.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kilalo position in the village of Kavasanza, Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kilalo position in the village of Kavasanza, Lubero territory. During the attack two Mai-Mai Kilalo and three FARDC were injured and a man was shot and wounded.

title/0/en: FARDC and a coalition of armed groups clashed South West of Kilembwe on 20 sept 2017, Fizi territory
notes/en: FARDC troops and a coalition of armed groups clashed South West of Kilembwe general area in Fizi territory. No further details about the incident were provided.

title/0/en: Nyatura militias loyal to Cmdr. Samuel reportedly clashed with CNRD militia group at Mpati village.
notes/en: On 20 September 2017, militias loyal to Cmdr. Samuel reportedly clashed with CNRD militia group at Mpati village. No Further details about the incident were provided.

title/0/en: Five armed men wearing FARDC uniforms looted $1,470, 1,432,000 Congolese francs and the goods belonging to a merchant who was returning from the market close to Kalungu in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Five armed men wearing FARDC uniforms looted $1,470, 1,432,000 Congolese francs and the goods belonging to a merchant who was returning from the market close to Kalungu in Kalehe territory. The assailants injured 13 men and a 15-year-old girl by beating them with an iron bar.
