title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Donat and Lukoba combatants looted 150,000 Congolese francs belonging to a merchant at an improvised check point set up by the assailants close to Byangama in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Donat and Lukoba combatants looted 150,000 Congolese francs belonging to a merchant at an improvised check point set up by the assailants close to Byangama in Shabunda territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Karakara attacked the FARDC position in Kiringye in Uvira territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Karakara attacked the FARDC position in Kiringye in Uvira territory. The assailants looted ammunitions, a Motorola radio, military uniforms, and food in the FARDC camp. They then burned down the FARDC camp.

title/0/en: Four FNL Nzabampema combatants who had kidnapped a 40-year-old woman on 09/16/2017 in Kiliba rural commune, released the hostage after a ransom of $500 was paid.
notes/en: Four FNL Nzabampema combatants who had kidnapped a 40-year-old woman on 09/16/2017 in Kiliba rural commune, released the hostage after a ransom of $500 was paid.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Kasongo attacked the CNRD position in Ngoliba in the territory of Masisi. No casualties were recorded.
notes/en: The Nyatura Kasongo attacked the CNRD position in Ngoliba in the territory of Masisi. No casualties were recorded.

title/0/en: Armed men held up two cars close to Kavasewa in Beni territory.
notes/en: Armed men held up two cars close to Kavasewa in Beni territory. The assailants looted money, telephones, beauty products, and plastic tarps.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Ngiko in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Ngiko in Rutshuru territory. The assailants looted money and goods. They injured a man with a crude weapon.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Donat and Lukoba combatants attacked a convoy escorted by the FARDC close to Lubila in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Donat and Lukoba combatants attacked a convoy escorted by the FARDC close to Lubila in Shabunda territory. During the attack an FARDC soldier was killed. The assailants seized one Motorola radio.

title/0/en: While on patrol in Butembo, FARDC shot another soldier who refused to stop when they asked him to.
notes/en: While on patrol in Butembo, FARDC shot another soldier who refused to stop when they asked him to. During the clash the soldier was injured on his hand. While he was escaping the population beated him badly. The police managed to rescue him from the mob.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided the village of Misheshe in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided the village of Misheshe in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants looted $1,000, nine goats and seventeen chickens. They abducted six girls younger than 18 years old for sexual exploitation. They also kidnapped ten men and demanded a ransom of 20,000 Congolese francs and one goat to release the hostages. Before leaving the village they also burned down fifteen houses.

title/0/en: ADF clashed with FARDC forces near Beni.
notes/en: ADF clashed with FARDC forces near Beni. Two people were killed. An ADF rebel was captured by FARDC.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked ADF forces in the forest near Mbau in retaliation for an attack the previous day.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked ADF forces in the forest near Mbau in retaliation for an attack the previous day.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon looted goods belonging to the population in the villages of Buleusa and Kimaka, in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon looted goods belonging to the population in the villages of Buleusa and Kimaka, in Lubero territory. The assailants left the villages after the looting.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the NDC Guidon in Mambangwe in the territory of Lubero.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the NDC Guidon in Mambangwe in the territory of Lubero. Two NDC Guidon and one Mai-Mai Mazembe were injured.

title/0/en: Armed men who had kidnapped nine men in Malolu on 09/12/2017 released the hostages close to Mamudioma in Beni territory.
notes/en: Armed men who had kidnapped nine men in Malolu on 09/12/2017 released the hostages close to Mamudioma in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms broke into a house in Cishenge, in Walungu territory during the night.
notes/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms broke into a house in Cishenge, in Walungu territory during the night. The assailants shot and killed a man and wounded a woman.

title/0/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants held up a vehicle close to Kanzenze in Rutshuru territory during the night.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants held up a vehicle close to Kanzenze in Rutshuru territory during the night. The assailants killed two men. They kidnapped three women, a man, and three boys under the age of 18. Among the hostages, one woman and two boys managed to escape.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the village of Bugumba 2, in the territory of Nyiragongo.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the village of Bugumba 2, in the territory of Nyiragongo. The assailants shot and killed a 37-year-old man and wounded his 33-year-old wife.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Muhima Fighters attacked the FARDC and the park rangers in Kyavinyonge in Beni territory following the arrest of one of their combatants.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Muhima Fighters attacked the FARDC and the park rangers in Kyavinyonge in Beni territory following the arrest of one of their combatants. During the attack four assailants died and one was captured. Two FARDC were injured. As a consequence of the clash a pirogue transporting displaced people to Kisaka capsized and the majority of the passengers drowned. Twenty-one people died as as a result.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen abducted four men close to Kagogo in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen abducted four men close to Kagogo in Uvira territory. The assailants forced the men to carry the luggage. The assailants killed three other men trying to escape. One of the abducted men managed to escape.

title/0/en: ADF forces attacked MONUSCO on the Mbau-Kamango road. A MONUSCO soldier was killed and another wounded.
notes/en: ADF forces attacked MONUSCO on the Mbau-Kamango road. A MONUSCO soldier was killed and another wounded.

title/0/en: NDC-R and Maimai Mazembe militia fighters clashed at Kanume village on 17 sept 2017
notes/en: NDC-R and Mai-Mai Mazembe militia fighters clashed at Kanune village, 7km west of Luofu in Lubero territory. The Mai-Mai Mazembe were pushed back to Kahumo village.

title/0/en: FARDC and coalition of armed groups clashed in Kilembwe general area on 17 sept 2017
notes/en: FARDC troops and a coalition of armed groups clashed around Kilembwe.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Butachibera looted $4,600 belonging to shopkeepers in Maibu village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Butachibera looted $4,600 belonging to shopkeepers in Maibu village in Kalehe territory. The assailants shot and wounded three men and kidnapped two women and thirteen men. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $4,500 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Kyondo rural commune in Beni territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Kyondo rural commune in Beni territory during the night. As the population raised the alarm, the assailants shot around at random in order to escape. The assailants injured two boys aged 8 and 6 and a 12-year-old girl.

title/0/en: Three men carrying crude weapons and one firearm kidnapped two men in a farm in the village of Vusigho, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Three men carrying crude weapons and one firearm kidnapped two men in a farm in the village of Vusigho, Lubero territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $500 and the restitution of their motorcycle that had been seized by the FARDC the day before. The kidnappers released the hostages after a ransom of $300 was paid and their motorcycle was given back.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men who had kidnapped a man the night of 09/15/2017 in Gite in Rutshuru territory, released the hostage after a ransom of $4,000 was paid.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men who had kidnapped a man the night of 09/15/2017 in Gite in Rutshuru territory, released the hostage after a ransom of $4,000 was paid. The kidnappers also injured the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed groups attacked and burnt down FARDC troops position in Kiringyie on 17 sept 2017
notes/en: Unidentified armed groups attacked and burned down the FARDC camp in Kiringyie village. They also looted the local shops.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked the FARDC and MONUSCO positions at kilometers 25 and 27, close to Mamudioma in Beni territory.
notes/en: The ADF attacked the FARDC and MONUSCO positions at kilometers 25 and 27, close to Mamudioma in Beni territory. During the clash two ADF combatants and an FARDC soldier were killed. Two ADF were captured and four FARDC disappeared. One MONUSCO peacekeeper was injured. In addition, two civilians died, four were wounded and two disappeared.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Miriki, Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Miriki, Lubero territory. One Mai-Mai Mazembe was killed and two NDC Guidon were injured. The NDC Guidon looted the population.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked FARDC position at Kaseghe village on 16 sept 2017.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe fighters attacked an FARDC position at Kaseghe village. The FARDC soldiers managed to repel the attack and pushed them towards Bingi.

title/0/en: FARDC troops reportedly clashed with a coalition of armed groups in Mayamoto, Fizi territory
notes/en: FARDC troops clashed with a coalition of armed groups in Mayamoto, Fizi territory. At least one of the FARDC soldiers was killed, two others wounded and three went missing. The armed groups also set fire to two vehicles belonging to FARDC.

title/0/en: Four FNL Nzabampema combatants broke into a house in Kiliba rural commune.
notes/en: Four FNL Nzabampema combatants broke into a house in Kiliba rural commune. The assailants kidnapped a 40-year-old woman. They demanded a ransom of $1,500. The kidnappers released the hostage on 09/19/2017 after a ransom of $500 was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up a vehicle close to the village of Kafulo in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up a vehicle close to the village of Kafulo in Fizi territory. The assailants looted money, telephones and other goods.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon looted 20,000 Congolese francs, a goat, eleven chickens, ten guinea pigs, a telephone and a radio in Bunyatenge, Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon looted 20,000 Congolese francs, a goat, eleven chickens, ten guinea pigs, a telephone and a radio in Bunyatenge, Lubero territory. They arrested five men accused to be accomplices of the Mai-Mai Mazembe. Two of the five men were released upon the payment of 100,000 Congolese francs. The assailants killed the remaining three men.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Gite in Rutshuru territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Gite in Rutshuru territory during the night. The assailants kidnapped a man and demanded a ransom of $15,000. The kidnappers released the injured hostage on 09/16/2017 at 8pm against the payment of a ransom of $4,000.

title/0/en: Two policemen broke into a house in Kambegeti center in the territory of Kalehe.
notes/en: Two policemen broke into a house in Kambegeti center in the territory of Kalehe. The policemen looted $1,350, three goats, seven chickens and three ducks. They also shot and wounded a 45-year-old man. The victim was hospitalized at Bunyakiri general hospital to receive treatment.

title/0/en: An unidentified armed group attacked civilians in Bushendo, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: An unidentified armed group attacked civilians in Bushendo, Rutshuru territory. One person was killed, seven people were injured and three people were abducted.

title/0/en: Unidentified militia abducted a priest from Ntamugenga in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified militia abducted a priest from Ntamugenga in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Burundian refugees demonstrated against the arrest of four members of their group following their involvement in the night patrol.
notes/en: Burundian refugees demonstrated against the arrest of four members of their group following their involvement in the night patrol. The demonstrators threw stones at the ANR office and one of them seized an FARDC weapon, shot an FARDC lieutenant who died. The FARDC shot the demonstrators. Twenty-four men, thirteen women and one boy were killed; 118 people were injured.

title/0/en: FARDC troops destroyed suspected Raia Mutomboki Wemba-Mabala allied Militias' base on  sept
notes/en: FARDC troops destroyed a base belonging to an alliance of Raia Mutomboki Wemba and Raia Mutomboki Mabala in Lubila in Shabunda territory. FARDC troops killed at least one combatant and seized an AK-47.

title/0/en: FARDC troops reportedly dismantled Raia Mutomboki Nyatura base on 15 sept 2017
notes/en: FARDC troops reportedly dismantled a Nyatura base on 15 September 2017 at Katala, around 6 km west of Lumbishi and Ziralo in Kalehe territory. FARDC captured two combatants and seized a hand grenade.

title/0/en: Armed men carrying crude weapons raided the village of Visiki/Kathamamba in Beni territory during the night.
notes/en: Armed men carrying crude weapons raided the village of Visiki/Kathamamba in Beni territory during the night. The assailants abducted three men and looted a telephone, a TV screen, three goats, six chickens, clothes and money.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe killed with a machete a 19-year-old man and a woman close to Kishishe in Rutshuru territory while the victims were walking to their field to harvest the crops.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe killed with a machete a 19-year-old man and a woman close to Kishishe in Rutshuru territory while the victims were walking to their field to harvest the crops.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in the village of Misinga in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in the village of Misinga in Walikale territory. In the clash one Mai-Mai Mazembe died, three men aged 19, 23, and 25 were shot and wounded. The NDC Guidon looted 50 goats, medicines at the Misinga health center and school material at Kigoma primary school.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe clashed with NDC-R at Misinga village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe clashed with NDC-R at Misinga village in Walikale territory. The attack forced civilians to flee towards Lusambo, Bushimba, Katirisa and Buleusa.

title/0/en: Presumed Mai-Mai Mulumba ambushed and looted civilians on 13 sept 2017.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mulumba ambushed and looted civilians on their way to Kitumba in Fizi territory. They killed two civilians. The incident took place at around 19:30.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided the village of Lolo in the territory of Shabunda.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided the village of Lolo in the territory of Shabunda. The assailants looted 22 goats, twelve chickens, six solar panels and other goods.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the NDC Guidon in the village of Pitakongo in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the NDC Guidon in the village of Pitakongo in Lubero territory. As a consequence of the clash four NDC Guidon were killed and two Mai-Mai Mazembe were injured. The NDC Guidon looted some goods and forced the civilians to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: A coalition of Hunde and Nande militia attacked members of the Hutu community with machetes to protest the killing of two youths.
notes/en: A coalition of Hunde and Nande militia attacked members of the Hutu community with machetes to protest the killing of two youths. FARDC soldiers fired into the air to disperse the crowd.

title/0/en: The FARDC clashed with a militia in Kyavinyonge in Beni territory, causing the population to flee.
notes/en: The FARDC clashed with a militia in Kyavinyonge in Beni territory, causing the population to flee.

title/0/en: Unidentified men who had kidnapped a man in Sayo neighborood in Beni, released the hostage against the payment of a ransom of $5,000.
notes/en: Unidentified men who had kidnapped a man in Sayo neighborood in Beni, released the hostage against the payment of a ransom of $5,000. The kidnappers released the hostage in Mundubiena neighborood in the rural commune of Mangina after holding him for eight days in captivity.

title/0/en: FARDC troops launched an offensive operation against AGs in Kilembwe area
notes/en: FARDC troops launched an offensive operation against armed groups in Kilembwe, forcing them to withdraw from the village.

title/0/en: A coalition of Armed groups ambushed FARDC convoy on 13 september 2017.
notes/en: An coalition of armed groups ambushed an FARDC convoy along the Lulimba-Kilembwe road in the vicinity of Lwiko. Fifteen FARDC soldiers were killed and two military vehicles set on fire.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani raided the village of Lumendje in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani raided the village of Lumendje in Kalehe territory during the night. The assailants recruted by force eleven men to integrate them in their armed group. Among the eleven men, three escaped, two were shot and wounded while they were trying to escape. The assailants also looted properties of the civilians from the households.

title/0/en: Uvira-FARDC troops reportedly attacked militias position at Kafuta village
notes/en: FARDC troops attacked armed groups at Kafuta village, close to Kalungwe and not far from Uvira town.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants ambushed an FARDC convoy leaving Goma to Lubero at the level of Kanyambi village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants ambushed an FARDC convoy leaving Goma to Lubero at the level of Kanyambi village in Lubero territory. Three FARDC died during the attack.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Donat and Lukoba kidnapped a 36-year-old woman in the village of Nyambembe in the territory of Shabunda.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Donat and Lukoba kidnapped a 36-year-old woman in the village of Nyambembe in the territory of Shabunda. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $550 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Twelve Nyatura Kalume conbatants held up a convoy of ores buyers and transporters close to the village of Chitendebwa in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Twelve Nyatura Kalume conbatants held up a convoy of ores buyers and transporters close to the village of Chitendebwa in Kalehe territory. The assailants shot and killed four men and injured two other men. The assailants also looted money and goods before escaping in the direction of Nyawaronga.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men looted money and other goods of the traders going to Pinga market at the level of Mpetit/Pinga village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men looted money and other goods of the traders going to Pinga market at the level of Mpetit/Pinga village in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC soldiers in the villages of Kyombi and Kazegama in the territory of Shabunda.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC soldiers in the villages of Kyombi and Kazegama in the territory of Shabunda. The assailants looted several goods before withdrawing from these villages.

title/0/en: Gunmen attacked the FARDC position in Kilembwe in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Gunmen attacked the FARDC position in Kilembwe in Fizi territory. As a consequence of the clash a 32-year-old man was shot and wounded. The assailants seized three AK47 weapons, three boxes of ammunitions and food from the FARDC warehouse in Kilembwe. On their way back the assailants forced the civilians to carry the looted goods. They released the civilians in the afternoon of 09/13/2017.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Elenge while the latter were raiding Kilongote village in the territory of Walikale.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Raia Mutomboki Elenge while the latter were raiding Kilongote village in the territory of Walikale. One man and a woman were shot and wounded. The Raia Mutomboki Elenge kidnapped four men and demanded three goats to release them. The FARDC looted chickens and goats after repelling the assailants.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Minova in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Minova in Kalehe territory during the night. They looted money, a computer, a TV screen and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen held up four motorbikes close to the village of Tebero in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen held up four motorbikes close to the village of Tebero in Masisi territory. The assailants looted money, telephones bags and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided the village of Malolu in Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided the village of Malolu in Beni territory. The assailants abducted nine men to carry their belongings. The assailants released the hostages on 09/18/2017 close to the village of Mamudioma.

title/0/en: Suspected Ngumino militia group clashed with Bembe tribesmen in Uvira territory
notes/en: Ngumino clashed with a Bembe militia known as Mai-Mai Njalbantu militias in the Haut plateau of Uvira territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into three houses in Kasenyi, Nyiragongo territory during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen broke into three houses in Kasenyi, Nyiragongo territory during the night. The assailants looted housekeeping material and money.

title/0/en: Two Mai-Mai Mazimano released a 61-year-old woman they had kidnapped on 09/09/2017 in CEPAC village in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Two Mai-Mai Mazimano released a 61-year-old woman they had kidnapped on 09/09/2017 in CEPAC village in Uvira territory. The kidnappers released the hostage after a ransom of 100,000 Congolese francs was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Ngangi 3 in the territory of Nyiragongo during the night.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Ngangi 3 in the territory of Nyiragongo during the night. They shot and killed a 40-year-old man.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the FDLR-FOCA combatants who made the population pay an illegal tax in the village of Kitovu in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the FDLR-FOCA combatants who made the population pay an illegal tax in the village of Kitovu in Rutshuru territory. The FARDC killed an FDLR-FOCA combatant and seized his weapon.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier broke into the house of his uncle in Kanyenze in the territory of Beni.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier broke into the house of his uncle in Kanyenze in the territory of Beni. The soldier intimidated the people living in the house and shot and wounded two  boys aged 12 and 13. The victims were hospitalized at Heal Africa hospital in Goma for treatment.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon released the second hostage they had kidnapped on 08/06/2017 in Vuhaya, Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon released the second hostage they had kidnapped on 08/06/2017 in Vuhaya, Lubero territory. The population paid a ransom of $250 to get the hostage released.

title/0/en: The PNC and the FARDC brutally repressed a demonstration by students and Parlement Dbout youth activists against the ongoing kidnappings and insecurity in Butembo.
notes/en: The PNC and the FARDC broke up a demonstration by students and Parlement Dbout youth activists against the ongoing kidnappings and insecurity in Butembo. The demonstrators demanded the appointment of a new major and new heads of urban security services. The security services wounded two 20-year-old men and a 15-year-old girl. One of the victims who was shot in the abdomen was hospitalized, underwent surgery and spent 22 days at Matanda hospital. The security services also arrested at least two youths and beat a journalist who was covering the events.

title/0/en: APCLS combatants raided the village of Rugarama in Masisi territory.
notes/en: APCLS combatants raided the village of Rugarama in Masisi territory. The assailants killed three men and shot and wounded two other men.

title/0/en: Five FDLR-FOCA combatants who kidnapped a 39-year-old man on 09/08/2017 in Rubona in Rutshuru territory, released the hostage after a ransom of $120 was paid.
notes/en: Five FDLR-FOCA combatants who kidnapped a 39-year-old man on 09/08/2017 in Rubona in Rutshuru territory, released the hostage after a ransom of $120 was paid.

title/0/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants broke into a dispensary in Nkwenda in Rutshuru territory during the night.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants broke into a dispensary in Nkwenda in Rutshuru territory during the night. The assailants abducted the nurse in charge of the night shif. The victim managed to escape.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Lukoba and Ndarumanga raped six pregnant women close to the village of Nyombe in Sabunda territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Lukoba and Ndarumanga raped six pregnant women close to the village of Nyombe in Sabunda territory. The victims were leaving Nyombe to go to Nyalubemba for a medical consultation.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru raided Mashere overnight in the territory of Kalehe.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru raided Mashere overnight in the territory of Kalehe. They looted propoerties and shot and killed a man. They also kidnapped six men and a 16-year-old boy. The assailants demanded a ransom of $250 and a goat to release each hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen killed an FDLR-FOCA combatant in Kwitabi village in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen killed an FDLR-FOCA combatant in Kwitabi village in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons broke into a bar in Bugarula in Idjwi territory during the night.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons broke into a bar in Bugarula in Idjwi territory during the night. They injured with a machete a 20-year-old man. The victim was hospitalized at MONVU hospital for treatment.

title/0/en: Two Mai-Mai Mazimano broke into a house in CEPAC village in theterritory of Uvira.
notes/en: Two Mai-Mai Mazimano broke into a house in  CEPAC village in theterritory of Uvira. The assailants kidnapped a 61-year-old woman and demanded a ransom of an unknown amount. The kidnappers released the hostage on 09/11/2017 after a ransom of 100,000 Congolese francs was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the police station in Musienene, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the police station in Musienene, Lubero territory. As a consequence of the clash one assailant died and one was captured. One policeman was injured.

title/0/en: FNL-Nzabampema combatants held up a vehicle that was transporting passengers returning from Kahungu market close to Kiliba in Uvira territory.
notes/en: FNL-Nzabampema combatants held up a vehicle that was transporting passengers returning from Kahungu market close to Kiliba in Uvira territory. The assailants looted money, telephones, corn flour bags, fishes and other goods.

title/0/en: In response to the Nyatura-Love raid in Kishishe, youth Nande and Hunde organized to burn down seven houses belonging to the members of the Hutu community in Kishishe in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: In response to the Nyatura-Love raid in Kishishe, youth Nande and Hunde organized to burn down seven houses belonging to the members of the Hutu community in Kishishe in Rutshuru territory. They also killed with a crude weapon five men and a woman of the Hutu community.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Shalio kidnapped five men in Chambucha, Walikale territory, shot and wounded a woman demanding the relsease of her son.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Shalio kidnapped five men in Chambucha, Walikale territory, shot and wounded a woman demanding the relsease of her son. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2,000 to release the hostages whom they accused to collaborate with the Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin Mbaenda. The assailants also looted goats and other goods.

title/0/en: Five FDLR-FOCA combatants kidnapped a 39-year-old man in the village of Rubona in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Five FDLR-FOCA combatants kidnapped a 39-year-old man in the village of Rubona in Rutshuru territory. The assailants demanded $500 for the release of the hostage. They released their captive after receiving a $120 ransom. The hostage spent four days in the hands of his captors.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Love raided the village of Kishishe in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Love raided the village of Kishishe in Rutshuru territory. The assailants killed with a crude weapon two men and a woman belonging to the Nande community. As the FARDC arrived, the assailants ran away.

title/0/en: The police arrested six women who were demonstrating against insecurity in Butembo and were calling for the liberation of the two priests kidnapped in Bunyuka.
notes/en: The police arrested six women who were demonstrating against insecurity in Butembo and were calling for the liberation of the two priests kidnapped in Bunyuka. The police released these women on 09/11/2017.

title/0/en: Armed men carrying crude weapons broke overnight into a priests convent at ITAV site in Butembo.
notes/en: Armed men carrying crude weapons broke overnight into a priests convent at ITAV site in Butembo. The assailants injured a priest with a crude weapon. They attempted to abduct the victim but he managed to escape as they were running away. The assailants also looted a computer, two cameras, one telephone and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men looted a vehicle that was headed from Goma at Nturo village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men looted a vehicle that was headed from Goma at Nturo village, Rutshuru territory. The assailants killed the driver when he wanted to escape the ambush.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed the FARDC close to the village of Rubaku in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed the FARDC close to the village of Rubaku in Uvira territory. Eleven FARDC were killed and five were injured. The assailants also looted some of the FARDC's weapons and ammunitions.

title/0/en: Four armed men kidnapped a 55-year-old man in his field in Kiringye in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Four armed men kidnapped a 55-year-old man in his field in Kiringye in Uvira territory. The assailants demanded a ransom of $3,500 for the release of the hostage. The kidnappers released the hostage on 09/12/2017 after a ransom was paid. The amount has not been made public as the family preferred to keep it secret. The assailants also injured the hostage. The latter was hospitalized at Lemera general hospital for treatment.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Love simultaneously attacked the FARDC positions in Bwalanda and Rwahurukene, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Love simultaneously attacked the FARDC positions in Bwalanda and Rwahurukene, Rutshuru territory. As a consequence of the attack two Nyatura died, three men were injured with crude weapons and several goods were looted. The FARDC seized two AK-47s.

title/0/en: Unidentifed gunmen broke overnight into a house in Mubimbi, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentifed gunmen broke overnight into a house in Mubimbi, Kalehe territory. The assailants injured a 50-year-old man and looted 46,000 Congolese francs, one computer and other properties. The victim was hospitalized in a local health center.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed the FARDC close to Kataka, Uvira territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed the FARDC close to Kataka, Uvira territory. One assailant died and five FARDC were injured. The FARDC seized two weapons belonging to the assailants.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the NDC Guidon position in Katendere, Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the NDC Guidon position in Katendere, Lubero territory. As a consequence of the attack five NDC Guidon and two FARDC died. The number of injured people of both groups is unknown. The FARDC burned down the NDC Guidon camp.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kirikicho attacked the Mai-Mai Kifuafua Maachano in Remeka, Masisi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kirikicho attacked the Mai-Mai Kifuafua Maachano in Remeka, Masisi territory. Three Mai-Mai Kirikicho, four Mai-Mai Kifuafua Maachano and two civilians were killed. The two civilians were men.

title/0/en: APCLS combatants killed with a crude weapon an FARDC soldier and wounded a second one in Bonde, Masisi territory.
notes/en: APCLS combatants killed with a crude weapon an FARDC soldier and wounded a second one in Bonde, Masisi territory. The assailants seized the weapon belonging to the dead soldier.

title/0/en: Six men carrying crude weapons and firearms, three of whom were wearing FARDC uniforms, abducted a man in his field situated in Sayo neighborood in Beni.
notes/en: Six men carrying crude weapons and firearms, three of whom were wearing FARDC uniforms, abducted a man in his field situated in Sayo neighborood in Beni. The kidnappers stole 15,000 Congolese francs, one telephone and a radio. The kidnappers called the hostage's family members to reassure them the victim was in good health. The kidnappers released the hostage after a ransom of $5,000 was paid. The vicitim spent eight days in captivity.

title/0/en: An FARDC broke into a house during the night in Nyaleke, Beni territory.
notes/en: An FARDC broke into a house during the night in Nyaleke, Beni territory. The soldier shot a 42-year-old man who was trying to defend himself. The victim died on the spot. The soldier also seized a tank of palm oil and a bag of salted fish.

title/0/en: Six combatants belonging to Mai-Mai Kyandenga group broke into a house during the night in Tokou, Beni territory.
notes/en: Six combatants belonging to Mai-Mai Kyandenga group broke into a house during the night in Tokou, Beni territory. The assailants shot and killed a man.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen looted seven goats that children were grazing in Kako, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen looted seven goats that children were grazing in Kako, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Four unidentified gunmen looted seven goats that children were grazing in Kako, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Four unidentified gunmen looted seven goats that children were grazing in Kako, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Saying they were looking for Nyatura collaborators, the FARDC killed a man, injured two other and arrested eleven other men in Mirenzo, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Saying they were looking for Nyatura collaborators, the FARDC killed a man, injured two other and arrested eleven other men in Mirenzo, Kalehe territory. The FARDC also burned down thirteen houses and looted $550 and five goats.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided overnight the village of Kaundju, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided overnight the village of Kaundju, Kalehe territory. They killed a woman whose husband was suspected of collaborating with the FARDC and injured five men with crude weapons. They also abduced four men and looted $975.

title/0/en: A policeman shot another policeman, who was 32-years-old, in Lac vert neighborhood, Goma.
notes/en: A policeman shot another policeman, who was 32-years-old, in Lac vert neighborhood, Goma. Both policemen were on guard at a police detention facility. The former suspected his colleague to have facilitated a prison break. The victim died on the spot.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the NDC Sheka in Maninge, Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the NDC Sheka in Maninge, Walikale territory. Three NDC Guidon fighters and one NDC Sheka combatant were injured. The injured NDC Guidon combatants were hospitalized at Pinga general hospital while the NDC Sheka fighter was hospitalized at Mutongo health center.

title/0/en: Men carrying crude weapons and firearms abducted a 37-year-old man in Kisone, Beni territory.
notes/en: Men carrying crude weapons and firearms abducted a 37-year-old man in Kisone, Beni territory. They injured the victim with a crude weapon and left him attached to a tree.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles carried out an attack in the village of Katoro, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles carried out an attack in the village of Katoro, Rutshuru territory. The assailants looted beans, goats, chickens and money. They also shot and wounded a man whose brother they were looking for.

title/0/en: Twenty gunmen identified as Mai-Mai Yakutumba killed two men aged 42 and 27 in a pasture in Namukala, Fizi territory.
notes/en: Twenty gunmen identified as Mai-Mai Yakutumba killed two men aged 42 and 27 in a pasture in Namukala, Fizi territory. The assailants also looted ten cows. Both victims were cowherds.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position early in the morning in Lubero rural commune.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position early in the morning in Lubero rural commune. During the clash the Mai-Mai Mazembe killed three FARDC and injured five others.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided Miowe village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raided Miowe village, Kalehe territory. The assailants looted $1,250, five goats, ten chickens and other goods. They kidnapped six men and shot and wounded two other who were trying to escape. They also raped four girls between 14 and 16 years old. The assailants demanded a ransom of $1,800 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: In Kavumo unidentified men released a 16 year-old girl after receiving a $1,000 ransom.
notes/en: In Kavumo unidentified men released a 16 year-old girl after receiving a $1,000 ransom.  The girl was one of a group of girls kidnapped on August 28, 2017.

title/0/en: The Nyatura John Love shot and killed an FARDC officer with the rank of 1st class sergeant, in Katolo, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura John Love shot and killed an FARDC officer with the rank of 1st class sergeant, in Katolo, Rutshuru territory. The assailants seized the soldier's weapon before withdrawing from the village.

title/0/en: An NDC Guidon combatant raped a 35-year-old woman close to Buleusa, Waikale territory.
notes/en: An NDC Guidon combatant raped a 35-year-old woman close to Buleusa, Waikale territory. After the incident the rapist fled. The victim was hospitalized at Buleusa health center.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a 22-year-old man with a crude weapon in the Katoyi neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a 22-year-old man with a crude weapon in the Katoyi neighborhood of Goma.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men wearing FARDC uniforms, killed two men and two women with crude weapons, they injured a man in Kudukudu, Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men wearing FARDC uniforms, killed two men and two women with crude weapons, they injured a man in Kudukudu, Beni territory. Four other people disappeared.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers broke during the night into a house belonging to a 36-year-old woman in Fizi centre in the territory of Fizi.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers broke during the night into a house belonging to a 36-year-old woman in Fizi centre in the territory of Fizi. These soldiers looted 34,000 Congolese francs and 10 crates of Primus. They also forced the AFRICANA organization guard to hand over money. As he did not have any money, one of the soldiers shot him. The victim died at the Fizi hospital.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Kyandenga combatants carried out an attack in the villages of Mashua, Mwarara and Mambombo, Beni territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Kyandenga combatants carried out an attack in the villages of Mashua, Mwarara and Mambombo, Beni territory. The assailants looted $100, 435,000 Congolese francs and one telephone. They also raped a 19-year-old woman.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD shot a man who was leaving Nyakakoma to reach Kinyandonyi in the village of Ngombe, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD shot a man who was leaving Nyakakoma to reach Kinyandonyi in the village of Ngombe, Rutshuru territory. The assailants injured the victim in the abdomen. The victim was transferred to Rutshuru general hospital for treatment.

title/0/en: The FARDC burned down a civilian's house in Kabashumba, Rutshuru territory, driven by anger following a soldier's assassination on 08/27/2017.
notes/en: The FARDC burned down a civilian's house in Kabashumba, Rutshuru territory, driven by anger following a soldier's assassination on 08/27/2017. At night unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC. A civilian man was killed during the clash.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Alimbongo
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Alimbongo

title/0/en: Three policemen looted the village Chitebeka in Kalehe territory during the night.
notes/en: Three policemen looted the village Chitebeka in Kalehe territory during the night. They stole $860 from a house, raped two women and a 16-year-old girl. They also shot and wounded four men who tried to pursue them.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house overnight in Vurondo, Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house overnight in Vurondo, Beni territory. The assailants shot and killed a 38-year-old ANR agent. They accused him of revealing their position to the FARDC.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men carried out an attack during the night in the village of Bushushu, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men carried out an attack during the night  in the village of Bushushu, Kalehe territory. The assailants looted $190, 1,550,000 Congolese francs, 29 telephones and other property of the civilians.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a 30-year-old man in Baswagha, Beni territory, with a crude weapon.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a 30-year-old man in Baswagha, Beni territory, with a crude weapon. The victim's body was found beheaded.

title/0/en: Armed men wearing Police and FARDC uniforms raided the village of Ibona in Walungu territory.
notes/en: Armed men wearing Police and FARDC uniforms raided the village of Ibona in Walungu territory. The assailants looted five cows and 25 goats. They also injured two men.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants raided Lukanga, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants raided Lukanga, Lubero territory. They killed a mentally ill man and burned down the police and ANR offices.

title/0/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms held up a vehicle carrying passengers close to Sake, Masisi territory.
notes/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms held up a vehicle carrying passengers close to Sake, Masisi territory. Two civilians were killed and nine were injured. The day after the population demonstrated their anger in front of the FARDC. The FARDC shot in the air to disperse the demonstrators.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Nzirunga position in Soma, Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Nzirunga position in Soma, Beni territory. The FARDC killed four Mai-Mai Nzirunga and seized an RPG weapon.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Nyawaronga mine site in Kalehe territory at night.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen raided the Nyawaronga mine site in Kalehe territory at night. The assailants plundered the property of the civilians and shot and killed an FARDC soldier.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men who had kidnapped a 33-year-old woman in the rural commune of Kiwanja on 25/08/2017 released the hostage.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men who had kidnapped a 33-year-old woman in the rural commune of Kiwanja on 25/08/2017 released the hostage after receiving a ransom of $2,000.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Shukuru combatants looted money and other goods on the national road n3 in Kabenga, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Shukuru combatants looted money and other goods on the national road n3 in Kabenga, Kalehe territory. The FARDC intervened attacking the assailants. One FARDC and one assailant were killed, two civilians, two FARDC and one assailant were injured.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Nzirunga attacked the FARDC position in a ranch in Byakobe, Beni territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Nzirunga attacked the FARDC position in a ranch in Byakobe, Beni territory. As a consequence of the clash two Mai-Mai Nzirunga were killed and one was captured. The FARDC also seized one PKM weapon.

title/0/en: The Congolese police attacked an unidentified group of armed men who were breaking into a printing house in Le Volcan neighborhood in Goma.
notes/en: The Congolese police attacked an unidentified group of armed men who were breaking into a printing house in Le Volcan neighborhood in Goma. The policemen arrested two of the armed bandits.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke in two houses in Bubale I, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke in two houses in Bubale I, Kalehe territory. They shot and killed a 67-year-old man and stole 20,000 Congolese francs.

title/0/en: Unidentified gunmen abducted three men close to Vitshumbi in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified gunmen abducted three men close to Vitshumbi in Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Yakutumba attacked the FARDC position in Dine on Ubwari peninsula in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Yakutumba attacked the FARDC position in Dine on Ubwari peninsula in Fizi territory. The assailants drove the FARDC out of the village

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Jackson combatants kidnapped three fishermen close to Vitshumbi.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped three fishermen close to Vitshumbi.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Yakutumba combatants took control of Dine Village on the Ubwari Peninsula after a brief exchange of gunfire with FARDC troops.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Yakutumba combatants took control of Dine Village on the Ubwari Peninsula after a brief exchange of gunfire with FARDC troops.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a 23-year-old man with a crude weapon in the Katoy neighborood of Goma. the victim's body was found the day after, on 08/30/2017.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a 23-year-old man with a crude weapon in the Katoy neighborood of Goma. the victim's body was found the day after, on 08/30/2017.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Nzirunga combatants broke into the houses overnight in Vukutu, Beni territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Nzirunga combatants broke into the houses overnight in Vukutu, Beni territory. The assailants looted nine goats and wounded a 58-year-old woman.

title/0/en: The police attacked unidentified armed men in Mikeno neighborood in Goma while the latter were robbing a hardware store on Kibabi avenue.
notes/en: The police attacked unidentified armed men in Mikeno neighborood in Goma while the latter were robbing a hardware store on Kibabi avenue. Two assailants were arrested.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped four girls on Kavumu-Bukavu road, Kabare territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped four girls on Kavumu-Bukavu road, Kabare territory. The kidnappers contacted one of the girls' family and demanded a ransom of $200 to release their daughter. Once they received the demanded sum the assailants demanded a further $150. As the family struggled to find and send the sum, the kidnappers raised their ransom to $1,500. One of the girls is 15-years-old.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants attacked the FARDC camp in the rural commune of Lubero, in Lubero territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants attacked the FARDC camp in the rural commune of Lubero, in Lubero territory. One FARDC and one woman were killed, two Mai-Mai Mazembe were captured and the FARDC camp was burned down.

title/0/en: Unidentified amed men shot and killed an 80-year-old man in Nyarubwa, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified amed men shot and killed an 80-year-old man in Nyarubwa, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Armed men carrying crude weapons and firearms broke into a house in Bugamba, Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Armed men carrying crude weapons and firearms broke into a house in Bugamba, Nyiragongo territory. They injured a woman and her four children.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe abducted a 45-year-old woman in Itala, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe abducted a 45-year-old woman in Itala, Rutshuru territory along her two children. The assailants accused her of collaborating with the FDLR. The assailants released the victim on 08/28/2017 under local leaders' pressure.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe who had abducted a 45-year-old woman in Itala, Rutshuru territory, accusing her of collaborating with the FDLR, released the victim on 08/28/2017 under local leaders' pressure.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe who had abducted a 45-year-old woman in Itala, Rutshuru territory, accusing her of collaborating with the FDLR, released the victim on 08/28/2017 under local leaders' pressure.

title/0/en: Armed men shot an FARDC soldier who was walking in Kakomero, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Armed men shot an FARDC soldier who was walking in Kakomero, Rutshuru territory. The soldier died on the spot and the assailants stole the victim's weapon.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Yakutumba attacked the FARDC position in Mizimu on the Ubwari Peninsula.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Yakutumba attacked the FARDC position in Mizimu on the Ubwari Peninsula.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki combatants raided Ebishi village, Kalehe territory, where they looted seven goats, ten chickens and other goods.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki combatants raided Ebishi village, Kalehe territory, where they looted seven goats, ten chickens and other goods. They also injured by machete three men who refused to carry the looted goods. The FARDC attacked the armed group. One man and his wife were killed.

title/0/en: The Nyatura Kasongo attacked CNRD combatants in Kabukome, Goriba, Kirumu, Nyange-Bibwe in Masisi territory.
notes/en: The Nyatura Kasongo attacked CNRD combatants in Kabukome, Goriba, Kirumu, Nyange-Bibwe in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants who had kidnapped two men in Nyahanga, Rutshuru territory, on 08/25/2017 released the hostages after a ransom of $2,500 was paid.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants who had kidnapped two men in Nyahanga, Rutshuru territory, on 08/25/2017 released the hostages after a ransom of $2,500 was paid. The released hostages are two 42 and 39-year-old men.

title/0/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants killed a 52-year-old man who was coming out of a bar in Bavunga, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants killed a 52-year-old man who was coming out of a bar in Bavunga, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed with a man on Avenue Funu in Bukavu with a crude weapon.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed with a man on Avenue Funu in Bukavu with a crude weapon. The victim died from his wounds.

title/0/en: Eight men and two boys, identified as ADF under the command of Lukwago, broke into several houses overnight in Nyaleke, Beni territory, as they were moving from Bashu chefferie (south) towards Banande-Kainama groupement (north).
notes/en: Eight men and two boys, identified as ADF under the command of Lukwago, broke into several houses overnight in Nyaleke, Beni territory, as they were moving from Bashu chefferie (south) towards Banande-Kainama groupement (north). The assailants looted cassava flour, one bag of rice, salt, a jug of palm oil, clothes, three pans, two pairs of rubber boots, three machetes, and one tarpaulin. They also forced five men aged 65, 47, 44, 34 and 24, to carry the looted goods. The assailants released them a day later, on 08/27/2017.

title/0/en: Two armed men attacked a CARITAS vehicle that was carrying teachers' salaries close to Ndindi, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Two armed men attacked a CARITAS vehicle that was carrying teachers' salaries close to Ndindi, Kalehe territory. The assailants stole the entire shipment of money, worth 16,045,000 Congolese francs.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot a motorbike driver close to Amba, Fizi territory during an attempted armed robbery.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot a motorbike driver close to Amba, Fizi territory during an attempted armed robbery. The motorbike driver died on the spot after being shot in the chest. The female passenger managed to escape to the forest. The assailants looted money and salted fish.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into two houses in Kabamba, Kabare territory and stole $1500 and 500,000 Congolese francs belonging to two men, 48 and 59-years-old.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into two houses in Kabamba, Kabare territory and stole $1500 and 500,000 Congolese francs belonging to two men, 48 and 59-years-old.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers attacked overnight the MRC-Lopard positions in Mabambi and Muhola.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers attacked overnight the MRC-Lopard positions in Mabambi and Muhola. As a consequence of the clash four civilians, three MRC-Lopard and several FARDC were killed. Two Mai-Mai MRC were injured.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the NDC Guidon position in Bunyatenge, Lubero territory, over a period of three days.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the NDC Guidon position in Bunyatenge, Lubero territory, over a period of three days. Four NDC Guidon combatants and one civilian were killed.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked an FARDC patrol overnight in Sake and Mubambiro, Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked an FARDC patrol overnight in Sake and Mubambiro, Masisi territory. Four assailants were killed and one FARDC was injured.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants abducted two men close to Malyanga, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants abducted two men close to Malyanga, Rutshuru territory. The assailants did not ask for a ransom.

title/0/en: FARDC forces clashed with Mai-Mai Mazembe in Lubero.
notes/en: FARDC troops clashed with the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Lubero. Two FARDC and three Mai-Mai were killed.

title/0/en: The 3307th regiment of the FARDC clashed with a Nyatura group in Butare.
notes/en: The 3307th regiment of the FARDC clashed with a Nyatura group in Butare. During the clash, a female IDP was killed and around 95 people were displaced.

title/0/en: A group of armed bandits attacked the police station in Kagando, which also serves to protect to local IDP camp.
notes/en: A group of armed bandits attacked the police station in Kagando, which also serves to protect to local IDP camp. Several civilians died as well as a policeman.

title/0/en: Two soldiers and a civilian woman raided a household in the village of Sebele in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Two soldiers and a civilian woman raided a household in the village of Sebele in Fizi territory. The assailants looted money and a solar panel from a 51-year-old man. They shot in the air before leaving. An FARDC patrol intervened and arrested these assailants, taking them to their operational headquarters.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided a household in the rural commune of Kiwanja, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided a household in the rural commune of Kiwanja, Rutshuru territory. The assailants kidnapped a 33-year-old woman. They demanded a ransom of $200,000 for the release of the hostage. After some discussion, the family paid $2,000 and the assailants released the hostage on 29/08/2017.

title/0/en: Eight men and two boys, identified as ADF under the command of Lukwago, broke into several houses overnight in Nyaleke, Beni territory, as they were moving from Bashu chefferie (south) towards Banande-Kainama groupement (north).
notes/en: Eight men and two boys, identified as ADF under the command of Lukwago, broke into several houses overnight in Nyaleke, Beni territory, as they were moving from Bashu chefferie (south) towards Banande-Kainama groupement (north). The assailants looted cassava flour, one bag of rice, salt, a jug of palm oil, clothes, three pans, two pairs of rubber boots, three machetes, and one tarpaulin. They also forced five men aged 65, 47, 44, 34 and 24, to carry the looted goods. The assailants released them a day later, on 08/27/2017.

title/0/en: Two FARDC raped a 44-year-old woman and her 15-year-old daughter in Masiba, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Two FARDC raped a 44-year-old woman and her 15-year-old daughter in Masiba, Kalehe territory. The two rape victims were hospitalized in Makuta health center in Karasi.

title/0/en: Des combattants Mai-Mai Mazembe ont tu par balle un civil dans la localit de Mambasa en territoire de Lubero.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants shot and killed a civilian in Mambasa, Lubero territory. The assailants suspected that he was collaborating with NDC Guidon combatants.

title/0/en: Armed shepherds held up a vehicle carrying passengers near Lubondiyi village in Fizi territory.
notes/en: Armed shepherds held up a vehicle carrying passengers near Lubondiyi village in Fizi territory. The assailants looted the passengers' belongings. The FARDC soldiers who were escorting the vehicles of the mining company Banro attacked these assailants, killed one and captured two others.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants attacked the FARDC position in Masereka, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants attacked the FARDC position in Masereka, Lubero territory. The assailants burned down the FARDC camp, the police administration offices and the personal house of a police officer. The group that carried out the attack, which is led by Kilalo, is suspected to have joined the MNR coalition (National Mouvement for the Revolution).

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Yakutumba attacked the FARDC position in Maya Moto in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Yakutumba attacked the FARDC position in Maya Moto in Fizi territory. The assailants captured several FARDC soldiers.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Shabani combatants raided Hungu village, Kelehe territory, where they looted fifteen goats, twenty chickens and other goods.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Shabani combatants raided Hungu village, Kelehe territory, where they looted fifteen goats, twenty chickens and other goods. They kidnapped ten people and demanded a ransom of $1500 to release the hostages. The FARDC attacked the assailants. Two Raia Mutomboki Shabani, three FARDC and two men were killed; two men and three women were injured.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants attacked the FARDC position in Malende neighborhood, on the outskirts of Butembo.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants attacked the FARDC position in Malende neighborhood, on the outskirts of Butembo. Two civilians were killed and several houses were burned down.

title/0/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants raided the Mondo Giusto compound in Nyahanga village, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants raided the Mondo Giusto compound in Nyahanga village, Rutshuru territory. They kidnapped two men, aged 42 and 39, respectively. They demanded a ransom of $2,500 for the release of the hostages. After two days, the assailants released the hostages on 27/08/2017 after they received the ransom they had asked for.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed two policemen who were returning from Goma to Kitchanga in the village of Tebero, Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed two policemen who were returning from Goma to Kitchanga in the village of Tebero, Masisi territory. The two policemen were killed by the assailants.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Yakutumba combatants reportedly attacked the FARDC position in Mai ya Moto and took over the base after brief fighting.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Yakutumba combatants reportedly attacked the FARDC position in Maya Moto and took over the base after brief fighting. Some FARDC soldiers were reportedly arrested.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto combatants raided Lubila village, Shabunda territory during the night.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Kazimoto combatants raided Lubila village, Shabunda territory during the night. The assailants looted twenty-five goats, twelve chickens, four solar panels and 450,000 Congolese francs belonging to the population.

title/0/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants abducted a woman in Musenyi, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants abducted a woman in Musenyi, Rutshuru territory. They suspected her to have collaborated with the Rwandan soldiers who attacked their commander.

title/0/en: Three Mai-Mai of the Kyandenga group raided the village of Kyavithondo in Beni territory during the night.
notes/en: Three Mai-Mai of the Kyandenga group raided the village of Kyavithondo in Beni territory during the night. The assailants demanded food and money from the population. They also injured two women aged 40 and 60 and three men aged 65, 41 and 28, respectively. The victims were admitted to the general hospital of Mabalako for treatment.

title/0/en: A policeman and a military police officer raided a CANAL+ distribution point in Uvira and stole $1300 and 300,000 Congolese francs.
notes/en: A policeman and a military police officer raided a CANAL+ distribution point in Uvira and stole $1300 and 300,000 Congolese francs. Before leaving, a crowd came to the rescue of the shop owner and lynched the policeman and the soldier, who both died. The crowd gave the owner back his money; the weapon of one of the assailants was handed over to the Congolese National Police.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot a civilian in Kabasha, Beni territory.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot a civilian in Kabasha, Beni territory. The victim had not given the soldier the cigarette he demanded. He was admitted for treatment to the health center in Kabasha.

title/0/en: Members of the police fired live bullets to disperse a crowd.
notes/en: Members of the police fired live bullets to disperse a crowd that was arguing over humanitarian assistance to the displaced in a distribution center in the village of Butale, Fizi territory. The police injured two women.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants wounded a civilian by machete in Kyansenda, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants wounded a civilian by machete in Kyansenda, Rutshuru territory. The incident took place while the Mai-Mai combatants were collecting illegal taxes among the population.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position in Ngerere, Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked the FARDC position in Ngerere, Beni territory. The FARDC abandoned their position.

title/0/en: Three unidentified armed men broke into a shop in Buganga, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified armed men broke into a shop in Buganga, Kalehe territory. The assailants looted the shop owner's money and four telephones.

title/0/en: The FARDC soldiers who were persuing Mai-Mai Kyandenga were attacked by surprise by the armed group in Mambale, Beni territory.
notes/en: The FARDC soldiers who were persuing Mai-Mai Kyandenga were attacked by surprise by the armed group in Mambale, Beni territory. During the attack the Mai-Mai Kyandenga injured an FARDC soldier.

title/0/en: FDLR-RUD combatants attacked a convoy escorted by the FARDC 10 km from Kahunga, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: FDLR-RUD combatants attacked a convoy escorted by the FARDC 10 km from Kahunga, Rutshuru territory. A man, a woman and a boy were killed, three men and five women were shot and wounded. The FDLR-RUD also managed to abduct two men.

title/0/en: The population burned down the local administrative office in the Bwinyole neighborood of Butembo.
notes/en: The population burned down the local administrative office in the Bwinyole neighborood of Butembo as they were demonstrating against looting perpetrated by men carrying crude weapons and firearms in their houses in Butembo.

title/0/en: A crowd in Kyambogho, Lubero territory, burned down the Kyambogho police station.
notes/en: A crowd in Kyambogho, Lubero territory, burned down the Kyambogho police station while they were demonstrating against a series of lootings carried out by men armed with crude weapons and firearms.

title/0/en: The population in southern Butembo town threw stones at the Congolese police (PNC) while they were demonstrating.
notes/en: The population in southern Butembo town threw stones at the Congolese police (PNC) while they were demonstrating against nighttime lootings carried by men armed with crude weapons and firearms in their houses. The police reacted and arrested thirty-four civilians. Five people were injured, one of whom by firearm.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers abducted a 40-year-old civilian in Nyiragongo.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers abducted a 40-year-old civilian in Nyiragongo village of the territory of the same name. This abduction is supposedly linked to a land conflict. Following investigations, it turned out the victim was arrested and locked up in a Goma police detention facility.

title/0/en: Two FDLR factions clashed in Kitimbo area.
notes/en: Two FDLR factions clashed in Kitimbo area. One FDLR commander and four other combatants were killed during the battle. It is not clear which FDLR group was involved in this clash.

title/0/en: An FARDC shot and killed a man following an argument over a woman in Kambegeti, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: An FARDC shot and killed a man following an argument over a woman in Kambegeti, Kalehe territory. The woman was shot and wounded. The soldier looted some goods and burned the house down.

title/0/en: A group of five men in FARDC uniforms shot dead a man in the Himbi neighborhood.
notes/en: A group of five men in FARDC uniforms shot dead a man in the Himbi neighborhood. The victim was killed when he was trying to make a phone call.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Simba in Kalay-Boeing, Makwatima and Baka mining sites, Walikale territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Simba in Kalay-Boeing, Makwatima and Baka mining sites, Walikale territory. Seven Mai-Mai Simba died during the clash. The fighting lasted from the afternoon of 22 August to the afternoon of 23 August.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mwenyemali attacked a herd of cows in Nyamugali in the Ruzizi plain, in Uvira territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mwenyemali attacked a herd of cows in Nyamugali in the Ruzizi plain, in Uvira territory. There was an exchange of fire with the armed herdsmen. Mai-Mai Mwenyemali killed five cows and wounded seven others. Then they stole 21 cows, 14 of which were handed over in return for a sum of $1400 by the owner

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Yakutumba combatants attacked the FARDC in Mwayenga on Ubwari peninsula and took over their position.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Yakutumba combatants attacked the FARDC in Mwayenga on Ubwari peninsula and took over their position.

title/0/en: During two days, the FARDC attacked the position of a coalition of Raia Mutomboki Lukoba and Donat in Kimbili, Ikeke, Lutika, and Kabukiki in Shabunda territory.
notes/en: During two days, the FARDC attacked the position of a coalition of Raia Mutomboki Lukoba and Donat in Kimbili, Ikeke, Lutika, and Kabukiki in Shabunda territory. During the clash the rebels killed a 44-year-old FARDC soldier. The FARDC repelled the rebels.

title/0/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants killed a man and abducted two others in Bushenge, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants killed a man and abducted two others in Bushenge, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Yakutumba attacked the FARDC position in Mwayenga on the Ubwari peninsula in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Yakutumba attacked the FARDC position in Mwayenga on the Ubwari peninsula in Fizi territory. The assailants drove the FARDC of the village.

title/0/en: FDLR combatants killed a person and kidnapped two others in vicinity of Bushenge.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants killed a person and kidnapped two others in vicinity of Bushenge.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and wounded a woman.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Himbi neighbourhood of Goma. The attackers shot and wounded a woman who was in the house.

title/0/en: Violent death in Himbi neighborood in Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Himbi neighborhood of Goma. The attackers shot and killed a 51-year-old man.

title/0/en: Three FARDC soldiers robbed a young man of 20,000 Congolese francs while he was returning from his fields in Duduanze, Beni territory.
notes/en: Three FARDC soldiers robbed a young man of 20,000 Congolese francs while he was returning from his fields in Duduanze, Beni territory. While the soldiers were threatening him, the young man managed to escape. One of the sodliers shot and wounded him on his arm. The victim was hospitalized at Beni general hospital.

title/0/en: Four FDLR-FOCA combatants raided Rubona, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Four FDLR-FOCA combatants raided Rubona, Rutshuru territory. The assailants looted four goats and broke into a house where they looted another seven goats. The assailants then escaped in the park.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men stopped a motorbike and looted the passengers' money, telephones, clothes and shoes in Munimba, Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men stopped a motorbike and looted the passengers' money, telephones, clothes and shoes in Munimba, Mwenga territory. The FARDC intervened and a clash between them and the assailants ensued.

title/0/en: Unidentified men carrying crude weapons and firearms broke into several houses overnight in the Bwinyole neighborood of Butembo.
notes/en: Unidentified men carrying crude weapons and firearms broke into several houses overnight in the Bwinyole neighborood of Butembo. The assailants wounded with a machete three men and a woman. The victims were hospitalized at Matanda general hospital.

title/0/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants broke into more than twenty-two houses in Ishasha, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants broke into more than twenty-two houses in Ishasha, Rutshuru territory. The assailants looted money and telephones.

title/0/en: Two policemen who were fighting over a woman shot and wounded a girl and a man.
notes/en: Two policemen who were fighting over a woman shot and wounded a girl and a man in Kambale, Kalehe territory. The victims were hospitalized in Bunyakiri general hospital and were subsequently transported to Bukavu by the ICRC. The policemen fled with three AK-47s to join the Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Shabani combatants raided the Petit centre de Bitale village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Shabani combatants raided the  Petit centre de Bitale village, Kalehe territory. The assailants looted goats, chickens and many other goods. They forced nine men to carry the looted goods. Two out of the nine men were shot and wounded while three were wounded by crude weapons as they were trying to escape. The assailants also raped three girls.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants burned down the police office and destroyed ANR documents in Musienene, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants burned down the police office and destroyed ANR documents in Musienene, Lubero territory.

title/0/en: Four FARDC soldiers broke into a shop in Ishasha, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Four FARDC soldiers broke into a shop in Ishasha, Rutshuru territory. The assailants shot the 40-year-old shop owner when his neighbors started to raise the alarm. The victim died on the spot.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin combatants attacked the Mai-Mai Kifuafua position in Tuonane, Walikale territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin combatants attacked the Mai-Mai Kifuafua position in Tuonane, Walikale territory. They killed three Mai-Mai Kifuafua Shalio combatants and burned the whole village down.

title/0/en: APCLS combatants attacked the Nyatura Kasongo in Bifumbi and Katovu villages.
notes/en: APCLS combatants attacked the Nyatura Kasongo in Bifumbi and Katovu villages, Masisi territory. Four Nyatura combatants and one APCLS died in the fighting. One civilian man was killed and several houses were burned down.

title/0/en: NDC Guidon caught two of their combatants looting in Kasugho.
notes/en: NDC Guidon caught two of their combatants looting in Kasugho, Lubero territory. These combatants shot and killed one of the thieves and tortured and injured the second. The latter was locked up in a make-shift jail.

title/0/en: NDC Guidon combatants raided Kalenga village, Walikale territory for the forced collection of illegal taxes. During the extortion, the assailants looted food and abducted two men. The two individuals were released the next day for a ransom of 100,000 Congolese francs.
notes/en: NDC Guidon combatants raided Kalenga village, Walikale territory for the forced collection of illegal taxes. During the extortion, the assailants looted food and abducted two men. The two individuals were released the next day for a ransom of 100,000 Congolese francs.

title/0/en: Nyatura Love combatants beheaded a 42-year-old man 3 km from Kibirizi going toward Ndau, Rutshuru territory. This attack was a reprisal for Mai-Mai Mazembe abuses against the Hutu population.
notes/en: Nyatura Love combatants beheaded a 42-year-old man 3 km from Kibirizi going toward Ndau, Rutshuru territory. This attack was a reprisal for Mai-Mai Mazembe abuses against the Hutu population.

title/0/en: A coalition of Raia Mutomboki Lukoba and Ndarumanga attacked the FARDC in Nzovu, Shabunda territory. Five Raia Mutomboki died in the clash, two FARDC and one child were injured. The FARDC also seized three weapons from the rebels.
notes/en: A coalition of Raia Mutomboki Lukoba and Ndarumanga attacked the FARDC in Nzovu, Shabunda territory. Five Raia Mutomboki died in the clash, two FARDC and one child were injured. The FARDC also seized three weapons from the rebels.

title/0/en: Three men carrying crude weapons and firearms, identified as FARDC soldiers, broke into a house during the night in Kima, Beni territory.
notes/en: Three men carrying crude weapons and firearms, identified as FARDC soldiers, broke into a house during the night in Kima, Beni territory. The soldiers demanded money but the occupants of the house did not find anything to give them. One of the soldiers shot and killed one of the civilians, a 19-year-old young man.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Kyandenga combatants broke into three houses overnight in Mambombo, Beni territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Kyandenga combatants broke into three houses overnight in Mambombo, Beni territory. The assailants looted 75,000 Congolese francs, raped a girl and wounded a man with a machete.

title/0/en: NDC Guidon released the two men adbucted in Kalenga, Walikale territory on 08/18/2017 after the payment of a ransom of 100,000 Congolese francs.
notes/en: NDC Guidon released the two men abducted in Kalenga, Walikale territory on 08/18/2017 after the payment of a ransom of 100,000 Congolese francs.

title/0/en: Two armed men wearing FARDC uniforms shot and killed a 42-year-old woman in her house in the Mambango neighborhood of Beni. These armed men also injured a 22-year-old woman who tried to escape.
notes/en: Two armed men wearing FARDC uniforms shot and killed a 42-year-old woman in her house in the Mambango neighborhood of Beni. These armed men also injured a 22-year-old woman who tried to escape.

title/0/en: Unknown armed men broke into a house in Kele, Mwenga territory. These armed men stole 450,000 Congolese Francs and an unknown amount of gold. They also shot and wounded a 42-year-old man and a 35-year-old woman.
notes/en: Unknown armed men broke into a house in Kele, Mwenga territory. These armed men stole 450,000 Congolese Francs and an unknown amount of gold. They also shot and wounded a 42-year-old man and a 35-year-old woman.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants kidnapped two men who were returning from their fields in Kashalira, Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $6500 to release the hostages.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants kidnapped two men who were returning from their fields in Kashalira, Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $6500 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants abducted two men from their fields in Mutanda, Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers did not demand any ransom for the release of the hostages.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants abducted two men from their fields in Mutanda, Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers did not demand any ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: NDC Guidon combatants attacked the FARDC in Rungoma and Mukaka, Walikale territory while NDC Guidon combatants were carrying out the forced collection of illegal taxes. At the end of the clash the FARDC captured one NDC Guidon combatant.
notes/en: NDC Guidon combatants attacked the FARDC in Rungoma and Mukaka, Walikale territory while NDC Guidon combatants were carrying out the forced collection of illegal taxes. At the end of the clash, the FARDC captured one NDC Guidon combatant.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants killed a 39-year-old man in Kibirizi, Rutshuru territory. The assailants suspected the victim of collaborating with FDLR combatants.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants killed a 39-year-old man in Kibirizi, Rutshuru territory. The assailants suspected the victim of collaborating with FDLR combatants.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo combatants shot and killed a 20-year-old man they suspected of collaborating with the FARDC in Katubiro, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo combatants shot and killed a 20-year-old man they suspected of collaborating with the FARDC in Katubiro, Kalehe territory. They also injured the victim's father who wanted to intervene on his son's behalf and looted the victim's house.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 42-year-old man close to Kalonge, Walikale territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $15,000 to release the hostage.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 42-year-old man close to Kalonge, Walikale territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $15,000 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Mikeno neighborhood in Goma. The assailants stole goods and killed a man who came to rescue the victims.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Mikeno neighborhood in Goma. The assailants stole goods and killed a man who came to rescue the victims.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers broke into a house in Mambango district in Beni. They shot and killed the owner of the house.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers broke into a house in Mambango district in Beni. They shot and killed the owner of the house.

title/0/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants abducted a 44-year-old man from a house in Kiwanja, Rutshuru territory. The reasons for the abduction were not known.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants abducted a 44-year-old man from a house in Kiwanja, Rutshuru territory. The reasons for the abduction were not known.
