title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a man while he was trying to prevent the soldier from shooting his wife after an argument. The victim was hospitalized in Mutwanga general hospital.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and wounded a man while he was trying to prevent the soldier from shooting his wife after an argument. The victim was hospitalized in Mutwanga general hospital.

title/0/en: Unknown men shot and killed a man in Nyanzale, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unknown men shot and killed a man in Nyanzale, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Nyatura Love combatants shot and killed an FARDC soldier in Nyanzale, Rutshuru territory. The assailants stole the weapon of the killed soldier.
notes/en: Nyatura Love combatants shot and killed an FARDC soldier in Nyanzale, Rutshuru territory. The assailants stole the weapon of the killed soldier.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men looted travelers' belongings on the Bukavu-Kisangani road in Otobora, Walikale territory. The assailants also kidnapped three men and demanded a ransom of $900 to release the hostages.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men looted travelers' belongings on the Bukavu-Kisangani road in Otobora, Walikale territory. The assailants also kidnapped three men and demanded a ransom of $900 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kill, abduct, and loot firearms in Bushuru.
notes/en: Unidentified men carrying crude weapons and firearms raided Bushushu, Kalehe territory. They killed a 36-year-old man with a machete, kidnapped a 27-year-old man and looted nine goats, a solar panel and five telephones.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the position of armed men suspected of being under the command of the Burundian opposition leader Hussein Radjabu in Bibokoboko, Fizi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the position of armed men suspected of being under the command of the Burundian opposition leader Hussein Radjabu in Bibokoboko, Fizi territory. During the attack the FARDC killed four combatants and seized  military equipment.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers injured a man in Pasisi neighborhood of Beni while he was returning from the city center. They also shot and wounded a soldier who came to rescue the victim. The two victims were hospitalized at the Beni general hospital.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers injured a man in Pasisi neighborhood of Beni while he was returning from the city center. They also shot and wounded a soldier who came to rescue the victim. The two victims were hospitalized at the Beni general hospital.

title/0/en: Nyatura combatants (faction unknown) who had kidnapped a 42-year-old woman on 08/13/2017 2km from Kibirizi, Rutshuru territory, raped and killed her. The victim's body was found in a field close to the place where she had been kidnapped.
notes/en: Nyatura combatants (faction unknown) who had kidnapped a 42-year-old woman on 08/13/2017 2km from Kibirizi, Rutshuru territory, raped and killed her. The victim's body was found in a field close to the place where she had been kidnapped.

title/0/en: APCLS combatants released the hostage they had kidnapped on 08/12/2017. The kidnappers released the hostage in Kaancha, Masisi territory after a ransom of $100 was paid.
notes/en: APCLS combatants released the hostage they had kidnapped on 08/12/2017. The kidnappers released the hostage in Kaancha, Masisi territory after a ransom of $100 was paid.

title/0/en: A Banyamulenge self-defense group known as Twigwaneho attacked a Bafuliru self-defense group in Kahuna, Uvira territory. Three women were killed and a man and a woman were injured.
notes/en: A Banyamulenge self-defense group known as Twigwaneho attacked a Bafuliru self-defense group in Kahuna, Uvira territory. Three women were killed and a man and a woman were injured.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into the house of police officer in Kakuku, Mwenga territory. The assailants shot the officer as he was about to enter his house to get his weapon.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into the house of police officer in Kakuku, Mwenga territory. The assailants shot the officer as he was about to enter his house to get his weapon. The victim was injured and hospitalized in a local health center.

title/0/en: Nyatura combatants (faction unknown) kidnapped a 42-year-old woman 2km from Kibirizi, Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $500 for the release of the hostage.
notes/en: Nyatura combatants (faction unknown) kidnapped a 42-year-old woman 2km from Kibirizi, Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $500 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as a community self-defense group for the Banyamulenge broke into the house of a 46-year-old policeman in Kahuna, Uvira territory. The assailants shot and killed the policeman.
notes/en: Armed men identified as a community self-defense group for the Banyamulenge broke into the house of a 46-year-old policeman in Kahuna, Uvira territory. The assailants shot and killed the policeman.

title/0/en: Armed men wearing uniforms similar to those of the FARDC attacked the FARDC position in Tungudu, Abialose and Parkingi. Eleven FARDC including high ranking officers were killed by the assailants. Three FARDC were captured and several weapons and ammunitions were stolen by the rebels. FARDC recovered their positions the day after.
notes/en: Armed men wearing uniforms similar to those of the FARDC attacked the FARDC position in Tungudu, Abialose and Parkingi. Eleven FARDC including high ranking officers were killed by the assailants. Three FARDC were captured and several weapons and ammunition were stolen by the rebels. FARDC recovered their positions the day after.

title/0/en: Unknown armed men shot and killed a man who worked for the Congolese National Intelligence Agency (ANR) in Kyambogho, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Unknown armed men shot and killed a man who worked for the Congolese National Intelligence Agency (ANR) in Kyambogho, Lubero territory.

title/0/en: APCLS combatants kidnapped a 35-year-old man in Kanfunsi-Kaanja, Walikale territory. The man was released three days later for a ransom of $100.
notes/en: APCLS combatants kidnapped a 35-year-old man in Kanfunsi-Kaanja, Walikale territory. The man was released three days later for a ransom of $100.

title/0/en: Nyatura (unknown faction) combatants attacked the APCLS position at Ngingwe. Two civilians died in the attack.
notes/en: Nyatura (unknown faction) combatants attacked the APCLS position at Ngingwe. Two civilians died in the attack.

title/0/en: NDC Guidon combatants attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Kimaka, Kahumo, Kanyavwanza and Kyambuli, Lubero territory. Five Mai-Mai Mazembe and two NDC Guidon died in the clash. One Mai-Mai Mazembe and four NDC Guidon were injured. NDC Guidon also looted solar panels, batteries and other goods in the targeted villages.
notes/en: NDC Guidon combatants attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Kimaka, Kahumo, Kanyavwanza and Kyambuli, Lubero territory. Five Mai-Mai Mazembe and two NDC Guidon died in the clash. One Mai-Mai Mazembe and four NDC Guidon were injured. NDC Guidon also looted solar panels, batteries and other goods in the targeted villages.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Yakutumba combatants, under the CNPDSC/Malaika coalition raided a herd of cattle in Lumembe, Fizi territory. The assailants stole forty cows. The herdsmen took their weapons and went to get their cows back. While looking for the cows the farmers were ambushed by the Mai-Mai Yakutumba. Three herders, aged 29, 35 and 41, died in the attack. The FARDC repelled the assailants and brought thirty of the forty cows back.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Yakutumba combatants, under the CNPDSC/Malaika coalition raided a herd of cattle in Lumembe, Fizi territory. The assailants stole forty cows. The herdsmen took their weapons and went to get their cows back. While looking for the cows the farmers were ambushed by the Mai-Mai Yakutumba. Three herders, aged 29, 35 and 41, died in the attack. The FARDC repelled the assailants and brought thirty of the forty cows back.

title/0/en: Armed men broke into a civilian's home in the Majengo neighborood of Goma. They shot a man dead and looted several of his belongings.
notes/en: Armed men broke into a civilian's home in the Majengo neighborood of Goma. They shot a man dead and looted several of his belongings.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a bar in the Mabanga-nord neighborood in Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a bar in the Mabanga-nord neighborood in Goma. They shot and wounded a man and a woman. The victims were hospitalized at Heal Africa and CBCA Ndosho hospitals.

title/0/en: A coalition of Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin and Mai-Mai Kifuafua Baeni attacked the coalition of Mai-Mai Kifuafua Shalio and Mai-Mai Kirikicho in Kilambo, Lulambo, Tuonane and Biriko villages.
notes/en: A coalition of Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin and Mai-Mai Kifuafua Baeni attacked the coalition of Mai-Mai Kifuafua Shalio and Mai-Mai Kirikicho in Kilambo, Lulambo, Tuonane and Biriko villages. During the clash two people of the Shalio and Kirikicho coalition died and the population was displaced.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin attacked the Mai-Mai Kirikicho positions in Lulere and Kautu, in Kalehe and Masisi territories.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin attacked the Mai-Mai Kirikicho positions in Lulere and Kautu, in Kalehe and Masisi territories. Other unidentified gunmen also attacked other Mai-Mai Kirikicho positions. These attacks resulted in six Mai-Mai Kirikicho dead and one captured and one Mai-Mai Delhpin injured. The unidentified gunmen raped a 13-year-old girl. The clash lasted intermittently for 15 days.

title/0/en: Armed men raided five civilians' homes in the village of Murambi, Beni territory.
notes/en: Armed men raided five civilians' homes in the village of Murambi, Beni territory. The assailants tortured and injured a civilian and looted 42,000 Congolese francs, $60, clothes, two plastic chairs, one battery and one table. One of the assailants was arrested and confessed that he was one of the people who escaped during the Beni prison break.

title/0/en: Unknown armed men killed a self-proclaimed colonel of the Nyatura Delta group and one of his bodygards.
notes/en: Unknown armed men killed a self-proclaimed colonel of the Nyatura Delta group and one of his bodyguards. The assailants killed him and the bodyguard at his home.

title/0/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants attacked a convoy of civilians escorted by the FARDC 17km from Vitshumbi.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants attacked a convoy of civilians escorted by the FARDC 17 kilometers from Vitshumbi. During the attack one FARDC lieutenant and one assailant died, one FARDC and one civilian were injured and one person was kidnapped. The assailants demanded a ransom of $5,000 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants attacked the NDC Guidon position in Mwekwe, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants attacked the NDC Guidon position in Mwekwe, Lubero territory. During the clash two NDC Guidon combatants died. The Mai-Mai Mazembe drove the NDC Guidon out of the village.

title/0/en: CNRD combatants attacked the Nyatura Ngwiti position in Muheto, Masisi territory.
notes/en: CNRD combatants attacked the Nyatura Ngwiti position in Muheto, Masisi territory. Six Nyatura Ngwiti died in the clash, including the self-proclaimed Nyatura Chief Ngwiti himself.

title/0/en: Nyatura Kasongo combatants killed a police commander in Muhongozi, Masisi territory.
notes/en: Nyatura Kasongo combatants killed a police commander in Muhongozi, Masisi territory.

title/0/en: Three armed men broke into a civilian's house in Mutilipi.
notes/en: Three armed men broke into a civilian's house in Mutilipi. The assailants demanded money but the victim did not have any. One of the assailants shot him in the abdomen and killed him. One of the assailants arrested two days later confessed that he was one of the people who escaped during Beni prison break on 11 June 2017, during which over 900 prisoners escaped.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants killed a man at the hospital in Lubero center.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants killed a man at the hospital in Lubero center. The victim who had been abducted by the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Ndoluma on 08/06/2017 had escaped to go to the hospital in Lubero to get treatment. The assailants killed him at the hospital.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Karakara combatants hacked a civilian with machetes in Rwenena.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Karakara combatants hacked a civilian with machetes in Rwenena. The assailants had kidnapped the victim on 08/04/2017. Local women discovered the victim's body in a state of advanced decomposition.

title/0/en: A Mai-Mai Charles combatant assaulted a canoe with three fishermen aboard. He stole the canoe and kidnapped one fisherman, demanding that the other two go and get the ransom.
notes/en: A Mai-Mai Charles combatant assaulted a canoe with three fishermen aboard. He stole the canoe and kidnapped one fisherman, demanding that the other two go and get the ransom. ICCN park rangers based in Lulimbi chased the kidnapper who started to shoot at them. During the clash the park rangers killed the kidnapper and his hostage.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Yakutumba simultaneously attacked the FARDC positions in Kikonde, Kasandjala and Alenge villages in Fizi territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Yakutumba simultaneously attacked the FARDC positions in Kikonde, Kasandjala and Alenge villages in Fizi territory. During the attack the Mai-Mai Yakutumba killed two FARDC and injured three others. They also seized several FARDC weapons.

title/0/en: NDC Guidon combatants attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Kateku, Lubero territory.
notes/en: NDC Guidon combatants attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe in Kateku, Lubero territory. During the clash six NDC Guidon and four Mai-Mai Mazembe died, three NDC Guidon, two Mai-Mai Mazembe and two women were injured.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attempted to kill the chef de groupement Muja in Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attempted to kill the chef de groupement Muja in Nyiragongo territory. During the assassination attempt the assailants killed his bodyguard, a policeman, and a civilian who came to help.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kyeshero neighborood in Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Kyeshero neighborood in Goma. The assailants killed the owner and injured the bodygard who was a policeman.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a policeman in Ndosho, Goma, while he was trying to come to the rescue of a family threatened by the attackers.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot and killed a policeman in Ndosho, Goma, while he was trying to come to the rescue of a family threatened by the attackers. The attackers stole the victim's weapon.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the NDC Guidon in Vutumbe, Lubero territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the NDC Guidon in Vutumbe, Lubero territory. During the clash the FARDC killed two NDC Guidon combatants and the NDC Guidon injured an FARDC.

title/0/en: Four FDLR-FOCA combatants looted 35 goats in Rubona while children were in the process of herding them.
notes/en: Four FDLR-FOCA combatants looted 35 goats in Rubona while children were in the process of herding them. They also abducted three children to accompany the goats. The children came back the same evening and found that ten goats had come back by themselves after escaping from the convoy. Twenty-five goats remained with the assailants.

title/0/en: Armed men, wearing FARDC uniforms, attacked a car leaving Butembo in direction of Kasindi at the village of Kyamaseru in the Semuliki plains.
notes/en: Armed men, wearing FARDC uniforms, attacked a car leaving Butembo in direction of Kasindi at the village of Kyamaseru in the Semuliki plains. While the car driver was turning to escape the attack the assailants shot at the vehicle and wounded the driver's foot.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked NDC Guidon combatants in Kateku and Kimaka villages in southwest Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked NDC Guidon combatants in Kateku and Kimaka villages in southwest Lubero territory. The Mai-Mai Mazembe killed four NDC Guidon combatants, injured one and abducted five others. Mai-Mai Mazembe also seized five guns, two rocket launchers and other military belongings.

title/0/en: CNRD combatants attacked the Nyatura Kasongo in Mpati, Masisi territory.
notes/en: CNRD combatants attacked the Nyatura Kasongo in Mpati, Masisi territory. During the clash the CNRD killed two Nyatura Kasongo combatants.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Butachibera combatants tortured and injured a 46 years old man in Mbarata, Kalehe territory, following a land-related conflict between the victim and a Raia Mutomboki officer.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Butachibera combatants tortured and injured a 46 years old man in Mbarata, Kalehe territory, following a land-related conflict between the victim and a Raia Mutomboki officer. These combatants also burned down two houses belonging to the victim. They forced the vicitim to pay $150 and one goat.

title/0/en: NDC Guidon combatants kidnapped a civilian in Vuhaya, Lubero territory, whom they accused of collaborating with the Mai-Mai Mazembe.
notes/en: NDC Guidon combatants kidnapped a civilian in Vuhaya, Lubero territory, whom they accused of collaborating with the Mai-Mai Mazembe. They also kidnapped another civilian who attempted to negotiate the release of the first victim. The NDC Guidon combatants demanded a cow as a ransom. The population gave them a cow but the kidnappers accepted to release only one hostage. It is onmly pon 09/11/2017 that the NDC Guidon released the second hostage after a ransom of $250 was paid.

title/0/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants broke into a civilian's home in Kibututu, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants broke into a civilian's home in Kibututu, Rutshuru territory. The assailants shot the owner of the house and stabbed him to death in the chest. They also looted the victim's goats.

title/0/en: Three FDLR-FOCA combatants broke into a civilian's house in Rubare, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Three FDLR-FOCA combatants broke into a civilian's house in Rubare, Lubero territory, where they looted seven goats, a bag of salt and 5kg of cassava flour.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Kyandenga combatants kidnapped a civilian who was returning from his cocoa field.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Kyandenga combatants kidnapped a civilian who was returning from his cocoa field. Upon hearing the news the population mobilized to search for the hostage. The kidnappers shot at the search party wounding three people. The injured people were hospitalized at Beni general hospital. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $50,000 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed motorbike taxi drivers on the Lubero-Butembo road at Lumisi
notes/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed motorbike taxi drivers on the Lubero-Butembo road at Lumisi in Lubero territory. One taxi driver was shot and killed.

title/0/en: Nyatura Love combatants kidnapped the driver of a motorcycle and his two passengers.
notes/en: Nyatura Love combatants kidnapped the driver of a motorcycle and his two passengers. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2,000 to release the hostages. They injured the motorbike driver with a machete.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked NDC Guidon combatants in Kasugho agglomerate in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked NDC Guidon combatants in Kasugho agglomerate in Lubero territory. One Mai-Mai Mazembe and four civilians were killed, one NDC Guidon was injured. Among the four civilians killed, two were shot and two others were summarily executed by the NDC as they were accused of collaborating with the Mai-Mai Mazembe.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Pipompa combatants killed a woman in Chibinda, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Pipompa combatants killed a woman in Chibinda, Kalehe territory. The assailants accused her of having thrown a spell on a Raia Mutomboki officier's son in March 2017.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked a camp of FNL combatants, in Simbi, and arrested 6 combatants.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked a camp of unknown Burundian combatants in Simbi and arrested 6 combatants.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men wearing military uniforms raided a civilian house on Kituku Avenue where they looted telephones, computers, clothes and other household goods.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men wearing military uniforms raided a civilian house on Kituku Avenue where they looted telephones, computers, clothes and other household goods. The soldiers then shot an FARDC major who was passing with his family for a prayer vigil. This major was wounded and was admitted to the general hospital in Goma.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a man in the Mabanga neighborhood of Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a man in the Mabanga neighborhood of Goma. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $5,000 for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: Nyatura combatants under the command of John Love attacked the FARDC position in Butare, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Nyatura combatants under the command of John Love attacked the FARDC position in Butare, Rutshuru territory. In the attack, one civilian was wounded. The attackers seized FARDC weapons and ammunitions and looted the population.

title/0/en: NDC Guidon combatants attacked the FARDC in Vuyinga following a misunderstanding between these two actors who are usually allies in this part of Lubero territory.
notes/en: NDC Guidon combatants attacked the FARDC in Vuyinga following a misunderstanding between these two actors who are usually allies in this part of Lubero territory. The NDC Guidon killed three FARDC, seized their weapons and ammunitions and burned their camp down. MONUSCO peacekeepers intervened in support of the FARDC to chase the NDC Guidon from Vuyinga.

title/0/en: Unknown armed men kidnapped a taxi driver.
notes/en: Unknown armed men kidnapped a taxi driver. The kidnappers did not disclose the reasons for the kidnapping or demand a ransom. They also stole the victim's motorbike.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Kalundu, Lubero territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Kalundu, Lubero territory. After being repelled by the Mai-Mai Mazembe, NDC Guidon combatants looted property of the population during their flight. Seven NDC Guidon combantants were killed and two were captured, while one Mai-Mai Mazembe was killed. There were multiple combatants injured on both sides. The Mai-Mai Mazembe also stole nine weapons.

title/0/en: Nyatura combatants under the command of John Love attacked the FARDC position in Bambu, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Nyatura combatants under the command of John Love attacked the FARDC position in Bambu, Rutshuru territory. Six FARDC were killed and one injured. Six women, two boys and four girls were injured. The assailants also stole weapons and ammunitions from the FARDC.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed the woman they had abducted on 29/07/2017 in Cizi village, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed the woman they had abducted on 29/07/2017 in Cizi village, Kalehe territory. The body of the victim was found in a field after seven days of captivity.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants attacked the FARDC position in Kaviru.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants attacked the FARDC position in Kaviru. One FARDC soldier was killed and three were injured and the assailants stole one weapon.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin attacked the Mai-Mai Shalio positions in Kifuruka, Kilambo, Tuonana and Biriko villages for three days.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin attacked the Mai-Mai Shalio positions in Kifuruka, Kilambo, Tuonana and Biriko villages for three days. Six Mai-Mai Shalio, one Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin and four civilians died and nine Mai-Mai Shalio, two Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin and seven civilians were injured. Several houses were burned down in the village where the clash took place.

title/0/en: An unidentified Mai-Mai group raided Muhangi, around 50 kilometers west of Butembo. The group kidnapped the police commander and village chief.
notes/en: An unidentified Mai-Mai group raided Muhangi, around 5 kilometers west of Butembo. The group kidnapped the police commander and village chief.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men abducted two civilians close to Buhimba.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men abducted two civilians close to Buhimba.

title/0/en: Three unidentified armed men stole $4,000 and other belongings from a civilian in Lwango, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Three unidentified armed men stole $4,000 and other belongings from a civilian in Lwango, Kalehe territory. The victim was on his way to Goma to purchase good for trading.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a civilian's house in Kinyamigha/Museya, in the far south of Beni territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a civilian's house in Kinyamigha/Museya, in the far south of Beni territory. They looted $80, a radio and a solar panel. Before leaving the assailants shot the father of the household. The victim, who was injured on his right shoulder, was treated at a local health center.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe released three women, including one minor, in Kasesa.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe released three women, including one minor, in Kasesa. The women had been adbucted in retaliation for the five people who had been abducted by the Nyatura led by John Love on 07/30/2017. The Mai-Mai Mazembe's demand for a hostage exchange was not successful as the Nyatura-Love did not release their five hostages.

title/0/en: An FARDC convoy heading to Kirumba was ambushed by Mai-Mai Mazembe at Kanyatsi.
notes/en: An FARDC convoy heading to Kirumba was ambushed by Mai-Mai Mazembe at Kanyatsi. Two FARDC soldiers were killed.

title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men attacked a motorcycle on the road Ishasha-Kiwanja.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men attacked a motorcycle on the road Ishasha-Kiwanja. The assailants shot and injured the driver. They escaped into the bush with the woman travelling on the motorcycle.

title/0/en: Unknown armed men tortured and injured three civilians close to Nyasheke, in the Virunga National Park, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unknown armed men tortured and injured three civilians close to Nyasheke, in the Virunga National Park, Rutshuru territory. The attackers accused them of collaborating with the FDLR.

title/0/en: An unknown Nyatura group reportedly killed three men in Butare village for refusing to pay a tax imposed by armed groups in the area.
notes/en: An unknown Nyatura group reportedly killed three men in Butare village for refusing to pay a tax imposed by armed groups in the area.

title/0/en: Two unidentified armed men attacked a motorcycle transporting money-changers in Rombe II district in Uvira.
notes/en: Two unidentified armed men attacked a motorcycle transporting money-changers in Rombe II district in Uvira. The assailants threw a grenade and shot bullets in the air to scare the money-changers. They abandoned a bag full of money and run away. The assailant took the bag.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Elenge combatants looted travellers on the road Walikale-Bukavu.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Elenge combatants looted travellers on the road Walikale-Bukavu. Three civilians were shot and injured because they refused to hand over their belongings. The assailants also burnt down 22 houses in Musenge, where the combatants accused the population of refusing to give them food.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as Nyatura Domi shot and killed three men who refused to pay a local tax in Butare in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Nyatura Domi combatants shot and killed three men who refused to pay a local tax in Butare, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants who had kidnapped three men on 07/26/2017 close to Rubare, Rutshuru territory, released two of the three hostages.
notes/en: FDLR-FOCA combatants who had kidnapped three men on 07/26/2017 close to Rubare, Rutshuru territory, released two of the three hostages. The two hostages' families paid a ransom for their release. The amount has not been declared.

title/0/en: Prisoners set their mattresses alight, to protest that they had not been fed for 3 days.
notes/en: Prisoners set their mattresses alight, to protest that they had not been fed for 3 days. The Women's Block of Goma prison was destroyed.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe kidnapped three women, including one minor, in Kasesa in retaliation for the five people kidnapped by the Nyatura led by John Love on 07/30/2017.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe kidnapped three women, including one minor, in Kasesa in retaliation for the five people kidnapped by the Nyatura led by John Love on 07/30/2017. The assailants demanded a hostage exchange. The hostages were raped by the Mai-Mai Mazembe.

title/0/en: The police arrested 25 protestors demanding the implementation of the 31 December 2016 Agreement.
notes/en: The police arrested 25 protestors demanding the implementation of the 31 December 2016 Agreement, in Goma. The victims were incarcerated in the police detention facility close to townhall in Goma.

title/0/en: The PNC arrested eleven LUCHA activists in Butembo while they were demostrating to demand the publication of the electoral calendar and economic and social reforms.
notes/en: The PNC arrested eleven LUCHA activists in Butembo while they were demostrating to demand the publication of the electoral calendar and economic and social reforms. The PNC locked them up in the prison of the criminal investigative police. The activists were released the following day.

title/0/en: The police fired live ammunition at LUCHA supporters protesting outside CENI offices in Bukavu.
notes/en: The police fired live ammunition at LUCHA supporters protesting outside CENI offices in Bukavu. The Police wounded five people and arrested two journalists covering the protest.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers attacked FNL Nzabampema rebels in Kiliba, Uvira territory, while the latter were escaping a Burundian army attack at the Burundi-DRC border.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers attacked FNL Nzabampema rebels in Kiliba, Uvira territory, while the latter were escaping a Burundian army attack at the Burundi-DRC border. The FARDC captured one FNL rebel and seized a weapon.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Bukununu, Lubero territory, killing a 20-year-old man and shooting three other men in their twenties, wounding them.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Bukununu, Lubero territory, killing a 20-year-old man and shooting three other men in their twenties, wounding them. They also looted money, goats, sheeps and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed an FARDC convoy escorting a man who was suspected for murder in the village of Mighobwe, south Lubero territory, to bring him to the military prosecutor in Kirumba.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed an FARDC convoy escorting a man who was suspected for murder in the village of Mighobwe, south Lubero territory, to bring him to the military prosecutor in Kirumba. Two FARDC were killed in the ambush. The assailants withdrew without freeing the suspected killer.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Shabani raided Misheshe village, Kalehe territory, where they looted 785,000 Congolese francs, seven goats and eleven chickens.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Shabani raided Misheshe village, Kalehe territory, where they looted 785,000 Congolese francs, seven goats and eleven chickens. The assailants forcedly recruited five men, including two minors. The local chief who tried to negotiate their release was then kidnapped. The assailants demanded 350,000 Congolese francs and one goat to release them.

title/0/en: Three FDLR-FOCA combatants attempted to kidnap a civilian at the entrance to his house when he was returning from work.
notes/en: Three FDLR-FOCA combatants attempted to kidnap a civilian at the entrance to his house when he was returning from work. When he tried to escape they shot him in the leg and then tortured him. The assailants looted three goats from a house closeby.

title/0/en: Two FARDC raped a 16-year-old girl in Kaloba.
notes/en: Two FARDC raped a 16-year-old girl in Kaloba. The victim was accompanied by her 5-year-old sister who escaped and alerted their parents.

title/0/en: The unidentified men who abducted a civilian in Kananira village released him a day later.
notes/en: The unidentified men who abducted a civilian in Kananira village released him a day later. The victim was found with injuries.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles ambushed an FARDC patrol in the Virunga National Park, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Charles ambushed an FARDC patrol in the Virunga National Park, Rutshuru territory. Ten FARDC were killed, including four officers, and eight were injured.

title/0/en: Nyatura combatants, led by John Love, searched the luggage of fifteen people who were returning from Kanyabayonga to Mutanda.
notes/en: Nyatura combatants, led by John Love, searched the luggage of fifteen people who were returning from Kanyabayonga to Mutanda. After the search the assailants abducted five men aged 22, 24, 25, 28 and 36.The assailants accused these men of being Mai-Mai because, according to them, they were carrying machetes and spears in their luggage.

title/0/en: The kidnappers released two hostages they had kidnapped on 07/29/2017 in Butembo.
notes/en: The kidnappers released two hostages they had kidnapped on 07/29/2017 in Butembo. The kidnappers who had demanded a ransom of $900 finally only received 100 airtime units (worth $1) for their release.

title/0/en: The kidnappers released the civilian they had kidnapped on 07/27/2017.
notes/en: The kidnappers released the civilian they had kidnapped on 07/27/2017. The release occurred after a payment of $1500. The kidnappers abandoned the hostage in Rubaya, Masisi territory.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Shabani combatants recruited two men and one boy who were returning from their fields.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Shabani combatants recruited two men and one boy who were returning from their fields. The Raia Mutomboki shot the boy who tried to run away while they were been taken to the armed group's headquarters in Musenyi. The victim was hospitalised at the Maibano health center.

title/0/en: Unknown armed men attacked the FDLR-FOCA in Karambi in the Virunga National Park, in the south of Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unknown armed men attacked the FDLR-FOCA in Karambi in the Virunga National Park, in the south of Rutshuru territory. One FDLR-FOCA captain was killed.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into two houses in the Rughenda district of Butembo where they kidnapped two men aged 34 and 37.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into two houses in the Rughenda district of Butembo where they kidnapped two men aged 34 and 37. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $900.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men abducted a civilian in Kananira village, Kalehe Territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men abducted a civilian in Kananira village, Kalehe Territory. During the abduction, the victim was tortured and injured. He was released a day later.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Nyambuga, Kalehe territory, while the owners were sleeping. The assailants took $575.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in Nyambuga, Kalehe territory, while the owners were sleeping. The assailants took $575. They tied the father of the household to a coffee tree before leaving.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier detonated a grenade in the middle of a crowd who came to claim the illegal alcohol he had seized from a civilian and that the soldier was starting to sell.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier detonated a grenade in the middle of a crowd who came to claim the illegal alcohol he had seized from a civilian and that the soldier was starting to sell. Six men and one woman were injured.

title/0/en: Unidentified men abducted a 62-year-old woman from the village of Cizi, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men abducted a 62-year-old woman from the village of Cizi, Kalehe territory. The motive of the abduction is unknown.

title/0/en: Four M23 combatants released the hostage they had kidnapped on 07/25/2017 after a ransom payment of $400.
notes/en: Four M23 combatants released the hostage they had kidnapped on 07/25/2017 after a ransom payment of $400.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a man in Katalogwa.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a man in Katalogwa. The kidnappers called him on the phone and asked him where to spend the night. When the victim came out of his house to speak to them, they kidnapped him and took him to an unknown place. They demanded a ransom of $3000. The victim was released after three days.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Donatien combatants broke into Nyombe where they raped eight women between the ages of 15 and 24 and looted belongings.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Donatien combatants broke into Nyombe where they raped eight women between the ages of 15 and 24 and looted belongings. The population escaped to the forest.

title/0/en: Policemen shot to death a civilian in Loa Numbi after a new mining venture was established there.
notes/en: Policemen shot to death a civilian in Loa Numbi after a new mining venture was established there. The incident was triggered by a quarrel between the police and members of the community who opposed the venture.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Kasiki.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Kasiki. Seven Mai-Mai and three FARDC were killed, while several FARDC were injured.

title/0/en: Policemen opened fire on the population who was demonstrating to express their dissatisfaction on the nomination of two mining agents as owners of the Ruziba mining site in Lumbishi.
notes/en: Policemen opened fire on the population who was demonstrating to express their dissatisfaction on the nomination of two mining agents as owners of the Ruziba mining site in Lumbishi. One civilian died by bullet.

title/0/en: Prisoners in Bukavu prison exploded a grenade and then fought to escape the prison.
notes/en: Prisoners in Bukavu prison detonated a grenade and then  broke out of prison. Four prisoners were killed, many were wounded, and twenty escaped.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a civilian in Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a civilian in Goma. The killers strangled him and threw him in a gutter close to the Papyrus stationery shop a few meters from the local administrative office in Mikeno, Birere. The victim was a clerk at the High Court in Goma and member of an opposition party.

title/0/en: NDC Guidon members attacked their fellow combatants following the announcement of the surrender of the rebel leader Ntabo Ntaberi Sheka, the leader of another NDC faction.
notes/en: NDC Guidon members attacked their fellow NDC Guidon combatants following the announcement of the surrender of the rebel leader Ntabo Ntaberi Sheka, the leader of another NDC faction. The former accused the latter of having triggered Sheka's surrender by attacking his positions. One combatant was injured.

title/0/en: Nyatura combatants killed a businessman and stole $14,650 and the victim's phone.
notes/en: Nyatura combatants killed a businessman and stole $14,650 and the victim's phone.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men, who had kidnapped a child on 07/10/2017 in Rombe II district in Uvira, released the hostage after a ransom of $300 was paid.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men, who had kidnapped a child on 07/10/2017 in Rombe II district in Uvira, released the hostage after a ransom of $300 was paid.

title/0/en: A coalition of Mai-Mai Karakara and Mai-Mai Mwenyemali attacked an FARDC position in Matiaza.
notes/en: A coalition of Mai-Mai Karakara and Mai-Mai Mwenyemali attacked an FARDC position in Matiaza. One FARDC and two civiliansone man and two womenwere injured. The assailants set the FARDC camp on fire and looted food from the FARDC camp.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as FDLR-FOCA combatants kidnapped three men near Rubare in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Armed men identified as FDLR-FOCA combatants kidnapped three men near Rubare in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a $15,000 ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: Unidentified men armed with bladed weapons wounded a civilian in his field in Makungwe in the Beni Territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men armed with bladed weapons wounded a civilian in his field in Makungwe in the Beni Territory. When the FARDC intervened, the assailants fled toward the Semuliki valley.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Simba attacked the FARDC position in Mabuo, a mining village.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Simba attacked the FARDC position in Mabuo, a mining village. One FARDC was killed as well as one Mai-Mai Simba combatant and a girl injured by a stray bullet. During the same incident, the assailants went door to door pillaging residences, pharmacies, and shops. They took everything, including the domestic animals and an HF radio transmitter. They kidnapped around a hundred people to carry their heavy loot.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Nguru set fire to the house and property of a civilian in Kakunda, in the northern part of Lubero territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Nguru set fire to the house and property of a civilian in Kakunda, in the northern part of Lubero territory. The assailants were looking for the father of the household, reportedly in order to kill him for collaborating with ICCN agents (park rangers).

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot a civilian at night while the victim and his wife were leaving their home to go to the toilet, injuring him.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot a civilian at night while the victim and his wife were leaving their home to go to the toilet, injuring him. The victim was treated at the Masisi General Hospital.

title/0/en: NDC Guidon combatants kidnapped two men in Mayiba.
notes/en: NDC Guidon combatants kidnapped two men in Mayiba. They demanded $800 in ransom for the hostages' release.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier killed a civilian in Kipese, Lubero territory, when he attempted to burglar the victim's house.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier killed a civilian in Kipese, Lubero territory, when he attempted to burglar the victim's house.

title/0/en: Four M23 combatants broke into the house of a civilian in Kingarame.
notes/en: Four M23 combatants broke into the house of a civilian in Kingarame. The assailants kidnapped the father of the household. They demanded $5000 for hostage's release. He was released after 4 days.

title/0/en: Policemen and FARDC soldiers tortured a prengant woman in Nyalugusha as they wanted to arrest her husband who was not at home.
notes/en: Policemen and FARDC soldiers tortured a prengant woman in Nyalugusha as they wanted to arrest her husband who was not at home. The victim miscarried and is being hospitalized at Numbi hospital.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe killed the two kidnappers of a civilian in Mubana in Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe killed the two kidnappers of a civilian in Mubana in Lubero territory. The Mai-Mai organized an impromptu trial to condemn the kidnappers to death before burning them alive.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided the CBCA church in Bulera.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided the CBCA church in Bulera. They looted 6000 Congolese francs and other belongings.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot a civilian in his field in Mugora, Rutshuru territory, while the victim was harvesting beans.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot a civilian in his field in Mugora, Rutshuru territory, while the victim was harvesting beans. The soldier wanted to loot half of his harvest and the farmer resisted. The victim was shot in the thigh.

title/0/en: Armed men identified as members of the Raia Mutomboki Shukuru group robbed several motorcyclists and their passengers in Mukowa, Kalehe Territory.
notes/en: Armed men identified as members of the Raia Mutomboki Shukuru group robbed several motorcyclists and their passengers in Mukowa, Kalehe Territory. The assailants wounded two people with bladed weapons and looted money and other belongings.

title/0/en: An armed man belonging to an unidentified Nyatura group robbed three people riding on a mortorcycle.
notes/en: An armed man belonging to an unidentified Nyatura group robbed three people riding on a mortorcycle. The assailant looted the victims' money.

title/0/en: An unidentified gunman robbed a motorcycle carrying two traders in the Virunga National Park 3km from Rutshovu in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: An unidentified gunman robbed a motorcycle carrying two traders in the Virunga National Park 3km from Rutshovu in Rutshuru territory. The assailant looted $800 and two phones from these traders.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the position of the FARDC in Bingi, Lubero Territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the position of the FARDC in Bingi, Lubero Territory. The FARDC repelled the attack, killing two Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants.

title/0/en: Three armed men raped two girls in Kirambo while the victims were travelling from Ramba to Ziralo.
notes/en: Three armed men raped two girls in Kirambo while the victims were travelling from Ramba to Ziralo. The rapists were arrested by the FARDC.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot a taxi driver in Kabulu I, Kalehe territory as he was trying to extort money from him.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot a taxi driver in Kabulu I, Kalehe territory as he was trying to extort money from him. The injured victim was taken to Goma for appropriate care.

title/0/en: The population demonstrated against the nomination of a new local Chief in Biriba.
notes/en: The population demonstrated against the nomination of a new local Chief in Biriba. The police unsuccessfully tried to disperse the demonstrators. Finally the FARDC managed to disperse the demonstrators. No victims were reported.

title/0/en: NDC Guidon attacked Mai-Mai Mazembe's positions in Kyambuli and Miriki in the south-west of Lubero territory, dislodging them.
notes/en: NDC Guidon attacked Mai-Mai Mazembe's positions in Kyambuli and Miriki in the south-west of Lubero territory, dislodging them. Five NDC Guidon combatants were killed and thirteen injured, while two were killed and one wounded among the Mai-Mai Mazembe. After the fighting, the NDC Guidon looted drugs and the money that had been intended to finalize the construction of the local health center.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani forcefully recruited six men including one minor to join their armed group.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Shabani forcefully recruited five men and one minor to join their armed group, in Burali village, Kalehe territory

title/0/en: Des hommes arms non identifis ont tu un policier par balle  50 mtres du sous-commissariat de la police de Luofu, en territoire de Lubero.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot to death a policeman 50 meters from the police station in Luofu, in Lubero territory. The assailants did not take anything from the victim.

title/0/en: NDC-R and Mai-Mai Mazembe clashed at Kanune village.
notes/en: NDC-R and Mai-Mai Mazembe clashed at Kanune village. At least two Mai-Mai Mazembe and six NDC-R combatants were killed, as well as five civilians. The clash triggered a movement of IDPs towards Kirumba, Kayna and Kanyabayonga.

title/0/en: FDLR-RUD combatants attacked a convoy of civilians escorted by the FARDC 4 km from Vitshumbi, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: FDLR-RUD combatants attacked a convoy of civilians escorted by the FARDC 4 km from Vitshumbi, Rutshuru territory. The assailants kidnapped five people who were trying to run away.

title/0/en: FDLR-RUD combatants raided Rugarama and Shinda villages in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: FDLR-RUD combatants raided Rugarama and Shinda villages in Rutshuru territory, where they looted 24 goats, telephones and many other goods.

title/0/en: Angry FARDC looted Alimbongo in Lubero territory.
notes/en: FARDC looted Alimbongo in Lubero territory after one of their soldiers was killed.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Butachibera combatants ambushed civilians who were returning from the Karasi market in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Butachibera combatants ambushed civilians who were returning from the Karasi market in Kalehe territory. They looted several objects belonging to the population (telephones, shoes and other goods) and injured 23 civilians. They also allegedly raped at least two girls.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked an APCLS position in Muhanga, Masisi territory.
notes/en: The FARDC fought with the APCLS position around Mahanga, Masisi territory over a. period of five days. Two rebels were killed, one civilian woman was killed, three men and a woman were injured, and four FARDC were injured.

title/0/en: Two FARDC soldiers, caught as they were stealing in Mukuna neighborhood of Butembo, injured a young man among the youths who pursued them.
notes/en: Two FARDC soldiers, caught as they were stealing in Mukuna neighborhood of Butembo, injured a young man among the youths who pursued them.

title/0/en: A group of Mai-Mai (unknown faction) attacked the FARDC and police positions in Alimbongo, Lubero territory. The assailants beheaded an FARDC captain.
notes/en: A group of Mai-Mai (unknown faction) attacked the FARDC and police positions in Alimbongo, Lubero territory. The assailants beheaded an FARDC captain. Three assailants died in the attack.

title/0/en: FDLR-RUD combatants kidnapped two men in Katwiguru, Rutshuru territory, while the victims were returning from their fields.
notes/en: FDLR-RUD combatants kidnapped two men in Katwiguru, Rutshuru territory, while the victims were returning from their fields.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Domi positions in Karambi and Ngoholo villages, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Domi positions in Karambi and Ngoholo villages, Rutshuru territory. Two Nyatura combatants and one civilian were killed and three civilians were injured.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a boy in Kiwanja rural commune, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a boy in Kiwanja rural commune, Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $6000 and $100 for food.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men held up several motorcycles on the National Road #3 in the Kahuzi Biega National Park.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men held up several motorcycles on the National Road #3 in the Kahuzi Biega National Park. The assailants stole $1500 and other belongings. They also tortured and injured four people.

title/0/en: Armed men broke into the house of a civilian, in Kanyihunga, Beni Territory, and took him to an unknown destination.
notes/en: Armed men broke into the house of a civilian, in Kanyihunga, Beni Territory, and took him to an unknown destination.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai (unknown faction) burned down the office of the police and of the National Intelligence Agency (Agence Nationale de Renseignement - ANR) in Kasithu, Beni territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai (unknown faction) burned down the office of the police and of the National Intelligence Agency (Agence Nationale de Renseignement - ANR) in Kasithu, Beni territory. They also burned the motorcycle belonging to the head of the ANR branch in Kasithu.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki (faction unknown) combatants raped a woman and a girl in Bumoga, Kalehe territory, and stole some money.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki (faction unknown) combatants raped a woman and a girl in Bumoga, Kalehe territory, and stole some money.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Kasongo in Yoroba, Rutshuru territory when the Nyatura were roaming the fields.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Nyatura Kasongo in Yoroba, Rutshuru territory when the Nyatura were roaming the fields. One Nyatura was killed.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe lauched a counterattack against the NDC Guidon in Kyambuli and Kateku, on the border between Walikale and Lubero territories.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe lauched a counterattack against the NDC Guidon in Kyambuli and Kateku, on the border between Walikale and Lubero territories. Two Mai-Mai were killed and six injured. Seven NDC Guidon combatants were killed and three injured. Six civilians were injured.

title/0/en: Unidentified men armed with crude weapons killed seven people in Kahira, Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men armed with crude weapons killed seven people in Kahira, Masisi territory.

title/0/en: A group of ten Mai-Mai Nzirunga looted three cows and injured five others in a farm in Mahipi, Beni territory.
notes/en: A group of ten Mai-Mai Nzirunga looted three cows and injured five others in a farm in Mahipi, Beni territory.

title/0/en: Two armed men, members of FDLR-RUD released the man they had kidnapped on 07/16/2017.
notes/en: Two armed men, members of FDLR-RUD released the man they had kidnapped on 07/16/2017. The man was liberated after a ransom of $2000 was paid.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped three men, one woman and a girl who were travelling on a FUSO truck on the Kiwanja-Goma road in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped three men, one woman and a girl who were travelling on a FUSO truck on the Kiwanja-Goma road in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $5000.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers broke into a farm in Mukulya, south of Beni.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers broke into a farm in Mukulya, south of Beni, where they looted $120, food, electrical material, clothes, twelve goats, fifteen rabbits, six ducks, ten chickens and ten guinea pigs.

title/0/en: NDC Guidon combatants attacked the NDC Sheka positions in Maninge, Buwere and Kibungu, Walikale territory.
notes/en: NDC Guidon combatants attacked the NDC Sheka positions in Maninge, Buwere and Kibungu, Walikale territory. Three civilian men were injured, one NDC Sheka combatant was killed and one NDC Guidon combatant was injured. The clash started in the afternoon of 17 July 2017 did not end until the evening of 19 July 2017.

title/0/en: NDC Guidon combatants attacked the Mai-Mai position in Kyambuli.
notes/en: NDC Guidon combatants attacked the Mai-Mai position in Kyambuli. Two Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants were killed and five were injured. Two NDC Guidon combatants were killed, two women were killed and three men injured among the civilian population.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into the Catholic Church "Reine des Anges" in Bunyuka.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into the Catholic Church "Reine des Anges" in Bunyuka. They kidnapped two priests and stole a motorcycle and several other goods that they loaded onto two vehicles belonging to the church. The two vehicles were found the following morning, abandoned 20km away, towards Kavasewa in Bwino-Karuruma, at the border with the Virunga National Park. They demanded $200,000 in ransom for the priests.

title/0/en: Two FARDC soldiers shot a civilian in Misisi in Fizi territory after demanding all the money he allegedly had received on behalf of Amuri Yakutumba, the commander of the Mai-Mai Yakutumba.
notes/en: Two FARDC soldiers shot a civilian in Misisi in Fizi territory after demanding all the money he allegedly had received on behalf of Amuri Yakutumba, the commander of the Mai-Mai Yakutumba. The victim died immediately.

title/0/en: Two FDLR-RUD combatants kidnapped a man in Buganza, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: Two FDLR-RUD combatants kidnapped a man in Buganza, Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $2000. He was released after three days.

title/0/en: A coalition between Nyatura (unknown faction) and FDLR-FOCA attacked the FARDC in Ngiko.
notes/en: A coalition between Nyatura (unknown faction) and FDLR-FOCA attacked the FARDC in Ngiko. An FARDC soldier and one FDLR-FOCA combatant were killed and a woman was injured.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers and policemen tortured and injured a man in Mapimo, Shabunda territory.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers and policemen tortured and injured a man in Mapimo, Shabunda territory while the victim was trying to negotiate the release of his brother who was in jail.

title/0/en: APCLS combatants attacked the FARDC position in Kitchanga.
notes/en: APCLS combatants attacked the FARDC position in Kitchanga. Two civilians were killed and one seriously injured.

title/0/en: Unidentified men armed with crude weapons broke into a house where they killed the mother of the household.
notes/en: Unidentified men armed with crude weapons broke into a house where they killed the mother of the household. The victim's body was found beheaded.

title/0/en: Unidentified men abducted three civilians in Nyiragongo.
notes/en: Unidentified men abducted three civilians in Nyiragongo. The place were the hostages are held is unknown and no ransom has been demanded.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants killed two men who were returning from their fields in Itebero, Walikale territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants killed two men who were returning from their fields in Itebero, Walikale territory.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers looted Kipese, Lubero territory, after having pushed the Mai-Mai Mazembe out of the village.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers looted Kipese, Lubero territory, after having pushed the Mai-Mai Mazembe out of the village. They stole telephones, clothes and other belongings.

title/0/en: An FARDC drunk soldier shoot a man who was passing by the place where the soldier was having a drink in Mabalako, Beni territory.
notes/en: An FARDC drunk soldier shoot a man who was passing by the place where the soldier was having a drink in Mabalako, Beni territory. The victim was brought to the general hospital in Mabalako for emergency care. According to the doctor, the victim was in stable condition. The fate of the perpetrator is not known.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Simba position in Fwamba, in the mining site called "Sous-sol", Walikale territory.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Simba position in Fwamba, in the mining site called "Sous-sol", Walikale territory. Two Mai-Mai were killed and one Mai-Mai was injured.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked Kipese, a rural commune around 60 km southeast of Butembo, Lubero territory, at 530AM.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked Kipese, a rural commune around 60 km southeast of Butembo, Lubero territory, at 530AM. After fighting for more than three hours the FARDC launched a counteroffensive at 3PM, managing to repel the Mai-Mai and regain control of Kipese. Three Mai-Mai and two FARDC died in the attack.

title/0/en: Armed men broke into the campus of the Bilingual Christian University of Congo where they stabbed and injured the guards and one student.
notes/en: Armed men broke into the campus of the Bilingual Christian University of Congo where they stabbed and injured the guards and one student. They also stole computers and at least ten cameras.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a man in the village of Bigaruka, Nyiragongo territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a man in the village of Bigaruka, Nyiragongo territory.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Lukoba raided the village of Nyalubemba where they looted property and abducted 18 people.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Lukoba raided the village of Nyalubemba where they looted property and abducted 18 people. The assailants forced these people to carry the looted property.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a woman in Bweranfula, Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a woman in Bweranfula, Masisi territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided a household in the Butsili neighborhood of Beni where they looted property and wounded a man and a woman.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided a household in the Butsili neighborhood of Beni where they looted property and wounded a man and a woman.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai combatants shot dead a civilian in Kavasewa.
notes/en: Mai-Mai combatants shot dead a civilian in Kavasewa.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the neighborhood "Cit-Belge," where they tortured and wounded two men and a woman and killed a goat. The assailants left without taking anything.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the neighborhood "Cit-Belge," where they tortured and wounded two men and a woman and killed a goat. The assailants left without taking anything.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants wounded two civilians at the administrative office of Kitsombiro.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants wounded two civilians at the administrative office of Kitsombiro.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided several households in the Katwa neighborhood of Butembo, where they looted money and other property. They also tortured and injured a civilian.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided several households in the Katwa neighborhood of Butembo, where they looted money and other property. They also tortured and injured a civilian.

title/0/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms raided two households where they looted phones, a radio, a TV, a machete and a bag.
notes/en: Armed men wearing FARDC uniforms raided two households where they looted phones, a radio, a TV, a machete and a bag.

title/0/en: NDC Guidon combatants attacked NDC Sheka after a meeting between the two factions failed to delimit their respectives areas of control.
notes/en: NDC Guidon combatants attacked NDC Sheka after a meeting between the two factions failed to delimit their respectives areas of control.

title/0/en: Clashes between the army and Mai-Mai militia to control Ishasha
notes/en: Clashes took place between the army and Mai-Mai Charles to control Ishasha, Rutshuru territory. Three Mai-Mai and nine soldiers were killed; four soldiers and three Mai-Mai wounded.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Charles attacked the FARDC positions in Ishasha.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Charles combatants attacked the FARDC position in Ishasha, Rutshuru territory. Nine soldiers were killed and four wounded among the FARDC, while seven were killed and four wounded among the Mai-Mai. The FARDC recovered a machine gun and the Mai-Mai looted several cases of ammunition.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai combatants from an unidentified faction attacked an FARDC position in Museya and killed two soldiers.
notes/en: Mai-Mai combatants from an unidentified faction attacked an FARDC position in Museya and killed two soldiers.

title/0/en: APCLS combatants attacked the FARDC position in Bukombo. The attackers burned down part of the FARDC camp. The FARDC repelled the attack.
notes/en: APCLS combatants attacked the FARDC position in Bukombo. The attackers burned down part of the FARDC camp. The FARDC repelled the attack.

title/0/en: The woman and her two daughters kidnapped and raped by Raia Mutomboki (unknown faction) returned to their village after a ransom of $360 was paid.
notes/en: The woman and her two daughters kidnapped and raped by Raia Mutomboki (unknown faction) returned to their village after a ransom of $360 was paid.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier wounded a civilian at a bar when his commander tried to disarm him after the soldier threatened other clients.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier wounded a civilian at a bar when his commander tried to disarm him after the soldier threatened other clients.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Nguru attacked the position of the park guards ICCN in Museya. FARDC sent reinforcements. Mai-Mai Nguru looted several properties and destroyed the park guards building.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Nguru attacked the position of the park guards ICCN in Museya. FARDC sent reinforcements. Mai-Mai Nguru looted several properties and destroyed the park guards building.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Kyandenga combatants looted a vehicle that was returning from the market of Makumo. The attackers shot and wounded two civilians.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Kyandenga combatants looted a vehicle that was returning from the market of Makumo. The attackers shot and wounded two civilians.

title/0/en: A Raia Mutomboki group reportedly kidnapped three civilians from the village of Bongobongo in Walikale territory.
notes/en: A Raia Mutomboki group reportedly kidnapped three civilians from the village of Bongobongo in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: An armed group attacked the FARDC position in the hills of Kakungwe, not far from the Mulongwe neighborhood of Uvira.
notes/en: An armed group attacked the FARDC position in the hills of Kakungwe, not far from the Mulongwe neighborhood of Uvira. At the same time, another group engaged with an FARDC unit close to the MONUSCO office in Uvira town.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe and NDC-R groups clashed at Kasugho village.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe and NDC-R groups clashed at Kasugho village. At least eight Mazembe combatants were killed and NDC-R militia fighters reportedly took control of the area.

title/0/en: Using bladed weapons, NDC Guidon killed two civilians suspected of being collaborators of Mai-Mai Mazembe in Kasugho, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Using bladed weapons, NDC Guidon killed two civilians suspected of being collaborators of Mai-Mai Mazembe in Kasugho, Lubero territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a child in Rombe II district in Uvira.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a child in Rombe II neighborhood in Uvira. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $3000 to release the hostage.

title/0/en: Four armed men identified as Mai-Mai combatants broke into the house of a Burundian refugee in Sange, and murdered him.
notes/en: Four armed men identified as Mai-Mai combatants broke into the house of a Burundian refugee in Sange, and murdered him.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai combatants (faction unknown) attacked the FARDC position in Munanira in Uvira territory. The attackers burned down the FARDC camp in Munanira and wounded one FARDC soldier. A stray bullet also killed a civilian.
notes/en: Mai-Mai combatants (faction unknown) attacked the FARDC position in Munanira in Uvira territory. The attackers burned down the FARDC camp in Munanira and wounded one FARDC soldier. A stray bullet also killed a civilian.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai combatants (faction unknown) attacked the FARDC position in Mambango (Beni town), wounding three FARDC soldiers.
notes/en: Mai-Mai combatants (faction unknown) attacked the FARDC position in Mambango (Beni town), wounding three FARDC soldiers.

title/0/en: The ADF released the hostages who had been forced to carry the property looted in the villages of Vido, Kakuka, Muzirandura and Kitsimba.
notes/en: The ADF released the hostages who had been forced to carry the property looted in the villages of Vido, Kakuka, Muzirandura and Kitsimba.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked an FARDC position at Birundule.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked an FARDC position at Birundule. The Mai-Mai were able to push the FARDC out of the village, after which they burned down the military camp and left the area.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants attacked an FARDC position. The attack lasted for two days. Three Mai-Mai combatants were killed, two wounded, and two captured, while two FARDC were killed.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combatants attacked a FARDC position. The attack lasted for two days. Three Mai-Mai combatants were killed, two wounded, and two captured, while two FARDC were killed.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a woman at her home in Nyamugari.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a woman at her home in Nyamugari.

title/0/en: Men carrying bladed weapons broke into the house of a civilian, where they injured the father of the household. The assailants stole belongings in the house as well as musical instruments belonging to the church. One of the assailants was apprehended by the neighbors who beat him.
notes/en: Men carrying bladed weapons broke into the house of a civilian, where they injured the father of the household. The assailants stole belongings in the house as well as musical instruments belonging to the church. One of the assailants was apprehended by the neighbors who beat him.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a civilian. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men kidnapped a civilian. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the hostage.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the positions of Raia Mutomboki Mirage in Kaminjenje and Kabalo.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the positions of Raia Mutomboki Mirage in Kaminjenje and Kabalo. The clashes lasted for three days. The FARDC captured four Raia Mutomboki and Mirage's wife. The Mai-Mai launched a counterattack, burning down the FARDC camp and looting property in the camp.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers intercepted a group of Mai-Mai Kilalo in the Mambango neighborhood of Beni.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers intercepted a group of Mai-Mai Kilalo in the Mambango neighborhood of Beni. A clash ensued. The FARDC were able to chase the Mai-Mai into the bush. That same night, the FARDC captured a Mai-Mai with his weapons.

title/0/en: Heavy fighting broke out between the Gumino armed group and unidentified Mai-Mai in Mikenge village, Mwenga territory.
notes/en: Heavy fighting broke out between the Ngumino armed group and unidentified Mai-Mai in Mikenge village, Mwenga territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a civilian on the BihambweRubaya road in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a civilian on the BihambweRubaya road in Masisi territory.

title/0/en: Angry demonstrators destroyed the office of the military prosecutor in Kirumba, Lubero territory, after the funeral of a local man who had been killed by unidentified armed men.
notes/en: Angry demonstrators destroyed the office of the military prosecutor in Kirumba, Lubero territory, after the funeral of a local man who had been killed by unidentified armed men.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki (unknown faction) combatants abducted a woman with her two underage daughters and raped them.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki (unknown faction) combatants abducted a woman with her two underage daughters and raped them.

title/0/en: Armed men dressed in FARDC clothing and speaking Kinyarwanda kidnapped six people in Kanyamisango village in Rutshuru territory. They demanded a ransom for the release of the hostages.
notes/en: Armed men dressed in FARDC clothing and speaking Kinyarwanda kidnapped six people in Kanyamisango village in Rutshuru territory. They demanded a ransom for the release of the hostages.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC post in Kipese.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC post in Kipese. Two Mai-Mai and one FARDC died. Three Mai-Mai and 4 FARDC were injured. Three Mai-Mai were captured.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Kitsombiro.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the FARDC position in Kitsombiro. One Mai-Mai was killed and 3 FARDC were captured by the Mai-Mai.

title/0/en: An unidentified Mai-Mai group killed a man in Kavegha.
notes/en: An unidentified Mai-Mai group killed a man in Kavegha. The assailants cut his throat and took his body with them.

title/0/en: The FDLR-FOCA shot at a vehicle transporting traders from Kiwanja to Goma, injuring one man and one woman.
notes/en: The FDLR-FOCA shot at a vehicle transporting traders from Kiwanja to Goma, injuring one man and one woman. Two people who were riding a motorbike just behind the vehicle were shot and the motorbike driver died from his injuries.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Nzirunga attacked the FARDC position in Maswata.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Nzirunga attacked the FARDC position in Maswata. The FARDC warded off the attack.

title/0/en: A combatant of the Nyatura group (Ngwiti faction) killed a boy in Butare, Territory of Masisi
notes/en: A combatant of the Nyatura group (Ngwiti faction) killed a boy in Butare, Territory of Masisi

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men killed a man in Kirumba.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men killed a man in Kirumba.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into two houses in Yamba-Yamba where they stole $200, 60,000 Congolese francs and several goods.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into two houses in Yamba-Yamba where they stole $200, 60,000 Congolese francs and several goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a student in Bukavu.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a student in Bukavu. The assailants demanded $2000 in ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified combatants attacked the villages Vido, Kitsimba, Muzirandura and Kakuka.
notes/en: ADF and unidentified combatants attacked the villages Vido, Kitsimba, Muzirandura and Kakuka. The FARDC launched a counterattack, pushing the assailants back. Four FARDC including a colonel were injured and goods were looted.

title/0/en: A Raia Mutomboki group kidnapped a boy and his sister.
notes/en: A Raia Mutomboki group kidnapped a boy and his sister. They raped the girl. The assailants demand $500 in ransom.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the NDC Guidon position in Kasugho.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the NDC Guidon position in Kasugho. The FARDC arrived to help the NDC Guidon take back their position. In the clash 1 Mai-Mai, 3 NDC Guidon and 1 FARDC died.

title/0/en: A Raia Mutomboki group broke into the Doctors Without Borders' office, stealing $700, 34000 Congolese francs and other belongings.
notes/en: A Raia Mutomboki group broke into the Doctors Without Borders' office, stealing $700, 34000 Congolese francs and other belongings.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai combatants attacked the PNC post at Ndoluma village in the south of Lubero territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai combatants attacked the PNC post at Ndoluma village in the south of Lubero territory. The attackers burned down the PNC administrative office and released two detainees from PNC custody.

title/0/en: FARDC troops reportedly clashed with an unknown armed group allegedly from Tanzania in Kafulo village.
notes/en: FARDC troops reportedly clashed with an unknown armed group allegedly from Tanzania in Kafulo village. At least one FARDC soldier, a militiaman and two civilians were killed and several others wounded.

title/0/en: Unidentified men killed a guard in Ndosho.
notes/en: Unidentified men killed a guard in Ndosho. In the morning the victim's head and feet were found. The rest of the body was missing.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe killed Kamandi's Police commander with a machete.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe killed Kamandi's Police commander with a machete. The assailants had kidnapped the victim on 1 July 2017.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon kidnapped two people in Bingi.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon kidnapped two people in Bingi.

title/0/en: The FDLR-FOCA injured 2 men, 1 woman and 1 child who were travelling to Rutshuru.
notes/en: The FDLR-FOCA injured 2 men, 1 woman and 1 child who were travelling to Rutshuru. The incident took place in Mahura, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: The APCLS attacked the FARDC positions in Kashebere and in Kibati.
notes/en: The APCLS attacked the FARDC positions in Kashebere and in Kibati. Five APCLS died in the attack. The number injured APCLS and FARDC is unknown.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raped three women while they were going to their fields.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo raped three women while they were going to their fields.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga and Raia Mutomboki Maheshe clashed over a leadership struggle in the village of Kisungi, Walungu territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga and Raia Mutomboki Maheshe clashed over a leadership struggle in the village of Kisungi, Walungu territory. The incident resulted two fatalities: a RM Ndarumanga combatants and a civilian killed by a stray bullet.

title/0/en: FARDC troops reportedly clashed with suspected Mai-Mai Runion combatants in Kabumbe village.
notes/en: FARDC troops reportedly clashed with suspected Mai-Mai Runion combatants in Kabumbe village. At least three civilians were reported wounded and admitted tp the Nundu hospital.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe released 2 civilians they had kidnapped when the civilians wanted to negotiate the liberation of a Police commander in Kamandi.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe released 2 civilians they had kidnapped when the civilians wanted to negotiate the liberation of a Police commander in Kamandi. The civilians were released upon payment of a ransom of 550,000 Congolese francs and 2 goats.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 5-year-old boy while he was playing with his friends.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a 5-year-old boy while he was playing with his friends. They demanded $450 in ransom.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the FDLR-RUD who had kidnapped 6 civilians in Kahumiro.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the FDLR-RUD who had kidnapped 6 civilians in Kahumiro. The 6 civilians were released during the attack.

title/0/en: The unknown Raia Mutomboki group that had abducted people to carry stolen goods released 14 of them.
notes/en: The unknown Raia Mutomboki group that had abducted people to carry stolen goods released 14 of them.

title/0/en: FARDC troops clashed with RED-Tabara in Lubarika.
notes/en: FARDC troops clashed with RED-Tabara in Lubarika. According to reports, at least two suspected Rwandan and six Burundian combatants were captured. The FARDC clashed again with the the group in Munanira village captured one combatant, killed four and recovered three AK-47 rifles.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe kidnapped 2 people who wanted to negociate the liberation of the Kamandi Police commander who had been kidnapped 2 days before.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe kidnapped 2 people who wanted to negociate the liberation of the Kamandi Police commander who had been kidnapped 2 days before. The assailants demanded $1000 in ransom.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD broke into four houses in Rugarama.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD broke into four houses in Rugarama. They stole 26 goats, telephones and other belongings.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot the members of a family in Mighobwe.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot the members of a family in Mighobwe. The parents died on the spot. A child was injured.

title/0/en: The APCLS looted civilians' belongings at the crossroads between Kaancha and Kashebere.
notes/en: The APCLS looted civilians' belongings at the crossroads between Kaancha and Kashebere. Tha assailants forced 4 taxi drivers to transport the stolen goods. They APCLS also abducted the police commander of Kaancha, suspecting him of being an informant for the FARDC.

title/0/en: A coalition of Mai-Mai Charles and Mai-Mai Jackson attacked an FARDC position in Kamuhoro.
notes/en: A coalition of Mai-Mai Charles and Mai-Mai Jackson attacked an FARDC position in Kamuhoro. The FARDC supported by the park rangers managed to push the Mai-Mai coalition back but three FARDC died during the clashes.

title/0/en: An unidentified Raia Mutomboki group looted Masiba, Maibu and Bukanga villages.
notes/en: An unidentified Raia Mutomboki group looted Masiba, Maibu and Bukanga villages. They abducted 19 people to carry looted goods, 5 of whom were kept as hostages. The assailants demanded $250 per person in ransom.
