title/0/en: The NDC Guidon tortured and cut off the ears of four civilians in Kasugho.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon tortured and cut off the ears of four civilians in Kasugho.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe positions in Byanze, Kanzanza and Kandole.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Mazembe positions in Byanze, Kanzanza and Kandole. The number of deaths remains unknown although there have been casualties on both sides. The FARDC burned down the Mai-Mai Mazembe camp.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men, wearing FARDC uniforms, broke into a house where they kidnapped 3 civilians.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men, wearing FARDC uniforms, broke into a house where they kidnapped 3 civilians.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon took over the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Mabambi and looted the town.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon took over the Mai-Mai Mazembe position in Mabambi and looted the town. The Mai-Mai Mazembe abandoned the village just before the arrival of the NDC Guidon.

title/0/en: The armed group of FARDC retired General Sikatenda clashed with FARDC troops in Kilembwe, Fizi territory.
notes/en: The armed group of FARDC retired General Sikatenda clashed with FARDC troops in Kilembwe, Fizi territory. Several FARDC troops were reportedly wounded and admitted to Fizi hospital.

title/0/en: In Bukanga, Kalehe territory, where the Raia Mutomboki Shukuru forced the population to carry out communal labor, 29 people were arrested for refusing to participate.
notes/en: In Bukanga, Kalehe territory, where the Raia Mutomboki Shukuru forced the population to carry out communal labor, 29 people were arrested for refusing to participate. The Raia Mutomboki Shukuru killed a man by flogging. They also raped the victim's wife as she came to help her husband.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe kidnapped Kamandi's Police Commander in Kipese.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe kidnapped Kamandi's Police Commander in Kipese. The assailants demanded $1500 in ransom.

title/0/en: A Mai-Mai Mazembe group killed a man with machete.
notes/en: A Mai-Mai Mazembe group killed a man with machete.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped a man in the Buturande neighborhood of Kiwanja, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped a man in the Buturande neighborhood of Kiwanja, Rutshuru territory. They demanded a ransom of $2000 to release the victim.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kifuafua position in Kilungu, Walikale territory.
notes/en: The 3404th regiment of the FARDC attacked the position of the Mai-Mai Kifuafua of Delphin Mbaenda in Kilungu, Walikale territory. No casualties were reported.

title/0/en: A FARDC soldier injured a man following a fight between their daughters.
notes/en: A FARDC soldier injured a man following a fight between their daughters. The victim is being treated in a local health center.

title/0/en: The FDLR-FOCA tortured and raped three women in Kahumiro, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: The FDLR-FOCA tortured and raped three women in Kahumiro, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: A policeman shot a man in Kamubuyo, Beni territory.
notes/en: A policeman shot a man in Kamubuyo, Beni territory.

title/0/en: The CNPSC coalition attacked a FARDC position in Lulimba, Fizi territory, and ransacked the weapons depot
notes/en: Armed men attacked an FARDC position in Lulimba and ransacked the weapons depot. Local sources say that it is a new coalition of several armed groups called the CNPSC.

title/0/en: Armed men attacked a FARDC position in Misisi, Fizi territory, and ransacked the weapons depot.
notes/en: The CNPSC coalition attacked an FARDC position in Misisi and ransacked the weapons depot.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai militia attacked a military-escorted convoy in Lulimba.
notes/en: Mai-Mai militia attacked a convoy that was traveling with a military escort in Lulimba, Fizi territory. There were no reported fatalities, but 24 truck drivers protected by the convoy were abducted. There were 21 Tanzanian nationals and 3 Kenyan nationals, all driving Tanzanian-registered trucks.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped 3 men and 3 women in Kahumiro.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD kidnapped 3 men and 3 women in Kahumiro. They demanded $100 in ransom for each hostage.

title/0/en: A FARDC soldier shot at two men in Kirumba, Lubero territory following their refusal to buy him a beer.
notes/en: A FARDC soldier shot at two men in Kirumba, Lubero territory following their refusal to buy him a beer. One died, the other was seriously wounded.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot a taxi driver who died on the spot.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot a taxi driver who died on the spot. They also shot a couple; the man died at the CBCA Ndosho hospital and the woman is still being treated.

title/0/en: FARDC soldiers looted the village of Kasesa, Beni territory.
notes/en: FARDC soldiers looted the village of Kasesa, Beni territory. They stole $200 and several belongings.

title/0/en: While pursuing a Mai-Mai Kifuafua combatant in Tanganyika (Walikale territory), the FARDC killed 2 children and injured their father.
notes/en: While pursuing a Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin combatant, the FARDC killed 2 children and injured their father. The combatant managed to escape.

title/0/en: An unidentified Nyatura group killed a woman and her daughter while they were leaving to Bukavu to sell gold.
notes/en: An unidentified Nyatura group killed a woman and her daughter while they were leaving to Bukavu to sell gold.

title/0/en: The FARDC pushed the Mai-Mai Nzirunga, who had attacked their position in Kalau, back to Kalingathe.
notes/en: The FARDC pushed the Mai-Mai Nzirunga, who had attacked their position in Kalau, back to Kalingathe. Four FARDC and three Mai-Mai were killed in the clash.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga looted the villages of Kamungini and Bulumbu where they stole chickens, sheep and other belongings. T
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Ndarumanga looted the villages of Kamungini and Bulumbu where they stole chickens, sheep and other belongings. The forced 26 men, 7 women and  17 boys to transport the stolen goods.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Charles attacked FARDC positions and vehicles in Humule and Nyamilima.
notes/en: During the three days before the Congolese independence day, Mai-Mai Charles attacked FARDC positions and vehicles in Humule and Nyamilima, while led to continuous fighting during this period. Three FARDC were seriously injured, while 6 Mai-Mai were killed and 8 were captured. One civilian was also seriously injured.

title/0/en: An unidentified Mai-Mai group killed a man in Kigarama, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: An unidentified Mai-Mai group killed a man in Kigarama, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men attacked a vehicle transporting people and goods in Kabenga, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men attacked a vehicle transporting people and goods in Kabenga, western Kalehe territory. The assailants stole the belongings that were in the vehicle and forced 17 passengers to transport them. Five of the porters were minors.

title/0/en: The FARDC prevented the entry of Mai-Mai Nzirunga to Lubiriha village. One Mai-Mai was killed.
notes/en: The FARDC prevented the entry of Mai-Mai Nzirunga to Lubiriha village. One Mai-Mai was killed. One Mai-Mai and one FARDC were seriously injured.

title/0/en: Two unidentified men killed a trader on the road Kasese-Mapimo.
notes/en: Two unidentified men killed a trader on the road Kasese-Mapimo. The victim's body was found the following morning.

title/0/en: The FDLR-RUD looted 7 households in Kisorora, Rutshuru territory. They stole 28 goats and other belongings from the houses.
notes/en: The FDLR-RUD looted 7 households in Kisorora, Rutshuru territory. They stole 28 goats and other belongings from the houses.

title/0/en: Ten NDC Guidon combattants attacked 3 motorbikes that were transporting passengers.
notes/en: Ten NDC Guidon combattants attacked 3 motorbikes that were transporting passengers in Banamukobya, Walikale territory. They stole 500,000 Congolese francs and other belongings.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki combatants raped 2 young women and 1 minor in Lay Lay, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki combatants raped 2 young women and 1 minor in Lay Lay, Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kifuafua of Delphin Mbaenda in Kilungu, Walikale territory.
notes/en: The FARDC of the 3404th regiment attacked the Mai-Mai Kifuafua of Delphin Mbaenda in Kilungu, Walikale territory. Two civilians were killed, 1 Mai-Mai was killed and 2 Mai-Mai were injured.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the NDC Guidon position in Vukohwa village, Lubero territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Mazembe attacked the NDC Guidon position in Vukohwa village, Lubero territory. The Mai-Mai Mazembe killed 11 NDC Guidon combattants.

title/0/en: An unidentified Mai-Mai group attacked the FARDC post in Kaseghe, Lubero territory early in the morning.
notes/en: An unidentified Mai-Mai group attacked the FARDC post in Kaseghe, Lubero territory early in the morning. 4 Mai-Mai and 2 FARDC died in the attack. The FARDC managed to disperse the assailants. A FARDC soldier's wife was killed and a second one seriously injured.

title/0/en: NDC Guidon elements looted Bukendo village in Lubero territory.
notes/en: NDC Guidon elements looted Bukendo village in Lubero territory. While they were looting they shot in the air to frighten the population. They recruited 5 men and a young boy who were forced to transport the looted goods.

title/0/en: FDLR-RUD elements forced a farmer out of his house and killed him in a field in Bunyereza, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: FDLR-RUD elements forced a farmer out of his house and killed him in a field in Bunyereza, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: The director of the primary school Maendeleo was released by the Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo after the payment of a ransom.
notes/en: The director of the primary school Maendeleo was released by the Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo after the payment of a ransom.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Malepe neighborhood in Beni. They stole $10 and raped a 12-year-old girl.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a house in the Malepe neighborhood in Beni. They stole $10 and raped a 12-year-old girl.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided Katsiru, pillaging money, telephones, food and other goods.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided Katsiru, pillaging money, telephones, food and other goods.

title/0/en: Four unidentified armed men broke into a taxi driver's house.
notes/en: Four unidentified armed men broke into a taxi driver's house. They looted the house and kidnapped the taxi driver and requested a ranson to release him.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Nzirunga position in Kalau, 9 km from Beni.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Nzirunga position in Kalau, 9 km from Beni. The FARDC supported by MONUSCO peace keepers resisted and managed to push the Mai-Mai out of town. One civilian was killed and 8 wounded, while 5 Mai-Mai Nzirunga were killed and 3 wounded, and 3 FARDC were killed and two wounded.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Nyerere combatants shot two travellers close to the bridge over the Kiliba river.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Nyerere combatants shot two travellers close to the bridge over the Kiliba river. They killed one man and seriously injured the other.

title/0/en: Military operations on the Lemera plateau killed 13 Mai-Mai Fuliru and 2 Burundian rebels.
notes/en: FARDC operations around Lemera killed 13 Mai-Mai and 2 Burundian rebels.

title/0/en: Nyatura combatants broke into a civilian's house in Shinda and looted $300.
notes/en: Nyatura combatants broke into a civilian's house in Shinda and looted $300.

title/0/en: An unidentified Mai-Mai group killed the manager of a farm in Kanyihunga, Beni territory.
notes/en: An unidentified Mai-Mai group killed the manager of a farm  in Kanyihunga, Beni territory. The assailants stole 3 cows, several sheep, goats and chickens.

title/0/en: A Mai-Mai Charles combatant killed a farmer in his field in Kitoboko, Kiwanja, Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: A Mai-Mai Charles combatant killed a farmer in his field in Kitoboko, Kiwanja, Rutshuru territory.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combattants clashed with the FARDC in Mabambi, Lubero territory.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Mazembe combattants clashed with the FARDC in Mabambi, Lubero territory.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo kidnapped 4 men and 2 women in response to the arrest of three of their members.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo kidnapped 4 men and 2 women in response to the arrest of three of their members. They demanded the liberation of their members and $3000 in ransom for the kidnapped civilians.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a taxi driver's house.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a taxi driver's house. They injured him and looted several goods.

title/0/en: A policeman shot a motorcycle taxi driver who had just hit a taxi-bus.
notes/en: A policeman shot a motorcycle taxi driver who had just hit a taxi-bus.The driver of the bus had called the motorcycle driver a thief when the latter had started to flee. The policeman was put under arrest by his hierarchy.

title/0/en: Nyatura combatants killed an ANR agent in Birambizo.
notes/en: Nyatura combatants killed an ANR agent in Birambizo.

title/0/en: Three unknown armed men attacked and injured a young man with a machete at his home in Butembo.
notes/en: Three unknown armed men attacked and injured a young man with a machete at his home in Butembo.

title/0/en: The three people kidnapped on 17/06/2017 close to Tama, Lubero territory, were released thanks to an FARDC operation.
notes/en: The three people kidnapped on 17/06/2017 close to Tama, Lubero territory, were released thanks to an FARDC operation. One of the kidnappers injured by a bullet was arrested at the General Hospital in Kayna.

title/0/en: Five armed assailants kidnapped two men and a woman in their fields in Kitobindo in the territory of Lubero.
notes/en: Five armed assailants kidnapped two men and a woman in their fields in Kitobindo in the territory of Lubero. The three people were released thanks to an FARDC operation the following day.

title/0/en: Three Raia Mutomboki Shabani combatants tried to loot Mikonzi village in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Three Raia Mutomboki Shabani combatants tried to loot Mikonzi village in Kalehe territory. The population tried to stop and catch them. In response, the Raia Mutomboki shot and seriously injured three civilians.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo attacked a vehicle driving from Bukavu towards Bunyakiri at Miowe/Mafuo in Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo attacked a vehicle driving from Bukavu towards Bunyakiri at Miowe/Mafuo in Kalehe territory. They stole the passengers' goods. The FARDC who were posted 2 km away from the incident came to rescue the victims. A clash between FARDC and Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo ensued. One man and a woman were injured during the clash. 10 men were forced to carry the goods looted by the assailants.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki combatants led by Mirage Bitunya raided Lubilinga village in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki combatants led by Mirage Bitunya raided Lubilinga village in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: Three Mai-Mai Yakutumba combatants broke into the house of a woman during the night and raped her.
notes/en: Three Mai-Mai Yakutumba combatants broke into the house of a woman during the night and raped her. They also looted food and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified men strangled a male nurse to death and left him on the road leading to the health center where he worked in Lumbishi, Kalehe territory.
notes/en: Unidentified men strangled a male nurse to death and left him on the road leading to the health center where he worked in Lumbishi, Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Armed med raided a farm where they shot and seriously injured two farmers.
notes/en: Armed med raided a farm where they shot and seriously injured two farmers. The assailants run away when the FARDC arrived and intervened.

title/0/en: A FARDC Colonel raped a 16 years old girl in Biruwe, Walikale territory.
notes/en: A FARDC Colonel raped a 16 years old girl in Biruwe, Walikale territory. Subsequently he gave the girl's father 200,000 Congolese francs.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Nzirunga clashed with the FARDC and MONUSCO in Kabasha on the road between Beni and Butembo during two days.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Nzirunga clashed with the FARDC and MONUSCO in Kabasha on the road between Beni and Butembo during two days. Sixteen Mai-Mai were killed and twelve were captured. Eighteen FARDC were killed and seven injured. Two MONUSCO peacekeeping troops were injured.

title/0/en: Following violent clashes between the Mai-Mai Nzirunga and the FARDC in Kabasha, on the road between Beni and Butembo, the FARDC, while fleeing, looted the village.
notes/en: Following violent clashes between the Mai-Mai Nzirunga and the FARDC in Kabasha, on the road between Beni and Butembo, the FARDC, while fleeing, looted the village.

title/0/en: A commander of the armed group NDC Guidon raped a 13 years old girl in Bana-Muruhya, Walikale territory.
notes/en: A commander of the armed group NDC Guidon raped a 13 years old girl in Bana-Muruhya, Walikale territory.

title/0/en: Two ICRC workers kidnapped on June 7, 2017 were released in Kaseghe, southern Lubero territory.
notes/en: Two ICRC workers kidnapped on June 7, 2017 were released in Kaseghe, southern Lubero territory.

title/0/en: A group of 20 Vivuya Mai-Mai attacked the Tuha Mukulya road toll station south of Beni and killed a policeman.
notes/en: A group of 20 Vivuya Mai-Mai attacked the Tuha Mukulya road toll station south of Beni and killed a policeman. 12 Mai-Mai were captured by the FARDC.

title/0/en: The FARDC carried out a military operation in Lemera against the Mai-Mai Mwenyemali who were in a meeting in Rudaga, causing a violent clash.
notes/en: The FARDC carried out a military operation in Lemera against the Mai-Mai Mwenyemali who were in a meeting in Rudaga, causing a violent clash. Three FARDC were killed and six injured. One Mai-Mai was captured. The Mai-Mai looted five AK-47s, two ammunition boxes and stole the uniforms of the killed FARDC.

title/0/en: Armed men, who appeared to be FARDC soldiers, looted the office of the Institut du Lac in Village City 4, in Mboko, Fizi territory.
notes/en: Armed men, who appeared to be FARDC soldiers, looted the office of the Institut du Lac in Village City 4, in Mboko, Fizi territory. They stole 2,588,000 Congolese francs and other goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men shot a motorbike driver and stole his motorcycle.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men shot a motorbike driver and stole his motorcycle.

title/0/en: An unidentified person kidnapped an 8-year-old boy in the Himbi 2 neighborhood of Goma while the boy was walking to school.
notes/en: An unidentified person kidnapped an 8-year-old boy in the Himbi 2 neighborhood of Goma while the boy was walking to school. The kidnapper demanded for a ransom of $4,000.

title/0/en: The ADF attacked and looted Ibanda. They stole chickens, goats and other belongings.
notes/en: The ADF attacked and looted the village of Ibanda in Beni territory. They stole chickens, goats and other belongings.

title/0/en: Two factions of the Mai-Mai Kifuafua - one led by Baeni, the other by Maachano - clashed violently in Busurungi in Walikale territory.
notes/en: Two factions of the Mai-Mai Kifuafua - one led by Baeni, the other by Maachano - clashed violently in Busurungi in Walikale territory.

title/0/en: A dozen armed combatants attacked and robbed a motorbike driver and his passenger, a woman.
notes/en: A dozen armed combatants attacked and robbed a motorbike driver and his passenger, a woman, on the road between Buhavu and Bunyakiri, around the village of Mafuo, in Kalehe territory.

title/0/en: Armed men attacked taxi drivers and passengers in Kibinda where they stole $100, 50,000 Ugandan Shillings and phones.
notes/en: Armed men attacked taxi drivers and passengers in Kibinda where they stole $100, 50,000 Ugandan Shillings and phones. A man and a woman were injured.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men strangled to death a motorcycle taxi driver in a neighborhood of Butembo.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men strangled to death a motorcycle taxi driver in a neighborhood of Butembo. The body showed signs of torture.

title/0/en: Twelve Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo combatants ambushed people travelling along the Bukavu-Bunyakiri road close to Bikenge town and looted $2,450.
notes/en: Twelve Raia Mutomboki Hamakombo combatants ambushed people travelling along the Bukavu-Bunyakiri road close to Bikenge town and looted $2,450.

title/0/en: A group of Mai-Mai Nzirunga attacked Kangbayi prison in Beni where they allowed more than 900 prisoners to escape.
notes/en: A group of Mai-Mai Nzirunga attacked Kangbayi prison in Beni where they allowed more than 900 prisoners to escape. Four prisoners died in the attack and around 400 voluntarily followed the assailants who had just rescued them. The FARDC arrived late in support of the Congolese National Police guarding the prison, but did not manage to prevent the prison break.

title/0/en: A group of Mai-Mai Kifuafua detained and tortured two civil society activists in Biriko (Busurungi), in Walikale territory.
notes/en: A group of Mai-Mai Kifuafua detained and tortured two civil society activists in Biriko (Busurungi),  in Walikale territory. The two men suffered serious injuries. The assailants also stole a chainsaw, 80 liters of fuel, 50kg of nails and 50,000 Congolese francs.

title/0/en: A group of Mai-Mai Yakutumba looted a convoy of traders close to Bibogobogo, in Fizi territory.
notes/en: A group of Mai-Mai Yakutumba looted a convoy of traders close to Bibogobogo, in Fizi territory. The assailants looted telephones, salted fish and other goods. The assailants also raped two women.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Kirikicho combatants attacked and looted a passenger vehicle leaving Buhavu chefferie in direction of the groupement of Ziralo close to the Chinono forest.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Kirikicho combatants attacked and looted a passenger vehicle leaving Buhavu chefferie in direction of the groupement of Ziralo close to the Chinono forest. The assailants kidnapped two girls, took them into the forest and raped them.

title/0/en: The NDC Guidon raided the villages of Kailenge, Katanga and Rungoma, in Walikale territory.
notes/en: The NDC Guidon raided the villages of Kailenge, Katanga and Rungoma, in Walikale territory. They looted goods belonging to the population.

title/0/en: Members of the Mai-Mai Nzirunga killed and mutilated a farmer, abandoning his body in the Soma forest.
notes/en: Members of the Mai-Mai Nzirunga killed and mutilated a farmer, abandoning his body in the Soma forest, around ten kilometers from Kalunguta.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked and destroyed a camp of Mai-Mai Lafontaine (led by Muhambalyaki) in Kandole, Lubero territory in North Kivu.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked and destroyed a camp of Mai-Mai Lafontaine (led by Muhambalyaki) in Kandole, Lubero territory in North Kivu.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed a vehicle north of Rubare.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men ambushed a vehicle north of Rubare. They shot and killed a woman.

title/0/en: A coalition of APCLS and FDLR-RUD attacked the FARDC position in Pinga after the departure of MONUSCO peacekeepers.
notes/en: A coalition of APCLS and FDLR-RUD attacked the FARDC position in Pinga after the departure of MONUSCO peacekeepers. Two APCLS combatants were killed.

title/0/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kilalo position in Muhola.
notes/en: The FARDC attacked the Mai-Mai Kilalo position in Muhola. Two Mai-Mai and five FARDC were killed. The number of injured on both sides is unknown.

title/0/en: The four people kidnapped on 5 June by the Mai-Mai Kirikicho were released. The victims were tortured.
notes/en: The four people kidnapped on 5 June by the Mai-Mai Kirikicho were released. The victims were tortured.

title/0/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin and Mai-Mai Kifuafua Shalio recruited 12 young men in Bakano, Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Mai-Mai Kifuafua Delphin and Mai-Mai Kifuafua Shalio recruited 12 young men in Bakano, Walikale territory.

title/0/en: A group of FDLR-FOCA, looking for a farmer whom they accused of treason, killed 4 cows and stole three others.
notes/en: A group of FDLR-FOCA, looking for a farmer whom they accused of treason, killed 4 cows and stole three others.

title/0/en: An FARDC soldier shot and injured a civilian and stole all his belongings.
notes/en: An FARDC soldier shot and injured a civilian and stole all his belongings (including money, telephones and a radio). The victim was taken to the Oicha General Hospital, in Beni territory.

title/0/en: Three Raia Mutomboki combatants raped a 40-year-old woman in Nduma.
notes/en: Three Raia Mutomboki combatants raped a 40-year-old woman in Nduma. The rapists were caught by the police.

title/0/en: Unknown armed men attacked the FARDC position in Biriba/Bukonde, in Masisi territory.
notes/en: Unknown armed men attacked the FARDC position in Biriba/Bukonde, in Masisi territory during the night of 8 to 9 June 2017.

title/0/en: A Raia Mutomboki Shukuru group, lead by Shukuru himself, robbed several taxi drivers and their passengers close to Ebisha.
notes/en: A Raia Mutomboki Shukuru group, lead by Shukuru himself, robbed several taxi drivers and their passengers close to Ebisha taking $5,500, solar panels, batteries and other goods. The assailants forced the victims to carry the looted goods and killed one of them who had wanted to stop at Luoo bridge because he was tired.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a home, shot and killed the owner, a woman, in the Ndosho neighborhood in Goma.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into a home, shot and killed the owner, a woman, in the Ndosho neighborhood in Goma.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Corps du Christ combatants burned down four houses and other goods during the night in Kathanda.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Corps du Christ combatants burned down four houses and other goods during the night in Kathanda.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men raided the village of Lumbishi in Kalehe territory, where they shot and injured one person and looted the goods of several other people.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men raided the village of Lumbishi in Kalehe territory, where they shot and injured one person and looted the goods of several other people.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Charles combatants attacked the FARDC camp of Nyabitare.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Charles combatants attacked the FARDC camp of Nyabitare. They burned the FARDC camp down and killed three soldiers. Two soldiers' wives were also killed.

title/0/en: A Nyatura group kidnapped five men and a woman in Mugomba in Rutshuru territory.
notes/en: A Nyatura group kidnapped five men and a woman in Mugomba in Rutshuru territory. The kidnappers demanded a ransom of $600 to release the hostages.

title/0/en: Raia Mutomboki Lukoba combatants raided the village of Kachuba in Kabare territory.
notes/en: Raia Mutomboki Lukoba combatants raided the village of Kachuba in Kabare territory. The assailants attacked the FARDC position close to Kachuba and burned down the FARDC camp. Three FARDC died and several were injured. They also killed a civilian and looted the village before leaving two days later.

title/0/en: The FARDC stole the population's chickens and sheeps on the pretext that the people had not showed them the proper respect.
notes/en: The FARDC stole the population's chickens and sheeps on the pretext that the people had not showed them the proper respect.

title/0/en: APCLS combatants attacked the FARDC position in Nyabiondo, Masisi territory.
notes/en: APCLS combatants attacked the FARDC position in Nyabiondo, Masisi territory. The FARDC fought the assailants off, killing four APCLS combatants.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Kithikyolo burned down two farmers' houses in Rugetsi during the night.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Kithikyolo burned down two farmers' houses in Rugetsi during the night.
The Mai-Mai Simba ambushed an FARDC convoy 1 km from the village of Kilo, in Walikale territory. One FARDC major was injured.

title/0/en: An FARDC corporal shot a man who had escaped from an FARDC jail in Kikingi.
notes/en: An FARDC corporal shot a man who had escaped from an FARDC jail in Kikingi. The victim died on the spot and the corporal was arrested by the military police.

title/0/en: While crossing the road Mbau-Kamango South-North, an armed group shot two people riding a motorcycle (a driver and his passenger).
notes/en: While crossing the road Mbau-Kamango South-North, an armed group shot two people riding a motorcycle (a driver and his passenger). The driver died and the passenger managed to escape.

title/0/en: The FARDC supported by MONUSCO and the Virunga National Park rangers attacked several positions of the Mai-Mai Mazembe and Mai-Mai Charles in Kyanika, Ndwali, Kiserera, Kamuhororo, Kamandi and Nkenga.
notes/en: The FARDC supported by MONUSCO and the Virunga National Park rangers attacked several positions of the Mai-Mai Mazembe and Mai-Mai Charles in Kyanika, Ndwali, Kiserera, Kamuhororo, Kamandi and Nkenga. The fighting lasted for three days.

title/0/en: FDLR-RUD combatants raided the village of Kiseguru where they looted goods belonging to the population.
notes/en: FDLR-RUD combatants raided the village of Kiseguru where they looted goods belonging to the population. They also injured three men and a woman.

title/0/en: Mai-Mai Yakutumba attacked a group of herdsmen that was taking cows to Kalemie.
notes/en: Mai-Mai Yakutumba attacked a group of herdsmen that was taking cows to Kalemie. They killed a cowherd and looted 10 cows.

title/0/en: Armed men members of Raia Mutomboki Elenge attacked Tusoke where they looted goods from several households.
notes/en: Armed men members of Raia Mutomboki Elenge attacked Tusoke where they looted goods from several households. They also forced several people to carry the looted goods.

title/0/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a child in the Keshero Quarter in Goma, when the latter was on his way to school.
notes/en: Unidentified men kidnapped a child in the Keshero Quarter in Goma, when the latter was on his way to school. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of the child.

title/0/en: Unidentified armed men broke into the CBCA health center in Bughanga where they shot and injured a male nurse in charge of the health center.
notes/en: Unidentified armed men broke into the CBCA health center in Bughanga where they shot and injured a male nurse in charge of the health center. The incident took place in Luofu, Lubero territory.

title/0/en: The Raia Mutomboki arrested a woman suspected to be an informer for the FARDC in Kabalo, Walikale territory.
notes/en: The Raia Mutomboki arrested a woman suspected to be an informer for the FARDC in Kabalo, Walikale territory. They raped her and then killed her.
